1b1(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar skad du/ shrI gu h+ya sa ma dza ma hA tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/
1b2(rgyud 'bum): dpal gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la
1b3(rgyud 'bum): phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de
2a1(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi snying po rdo rje
2a2(rgyud 'bum): btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs so/ / brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang brjod kyis mi lang ba'i sangs rgyas
2a3(rgyud 'bum): kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub
2a4(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dam tshig rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
2b1(rgyud 'bum): sku rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsung rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
2b2(rgyud 'bum): thugs rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
2b3(rgyud 'bum): chen po rgyal ba rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher
2b4(rgyud 'bum): po chu rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po me rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rla
2b5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
3a1(rgyud 'bum): gzugs rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgra rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
3a2(rgyud 'bum): chen po dri rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ro rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po reg bya rdo rje dang /
3a3(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid rdo rje dang / de dag la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
3a4(rgyud 'bum): chen po brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang brjod kyis mi yang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab snyed rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nam
3a5(rgyud 'bum): mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa la/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mi bskyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad
3a6(rgyud 'bum): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rin chen dpal dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje 'od dpag tu med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje gdon
3b1(rgyud 'bum): mi za ba dang / de dag la sogs pa nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/
3b2(rgyud 'bum): til gyi gang bu bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad shin tu gang bar snang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
3b3(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags chen po'i tshul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/
3b4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkod pa de dag thams cad nyid kyi sku la zhugs par mdzad do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de
3b5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag po yongs su mnyes par bya ba'i phyir/ nyid kyi sku bud med kyi gzugs su mngon par sprul nas/ bcom
3b6(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i sku las mngon par byung bar gyur to/ / de la la la ni sangs rgyas spyan lta bu/ la la ni mA sa kI lta bu/ la la ni gos dkar mo lta bu/
3b7(rgyud 'bum): la la ni dam tshig sgrol ma lta bu/ la la ni gzugs kyi ngo bo lta bu/ la la ni sgra'i ngo bo lta bu/ la la ni dri'i ngo bo lta bu/ la la ni ro'i ngo bo lta bu/ la la ni reg gi ngo bo lta ba
4a1(rgyud 'bum): der yang dag par gnas par gyur to/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi snying
4a2(rgyud 'bum): po rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor rdul med pa gru bzhir byin gyis brlabs pa ni/ gsal ba de yi ngo bo nyid// sna tshogs gzugs kyis kun tu rgyas// sangs
4a3(rgyud 'bum): rgyas sprin gyis kun tu khyab/ / 'od zer 'phro ba mang po 'khrug/ gsal ba la sogs dkyil 'khor ldan// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
4a4(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i bdag po de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su bzhag par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs
4a5(rgyud 'bum): pa mi bskyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dpal dang / de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam
4a6(rgyud 'bum): par snang mdzad rnams/ de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'i thugs la zhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rje / de bzhin gshegs pa
4a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad zil gyis gnon pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas nam mkha'i
4b1(rgyud 'bum): sgyu 'phrul chen po don sgrub pa/ / sgyu 'phrul chen po dga' bas dga'// sgyu 'phrul chen po mag 'phrul can// sbyin bdag chen po gtso bo ste// tshul khrims chen po 'chang ba'i mchog/ bzong chen 'chang ba bstan
4b2(rgyud 'bum): pa ste/ / brtson 'grus chen po pha rol gnon// bsam gtan chen po ting 'dzin gnas// shes rab chen po lus 'chang ba// stobs po che la thabs che ba// smon lam ye shes rgya mtsho ste// byams chen rang bzhin
4b3(rgyud 'bum): dpag tu med/ / snying rje chen po blo yi mchog/ shes rab chen po blo chen ldan// thabs chen byed pa chen po ste// rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs dang ldan// shugs chen mgyogs pa chen po ste// rdzu 'phrul chen po cher grags
4b4(rgyud 'bum): pa/ stobs chen pha rol gnon pa po// srid pa'i ri bo chen po 'joms// mkhregs shing rdo rje chen po 'chang // drag po chen po drag shul che// 'jigs chen 'jigs par byed pa po// mgon po rigs mchog chen po
4b5(rgyud 'bum): ste/ bla ma gsang sngags che ba mchog/ theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas// theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi mchog/ sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che// thub pa chen po thub chen ldan// gsang sngags tshul chen las
4b6(rgyud 'bum): 'byung ba/ / gsang sngags chen po bdag nyid can// pha rol phyin bcu thob pa ste// pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas// pha rol byin bcu dag pa ste// pha rol phyin pa bcu yi tshul// sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon pa
4b7(rgyud 'bum): ste/ / sa bcu la ni rab tu gnas// shes bcu rnam dag bdag nyid can// shes bcu rnam dga'achang ba po// rnam pa bcu po don bcu'i don// thub dbang stobs bcu khyab pa'i bdag/ kun gyi don nim lus byed
5a1(rgyud 'bum): na nyid kyi dam tshig rin po che'i sprin gyis yang dag par mchod de/ phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// 'dus pa gsang ba las byung ba// de bzhin gshegs pa
5a2(rgyud 'bum): kun gyi gsang / / rdo rje snying po 'dus pa yi// de nyid bcom ldan bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa
5a3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad legs so legs so// 'on kyang 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang the tshom
5a4(rgyud 'bum): skye bar byed pa yin na/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan rnams lta ci smos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du gyur te/ the tshom thams cad
5a5(rgyud 'bum): gcod par mdzad pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol to// gang bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i yon tan khyad par can du gyur pa'ang de
5a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba ston par mi spro ba de/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshes
5a7(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad la byin gyis brlab pa mdzad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig 'byung ba'i tshig gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid pa myong ba dgyi
5b1(rgyud 'bum): ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu thob par bgyi ba'i bar gyi phyir yang dag par bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
5b2(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa de mkhyen nas/ ye shes kyi sgron ma rdo rje zhes bya
5b3(rgyud 'bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ zhe sdang gi rigs kyi sngags mchog gi snying po'i snying po 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // badz+ra d+h+r-i ka/
5b4(rgyud 'bum): de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid mi bskyod pa'i phyag rgya chen por sbyor ba'i thab
5b5(rgyud 'bum): nag po dkar po dmar po'i tshul du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje la bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
5b6(rgyud 'bum): kyi dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ gti mug gi rigs kyi mchog snying po'i snying po 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung
5b7(rgyud 'bum): podzi na dzI ka/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu rnam par snang mdzad kyi
6a1(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba'i thabs kyis/ dmar po nag po dkar po'i tshul du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i rgyab tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
6a2(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi grub pa gdon mi za ba'i mchog dam tshig 'byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ dam tshig 'gugs pa'i rigs kyi mchog gi snying po'i snying po
6a3(rgyud 'bum): 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang /
6a4(rgyud 'bum): thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu grub pa gdon mi za ba'i phyag rgya chen por sbyor ba'i thabs kyis ljang khu dang / nag po dang / dkar po'i tshul du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang
6a5(rgyud 'bum): gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i byang phyogs su bzhugs so// zhe sdang gti mug 'dod chags dang // yid bzhin nor bu dam tshig ste// rigs lngar gtogs pa 'di rnams kyis// 'did dang
6a6(rgyud 'bum): thar pa rab sgrub pa'o/ / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje 'dzin rjes su mnyes par byed pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
6a7(rgyud 'bum): nas rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyi btsun mo'i mchog 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // dwe Sha ra ti/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/ bcom
6b1(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya chen por sbyor ba'i thabs kyis/ dkar po nag po dmar po'i tshul du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i spyan sngar bzhu
6b2(rgyud 'bum): so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che 'byung ba'i rdo rje dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rigs kyi
6b3(rgyud 'bum): mchog gi snying po'i snying po 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // rat+na d+h+r-ika/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
6b4(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu rin chen dpal gyi phyag rgya chen por sbyor bas nam mkha'i gnas kyis ser po nag po dkar po'i tshul du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
6b5(rgyud 'bum): / sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i lho phyogs su bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags chen po'i rgyun 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge
6b6(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'dod chags kyi rigs kyi mchog gi snying po'i snying po 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // a ro l-ika/ de nas 'di phyung
6b7(rgyud 'bum): ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid/ 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rig pa'i bdag po'i phyag rgya chen po
7a1(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin par gyur te/ shar phyogs
7a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi sgrar bzhugs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su mnyes par byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs
7a3(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi btsun mo'i mchog 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // mo ha ra ti/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
7a4(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin par gyur te/ lho phyogs kyi grwar bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de
7a5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags 'dzin pa rjes su chags pa byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags
7a6(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pa'i btsun mo'i mchog 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // rA ga ra ti/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
7a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin par gyur te/ nub phyogs kyi grwar bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
7b1(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs sru ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab 'chang
7b2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i btsun mo'i mchog 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // badz+ra ra ti/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
7b3(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyi dbud med kyi gzugs 'dzin par gyur te/ byang phyogs kyi grwar bzhugs so// de bzhin gshegs pa
7b4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi btsun mo'i mchog dam tshig phun sum tshogs pa'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas//
7b5(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i khro bo chen po 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // ya man+ta kr-i ta/
7b6(rgyud 'bum): de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
7b7(rgyud 'bum): bsnyungs par byed pa'i tshul du shar phyogs kyi sgor bzhugs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mngon par byang chub pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
8a1(rgyud 'bum): zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa'i khro bo chen po 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo //
8a2(rgyud 'bum): pradz+nyAn+ta kr-i ta/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid/ rdo rje'i dam tshig bsnyengs
8a3(rgyud 'bum): ba'i tshul du lho phyogs kyi sgor bzhugs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos rin po che 'byung gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/
8a4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags 'tshang ba'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i khro bo chen po 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // pad+man
8a5(rgyud 'bum): kr-i ta/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
8a6(rgyud 'bum): gsung gi tshul du nub phyogs kyi sgor bzhugs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
8a7(rgyud 'bum): bar zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i khro bo chen po 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang
8b1(rgyud 'bum): thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / / big+h+nAn+ta kr-ita/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid
8b2(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi tshul du byang phyogs kyi sgor bzhugs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs
8b3(rgyud 'bum): mnyes par byed pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig sems dpa' rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las
8b4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dang po'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
8b5(rgyud 'bum): sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi bdag po la/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mchod pa byas te/ phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// sku dang gsung dang
8b6(rgyud 'bum): thugs kyi mchog/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // bla na med pa'i byang chub sems// bcom ldan snying po bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
8b7(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa mkhyen cing / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sems kyis yongs
9a1(rgyud 'bum): su rtog pa'ang thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyed kyis sems lus lta bu dang / lus sems lta bu dang /
9a2(rgyud 'bum): sems tshig tu brjod pa lta bur skyed cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs
9a3(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha' lta bur sbyar nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o kun tu bzang po yi// sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje can// skye ba med pa'i tshul gyis su// skye ba 'di ni rab tu
9a4(rgyud 'bum): bsgrags/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mngon par
9a5(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs par byang chub pa'i tshul rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// dngos po med pas sgom pa med// bsgom par bya ba sgom pa min/
9a6(rgyud 'bum): de ltar dngos po dngos med pas// sgom pa dmigs su med pa'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas
9a7(rgyud 'bum): gsungs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mngon par rtogs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/
9b1(rgyud 'bum): byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// dngos po thams cad dang bral ba// phung po khams dang skye mched dang // gzung dang 'dzin pa rnams spangs pa// chos bdag med pa mnyam nyid pas//
9b2(rgyud 'bum): rang sems gdod nas ma skyes pa// stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
9b3(rgyud 'bum): ba rdo rje mi bskyod pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mi zad pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// dngos po 'di rnams ma smras pa/
9b4(rgyud 'bum): chos dang chos nyid med pa ste// nam mkha' lta bur bdag med pa// byang chub tshul 'di brtan pa'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan
9b5(rgyud 'bum): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// chos rnams
9b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dngos med cing / / chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam par spangs// bdag med chos las kun tu byung // byang chub tshul 'di brtan pa'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen
9b7(rgyud 'bum): dpal gyis gsungs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pa 'od zer 'bar ba rdo rje sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so//
10a1(rgyud 'bum): ma skyes pa yi chos rnams la// ngo bo med de sgom pa'ang med// nam mkha'i tshul du sbyor ba yis// dngos po dag tu rab tu bsgrags// zhes bcom ldan 'das de
10a2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pas gsungs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa grub pa gdon mi za ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zil gyis gnon pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i
10a3(rgyud 'bum): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// chos rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// gdod nas dag pa nam mkha' bzhin// byang chub med cing mngon rtogs
10a4(rgyud 'bum): med/ byang chub tshul 'di brtan pa'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa grub pa gdon mi za bas gsungs so// de nas byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
10a5(rgyud 'bum): chen po rnams/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba'i chos kyi de kho na nyid kyi yi ge thos nas ngo mtsha du gyur/ rmad du gyur te/ ched
10a6(rgyud 'bum): du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ / e ma 'o sangs rgyas e ma'o chos// chos bshad pa ni ngo mtshar che// yang dag don ni dag pa'i don// byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag med
10a7(rgyud 'bum): ba yi chos las byung / / sangs rgyas byang chub rdzogs mdzad pa// rnam par mi rtog dmigs su med// byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo// kun tu bzang po thams cad don// byang chub
10b1(rgyud 'bum): sems ni rab bskor ba/ / byang chub spyod pa rdo rje che// byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo// dag pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs// sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje 'dzin// sangs rgyas byang
10b2(rgyud 'bum): chub rab ston pa/ / byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ byang chub sems
10b3(rgyud 'bum): kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/ de bzhin
10b4(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phro ba'i sprin bkod pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje dkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u 'di gsungs so// oM shU n+ya
10b5(rgyud 'bum): tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma kohaM/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom pa ni// 'od zer sprin gyi bkod pa che// sangs rgyas 'bar ba'i
10b6(rgyud 'bum): 'od dang mnyam/ / 'od zer sna lngas kun tu khyab// kun nas yongs su zlum po ste// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis khyab// mchod pa rnam pa lngas brgyan pa// mdor na de ltar bsgom
10b7(rgyud 'bum): nas su/ / gzugs ni dbus su bsgom par bya// rnam par snang mdzad phyag rgya che// sku gsung thugs kyis mtshan pa'o// sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje yi// phyag rgya chen po bsgom par bya//
11a1(rgyud 'bum): tshogs gnyis dang ni ldan pa yis// bsdus dang gcig tu sbyor ba yis// mi bskyod pa yi rgya mchog dang // dkon mchog dpal gyi rgya chen dang // tshe dpag
11a2(rgyud 'bum): med pa'i 'od byed dang / / thogs med grub pa'i rgya chen rnams// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// in+d+ra nI la'i kha dog 'dra// rab
11a3(rgyud 'bum): 'bar phyag na rdo rje bsnams/ / rnam par gtsigs la 'jigs 'jigs lta// shel dang zla ba'i 'od 'dra ba// thor tsugs cod pan gyis brgyan pa// rab 'bar phyag na 'khor lo bsnams/
11a4(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs rgyan gyis mdzes par brgyan// 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser 'od 'dra// sangs rgyas sprin gyis kun tu 'khrigs// de yi phyag na rdo rje che// rtse mo dgu pa rnam par sgom// marka ta yi
11a5(rgyud 'bum): 'od 'dra ba/ / rdo rje 'bar bas rnam par brgyan// kun tu 'bar ba'i sprin gyis khyab// phyag na rin chen bsnams par sgoms// pad+ma rA ga'i mdog 'dra ba// gtso bo 'dod chags 'bar ba mangs
11a6(rgyud 'bum): rab 'bar phyug na pad+ma bsnams/ / 'dod chags rdo rje can bsgom bya// 'od zer sna lnga'i 'od 'dra'i sku// gdon mi za ba rdo rje can// zhi ba phyag na ral gri bsdams// sangs rgyas dkyil
11a7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor bsgom par bya/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid rdo rje zhes
11b1(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ sku dang / gsung dang / thugs byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags 'di gsungs so// oM d+harmA d+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma kohaM/ rin chen chen po
11b2(rgyud 'bum): kha dog lnga/ / yungs kar gyi ni 'bru tshad tsam// sna yi rtse mor nan tan du// rnal 'byor gyis ni rtag tu sgom// rin chen brtan par gyur nas spro// brtan par ma gyur yong mi spro//
11b3(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas 'bar ba 'dra ba'i 'od// mchog rab sprin rnams spro bar bya// 'khor lo rdo rje rin chen dang // pad+ma ral gri mtshon chen 'dzin// byang chub sems dpa'i sprin chen rnams/
11b4(rgyud 'bum): spro ba'i bdag nyid can gyis spro// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// 'khor lo'i dkyil
11b5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor bsgom par bya/ / pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dra bar ni// pad+ma sgom pas bsgom par bya// rin chen dkyil 'khor 'dra bar ni// rin chen brtson pas bsgom par bya// sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor
11b6(rgyud 'bum): las byung ba/ / nam mkha' 'dra bar bri bar bya// 'di dag sangs rgyas rab kyi mchog/ sku gsung thugs ni bsgoms pa yis// dkyil 'khor rdo rje las byung ba// thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshul
11b7(rgyud 'bum): 'thob pa'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ rdo rje bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste gsum pa'o// //
12a1(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'dus nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi bdag po
12a2(rgyud 'bum): la bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis gsol ba btab bo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// chos kun bdag med pa yi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du
12a3(rgyud 'bum): gsol/ / mtshan rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs// mtshan min thams cad yang dag spangs// kun tu bzang po sku yi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// zhi ba'i chos ni mchog
12a4(rgyud 'bum): las byung / / ye shes spyod pa rnam sbyong ba// kun tu bzang po gsung gi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// sems can kun gyi sems chen po// rang bzhin dag cing dri ma med
12a5(rgyud 'bum): kun bzang thugs mchog kha lo sgyur/ / dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// 'jig rten gsum pa khams gsum pa// 'jig rten gsum mchog rdo rje gtso//
12a6(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten gsum mchog ston pa po// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi thugs// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor rab 'dra bar// dkyil 'khor rab tu nyams dga'
12a7(rgyud 'bum): bshad/ / de nas thugs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ thugs kyi rdo rje rab 'dra ba// sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams kyi// dkyil 'khor rab tu bshad par bya// lus ngag sems ni bsgoms pa yis/
12b1(rgyud 'bum): shes rab can gyis thig gdab pa// thig skud gsar pa legs bkal ba// tshad ma rab tu mdzes pa yis// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// khru ni bcu gnyis tshad du bya// ngos bzhi dang ni
12b2(rgyud 'bum): grwa bzhir ldan/ / sgo bzhi par ni rab tu brtag/ de yi dbus su 'khor lo ni// rab tu zlum po bri bar bya// de nas las kyi cho ga ni// mthong bas phyag rgya dgod par bya// de'i dbus rdo rje bri ba ni//
12b3(rgyud 'bum): in+d+ra nI la'i kha dog 'dra// 'bar ba chen po rtse lnga pa// 'jigs pa dag kyang rab 'jigs byed// 'khor lo chen po shar phyogs su// rdo rje 'bar bas rnam par brgyan// rin chen chen po lho phyogs
12b4(rgyud 'bum): su 'od zer mang pos rab tu 'khrigs/ / pad+ma chen po nub phyogs su// pad+ma rA ga'i kha dog 'dra// ral gri chen po byang phyogs su// 'od zer mang pos rab tu 'khrigs// dbus su sprin
12b5(rgyud 'bum): dang 'dra ba'i 'od/ / spyan ni shar gyi grwa ru bri// mA ma kI yi rigs 'byung ba'i// rdo rje de bzhin lho phyogs su// pad+ma kha bye sdong bur bcas// nub phyogs su ni bri bar bya// ut+pal mdzes
12b6(rgyud 'bum): pa byang phyogs su/ / mthing kha sprin dang 'dra bar bri// tho ba 'bar ba 'od gsal ba// shar phyogs sgor ni bri bar bya// rdo rje 'bar sogs 'od bzang ba// be con lho yi phyogs su bri// pad+ma
12b7(rgyud 'bum): 'bar ba 'od byed pa/ / nub kyi phyogs su bri bar bya// rdo rje 'khyil pa rdo rje can// byang gi phyogs su rdo rje bri// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa de// yongs su gsal bar shes byas nas// lus
13a1(rgyud 'bum): dang ngag sems mchod pa yis/ / nan tan du ni mchod par bya// bud med rab tu mdangs bzang ba// lo grangs bcu drug lon pa ni// dri dang me tog 'phreng brgyan te//
13a2(rgyud 'bum): yon tan ska rags mA ma kIr// shes rab can gyis byin brlabs la// de yi dbus su mnyes par bya// sangs rgyas zhi ba'i gnas spros pas// nam mkha'i dbyings ni rab tu brgyan// bshang
13a3(rgyud 'bum): gci khu ba khrag la sogs/ / lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// de ltar byas nas sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpa' grags chen mnyes// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang
13a4(rgyud 'bum): gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas de bzhin
13a5(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa ni/ / kun gyi sku dang gsung thugs kyi// rdo rje 'chang ba'i rgyal po ni// gnas kyi dbang 'phyug kun mchog gis// spyod pa kun mchog chos kyi don// spyod pa'i mtshan nyid bka' stsal to//
13a6(rgyud 'bum): rnam par mi rtog don las byung // 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rigs// theg pa mchog ni bla med pa'i// dngos grub rab mchog sgrub par byed// rigs ngan smig ma mkhan la sogs// gsod
13a7(rgyud 'bum): don don gnyer sems pa rnams/ / theg chen bla na med pa yi// theg mchog 'di la 'grub par 'gyur// sems can mtshams med la sogs pa'i// sdig pa chen po byed pa yang // rdo rje
13b1(rgyud 'bum): theg pa rgya mtsho che/ / theg pa mchog ni 'di la 'grub// snying nas slob dpon spod pa dag/ bsgrubs kyang 'grub par yong mi 'gyur// srog gcod pa yi sems can gang // brdzun du sprul
13b2(rgyud 'bum): dga' ba dang / / gzhan gyi nor la chags pa dang // rtag tu 'dod pa spyod gang dang // bshang gci zas su za ba ste// de dag sgrub pa'i snod du 'gyur// ma dang sring mo bu mo la// 'dod pa/
13b3(rgyud 'bum): bas ni mnyes byas na// theg chen mchog gi chos nyid kyi// dngos grub rgya che des 'thob bo// sangs rgyas gtso bo'i yum dag la// rnam par mi rtog blo can gyis// mnyes par byas kyang mi
13b4(rgyud 'bum): gos te/ / de ni sangs rgyas 'grub par 'gyur// de nas sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du gyur te/
13b5(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po/ ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi nang du 'di lta bu'i tshig ngan pa gsungs zhes gsol to// de nas de bzhin
13b6(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi tshig gsan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad
13b7(rgyud 'bum): ces bka' stsal to/ / rigs kyi bu rnams thong de skad ma zer cig/ snying po ye shes can rnams kyi// sangs rgyas chos nyid dag pa 'di// snying po chos kyi don las byung // byang chub spyod pa'i
14a1(rgyud 'bum): gnas 'di yin/ / de nas yang brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang brjod kyis mi lang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ri rab la sogs pa'i rdul phra mo snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs skrag
14a2(rgyud 'bum): nas brgyal bar gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag brgyal bar gyur pa gzigs nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
14a3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag bslang bar gsol/ de nas
14a4(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa gnyis su med pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
14a5(rgyud 'bum): par zhugs so/ / snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i bdag po'i 'od kyis reg pa tsam gyis/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
14a6(rgyud 'bum): chen po de dag rang rang gi stan la gnas par gyur to/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du gyur/ dgyes pas khyab par gyur nas/ chos kyi dbyings 'di skad
14a7(rgyud 'bum): ces gsungs so/ / e ma'o chos e ma'o chos// e ma'o chos kyi don 'byung ba// chos don dag pa bdag med pa// rdo rje rgyal po phyag 'tshal 'dud// sku dang gsung thugs rab tu dag/ nam
14b1(rgyud 'bum): mkha' dang ni mnyam nyid gnas/ / rnam par mi 'gyur snang ba med// rdo rje'i sku la phyag 'tshal 'dud// thugs ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtso// dus gsum dag gi lam du byung // nam mkha'
14b2(rgyud 'bum): chen po dbyings gyur pa/ / nam mkha'i lam la phyag 'tshal 'dud// nam mkha'i sku las yang dag byung // nam mkha'i lam la gnas pa po// nam mkha'i thugs te chos kyi mchog/ spyod pa'i gnas la
14b3(rgyud 'bum): phyag 'tshal 'dud/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ kun tu spyod pa mchog gi le'u ste lnga pa'o//
14b4(rgyud 'bum): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mi bskyod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te
14b5(rgyud 'bum): / thugs byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags 'di gsungs so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma kohaM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad/ rdul
14b6(rgyud 'bum): / dang bral ba'i gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ sku byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags 'di gsungs so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta yA badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma kohaM/ de nas
14b7(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pa/ mnyam pa nyid mi gnyis pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ gsung byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags
15a1(rgyud 'bum): 'di gsungs so/ / oM sarba ta thA ga ta bA ka badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma kohaM/ rdo rje gsum po de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang // gnas ni gnas kyi rnam par bsgom
15a2(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / sngags kyi mtshan gyis shin tu mtshan byas la// mchog rab 'di yis bsgrub pa nyid du bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog dpal/
15a3(rgyud 'bum): / ye shes sgron ma rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ sngags 'di gsungs so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga Na badz+ra sa b+hA ba At+ma kohaM/ de nas bcom
15a4(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa grub pa rdo rje gdon mi za ba/ rdo rje gdon mi za ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ sngags 'di gsungs so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta
15a5(rgyud 'bum): / pU dza badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma kohaM/ rtag tu 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas// sangs rgyas tshul bzhin mchod par bya// mchod pa rnam pa lnga rnams kyis// myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur//
15a6(rgyud 'bum): zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi bdag po rdo rje 'chang bas gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
15a7(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi gsang ba 'di gsungs so// sngags la dmigs pa'i lus dang ni// ngag dang
15b1(rgyud 'bum): yid kyis bskul nas su/ / yid ni dga' zhing mgu ba yis// dngos grub rab mchog bsgrub par bya// sems la dmigs pa bdag med pa// ngag dang lus kyang rnam par sgom// nam mkha'
15b2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du mnyam pa'i gnas/ / sbyor ba rnam gsum bsgrub par bya// lus dang ngag dang sems dmigs na// ngo bo nyid ni dmigs su med// sngags kyi lus su sbyor ba la// byang chub med cing
15b3(rgyud 'bum): sgom pa'ang med/ / sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan nyid ni// 'di ni mdor na rnam dpyad nas// sngags kyis partag pa'i ting nge 'dzin// byang chub sbyor ba bsgom par bya// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin/
15b4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis mchod// sangs rgyas kun mchog kun mkhyen gyis// bsgom pa'i mchog ni bka' stsal to// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// zla ba'i
15b5(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ / sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms nas// phra mo'i sbyor ba kun tu brtsam// sna yi rtse mor yungs kar bsam// 'gro dang mi 'gro yungs kar la// ye
15b6(rgyud 'bum): shes gnas ni nyams dga' ba/ / gsang ba'i ye shes kyis brtags sgom/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas sku
15b7(rgyud 'bum): yi gnas bsgoms te/ / de yi steng du gnas gzhag go// hUM nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// spyan gyi tshul du sbyor ba la/
16a1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje pad+ma rnam par sgom// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// rin chen dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// mchog gi sbyor ba nan tan gyis// de yi steng du yongs su
16a2(rgyud 'bum): / sgom// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas tshul ni zhi ba spro// 'khor yang khyad par dag tu spro// ut+pal mthing kha'i mdog
16a3(rgyud 'bum): 'dra ba/ / rtse mo lnga pa khyad par du// nas kyi 'bru tsam nan tan gyis// sna yi rtse mor rnam par bsam// tsa na ka yi 'bru tsam la// 'dab ma brgyad pa ge sar bcas// sna yi rtse mor 'di
16a4(rgyud 'bum): shis te/ / bsgoms pas byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur// 'khor lo la sogs khyad par du// sgom pa der ni brtag par bya// dngos grub thams cad yon tan gnas// nyams dga' byang
16a5(rgyud 'bum): chub gnas 'grub 'gyur/ / sangs rgyas byang chub gnas rnams ni// de ru mdor na spro bar bya// sku gsung thugs kyis mtshan ma yi// chos kyi tshig rnams rab tu brjod// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje
16a6(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin/ / de nyid don kun ston pa po// spyod pa kun mchog legs dag pa// gsang ba'i dam pa bka' stsal to// gzugs dang sgra dang ror ldan pa// shes rab can gyis zla drug sgom// gsang ba'i
16a7(rgyud 'bum): de nyid mchod chen gyis/ / legs par mchod nas bsgom par bya// dngos grub 'bras bu 'dod pa yis// zas su bshang gci zos na ni// sangs rgyas byang chub skyon med pa// yang dag bla med grub
16b1(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / zas su sha rnams za ba dang // sha chen dag ni rab brtags na// sku dang gsung thugs gsang ba yis// dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// glang po'i sha dang rta yi
16b2(rgyud 'bum): sha/ de bzhin dam pa khyi yi sha// zas kyi phyir ni bza' bar bya// zas gzhan dag ni ma zos na// byang chub sems dpa' blo can dang // sangs rgyas rnams ni mnyes par 'gyur// 'di lta
16b3(rgyud 'bum): bu yi sbyor ba yis/ / myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// 'dod khams dbang phyug 'jig rten na// go 'phang las ni byed par 'gyur// gtso bo gzi can stobs dang ldan// mdangs bzang
16b4(rgyud 'bum): mthong na yid du 'ong / / mthong ba tsam gyis skul med par// 'jig rten 'di dag dbang du 'gyur// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba byang chub dam pa ste// yang dag sngags kyi
16b5(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba 'di/ / lus ngag sems las 'da' ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ sku dang / gsung dang /
16b6(rgyud 'bum): thugs byin gyis rlob pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi bdag pos/ dam tshig chen
16b7(rgyud 'bum): po'i de kho na nyid sngags kyi spyod pa'i mchog mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i le'u 'di gsungs so/ / 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la// ji ltar 'dod par bsten na ni// 'di lta bu yi sbyor ba yis//
17a1(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas myur du thob par 'gyur// 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad ni// ji ltar 'dod par bsten bya ste// rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis// bdag dang gzhan
17a2(rgyud 'bum): la mchod par bya/ / bka' thub sdom pa mi bzad pas// bsten kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur gyi// 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la// bsten na myur du 'grub par 'gyur// slongs mo tha
17a3(rgyud 'bum): zhing mi bzla ste/ / slong la'ang dga' bar mi bya'o// 'dod pa kun la longs spyod cing // sngags kyi yan lag ma nyams bzlas// lus dang ngag dang sems rnams ni// bde bar gnas na byang chub
17a4(rgyud 'bum): 'thob/ / gzhan du dus min 'chi ba dang // dmyal bar nges par sreg par 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // sngags kyi spyod pa mchog spyod rnams// chos mchog mi g.yo brnyas pa yang /
17a5(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa thams cad bsten pas so// chags can ye shes 'dod pa yis// rtag tu 'dod yon lnga rnams bsten// byang chub sems dpa' mnyes par bya// byang chub nyi ma chags par bya// gzugs la
17a6(rgyud 'bum): rnam gsum shes byas nas/ / mchod par byed pas mchod par bya// de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa// sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad gzhi// sgra la rnam gsum shes byas nas// lha rnams la ni dbul
17a7(rgyud 'bum): bar bya/ / de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa// sangs rgyas rin chen 'thung gnas gtso// dril rnam gsum shes byas nas// sangs rgyas sogs la dbul bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa/
17b1(rgyud 'bum): 'dod chags chos kyi 'byung gnas gtso// ro la rnam gsum shes byas nas// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// de nyid sangs rgyas sna tshogs pa// sangs rgyas thogs med rdo rje 'dzin// reg la
17b2(rgyud 'bum): rnam gsum shes byas nas/ / bdag gi rigs la dbul bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan rdo rje can// mi bskyod pa yi tshul brnyes pa'o// gzugs sgra ro la sogs pa la// rtag tu sems ni sbyar
17b3(rgyud 'bum): bapar bya/ / 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba'i snying po btus pa'o// gzugs sgra dri sogs sngags pa yis// lha nyid du ni rtag tu bsgom// yang na de la bsgom pa ni// rigs
17b4(rgyud 'bum): kyi tshul du rnam par sgom/ / sangs rgyas rjes su dran par sbyor// chos ni rjes su dran sgom pa// rdo rje rjes su dran sgom pa// sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams sgom// rigs ni rjes su dran par sbyor//
17b5(rgyud 'bum): khro bo rjes su dran sgom pa// lha ni rjes su dran par sbyor// bsgoms na byang chub thob par 'gyur// bud med gzugs ldan mdangs bzang ba// lo grangs bcu drug lon pa la// byin gyis brlabs kyi gnas
17b6(rgyud 'bum): gsum gyis/ / dben par mchod pa rab tu brtsam// de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mo'i mchog/ spyan la sogs par bsgom par bya// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar bas// sangs rgyas dngos grub
17b7(rgyud 'bum): thob par 'gyur/ / yi ge hUM dang oM dag dang // aHdang phaT kyang rab brtag bya// 'od zer rnam lngas khyab pa yi// pad+mo rdo rje bsgom par bya// 'bar bcas zla 'od bzhin du dkar// yid du 'ong ba
18a1(rgyud 'bum): bsgom par bya/ / sangs rgyas rjes dran sbyor la sogs// byang chub 'dod pas bsgom par bya// de la sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/ b+ha ga la ni ling ga gzhag
18a2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas gzugs ni bsgom par bya/ / ba spu rnams kyi bu ga nas// mkhas pas sangs rgyas sprin rnams spro// de la chos rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/ thA ga la ni ling ga gzhag/ rdo rje chos ni
18a3(rgyud 'bum): bsgom par bya/ / ba spu rnams kyi bu ga nas// mkhas pas chos kyi sprin rnams spro// de la rdo rje rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/ b+ha ga la ni ling ga gzhag/ rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par sgom/
18a4(rgyud 'bum): ba spu rnams kyi bu ga nas// rdo rje sprin rnams spro bar bya// de la rigs rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/ b+ha ga la ni ling ga gzhag/ sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab tu sgom// ba spu rnams kyi bu ga nas/
18a5(rgyud 'bum): mkhas pas rigs kyi sprin rnams spro// de la khro bo rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/ b+ha ga la ni ling ga gzhag/ khro bo'i dbang po rab tu sgom// ba spu rnams kyi bu ga nas// mkhas pas khro bo'i
18a6(rgyud 'bum): sprin rnams spro/ / de la dam tshig rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/ bdag gi rdo rje pad+mar ldan// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar te// rang gi khu ba'i thig pa yis// sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa'
18a7(rgyud 'bum): mchod/ / de la dkyil 'khor rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/ dbang po gnyis ni mnyam bzhag ste// mkhas pas rang gi khu ba dag/ rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu dbyung // dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor
18b1(rgyud 'bum): tshul du bya/ / de la sku rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/ sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gang yin// phung po lnga yis rab tu rgyas// sangs rgyas sku yi rang bzhin gyis// bdag kyang de dang 'drar gyur cig/
18b2(rgyud 'bum): de la gsung rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/ rdo rje chos kyi gsung gang yin// gsung de nges tshig phun sum tshogs// bdag gi tshigs kyang de 'dra ste// chos 'dzin pa dang 'drar gyur cig/
18b3(rgyud 'bum): de la thugs rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/ gsang ba'i bdag po blo ldan pa// kun tu bzang po'i thugs gang yin// rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bur ni// bdag gi sems kyang de 'drar gyur// de la
18b4(rgyud 'bum): sems can rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/ sems can kun gyi sems gang yin// sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi mtshan// de ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// mkha' dang mtshungs par spyod
18b5(rgyud 'bum): gyur cig/ de la sngags thams cad kyi gzugs dang / sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/ sngags kyi rdo rje sku gang yin// gsung gis sku yang rnam sgom pa/
18b6(rgyud 'bum): bdag kyang rtag tu de 'dra bar// sngags 'dzin pa dang mnyam gyur cig/ de la das tshig rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/ dam tshig khu phyung cho ga bzhon// 'bras bu 'dod pas btung bar bya// de bzhin
18b7(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa'i tshogs bsad na/ / dngos grub rab tu 'thob par 'gyur// de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig rjes su dran par ji ltar sgom zhe na/ rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal ba/
19a1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad ma skyes zag pa med// byang chub med cing mngon rtogs med// khams kyang med cing 'byung ba'ang med// de la ma skyes pa rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/ thams
19a2(rgyud 'bum): cad rang bzhin 'od gsal ba/ / mtshan med mi 'gyur nam mkha' bzhin// gnyis med gnyis su med min zhi// shin tu dri med nam mkha' bzhin// de la zhe sdang gi rigs la sogs pa'i mchod pa
19a3(rgyud 'bum): rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/ bud med sems ni rab brtan pa// lo grangs bcu gnyis lon rnyed pa// rigs kyi sbyor bas rab bsgoms te// bdag gi khu bas mchod par bya// 'dis ni de
19a4(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku/ / rdo rje 'dzin pa'i thugs dang ni// chos 'dzin mchog gi gsung dag kyang // tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// sku dang gsung dang thugs kyang 'grub// gang gzhan phra mor
19a5(rgyud 'bum): bshad pa rnams/ / rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms te// bzlas pa tsam gyis de 'grub 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba
19a6(rgyud 'bum): 'dus pa las/ sngags kyi spyod pa mchog gi le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje dkon mchog dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das
19a7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po/ dbang phyug dam pa rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis gsol ba btab bo// rdo rje sems dpa' theg pa che// nam mkha'i spyod pa rnam
19b1(rgyud 'bum): sbyong ba/ / kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa mchog/ rgyal mchog mchod pa bshad du gsol// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug che// rdo rje theg par rab ston pa// nam mkha'i dbyings dang mtshungs pa'i
19b2(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ rgyal bzhi mchod pa bshad du gsol// thar pa'i lam ni rab ston pa// theg pa gsum gyi lam la gnas// sangs rgyas skal mchog dag pa'i bdag/ mi mchog mchod pa bshad du
19b3(rgyud 'bum): gsol/ / byang chub sems ni rgyas pa'i spyan// chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ba// sku dang gsung thugs shin tu dag/ phyag 'tshal rdo rje theg pa la'o// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// thams
19b4(rgyud 'bum): cad nam mkha' mi 'gyur che/ / thams cad dbang bskur kun gyi don// kun dbang rdo rje rin chen 'dzin// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i mchog/ rdo rje mi phyed gsum gnas pa// sku dang gsung
19b5(rgyud 'bum): dang thugs skal mchog/ rgyal ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba bshad// na chung gzhon nu mig yangs pa// gzugs bzang gzhon pas brgyan pa ni// lo grangs nyi shu lnga lon rnyed// byol song las kyang
19b6(rgyud 'bum): rab tu brtag/ sa phyogs gtsang zhing rnam par dben pa 'am// rgyal nyid skyes zhi zhi ba'i gnas rnams su// bshang gci chu la sogs pas byug pa 'am// rgyal ba mchod phyir rtag par rab tu bya//
19b7(rgyud 'bum): nu ma'i dbus par spyi gtsug mtha' yi bar// cho ga shes pas yang na rkang pa'i bar// lte ba rked pa gsang bar rgyal ba'i sras// rigs lnga rnams ni dgod par rab tu bya// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus
20a1(rgyud 'bum): gnas par/ / ye shes rgya mtsho bsgom par bya// bdag nyid zla ba'i dbus gnas par// mkhas pas snying khar bsgom par bya// zhi ba rdo rje 'dzin 'dod na// bsdu ba dag kyang rab
20a2(rgyud 'bum): tu bya/ / rin chen sna bzhi'i mchod rten la// 'od zer 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// ye shes rgya mtsho dus gsum gyi// gnas de yin par rnam par bsam// bdag gi ba spu'i bu gnas// mkhas
20a3(rgyud 'bum): pas mchod pa'i sprin rnams spro/ / mkhas pas ut+pa la dag dang // pad+ma rnam pa lngar shes bya// dzA ti rnam gsum shes byas nas// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// me tog kar+t+ti kA ra dang /
20a4(rgyud 'bum): mawi kA dang yU thi kA// me tog ka ra bI ra bsam// mchod pa thams cad rab tu brtag/ dpag tshad brgya yi khyon tsam du// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms byas la// rnam par mkhas pas
20a5(rgyud 'bum): rtag par ni/ / rigs rnams rab tu dgod par bya// de bzhin pad+mo rdo rje dang // ral gri ut+pal mkhas pas bsgom// dpag tshad bye ba'i khyon tsam du// gru bzhi shin tu mdzes pa yi// mchod
20a6(rgyud 'bum): rten rin chen sna bzhi pa/ / gsal zhing rang bzhin dri ma med// rigs rnams thams cad mchod pa'i phyir// shes rab can gyis gnas su bsgom// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis// de la mchod
20a7(rgyud 'bum): ba rgya mtsho brtsam/ / rin chen na bza' la sogs pas// byang chub 'dod pas rtag tu mchod// mchod pa rnam lnga mchog rnams kyis/ rtag tu lha rnams mnyes par bya// rin chen 'byung gnas na chung
20b1(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ rin chen sna tshogs mchog gis brgyan// sgrub tshe rab tu 'grub pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas kun la dbul bar bya// zhing 'di rin chen sna bdun gyis// mkhas pa dag gis yongs bkang la// dngos
20b2(rgyud 'bum): grub 'dod pas sbyin pa'i phyir/ / nyin re shes rab can gyis dbul// bdag po'i phyag rgyas mnyam gzhag la// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus dag tu// 'dod chags blo can sangs rgyas la//
20b3(rgyud 'bum): reg pa'i sbyor ba dbul bar bya// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// dkyil 'khor bkod pa bsgom par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa bdag gi lus// bla ma bshang dang gci bas mchod// bzhin
20b4(rgyud 'bum): bzang shin tu mdzes pa yi/ / na chung skal ba mchog ldan pa// byin gyis brlabs kyi gnas bsams te// sangs rgyas mchod pa rab tu brtag/ mig bzang brtan pa'i blo ldan pas// khu ba blangs nas
20b5(rgyud 'bum): bza' bar bya/ / 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi mchod pa ste// ye shes rdo rje can gyi gsang // sngags rnams dngos grub byed par gsungs// de bzhin gshegs pa
20b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ bshang gci'i dam tshig gi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// thams
20b7(rgyud 'bum): cad nam mkha' mi 'gyur che/ / thams cad dbang bskur spyod pa'i mchog/ dbang phyug dam pa kun don gyis// sku gsung thugs la longs spyod pa// rdo rje mi phyed gsum dkyil 'khor// sangs rgyas ye
21a1(rgyud 'bum): shes can gyi gsang / / nyams dga' mchog ni rab tu bshad// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// rdo rje mi bskyod rab
21a2(rgyud 'bum): bsgoms nas/ / lag tu rdo rje bsgom par bya// 'od 'phro mang po 'bar ba dang // 'od zer sna lngas rab tu gang // dus gsum pa yi sangs rgyas rnams// bsgoms nas rdo rjes phye mar brlag/ sku gsung
21a3(rgyud 'bum): thugs kyi longs spyod ni/ / rdo rjes phyer brlags med gyur pa// bsam gtan mchog de bsgoms na ni// thugs kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// rdo rje gsang ba 'di lta bus// sems can thams cad
21a4(rgyud 'bum): bsad na ni/ / mi bskyod sangs rgyas zhing dag tu// rgyal ba'i sras su skye bar 'gyur// 'di ni zhe sdang gi rigs kyi dam tshig gi de kho na ste/ rigs thams cad kyi rgya mtsho yin par bya'o// de nas rgyal po
21a5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje 'dzin/ / mi shes thar pa rab sgrub pa// ngo bo nyid dag gos pa med// byang chub spyod pa rab ston pas// sangs rgyas byang chub sgrub pa yi// yang dag dam tshig bka' stsal to// nam mkha'i dbyings
21a6(rgyud 'bum): kyi dbus gnas par/ / 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// rnam par snang mdzad rab bsgoms te// sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par sgom// rin chen kun gyi sbyor ba yis// rdo rje'i gzugs
21a7(rgyud 'bum): ni rab tu brtag/ nor rnams thams cad phrogs nas su// rdo rje gsum du rnam bsgoms na// nor gyi rgya mtshos gang ba yi// yid bzhin nor bu 'dra bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi sras rnams dang /
21b1(rgyud 'bum): thub pa'i skyes bu mchog tu 'gyur// 'di ni rigs kyi rgya mtsho thams cad las// gti mug gi rigs kyi dam tshig yang dag pa nyid du shes par bya'o// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// 'dod chags thar
21b2(rgyud 'bum): ba rab sgrub pa/ / gsang ba dag pa dmigs med pas// dkyil 'khor rab tu bka' stsal to// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// dpag med che
21b3(rgyud 'bum): ni rab bsgoms te/ / sangs rgyas rnams kyis thams cad dgang // bud med lta bur sgyur ba ni// dam tshig bzhi yi sbyor ba yis// thams cad de ru bsgom par bya// 'di ni rdo rje'i tshul mchog
21b4(rgyud 'bum): go/ dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bas// de dag thams cad nye bar spyad// 'di ni rdo rje thams cad kyi// mi phyed sku gsum sgom pa'o// 'di ni 'dod chags kyi rigs yang dag pa'i dam tshig ste/
21b5(rgyud 'bum): sngags pa rnams kyis bsgom par bya'o// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje sngags kyi don sgrub pa// bdag med ye shes las byung bas// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// nam mkha'i
21b6(rgyud 'bum): dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ / sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// rdo rje thogs med rab bsgoms te// sangs rgyas thams cad bsgom par bya// thams cad gzugs su rnam bsgoms nas
21b7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje tshig gi brdzun smra bas/ / rgyal ba kun gyi gnas rnams dang // rgyal ba thams cad bslu bar bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// nam mkha'i gsung ste dri med pa// ye shes blo can kun
22a1(rgyud 'bum): gyi gsang / / sngags kyi dngos grub thob par bshad// 'di ni dam tshig 'gugs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid de/ don ji lta ba bzhin du spro bar bya'o// de nas rgyal po
22a2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje 'dzin/ / rdo rje mi phyed gsum rgyal gnas// rdo rje dngos grub rab ston pas// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// dam tshig dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya//
22a3(rgyud 'bum): dkon mchog dpal ni rab bsgoms te// gzugs rnams kun gyis 'di dag dgang // rtsub pa'i ngag la sogs pa ni// bstan na ye shes thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
22a4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi rdo rje bkod pas de skad ces bka' stsal to/ / de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje dpal la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ngo mtshar du
22a5(rgyud 'bum): gyur cing / rmad du gyur nas rdo rje'i tshig 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po/ khams gsum las 'das shing 'jig rten thams cad las 'das pas/
22a6(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi 'khor gyi nang du/ 'di lta bu'i yang dag pa ma yin pa'i tshig gi lam rdo rje'i tshig 'di ci'i slad du gsung / de nas bcom ldan
22a7(rgyud 'bum): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang brjod kyis mi lang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi ri rab kyi rdul phra mo snyed kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje
22b1(rgyud 'bum): dpal la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rigs kyi bu dman pa'i 'du shes dang / smad pa'i 'du shes de lta bu'ang ma skyed cig/
22b2(rgyud 'bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ sngags kyi spyod pa ni spyod pa'i mchog go// 'di lta ste/ sngags kyi spyod pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na
22b3(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha' ni thams cad kyi rjes su song ba ste/ chos thams cad kyang nam mkha'i khongs su gtogs pa'o// chos de dag thams cad kyang 'dod pa'i khams na mi gnas/ gzugs kyi khams na
22b4(rgyud 'bum): mi gnas/ gzugs med pa'i khams na mi gnas/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi la'ang mi gnas so// rigs kyi bu chos thams cad kyang de ltar rjes su rig par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni
22b5(rgyud 'bum): don gyi dbang de lta bu mkhyen cing / sems can rnams kyi bsam pa mkhyen nas chos 'chad par mdzad do// rigs kyi bu de ltar nam mkha'i tshig nges par brjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam
22b6(rgyud 'bum): tshig de dag rjes su rig par bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na gtsub shing dang / gtsub stan dang / mi'i lag pa bskyod pa'i rkyen gyis du ba 'byung bar 'gyur mod kyi/ me de'ang gtsub
22b7(rgyud 'bum): shing la'ang mi gnas/ gtsub stan la'ang mi gnas/ mi'i lag pa bskyod pa la'ang mi gnas so// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig 'gro ba dang 'ong ba
23a1(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pa rjes su rig par bya'o/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du gyur nas/ ngam zhing mig gdangs te tshig 'di skad ces smras so//
23a2(rgyud 'bum): rmad byung chen po'i chos rnams ni// nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs pa dang // rnam par mi rtog dag pa las// kun rdzob tu yang bshad pa mtshar// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang //
23a3(rgyud 'bum): thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ don dam pa'i dag pa de kho na nyid kyi don gyi dam tshig gi le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
23a4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad yang 'dus te/ bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje de kho na nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa sku dang / gsung dang / thugs gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal
23a5(rgyud 'bum): te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// de nyid sngags snying kun bsdus pa// sku dang gsung thugs gsang bar bsgrags// dngos grub chen po'i tshul gyi mchog/ yang dag bcom ldan bshad du gsol/
23a6(rgyud 'bum): de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// nyon mongs kun gyi rgya mtsho gtso// 'bar ba drag po spyan yangs pas// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// lus dang ngag dang sems rnams ni// rnam par mi rtog
23a7(rgyud 'bum): mi dmigs pa/ / gang na'ang mi gnas mnyam pa nyid// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rjer sgom// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rang bzhin gyis dag pa pha rol tu phyin pa sngags kyi tshul
23b1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ mi bskyod
23b2(rgyud 'bum): pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rig pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang thabs cig tu/ sems can thams cad kyi don bya ba la rol pa ston par mdzad de/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig
23b3(rgyud 'bum): rten gyi khams mthas klas pa/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis rol cing dgyes par yongs su spyod pa yod kyang / de dag sngags spyod pa la mngon par brtson pa rnams la kye ma
23b4(rgyud 'bum): 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi spyod pa'i tshul gyi chos rdzogs par gyur to snyam nas spyan ras kyis mi 'tsho ste/ de bas na skyes bu dam pa de dag la spyan ras
23b5(rgyud 'bum): kyis btso ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i gsang ba sngags thams cad kyi snying po kun tu skul bar byed pa zhes bya ba/ rab tu
23b6(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi dam tshig la dmigs pa/ rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi dam tshig
23b7(rgyud 'bum): la dmigs pa/ chos 'dzin pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi dam tshig la dmigs pa 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las tshig gi
24a1(rgyud 'bum): lam nges par brjod pas sngags sdug pa 'di lta bu gsungs so/ / oM AHhUM/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa kun/
24a2(rgyud 'bum): rab tu 'dar zhing brgyal bar gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' rjes su dran// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos dam tshig 'di gsungs so// nam mkha'i dbyings
24a3(rgyud 'bum): kyi dbus gnas par/ / dkod pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// de yi dbus gnas yi ge hUM// rang gi gzugs su rab tu brtag/ rdo rje'i 'od zer cher 'bar ba// rnam par
24a4(rgyud 'bum): 'phro ba bsam par bya/ / sangs rgyas kyi ni sku gsung thugs// drangs par de yis rnam bsgoms na// de ma thag tu de 'gyur ba// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje sems dpa'
24a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po che/ / kun gyi gtso bo dbang phyug mchog/ rang gi dkyil 'khor rang rdo rjes// skyed par byed pa'i tshul du 'gyur// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// snying po rdo rje bsdus pa yin// rang
24a6(rgyud 'bum): sngags skyes bur bsgoms nas ni/ / gnas bzhi rnams su gzugs kyi tshul// zhal gsum lta bu'i sbyor ba yis// kha dog gsum du rab tu sgom// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dam tshig gis de skad
24a7(rgyud 'bum): ces bka' stsal to/ / de la 'di ni rdo rje mchog gi gsang ba'o// snying kha'i dbus su phra mo yi// dkyil 'khor rnams ni bsam par bya// yi ge mchog tu gyur pa'i tshig/ de yi dbus su
24b1(rgyud 'bum): bsam par bya/ / rdo rje chen po rtse lnga pa// rtag tu sbyor bas bsgom par bya// rdo rje kyo ba'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje gsum rnams bsgom par bya// de yis snying khar gdab byas te/
24b2(rgyud 'bum): lha rnams ji snyed bskul bar bya// 'di ni rdo rje thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pa'o// rdo rje pad+mo'i rigs la sogs// rdo rje kyo ba rnam sgom zhing / snying kha ru ni
24b3(rgyud 'bum): bskul bar bshad/ / 'di ni rol mo'i 'byung ba ste// rdo rje yi ni tshul mchog 'di// zhag bdun bar du byas na ni// ye shes rdo rje can gyi gsung // sku dang gsung thugs 'grub
24b4(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / mchog stsol ba dag rnam par gzigs// yid ni 'dzegs shing skrag gyur nas// yid la mgu zhing dga' gyur pa'i// dngos grub rgya chen ster bar 'gyur// sangs
24b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ / sngags kyi spyod pa'i mchog sgrub pas// rmongs pas 'da' bar byas na ni// de yi srog ni der zad 'gyur// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje
24b6(rgyud 'bum): gsum gyi ston pa mchog/ 'jig rten gsum mchog rdo rje gtsos// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// sngags kyi skyes bu ji snyed pa// rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes rdzogs// dbang po
24b7(rgyud 'bum): gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis/ / dngos po thams cad brtag par bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sngags kyi dam tshig sgom pa'o// rig ma'i dbang phyug zhugs pa la// rdo rje'i sbyor
25a1(rgyud 'bum): ba rab sgom zhing / / chags la chags pas blta bar bya// 'di ni dam tshig dkyil 'khor ro// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sras//
25a2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dbang bskur sangs rgyas gtsos// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// 'jig rten khams ni thams cad na// bud med ji snyed yod pa kun// phyag rgya che sogs sbyor ba
25a3(rgyud 'bum): yis/ de dag thams cad nye bar spyad// bye ba grangs med rdo rje 'dzin// sangs rgyas gnas ni der spro bya// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to//
25a4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje gsum po mkha' 'dra ba'i// byang chub 'di yis thob par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' rgyal rgya mtsho// rdo rje sems dpa'i tshe des 'thob// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
25a5(rgyud 'bum): kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po bskul ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//
25a6(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i sngags kyi skyes bu mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge
25a7(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi rdo rje rig pa'i skyes bu'i le'u 'di gsungs so// rdo rje gsum yig sngags kyi mchog/ phyag rgya chen po
25b1(rgyud 'bum): rnam smos pa/ / byang chub thams cad thob bya'i phyir// ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya// oM ni ye shes snying po ste// rdo rje'i sku ni thob byed pa'o// AHni byang chub bdag med pa// rdo rje gsung ni thob
25b2(rgyud 'bum): byed pa'o/ / hUM ni sku gsung thugs nyid de// rdo rje mi phyed gsum thob pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi sngags kyi skyes bus de skad ces
25b3(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsal to/ / nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par// dkyil 'khor rdo rje kun skyes bsam// rdo rje sprin ni 'phro bskyed pa// de ru yi ge b+h+rUM bsam mo// de la 'di ni ye shes rdo rje'i snying pa'o//
25b4(rgyud 'bum): b+h+rUM rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// hUM zhes bya ba rab tu sgom// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// yi ge oM ni rnam par bsam// chos kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/
25b5(rgyud 'bum): yi ge AHni rab tu sgom// yi ge b+h+rUM gyis gnas bsgoms te// rdo rje gsum 'byung bsgom par bya// snying po dus gsum sangs rgyas kyi// sku gsung thugs ni mnyes byed pa// oM ni sangs rgyas su
25b6(rgyud 'bum): yi mchog/ oM AHni sangs rgyas gsung gi lam// AHhUM ni ye shes thugs kyi 'jing // hUM byang chub tshul mchog 'di yin te// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pa//
25b7(rgyud 'bum): ye shes rdo rje sprul pa ste// sangs rgyas rgyu dang 'bras bu 'byung // 'di dag sangs rgyas skyes bu ste// sngags kyi rig pa zhes kyang bsgrags// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgom pa'i// dam tshig dag gis rdzogs
26a1(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thug kyi dam tshag de kho na nyid kyi ye shes rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// dben zhing
26a2(rgyud 'bum): rab tu nyams dga' bar/ / sbyor ba 'di ni kun brtsams na// rdo rje sku dang gsung dang thugs// zla ba phyed kyis nges par 'grub// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus bsams te/
26a3(rgyud 'bum): rang gi sngags kyi dam tshig bskyed// yi ge oM ni snying khar gzhag/ 'od zer lnga yi sprin chen po// rnam par snang mdzad mchog tu sgom// 'di yis sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku// rdo rje rnam snang rgya mtshor
26a4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / ye shes lnga ldan bsten na ni// sangs rgyas sku ni 'dra ba'i mdog/ rdo rje bskal pa gsum du gnas// zla ba phyed kyis 'grub par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das sku rdo rje gsang bas de skad ces bka'
26a5(rgyud 'bum): stsal to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rdo rje'i 'od zer bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// chos kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// rang gi sngags kyis skyes bu
26a6(rgyud 'bum): bskyed/ / AHni ngag gi lam bzhag ste// kha dog lnga yis pad+ma che// 'jig rten dbang mchog bsgoms pa yis// dam tshig ye shes rdzogs byas te// tshig gi dam tshig lnga yi mchog/ chos kyi tshig gi lam
26a7(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa/ / rdo rje chos dang mtshungs par 'gyur// ye shes lnga ldan bsten na ni// rdo rje bskal pa gsum du gnas// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i gsung gsang bas de skad ces bka' stsal to// de bzhin
26b1(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung rdo rje'i dam tshig 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ / rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// rang sngags skyes bu rdzogs byas la/
26b2(rgyud 'bum): sems la yi ge hUM gnas pa// dam tshig chen po'i de nyid ni// kha dog rnam lngar bsgom par bya// rdo rje kun dang rgyal ba'i gnas// ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya// ston pa rdo rje'i thugs 'dra ba/
26b3(rgyud 'bum): ye shes yon tan rgya mtshor 'gyur// ye shes lnga ldan bsten na ni// rdo rje bskal pa gsum du gnas// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i thugs gsang bas de skad ces bka' stsal to// de bzhin
26b4(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// ye shes dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// rdo rje chen po bsgom par bya/
26b5(rgyud 'bum): lus rnams kun la khams dmigs na// rdo rje ye shes mkha' mnyam 'gyur// khaMsangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis// yang dang yang du mchod pa dang // bskal pa gsum du dam
26b6(rgyud 'bum): tshig gnas/ / sangs rgyas kyis kyang gzigs mi 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' rdo rje dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// sku dang / gsung dang / thugs mi snang ba 'byung ba
26b7(rgyud 'bum): bkod pa'i 'phreng ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ / rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// rang sngags skyes bu rab bsams nas// snying khar rdo rje haM zhes pa// gzhag ste 'od zer rnam par sgom/
27a1(rgyud 'bum): haM 'jam dpal dam tshig longs spyod la// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// sa bcu dag la gnas pa yi// byang chub sems dpar de 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i ye
27a2(rgyud 'bum): shes kyi dam tshig rdo rje zla ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ / 'od zer 'bar ba'i yi ge b+hI// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su bsam// mtshan mchog rdo rje'i lus dag gis// rdo rje'i sku dang 'dra
27a3(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur/ / b+h+rUMHnam mkha' rdo rje'i dam tshig gi bkod pa'i gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// sangs rgyas mngon shes dam tshig mchog/ rdo rje 'chang dang 'dra bar 'gyur// 'din dngos grub
27a4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi/ / sangs rgyas mngon shes mchog sgrub pa'o// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// rdo rje sems dpa' rab bsgoms la// ye shes
27a5(rgyud 'bum): oM ni bsgom par bya/ / oM rdo rje dam tshig gsum bsgoms pas// mi bskyod rdo rje gsum 'drar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mi bskyod pas de skad ces bka' stsal to// mi bskyod pa yi sku 'dra dang //
27a6(rgyud 'bum): gsung dang thugs mchog 'dra ba 'dzin// 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad du// mi bskyod rdo rjes mchod par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa'i sku dang mnyam par mngon par 'byung ba'i dam tshig
27a7(rgyud 'bum): / rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su ni// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor 'od bzang bsam// nam mkha'i rdo rje rab bsgoms la// rin chen oM ni bsam par bya//
27b1(rgyud 'bum): oM rdo rje dam tshig gsum bsgoms pas// rdo rje gsum dpag med 'drar 'gyur// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yis// dkon mchog dpal gyi 'od dang 'dra// de ni bdag med byang chub dang // ye shes
27b2(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba 'dir gnas 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje dkon mchog dpal gyis de skad ces bka' stsal to// rin po che'i dam tshig longs spyod pa rdo rje'i tshul zhes bya ba'i ting nge
27b3(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin to/ / nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su ni// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// 'jig rten dbang phyug rab bsgoms la// chos kyi oM ni bsgom par bya// oM rdo rje dam tshig
27b4(rgyud 'bum): gsum bsgoms pas/ / rdo rje gsum dpag med 'drar 'gyur// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yis// 'od dpag med dang 'dra bar 'gyur// de ni sems can thams cad kyi// theg chen lam
27b5(rgyud 'bum): ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje tshe dpag tu med pas de skad ces bka' stsal to// yon tan dpag tu med pa rdo rje 'od kyi dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam mkha'i
27b6(rgyud 'bum): dbyings kyi dbus su ni/ / sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// rdo rje pad+ma la bsgoms la// dam tshig oM ni rab tu sgom// oM rdo rje dam tshig gsum bsgoms pas// rdo rje gdon mi za ba
27b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yis// rdo rje thogs med 'dra ba'i 'od// de ni dpal ldan ye shes mtsho// sems can kun don 'byung bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gdon mi za bas de
28a1(rgyud 'bum): skad ces bka' stsal to/ / gdon mi za ba'i dam tshig 'od zer gyi ye shes kyi mchog 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su ni// sangs
28a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/ / rdo rje snang mdzad rab bsgoms la// sku gsum oM ni rab tu sgom// oM rdo rje dam tshig gsum bsgoms pas// rnam par snang mdzad mnyam par 'gyur//
28a3(rgyud 'bum): lus dang ngag yid rdo rje yi// rnam par snang mdzad 'dra ba'i 'od// de ni ye shes rdzogs byang chub// sku gsum mi phyed sgrub byed 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad kyis de
28a4(rgyud 'bum): skad ces bka' stsal to/ / lus dang / ngag dang / yid dmigs pa mngon par byang chub pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rnam par dben pa'i ri bo dang // klung dang 'bab chu rnams dang ni// dur
28a5(rgyud 'bum): gyi khrod la sogs par yang / / bsam gtan bsdus pa 'di dag sgom// mi bskyod ye shes dag la sogs// rdo rje nam mkha'i dkyil du bsam// mngon shes lnga po'i sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas
28a6(rgyud 'bum): mchog gi gnas su sgom/ / bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje mngon par mkhyen pas de skad ces bka' stsal to// rdo rje chen po rtse lnga pa// 'bar ba lnga yis rnam par brgyan//
28a7(rgyud 'bum): gnas lnga dag tu sbyor ba yis// rdo rje mngon shes 'dra bar 'gyur// me stag mang po 'khrug pa yi// rang sngags 'khor lo bsgom par bya// rdo rje lnga yi sbyor ba yis// rdo rje mngon shes 'dra bar 'gyur//
28b1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje nam mkha'i dkyil nyid du// 'khor lo sangs rgyas 'bar 'od 'dra// sangs rgyas 'jug pa rab bsgoms na// sangs rgyas gnas dang 'dra bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor
28b2(rgyud 'bum): dbus gnas par/ / bdag gi lus la snang mdzad gzhag/ snying khar yi ge oM bsams la// sngags la rnam par shes pa sgom// 'gog pa'i rdo rje sems nyid du// gang tshe de la skye 'gyur na// sangs
28b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyas kun gyi mchog 'dzin pa/ / yid bzhin dpal ldan lta bur 'gyur// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje mi bskyod rab tu sgom// snying khar yi ge hUM bsgoms nas// sems
28b4(rgyud 'bum): ni thig ler gyur par bzhag/ sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// tshe dpag med pa rab tu sgom// snying khar yi ge AHbsams te// rdo rje thig ler gyur par bzhag/ 'di ni dam tshig
28b5(rgyud 'bum): mchog gi mchog/ rdo rje mi phyed gsum sgom pa// 'gog pa'i dam tshig ye shes te// sangs rgyas dngos grub thob 'gyur ba// rdo rje nam mkha'i dbyings gnas par// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom
28b6(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / lus ngag sems la yi ge oM// bsams na de ni bskal par gnas// rdo rje nam mkha'i dbyings gnas par// chos kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// lus ngag sems la yi
28b7(rgyud 'bum): ge AH/ / bsams na de ni bskal par gnas// rdo rje nam mkha'i dbyings gnas par// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// lus ngag sems la yi ge hUM// bsams na de ni bskal par
29a1(rgyud 'bum): gnas/ / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gsum gyi rtog pa'i dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje yi// rnal 'byor 'dir gyur phyin chad ni/
29a2(rgyud 'bum): klog gam yang na sems kyang rung // de yang rdo rje 'dzin 'drar 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ de bzhin
29a3(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi dam tshig de kho na nyid rdo rje'i rig pa'i skyes bu mchog gi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o/ / // de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// bskyed pa ye
29a4(rgyud 'bum): shes mchog sgrub pa/ / dam tshig de nyid rdo rje gsum// rdo rje gsung gis bka' stsal pa// mkha' dang mtshungs par mnyam gyur pa// rnam par mi rtog ngo bo nyid// chos rnams rang bzhin
29a5(rgyud 'bum): dag pa las/ / rol mo 'di dag rab tu sgom// dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs su// me tog 'bras bu sogs kyis brgyan// ri bo dben pa'i sa phyogs su// dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa
29a6(rgyud 'bum): sgrub/ / maM lus dang ngag sems rdo rje la// rdo rje 'jam pa rab tu sgom// lus dang ngag sems la spros pas// rdo rje 'jam pa 'dra bar 'gyur// dpag tshad brgya yi khyon tsam du// rdo rje 'bar
29a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i 'od dag gis/ / rgyan rnams kun gyi brgyan pa yi// dag pa'i bdag nyid snang bar 'gyur// tshangs pa drag po la sogs lhas// nams kyang mthong bar mi nus so// rdo rje 'jab pa mchog gi dam
29b1(rgyud 'bum): tshig mi snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ / rdo rje mi phyed gsum las byung // bshang gci dam tshig lnga rnams ni// lcags gsum las byung ldan byas te// khar bcug nas ni bsgom par bya// sangs
29b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyas kun gyis mi phyed pa'i/ / thugs ni de ru rab bsgoms na// rdo rje 'jam pa'i 'od 'dra bar// de ma thag tu de 'gyur ro// 'khor lo 'od 'phro mdangs mchog can// rang gi sngags kyis rab bsgoms
29b3(rgyud 'bum): nas/ / sangs rgyas thams cad bzhugs pa'i gnas// bsgoms na sangs rgyas 'dra bar 'gyur// ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi/ rdul phran ji snyed yod pa yi// rdo rje 'dzin dang 'dra ba kun// de yi rjes
29b4(rgyud 'bum): su 'brang bar 'gyur/ / 'khor lo'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rdo rje chen po rang sngags kyis// dkyil 'khor dbus su rab bsgoms nas// rdo rje kun gyi gnas yin par// bsams na
29b5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur/ / ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi/ rdul phran ji snyed yod pa yin// de snyed kyis ni bud med rnams// yon tan can gyi gnas su 'gyur// drag po dag gis phyag byas pa// khams gsum
29b6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje chen por 'gyur/ / rdo rje dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// pad+ma chen po 'dab brgyad la// rang sngags rdo rje bsams nas su// chos rnams kun gyi gnas yin par// bsams na chos dang 'dra
29b7(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur/ / ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi/ rdul phran ji snyed yod pa yi// sangs rgyas mchod mchog dkyil 'khor du// dag pa'i bdag nyid 'jog par byed// pad+mo mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/
30a1(rgyud 'bum): ye shes lnga ldan rab bsten na// bskal pa gsum du yun du gnas// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba gsum la bsnyen bkur byed// 'od zer lnga yi mdog
30a2(rgyud 'bum): 'dra'i 'od/ / rang gi sngags kyi ral gri sgom// mig yangs lag na thogs na ni// rdo rje gsum rig 'dzin par 'gyur// khams gsum kun gyis rab mchod cing // tshangs dbang lha min phyag byas pa
30a3(rgyud 'bum): stong gsum na ni gcig pu pa/ / mi mchog gsang ba 'dzin par 'gyur// gang rnams 'dod dang bsam pa dag/ sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje'i thugs las rab tu byung // de lta bu yi dngos grub
30a4(rgyud 'bum): ster/ / ral gri thams cad kyi dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// oM ni ril bu tsa na ka'i// 'bru tshad tsam du bsams nas ni// dbus su rang gi lha yi gzugs// bsams te khar bcug rnam bsgoms na//
30a5(rgyud 'bum): de ni de ma thag tu yang // byang chub sems dpa'i 'od 'drar 'gyur// nyi ma shar ba'i 'od 'dra zhing // 'dzam+bu chu bo'i gser gyi mdog/ AHni ril bu tsa na ka'i// 'bru tshad tsam du bsams nas ni// dbus
30a6(rgyud 'bum): su rang gi lha yi gzugs/ / bsams te khar bcug rnam bsgoms na// de ni de ma thag tu yang // byang chub ye shes 'od 'drar 'gyur// nyi ma shar ba'i 'od 'dra zhing // 'dzam+b+ha chu bo'i gser gyi mdog/
30a7(rgyud 'bum): hUM ni ril pu tsa na ka'i// 'bru tshad tsam du bsams nas ni// dbus su rang gi lha yi gzugs// bsams te khar bcug rnam bsgoms// de ni de ma thag tu yang // rdo rje'i sku dang 'od 'drar 'gyur//
30b1(rgyud 'bum): mkha' dbyings gsal ba'i dbus gnas par// rnam par snang mdzad rab tu sgom// lag tu 'khor lo rab bsgoms na// 'khor lo'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// 'khor lo chen po'i rigs bsgoms te/
30b2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas skur ni rab sbyor zhing // ye shes 'di ni rab sgrub pa// ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya// mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbus gnas par// ye shes mi bskyod rab bsgoms te// lag tu rdo rje rab
30b3(rgyud 'bum): bsgoms na/ / rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// rdo rje chen po'i rigs bsgoms te// rdo rje'i sku ni rab sbyor zhing // rdo rje'i mchog 'di sgrub pa ni// ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya// mkha' dbyings rin
30b4(rgyud 'bum): chen dbus gnas par/ / rin chen rdo rje rab tu sgom// lag tu rin chen rab bsgoms na// rin chen rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// rin po che'i rigs bsgoms nas// rin chen skur ni rab sbyor zhing //
30b5(rgyud 'bum): rin chen mchog 'di sgrub pa ni// rdo rje ye shes dag gis bya// mkha' dbyings chos kyi dbus gnas par// tshe dpag med pa rab tu sgom// lag tu pad+mo rab bsgoms na// pad+mo'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur//
30b6(rgyud 'bum): pad+mo'i rigs chen bsgoms nas su// chos kyi skur ni rab sbyor zhing // pad+mo'i mchog 'di sgrub pa ni// ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya// mkha' dbyings dam tshig dbus gnas par// gdon mi za ba'i ye
30b7(rgyud 'bum): shes sgom/ / lag tu ral gri rab bsgoms na// ral gri'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// dam tshig chen po'i rigs bsgoms nas// thogs med dam tshig rab sbyor zhing // dam tshig mchog 'di sgrub pa ni//
31a1(rgyud 'bum): ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya// rtse gsum ye shes lcags kyu sogs// rdo rje khyad par gyis bsgrubs na// sku gsung thugs kyi sgrub pa yi// bsam gtan des ni 'grub par 'gyur//
