31a2(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i dngos grub rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to// lam gyi bzhi mdo'am shing gcig drung // mtshan ma gcig dang zhi gnas su// rdo rje dgug pa'i khyad par gyis// sgrub pa/
31a3(rgyud 'bum): bos ni rtag tu sgrub// sbyor gsum rdo rje can rnams kyi// sbyor gsum sngags kyi skyes bu bsam// sangs rgyas ye shes blo ldan gyis// sku gsung thugs kyi kyo ba btang // rlung gi dkyil 'khor mchog gnas
31a4(rgyud 'bum): pa/ sangs rgyas dgug pa dam pa yin// dam tshig las byung phyogs bcu pa// rdo rjes bkug nas nye bar spyod// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi rdo rje dam tshig dgug pa'i cho ga'o// rnam par snang mdzad 'khor lo che/
31a5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje pad+mo la sogs pas// rgyal gnas lcags kyu bsams nas ni// dam tshig dgug mchog kyo bas bya// khams gsum gyi dam tshig dgug pa'o// rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i// sangs rgyas sku ni/
31a6(rgyud 'bum): rnam bsgoms la// lag tu sku dang gsung thugs kyi// kyo ba la sogs rab tu sgom// 'di dag lta bu'i sbyor ba yis// de ni gnas las byed par 'gyur// rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i// rdo rje'i
31a7(rgyud 'bum): / sku ni rnam bsgoms la// rdo rje'i sbyor bas lce bsgoms na// rdo rje'i gsung dang 'dra bar 'gyur// rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i// sangs rgyas skur ni rnam bsgoms la// lag tu bsgrub bya bsams na ni// rdo rje dang ni 'dra bar
31b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / gsang gsum dam tshig mchod pa'i mchog/ mchod pas mchod nas rab tu sgrub// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba'i snying po bsdus pa yin// bcom ldan 'das gsang ba chen po'i ngam
31b2(rgyud 'bum): tshig gis de skad ces gsungs so/ / sha chen dam tshig mchog gis ni// rdo rje gsum mchog bsgrub par bya// bshang gci dam tshig mchog gis ni// rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtso bor 'gyur// glang
31b3(rgyud 'bum): po'i sha yi dam tshig gis/ / mngon shes lnga dag thob par 'gyur// rta sha dag gi dam tshig gis// mi snang ba yi bdag por 'gyur// khyi sha dag gi dam tshig gis// dngos grub thams cad
31b4(rgyud 'bum): 'grub par 'gyur/ / ba lang sha yi dam tshig gis// rdo rje dgug pa'i mchog tu 'gyur// sha rnams thams cad med na yang // thams cad bsam pas rnam par brtag/ rdo rje sbyor ba 'di byas na/
31b5(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas thams cad byin gyis rlob// rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa// sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje can// snying khar ye shes dam tshig dang // dbu rgyan rdo rje mchog 'dzin pa// sangs rgyas
31b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad mnyes gyur pa/ / dam tshig mchog gis bya ba ni// dngos grub thams cad 'grub pa'i mchog/ dam tshig mchog gis rab tu bya// dam tshig thams cad ye shes rdo rjer gyur pa zhes bya ba'i
31b7(rgyud 'bum): ting nge 'dzin to/ / lce yi dam tshig rdo rje mchog/ rdo rje can gyis hUM bsgoms te// bdud rtsi lnga yi sbyor ba yis// zos na rdo rje gsum thob 'gyur// AHdang oM gyi dam tshig kyang // 'di ni rdo rje'i tshul
32a1(rgyud 'bum): mchog ste/ / 'di lta bu yi sbyor ba yis// rdo rje mi phyed 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rje'i dam tshig bdud rtsi 'phreng ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rdo rje dam tshig dngos grub mchog/
32a2(rgyud 'bum): sku gsung rdo rje can du 'gyur// phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad kyi// nor bu yid bzhin rgya mtshor 'gyur// 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du// rdo rje'i bdag nyid snang bar byed// 'khor lo'i dam
32a3(rgyud 'bum): tshig grub pa'i mchog/ sangs rgyas sku dang 'dra bar 'gyur// gang+gA'i bye snyed thams cad du// grub pa kun tu rnam par spyod// dam tshig dam pa thams cad kyi// rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtso bor 'gyur//
32a4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i sku ni rab bsgoms pas// thams cad dam tshig mchog tu 'grub// mi snang gyur pa thams cad la// stong khams dag ni snang bar byed// sangs rgyas kun las 'phrog pa dang // lha yi bu mo
32a5(rgyud 'bum): mchog la spyod/ / gang+gA'i bye snyed sangs rgyas rnams// rdo rje gsum gyi gnas bzhugs pa// rang lag skyu ru ra bzhag bzhin// rdo rje mig gis mthong bar 'gyur/ gang+gA'i bye snyed zhing rnams na/
32a6(rgyud 'bum): sgra bsgrags pa ni ji snyed pa// mngon shes rna bas thos pa ni// rna ba'i drung na 'khod pa bzhin// gang+gA'i bye snyed zhing dag gi/ sems can kun gyi sems rnams ni// sku gsung thugs kyis mtshan
32a7(rgyud 'bum): pa yi/ / rol mo las byung sems rig 'gyur// bskal pa gang+gA'i bye snyed du// 'khor ba dag na gnas pa yi// sngon gyi gnas kyi gtan tshigs rnams// zhag gsum lon pa bzhin du dran//
32b1(rgyud 'bum): gang+gA'i bye ma snyed kyi lus// sangs rgyas srin la sogs brgyan pa// bskal pa gang+gA'i bye snyed du// rdo rje rdzu 'phrul mchog gis 'gengs// bcom ldan 'das dam tshig mngon par mkhyen pas
32b2(rgyud 'bum): de skad ces bka' stsal to/ / de la mngon par shes pa lnga ni// rdo rje'i spyan dang / rdo rje'i snyan dang / rdo rje'i thugs dang / rdo rje'i gnas dang / rdo rje'i rdzu 'phrul lo// sangs rgyas mngon shes
32b3(rgyud 'bum): lnga don 'grub/ / sangs rgyas sku dang 'dra bar 'gyur// gang+gA'i bye snyed grangs med pa'i// 'khor gyis yongs su bskor nas su// rdo rje'i sku dang gsung thugs kyis// 'jig rten khams kun bgrod
32b4(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / bsnyen pa'i dam tshig sbyor ba dang // nye bar sgrub pa 'byung ba dang // sgrub pa'i don gyi dam tshig dang // sgrub pa chen po dag dang bzhi// rdo rje'i bye brag shes byas la// de nas las rnams
32b5(rgyud 'bum): bsgrub par bya/ / bsnyen pa'i ting 'dzin rab sbyor ba// byang chub mchog ni bsgom par bya// nye bar sgrub pa grub mchog la// rdo rje skye mched rnam par spyad// sngags kyi bdag po bsgoms pa yis/
32b6(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa'i tshe na bskul bar gsungs// sgrub pa chen po byed pa'i tshe// rang sngags rdo rje can gyi gzugs// dbu rgyan la ni bdag po bsam// ye shes rdo rje 'grub par 'gyur// bsnyen pa'i ye shes bdud rtsi
32b7(rgyud 'bum): dag/ thams cad du ni brtag par bya// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// sngags kyi de nyid don sgrub pa'o// dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs dang // rab tu rnam par dben pa dang // ngo bo nags 'dab
33a1(rgyud 'bum): chu ngogs su/ / rtag tu dngos grub thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sgrub pa chen pos de skad ces bka' sprul to// yang na rdo rje bzhi dag gis// brtul zhugs brdan
33a2(rgyud 'bum): pas bsnyen pa bya/ / sku gsum mnyam pa nyid gyur pa// bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// dus bzhi dag tu rab sbyor bas// blo dang ldan pas gnas lngar ni// ye shes rdo rje yi ge oM/
33a3(rgyud 'bum): bsgoms na sdom pa yin par bshad// zhag bdun dang ni zla phyed dang // zla gcig zla ba phyed dang gnyis// rdo rje dam tshig bsgrubs na ni// dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// zhag grangs bye brag rab
33a4(rgyud 'bum): bskul ba/ / nga yis rgyas par rab tu bstan// gsang ba mchog las byung ba la// zla ba phyed kyis 'grub par gsungs// de la 'di ni nye bar sgrub pa'i sdom pa'i yul lo// sangs rgyas sku
33a5(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin dpal dang ldan/ / rdo rje mi phyed gsum 'byed pa// byin gyis brlabs kyi gnas byas te// rdo rje sku dang ldan par bya// mi phyed rdo rje gsum bsgoms pas// phyogs bcur bzhugs
33a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ / de la sku yis mtshan pa yi// byin gyis brlabs kyis gnas mdzad do// de la 'di ni sgrub pa'i sdom pa'i yul lo// chos kyi gsung lam dpal dang ldan// rdo rje
33a7(rgyud 'bum): mi phyed gsum 'byed pa/ byin gyis brlabs kyis gnas byas te// rdo rje gsang dang ldan par bya// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas// phyogs bcu na bzhugs sangs rgyas rnams// de la
33b1(rgyud 'bum): gsung las byung ba yi/ byin gyis brlabs kyis gnas mdzad do// de la 'di ni sgrub pa chen pa'i sdom pa'i yul lo// rdo rje'i thugs 'dzin dpal dang ldan// rdo rje mi phyed gsum 'byed pa// byin
33b2(rgyud 'bum): gyis brlabs kyi gnas byas te/ / rdo rje thugs dang ldan par bya// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas// phyogs bcun bzhugs sangs rgyas rnams// de la thugs las byung ba yis// byin gyis
33b3(rgyud 'bum): brlabs kyis gnas mdzad do/ / sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' 'am// yang na chos kyi sems dpa' nga rung // rmongs pas 'da' bar byed na ni// tshal par 'gas par gdon mi za// de bzhin
33b4(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i sbyor ba'i dam tshig sgrub pa'i mchog bstan pa'i le'u ste
33b5(rgyud 'bum): bcu gnyis pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan pade gshegs kun// ye shes rdo rje mchog 'dzin pa// sems can kun don yang dag 'byung // byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan gyis//
33b6(rgyud 'bum): / thub pa don kun rdo rje can// ston pa che la phyag 'tshal nas// dam tshig de nyid mkhyen pa la// mchod de rdo rje'i dbyangs 'di gsungs// e ma 'o sangs rgyas tshul re bzang // e ma 'o byang chub tshul gyi mchog
33b7(rgyud 'bum): e ma'o chos kyi tshul re zhi/ / e ma 'o sngags kyi tshul re brtan// ma skyes pa yi chos rnams ni// ngo bo nyid kyis khyad par can// rnam par mi rtog yang dag rig/ ye shes 'byung ba rab tu bshad// yid 'ong
34a1(rgyud 'bum): sngags rnams kun bsdus pa/ / rdo rje bzlas pa ye shes che// sku gsum mi phyed dkyil 'khor dang // sangs rgyas ye shes thob 'gyur ba// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pa'i/
34a2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis rlob// rigs dang gsang sngags thams cad kyi// sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi mtshan// gsang sngags zlos pa de ring gsungs/
34a3(rgyud 'bum): ye shes rgya mtsho gsan pa dang // sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// sangs rgyas dus gsum las byung rnams// rdo rje sngags ni rab bsgoms pas// ye shes mnyam med thob 'gyur ba// bcom ldan
34a4(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ / de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// nam mkha' rdo rje ye shes 'byung // byed skyed dam pa mchog gi gtsos// rdo rje bzlas pa 'di gsungs so// sngags kyi don kun bzlas
34a5(rgyud 'bum): pa ni/ / rdo rje mi phyed gsum gyis mtshan// rdo rje dbye ba gsum gyi mthar// bkod pa rdo rje gsum zhes bya// sku gsung thugs kyi gnas rnams su// spro ba rnam pa gsum dag bya// rdo rje bzlas pa 'di
34a6(rgyud 'bum): yis ni/ / rdo rje gsum gyi thugs 'drar 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs// bsgoms nas mchod pa'i mchog brtag pa// ye shes rdo rjes byas na ni// rdo rje gsum gyi thugs 'drar 'gyur//
34a7(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs// bsams nas mchod pa'i mchog brtag pa// ye shes rdo rjes rab tu bya// 'di ni byang chub mchog thob pa'o// yang na dbye ba rnam gsum gyis// so so dag tu spro
34b1(rgyud 'bum): bar bya/ / sku dang gsung thugs bdag med pa// ye shes sems kyis yang dag spro// brjod nas rdo rje spro ba ni// rdzogs nas rab tu bsdu bar bya// 'di ni ye shes spyan phye ba'i// sangs rgyas
34b2(rgyud 'bum): rnams ni kun gyi yin/ / sku yi rdo rje rdzogs byang chub// dngos dang dngos med rnam dpyad pa// sangs rgyas sku zhes bya bar bshad// de ni sku yi bzlas par bshad// gsung gi dam tshig rdzogs
34b3(rgyud 'bum): byang chub/ / sgra dang sgra min rnam dpyad pa// gsung gi rdo rje zhes bshad de// de ni gsung gi bzlas par bshad// thugs kyi dam tshig rdzogs byang chub// gnas pa'i rdo rje rnam dpyad pa// thugs
34b4(rgyud 'bum): kyi rdo rje zhes bya ste/ / de ni thugs kyi bzlas par bshad// don gyi rjes 'gro bzlas pa ni// ngo bo nyid med bzang po yis// dus gsum sangs rgyas rnam dpyad pa// de ni rin chen bzlas par
34b5(rgyud 'bum): bshad/ / sangs rgyas zhing rnams thams cad du// sku yi sprin rnams spro ba dang // bzhud cing byon pa rdo rje'i don// de ni thog med bzlas par bshad// khro bo'i dam tshig ye shes kyis// rang gi rdo rje'i
34b6(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor grags/ / sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig thos pa// de ni khro bo'i bzlas par bshad// 'dod pa'i don gyis myos gyur pa// kun tu skyob cing phan par dga'// sems can gti mug gnas
34b7(rgyud 'bum): la 'jog/ de ni gti mug bzlas par bshad// 'dod chags rdo rje las byung tshig/ lus dang ngag sems la gnas pa'i// sems can 'dod chags mtshor gnas bzhag/ de ni 'dod chags bzlas
35a1(rgyud 'bum): par bshad/ / zhe sdang rdo rje las byung sems// lus dang ngag sems la gnas pa'i// sems can zhe sdang gnas la bzhag/ de ni zhe sdang bzlas par bshad// dam tshig de nyid
35a2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje gsum/ / dbu ma dam tshig rdo rje can// de nyid dam tshig rdo rje yi// bzlas pa ma ning zhes bya'o// 'dod chags de nyid don sgom pa// rdo rje bdag po thams cad ni// sems can kun la phan 'dod
35a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i/ / 'dod chags byang chub rdzogs par mdzad// rig pa chen mo spyan la sogs// rtag tu 'dod pa'i don brtson pa// 'dod pa'i longs spyod dag gis ni// ji ltar 'dod pa bsten na 'grub//
35a4(rgyud 'bum): gti mug dam tshig las byung ba// rig pa'i rgyal po rdo rje can// ma ning dag gi gnas grub pa// dngos grub dam pa rab tu ster// khro bo zhe sdang gnas las skyes// gsod la rtag tu brtson pa dag/
35a5(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa mchog gi chos can la// gsod pa'i don gyis 'grub par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das skyes bu chen po'i dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// ye shes 'khor lo can rnams kyi// 'khor lo
35a6(rgyud 'bum): snying kha'i dbus su sgom/ / gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// dbus su 'khor lo'i don skom mo// ye shes rdo rje can rnams kyi// rdo rje snying kha'i dbus su sgom// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas
35a7(rgyud 'bum): par/ / rdo rje'i sngags don bsgom par bya// rin chen ye shes can rnams kyi// rin chen snying kha'i dbus su sgom// rin chen dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rin chen sngags don bsgom par bya// pad+mo ye shes can
35b1(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi/ / pad+mo snying kha'i dbus su sgom// chos kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// pad+mo'i sngags don bsgom par bya// ral gri ye shes can rnams kyi// ral gri snying kha'i dbus su sgom// dam tshig
35b2(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ / ral gri'i sngags don bsgom par bya// dkyil 'khor kun gyi ngos rnams su// sangs rgyas lnga rnams dgod par bya// 'od zer lnga yi bye brag gis// spron byang chub thob
35b3(rgyud 'bum): bapar 'gyur/ / sngags rnams thams cad spro ba ni// bye brag rnam pa gnyis su bsgrags// sku gsum rdo rje bye brag gis// spro ba dang ni bsdu ba bya// lus kyis sku yi ngo bo nyid// sems kyis thugs kyi
35b4(rgyud 'bum): ngo bo nyid/ / ngag gis gsung gi ngo bo nyid// mchod nas mchod pa'i gnas su 'gyur// dkyil 'khor chen po'i 'khor lo yis// rdo rje lnga rnams bsgom par bya// dbus su bdag po bsams nas ni//
35b5(rgyud 'bum): sku gsung rdo rje rang gi gzugs// rang sngags rdo rje'i gzugs dag gis// dkyil 'khor rnam pa bzhi dag tu// kha dog rnam bzhir kun brtags la// snying khar sngags kyi don bsgoms na// rdo rje rnam pa bzhi yi
35b6(rgyud 'bum): las/ / bsam gtan rdo rje can dag byed// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// gsang ba rab tu bzang po yin// zhi ba la ni spyan gyi tshul// rgyas la rdo rje pad+mo can// dbang la rnam par snang mdzad gnas/
35b7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje khro bo mngon spyod la// 'di ni rdo rje thams cad kyi// gsang ba sku gsum las byung ba// sngags rnams kun ni sprul pa ste// bya ba'i rol mos mtshan pa'o// ma dang smra ba'i sems can dang // rdo rje slob dpon
36a1(rgyud 'bum): smod pa dang / / gdug pa'i sems can gzhan rnams la'ang // rab tu bskul ba 'di bya'o// bcom ldan 'das ye shes chen po'i 'khor lo rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to// khams
36a2(rgyud 'bum): gsum gnas pa'i sems can rnams/ / sangs rgyas skur ni rnam bsgoms la// dgra bos bsad par bsams nas su// de nas las rnams brtsam par bya// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par//
36a3(rgyud 'bum): rdorje rtse lnga kha bzhi pa// rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun dang ldan// rdo rje sems dpar rnam par sgom// dus gsum dam tshig las byung ba// sangs rgyas 'khor lo rnam bsgoms la// sangs rgyas 'khor
36a4(rgyud 'bum): lo stobs po che/ / lag pa g.yas pas 'di bya'o// phyogs bcu nas byung sems can rnams// sangs rgyas sku yi bye brag gis// bsdus te gong bu'i tshul gyis su// rang gis lus la de dag gzung //
36a5(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas ye shes 'khor lo can// slar yang spro bar rab tu bya// khro bas 'khrug pa'i khro bo rnams// mi sdug 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs// mtshon cha sna tshogs mchog 'dzin pa// gsod pa'i
36a6(rgyud 'bum): don gyis don sems pa/ / rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid dam// gdug pa chen po gsod par byed// sangs rgyas sku gsum mchog stsol ba'o// rdo rje gsum gyi dkyil 'khor gnas// nyi ma bdun du 'di
36a7(rgyud 'bum): byas na/ / sangs rgyas dngos grub ster bar 'gyur// rmongs pas grub pa mi ster na// 'chi bar 'di ni gdon mi za// rdo rje'i dam tshig ye shes kyi bka'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam mkhan
36b1(rgyud 'bum): dbyings kyi dbus su ni/ / 'khor lo rdo rje 'bar bas brgyan// rnam pa'i mchog ni kun dang ldan// rnam par snang mdzad rab tu sgom// dus gsum dam tshig las byung ba// rdo rje sems dpa' grags chen ni
36b2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje me stag 'phro ba can/ / de yi phyag na bsnams par bsgoms// phyogs bcu nas byung sems can rnams// rdo rje sku yi khyad par gyis// 'od zer tshul gyis bsdus nas ni// de dag bdag gi lus la gzung //
36b3(rgyud 'bum): spro ba rdo rje thams cad kyi// ye shes mchog gi gnyen gyis bya// sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba can// sangs rgyas thams cad bdag la gson// bdag ni dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin// bka' yi 'khor
36b4(rgyud 'bum): lo rab sbyor ba/ / gal te dam tshig las 'das na// rdo rje rab tu 'bar ba yis// sku gsum las byung dgas par bgyi// zhig par 'gyur bar gdon mi 'tshal// 'khor lo'i dam tshig ye shes
36b5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ / sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor rdo rje can// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// gshin rje'i gshed kyi 'khor lo che// rang gi rdo rje yin par brtag/ dus gsum sangs rgyas
36b6(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' rnams/ / sku gsum dkyil 'khor bzhugs pa dag/ gshin rje'i gshed kyi mdog 'dra ba// slar yang sangs rgyas spro bar bya// dus gsum la bzhugs sems can dang // gdug sems
36b7(rgyud 'bum): can gyi dgra bo rnams/ / khros pas thams cad gsod par sgom// 'di ni rdo rje bka'i dkyil 'khor dam tshig thams cad las byung ba gshin rje gshed kyi sku gsum gyi ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge
37a1(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin to/ / sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'am// rang sngags don gyi yon tan nam// yang na gtsug tor dam tshig gis// bka' yi 'khor lo sbyar bar bya// sngags kun
37a2(rgyud 'bum): srung phyir ye shes mchog/ rdo rje can gyis bya ba ste// 'di ni rdo rje thams cad kyi// byang chub bsrung ba'i don chen bya// bcom ldan 'das rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to// nam mkha' rdo rje'i
37a3(rgyud 'bum): dbus gnas par/ / chos kyi snang mdzad sku mchog las/ byung ba'i sku gsum dam tshig dag/ mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbus gnas par// bsams nas gdan du de rab brtag/ mkha' dbyings
37a4(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ / yongs su gang bar rnam par sgom// rang sngags yi ge'i gnas ye shes// thugs kyi rnam par bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas rnams ni sems tsam du// bsgoms
37a5(rgyud 'bum): nas slar yang rab tu bsdu/ / thugs kyi rdo rjer byas pa'i phyir// sku gsum la ni de dag gzud// rdo rje'i sngags rin po che rab tu snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rnam pa'i mchog rnams
37a6(rgyud 'bum): kun ldan pa'i/ / rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu sgom// sangs rgyas rim bzhin bkod nas ni// chu yi steng du bcag par bya// rkang pa mnyam gzhag sbyor ba yis// spyi bo'i steng du rkang pa sgom// bcom
37a7(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das ngo bo nyid dag pas de skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rdo rje rgya mtsho rkang pas gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// dbang chen dkyil 'khor bsgoms nas ni// dbus su khro bo rnam bzhag la//
37b1(rgyud 'bum): las kyi rdo rje rkang pa yis// de yi spyi bor gnon par sgom// mu stegs can dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyi 'khrul 'khor gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rdo rje gsum mchog khro bo'i
37b2(rgyud 'bum): tshul/ / ge sar ser po'i mchog 'dra ba// thams cad ri yi rgyal po ltar// bsams nas spyi bor rab tu sgom// sangs rgyas dpung yang gnon byed na// mi dbang la ni dogs pa med// bcom
37b3(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs las byung bas de skad ces bka' stsal to// dpung thams cad gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// dgra bo
37b4(rgyud 'bum): skrag pa'i dam tshig gi/ bsam gtan rab tu brtag pa 'di// sangs rgyas dag gis 'das na yang // 'gas par 'gyur par gdon mi za// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig gis de skad
37b5(rgyud 'bum): gsungs so/ / hUM las phur bu bsams pa ni// rtse lnga pa yi tshad du ste// rdo rje phur bu de yis ni// snying khar de ni rab bsgoms na// khros pas sangs rgyas dpung dag kyang // 'jig par 'gyur ba
37b6(rgyud 'bum): gdon mi za/ / dgra rmongs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// grong ngam yang na grong khyer ram// ljongs dag tu ni rab sbyor ba// nad kun spong ba'i zhi ba yang // 'dis ni rtag tu sbyar bar bya//
37b7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa ni// bar snang dag la rab tu sgom// sreg pa'i bskal pa ltar bsams na// slar yang rab tu bsdu bar bya// spro ba dag kyang de nas bya// rin chen yid bzhin nor bu'i 'od// chos kyi sprin
38a1(rgyud 'bum): ni bsgoms nas kyang / / dbang bskur ba ni yang dag bya// rdo rje'i bsam gtan 'di yis ni// dgang dka' ba yang rab tu 'gengs// sbyin pa'i rdo rje rab tu sgom// yid bzhin
38a2(rgyud 'bum): nor bu dpal ldan 'gyur/ / sangs rgyas sprin dang chos chen dang // rdo rje sems dpa' der spro bya// bskal pa gsum gyi yun gnas shing // sangs rgyas thams cad byin gyis rlob// 'di ni sangs rgyas
38a3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi/ / gsang ba'i sku ste skyon med pa'o// nad thams cad med par byed pa rdo rje 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// bsams gnas las byung dam bcas pas// gnas gang du ni yang dag
38a4(rgyud 'bum): spyad/ / bsam gtan sbyor ba 'di yis ni// gnas na sangs rgyas byin gyis rlob// rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyal po che// rdo rje phur bu rab tu sgom// me stag 'bar ba 'dra ba yis// phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor
38a5(rgyud 'bum): gdab par bya/ / 'gro ba 'dul bzhi pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su bsams// rnam par snang mdzad gzugs bsams nas//
38a6(rgyud 'bum): rang gi thugs kar 'dod pa gzhag/ spyan la sogs pa mchog rnams kyis// mkha' dbyings yongs su gang bar sgom// bsdus nas 'od kyi gong bu yis// nad pa la ni dbab par bya/ kha spu'i bu ga nas
38a7(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas/ / sprin rnams brtul zhugs can gyis spro// sangs rgyas sprin rnams de yi tshe// de la dbang bskur rab tu stsol// nad pa rdo rje dam tshig gis// skad cig gis ni dpal ldan 'gyur// sangs rgyas
38b1(rgyud 'bum): kyi dam tshig dkod pa'i sprin zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// dbang chen dkyil 'khor dam pa bsams// chos 'dzin pa yi gzugs bsams nas// snying khar 'dod
38b2(rgyud 'bum): pa gzhag par bya/ / mkha' dbyings gnas ni nyams dga' bar// dkar mo zhes byas rab tu dgang // 'od kyi gong bur bsdus nas ni// yid bzhin nor bu rin chen 'od// lus dang ngag dang sems
38b3(rgyud 'bum): gnas la/ / 'dod pa la de dbab par bya// ba spu'i bu ga nas rin chen// sprin rnams brtul zhugs can gyis spro// chos kyi sprin rnams bsgoms nas su// dbang bskur ba ni yang dag bya// rdo rje bsam
38b4(rgyud 'bum): gtan 'di yis ni/ / dgang dka' ba yang rab tu 'gengs// sbyin pa'i rdo rje sgrub pa de// yid bzhin nor bu dpal ldan 'gyur// chos kyi sprin gyi dam tshig bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
38b5(rgyud 'bum): to/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su ni// rdo rje'i zla gam dkyil 'khor bsams// rdo rje nam mkha' chos mdun gzugs// 'dod pa snying khar gzhag par bya// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'
38b6(rgyud 'bum): yis/ / nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor yongs su gang // 'od zer lnga yi sbyor ba yis// de ni gzi brjid dbab par bya// de ni de ma thag tu yang // sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs su byon// 'jam dpal gyi ni
38b7(rgyud 'bum): mdog dang 'dra/ / gnas las byed par de 'gyur ro// dbang bskur ba ni dga' ston che// dgyes pa'i bdag nyid de stsol bas// bltas tsam skyed pa nyid kyis kyang // 'gro ba thams cad dbang du 'gyur//
39a1(rgyud 'bum): rin po che'i dam tshig gi sprin bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam mkha'i rdo rje srin po ni// drag cing khro la rab gtum dang // wa dang bya rog sna tshogs dang // bya rgod kyi
39a2(rgyud 'bum): yis gang bar sgom/ / me yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// dgra bo rnams ni skrag par sgom// sangs rgyas kun la gnod byed pa// bsams nas rnal 'byor sbyar bar bya// mtshon cha sna tshogs
39a3(rgyud 'bum): thogs pas mnan/ / rgyu ma khrag dang rkang la sogs// thams cad drangs par rnam bsgoms te// bsgoms na dgra rnams 'chi bar 'gyur// gal te de ltar rab bsgoms na// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin
39a4(rgyud 'bum): pa yang / / zla ba phyed ni tshun chad kyis// 'chi bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za// rdo rje dam tshig gi sprin bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rnam par snang mdzad zhal gsum pa// ston ka'i
39a5(rgyud 'bum): sprin gyi mdog 'dra bsam/ / dkar po nag po rab tu dmar// thor tsugs dbu rgyan dag gis brgyan// rdo rje can ni zhal gsum bsam// nag po dkar po dmar po'i zhal// 'bar ba'i thor
39a6(rgyud 'bum): tsugs dbu rgyan can/ / 'jig rten khams rnams 'khrug byed pa'o// 'dod chags can ni zhal gsum bsam// dmar po nag po dkar po'i zhal// thor tsugs dbu rgyan longs spyod can//
39a7(rgyud 'bum): bsgoms na nges par 'grub par 'gyur// 'khor lo rdo rje pad+mo che// g.yas pa'i phyag tu bsnams par sgom// rdo rje phyag drug mtshon cha ni// bzang po sna tshogs bsnams par sgom// sems can kun
39b1(rgyud 'bum): la phan bzhed ma/ / spyan ni zhal gsum dag tu bsam// dkar po nag po rab dmar ba// mdzes pa'i gzugs su rab tu sgom// mkha' skyes spyan ni rgyal mo che// zhal gsum du ni rtag par sgom/
39b2(rgyud 'bum): gnag dang dkar dang dmar ba'i tshul// mdzes pa'i gzugs su rnam par sgom// chu skyes spyan ni rgyal mo che// zhal gsum du ni rnam par sgom// dmar dang gnag dang dkar ba ste// kha dog
39b3(rgyud 'bum): mdzes par rnam par sgom/ / rig ma rdo rje ut+pal bsnams// zhal gsum rab tu gsal ba'i mdangs// ser dang gnag dang dkar ba'i zhal// bsgoms na ye shes thob par 'gyur// khro bo
39b4(rgyud 'bum): chen po gshin rje gshed/ / zhal gsum drag po'i 'od bzang ba// rnon po 'jigs pa'ang 'jigs par byed// kha dog nag po rab tu sgom// gzhan gyis mi thub khro bo che// drag tu bzhad
39b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sgra 'byin pa/ / zhal gsum 'od zer mang po dag/ rab tu 'phro ba rnam par bsam// khro bo chen po rta mgrin ni// bskal pa'i me bzhin rab tu 'bar// zhal gsum gdug pa zhabs
39b6(rgyud 'bum): kyis mnan/ / sbyor ba can gyis rtag tu sgom// rdo rje mi 'chi khro bo che// 'od zer 'phro ba rab tu 'khrug/ drag po 'khor lo 'bar ba 'dra// 'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs par byed// 'dod pa'i
39b7(rgyud 'bum): ye shes khro bo che/ / zhal gsum pa ni 'jigs par byed// phyag bzhi 'jigs par byed pa'i mchog/ Dak+ki rgyal po rab tu sgom// stobs po che ni rdo rje che// 'jig rten gsum gyi mun sel ba//
40a1(rgyud 'bum): gdug pa thams cad 'joms par byed// zhal gsum par ni rtag par sgom// khro bo chen po dbyig sngon can// khams gsum dag ni 'jigs par byed// zhal gsum rdo rje
40a2(rgyud 'bum): gsum las byung / / 'bar ba rnon po can du sgom// rdo rje mi g.yo khro bo che// rdo rje las byung mi g.yo ba// zhi ba ral gri zhags pa bsnams// brtul zhugs can gyis zhal gsum sgom// gtsug tor chen
40a3(rgyud 'bum): po yi ge gcig/ 'od zer dag ni kun tu 'phro// zhal gsum 'bar ba 'khor lo can// bsam gtan dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// gnod mdzes ye shes mchog 'dzin pa// 'jigs pa'i
40a4(rgyud 'bum): rgya mtsho yang dag byed/ / zhal gsum 'bar ba 'od 'phro can// bsam gtan dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// gzi brjid phung po gtsug tor rgyal// gang gzhan sngags kyi 'khor lo can// dam tshig
40a5(rgyud 'bum): longs spyod 'di rnams kyis/ / so so dag tu bsgom par bya// ting nge 'dzin ni dpag med pa// sngags rnams kyi ni bshad pa yin// khro bo dag ni re re yang // nam mkha'i steng du shin tu 'phags//
40a6(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsams// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// rnam par snang mdzad rnam par bsam// gsal zhing zhi ba
40a7(rgyud 'bum): zla ba bzhin/ / 'od zer sna tshogs 'dra ba'i 'od// me long lta bur yang dag byung // khams gsum dag gi dkyil 'khor du// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa dag/ bsams na de yis byang chub mthong //
40b1(rgyud 'bum): bsam gtan rdo rje rab sgom pa// 'di yis sangs rgyas che ba'i bdag/ 'jig rten thams cad dbang byed pa// tshe 'di nyid kyis 'thob par 'gyur// rnam par snang mdzad kyi dam tshig 'byung ba
40b2(rgyud 'bum): mdzes pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ / rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bsam//
40b3(rgyud 'bum): khros pa gsal ba'i lus dang 'dra// 'bar pa sna tshogs mnyam pa'i 'od// rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun dang ldan// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// zhi ba'i ye shes gnas bsgoms na//
40b4(rgyud 'bum): myur du rdo rje nyid thob 'gyur// bsam gtan rdo rje rab bskul ba// 'dis ni rdo rje'i bdag nyid che// sems can thams cad dbang byed pa// tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// dam tshig thams cad 'byung
40b5(rgyud 'bum): papa mdzes pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ / chos kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// chos kyi sems dpa' rnam par
40b6(rgyud 'bum): / sgom// gsal ba'i lus 'dzin zhi ba ni// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// 'od zer sprin gyi 'khor lo che// rnam par 'phro ba rab tu sgom// 'di yis chos kyi bdag nyid che// sku gsum
40b7(rgyud 'bum): mi phyed las byung ba/ / ye shes rgya mtshos rnam par brgyan// tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// chos kyi sems dpa'i dam tshig 'byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni//
41a1(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// spyan gyi mchog ni rnam par sgom// zhal bzang spyan ni rab tu yangs// sna tshogs rgyan
41a2(rgyud 'bum): gyis rnam par brgyan/ / mtshan rnams thams cad rab tu rdzogs// bud med sgyu ma'i mchog ldan pa// khams gsum dag ni dbang byed pa// ye shes thams cad grub par byed// 'khor lo yid
41a3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin nor bu ster/ / phyag tu 'khor lo bsgom par bya// spyan gyi dam tshig phyog gi mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'od mchog can// mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i
41a4(rgyud 'bum): dbus su bsam/ / sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms nas// nam mkha'i rdo rje rab mchog sgom// zhal bzang spyan ni rab tu yangs// ut+pal mthing kha'i mdog 'dra ba// mtshan rnams thams
41a5(rgyud 'bum): cad rab tu rdzogs/ / nam mkha'i rdo rje mchog rab sgom// khams gsum dag gis phyag byas pa// sangs rgyas byang chub byed pa'i mchog/ dngos grub rdo rje can gyi gsang // ut+pal sngo dmar phyag na bsnams//
41a6(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha' yum gyi rin po che// 'od kyi sprin rdo rje tshim par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// chos kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab
41a7(rgyud 'bum): bsgoms la/ / rdo rje chos ma rab tu sgom// zhal bzang spun ni rab tu yangs// pad+ma rA ga'i mdog 'dra ba'i// sgyu mas mtshan pa'i mchog las byung // 'dod chags chags pa 'dzin sdug pa// mtshan
41b1(rgyud 'bum): nyid thams cad yongs rdzogs shing / / rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa yi// sangs rgyas thams cad rab bsgoms pa// chos kyi ye shes 'byung gnas mchog/ dam tshig rdo rje can gyi gsang // ut+pal dmar
41b2(rgyud 'bum): po phyag na bsnams/ / chos kyi dam tshig de kho na nyid mngon par byang chub pa kun tu ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// dngos grub dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs
41b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la/ / sgrol ma'i mchog ni bsgom par bya// zhal bzang spyan ni rab tu yangs// sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// kha dog ljang ser 'dra ba'i 'od// bud med
41b4(rgyud 'bum): sgyu ma rab tu myos/ / rdo rje ting nge 'dzin las byung // sems can kun gyis phyag byas pa// u t+pal ser po mdog 'dra ba'i// gsal ba phyag na bsnams par sgom// dam tshig sgrol ma mchog
41b5(rgyud 'bum): dong ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// gshin rje gshed mchog rnam par
41b6(rgyud 'bum): sgom/ / 'bar ba'i 'od zer mang po 'phro// 'jigs pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu khros// spyan dmar mche ba rnam par gtsigs// phyag na ral gri bsnams par sgom// snang mdzad dbu rgyan rnam bsgoms
41b7(rgyud 'bum): na rdo rje can ni dgyes par 'gyur/ / 'di ni ye shes rdo rje can// khro bo kun gyi dam tshig yin// gshin rje gshed kyi spro ba'i snang ba bkod pa bsgom pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nyi ma'i
42a1(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor dam pa ni/ / nam mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// gzhan gyis mi thub rab sgom pa// 'bar ba'i 'od zer mang po can//
42a2(rgyud 'bum): sbrul gyis brgyan cing ska rags can// rdo rje dgyes pa 'jigs 'jigs lta// kha dog dkar po rab tu sgom// mi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la// bsams na rdo rje can dag mnyes// 'di ni ye shes blo
42a3(rgyud 'bum): can gyi/ / khro bo kun gyi dam tshig go/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rdo rje bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas
42a4(rgyud 'bum): gzugs ni rab bsgoms la/ / rdo rje rta ni rab tu sgom// khro bo'i 'od zer mang po dag/ thams cad du ni rnam par 'phro// gdug pa thams cad zhabs kyis mnan// kha dog dmar po rnam par bsam/
42a5(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs sangs dpag med dbu rgyan la// bsgoms na rdo rje can dag ma nyes// 'di ni rdo rje ye shes can// khro bo kun gyi dam tshig yin// rta skyed pa 'byung ba rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//
42a6(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// rdo rje mi 'chi rab tu sgom// 'bar ba'i 'od zer mang po 'phro// rdo rje'i sprin rnams
42a7(rgyud 'bum): kun tu 'khrug/ khros shing khro bcas gnag pa dang // mche ba rnon po rab tu sgom// mi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la// bsgoms na khro bo 'dzin mnyes 'gyur// 'di ni khro bo thams cad kyis// 'da' bar
42b1(rgyud 'bum): dka' ba'i dam tshig go/ mi 'chi ba'i dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms
42b2(rgyud 'bum): lang Tak+ki rgyal po rab tu sgos/ / khro bo 'jigs pa'i cha lugs gtum// 'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs par byed// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// rdo rje 'od bzang bsgom par bya//
42b3(rgyud 'bum): mi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la// bsgoms na rab tu mnyes par 'gyur// 'di ni khro bo thams cad kyi// 'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go// bsam gtan rdo rje rdzogs par byang chub pa dga' ba zhes
42b4(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// stobs po che ni rab tu sgom// 'bar ba'i 'od zer
42b5(rgyud 'bum): mang po 'phro/ / rdo rje gsum gyi gnas dkyil 'khor// khros shing khros pa zhags pa 'dzin// rdo rje stobs chen bsgom par bya// mi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la/ bsgoms na rab tu mnyes par
42b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / 'di ni khro bo thams cad kyi// 'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go// rdo rje gsum gyi stobs zhes bya ba'i ting te 'dzin to// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus su
42b7(rgyud 'bum): bsam/ / sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// rdo rje sngon po rnam par sgom// khro bo 'jigs pa'i cha lugs can// 'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs par byed// gzugs ni rab tu gnag
43a1(rgyud 'bum): la no/ / rgya mtsho nag po skyed par byed// 'bar ba'i 'od zer mang po 'phro// rdo rje'i dbyig thogs bsgom par bya// mi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la// bsgoms
43a2(rgyud 'bum): na rab tu mnyes par 'gyur/ / 'di ni khro bo thams cad kyi// 'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go// rdo rje dbyig pa'i dam tshig mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nyi ma'i dkyil
43a3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor dam pa ni/ / nam mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// mi g.yo mchog ni rnam par bsgom// khros shing 'jigs pa'i zur gyis lta//
43a4(rgyud 'bum): 'khrugs pa ral gri zhags pa bsnams// 'bar ba'i 'od zer mang po 'phro// mi g.yo rdo rje can du sgom// mi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la// bsgoms na rab tu mnyes par 'gyur//
43a5(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni khro bo thams cad kyi// 'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go// rdo rje nam mkha' dbyings kyi dam tshig zhabs kyis gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni/
43a6(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// rig pa'i 'khor lo rab tu sgos// mtshan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// 'khor lo 'bar bas yongs
43a7(rgyud 'bum): su bskor/ / gtsug tor 'khor lo sgyur dam tshig/ rnam par 'phro ba rab tu sgom// mi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la// bsgoms na rab tu mnyes par 'gyur// 'di ni khro bo thams cad kyi/
43b1(rgyud 'bum): 'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go// gtsug tor gyi dam tshig rig pa'i stobs 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus su
43b2(rgyud 'bum): bsam/ / sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// rdo rje sum+b+ha rab tu sgom// me lce rnon po 'bar ba'i sku// rdo rje'i sprin ni rab tu 'phro// phyag na rdo rje rab 'bar ba// bsgoms na dngos
43b3(rgyud 'bum): grub thob par 'gyur/ / mi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la// bsgoms na rab tu mnyes par 'gyur// 'di ni khro bo thams cad kyi// 'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go/ rdo rje'i dam tshig
43b4(rgyud 'bum): sum+b+ha rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ / 'gog pa khro bo'i 'khor lo ni// sangs rgyas 'khor lo bsten pa yis// ting 'dzin rdo rje ye shes rnams// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor
43b5(rgyud 'bum): grub par 'gyur/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ dam tshig bkod pa de kho na nyid kyi don sgom pa mngon par
43b6(rgyud 'bum): byang chub pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o/ / / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi bdag po/ rdo rje 'dzin chen po zhi
43b7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i dam tshig gi mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo'i mchog 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdorje
44a1(rgyud 'bum): las phyung ngo / / oM ru ru s+phu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa ne sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ri swA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// 'byor pa kun la dgyes pa rnams// mnyes shing rab tu
44a2(rgyud 'bum): dgyes gyur nas/ / sangs rgyas rdo rje rjes su dran// sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhi 'byung ba// las rnams thams cad rab bsgrub cing // rdo rje'i dam tshig bskul mdzad ma// shi ba sos par
44a3(rgyud 'bum): byed par gsungs/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das sku gsum gyi dam tshig rdo rje khro bo/ dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje 'dzin
44a4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi btsun mo'i mchog 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM shaM kA re shAn+tiM ka re/ g+hun+tu g+hun+ya g+huT+Ti ni g+hA ta ya ni g+hA ta ya/ b+hur+thi ni swAhA/ de nas 'di ni
44a5(rgyud 'bum): gsungs tsam gyis/ / sku gsum dbyer med rdo rje can// mnyes pa'i spyan ni gdangs nas su// rdo rje'i thugs ni rjes su dran// rdo rje srung ba'i sbyor ba la// las rnams rtag tu rab sgrub pa// rdo rje
44a6(rgyud 'bum): chen po 'jigs nyen la/ / rtag tu stobs ni byed par bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags chen po'i dam tshig la gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ chos
44a7(rgyud 'bum): kyi sku'i btsun mo'i mchog 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM ka Te bi ka Te ni ka Te ka TaM ka Te swA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// rdo rje chos mchog 'dzin
44b1(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pa rnams/ / mnyes nas bsam gtan thob gyur nas// rdo rje'i chos ni rjes su dran// rtag tu chos rgyas stobs mdzad pa// rtag tu mdzod po che dang ldan// rdo rje gsung gi bka' bzhin du/
44b2(rgyud 'bum): bzlas pa tsam gyis byed par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig kun las 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dam tshig sems dpa'i btsun mo'i mchog
44b3(rgyud 'bum): 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// sangs rgyas kun bdag che las skyes// mnyes shing ye shes
44b4(rgyud 'bum): thob gyur nas/ / rdo rje'i sku ni rjes su dran// sangs rgyas rdo rje sde chen dang // sems can khams ni ma lus pa// skad cig gis ni bran bzhin du// thams cad g.yo med dbang du byed// ces bcom
44b5(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/ dri ma med pa'i 'od zer gyi sprin rdo rje
44b6(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje gshin rje'i gshed po chen po rdo rje khro bo 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // na maHsa man+ta kA ya
44b7(rgyud 'bum): ka tsit+ta badz+ra NAM/ au kha kha khA hi khA hi/ sarba duSh+Ta satwa da ma ka/ a si mu sa la pa ra shu pA sha has+dza/ tsa tur b+hu dza/ tsa tur mu kha/ ShaT+ya ra Na/ A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ sar+b+ba duSh+Ta prA na
45a1(rgyud 'bum): a pa hA ri Ne/ ma hA big+h+na g+ha ta ka/ bi kri ta A nan/ sar+b+ba b+hU ta/ d+ha yaM ka ra/ an+d+raT+TahA sa nA di ne/ b+ha g+h+ra tsar+m+ma ni ba sa na/ ku ru ku ru sarba kar+dz+dza Ni/ min+da tsin+da
45a2(rgyud 'bum): sar+b+ba man tAn/ b+hin+da bin+da ba ra mu dran/ A kaR+Sha ya A kaR+Sha ya sar+b+ba b+hu tAn/ ma tha ma tha/ nirma tha nirma tha sar+b+be duSh+TA na/ pra be sha ya pra be sha ya maN+Da la ma d+h+ye/ baM ba swa ti/ dzI bI tAn+ta ka
45a3(rgyud 'bum): ma ma sar+b+ba kar+yaM ku ru ku ru/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa ba tsa/ mA bi laM ba mA bi laM ba/ sa ma ya ma nu s+pha ra/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/ bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya/ sar+b+bA shA ba ri pU ra ka sar+b+bA na nA shA ya ri pUn/ ka ra
45a4(rgyud 'bum): ka ra he he b+ha ga bAn/ kiny+tsi rA ya si/ ma ma sar+b+ba an+d+ra na/ sA d+ha ya swAhA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// sangs rgyas grags pa chen po kun// 'jigs shing kun tu skrag gyur nas/
45a5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems dpa' rjes su dran// thod pa ma chag ma gas pa// gzugs mdzes yid 'ong rnyed pa la// rkang pas mnan pa'i tshul byas nas// sngags 'di rjes su dran par bya// mA ma kI 'am
45a6(rgyud 'bum): spyan yang rung / / rdo rje'i rigs chen las byung ba// lan gsum dag tu brjod na ni// de ma thag tu nges par 'gugs// bcom ldan 'das thugs rdo rjes de skad ces gsungs so// de nas bcom
45a7(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad/ dam tshig gi 'od zer stug po'i mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ khro bo mi 'chi ba'i dam tshig 'di/
45b1(rgyud 'bum): nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // na maHsa man+ta kA ya waka tsit+ta badz+rA NAM/ na mo badz+ra kro d+hA ya/ ma hA daMSh+To ta ka Ta b+hai ra bA ya/ a si mu sa la pA ra shu pa sha hastA ya
45b2(rgyud 'bum): oM a mri ta kuN+DA li/ kha kha khA hi khA hi/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ b+han+ta b+han+ta/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ gardza gardza/ bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ye/ sarba big+h+nAn/ bi nA ya kAn/ ma hA ga Na pa ti dzI bi tAn+ta ka/
45b3(rgyud 'bum): rA ya swA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// sangs rgyas grags pa chen po kun// brgyal zhing rab tu 'jigs gyur nas// rdo rje'i sku ni rjes su dran// sngags rnams kun gyi sbyor ba dang //
45b4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje bskrad pa'i las rnams la// sangs rgyas nyid kyi dpung dag kyang // tshul bzhin byas na skrod par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog/ sangs rgyas kyi
45b5(rgyud 'bum): 'od zer rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje khro bo gzhan gyi mi thub pa 'di// nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // na maHsa man+ta kA ya
45b6(rgyud 'bum): wAka tsit+ta badz+rA NAM/ oM hUM dzi na ri TiT+Ta hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// sangs rgyas bdag nyid che skyes kun// 'jigs shing kun tu skrag gyur te// byang chub sems ni
45b7(rgyud 'bum): rjes su dran/ / srin po ma rungs gtum po dang // 'jigs pa chen po 'khrugs pa dang // rdo rje sems kyis rab sbyar na// las rnams cho ga bzhin du byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
46a1(rgyud 'bum): pa tshe dpag tu med pa/ dpag tu med pa rdo rje 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ pad+mo 'byung ba rdo rje khro bo chen po 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung
46a2(rgyud 'bum): dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // na maHsa man+ta kA ya wAka tsit+ta badz+rA NAM/ oM hUM hUM hUM/ ta ru la/ bi ru la/ sarba bi Sha g+hA ta ka/ dz+wa li ta'i s+phu li gaM/ aT+TAn+da hA sa/ ke sa ri sarba a To ba
46a3(rgyud 'bum): mr-i kA ra/ badz+ra khA ra nirarA b+hU ta na tsa li ta ba sud+b+ha ta la/ ni shwA sa mA ru totak+Shi ba tad+hA ra NI d+ha ra/ b+h+r-i Sha Na an+tan+ta hA sa/ a pa ri mi ta ba la pa rA kra ma/ a r+ya ga Na b+h+ri ta b+h+ra ta gar+Na/ d+hA Shi ta/
46a4(rgyud 'bum): b+h+yad+hab+hU d+ha/ ha ya shrI be/ khA da khA da/ ba ra man+tan/ tsin+d+ra tshiH/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ pa ra mu dran/ sid+d+his me dza~M shaM/ A be sha ya/ sarba dz+wa ra pi shA tsa dIn/ sarba pra se Sh+Ta a pra ti ha tod+hab/ @
46a5(rgyud 'bum): dr-iSh+Ta kiny+dza rA ya si/ i daM duSh+Ta gra hi duSh+Ta sarbaM dA/ d+hu na d+hu na/ ma tha ma tha/ mar dmar dA/ pA Ti ya pA ta ya/ sa Ta maT/ b+har+tha b+har+tha/ bud+d+ha d+harmA saM g+ha a nu dz+nyA taM karma ku ru shI g+b+h+yAM/ ha
46a6(rgyud 'bum): grI bA ya phaT/ badz+ra ya phaT/ badz+ra kA tA ye phaT/ badz+ra ne dz+wa ya pa Ta/ badz+ra Sh+Ta sa laT badz+ra wa na sa yaTaH/ badz+ra pur ner m+b+ha ta nA ya phaH/ pa ra man+t+ra b+hi nA sha nA ya phaT/ sarba trai lo kya b+ha yaM ka rA ya phaT/ sarba karme Shu e pra tiH
46a7(rgyud 'bum): tA ya phaT/ badz+ra ku la san trA sa na paT/ hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT swAhA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// chos kyi rdo rje che mchog spras// 'jigs shing rab tu brgyal bar 'gyur// ye shes rgyal po
46b1(rgyud 'bum): rjes su dran/ / mkha' dbyings drug gis yongs gang ba// rdo rje ha la ha la'i 'od// khro bo'i rgyal po bskul ba yis// drug rnams thams cad med par byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
46b2(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pa/ gdon mi za ba'i dam tshig 'byung ba dpal rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje be con sngon po khro bo'i rgyal po 'di/ nyid kyi
46b3(rgyud 'bum): / sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // na maHsa man+ta kA ya waka tsit+ta badz+ra NAM/ oM e h+ye hi/ b+ha ga ban nI la badz+ra dar+dz+dza/ tu ru tu ru/ hu lu hu lu/ hA hA/ gu lu gu lu/ gu lA pa ya
46b4(rgyud 'bum): gu lA pa ya/ kra ma kra ma/ b+ha ga bAn/ bA yu be ge na/ b+hU tAn shI g+h+raM/ da ha da ha/ dar da ra/ ha na han/ pa tsa paH/ ma tha ma tha/ pA ta ya pA ta ya/ ma Ta ma Ta/ mo tsA pa ya mo nA pa ya/ sarba
46b5(rgyud 'bum): kar+m+ma Ni/ tshin+da tshin+da/ b+hak+Sha ya b+hak+Sha ya/ as+thi me dam a s+ya ru d+hi ra madz+nyA ma da ba sa madz+dza ru d+hi ra/ pri ya e h+ye hi b+ha ga bAn/ sarba big+h+nA ni/ sarba dIr+ya ni/ sarba man+ta ni/ sarba mU la karmA Ni/
46b6(rgyud 'bum): kri tri ma Ni ShA dI ni/ sarba gra hA na/ ha na ha na/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ mar da mar dwe/ i dam+ma kAR+ya sA d+ha ya/ hU ni lA ya ni lA ya/ nI la badz+ri dar+N+Na ya/ tu ru tu ru/ big+h+nAn bi nA ya kAn nA sha yaH
46b7(rgyud 'bum): sha ya/ hu ru hu ru/ dIp+ta tsaN+DA ya/ sarba sha trUM NAM hr-i da yA ni bI Da ya/ tshin+da tshin+da pa ra bid+hi nAM sned ka/ hUM bidrA nA ma shiSh+Tha ka/ sa ma sa nu s+pha ra/ badz+ra d+ha ra ba tsA nA tsiH/ marmA Ni ni kr-in+ta/ hUM san hUMs na/
47a1(rgyud 'bum): da ha da ha/ pa tsa ba tsa/ ku ru ku ru/ tu ru tu ru/ hu ru hu ru/ phaT phaT/ hUM hUM kri tanA ya/ de ba ri Shi bi drA ba kA ya/ han han/ badz+radaN+Den sAhA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs
47a2(rgyud 'bum): tsam gyis/ / gdug pa'i mchog las byung ba kun// yid ni 'jigs shing rab skrag nas// sems dpa'i rdo rje rjes su dran// khro bo'i rgyal po grags chen 'di// brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas pa dang /
47a3(rgyud 'bum): cho ga'i tshul bzhin bskul ba yis// gdug pa thams cad gsod par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas/ kun nas sprin gyi dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge
47a4(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje stobs po che 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // na maHsa man+ta kA ya wA ka tsit+ta badz+rA NAM/ oM hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT/ u gra sh+tsa
47a5(rgyud 'bum): la pA Ni/ hU~M hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ oM dz+yo ti nir nA da/ nU nAM hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ oM ma hA ba lA ya swA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs ma thag/ stobs po che yis klu rnams kun// yid ni 'jigs
47a6(rgyud 'bum): shing rab skrag nas/ / sku gsum rdo rje rjes su dran// bzlas pa tsam gyi sbyor ba yis// las rnams thams cad sgrub par byed// than pa byung ba'i dus na yang // chu yi dkyil 'khor 'bebs par byed//
47a7(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu 'joms pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi Tak+ki'i rgyal po khro bo chen po 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung
47b1(rgyud 'bum): dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // na maHsa man+ta kA ya waka tsit+ta badz+ra NAM/ oM Tak+ki hUM dzaH/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po kun// 'jigs shing dam tshig ldan
47b2(rgyud 'bum): gyur nas/ / rdo rje sku gsum rjes su dran// rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis// ling ga rkang pas g.yas pas mnan// rdo rje gsum gyi sngags dag gis// sngags rnams thams cad 'gugs pa'i
47b3(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes kyi 'phreng ba'i chu'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ mi g.yo ba'i rdo rje gtum po'i dam tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung
47b4(rgyud 'bum): dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // na maHsa man+ta kA ya wAka tsit+ta badz+rA NAM/ a tsa la kA Na tsaN+Da/ na nA nan+ta/ man+t+ra ma n+sa/ mon+ta moT+Ta/ shar+b+ha shan+da/ tar+b+ha tan+ta/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ mo ha mo ha/ mo hA
47b5(rgyud 'bum): ka ra/ has ha sa/ badz+re hA sa ku ru/ ha sa ha sa/ ma ra ma ra Ta ma ra ma raT/ kardza gardza/ han ha na/ b+han+d+ha b+han+ta/ tiSh+Tha teSh+Tha/ A ba~M sha A bi shre/ mahA man+t+ra/ pA la ka/ d+hun d+hun/ ti Ni ti Ni/ 3
47b6(rgyud 'bum): khya da/ big+h+nAn mA ra ya mA ra ya/ duSh+TaM/ b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha/ sarbaM ku ru ku ru/ ki ri ki ri/ ma hA bi Sha Na badz+ra/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ hUM hUM hUM/ tri ba lI ta raM/ ga nar+ha ka/ AM AM AM/ hAM hAM hAM/ a tsa la tseH
47b7(rgyud 'bum): s+pho Ta ya s+pho u0f89u0fa4 ya/ hU~M hUM/ a sa man+ti ke trAT/ ma hA ba la shA ta sa/ sa ma ya ni/ g+ha ta ya s+pha ra sa ma ya san tra~M/ A A~M/ nAM hU~M ma~M/ shuts+tsha tu lo ka/ tu dz+ra tu badz+ri/ na mo s+tha A pra ti ha ta ba le d+ha/ nA la pa/
48a1(rgyud 'bum): tra Ta a sa ha na na maHswahA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// lha rnams 'khor du bcas pa kun// brgyal zhing yid ni rab skrag nas// rdo rje'i sku ni rjes su dran// khra bo chen
48a2(rgyud 'bum): po'i sngags 'di yis/ / lha chen dag la sogs pa'i lha// mthu chen dag kyang skrag gyur nas// kha sbyar lus su 'gugs par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig rnam par 'phrul pa rdo rje zhes bya
48a3(rgyud 'bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyi dam tshig khro bo gnod mdzes 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hUM/ grih+Na grih+Na hUM/
48a4(rgyud 'bum): grih+NA pa ya grih+NA pa ya hUM/ a na ya ho b+ha ga wAM bi d+ya ra dzA hUM phaT/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// bu mo mthu chen thams cad ni// skra bshig gos dang bral gyur nas// rdo rje sems dpa' rjes
48a5(rgyud 'bum): su rban/ / rdo rje sems dpa'i zhabs kyis mnan// de bzhin gshegs pa kun bdag pa'o// rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa yis// bu mo rnams ni 'gugs pa'i mchog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dam
48a6(rgyud 'bum): tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje gsum gyi gsang ba gsung gi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi gnas 'di/ nyid kyi sku
48a7(rgyud 'bum): dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // sangs rgyas rdo rje sku gsum la// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par sgom// zhags pa rdo rje kyo ba 'dzin// sangs rgyas dgug pa dam pa'o// sangs rgyas sku gsung
48b1(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba yis/ / 'khor lo chen po'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// rtag tu nges par khugs par 'gyur// mi phyed rdo rje gsum bsgoms pas// 'khor lo pad+mo rdo rje che// rdo rje kyo ba'i
48b2(rgyud 'bum): khyad par gyis/ / sngags rnams thams cad dgug pa'i mchog/ thams cad rdo rje'i dngos zhi ba// rang sngags skyes bu bsgoms nas ni// mi yi bu mo mchog rnams kyi// snying khar rdo rje kyo ba sbyor//
48b3(rgyud 'bum): rlung gi dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis// nges par rtag tu 'gugs par 'gyur// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dag la ni// rnam par snang mdzad gzugs chen sgom// de na sha tsi gnas par bsam// rdo rje mo
48b4(rgyud 'bum): 'chi'i sbyor ba yis/ / lan grangs lnga bcu brjod na ni// nges par rtag tu 'gugs par 'gyur// rdo rje kyo ba gzugs chen po// 'bar ba rdo rje 'dra ba'i 'od// rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsgoms na ni/
48b5(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha'i bu mo 'gugs pa'i mchog/ khro bo rdo rje dam tshig ni// rdo rje sa 'og gnas pa dag/ shU la rdo rje kyo ba'i gnas// lha min bu mo 'gugs pa'i gnas// btsag gam rdo rgyus dag kyang rung /
48b6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje kyo ba'i sbyor ba yis// zla ba gzas ni zin pa'i tshe// khar bcug nas ni bsgrub par bya// tshangs pa drag po la sogs lha// rang gi ming rnams bris nas ni// rdo rje gsung gi bka' bzhin du/
48b7(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs shing skrag nas 'ong bar 'gyur// rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa// rdo rje 'jam pa rab tu sgom// khro bo chen po gshin rje gshed// rdo rje kyo ba rnam par bsam// bskal pa'i srag
49a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i 'khor lo che/ / bsgoms nas gnod sbyin mo dag spyad// kun gyi phyag rgya'i khyad par dang // yang gsungs pa/ gcer bur phud de sgra bshig la// 'jigs pa'i tshul
49a2(rgyud 'bum): du gtsigs shing 'gyur/ / rkang pas ling ga mnan na ni// nam mkha'i dbyings kyang 'jig par 'gyur// ma mo'i gnas sam dur khrod dam// khang stong dang ni bzhi mdo dang // mtshan
49a3(rgyud 'bum): gcig dang ni shing gcig drung / / mngon par spyod pa brtsam par bya// mi rus las byas phur bu ni// sor brgyad pa yi tshad dag la// brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas byas te// dgra bo'i
49a4(rgyud 'bum): sgo khar sbas na ni/ / sangs rgyas sku gsum mchog sbyin pa// shes dang mi shes rnam spangs pa// zla ba phyed ni tshun chad kyis// bskams sam yang na 'chi bar 'gyur// yang na thod pa gang
49a5(rgyud 'bum): ba dag/ khyad par du ni mkhas pas btsal// der ni sngags kyi tshogs bris te// rdo rje'i tshig gis bzlas pa bya// dgra yi sgo 'am grong dag tu// sbas na nges par skrod par 'gyur// ta la'i lo
49a6(rgyud 'bum): ma 'am gzhan la'ang rung / / khro bo'i sngags ni kun bris la// dgra yi grong ngam sgo dag tu// sbas na 'chi 'am bskams par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i dpal rdo rjes de skad
49a7(rgyud 'bum): ces bka' stsal to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs nges par 'ching ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/
49b1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje khams gsum pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs gnon pa zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // oM g+ha g+ha/ g+hA ta ya g+hA
49b2(rgyud 'bum): yaHsarba duSh+TAn phaT phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya/ sarba pA paM phaT phaT/ hUM hUM hUM/ badz+ra kI la ya/ badz+ra d+ha ro A dz+nyA pa ya ti/ kA ya wA ka tsit+ta badz+ra kI lA ya hU~M hU~Mn+d+ra phaT/ de nas 'di ni gsungs sa
49b3(rgyud 'bum): thag/ sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul chen po kun// brgyal zhing rab tu 'jigs gyur nas// nam mkha' rdo rje thugs dran 'gyur// mi rus las byas phur bu 'am// yang na seng ldeng rtse las skyes//
49b4(rgyud 'bum): lcags las byas pa'i phur bu dag/ rdo rje sku gsum 'jig par byed// 'od 'phro 'khrug cing mdangs bzang ba'i// rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam bzhag la// rdo rje sku ni gsum gyi mthar// gzugs brnyan
49b5(rgyud 'bum): bsams nas sbyar bar bya/ / rnam par snang mdzad rgya chen nam// yang na 'dod chags rdo rje can// gshin rje gshed kyi rgya chen dag/ bsams na rdo rje gsum yang gnon// rdo rje bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yis//
49b6(rgyud 'bum): gdug cing khro ba tshar bcad la// sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po yang // rdo rje'i sbyor bas bya ba yin// snying kha nas ni rkang pa'i mthar// rdo rje phur bu rnam par sgom// gong du'ang dam tshig de nyid bya//
49b7(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni phur bu'i rnam 'phrul yin// bsam gtan rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'bebs// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// phur bus btab na myur du 'chi// de nas bcom ldan 'das
50a1(rgyud 'bum): rnam par snang mdzad chen po/ / sku rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ sku'i dam tshig tsham rngam gyis gnon pa zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di/ nyid
50a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM badz+ra tshin+da tshin+da/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ dip+ta badz+ra tsakra hUM phaT/ phan tshun dkri ba'i tshul du bya// mthe bong gzhi ni rab tu bsdam//
50a3(rgyud 'bum): rnam par snang mdzad tshul gnas te// rdo rje phur bus nges par gdab// btab ma thag tu sems dpa' che// rdo rje sku gsum las byung ba// dam tshig mchog gis ldang bar 'gyur// yang na
50a4(rgyud 'bum): 'chi ba'i gnas su 'gyur/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug/ gsung rnam par 'phrul pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ gsung gi dam tshig
50a5(rgyud 'bum): tsham rngam gnon pa rdo rje'i sngags 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM hrIHb+hur b+hu baHye shes pad+mo kha bye ba// rdo rje sor mo nges par bzhag/ 'dod
50a6(rgyud 'bum): chags rdo rje'i tshul gnas te/ / rdo rje'i phur bu nges par 'debs// btab ma thag tu rdo rje che// sku gsum dri med las byung ba// btab pa tsam gyis ldang bar 'gyur// yang na 'chi ba'i
50a7(rgyud 'bum): gnas su 'gyur/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin chen po/ thugs rnam par 'phrul pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thugs kyi dam tshig tsham rngam gyis gnon
50b1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i sngags 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM badz+ra rA dza hUM/ rtse mo lnga par bcings nas ni// 'od 'phro mang po 'khrigs par sgom// rdo rje thugs kyi tshul gnas te/
50b2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje phur bus nges par gdab// btab pa tsam gyis rdo rje che// rdo rje dri med gsum las byung // btab ma thag tu ldang bar 'gyur// yang na 'chi ba'i gnas su 'gyur// sku gsung thugs kyi
50b3(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba yis/ / cho ga legs par byas nas ni// mkha' dbyings rdo rje mthas klas par// phur bus 'debs par gdon mi za// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje phur bu chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal
50b4(rgyud 'bum): toHde nas sangs rgyas sku gsum mchog/ sems can khams la phan mdzad pa// mnyes shing rab tu dgyes gyur nas// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// e ma'o gsang ba'i gnas kyi mchog/
50b5(rgyud 'bum): e ma'o snying po kun bsdus pa// e ma'o chos kyi gnas zhi ba// e ma'o rdo rje rnam par 'joms// phur 'debs sangs rgyas thams cad dang // byang chub sems dpa' grags chen te// sku gsung
50b6(rgyud 'bum): thugs kyi rdo rje rnams/ / phur bus gdab pa yang dag bshad// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// phur gdab de nyid las byung ba// sku gsung thugs ni mchog sbyin pa'i// sngags kyi de nyid
50b7(rgyud 'bum): don bsdus pa'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rmad du byung ba'i sngags kyis
51a1(rgyud 'bum): 'gugs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o/ / // de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// thams cad nam mkha' mi 'gyur te/
51a2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dbang bskur kun mkhyen pas// rdo rje'i gsung ni bka' stsal pa// sme sha can gyi bdag nyid che// bu mo lo grangs bcu gnyis pa// dben pa'i gnas su khyad par du// sgrub pa pos
51a3(rgyud 'bum): ni rtag tu sgrub/ / bshang gci dam tshig la sogs pa// de ru cho ga bzhin du ni// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham par bya// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor sgom pa yis// mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su dag/
51a4(rgyud 'bum): rab tu bzang la bzhin yang mdzes// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// pang bar bzhag nas rnam par sgom// dkyil 'khor lnga yi 'khor lo yis// sangs rgyas rnams su rnam par
51a5(rgyud 'bum): sgom/ / sngags kyi 'khor lo can gyi gsang // mchod pa'i gnas ni nyams dga' sgom// sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje can// rnam par snang mdzad sku chen po// bsam gtan sngags kyi sbyor
51a6(rgyud 'bum): pa yis/ / sangs rgyas kyi ni 'od 'drar 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis// btso brag mkhan ni bdag nyid che// bu mo ut+pal mthing kha'i mdog/ 'dra ba dag ni rtag tu sgrub//
51a7(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba'i cho ga de nyid ni// byas nas las rnams brtsam par bya// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o// de ni de ma thag tu yang // rdo rje sems dpa'i 'od
51b1(rgyud 'bum): 'drar 'gyur/ / rgyal po chos rnams kun dang mtshungs// 'dong dang thar pa rab sgrub pa// rdo rje chos ni rnam bsgoms pas// gar mkhan bu mo rab mdzes shing // bzhin bzang mig ni dkyus
51b2(rgyud 'bum): ring ba/ / sgrub pa pos ni rtag tu sgrub// de ni rdo rje chos kyi bdag/ sa bcu la ni gnas par 'gyur// rgyal po gsung gi dam tshig 'dzin// mnga' bdag dam pa kun gyi mchog/ bram ze rgyal rigs
51b3(rgyud 'bum): rje'u'i rigs/ / dmangs rigs las byung bu mo ni// rdo rje chos bdag bsgrub par bya// 'di ni gsang ba thos byed pa'o// rdo rje nyi ma nub nas ni// sgrub pa kun tu brtsam par bya// skya rengs 'char ba'i
51b4(rgyud 'bum): dus su ni/ / sgom pa'i mchog gis 'grub par 'gyur// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// spos dang me tog rnams kyis brgyan// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog bsgoms na// grub
51b5(rgyud 'bum): pa myur du 'thob par 'gyur/ / 'di ni sku gsum mchog sbyin pa// sangs rgyas mtshan gyis mtshan par gyur// dpag tshad brgya yi khyon tsam du// de yi 'od kyang snang bar byed// dbang po gnyis ni
51b6(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba yis/ / sbyor ba thams cad brtsam par bya// 'di ni dngos grub thams cad kyi// dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o// rdo rje can gyi grub 'dod na// bshang gci'i dam tshig bza' bar bya//
51b7(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni dngos grub thams cad kyi// dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o// bshang gci'i dam tshig la sogs pas// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas byang chub gnas zhi ba// de nyid bla na
52a1(rgyud 'bum): med pa 'grub/ / bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa dang thar pa'i dam tshig rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje khro bo zhes bya
52a2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje kun tu skrag par byed pa'i rdo rje khro bo 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo //
52a3(rgyud 'bum): oM hrIHSh+Ti wi kri ta A na na// sarba sha trun nA sha ya s+t+waM ba ya hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ dug ni khrag dang kun tu sbyar// lan tshwa ske tshe yungs mar te// khro zhing tsher ma'i ma la bsreg/ bu mo'i ming dang tshig
52a4(rgyud 'bum): tu bcas/ / nyi ma gung ngam nam phyed na// 'di ni yong ye rab tu shis// shes rab can gyis gru gsum du// stong rtsa brgyad ni tshul bzhin bsreg/ bu mo dag gi don gyi phyir// 'di ni nyi ma gsum
52a5(rgyud 'bum): du bya/ / bskal pa grangs med gsum du yang // de yis rtag tu gnon par 'gyur// sangs rgyas sam ni chos 'dzin pa 'am// yang na rdo rje sems dpa' yang rung // gal te rmongs pas 'das na ni//
52a6(rgyud 'bum): de yi tshe ni der zad 'gyur// bcu bzhi 'am yang na tshes brgyad la// dur khrod sol ba blangs nas ni// cho ga bzhin du sngags btab na// de ni rtag tu ster bar 'gyur// sngags shes pa yis gang
52a7(rgyud 'bum): rung ba'i/ / dgra yi gzugs brnyan byas nas su// bsam gtan dag gis bris na ni// 'chi bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za// tho ba bsam gtan sbyor ba yis// phab na nges par ltung bar 'gyur// /
52b1(rgyud 'bum): hUM ni rab tu 'bar dang bcas// rdo rje 'bar ba rab tu skos// phyag na rdo rje'i rigs dran te// gdug pa thams cad 'jigs par byed// rdo rgyus sol ba la sogs pas// skyes pa 'am
52b2(rgyud 'bum): bud med gzugs bris la/ / lag par sta re bsams nas su// med pa bcad par rnam par sgom// sangs rgyas sku gsum rin chen mchog/ sems can kun la phan 'dod pa// 'di yis
52b3(rgyud 'bum): snad par 'gyur ba 'am/ / shi bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za// las kyi rdo rje rab 'bar ba// me stag mang po 'khrigs pa can// dbus su rdo rje bsams na ni// chu rnams mnan pa'i mcho
52b4(rgyud 'bum): yin no/ / dkyil 'khor dag ni 'dri ba na// rlung la sogs pa byung na ni// mche ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas su// gdug pa'i dgra ni dran par bya// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis//
52b5(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig sprul par gyur pa yang // mthong ba tsam gyis 'gag 'gyur te// gzhan du byas na 'jig par 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // skye bo gdug pa gzhan
52b6(rgyud 'bum): dag kyang / / sngags 'dis skrag par byas na ni// 'chi bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za// de la 'di ni sngags thams cad kyi gsang ba'i snying po'o// phaTaye shes sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis//
52b7(rgyud 'bum): dbus su gzugs ni bsgom par bya// sngags shes pa yis gnas bzhi ru// bud med rtag tu gzhag par bya// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// mtshan rnams thams cad kyis
53a1(rgyud 'bum): mtshan cing / / pad+mo rab tu rgyus byas nas// sngags 'di rnam par bsgom par bya// hUM/ 'od zer lnga ni rab 'bar ba'i// rdo rje can gyi sbyor ba sgom// rang lus ngag sems
53a2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje la/ / phab na byang chub thob par 'gyur// de ni de ma thag tu yang // rnam par snang mdzad 'od 'dra zhing // rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// sangs rgyas sku gsum rdo rje 'dzin// sems
53a3(rgyud 'bum): dpa' thams cad bskyed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ / bzhin bzang phan par 'dod pa yi// bud med rnyed na cho ga bzhin// dben par mchod pa brtsam par bya// gsang ba blangs nas
53a4(rgyud 'bum): bza' bar bya/ / de ni de ma thag tu yang // 'jam dpal dang ni gzi brjid mnyam// mi snang bdag po dpal dang ldan// dzam+bu gser gyi mdangs 'drar 'gyur// bshang ba'am yang na bza' ba
53a5(rgyud 'bum): 'am/ sha dag kyang ni gzhug par bya// cho ga bzhin du bsngags nas ni// zos na sangs rgyas kyis mi mthong // zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to// bshang ba
53a6(rgyud 'bum): cho ga bzhin blangs nas/ / kham por sbyar mar gzhag par bya// brgya rtsa brgyad du bskul na ni// sangs rgyas nyi mas mi mthong ngo // khyi yi sha dang rta sha dang // sha chen dag ni cho ga bzhin// blangs nas
53a7(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba'i thabs kyis ni/ / zos na de yis mi mthong ngo // bshang dang lhan cig sbyar ba yi// ril bu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong
53b1(rgyud 'bum): ngokhyi yi sha dang sbyar ba yi/ / ril bu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo // sha chen dang ni sbyar ba yi// ril bu lcags gsum gyis
53b2(rgyud 'bum): dkris pa/ dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo // pa lang sha dang sbyar ba yi// ril bu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// sangs
53b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo / / bshang ba las byung srog chags las// brtul zhugs can gyis ril bu bya// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo // ga pur tsan dan
53b4(rgyud 'bum): sbyar ba yis/ / ril bu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo // gi waM a ka ru sbyar ba'i// ril bu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa/
53b5(rgyud 'bum): dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// rdo rje stobs po cher 'gyur ro// ga pur gur kum sbyar ba yi// ril bu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong
53b6(rgyud 'bum): ngo rdo rje 'dzin pa gang yang rung / / phyag rgya chen por byin brlabs nas// de ni de 'dri'i dpal ldan pa'i// stobs chen pha rol gnon par 'gyur// dpag tshad bye ba rdzogs pa yi// steng du rdo rje 'dra bar
53b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / stong gsum bgrod pa'i dpal ldan pa// sangs rgyas 'od dang 'dra bar 'gyur// 'dod khams gnas pa'i bu mo dang // lha yi longs spyod rig brtul zhugs// yang na gzugs khams gnas
54a1(rgyud 'bum): ba la/ / stobs chen gyis ni 'dod pa spyad// bcom ldan 'das dam tshig mi snang ba'i rdo rje chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas sangs rgyas rab dgyes bdag/ sems
54a2(rgyud 'bum): 'khrul yid la dbang ba rnams/ / ngo mtshar gyur cing spyan gdangs nas// gsung ni 'di skad bka' spel to// e ma'o 'di rab ngo mtshar che// e ma 'ogasang gnas mi 'gyur ba// a mthongo bo te kyis dag/
54a3(rgyud 'bum): e ma'o shin tu dri med chos// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// skyed pa byed pa mi 'gyur che// sangs rgyas rdo rje chos chen pos// rdo rje'i gsung du bka' stsal pa// sems dpa' rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis//
54a4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje 'dzin rnams mnyes par 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub rab dbye ba// sangs rgyas rdo rje can mnyes 'gyur// rdo rje can gyi gzugs la sogs// gtsug tor 'jog par byed par bshad//
54a5(rgyud 'bum): khro bo'i nang na de mchog ste// sangs rgyas rdo rje rab sgom pa'o// rig pa'i rgyal mo chos mchog rnams// dkon mchog dpal ni rnam par sgom// rig pa'i rgyal mo sbyor ba la// tshe dpag med
54a6(rgyud 'bum): pa rab tu sgom/ / thams cad las byed sngags rnams la// gdon mi za ba'i ye shes sgom// sngags rnams thams cad nyid la ni// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par sgom// zhes gsungs so//
54a7(rgyud 'bum): gnod sbyin mo yis sngags rgyud la// gshin rje gshed ni brtag par bya// sngags rnams thams cad nyid la ni// spyi bo nas ni bskul ba shis// bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen pos de skad ces
54b1(rgyud 'bum): ces bka' stsal to/ / bsam gtan 'khor lo de yis ni// sngags mnyes pa yi dkyil 'khor dag/ dam tshig chen po sgrub byed pa// sgrub pa po la phan par gsungs// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin//
54b2(rgyud 'bum): gtso bo chos rnams kun dbang phyug/ sku dang gsung thugs yongs dag pas// ye shes rdo rje bka' stsal to// ri rtse nyams ni dga' ba dang // nags tshal rab tu dben par ni// bsam gtan
54b3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje rab bya ba/ / bzlas dang sngags kyi sbyor bas so// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs kun// sngags kyi bsam gtan gyis bskul bas// gsung gi las kyi bka' bzhin du// las rnams sna
54b4(rgyud 'bum): tshogs byed par 'gyur/ / rdo rje chos kyi gzugs chen po// pad+ma rA ga'i 'od 'dra ba// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje la// gnas gsum du ni rigs brtag go/ dbab pa'i cho ga thams cad ni// byas na
54b5(rgyud 'bum): gdon mi za bar 'grub/ / bskul dang rengs dang lha chen po// 'phags lam bzhi po dag kyang ni// rdo rje grub pa dag gis bya// de ltar byas na rtag par 'grub// bu mo lo grangs bcu gnyis ma 'am/
54b6(rgyud 'bum): khye'u lo grangs bcu gnyis pa// mtshan nyid thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// bzung nas dbab pa rab tu brtag/ cho ga thams cad byas nas ni// las rnams rab tu bsgrub par bya// rnam pa gzhan du byas na ni//
54b7(rgyud 'bum): khams gsum skye bos dpyas par 'gyur// de la snying po'i sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig 'di rnams so// hUM haHAHdz+nye/ nam mkha'i khams ni sems med cing // rtog pa thams cad rnam spangs dang /
55a1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid kyang // cho ga bzhin du byas na 'bab// hUM ni rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag/ hAHni sku yi rdo rje can// AHni chos 'dzin rgyal po ste// 'di ni gsang
55a2(rgyud 'bum): tshig bstan pa'o/ / dz+nyA ni skul bar byed par bshad// 'gul ba dang ni g.yo ba yin// 'di ni skul ba thams cad kyi// gsang ba yin par 'di rab bshad// khru gang tsam mam khru do 'am// khru brgyad
55a3(rgyud 'bum): tsam mam lnga tsam du/ / rdo rje sems dpa' rab bskul na// 'jigs shing skrag nas 'phar bar 'gyur// snga ma bzhin du thams cad 'gyur// 'di ni gsang ba thob pa'o// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin//
55a4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag/ sku gsum gnas ni yongs dag pas// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// rtse gcig ma gyur pa yis kyang // brtul zhugs brtan pas 'di dag bya// sbyor ba/
55a5(rgyud 'bum): gzhan min pas bya ba// gdug pa thams cad rnam gzhig pa'o// dur khrod sol dang phub sogs las// dgra yi gzugs brnyan byas nas ni// sgra bshig gcer bur byung nas ni// khams gsum dag
55a6(rgyud 'bum): kyang 'jig par byed/ / dur khrod ro bsregs thal ba yis// dgra yi gzugs brnyan byas nas ni// rtong rtsa brgyad du bzlas pas kyang // 'chi bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za// dkyil 'khor gru gsum
55a7(rgyud 'bum): byas pa la/ / ba lang sha 'am rta yi sha/ khyi yi sha 'am sna tshogs kyis// rdo rje'ang gdon mi za bar 'jig/ sha chen gyis ni thams cad kyi// rdo rje las byung 'jigs par bshad// 'di ni dgra rnams
55b1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi/ / 'jig pa shin tu mi bzad yin// dgra yi gzugs brnyan byas nas ni// bshang gci dag gi chos mchog can// tsher ma'i me la khros nas bsregs// sangs rgyas dag kyang nges
55b2(rgyud 'bum): par 'jig/ chu bo'i 'gram gnyis sa yis kyang // dgra yi gzugs brnyan byas nas ni// til 'bru tsam gyis yan lag kun// dug las byung ba'i tsher ma yis// bskul ba'i tshig dang bcas
55b3(rgyud 'bum): pas dgang / / sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'jig/ ske tshe lan tshwa 'bru mar dang // dug dang da du ra dag ni// sangs rgyas thams cad gsad pa la// 'di dag mchog tu gyur par bshad// sol khus
55b4(rgyud 'bum): gsher ba'i gos dag ni/ / gyon te sems ni khros nas su// rkang pas ling ga mnan na ni// srin pos 'khyer bar gdon mi za// rus phye khrag dang dug rnams kyis// gzugs brnyan
55b5(rgyud 'bum): rab tu byas na ni/ / rdo rje sems dpa' drag po yang // myur ba dag tu 'khyer bar 'gyur// ske tshe bshang gci sbyar ba yis// ling ga yongs su gang bar ni// blugs la rkang pas rab mnan na//
55b6(rgyud 'bum): tsha ba chen pos btab par 'gyur// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje khro bo'i snying po'o// na maHsam+b+ha kA ya wA ka tsit+ta badz+ra NAM/ oM hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha
55b7(rgyud 'bum): tiSh+Tha/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ gardza gardza/ pi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya/ sarba big+h+nan bi nA ya kA na/ ma hA ga na pa ti dzI bi tAn+ta ka rA ya hUM phaT/ sbyin sreg ya nra
56a1(rgyud 'bum): bsam gtan dag/ lus dang ngag sems 'jig pa ste// ma yengs pa yi sems kyis bya// 'di ni gsod pa'i mchog yin no// rdo rje sems dpa' khro bo che// rnam
56a2(rgyud 'bum): par bgrad pa 'jigs 'jigs lta/ / sta re tho ba phyag na bsnams// bsams nas bsam gtan rab tu bya// de la 'di ni drag po chen po'i khro bo'i dam tshig go// mkha' dbyings thams cad sangs
56a3(rgyud 'bum): rgyas kyis/ / yongs su gang bar rab tu sgom// gdug pa de yis bsad par ni// bsams na de ma thag tu 'chi// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis// yongs su gang bar bsgoms nas ni//
56a4(rgyud 'bum): gdug pa'i sems dpas bsad na ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid kyang 'chi// sangs rgyas gnod byed dgra rnams la// skrag cing 'jigs pas dkrug par ni// sngags mkhan gyis ni mdun bsams na//
56a5(rgyud 'bum): 'chi bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za// srin po khro bo sna tshogs pa// gtum zhing khro bo mi bzad pas// der ni skrag par byas bsams na// rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid kyang 'chi// 'ug pa khwa dang bya rgod
56a6(rgyud 'bum): dang / / chu ring ba dang wa rnams te// de yis zos par bsams na ni// sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'jig/ sbrul nag rab tu khro ba ni// 'jigs pa dag kyang nges par 'jig/ dug gi
56a7(rgyud 'bum): mchog gi dam tshig ni/ / dpral bar bsams na khyad 'phags pa'i// sbrul des zos par bsams na ni// sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'jig/ phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad la/
56b1(rgyud 'bum): yams sam gnod par byed pa rnams// 'jigs pa nges par 'bebs pa'i mchog/ 'di ni bskul ba'i mchog yin no// tho ba rab tu drag po yis// brtul zhugs can gyis snying khar brdeg/ rdo rje 'dzin
56b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i bka' bzhin du/ / dgra bo'i srog ni med par 'gyur// rdo rje sta re la sogs pas// gshag cing gtub par bsams na ni// sku gsum gyi ni mchog sbyin pa// rdo rje sems dpa' drag po'ang 'chi//
56b3(rgyud 'bum): srung ba la sogs sngags rnams dang // lha rnams kyang ni phur bus gdab// 'di ni gsod par byed pa'i mchog/ dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o// rdo rje phung pos ji tsam du// sems can dkyil
56b4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gnas pa la/ / bsang bdag nyid gtogs bsams na ni// mnyes par 'gyur te gzhan du min// ston pa sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje chos dang rdo rje can// rdo rje thugs kyi bka' bzhin du/
56b5(rgyud 'bum): bsam gtan sbyor bas 'chi bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen po'i dam tshig khro bos de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// thams cad nam mkha' thub chen po/
56b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dbang bskur rdzogs sangs rgyas// ye shes rdo rjes bka' sprul pa// e ma'o ngo bo nyid kyis dag/ rdo rje theg pa bla na med// ma skyes pa yi chos rnams la// rgyal ba rnams kyi skye bar
56b7(rgyud 'bum): bstan/ / de la 'di ni las phran tshegs kyi rdo rje gsang ba'o// sbrul ni mi sdug 'jigs byed pa// nag po 'bar ba 'khrug cing khro// lce gnyis mche ba'i 'phreng can ni// rdo rgyus dag gam sol bas
57a1(rgyud 'bum): bri/ / de la 'di ni klu khro bo bskul ba'i snying po'o// khaMr mi bzad par ni 'gyur ba'i dug/ rdo rje'i dbus na 'dug par bsam// dug ni ha la ha la mtshungs// sreg pa'i me yi kha
57a2(rgyud 'bum): dog bzhin/ / bsgoms na 'gul bar gdon mi za// de la 'di ni dug thams cad 'byin pa'i snying po'o// hrIHrnam pa sna tshogs las byug dug/ khams gsum na ni gnas pa kun// de yis khyer
57a3(rgyud 'bum): bar bsgoms nas ni/ / 'bab par gyur par rnam par bsam// de ni de ma thag tu yang // mi bzad dug gi rgya mtshor 'gyur// reg ma thag tu skye bo kun// 'jig pa 'di la the tshom med// sdig pa rus
57a4(rgyud 'bum): sbal la sogs dang / / sbrul rnams sna tshogs pa dag kyang // sbyor ba 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid kyis// cho ga bzhin du rab tu bya// de la 'di ni dug thams cad 'pho ba'i snying po'o// oM lta ba rdo rje'i dug
57a5(rgyud 'bum): la sogs/ / gzhan yang mi bzad pa yi dug/ nam mkha' rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du// bsams na ye shes rdo rjes 'dren// bcom ldan 'das dug gi dam tshig chen po rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to//
57a6(rgyud 'bum): de la 'di ni dug gso ba'i dam tshig rdo rje snying po'o// hUM rdo rje chen po'i snying po 'di// kha dog dkar por rnam par bsam// 'od kyi sprin ni shin tu 'bar// zla ba'i 'od zer bzhin du bsil// gnas
57a7(rgyud 'bum): bzhi dag tu sbyor ba yis/ / de ma thag tu 'byung bar 'gyur// lan gsum legs par sgom pa ni// skyugs pa dag tu rnam bsams na// nam mkha'i khams kun gang ba yang // de ma thag tu dug med 'gyur//
57b1(rgyud 'bum): zhes de skad bka' stsal to// de la 'di ni nye ba'i dug thams cad drang ba'i snying po'o// AH'bras dang po la mig 'brum bu dang // gang gzhan nang du bshad pa rnams// phyag na rdo rje'i bka' bzhin du/
57b2(rgyud 'bum): bsams pa tsam gyis med par 'gyur// pad+ma chen po 'dab ma brgyad// zla ba bzhin du dri ma med// de yi dbus na 'dug bsam pa// 'od zer lnga ni rdzogs pa'o// sdud pa na ni dam tshig gnag/ bskul ba na ni
57b3(rgyud 'bum): dkar po 'dra/ / bsam gtan gnas ni gsang ba 'di// ye shes dri med gsang chen yin// de la 'di ni phyi nang gi nad rnams gso ba'i rdo rje snying po'i sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig rnams so// dzi na dzi ka/ A
57b4(rgyud 'bum): li ka/ badz+ra d+h+ri ka/ nad kyi rdo rje bskul ba yis// yi ge'i tshig ni gang 'dod pa// dad pas yon tan thob 'gyur ba// de 'dra'i gzugs ni bsgom par bya// dam tshig spre'u dang 'dra ba 'am// yang na khyi las
57b5(rgyud 'bum): byung ba'ang rung / / rang gi lus ngag sems gnas las// byung ba dag tu rnam par bsam// 'khor lo 'am ni rdo rje'ang rung // bsgoms na rdo rje'i go 'phang gnas// lus dang ngag sems dam tshig rnams//
57b6(rgyud 'bum): des ni phye mar brlag par sgom// de nas brtsams te rdzogs sangs rgyas// byang chub sems dpa' grags chen rnams// byin rlabs go 'phang dam pa dag/ dgyes pa'i spyan gyis rab tu stsol// 'di skad
57b7(rgyud 'bum): ces kyang bka' stsal to/ / rang lus ngag sems rdo rje la// sangs rgyas sprin dag rnam par bsam// rdo rje rgyal po sprin chen po// nad las thar par rnam par sgom// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang /
58a1(rgyud 'bum): blo ldan byang chub sems dpa' dag/ de la khros par bsams na ni// 'chi bar byed pa dam pa yin// bsam gtan sbyor ba 'di dag gis// las skyes su yang gang grags pa/
58a2(rgyud 'bum): brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas sbyor ba yis// nyi ma bdun gyis 'jig par 'gyur// yang na bdag gis sngags rgyal gyis// rdo rje'i bsam gtan cho ga bsam// 'di ni nad rnams thams cad kyi// dam tshig shin tu
58a3(rgyud 'bum): 'da' dka' ba'o/ / de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// ye shes kyo ba 'od po che// 'dod dang thar pa rdo rje ches// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// chos rnams rmi lam lta bu ste// ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes
58a4(rgyud 'bum): shing / / rang bzhin dag pa de nyid la// 'khrul pa'i rdo rje rab tu gsung // bsam gtan bzlas pa don brtson pa'i// sgrub pa pos ni rtag tu mthong // sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams// dbye ba rnam
