58a5(rgyud 'bum): pa gnyis su mthong / / de la 'di ni rmi lam chen po'i dam tshig gi gnas te// byang chub ye shes mchog thob pas// sangs rgyas 'od ni bzang por mthong // sangs rgyas rdzogs longs spyod pa yi// skur yang
58a6(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid myur du mthong / / sems can chen po khams gsum pas// mchod pa byed par des mthong ngo // ye shes chen po'i 'od 'dra'i gzugs// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis// 'dod pa'i
58a7(rgyud 'bum): yon tan lnga rnams kyis/ / rtag tu mchod pa byed par mthong // rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs chen dang // grags pa chen po rdo rje chos// gsang ba rdo rje grags pa cher// rmi lam dag na rang gzugs mthong //
58b1(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje can// sangs rgyas chen po phyag 'tshal ba'i// rmi lam 'di 'dra mthong gyur pa// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub ste// rgyan rnams thams cad yangs rdzogs pa'o//
58b2(rgyud 'bum): lha yi bu mo yid 'ong dang // khye'u dang bu mo dag mthong na// de ni dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang // zhing na bzhugs par nges par mthong //
58b3(rgyud 'bum): thugs ni dgyes par gyur nas kyang // chos mdzod yid du 'ong ba stsol// chos kyi 'khor lo sgyur ba'i lus// sangs rgyas kun gyis yongs bskor ba// bsam gtan rdo rje la gnas pa'i//
58b4(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig sbyor bas mthong bar 'gyur// kun dga' ra ba skyed mos tshal// lha yi bu mo sogs pas brgyan// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs pas// bsam gtan dam tshig can gyis mthong //
58b5(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis// de ni mngon par dbang bskur mthong // rig 'dzin rgyal po chen po yis// mchod pa byas par nges mthong ngo // yang gsungs pa/ rdo rje las byung sna tshogs
58b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i/ / rmi lam dri ma med mthong na// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las// skyes pa bla med 'grub par 'gyur// gdol pa khyi yi sbyor la sogs// gal te rdo rje thos mthong na// blo ldan rdo rje sems
58b7(rgyud 'bum): dpa' yi/ / sems kyi gnas ni 'grub par 'gyur// de la 'di ni rmi lam rnam par dpyad pa'i dam tshig gi snying po'o// rang sems rnams ni dmigs pa la/ chos rnams thams cad rab tu gnas// nam
59a1(rgyud 'bum): mkha' rdo rje'i gnas sems 'di/ / chos med chos nyid med pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du gyur nas/ de bzhin gshes
59a2(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi dam tshig gi the tsom gcod pa rdo rje sems dpa' la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ci zhig lags// chos rnams ngo bo med pa la// chos kyi de nyid kun
59a3(rgyud 'bum): bshad pa/ / e ma'o ngo mtshar las byung ba// nam mkha' la ni nam mkha' sgos// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs phyug na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs
59a4(rgyud 'bum): pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ nam mkha' ni chos gang dang yang mi ldan te/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no//
59a5(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha' de'ang ni chos thams cad du gtogs la/ thams cad kyi rjes su blta'o snyam du'ang mi sems so// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mi lam lta bu dang / rmi lam
59a6(rgyud 'bum): gyi dam tshig las byung bar rjes su rtogs par bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' brtag tu med cing bltar mi snang ba thob pa med pa de bzhin du/
59a7(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chos thams cad kyang rjes sa rtogs par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'di lta ste/ dper na lus dang / ngag dang /
59b1(rgyud 'bum): sems dang / chos thams cad rdo rje'i gnas kyi dam tshig ni/ thams cad kyi rjes su song ba ngo bo nyid gcig pa'i phyir te/ 'di lta ste/ sems kyi ngo bo nyid do// lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi khams
59b2(rgyud 'bum): gang yin pa dang / nam mkha'i khams de dag gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ 'di lta ste/ dper na sems can thams cad nam mkha'i 'am
59b3(rgyud 'bum): la gnas te/ nam mkha'i khams de'ang 'dod pa'i khams na gnas pa'ang ma yin// gzugs kyi khams na gnas pa'ang ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams na gnas pa'ang ma yin te/ chos
59b4(rgyud 'bum): gang khams gsum na mi gnas pa de ni skye ba med do/ / gang la skye ba med pa 'di ni chos gang gis kyang brtag par mi nus so// de bas na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ chos
59b5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa'o/ / kye bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ 'di lta ste/ dper na byang chub kyi sems kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes 'byung ba rdo rje'i
59b6(rgyud 'bum): gnas byed pa ste/ byang chub kyi sems de'ang lus la mi gnas/ ngag la mi gnas/ sems la mi gnas so// chos gang khams gsum na mi gnas pa de la skye ba med do// 'di ni ye shes 'byung ba
59b7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i gnas yin no/ / kye bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ rmi lam de ni bdag gis khams gsum du rmi lam mthong bar ba'o sam nga mi sems so// mi'ang bdag gis rmi lam
60a1(rgyud 'bum): mthong ngo snyam du mi sems so/ / khams gsum gyi bya ba de rnams kyang rmi lam lta bu/ rmi lam dang 'dra ba/ rmi lam las byung ba'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
60a2(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed pa rnams dang / sems can ji snyed pa thams cad kyang rmi lam bdag med pa'i gnas su rjes
60a3(rgyud 'bum): su rtogs par bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ 'di lta ste/ dper na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che ni/ rin po che thams cad kyi gtso bo yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa ste/
60a4(rgyud 'bum): rin po che thams cad kyi gtso bo yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa gang yin pa de la/ sems can gang dag gis gser ram/ rin po che 'am/ dngul yang rung ste/ gang bslangs pa de dag thams cad bsams
60a5(rgyud 'bum): pa tsam gyis 'byor par byed de/ rin po che la sogs pa de dag kyang sems la'ang mi gnas/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu la'ang gnas pa ma yin no// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
60a6(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad chos thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang rjes su rtogs par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad rab tu dgyes pa'i spyan gdangs
60a7(rgyud 'bum): nas/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang nam mkha'i khams kyi rjes su 'brang
60b1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i chos thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams rjes su 'brang ba de ngo mtshar to/ / de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin
60b2(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa'i zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / gang bcom ldan 'das khyed kyis sngags thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dngos grub mdor bsdus te gsungs pa/ sngags thams
60b3(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi rdo rje mdor bsdus pa'i dngos grub de dag gang la gnas/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la legs so zhes bya ba byin
60b4(rgyud 'bum): nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sngags kyi dngos grub thams cad ni/ sku dang / gsung dang / thugs la
60b5(rgyud 'bum): mi gnas so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sngags kyi dngos grub thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni bdag gi lus dang / ngag dang /
60b6(rgyud 'bum): sems rdo rje la ni gnas so// lus dang / ngag dang / sems rdo rje de dag kyang 'dod pa'i khams na mi gnas/ gzugs kyi khams na mi gnas/ gzugs med pa'i khams na mi gnas/ sems kyang
60b7(rgyud 'bum): lus la mi gnas/ lus kyang sems la mi gnas/ ngag kyang sems la mi gnas/ sems kyang ngag la mi gnas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nam mkha' ltar ngo bo nyid dag pa'i phyir ro// de nas
61a1(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos
61a2(rgyud 'bum): gang la gnas gnas byung / dpal rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa/ rang gi lus dang / ngag dang / sems las byung ngo // bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
61a3(rgyud 'bum): gsol pa/ sems gang na gnas/ bka' stsal pa/ gsol pa/ nam mkha' gang na gnas/ bka' stsal pa/ gang na'ang mi gnas so// de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
61a4(rgyud 'bum): de dag ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du gyur nas/ rang gi sems kyi chos nyid la gnas nas sems shing cang mi smra bar 'khod par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang
61a5(rgyud 'bum): gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ sems can thams cad kyi dam tshig gi snying po'i rdo rje 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// / de nas
61a6(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'dus par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs
61a7(rgyud 'bum): ba la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi dam tshig gis gsol ba btab nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rin chen gyi mchod pa'i tshogs
61b1(rgyud 'bum): kyis mchod pa byas so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/ rdo rje thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor seng ge'i dam tshig gi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
61b2(rgyud 'bum): zhugs nas/ rdo rje'i sku'i dkyil 'khor 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // de nas su yi dkyil 'khor mchog/ thus kyi dkyil 'khor rab 'thab// dkyil 'khor rnams na
61b3(rgyud 'bum): kun gyi mchog/ legs par rab tu bshad par bya// khru ni bcu drug tshad du bya// gru bzhi lham pa rab tu mdzes// sangs rgyas kun gyi dkyil 'khor te// sku yi rdo rje rab tu gnas// de yi
61b4(rgyud 'bum): nang du 'khor lo ni/ / rdo rje'i cho gas bri bar bya// sngags rnams kun gyi gsang ba mchog/ phyag rgya rdo rje'i gnas su bya// dbus su rnam par snang mdzad gnas// mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'ang bri//
61b5(rgyud 'bum): sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje mchog/ grwa rnams kun tu dgod par bya// stobs chen pha rol gnon pa yi// khro bo rnams kyang sgor bri'o// rdo rje gsang ba rab bsgoms pas// mchod pa sngags shes pa
61b6(rgyud 'bum): yis bya/ / 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o// bshang dang gci ba la sogs pa// bye brag tu ni nges par dbul// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// sku yi
61b7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje las dam tshig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas gsung rdo rje thams cad kyi dam tshig gi sprin bkod
62a1(rgyud 'bum): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ gsung rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'di// nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // de nas gsung
62a2(rgyud 'bum): gi dkyil 'khor mchog/ thugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab 'dra ba// dkyil 'khor rnams ni kun gyi mchog/ legs par rab tu bshad par bya// khru ni nyi shu'i tshad du bya// gru bzhi lham pa tshe
62a3(rgyud 'bum): ga bzhin/ / gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi par// rdo rje bsgom pas thig gdab po// de dbus 'khor lo chen po ni// zlum por kun tu bri bar bya// mdo ru phyag rgya thams cad ni// cho ga bzhin du bri bar bya//
62a4(rgyud 'bum): tshe dpag med kyi phyag rgya che// de yi dbus su gzhag par bya// rdo rje gnas mchog de nyid du// thams cad yongs su dgod par bya// yongs su gsal bar cho ga bzhin// dkyil 'khor dam pa
62a5(rgyud 'bum): byas nas ni/ / de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa bya// 'on tang rdo rje can dag mnyes// bshang gci khu ba'i dam tshig gis// mchod na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//
62a6(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas sprin gyi tshogs rdo rje zhes
62a7(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rab tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // rdo rje 'dzin mchog gang yin pa'i// gzugs
62b1(rgyud 'bum): ni dbus su legs bris pa/ / de yi dkyil 'khor gan su 'gyur// sku gsung thugs kyi gsang las byung // 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i
62b2(rgyud 'bum): gnas ye shes gsang ba yin te rab tu gsang ba'o/ / de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi 'khor lo 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/
62b3(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i gsang ba 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // de la 'di ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi sngags kyi
62b4(rgyud 'bum): snying po'i thig gdab pa'i yi ge'i gnas rnams so/ / oM AHhUM/ rdo rje'i thig ni gdab pa dang // tshon rtsi dag ni dgye ba dag/ sngags kyi sems dpas mi bya ste// byas na byang chub red par dka'
62b5(rgyud 'bum): de bas dam tshig tshul shes pas/ / sngags kyi lha rnams phab nas su// byin gyis brlabs kyis gnas bsgoms la// dkyil 'khor rnams ni rnam par brtag/ rgyal chen rnam par sna mdzad dang //
62b6(rgyud 'bum): yang na spyan ni dpam par bya// sku yi dkyil 'khor gnas yid 'o // rdo rje sku yi yon tan 'thob// rdo rje chos ni rgyal po che// rang gi chos mas dbab par bya// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// gsang ba rab tu brtag pa
62b7(rgyud 'bum): yin/ / rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// mA ma kI yang dbab par bya// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// gsang ba rmad du byung ba'o// de ltar byas na byin rlob cing // yid la dbang ba nyid
63a1(rgyud 'bum): gshegs te/ / rab tu dgyes par gyur nas ni// gsang ba dag gis mchog kyang stsol// 'di skad kyang gsungs so// sngags kyi sems dpas bya ba ni// rdo rje gsang ba rmang
63a2(rgyud 'bum): po che/ / khro bo'i rgyal pos bkug nas ni// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par bya// rdo rje dri med gsum dag gi/ dam tshig mchod pa dus gsum pa// rdo rje gsum gyi sbyor bas bya// sngags kyi
63a3(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub thob par byed/ / 'di skad kyang gsungs so// sngags rnams thams cad nyid la yang // rmad du byung ba'i gtor ma dbul/ kha shang gci sha dang 'bru mar dang // sems las byung ba'i tsan ngan
63a4(rgyud 'bum): dang / / khu ba dag gis sngags rnams kun// tshim par 'gyur bar kun tu bshad// 'di ni dam tshig mchog yin te// sangs rgyas byang chub rdzogs byed pa'o// thig gdab pa yi cho ga 'di// bdag nyid
63a5(rgyud 'bum): gang tshe spyod pa na/ / rnam par snang mdzad bsgoms nas su// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu sgom// yang na rdo rje mi 'chir grags// slob ma rdo rje 'od po che// sangs rgyas kun gyis bsten pa yi// las kyi go
63a6(rgyud 'bum): 'phang bsgom par bya/ / sangs rgyas rgyal chen lnga rnams na// rdo rje'i thig skud dag la dgod// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba rab tu rmad byung ba'o// rnam pa nyi shu rtsa lngar ni// tshon rtsi
63a7(rgyud 'bum): dag kyang rnam par sgom/ / 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba byang chub dam pa yin// sngags rnams thams cad nyid la yang // rdo rje hUM ni bsgom par bya// sku dang gsung dang dam tshig mchog/
63b1(rgyud 'bum): gnas lnga dag tu bsgom par bya// de ltar rtag tu byas na ni// rdo rje mi phyed gsum las skyes// rdo rje sems dpa' blo ldan pa// 'jigs shing skrag nas byin rlob mdzad// rdo rje bum pa bzhag pa ni// sngags
63b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyud bdag pos shes bya ste/ / rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas// brtan po'i blos ni brtag par bya// dngos grub kun gyis 'bras 'dod pa'i// sngags shes pas ni sbyin sreg bya// bshang gci
63b3(rgyud 'bum): 'bru mar sha la sogs/ / sbyin sreg tu ni dbul bar bya// rdo rje mi phyed gsum dag la// rdo rje gsang ba'i sbyin sreg dbul// dbus su rang gi lha yi gzugs// bsams te zhal du dbab par bya//
63b4(rgyud 'bum): 'di skad kyang gsungs so// dbang po gnyis kyi dam tshig gis/ sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad du bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o// rnam snang mdzad kyi
63b5(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba yis/ / slob ma rdo rje gsum las byung // AHni lus dang ngag sems la// bsgoms nas rdo rje gzung bar bya// rgyal chen rdo rje sems dpa' dang // grags chen rnam par snang mdzad dag
63b6(rgyud 'bum): sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig tu/ / byin gyis brlabs ni rab tu gsol// de la 'di ni dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug pa'i rdo rje'i dam tshig go/ AHkhaM bI ra hUM/ 'di ni dam tshig thams cad kyi lus
63b7(rgyud 'bum): dang / ngag dang / sems rdo rje'i snying po'o// de la 'di ni rdo rje chen po'i dbang bskur ba'i gsang ba'i ye shes gsang ba'o// sangs rgyas kun gyis nam mkha'i khams// yongs su gang ba rab tu sgom
64a1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i rigs ni 'dzin pa yis/ / sil snyan dri yi sprin rnams sgom// 'di skad kyang gsungs so// rdo rje sku gsung sngags kyis ni// nyung kar dag gis brdeg par bya// de la
64a2(rgyud 'bum): de yi tshe na ni/ / bdag nyid dbang bskur rab tu stsol// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// yang na sangs rgyas bsgom par bya// bum pa dam tshig mchog rnams kyis// bzung bar mkhas pa dag
64a3(rgyud 'bum): gis sgom/ / rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad bsam// slob ma rtag tu blo brtan la// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje can// sngags shes pas ni dgod par bya// de la 'di ni dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi
64a4(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba slob dpon thams cad kyi rdo rje'i tshig tu smra bar bya'o/ / sangs rgyas rnams ni thams cad kyi// rdo rje gsang ba gsum las byung // khams gsum dag gis phyag byas pa// rdo rje dbang
64a5(rgyud 'bum): bskur chen po sbyin/ / de la 'di ni slob ma thams cad kyis rdo rje chen po'i gsol ba bya ba'i cho ga gsang ba'o// byang chub rdo rjes sangs rgyas la// mchod chen ji ltar stsal ba bzhin// bdag kyang rab
64a6(rgyud 'bum): tu bsgral ba'i phyir/ / nam mkha'i rdo rje deng bdag stsol// de tshe de la dbang bskur ba// rab tu dgyes nas stsol bar mdzad// lha yi gzugs kyi sbyor ba yis// snying khar bdag po gzhag par bya//
64a7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje slob ma blo ldan la// sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig byin la// dkyil 'khor dag ni brtan par bya// sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa yi// dam tshig gsang ba bsgrag par bya// khyod kyis srog chags gsad par bya//
64b1(rgyud 'bum): brdzun gyi tshig kyang smra bar bya// ma byin par yang khyod kyis long // bud med dag kyang bstan bya// rje rje'i lam ni 'di dag gis// sems can thams cad bskul bar bya// 'di skad kyang gsungs te/
64b2(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// dam tshig mchog tu rtag pa'o// sngags kyis bskul ba smras pa yis// de la sngags kyang smin par bya// sngags kyi rgyal po'i ting 'dzin dang // gsang ba sbyin pa
64b3(rgyud 'bum): brtsam par bya/ / khu ba 'am yang na bshang ba'ang rung // cho ga bzhin du brgyus nas ni// rdo rje'i bros ni bza' bar bya// na tang dngos grub rnyed mi dka'// rnam pa 'di bzhi gsang chen te// rdo rje
64b4(rgyud 'bum): can ni kun gyi gsang / / sngags kyi 'khor lo bud med gzugs// sems can don spyod phyir gnas pa'o// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi sngags kyis mnyes par bya ba gsang
64b5(rgyud 'bum): ba'o/ / glang po'i sha dang rta yi sha// sha chen dag kyang bza' bya zhing // sngags rnams kul la dbul bar bya// de ltar nas na mgon po mnyes// nyin re rdo rje slob ma la// mkhas pas dkyil
64b6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor bstan par bya/ / bshang gci sha yi bya ba dang // rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig dag gis// sngags rnams kun gyi yi ge e// bsgoms na de ma thag tu 'bar// bcom ldan 'das sngags kyi rig pa'i
64b7(rgyud 'bum): skyes bu chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to/ / dngos grub thams cad bsgrub pa dang // dam tshig chen po bsgrub pa dang // sangs rgyas byang chub nyid dag kyang // nan tan du ni bsgrub par bya//
65a1(rgyud 'bum): mi snang stobs dang brtson 'grus dang // rdo rje dgug pa'i mchog dag kyang // rdo rje sku yi bka' bzhin du// dkyil 'khor dag gis thams cad 'grub// bshang gci dang ni sha chen
65a2(rgyud 'bum): rnams/ / cha ni mnyam par byas nas su// kham phor sbyar mar bzhag na ni// sangs rgyas kun dang lhan cig 'khod// 'di skad ces kyang gsungs te/ de la 'di ni gsang ba thams cad kyi rdo rje mngag
65a3(rgyud 'bum): gzhug par rab tu sgrub pa'i tshig gi mchog go/ / hriHni 'bar ba'i 'od bzang po// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas kun gyis nam mkha'i khams// yongs su gang bar rnam par
65a4(rgyud 'bum): sgom/ / de yi sku gsung thugs kyi gnas// der ni sngags kyis dbab par bya// de la 'di ni sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi sngags rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa'i snying po'o// aHkhaM d+hIH/ phyag na
65a5(rgyud 'bum): / rdo rje'i gzugs chen dang // phyag na pad+mo 'od chen dang // gzhan gyis mi thub gzugs chen dag/ bsgoms nas gsang ba'i gnas gzhag go// de la 'di ni rdo rje gsang ba'i gnas so// nyi ma'i dkyil
65a6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor dbus gnas par/ / mi bskyod pa ni rab tu brtag/ tshe dpag med pa'i 'khor lo che// rdo rje snang mdzad de bzhin te// 'od chen sdug bsngal chen po yis// thams cad snying pos bskul bar bya//
65a7(rgyud 'bum): de la 'di ni rdo rje'i snying po thams cad bskul ba'o// AMmadung rtse che dang rdo rje che// lcags kyu sna tshogs mchog rnams kyis// rdo rje cho ga bzhin bskul na// sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu 'grub// 'di skad
65b1(rgyud 'bum): ces kyang gsungs so/ / nyams dga' ba yi ri dag dang // chu gling rnam pa sna tshogs su// zla ba phyed ni tshun chad kyis// sangs rgyas thob pa gdon mi za// ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi/ rdul
65b2(rgyud 'bum): phran ji snyed yod pa yis/ / de yi 'khor tshogs lhan cig tu// 'khor lo can gyi byang chub 'grub// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur// zab mo'i
65b3(rgyud 'bum): chos kyang thos 'gyur zhing / / sangs rgyas sa yang 'thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das dam tshig rdo rje bzhad pas de skad ces bka' stsal to// de la 'di ni mngag gzhug pa thams cad kyi gsang
65b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rdo rje gsang ba'o/ / rdo rje sems dpa' ye shes che// de bzhin gsung gi rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje sku yi dgod pa che// mngag gzhug pa dag brtag tu brtul// de la 'di ni rdo rje ye shes 'khor lo sngags kyi
65b5(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig gi gnas so/ / dam tshig bskul ba dang / dam tshig gtong ba dang // dam tshig bod pa dang / dam tshig bcing ba'o// mkha' dbyings rgya chen dag pa ni// chos rnams thams cad rnam par spangs//
65b6(rgyud 'bum): gong bu'i tshul gyis byed pa ni// rdo rje rmad byung gzugs can no// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bu gcig pa rdo rje sems dpa' chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa'
65b7(rgyud 'bum): yang rung / / gal te dbang du bya 'dod na// rdo rje mchog gsum 'dzin pa che// gsang ba chen po 'di bsam mo// rdo rje 'jam pa stobs po che// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// mda' lnga'i sbyor ba dag gis ni//
66a1(rgyud 'bum): dgra rgyan se mo yang dag s+ho// gnas lnga dag tu sngags shes pas// rdo rje cho bos rab tu dbyug// spangs shing brgyal bar nom pa ni// byis pa'i sngon grags can gyis// bas
66a2(rgyud 'bum): gtan 'di ni zla phyed du/ / gsang ba'i bskul ba dag gis bsgom// sngags rnams kun gyis rab gsang ba// rdo rje'i don gyis blo yis gsungs// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor mchog dag ni// nam mkha'
66a3(rgyud 'bum): rdorje'i dbus bsam pa/ / sngags kyi rdo rje hU~M la sogs// rdo rje gsum la sogs par sgom// oM ni mig gi dbus bsams nas// 'di dag cho ga bzhin du bstan// sngags rnams kun gyi gzugs dag ni//
66a4(rgyud 'bum): sku gsung rdo rje can du mthong / bkres skom la sogs nyon mongs che// sbyor ba 'di ni rnam bsam na// rdo rje thugs kyi bka' bzhin du// sdug bsngal thams cad byang bar 'gyur// rnam par snang
66a5(rgyud 'bum): mdzad gzugs chen po/ / bsams na don rnams thams cad 'byor// ba ni kha yi nang du sgom// oM ni lce la 'dug par bsam// bza' bar bya ba kun gyis gnas// yid bzhin nor bus brgyan pa
66a6(rgyud 'bum): ste zhi ba sdug bsngal thams cad sel/ / ye shes rdo rje las byung ba'o// bcom ldan 'das yid bzhin gyi nor bus de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshes
66a7(rgyud 'bum): pa dpa' bo chen po rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas rdo rje sgom pa'i tshig gi mchog rdo rje'i gsung las phyung ngo / / bI sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor 'od bzang po// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// rdo rje sku gsum
66b1(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba yis/ / bskyed de 'di ni rnam par bsam// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// cung zad ser ba rdo rje 'gying // zhi ba thor tsugs dbu rgyan can// bsams nas thams cad brtsam par bya//
66b2(rgyud 'bum): rdorje dpa' bo rlabs kyi 'phreng ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun nas dbyangs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje chen po sgom pa'i tshig 'di
66b3(rgyud 'bum): nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // tsuM nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas sprin gyi cho ga yis// rdo rje gsum gyi grags chen ni/
66b4(rgyud 'bum): lus dang ngag dang sems la dbab// skal byed rdo rje ma sgom mo// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// kha dog dkar mor rab tu sgom// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// bsam la sngags kyi tshig
66b5(rgyud 'bum): dgod do/ / rdo rje'i dam tshig ye shes kyi 'od zer zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/ bsam pa thams cad rdo rje longs spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting
66b6(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi 'khor lo'i tshul 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // dza sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa dag/ nam mkha'
66b7(rgyud 'bum): dbyings kyi dbus su bsam/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi cho ga yis// rdo rje bsgom pas dbab par bya// dzam+b+ha la ni nor sgrub pa// gnod sbyin chen po bskyed par bya// zhi ba gnod sbyin gzugs 'dzin pa/
67a1(rgyud 'bum): thor tshugs dbu rgyan rdo rje can// sangs rgyas lnga yis cho ga yis// gnas lnga dag tu bsgom par bya// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu de yis// bsam gtan gnas la 'dug la dbul/
67a2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems dpa'i cho ga yis// dbu rgyan de la rnam par bsam// de ltar byas na gnod sbyin dbang // gnod gnas dbang po 'od chen gnyis// rdo rje dam tshig gi phyag rgya rdzas sgrub pa'i tog gi dpal zhes bya
67a3(rgyud 'bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje 'dod pa nye bar longs spyod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ gnod sbyin mo'i rdo rje'i
67a4(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig gi 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // k+ShiM mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbus gnas par// gru bzhi lham pa rab tu bzang // thams cad rin chen bzhi las byas//
67a5(rgyud 'bum): me tog spos kyis kun tu 'khrigs// gnod sbyin mo ni thams cad kyis// nam mkha'i dbyings ni gang bar bsams// gzugs kyi sprin dag rnam bsams la// rdo rje gsum gyi sbyor bas dbab// gzug
67a6(rgyud 'bum): ni gcig tu bsam par bya/ / lus gsum rdo rje bye brag gis// de yi bsam gtan bsgom par bya// rdo rje 'jam pa'i ting 'dzin gnas// dbu rgyan la ni khro bo sgom// snying khar sngags kyi tshig bsgom la/
67a7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i sbyor ba brtsam par bya// gnod sbyin mo thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa bsgom pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/ rdo rje
67b1(rgyud 'bum): sngags thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dngos grub phra mo 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // sku dang /
67b2(rgyud 'bum): gsung thugs yang dag 'grub// sangs rgyas gzugs 'dzin 'od bzang po// 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser 'od 'dra// dngos grub phra mo dag la gnas// mi snang la sogs yang dag grub// 'jam pa'i 'od dang 'dra
67b3(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur/ / gnod sbyin rgyal po grub pa che// rig 'dzin dag gi dbang por 'gyur// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i dngos grub thams cad kyi gzugs gsang ba'i dngos grub rnams so// sngags kyi dngos grub thob pa yi//
67b4(rgyud 'bum): mdzes pa'i gzugs rnams thams cad ni// 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du// mthong ba nyid kyis dga' bar 'gyur// gtsug tor thams cad grub pa ni// yid bzhin nor bu'i bdag por 'gyur// sangs
67b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyas byang chub byed pa'i mchog/ sangs rgyas rdo rje rab sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i rdo rjes 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin
67b6(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rig pa'i brtul zhugs yang dag par len pa'i spyod pa 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs
67b7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje las phyung ngo / / sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams// lus dang ngag sems sgom pa ni// rang tshul nyid kyis de byas te// de ltar dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// de la 'di ni sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi
68a1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i rig pa'i brtul zhugs so/ / thor tshugs dbu rgyan can gyi gzugs// chen po kha dog dkar po 'dra// sngags kyi sdom pas kun tu bsdams// cho ga bzhin du thams cad bya// lo
68a2(rgyud 'bum): grangs bcu drug lon pa ni/ / rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs// bzhin sdug mig gi dkyus ring ba// rnyed nas rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad// spyan gyi go 'phang longs spyod cing // rdo rje'i mtshan mas bsgom
68a3(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / phyag rgya sngags kyi cho ga shes// sngags kyi rgyud rnams legs par bslabs// de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mor bya// sangs rgyas byang chub la rab gnas// brtul zhugs chen po dus bzhir ni/
68a4(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba'i mchod pa rab tu bya// sdong bu rtsa ba 'bras bu yi// bza' dang bca' ba spyad par bya// 'on tang myur du sangs rgyas 'gyur// bdag po ye shes rgya mtsho che// zla ba drug gis de dag kun// gdon mi
68a5(rgyud 'bum): za bar 'thob par 'gyur/ / rtag tu gzhan gyi nor rku zhing // bsad pa'ang rmad du byung ba dang // 'dod chags rdo rje'i gnas spyad pa// sdom pa 'dis ni kun tu bsdams// 'dod chags rdo rje lcags kyu mo//
68a6(rgyud 'bum): yon tan lug rgyud mA ma kI// gsung gi rdo rje thugs mchog la// 'di ni rnam pa kun tu rigs// bsam gtan yig gsum rdo rje can// rang gi phyag rgya sems kyi bsam// de ltar sangs rgyas kun mkhyen pa/
68a7(rgyud 'bum): mnyes par 'gyur ba gdon mi za// sgrub pa po ni blo brtan pas// nags tshal dag tu bsod snyoms bslang // kha zas bzang po bstar ba dag/ de dag skrag nas ster bar 'gyur// rdo rje'i bdag nyid gsum
68b1(rgyud 'bum): 'das nas/ / rdo rje'i yi ge 'jig par 'gyur// lha mo klu mo gnod sbyin mo// lha ma yin nam mi mo'ang rung // rnyed nas rig pa'i brtul zhugs bya// rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes bsten// 'di ni sngags rnams
68b2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi/ / de nyid gsang ba'i tshul chen yin// rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes 'byung // sangs rgyas byang chub rab 'jug pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig pa'i
68b3(rgyud 'bum): brtul zhugs kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ dngos grub
68b4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rdo rje mngon par byang chub pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'dus nas/
68b5(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba btab pa/ mi bskyod rdo rje ye shes che// rdo rje dbyings ni mkhas pa
68b6(rgyud 'bum): che rdo rje gsum mchog dkyil 'khor gsum/ / gsang ba'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam par snang mdzad dag pa che// rdo rje zhi ba dga' ba che// rang bzhin 'od gsal mchog gi mchog/
68b7(rgyud 'bum): ston pa rdo rje phyag 'tshal lo// rin chen rgyal po rab tu zab// rdo rje nam mkha' dri ma med// rang bzhin dag pas gos pa med// rdo rje sku la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje dpag med rgyal po che// mi rtog nam mkha'
69a1(rgyud 'bum): @/ rdo rje 'dzin// 'dod chags pha rol phyin pa brnyes// rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal lo// don yod rdo rje rdzogs sangs rgyas// bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa// dag pa ngo bo nyid
69a2(rgyud 'bum): las byung / / rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas kun gyis bskul ba yi// bstod tshig zhi ba 'di rnams kyis// rdo rje longs spyod bstod na ni// de yang sangs rgyas 'dra bar 'gyur// de nas
69a3(rgyud 'bum): ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/ / sangs rgyas kun la rjes brtse ba// rdo rje gsang ba gsung dag pa// rdo rje'i gsung ni bka' stsal to// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// chos kyi dbyings ni yi ge che// rang bzhin 'od
69a4(rgyud 'bum): gsal yongs su dag/ nam mkha'i dbyings bzhin dri ma med// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku rdo rje'i dam tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang
69a5(rgyud 'bum): gsung dang / thugs rdo rje la phyung ngo // sangs rgyas ye shes rgya mtsho yi// dam tshig bzhi ni bsrung bar bya// sha chen rtag tu bza' bar bya// 'di ni dam tshig mchog yin no// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin
69a6(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung rdo rje'i dam tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // dam tshig bzhi po bsrung bar bya//
69a7(rgyud 'bum): gsung gi rdo rje yi ge che// bshang gci dag ni rtag tu bza'// 'di ni gsang ba rmad byung ba'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyi
69b1(rgyud 'bum): dam chis 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // rdo rje sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che// dam tshig bzhi po bsrung bar u0f7f// khrag dang khu bsgyung ba dag/ brgyal thugs ban p
69b2(rgyud 'bum): as rtag tu bza'/ / sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis// dam tshig 'di ni mang po che// sangs rgyas kun gyi brtag pa 'dri// rdo rje 'dzin gyis bsrung bar bya// gang zhig dam tshig 'di srung ba//
69b3(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' 'od po che// de yi sku gsung thugs rtogs pa'o// de ma thag tu sangs rgyas 'gyur// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ rang sangs rgyas kyi don gyi dang
69b4(rgyud 'bum): tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // de yi lus kyi ston pa ni// rdo rje'i sku la rab tu gnas// sems can gzung ba'i ngang tshul te// dam tshig mchog tu rtag pa'o//
69b5(rgyud 'bum): de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ nyan thos kyi bsgrub pa'i dam tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ba'o// dge ba bcu yi las kyi
69b6(rgyud 'bum): lam/ / byed pa ye shes spangs pa rnams// dman par mos pa thams cad kyi// dam tshig 'di ni rmad po che// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ tshangs pa'i dam tshig 'di//
69b7(rgyud 'bum): nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // gti mug las kyi lam gang rnams// byed pa 'jigs shing mi sdug pa// sangs rgyas byang chub ston pa ste// sgra yi rdo rje nyid du 'gyur/
70a1(rgyud 'bum): de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ drag po'i dam tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // khams gsum dag
70a2(rgyud 'bum): na gnas pa yi/ / bud med rdo rje las byung rnams// sna tshogs dngos pos spyad pa ni// dam tshig mchog tu rmad byung ba'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ khyab
70a3(rgyud 'bum): 'jug gi dam tshig 'di/ / nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // sems can las byung ji snyed pa// dbyer med sku gsum la gnas pa// rdo rje mkha' dbyings bdag nyid
70a4(rgyud 'bum): kyang / / bsam gtan rdo rjes gsad par bya// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ rang gi dam tshig rdo rje 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las
70a5(rgyud 'bum): phyung ngo / / sku yi rdo rje tshangs par 'gyur// gsung gi rdo rje dbang phyug che// thugs kyi rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// de nyid khyab 'jug rdzu 'phrul che// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
70a6(rgyud 'bum): kyi bdag pos/ gnod sbyin mo thams cad kyi dam tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // khrag dang sha ni za ba dang // rtag tu gzhan gyi bud med spyod/
70a7(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig dga' ba 'di rnams kyis// rdo rje chen po mnyes par bya// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ klu'i rgyal po thams cad kyi dam tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang /
70b1(rgyud 'bum): gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // 'o ma 'thung ba phra ma can// de dag 'dod dang dri la 'bad// dam tshig 'dis ni bsgrub par bya// gzhan du nges par nyon mongs 'gyur// de nas phyag na rdo rje de
70b2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ lha ma srin gyi bu mo'i dam tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // khro zhing nga rgyal gsod pas non// spos dang me
70b3(rgyud 'bum): tog spyod la dgyes/ / rdo rje sa 'og dam tshig ste// gdul dka' rdo rje 'jigs byed pa'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ srin mo rnams kyi dam tshig 'di/
70b4(rgyud 'bum): nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // thod rus gdug pa'i 'bru mar dang // zhag gis rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// 'byung po kun gyi dam tshig ste// dag byed 'di ni don chen byed//
70b5(rgyud 'bum): de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi dam tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // bshang gci dang
70b6(rgyud 'bum): ni khrag dag bza'/ / chang la sogs pa'ang rtag tu btung // rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i sbyor ba yis// gnas kyi mtshan nyid kyis gsad bya// ngo bo nyid kyis kun 'byung ba// khams gsum dag na rnam par spyod//
70b7(rgyud 'bum): sems can kun la phan 'dod pa'i// dam tshig ma lus spyad par bya// khams gsum pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs
71a1(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ lus kyi dngos grub kyi dam tshig 'di// nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // lus kyi rnam gsum thams cad ni// rdo rje las ni
71a2(rgyud 'bum): byung bar bya/ / sems can khams ni thams cad du// rtag par sangs rgyas sku byed pa'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ ngag gi dngos grub kyi dam tshig 'di/ nyid kyi/
71a3(rgyud 'bum): sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // tshig gi las lam ma lus par// khams gsum dri med dkyil 'khor te// tshig gi dngos grub yid 'ong 'di// dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o//
71a4(rgyud 'bum): de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ sems rdo rje'i dam tshig gi dngos grub 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // yid kyi rdo rje'i rang bzhin kun/
71a5(rgyud 'bum): rdorje brtan pa 'dzin pas sgom// rdo rje mi phyed gsum ldan gyi// dam tshig bshad pa 'di yin no// bcom ldan 'das kun tu mdzes dga' rdo rje sems dpas de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin
71a6(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ sngags thams cad kyi rdo rje'i snying po'i dam tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // rang rgyal
71a7(rgyud 'bum): nyan thos de bzhin te/ / sku gsung thugs su sbyor ba na// phyag 'tshal na nam rung 'gyur// de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /
71b1(rgyud 'bum): gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i bsam gtan gyi dam tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // kun tu rdo rje sems dpa' yi// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la// bsam gtan rdo rje
71b2(rgyud 'bum): gsum sbyor bas/ / sngags zlos pas ni bsam gtan bya// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ sngags sgrub pa'i dam tshig dang sdom pa 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang /
71b3(rgyud 'bum): thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // mdor na sems can khams rnams ni// bsam gtan rdo rjes bskul bar bya// rdo rje gsum gyi phyag 'tshal mchog/ dam tshig rdo rje las byung ba'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs
71b4(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ bstan pa dang / sgrub pa dang / nye bar sgrub pa dang / sgrub pa chen po'i sdom pa 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // rdo rje bshang gaN+DI nam mkha'i dbyings/
71b5(rgyud 'bum): yongs su gang bar rnam par bsam// dus gsum rdo rje dag la dbul// dam tshig rab tu rtag pa'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ rdo rje mi snang ba thams cad kyi dam tshig 'di/
71b6(rgyud 'bum): nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // dus bzhir ji ltar mchog bzhin du// rdo rje mo ni nyin re spyad// yang na rdzas kyang rtag tu dbrog/ dam tshig rdo rje rdzogs byed pa'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje
71b7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ nam mkha'i rig 'dzin gyi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni// dadu rgyan dag la bsam gtan
72a1(rgyud 'bum): bsam/ / rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig ste// khros pa rnams kyis mi thub bo// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ sngags 'chang las dang po pa thams cad kyi
72a2(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // sku yi rdo rje kha zas la// phyi rol rdo rje 'dzin pa dang // mdo gdon cho ga'i bya ba la// rtag par rdo rje chos smra bya// bcom ldan 'das ngo bo
72a3(rgyud 'bum): nyid dag pa rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to/ / de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rdo rje mnyam pa nyid rnam par dgongs
72a4(rgyud 'bum): nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ / de nas yang brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ri rab kyi rdul rab tu phra ba dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa
72a5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po ci'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi nang du cang mi
72a6(rgyud 'bum): gsungs par bzhugs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
72a7(rgyud 'bum): sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi bdag po 'di/ sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i ngo bo nyid dmigs su med pa'i yi ge'i tshig la/ ngo bo nyid med pa'i yi ge'i tshig brjod nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so//
72b1(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po 'di sems pa ni 'di snyam du gyur to// sku ni mi 'gyur ma skyes pa// gsung dang thugs kyang mtshan ma med// nam mkha' rdo rje rtog las byung //
72b2(rgyud 'bum): log par gzung bas zin pa yin// de nas 'jam dpal la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
72b3(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ gsung rdo rje'i tshig la phyin ci log kun 'byung bar mi brtag tu gsol/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po 'di ni/

72b5(rgyud 'bum): mngon par shes pa chen po'i ye shes thob pa rnams chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid mi shes nas 'di snyam du rnam par rtog ste/ ci rdo rje'i bdag nyid 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos thams
72b6(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi rdo rje'i de kho na nyid yongs su ma shes nas/ gsang ba'i yi ge rnams 'chang ngam snyam du sems dpa'ang ma mchis so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems

73a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'ang spu dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi byang chub mi shes so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skye ba med pa'i rdo rje mngon par byang chub pa ni ngo bo nyid med pa mi 'gyur ba las byung ba'o// rigs kyi
73a2(rgyud 'bum): sems can chen po'i khongs su gtogs pa'i sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad byang chub la gnas pa sangs rgyas rdo rje'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kye sa sems can de dag ni sku gsum rdo rje'i chos nyid kyi
