77b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i gsang ba 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM/ 'od zer dkar po'i 'phrang ba can// 'khor lo'i dbus su chud par gzhag/ 'od zer ser po 'khrig pa ni// ser po
78a1(rgyud 'bum): lta bur bsgom par bya/ / rdor gsum 'od zer dam tshig gi/ sa bon gsang gsum las byung ba'o// de nus yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos lus
78a2(rgyud 'bum): dang / ngag dang / sems bsrung ba'i 'khor lo'i sngags rdo rje dang ldan pa 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // oM hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ da ha da hA
78a3(rgyud 'bum): a mr-i te hUM phaT/ gro ga la sogs 'khor lo ni// las kyi rdo rje la gnas par// haM ni dbus su bzhag nas su// ming ni dbus su bri bar bya// sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig rnams kyis// brgyan te rtag
78a4(rgyud 'bum): tu gzhag par bya/ / 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// gsang ba gsum gyi gnas bsdus pa'o// de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje any+dza na'i dam tshig 'di/
78a5(rgyud 'bum): nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // lam gyi bzhi mdo shing gcig drung // ma mo'i gnas sam zhi gnas su// de ru rdo rje any+dza na// thod par rtag tu dbab par bya// tshatshil chen
78a6(rgyud 'bum): po dang / khrag dang / bshang ba dang / pad+mo'i skud pa dang / arka'i skud pas me mar gyi snying po byas la tshes nyi shu dgu'i nam phyed na rdo rje any+dza na dbab par bya'o// de nyid la sngags ba
78a7(rgyud 'bum): rtsa brgyad btab na dngos grub rnam pa gsum du 'gyur ro/ / zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ phyag na
78b1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i yi ge du dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag/ de bzhin
78b2(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig gi spyod pa'i rdo rje 'di la dad cing sgom par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po phyag na rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
78b3(rgyud 'bum): la 'di skad ces gsungs so/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gsang ba'i yi ge gsum dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod
78b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rdo rje gang yin pa de la dad cing sgom par 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol pa/ gsum po gang zhig lags/ rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin
78b5(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rdo rje dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung rdo rje dang / de bzhin gshegs pa tham cad kyi thugs rdo rje ste gsum mo// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
78b6(rgyud 'bum): de dag thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ de bzhin gshes
78b7(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ sngon byung ba na brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang brjod kyis mi lang ba'i
79a1(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul rab tu phra ba dang mnyam pa'i bskal pa yang 'das nas/ gang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs/
79a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyas mar me mdzad 'das pa nas/ thub pa chen po 'od srungs mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i bar gyis kyang ma gsungs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba chen po'i gnas kyi
79a3(rgyud 'bum): don bshad pa de/ de'i tshe de'i dus na sems can rnams la skal ba med pa'i phyir ro// 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba 'dus pa 'di la
79a4(rgyud 'bum): skad cig thang cig yud tsam gyis sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rdzogs par byed do/ / gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma du ma snyed kyi bskal par byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'bad cing btsal yang byang
79a5(rgyud 'bum): chub thob par mi 'gyur pa de/ gsang ba 'dus pa la mngon par dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa' tshe 'di nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o//
79a6(rgyud 'bum): de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsung rdo rje'i yi ge'i tshig 'di thos nas rab tu ngus so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de rnams
79a7(rgyud 'bum): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / byang chub sems dpa' khyed rnams ma du zhig/ sdug bsngal gsum la ma sgom zhig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la/ byang chub sems
79b1(rgyud 'bum): dpa' de rnams kyis de skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ji ltar mi ngu bar bgyi/ ji ltar sdug bsngal gsum mi bsgom par bgyi/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
79b2(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba'i yi ge'i ming tsam thos pa'i skal ba'ang ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ de skad ma zer cig/ yi ge ni thun mong ste/ rigs kyi bu khyed
79b3(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis ji ltar mi shes pa dang ma thos pa de bzhin du/ nged de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis kyang / rigs kyi bu gsang ba'i yi ge 'di
79b4(rgyud 'bum): dag ma thos shing mngon par sangs ma rgyas so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gsang ba'i yi ge rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad cang mi smra bar gnas par
79b5(rgyud 'bum): gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs so// de nas
79b6(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi btsun mos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin chen po la dga' bas bskyod
79b7(rgyud 'bum): pasems can khams na gnas kyi dbang phyug khyod ni rdo rje'i thugs/ dga' ba yid 'ong don chen 'dod pas bdag la bskyab tu gsol/ mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis
80a1(rgyud 'bum): bzhed na/ sems can yab chen gnyen mchog bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi
80a2(rgyud 'bum): btsun mo mA ma kIs/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin chen po la/ rdo rje 'dod pa'i dga' ba'i mchod pa'i mchog gi yi ge'i tshig 'dis yang dag par
80a3(rgyud 'bum): bstod do/ / rdo rje'i sku khyod bka' yi 'khor lo sems can kun la phan// sangs rgyas don du byang chub don dam rjes su phan ston pa/ mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhengs
80a4(rgyud 'bum): 'dod chags dam tshig chags pas bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la/ 'jig rten gyi dbang phyug gi sku dang /
80a5(rgyud 'bum): gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i spyan gyis/ rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la 'dod pa la nye bar longs spyod pa'i dam tshig gis yang dag par bstod pa/ khyod ni rdo rje'i gsung ste kun la phan zhing thugs bcwa
80a6(rgyud 'bum): babang 'jig rten dag gi dgos pa'i don mdzad pa la rtag tu brtson/ / mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na// rab dga'i spyod pa kun tu bzang po bdag la dgyes par mdzad
80a7(rgyud 'bum): du gsol/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi dam tshig rdo rje'i btsun mos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje
80b1(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin chen po la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba'i dga' ba 'dis bstod do// khyod ni rdo rje 'dod pa dam tshig mchog gi phan don che// yang dag rdzogs sangs
80b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyas kyi gdung mchog mnyam pa nyid gzigs pa/ / mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na// yon tan rin chen mang po'i gter gyur bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol/
80b3(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod chags thams cad nye bar longs spyod pa'i rdo rje'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs
80b4(rgyud 'bum): papa thams cad kyi btsun mo de dag la dam tshig gi 'khor los 'dod pa spyod cing cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ / de nas nam mkha'i dbyings 'di dag thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
80b5(rgyud 'bum): kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i dam tshig gi khu bas yongs su gang ste/ bum pa rdo rje chus gang ba ltar gnas par gyur to// de nas rdo rje nam mkha'i dbyings 'di na gang sems can sku
80b6(rgyud 'bum): gsum gyi dam tshig las yang dag par byung ba de rnams rdo rje'i dpal gyis reg nas/ thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes
80b7(rgyud 'bum): can du gyur to/ / de nas brtsams te sems can thams cad kun tu bzang po kun tu bzang po zhes/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rjes dbang bskur bar gyur to//
81a1(rgyud 'bum): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chos
81a2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid mthong ngam/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhi
81a3(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje ye shes kyi spyod pa mthong lags so/ / bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ de bzhin gshegs pa
81a4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi btsun mo'i b+ha ga las mngon par byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na rdo rje chen po la 'di skad ces gsol to// gang 'dod chags kyi yi ge'i tshig gis sangs rgya
81a5(rgyud 'bum): byang chub rjes su rtogs pa de ni bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to/ / bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag thos/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
81a6(rgyud 'bum): cad la 'di skad ces gsungs so/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de skad ma zer cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni nam mkha'i rdo rje'i dam tshig dang mtshungs pa'i phyir/
81a7(rgyud 'bum): gzugs kyi phung po ma yin/ tshor ba'i phung se ma yin/ 'du shes kyi phung pos yin/ 'du byed kyi phung po ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i phung pos yin/ khams ma yin/ rgya mched ma yin/ de bzhin du
81b1(rgyud 'bum): 'dir 'dod chags ma yin/ zhe sdang ma yin/ gti mug ma yin/ chos ma yin/ chos ma yin pa'ang ma yin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas
81b2(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la bka' stsal pa/ khyed rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams
81b3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje 'di bsgo bar gyis shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ phyogs bcu na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de rnams
81b4(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la skal ba yod pa'i phyir ro/ / de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ rdo rje chos la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa
81b5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid 'di zung zhig/ khyod kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis chos kyi dbang phyug rdo rje zhes dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
81b6(rgyud 'bum): po rdo rje chos kyis de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes gsol nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje sems dpa'i yi ge gsum la rang gi sku dang / gsung dang /
81b7(rgyud 'bum): thugs zhugs par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sku rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad khams gsum thams cad kyi lus rdo rje la gnas shing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku mnyam pa nyid
82a1(rgyud 'bum): la dmigs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gsung rdo rje khams gsum thams cad kyi ngag rdo rje la gnas shing / de bzhin gshegs pa tham
82a2(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi gsung mnyam pa nyid la dmigs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na rdo rje khams gsum thams cad kyi sems rdo rje la gnas shing / de bzhin gshegs pa
82a3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi thugs mnyam pa nyid la dmigs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ / de skad ces bka' stsal to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba
82a4(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba 'dus pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dang sdom pa rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// / de bzhin gshegs
82a5(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs gsang zhing rab tu gsang ba zhes bya ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrad+d+ha ka ra lam dang / zhu chen
82a6(rgyud 'bum): gyi yo tsab dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI dz+nyAn kA ra bas bshad nas/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba 'phos lhas btsas kyis lus gtugs g.yar thal
82a7(rgyud 'bum): mtshal pa'o/ / 'dus pa'i sa brgyad la ma tshan gyis bskur ba mang du snga na'ang / 'gos kyis 'gyur ba chos mdzad pa srung bar snang la/ 'grel ba'i bshad pa 'gos 'gyur gyi steng nas byed pa sa k
82b1(rgyud 'bum): yi 'gog 'gyur gal che bar mthong nas bris pa'o/ / // de nas byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams
82b2(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi dbang bskur ba dang / sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba bstan pa la dngos po thams cad kyis ji lta ba dang / dus ji lta ba bzhin du mthong zhing thos la khong du chud nas/ chos
82b3(rgyud 'bum): gzigs pa dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / e ma'o kun tu bzang po yi// sku gsung thugs kyi nges pa dag/ rdo rje gsum gyis kun tu ni//
82b4(rgyud 'bum): / rdo rje gsum la kun tu bzhugs// sems can thams cad dus gsum gyi// rdo rje'i ngo bor yang dag byung // sangs rgyas rdo rje rdzu 'phrul che// byang chub rdo rje'i gnas thob pa'o// e ma'o 'di rab ngo
82b5(rgyud 'bum): mtshar che/ / e ma'o zhi ba dbang po 'das// e ma'o 'khor ba dag gi rgyun// e ma'o mchog tu mya ngan 'das// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
82b6(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po de rnams la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / byang chub sems dpa' de de bzhin no// sems dpa' chen po de de bzhin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad yang
82b7(rgyud 'bum): 'dus par gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la gsang ba dang phyi'i mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod nas phyag byas te mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to//
83a1(rgyud 'bum): e ma'o shin tu rnyed dka' ba// byang chub sgrub pa'i thabs 'di yin// rgyud kyi mchog gi mchog gyur pa// gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya'i rgyud// sbas pa de ni rtogs phyir
83a2(rgyud 'bum): dang / / sems can rnams la phan 'dod pas// yang dag gsung bas gang bshad pa// mgon po khyed la gsol bar 'tshal// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis/ byang
83a3(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa' de rnams la ni 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / gang zhig sbas pa'i rgyud tshig de// de dag thams cad 'dri 'dod pa// sems dpa' chen po legs so legs// yon tan 'byung
83a4(rgyud 'bum): gnas legs so legs/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun// rab tu dga' bas mig gdangs te// yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal nas// 'di yi som nyi zhus par gyur// gsang ba zhes 'di gang
83a5(rgyud 'bum): la bgyi/ / 'dus pa zhes ni gang la brjod// rgyud kyi 'grel pa ji lta bu// rnal 'byor rgyud 'dir ci la bgyi// de nyid rnam pa du ru bshad// de bzhin gsang ba rnam pa du// gsang chen zhes ni gang la
83a6(rgyud 'bum): bgyi/ / dam pa rnam pa du zhig mchis// byang chub sems zhes gang la bgyi// de bzhin rig pa'i skyes bu ci// badz+ra d+h+r-ika ces ci la bgyi// de bzhin dzi na dzika ni gang // de la rat+na d+h+r-i ka ni gang // de
83a7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin A ro li ka ni ci/ / pradz+nyA d+h+rika ces gang la bgyi// rigs 'dir de bzhin gang zhig lags// mo ha zhes ni gang la bgyi// dwe Sha zhes 'dir gang la bgyi// rA ga zhes ni tsi la bgyi// badz+ra sngags
83b1(rgyud 'bum): ni gang la bgyi/ / ra ti zhes 'dir gang la bgyi// phun sum tshogs pa gang zhig lags// ya mAn+ta krita don ni gang // de bzhin pradz+nyAn+ta krita tsi// pad+mAn+ta krita ming ji lta// de bzhin big+h+nAn+ta krita tsi/
83b2(rgyud 'bum): kun tu spyod pa gang ci lags// de bzhin sngags kyi spyod pa gang // 'dir ni bzlas pa gang zhig lags// rgyas btab pa zhes gang la bgyi// chos 'byung ba ni ji ltar sgom// de bzhin sdom pa ji
83b3(rgyud 'bum): lta bu/ / zhe sdang gti mug 'dod chags ches// sems can don mdzad ji lta bu// dkyil 'khor zhes ni gang la bgyi// phyag rgya'i dgod pa ji ltar lags// 'dir ni me tog ci zhig lags//
83b4(rgyud 'bum): mchod rten zhes ni gang la bshad// ye shes 'khor lo ji ltar shes// 'dir ni gnas shes gang la bshad// mgon po bskul ba ji lta bu// gtong ba dag kyang ji lta bu// ji ltar de rnams spyan drang
83b5(rgyud 'bum): bgyi/ / bcing ba 'dir ni ji lta bu// dbang bskur ba ni ji ltar sprul// de bzhin rig pa'i brtul zhugs gang // bdud rtsi lnga rnams ji ltar bza'// de bzhin dpa' bo lnga gang lags// dngos grub tha
83b6(rgyud 'bum): mal ji lta bu/ / de bzhin mchog kyang ji lta bu// de la thabs ni rnam pa du// de bzhin thabs byung ji lta bu// rnal 'byor rdo rje can kun gyi// bka' ni ji ltar bsgo bar bgyi// las kyi mchog go/
83b7(rgyud 'bum): tshogs rnams ni// sna tshogs ji ltar byed par 'gyur// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams kyis zhus pa'i tshig nye bar gsan nas/ byang chub
84a1(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' chen po rdo rje 'dzin pa la dmigs par mdzad nas skad cig cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' che// snying rje'i bdag nyid rab dga' nas// rdzogs
84a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sangs rgyas bde bar gshegs/ / mgon la yang dang yang rab bskul// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
84a3(rgyud 'bum): lus ngag yid ni rdo rje yis// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis// sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje la// bzhag nas byang chub sems dbang po// zhus pa rgya chen mnyan par gyis// de nas byang chub sems
84a4(rgyud 'bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis rjes su gsungs pa'i bka' spyi bos rab tu mnos te/ bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so//
84a5(rgyud 'bum): bde bar gshegs pa legs so legs so// zhes gsol nas/ rang rang gi lus dang / ngag dang / yid rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i sku dang / gsung dang /
84a6(rgyud 'bum): thugs rdo rje la dmigs te cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad rang rang gi thugs rdo rje chen po la dmigs par byin gyis brlabs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po
84a7(rgyud 'bum): de dag rnams la zhus pa de dag gsung gcig gis bka' stsal pa/ sku gsung thugs ni rnam pa gsum// gsang ba zhes ni bstan pa yin// sangs rgyas thams cad ces bya ba// tshogs pa 'dus pa
84b1(rgyud 'bum): yin par bshad/ / lnga pa dang ni dgu pa dang // bcu bdun pa dang bcu gsum pa// sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams kyis// bstan pa dag ni sgrub chen yin// bzhi pa dang ni bcu drug pa// brgyad
84b2(rgyud 'bum): bapa de bzhin bcu gnyis pa/ / slob dpon spyi yis las dang ni// dngos grub brtul zhugs sdom pa yin// drug pa dang ni gnyis pa dang // bcu pa dang ni bcu bzhi pa// drag spyod rjes su chags pa
84b3(rgyud 'bum): dang / / nye bar sgrub pa'i sdom pa'o// bdun pa dang ni gsum pa dang // bcu gcig pa dang bco lnga pa// dngos grub zhing dang mtshan sa ni// bsnyen pa sgrub pa'i sdom pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa kun
84b4(rgyud 'bum): gyi las/ / tshar gcod pan 'dogs spyod pa dag/ dul dang gdul dka' zhi ba yi// sems can rnams kyis 'jug pa'o// bskyed pa'i rim dang 'brel ba yi// bsnyen pa rdo rje cho ga bzhi// thun
84b5(rgyud 'bum): mong dngos grub 'brel ba yin/ / mchog tu gyur pa'i gzhung nyid do// dkyil 'khor brtul zhugs 'bral ba yi// gzhung ni slob dpon phun tshogs pa'o// bla mas sngags kyi lam gyis ni// slob ma
84b6(rgyud 'bum): yongs su smin bya ba/ / brtul zhugs bzang dang dbang bskur ba// rang gi slob ma bdag nyid che// sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams kyi// ston pas yongs su grol ba yin// thabs dang shes rab
84b7(rgyud 'bum): snyoms 'jug pa/ / rnal 'byor zhes ni bshad pa yin// gang zhig dngos med shes rab ste// thabs ni dngos po'i mtshan nyid do// rgyud ni rgyun zhes bya bar grags// rgyun de rnam pa gsum 'gyur te//
85a1(rgyud 'bum): gzhi dang de bzhin rang bzhin dang // mi 'phrogs pa yis rab phye ba// gzhi dang rang bzhin rgyu yin te// de bzhin mi 'phrogs 'bras bu'o// gzhi ni thabs zhes bya ba ste//
85a2(rgyud 'bum): gsum gyis rgyud kyi don bsdus pa'o// rigs ni lnga dang gsum dag dang // ngo bo nyid gcig rigs brgya'o// byang chub rdo rje bcas gsungs pa// de ni phyi ma'i rgyud du 'dod// de nyid rnam pa lnga ru
85a3(rgyud 'bum): bshad/ / gsang ba rnam pa gsum du bshad// lhag pa'i lha ni gsang chen te// dam pa'i rigs ni rnam pa brgya// thog ma tha ma med zhi ba// dngos dang dngos med mi zad gtso// stong nyid snying rje mi
85a4(rgyud 'bum): phyed pa/ / byang chub sems zhes bya ba yin// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis// mi phyed phye ba'i dngos po nyid// rig dang lhan cig ldan pas na// rig pa'i skyes bu zhes brjod do// rgyu lnga dang ni 'bras
85a5(rgyud 'bum): bu lnga/ / rdo rje zhes ni bshad pa yin// 'chang ba 'dzin zhes grags pa ste// rnam shes rdo rje 'dzin du 'dod// badz+ra d+h+r-ika ni rnam shes yin// yod dang med dang dbus las 'das// 'byung dang 'byung
85a6(rgyud 'bum): las gyur las byung / / sems can kun gyi lus yin te// skye las rgyal bas dzi na dzika/ don rnams thams cad 'byung bas na// sems ni rin po che zhes bya// tshor ba pos ni nges tshor bas// tshor ba rat+na
85a7(rgyud 'bum): d+h+r-ika tu brjod/ / mtshan gzhi mtshan nyid dngos po yis// kun la kun gyis thams cad du// dga' ba'i mtshan nyid mtshan gzhi ni// A ro lika ces bshad pa yin// rnam shes rab mthar phyin byed pa//
85b1(rgyud 'bum): gang yin de ni shes rab ste// 'du byed sems dpas 'dzin pas na// pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika ces bya bar bshad// rigs ni rgyud ces bya bar bshad// rgyud ni thog ma zhes brjod de// mi 'jig skye ba med gang yin//
85b2(rgyud 'bum): mgon po de ni yin par bshad// rgyu 'bras gnyis la sdang bas na// rnam shes zhe sdang yin par bshad// bems po bcings pa'i rang bzhin pas// gzugs ni gti mug ces byar bshad// bdag tu
85b3(rgyud 'bum): rlom pa'i ngo bo bas/ / tshor ba dregs pa yin par bshad// dngos la chags pa'i mtshan nyid can// 'du shes yang dag chags bdag nyid// rkyen gyis drangs pa'i bdag nyid can// 'du byed rtag tu
85b4(rgyud 'bum): phrag dog yin/ / byang chub sems kyi ngo bo nyid// srid pa kun 'byung thams cad du// 'dod chags zhe sdang rmongs ldan pa'i// sems ni 'dod pa zhes byar bshad// dam tshig sna tshogs 'dra ba
85b5(rgyud 'bum): yi mngon phyogs las las skyes 'bras bu/ / gnyis med ye shes chos rnams la// nga rgyal byed pa rmongs zhes bshad// de la phan tshun 'dzer ba ni// zhe sdang zhes ni bya bar bshad// mtshan nyid
85b6(rgyud 'bum): 'dod chags zhen pa yin/ / ye shes thabs ni rdo rjer bshad// dga' ba rdzogs pa'i longs spyod mchog/ bud med bde mchog phun sum tshogs// gti mug zhe sdang 'dod chags dang // rdo rje la
85b7(rgyud 'bum): dga' rtag par gnas/ / des na sangs rgyas rnams kyi thabs// rdo rje theg pa zhes bshad do// mi 'jigs bdag nyid chos rnams ni// ma skyes pa yi ngo bo nyid// dngos po kun gyi dam tshig ste/
86a1(rgyud 'bum): de nyid gshin rje mthar byed do// rnam shes min bdag chos rnams ni// don dam mi 'gyur dag gyur nyid// sems kun gyi ni dam tshig ste// des na rgyal ba shes mthar byed//
86a2(rgyud 'bum): brjod med bdag nyid chos rnams ni// ming dang gzugs blo dngos po med// chos rnams kun gyi dam tshig ste// des na khyab bdag pad mthar byed// mi rtog bdag nyid chos rnams ni// rang
86a3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gyis ni zhi ba'i dngos/ / rdo rje kun gyi dam tshig ste// des na gtso bo bgegs mthar byed// mi 'jig rnam par mi shes pa// brjod du med dang rtog bral ba// sangs rgyas byang chub ye
86a4(rgyud 'bum): shes 'di/ / shes na bde ba thob par 'gyur// gti mug gti mug longs spyod pas// gti mug zad phyir gshin rje gshed// des na lus mthar byed pa ste// des na shes bya mthar byed 'gyur// /
86a5(rgyud 'bum): nyes pa nyes pa longs spyod pas// nyes pa zad phyir shes mthar byed// des na sems ni mthar byed de// des na nyon mongs mthar byed 'gyur// 'dod chags 'dod chags longs spyod pas//
86a6(rgyud 'bum): 'dod chags zad pas pad mthar byed// des na 'dod chags mthar byed de// de bzhin snyoms 'jug mthar byed 'gyur// nyon mongs kun zad gang yin dang // de bzhin las ni thams
86a7(rgyud 'bum): cad zad/ / sgrib pa kun zad ye shes ni// bgegs mthar byed ces bya bar bshad// nyon mongs rdo rje sgrib dag na// las rnams thams cad rnam par dag/ las rnams thams cad rnam
86b1(rgyud 'bum): dag pas/ / las skyes 'bras bu rnam dag 'gyur// gzung dang chags pa nyid dang ni// rnam pa de bzhin mi g.yo dang // rgyu nyid 'bras bu nyid dag ste// drug las thugs ni kun tu 'byung //
86b2(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa'i rgyal po la sogs drug/ khro bo'i dbang por rnam par grags// dam tshig rdo rje la sogs drug/ sa la sogs pa rnam pa lnga// 'byung dang 'byung las gyur par grags// rig pa'i rgyal po
86b3(rgyud 'bum): zhes bshad do/ / gzugs kyi rdo rje la sogs drug/ rdo rje bdag po zhes bshad do// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las// bdag nyid chen po kun tu 'byung // thabs dang shes rab las byung ba'i//
86b4(rgyud 'bum): phung po khams dang skye mched gzugs// rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis// sngags pas sbyor ba nges byas la// thams cad dag par mos pa yis// 'jigs pa thams cad spangs nas su// /
86b5(rgyud 'bum): dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis ni// sngags pas seng ge bzhin du spyod// 'di la mi bya ci yang med// de bzhin mi bza' yod ma yin// smra bar mi bya cung zad med// rtag tu mi bsam ci yang med// /
86b6(rgyud 'bum): mnyam par ma gzhag sbyor ba yis// rtag pa nyid du mnyam par 'jog/ gang gis sems kun la spyod pa// kun tu spyod pa zhes bshad do// dbang po dang ni yul rnams kyi// rkyen gyis
86b7(rgyud 'bum): gang dang gang byung yid/ / yid de mAn zhes bya bar bshad// tra ni skyob par byed pa'i don// 'jig rten spyod las rnam grol bar// gang bshad dam tshig sdom pa ste// rdo rje kun gyis bsrungs pa ni//
87a1(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyi spyod pa zhes bshad do// rang rang gi ni ngo bo nyid// snying po yid kyis rnams bsams te// gsang sngags zlos pa'i dbye ba yis// zlos par byed cing spro
87a2(rgyud 'bum): zhing bsdu/ / sangs rgyas sna tshogs rdo rje bdag/ ye shes sa bon dag gis bsdu// byang chub bdag med sa bon gyis// brtul zhugs can gyis bdag med bzung // sna tshogs bzhin du sna
87a3(rgyud 'bum): tshogs spro/ / dus gsum sa bon dag gis bzla// bzlas pa smra bar grags pas na// ngag kun bzlas pa zhes bshad la// sngags kun 'bod pa zhes bshad de// de nyid bskul
87a4(rgyud 'bum): babar smra ba'o/ / ji ltar thugs sogs byin rlob pa// ting nge 'dzin kyang de bzhin no// de rnams spyi bor dbang bskur dang // de bzhin kun tu mchod pa'o// rdo rje 'chang ba gang yin
87a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i/ / rig pa yod pa'i sbyor ba dang // bdag byin brlabs sogs de bzhin te// de yi longs spyod bzhir shes bya// dpa' bo rdo rje gcig pu yi// spyi bor dbang bskur re re ste// snying po phyag
87a6(rgyud 'bum): rgya sngags tsam dag/ rang rigs rim gyis rgyas gdab bo// 'bras bus rgyu ni rgyas gdab cing // rgyu yis 'bras bu rgyas gdab par// sgom gyis gzhan du dngos grub ni// bskal pa bye/
87a7(rgyud 'bum): pabar 'byung mi 'gyur// longs spyod bzhi dang yang dag ldan// rig pa'i skyes bu rdo rje can// sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis// gru gsum du ni rnam par sgom// kun nas ser ba'i 'khor lo ni// rtsibs bcu
87b1(rgyud 'bum): de dbus rnam par sgom/ / rtsibs kun la ni khro bo bcu// ye shes bdag nyid bcu las byung // 'gog pa'i rdo rjes bsgom bya zhing // mchog tu mdzes pa bsgrub par bya// rdo rje 'bar ba'i sprin spros pas/
87b2(rgyud 'bum): mi g.yo ba dang mtshungs par 'khor// de ltar chos 'byung ye shes ni// rang bzhin dri ma med zhi ba// bsgoms pas skad cig nyid kyis ni// sangs rgyas spyan ni rab tu 'byung // rdo rje can gyis chos bstan
87b3(rgyud 'bum): pa nga rim pa gnyis la yang dag brten/ / bskyed pa yi ni rim nyid dang // de bzhin rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o// sgrub pa rang ni nan tan dang // dam tshig de bzhin sdom pa rnams// sngar ni de kun rgyas par ni//
87b4(rgyud 'bum): rim pa'i dbye bas phye ba yis// gzugs dang sgra sogs 'dod pa ni// bde sdug gnyis ka'i bdag nyid can// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug sogs// rtag tu snying las skye bar 'gyur// chags la 'dod
87b5(rgyud 'bum): chags rdo rje can/ / rdo rje 'dra bar rin chen 'byung // rin chen bzhin du dam tshig shes// 'dod pa de rnams dam tshig mtshungs// rnam bcas dang ni rnam pa med// kun 'gro yi ge gsum bdag nyid//
87b6(rgyud 'bum): bya ba dang ni dbrog pa dang // spro dang rang gi bzlas pa bya'o// de ltar zhe sdang gti mug dag/ sa gsum du ni bskyed par bya// gsang ba dag la rgyas gdab cing // rdo rje can gyi don byed do// zhe sdang sbyor
87b7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rnal 'byor pas/ / zhe sdang 'khor lo bskyed nas su// rdo rje drag pos bcom nas ni// ye shes rdo rje can gyis bsdu// de ni spro bas bsdu byas la// de bzhin slar yang bsdu bar bya'o// 'di lta'i
88a1(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba goms byas na/ / zhe sdang rdo rjer bdag nyid 'gyur// khams gsum po ni ma lus pa// gsad dang de bzhin gso ba dang // skad cig tsam gyis byed par ni// mngon du
88a2(rgyud 'bum): nus par the tsom med/ / gti mug sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor pas// gti mug 'khor lo bskyed nas ni// rgyan la sogs pa gang ci'ang rung // de dag thams cad rtag tu sku// gti mug sems kyi rgya mtsho
88a3(rgyud 'bum): sgom/ / rin chen kun gyis rab tu dgang // gti mug 'khor lo can kun gyis// sbyin pa'i cher ni rab tu 'bebs// rdzas rnams thams cad ma lus par// rab tu sbyin dang dbrog pa nyid// sems kyi rdo rje
88a4(rgyud 'bum): brtan po yis/ / skad cig tsam gyis byed par 'gyur// 'dod chags sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor pas// 'dod chags 'khor lo bskyed nas ni// lha mo thams cad phrogs nas su// 'dod pa'i sbyor bas 'dod pa
88a5(rgyud 'bum): spyod/ / dga' sdug bde ba rangs pa yis// 'dod pa'i rtsed mor rnam par 'phrul// de nas 'khor lo can kun la// lha mo rab tu dbul bar bya// khams gsum dag tu byung ba yi// lha dang lha min chung ma yang //
88a6(rgyud 'bum): skad cig tsam gyis 'dod spyod na// mi yi bud med smos ci dgos// dkyil 'khor dang ni dbang bskur dang // las mchog gi ni tshogs rnams dag/ nyams su len cing byin rlob pa// grub pa'i bgrod pa gzhan
88a7(rgyud 'bum): yin no/ / b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor zhes grags dang // byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor dang // lus kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bshad pa// gsum po dkyil 'khor yin par gsungs// phung po skye
88b1(rgyud 'bum): mched khams rnams ni/ / sangs rgyas thams cad rgyas btab pa'o// de ni rtag par rgya dgod pa// dkyil 'khor zhes ni bstan pa yin// 'dod rgyal dbyig sngon stobs mi g.yo// lcags
88b2(rgyud 'bum): kyu dbyig pa rtse gsum dang / / ral gri mtshams su rnam par dgod// steng du 'khor lo 'og gnod mdzes// rig rgyal rdo rje can rnams kyi// 'khor lo sgyur ba drug gi rgya// sa la sogs pa'i sems
88b3(rgyud 'bum): dpa' yi/ / phyag rgya rang gi dkyil 'khor pa// me long pi wang dung dang ni// de bzhin snod dang sna tshogs ras// chos 'byung ba yi phyag rgya drug/ rdo rje'i bdag po rdo rje can// sangs rgyas byang chub sems
88b4(rgyud 'bum): dpa' dang / / khro rgyal rnams kyis rgyas gdab bo// de nas gzhan yang dpa' bo gcig/ rigs ni kha dog dag gis brtag/ lha mo dgu dang nam mkha'i khams// me tog ces ni bshad pa yin// sku gsung
88b5(rgyud 'bum): thugs kyi dbye ba yis/ / rigs kyi rim gyis dgod par bya// mchod rten sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// bzhugs gnas pho brang yin par bshad// ye shes sems dpas gang reg pa// ye shes 'khor lo
88b6(rgyud 'bum): zhes bshad do/ / mi 'gyur rdo rje gsum yi ge/ sa bon yi ge gnas zhes bshad// sku gsung thugs kyi de nyid ni// sad par byas pas bskul bar bshad// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams rnams su//
88b7(rgyud 'bum): 'od zer 'gyed pa gtong ba'o// rdo rje can kun spyan 'dren pas// rdo rje can kun spyan drang ba'o// rdo rje can gyi gnas de yi// 'od zer gyis ni rdo rje kun// bsdus nas gong bu'i tshul gyis su// bcings
89a1(rgyud 'bum): pa bcing ba yin par bshad/ / sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// sku gsung thugs kyis rgyas btab ste// ri mo'i dkyil 'khor brtag
89a2(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / dbang bskur dbye ba rnam gsum du// rgyud 'di la ni rab tu brtag/ bum pa'i dbang bskur dang po ste// gnyis pa gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba// shes rab ye shes gsum pa ste//
89a3(rgyud 'bum): bzhi pa de yang de bzhin no// mig yangs sngags kyi snod du rung // me tog bcas shing sa bon byung // blangs nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba// sngags pas slob ma dag la sbyin// nam mkha'i
89a4(rgyud 'bum): dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ / dri chu rkang dang yang dag ldan// rdo rje pad+mo'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje can kun yang dag bsdu// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis// de dag thams cad snying khar bsdu// rdo rje'i
89a5(rgyud 'bum): lam nas byung nas su/ / slob ma'i khar ni dbab par bya// 'di ni gsang sngags de kun gyi// dbang bskur ba yi go 'phang mchog/ las mchog gi ni tshogs rnams dang // gsang sngags thams cad 'grub/
89a6(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur// mchog tu dad cing shes rab che// gzugs bzang sgrub pa po la dga'// sbyor ba gcig gis bya ba goms// dam tshig dag gi dam tshig can// bla ma la ni slob ma yis// yon rnams
89a7(rgyud 'bum): rab tu phul nas ni/ / bla mas de ni byin brlabs te// sgrub pa po la sbyin par bya// rmongs pas gti mug bdag nyid sbyor// gti mug dga' dang yang dag ldan// gti mug rgyan gyis dbang bskur na//
89b1(rgyud 'bum): gti mug rdo rjer bdag nyid 'gyur// zhe sdang sdang ba'i bdag nyid sbyor// zhe sdang dga' dang yang dag ldan// zhe sdang rgyun gyis dbang bskur na// zhe sdang rdo rjer bdag nyid 'gyur// chags la
89b2(rgyud 'bum): 'dod chags bdag nyid sbyor/ / 'dod chags dga' dang yang dag ldan// 'dod chags rgyun gyis dbang bskur na// 'dod chags rdo rjer bdag nyid 'gyur// shes rab ye shes bdag nyid sbyor//
89b3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje dga' dang yang dag ldan// ye shes rgyun gyis dbang bskur na// shes rab ye shes bdag nyid 'gyur// rig pa'i lha mo de nyid ni// rdo rje can gyi slob mas blang // lag par lag pa bzhag
89b4(rgyud 'bum): nas ni/ / de bzhin gshegs rnams dbang byas la// slob ma'i mgo bor lag bzhag ste// bla ma rdo rje can gyis bsgo// thabs gzhan gyi ni 'tshang mi rgya// de bas rig pa 'di mchog yin//
89b5(rgyud 'bum): chos kun gnyis su med pa la// dngos po gnyis su btags pa yin// de bas 'khor ba rnam bral ba// rtag tu khyod kyis mi bya'o// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rig pa'i brtul
89b6(rgyud 'bum): zhugs bla med pa'o/ / rmongs pa gang zhig 'das gyur na// de yi dngos grub mchog mi 'grub// tha mal lus kyi chos la ni// dri ma lnga rnams snang ba ni// ye shes lnga yis byin brlabs pas//
89b7(rgyud 'bum): bdud rtsi lnga zhes bya bar bshad// sbar dang de bzhin bsreg pa dang // snang bar bya dang gzugs snang ba// sngags kyi lus su rab sbyor bas// bdud rtsi lnga ni bza' bar bya// rdo rje hUM las byung ba ni//
90a1(rgyud 'bum): bar snang la gnas bsam par bya// AHlas byung ba'i pad+ma ni// de yi 'og tu bsgom par bya// oM gyis mtshan pa'i bdud rtsi ni// de yi dbus su gzhag par bya// rdo rje baH
90a2(rgyud 'bum): mnyam sbyor ba/ / 'bar bas rnal 'byor tshim par bya// shel dang mtshungs par snang gyur cing // ye shes nyi ma gnyis par 'gyur// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams rnams kyi// mtshon cha mchog
90a3(rgyud 'bum): gis drangs nas ni/ / bdud rtsi de ru phab nas kyang // bza' ba'i sbyor bar bza' bar bya// bsgrub bya'i dngos grub cho ga yis// de bzhin dpa' bo lnga rnams bza'// yig gsum sa bon las
90a4(rgyud 'bum): bskyed bya/ / gzhan du de ni 'grub mi 'grub// mi snang la sogs dngos grub ni// tha mal pa zhes bshad pa yin// sangs rgyas nyid sgrub sangs rgyas kyis// dngos grub mchog ces gsungs pa yin//
90a5(rgyud 'bum): thabs ni rnam pa bzhi po dag/ byang chub rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rnal 'byor rgyud ni thams cad du// rnal 'byor pa yis rtag par bsngags// bsnyen pa'i cho ga dang po ste// nye bar sgrub pa gnyi
90a6(rgyud 'bum): pa yin/ / sgrub pa yang ni gsum pa yin// sgrub pa chen po bzhi pa'o// thun mong mchog gi bye brag gis// bsnyen pa rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur// rdo rje bzhi po thun mong ste// ye shes bdud rtse mchog/
90a7(rgyud 'bum): yin no// dang po stong nyid byang chub ste// gnyis pa sa bon bsdus pa yin// gsum pa gzugs ni rdzogs pa ste// bzhi pa yi ge dgod pa'o// rdo rje rnam bzhi 'di dag gis// tha mal bsgrub la
90b1(rgyud 'bum): bsnyen pa bya/ / mchog ni ye shes bdud rtsi nyid// sbyor ba drug gis bya ba yin// bsnyen pa yan lag drug gis ni// byas pas sgrub pa mchog tu 'gyur// gzhan du bsgrubs par gyur na ni// dngos grub
90b2(rgyud 'bum): mchog ni 'byung mi 'gyur/ / so sor sdud dang bsam gtan dang // srog rtsol de bzhin 'dzin pa dang // rjes su dran dang ting 'dzin te// sbyor ba'i yan lag drug tu bshad// dbang po bcu po rnams
90b3(rgyud 'bum): kyi yang / / rang gi 'jug gnas thams cad du// 'dod pa so sor sdud pas na// so sor sdud pa zhes bshad do// 'dod pa lnga ni mdor bsdus nas// sangs rgyas lnga ru sbyor ba yis/ brtag
90b4(rgyud 'bum): pa bsam gtan zhes bshad de/ / bsam gtan de ni rnam lngar 'gyur// rtog dang dpyod dang dga' ba dang // de bzhin bde ba nyid dang yang // sems kyi rtse gcig nyid dag ste// lnga po der ni bsam
90b5(rgyud 'bum): gtan bsdu/ / gsang ba'i rgyud ni thams cad du// rnam pa du mar yongs bshad pa// gsang ba gsum byung rtog pa ste// de yi longs spyod dpyod pa'o// dga' dang 'dra ba gsum pa ste// bde bsdus
90b6(rgyud 'bum): pab ni bzhi pa'o/ / shes dang shes bya byung zad pa'i// rang sems lnga par shes par bya// sangs rgyas kun dngos zhi ba ni// 'dod pa kun la rab tu gnas// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin dbugs//
90b7(rgyud 'bum): 'byung ba lnga yi ngo bo nyid// gong bu'i gzugs kyis phyung nas ni// sna yi rtse mor rab tu brtag/ rin chen kha dog sna lnga pa// srog dang rtsol ba zhes byar bshad// rang sngags snying khar bsams nas ni//
91a1(rgyud 'bum): srog ni thig ler gyur par gzhag/ rang dbang rin chen dgag pa yi// gzung ba 'dzin pa yin par bshad// sems ni 'gog pa rdo rjer gyur// mtshan ma nyer 'dzin 'byung bar 'gyur/
91a2(rgyud 'bum): mtshan ma'i khams ni rnam pa lngar// byang chub rdo rjes gsungs pa yin// smig rgyu 'dra ba dang po ste// du ba lta bu gnyis pa yin// mkha' snang 'dra ba gsum pa ste// mar me ltar 'bar bzhi pa'o//
91a3(rgyud 'bum): sprin med nam mkha' lta bur ni// rtag tu snang ba lnga pa'o// brtan 'gyur rdo rje'i lam nas ni// nam mkha'i khams su spro bar bya// rjes dran gang zhig rnam sgom pa// de dang 'dra bar spro bar bya//
91a4(rgyud 'bum): rjes su dran pa zhes bshad de// so sor snang ba de la skye// thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug pas// dngos po thams cad mdor bsdus pa// gong bu'i tshul gyis bsdus nas ni// dbus
91a5(rgyud 'bum): su gzugs ni rnam par sgom/ / yid kyis ye shes rdzogs byed pa// ting nge 'dzin ces bya bar gnas// so sor sdud la snyoms 'jug na// sngags rnams thams cad byin gyis rlob// bsam
91a6(rgyud 'bum): gtan ye shes snyoms 'jug na/ / mngon shes lnga po thob par 'gyur// srog dang rtsol bas nges par ni// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzigs// rtag tu 'dzin pa'i stobs kyis ni// rdo rje
91a7(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' yang dag 'jug/ rjes dran mnyam par sbyor ba yis// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'byung bar 'gyur// ting 'dzin dbang gyur tsam gyis ni// sgrib pa rnams dang bral bar 'gyur// snying po de ni
91b1(rgyud 'bum): thugs ka ru/ / zla ba rdo rje'i sbyor bas blta// mtshon cha mchog gis drangs nas ni// sems ni sngags kyi dngos bya ste// sngags kyi gzugs kyi tshul gyis ni// byang chub tshig bcad brjod par bya//
91b2(rgyud 'bum): cho ga yang dag sbyor sgom pas// rang gi dkyil 'khor la gnas te// sems de ye shes gzugs kyis ni// sgom pa nye bar sgrub pa'o// ji srid mthong ba de srid du// rnam gnyis zla ba drug tu
91b3(rgyud 'bum): sgom/ / 'dod pa kun la longs spyod pas// thams cad du ni rtag tu bya// gal te zla ba drug gis ni// ji skad gsungs pa ma mthong na// ji skad bshad pa'i cho ga dang // sdom pas lan gsum
91b4(rgyud 'bum): brtsam par bya/ / de ltar byas kyang sgrub pa pos// mthong ba 'byung bar ma gyur cing // gang tshe byang chub ma grub na// drag shul sbyor bas bsgrub par bya// de'i tshe de yi ye shes ni// 'grub pa
91b5(rgyud 'bum): nges par nye bar 'byung / / rigs kyi dbye ba'i sbyor bas ni// rdo rje phur bus phur bu gdab// de nas dbang du bya ba dang // bsrung ba'i sbyor ba dag kyang bya// 'dod chags chen po'i tshul gyis ni// ye shes
91b6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo can rnams bsdu/ / lha mo dgu ni spros nas su// bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la dgod// yongs su gyur las phyag rgya bzhi// dkyil 'khor der ni brtag par bya// bdag nyid dbus su gnas
91b7(rgyud 'bum): byas la/ / 'khor lo can kun bsdu bar bya// thams cad rdo rje'i dngos byas la// de 'og byang chub bsgom par bya// bskul ba'i glu dbyangs bzhi yis ni// lha mos snying po bskul ba yis// dus gsum rdo rje'i
92a1(rgyud 'bum): rang bzhin sems/ / ye shes lta bur lus sgom mo// bzhi yis kha dog rnam par dbye// de bzhin 'ams kyi snying po ste// dbang bskur bas ni rang gi rgyu// bzhi yis 'bras bu phye
92a2(rgyud 'bum): yin/ / sngags kyis chos ni byed 'gyur la// rig pa'ang chos kyi phyag rgyas so// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po drug/ gtsug tor zhes ni rnam par grags// rdzu 'phrul chen po'i longs spyod bzhi// rig
92a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rgyal mo zhes byar grags/ / de bzhin rdo rje'i bdag po rnams// 'dod pa thams cad ces byar bshad// bsam gtan rdo rjes thams cad la// dbang bskur ba ni rab tu bsngags// cho ga'i
92a4(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ / ye shes lus dang lhan cig tu// sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje yis// gnyis su med par byed sgrub pa// sngar bshad pa yi rim gyis ni// rig pa'i skyes bu rdo rje can//
92a5(rgyud 'bum): bdag dang 'dra bar dkyil 'khor bskyed// sgrub pa chen po zhes bshad do// bsnyen pa'i dus su gtsug tor che// sbyor ba nyid kyi gzugs su dmigs// nye bar sgrub pa'i dus su ni// bdud rtsi
92a6(rgyud 'bum): 'khyil ba'i gzugs kyi bar/ / sngags pa cho ga shes pa yis// sgrub pa rang lha'i sbyor bas bya// sgrub pa chen po'i dus su ni// gtso bo sangs rgyas bdag po'i sku// 'di ni rdo rje can kun dang /
92a7(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor mchog gi gsang ba che// de lta'i rnam phyes shes byas nas// dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya// gzhan du bskal pa bye bas ni// sangs rgyas skyob pa rnams kyis kyang // dngos grub
92b1(rgyud 'bum): mchog ni zhi ba dag/ nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bsgrub bya sgrub par yang dag sbyor// gang yin de ni bsnyen par bshad// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor ba// nye bar sgrub pa zhes bshad do// yi ge hUM
92b2(rgyud 'bum): dang phaT ldan pa/ / bskyod pa sgrub pa zhes bshad la// ngo bo nyid ni zhi de ba// sgrub pa chen po zhes bshad do// bcom ldan sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag/ rdo rje 'chang ba chen po'i gnas// sangs
92b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyas kun gyi thabs las byung / / de nyid chos rnams chos nyid do// las dang rjes 'thun gang gang gis// rnal 'byor pa yis sbyor ba dmigs// dkyil 'khor de dang de bskyed nas// dam tshig mi
92b4(rgyud 'bum): zad bsgom par bya/ / sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis// dam tshig dang po bsrung bar bya// de nas gtsug tor dam tshig ni// cho ga ji skad gsungs las byung // las dang gang gang ces 'thun pas//
92b5(rgyud 'bum): rang gi 'khor la bka' yang bsgo// bsgrub bya'i las gang yin pa la'ang // dkyil 'khor rnam par bsgoms nas su// de yi lus gnas 'khor lo la// de yi nyes pa bsgrag par bya// de nas
92b6(rgyud 'bum): de rnams de bcom nas/ / byung bar gyur par rnam par sgom// dngos po kun gyis rnam bsgoms nas// dngos po kun gyis drangs nas ni// de ni rang gi 'khor lor gzhug/ ji skad gsungs pa'i rdzas
92b7(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis/ / de yi gzugs brnyan byas nas ni// khro bas khyab pa'i sems kyis ni// rkang pas mtshan ma mnan par bya// de nas bka' mnos khro bo ni// sna tshogs tshogs kyis bskor ba rnams//
93a1(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa rdo rje can gyis ni// bsgrub bya gsad phyir gtang bar bya// khro za'i rgyal po des bskor nas// de ni bcings shing brdeg pa dang // de nas brdungs shing skrag gyur pa/
93a2(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa pos ni dgug par bya// rdo rje gsum gyi sngags kyis ni// de yi gzugs brnyan la phab nas// sngags pas rdo rje dag gis ni// spyi bo mgrin pa snying kha ru// phur bu'i sngags kyis phur bu gdab//
93a3(rgyud 'bum): yams dang nye bar 'tshe ba kun// sna tshogs yul las byung ba rnams// gzugs de la ni phab nas su// de rnams kyi ni phur bus gdab// de nas sbyor ba thams cad kyis// cho ga ji skad gsungs pa
93a4(rgyud 'bum): bzhin/ / 'khrul 'khor sngags kyi sbyor la sogs// las kyi dbye bas sbyar bar bya// mtshan ma mnan nas bzlas pa 'am// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg gam// bsgoms pas gdug pa'i
93a5(rgyud 'bum): sems can ni/ / zos par gyur par rab tu brtag/ zhi la zhi ba'i sems kyis bya// rgyas la dga' ba'i yid kyis te// dbang la chags pa'i yid du bya// khro ba gtum pas rab tu bsgrub// ces pa'o//
93a6(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams kyi the tsom thams cad bcad par mdzad nas/ the tsom thams cad gcod
93a7(rgyud 'bum): par mdzad pa sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje la zhugs te/ de nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs la dmigs nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
93b1(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis bstod do// thams cad sku khyod phyag 'tshal lo// thams cad gsung la phyag
93b2(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal 'dud/ / thams cad thugs khyod phyag 'tshal lo// thams cad mdzad la phyag 'tshal 'dud// sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje yi// sku gsung thugs ni thob 'gyur bas// sems can
93b3(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas mi mnyam mnyam/ / bsgrub bya su yin sgrub po gang // sgrub pa'i dbang po bdag nyid che// sangs rgyas thams cad gsod pa yis// ji ltar sdig pas gos mi 'gyur// gal te gos
93b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur 'bras bu gang / / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams la legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ sems
93b5(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po legs so legs/ / bdag nyid chen po legs so legs// gsung dbyangs chen po legs so legs// mchod pa chen po legs so legs// slob dpon byang chub rdo rje can/
93b6(rgyud 'bum): dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag/ dngos rnams thams cad sgyu ma bzhin// bskyed dang sdud par mdzad pa po// des na de yi sdig mi 'byung // bsod nams dag kyang de bzhin te// gang
93b7(rgyud 'bum): la sdig dang bsod nams med/ / de ni byang chub yin par gsungs// mgon po de yi bslu ba yis// lus can thams cad 'jig mdzad kyang // ngan 'gror skye bar mi 'gyur zhing // byang chub kyang ni
94a1(rgyud 'bum): rnyed mi dka'/ / sngon ni mi bzad las byas pas// gal te dmyal ba rnams su ni// skye bo skye 'gyur de rnams kyi// dmyal ba rnams kyi 'bras bu che// byang chub rdo rjes
94a2(rgyud 'bum): bsgrub bya 'di/ / ye shes kyis ni rgyas btab pas// sems can rnams kyis sbyor ba des// mchog tu phan btags shes par bya// tshar gcod pa dang rjes gzung las// bdag nyid chen po
94a3(rgyud 'bum): de yis bya/ / sgrub pa chen po'i mthar thug par// byas nas las rnams brtsam par bya// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams rdo rje can gyi thugs rje chen po'i tshul gyis chos
94a4(rgyud 'bum): thos pas dga' zhing rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis legs so zhes gsol te/ mgon po chen po legs so legs// thub pa chen po legs so legs// chos rnams chen po legs so legs//
94a5(rgyud 'bum): thugs rje chen po legs so legs// e ma'o kun tu bzang po yi// thugs rje chen po dri ma med// gdug pa mi bzad las kyis kyang // sangs rgyas nyid kyi 'bras bu stsol// de nas de bzhin
94a6(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang
94a7(rgyud 'bum): bskur ba'i gsang ba 'dus par dbang bskur ba'i sngags pas 'jigs par mi bya zhing / skrag par yang mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub rdo rje las byung ba// zhe sdang rdo rje che la sogs//
94b1(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyi rgyud ni bsdus pa dag/ yongs su spang bar mi bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la
94b2(rgyud 'bum): mgrin gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa 'dis mngon par bstod do/ / dus gsum rdo rje'i thugs yin srid dang thar gyur gang // zhi zhing sgrib med nam mkha' dag pa'i ngo bo nyid// sangs
94b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyas rnam rgyas byang chub dbang phyug rdo rje can/ / de la lus ngag yid kyis rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo// gang zhig gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes 'du byed dang // rnam par shes dang skye mched
94b4(rgyud 'bum): dug dang dbang po drug/ sa chu ma dang rlung dang nam mkha' thams cad ni// byang chub sems 'dra rgya chen de la phyag 'tshal lo// gti mug nyes pa 'dod chags rdo rje chos bcas gang /
94b5(rgyud 'bum): rig pa'i sbyor ba las byung rtag tu rab 'brel bar// rnam pa sna tshogs dga' bas myos pa'i dngos gyur pa// byang chub sems 'dra rgya chen de la phyag 'tshal lo// spro dang dga' dang rnam pa
94b6(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin mi 'gyur dang / / rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rang bzhin sems su rjes thogs chos/ rmongs dang zhe sdang 'dod chags sgrib pa rdo rje ste// byang chub sems 'dra rgya chen de la phyag 'tshal lo//
94b7(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig thog med dngos po rnam dag 'di sgom pa// thabs dang shes rab las byung spros dang rnam par bral// gsang ba'i dbang bskur brtul zhugs dam tshig sbyor ba rtag/ byang chub rdo rje 'drar
95a1(rgyud 'bum): blta de la rtag phyag 'tshal/ / gang zhig dngos grub mchog gi thabs ni 'di sgom zhing // bsnyen pa'i cho ga nye bar sgrub dang sgrub pa dang // sgrub pa chen pos blo mi 'gyur
95a2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i sgrub dbang po/ / byang chub rdo rje 'drar blta de la rtag phyag 'tshal// gang zhig thun bzhi'i rdo rje dag ni sgrub byed pa// mi snang la sogs sna tshogs mchog dang dman 'grub cing // bla ma
95a3(rgyud 'bum): drin gyis 'di na ma nor lam rtogs pa/ / byang chub rdo rje 'drar blta de la rtag phyag 'tshal// gang zhig gsang 'dus pa'i rgyud 'di nyan pa dang // 'don par byed dang klog pa dang ni sems
95a4(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / / mchod par byed pa dang ni 'dri 'am 'drir 'jug pa// byang chub rdo rje 'drar blta de la rtag phyag 'tshal// gang du zhi sogs las tshegs shin tu brtags pa yis// 'khrul
95a5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor sngags kyi cho ga de bzhin rgyas 'debs pa'i/ / bsgrub bya 'di dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa'i dbang po ni// byang chub rdo rje 'drar blta de la rtag phyag 'tshal// gang gis gtso bo sgrub pa
95a6(rgyud 'bum): po mthong reg pa dang / / reg par dran dang ming tsam nges pas thos pa dang // dad par byed cing phyogs gcig tsam zhig 'dzin pa dag/ byang chub rdo rje 'drar blta de la rtag phyag 'tshal
95a7(rgyud 'bum): bstod pa'i tshig ni zhi ba 'dis/ / 'dren pa kun la bstod pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' mchod chen la// mgon po de dag rjes yi rang // 'dus pa gsang ba las byung ba// de bzhin
95b1(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa kun gyi gsang / / rgyud kun bdag po'i dbang po yis// rgyud 'di legs par gsungs pa yin// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dang / byang chub sems
95b2(rgyud 'bum): dpa' de dag thams cad kyis de skad ces gsungs nas/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje la bzhugs te/ sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i sku dang / gsung dang / thugs
95b3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje la dmigs te cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba chen po gsang ba 'dus pa las/ gsang ba thams cad ston pa rdo rje'i
95b4(rgyud 'bum): ye shes kyis byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba le'u ste bco brgyad pa rdzogs so/ / / rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsar+ya shrad+d+ha ka ra barma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba dge slong rin chen bzang
95b5(rgyud 'bum): pos bsgyur cing bcos te gtan la phab pa'o/ / / rgya gar skad du/ sad+d+hi byA ka ra Na nA ma tan+t+ra/ bod skad du dgongs pa lung bstan pa
95b6(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// de nyid 'di skad bdag gis thos// shin tu gsal ba'i dus gcig na// gsang gtso rdo rje bcom ldan 'das
95b7(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig mchog ni rdo rje gsum/ / de bzhin gshegs kun ye shes ni// yon tan phun tshogs bsam mi khyab// yod med mtha' gnyis las 'das pas// gnas med pa la gnas zhes bya// nam mkha'
96a1(rgyud 'bum): rang bzhin gcig pa 'dir/ / kun mkhyen ye shes rnam bsgom pa// 'gro snying rnam dag ces bya la// thub pa chen po bzhugs pa yin// ma rig pa dang 'du byed dang // rnam par shes dang
96a2(rgyud 'bum): ming dang gzugs/ / skye mched drug dang reg pa dang // tshor ba dang ni sred pa dang // nyer len srid pa skye ba dang // rga shi zhes bya rig ma yin// nga rgyal che ba'i nga rgyal dang // nga'o snyam nga rgyal mngon pa rgyal//
96a3(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang nga rgyal las nga rgyal// cung zad nga rgyal log par bcas// 'di dag rdo rje mtha' can mchog/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// de rnams brjod mi lang ba'i grangs// brjod kyis
96a4(rgyud 'bum): mi lang nyid du gyur/ / sangs rgyas zhing ni grangs med pa'i// ri rab rdul phran grangs mnyam pa// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// til gyi gang bu mtshungs pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa
96a5(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis kyang / / nam mkha'i khams kun gang bar snang // de nas dpal ldan rnam snang mdzad// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas// de nyid gsum skyes skur
96a6(rgyud 'bum): mdzad do/ / tshangs pa khyab 'jug lha chen dang // 'dod dang rig byed de bzhin zung // tshangs lha de bzhin zla ba ste// phung po la sogs grangs dang mnyam// sgra sgrogs de bzhin dga' byed dang // skya bsing
96a7(rgyud 'bum): skem byed thub pa dang / / sna yon dang ni dkon mchog gsum// de bzhin gshegs kun gcig pu nyid// de tshe phyung la gsol ba yi// gsang sngags gsungs pa dang po nyid// thub chen byang chub sems
96b1(rgyud 'bum): tshul du/ / mdzad pa gnyis pa yin par bshad// rnam lnga mngon par byang chub pa'i// phra mo rnal 'byor gsum pa yin// dbang bskur ba ni rnam pa bzhi// gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid bzhi pa/
96b2(rgyud 'bum): srung ba'i bslab bzhi rnam bzhi dang // spyod pa'ang 'dir ni lnga pa ste// drug pa rang sangs rgyas nyid kyi// ting 'dzin phra mo'i rnal 'byor ro// bdun pa de nyid mchod par bshad// gsang ba'i dbang
96b3(rgyud 'bum): du gtso bos mdzad/ / phyag rgyas dbang bskur brgyad pa bstan// dam tshig bzhi po dgu pa yin// rnam pa bcur phye yang dag rtog/ bzlas pa'i sngags kyang gsungs pa yin// bcu gcig ming du byung
96b4(rgyud 'bum): ba ni/ / phyag rgya gcig par bshad dkyil 'khor// bcu gnyis pa yi bdag nyid sku// nyan thos byang chub ston par mdzad// de bzhin rig pa spyod grub pa// mngon shes lnga ni bcu gsum pa// bcu
96b5(rgyud 'bum): dang bzhi par bzhi po dang / / 'phreng sngags bla ma ston par mdzad// phyogs dang skya bseng nyid gyur pa// dngos grub dkyil 'khor bu med pa'o// sgra sgrogs dus dang yang dag ldan// dkyil 'khor rdul tshom
96b6(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa'o/ / slob ma dbang bskur nyi zla dag/ chags bral sna tshogs nyid gyur pa// sna tshogs tshig gi don gyi brda// sna tshogs ming can ming gcig pu// de ltar rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i// so sor sdud pa
96b7(rgyud 'bum): rab tu bstan/ / gcig dang du ma las grol ba// yang dag mthong nas yongs su bsgom// yongs su bsgoms par gyur pa'i bdag/ rten 'brel du yang bstan par bya// de nas ma skyes sbyor ba la/ thub
97a1(rgyud 'bum): pa rnam pa snang mdzad che/ / rten 'brel yan lag bcu gnyis pa'i// ting 'dzin de 'og ston par mdzad// 'dod pa'i yan lag 'gro ba'i tshogs// gnyis pa thams cad de
97a2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs/ / 'dod chags che tshul zhes bya ba'i// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs// de bzhin gshegs kun gtso bo yi// rang gi sku la zhugs par mdzad// byang chub sems dpa'
97a3(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' che/ / rgyun de la ni sbyor bar gyur// de nas de bzhin gshegs kun dang // de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' rnams// de bzhin gshegs bdag mnyes bya'i phyir// de rnams
97a4(rgyud 'bum): zhugs nas byung gyur pa/ / srog dang gyen rgyu thur sel dang // mnyam gnas khyab byed ces bya dang // klu dang rus sbal rtsangs pa dang // lha sbyin gzhu rgyal zhes bya ba// 'di dag tu ni nyid sku mdzad//
97a5(rgyud 'bum): bud med gzugs su slar sprul te// rang gi ngo bo ji bzhin du// de yi sku las byung bar gyur// de nyid gsum ni mnyam sbyor las// rang gi gsang sngags de dag bsgom// yan lag kun las
97a6(rgyud 'bum): nges grol zhing / / shin tu phra ba nyid du gyur// dbu dgos ming las byung ba ni// zhi gnas dang ni lhag mthong ste// dngos med ngo bo nyid yin pas// rang nyid kyang ni mi shes so//
97a7(rgyud 'bum): 'on kyang 'di ltar thub pa la// de bzhin gshegs rnams gsol ba 'debs// bcom ldan dgongs pa lung bstan pa// chos kyi mchog ni bstan du gsol// khyab bdag khyed ni chos 'di
97b1(rgyud 'bum): rnams/ / dngos med nyid ni thugs su chud// 'gro ba'i don ni rab grub pas// yid bzhin nor bu lta bur mdzes// gang zhig yang dag shes gyur na// 'jig rten pa dang rtsod med cing //
97b2(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin 'jig rten 'das pa dang // 'jig rten shin tu 'das de bzhin// gang 'di zhi ba nyid kyi chos// zhi gnas shin tu sngon 'gro ba// byang chub sems dpas thos na yang // de bzhin nyid
97b3(rgyud 'bum): kyi bde ba byed/ / de nas sa snying la sogs pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// mgon po rnam snang chen po la// de dag gis ni zhus gyur pa// gang shes bla med byang chub ni//
97b4(rgyud 'bum): ma 'ongs skye bos thos 'gyur ba'i// gsang sngags de nyid don 'byung ba// rnal 'byor bcom ldan bshad du gsol// lan gnyis gsol yang mgon po ni// mi gsung bar ni rnam par bzhugs//
97b5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje can gyis de shes nas// de nas slar yang zhus par gyur// gang 'di zhi gnas la sogs pa'i// rnal 'byor zab mo bra med pa// 'di ni 'di ltar sngags pas bsngags// 'tshal
97b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur de ni gtso bos gsungs/ / bya ba dag bya'i rnal 'byor dang // rnal 'byor 'ba' zhig pa nyid dang // lung ni yang dag gang yin pa// de ni bstan par mdzad pa'i rigs// zhus
97b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i don ni mkhyen nas ni/ / bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// gsang sngags tshul ni mchog 'gyur 'di// gsang ba khyod la bstan par bya// 'di skad ces bya'i gsang sngags che//
98a1(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags kun don sngar ster ba'o// der ni lnga yi bdag gyur cing // sbyor ba bzhi dang bcu yi bdag/ lnga pa lnga po'i ming 'di ni// gsal dang mi gsal dag tu sbyar/
98a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyu mngon phyogs pa'i sbyor bshad pa// dkyil 'khor lnga yis brgyan pa yin// bcu bdun zhes ni bshad pa 'di'i// gsungs pa'i don de ma shes pas// sngags pas gsang sngags sbyor ba dag
98a3(rgyud 'bum): detshe ji ltar byed par 'gyur/ / don 'di rtogs par gyur nas ni// sna tshogs don ni ston pa dang // 'gro ba'i don ni rab sgrub pa// gsang sngags rig pa mchog rnams byed// bdag ni stong dang yang
98a4(rgyud 'bum): dag sbyar/ / yi ge a ni steng du gnas// phye ma zhes bya gnas byas la// sngags pas sems can don rnams bya// yi ge a gnyis sbyor ba gang // a sgo las skyes nyid du 'gyur// steng 'og phyogs
98a5(rgyud 'bum): kyi rnam pa de/ / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid// gang zhig 'di las gsungs pa ni// bsam mi khyab pa'i thabs chos nyid// bdag gis zhes rtogs de 'gyur ba// thogs med rtog pa 'di gnas so// /
98a6(rgyud 'bum): ston pa po dang bstan dang gnas// phra rab tsam gyi ngo bo nyid// kun rdzob dus gsum sbyor gcig la// sngags pa rnams kyis thos de 'gyur// shin tu grangs med bskal pa ru// sangs rgyas rnams
98a7(rgyud 'bum): kyis gang mkhyen pa/ / sngags pa rnams kyis dus gcig na// skad cig la rdzogs byang chub thob// kun mkhyen kun rig thugs chud pa// gsang sngags ston pa'i chos can te// de nyid kho na bcom ldan
98b1(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ sku gsung thugs rdo rje las skyes// mi rtog nam mkha' ji bzhin de// gsang sngags thams cad nyi ma 'dra// sa la rlung bzhin sngags pa ni// 'dod pa kun la nye bar spyod// thams cad 'gyur/
98b2(rgyud 'bum): ba gang gang yin// de de stong pa nyid du 'gyur// de bzhin sbyor ba de mthong bas// kun rig de ni de bzhin gshegs// de bzhin nyid gzugs brnyan gyur pa// de ni sku yi rdo rjer gyur// 'gro ba yang
98b3(rgyud 'bum): dag tshim par 'byung / / mi phyed gsung gi rdo rjer gyur// nam mkha'i gnas kyi sbyor ba gang // bsam mi khyab par spro bdag nyid// de nyid ye shes rgya mtsho la// thugs kyi rdo rje yang dag 'byung //
98b4(rgyud 'bum): sems can kun gyi sems gang yin// nam mkha' yongs su brtag pa ste// de yang de ru kun gnas pas// bud med chos gcig pu yi gzugs// sangs rgyas kun gyis gang brten pa//
98b5(rgyud 'bum): sar gyur de ni bcu gsum pa// de ni bud med ces bshad de// de bas chos de b+ha ga yin// bya ba la sogs ji skad bshad// dam tshig gsum po gcig tu gyur// dngos med chos nyid gcig
98b6(rgyud 'bum): pu ru/ / 'di ni de dag mnyam par 'gyur// dam tshig sku gsung thugs dang ni// ting 'dzin de bzhin rgyal ba dang // sa dang chu dang de bzhin me// rlung dang nam mkha' nyid dag dang // gzugs
98b7(rgyud 'bum): dang sgra dang dri dang ro/ / reg dang de bzhin chos kyi dbyings// 'di rnams rdo rje'i mtha' can byung // byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che// de ltar brjod mi lang zhes pa// brjod mi lang ba nyid
99a1(rgyud 'bum): gyur rnams/ / sangs rgyas zhing gi ri rab kyi// rdul phran gyi ni grangs mnyam pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' sems chen dang // nam mkha' mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs//
99a2(rgyud 'bum): mi bskyod rnam snang mdzad rin chen// dpag med tshe dang gdon mi za// 'di dag nam mkha'i khams mnyam pa'i// rdo rje snying po de bzhin gshegs// dper na til 'bru mtshud pa yi// de bzhin gshegs
99a3(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyis/ / nam mkha'i khams ni yongs khengs pa// de rnams der ni yang dag snang // de nas mgon po rnam snang mdzad// de bzhin nyid dang gcig tu gyur// gang yang dam tshig sngon 'gro
99a4(rgyud 'bum): dang / / sku rdo rje sogs ming can gyis// byang chub sems dpa' sems chen dang // don yod thams cad de bzhin gshegs// 'di rnams sku yi yan lag grags// zhi gnas bsam mi khyab
99a5(rgyud 'bum): las byung / / ma skyes gcig pu gzigs pa ni// 'dod chags chen po'i tshul du gyur// 'dod chags chen po'i tshul mchog gi/ ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi tshogs// de ni de bzhin gshes
99a6(rgyud 'bum): pa kun/ / de ni rnam par snang mdzad che// 'di nyid mnyes par bya ba'i phyir// nyid sku bud med nyid du mdzad// de nas mgon po bsam yas las// bud med gzugs su byung bar gyur// de ni
99a7(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas spyan 'dra dang / / mA ma kI 'dra sbyor ba dang // gos dkar mo 'dra'i gzugs dang ni// sgrol ma'i gzugs su yang dag gnas// sgra yi ngo bo'i gzugs can dang // dri yi ngo bo'i gzugs
99b1(rgyud 'bum): dang ni/ / de bzhin ro yi ngo bo'i gzugs// reg gi ngo bo'i gzugs can dang // la la gzugs kyi ngo bo yis// de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams bzhugs// de nas tshul gsum don gcig
99b2(rgyud 'bum): dang / / mi bskyod pa yang bstan phyir dang // 'jig rten rgyang 'phan gdul don du// 'jig rten 'das pa'i tshul byung ngo // gnyis med mnyam pa nyid rnal 'byor// rdo rje bud med b+ha ga mchog/
99b3(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor du// de ni mi bskyod yang dag bri// zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// sbyor bzhi gcig tu sbyor ba nyid// dri ma med par byin brlabs pa// kun nas shin tu gsal
99b4(rgyud 'bum): ba'i gzugs/ / sangs rgyas sprin gyis kun tu khyab// 'bar ba mang pos rnam par 'khrug/ gsal ba la sogs dkyil 'khor ldan// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// de nas de ni
99b5(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das/ / de bzhin gshegs kun bdag po 'di// dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su yang // rnam par gzhag ste bzhugs par gyur// mi bskyod rin chen dpag med dang // don
99b6(rgyud 'bum): grub rnam snang de bzhin gshegs/ / de rnams byang chub sems rdo rje'i// thugs la rnam par bzhugs par gyur// de rnams zil gyis mnan pa'i phyir// de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems//
99b7(rgyud 'bum): dngos med ngo bor gcig par ni// mkha' 'dra rdo rje las byung gzigs// shes rab ting 'dzin gzhi gcig pu// de ni grib ma ltar thugs chud// rdo rje'i rang bzhin skur mdzad nas// 'gro don mnyam
100a1(rgyud 'bum): dang mi mnyam mdzad/ / ji ltar mtshams gnas nyi ma yis// 'gro ba gnyid log sad par gyur// de bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa kun// byang chub sems kyis sad par
100a2(rgyud 'bum): byed/ / sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje gcig/ de rnams skye bar bzhed pa yis// byang chub sems kyi ngo bo yis// rdo rje'i sngags su mdzad par gyur// rig pa skyes bu'i gzugs dag ni// sngags kyis
100a3(rgyud 'bum): byin rlabs bla na med/ / der ni zhal gsum pa lta bur// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gzigs// de nas mgon po bcom ldan gyis// thugs rjes bzhugs pa las byung ste// byang chub sems ni
100a4(rgyud 'bum): rab bskor la/ / lan gsum ched du brjod pa mdzad// bsam mi khyab cing dpag med gang // de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // rdo rje byang chub sems gcig las// spyod yul der ni gyur pa yin//
100a5(rgyud 'bum): de nas gsang tshul thos pa dang // de 'og gsang ba'i bdag pos ni// khyab bdag rnam par snang mdzad la// ji bzhin tshul du de btud zhus// phung po khams la sogs pa'i chos// 'dus la gang zhig
100a6(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa'i rnams/ / rten 'brel las skyes yin par ni// khyed chos ston par mdzad pas khums// dman pa'i chos rnams 'di dag ni// zhe sdang la sogs rkyen dang ldan// 'di dag ji ltar bde gshegs dang // /
100a7(rgyud 'bum): rdzu 'phrul chen po rigs ma lags// byang chub sems dpa' sems chen de// lus la sogs pa ji ltar 'gyur// gang zhig phyi dus skye bo yis// 'di dag 'tshal bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje
100b1(rgyud 'bum): can/ / 'od chen ldan pas bka' stsal pa// ma 'ongs skye bo mthong nas ni// gang zhig khyod kyis 'dris pa// legs so legs so sems dpa' che// gsang ba'i bdag po khyod legs so// smras don ji
100b2(rgyud 'bum): lta ji lta bar/ / de ltar khyod la lung bstan bya// ma 'ongs dus na mi rnams ni// 'jig rten rgyang 'phan mchog gzhol 'gyur// log par lta ba la gnas te// ci dga' bar yang spyod par byed//
100b3(rgyud 'bum): la la glu dang gar la dga'// rgod dang sgeg la mchog tu gzhol// dri dang 'phreng ba la dga' zhing // de bzhin 'khrig pa la dgar 'gyur// rmongs pa la la sdang ba dang // de bzhin gti mug
100b4(rgyud 'bum): la rab gzhol/ / la la de bzhin 'dod chags zhe na// shes pa gzhan dag 'dod par 'gyur// nya dang sha dang de bzhin chang // bshang gci khu ba khrag rnams ni// skyes bu glen pa za byed cing //
100b5(rgyud 'bum): med par smra ba chos su sgrogs// ma dang sring mo la sogs pa// bgrod min la ni bgrod pa dang // pha dang ma yang gsod pa dang // de bzhin srog chags gzhan rnams gsod// brdzun gyi tshig nyid smra
100b6(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / / khyad par du yang rku ba dang // gzhan gyi chung ma'i thad 'gro zhing // smad pa gzhan yang byed par 'gyur// la la dam chos spong ba dang // de bzhin mtshams med byed pa ste// sna tshogs
100b7(rgyud 'bum): sdig pa byas nas kyang / / sngags pa dngos grub 'dod par 'gyur// gzer nad dug dang sbyar ba'i dug/ sna tshogs nad ni mi bzad pa// 'di rnams kyis ni gzir gyur nas// zhi ba nyid ni 'dod par
101a1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / 'dor bar byed pa rmongs pa de// mi bzad sdig pa byas pa dang // log par lta la mchog gzhol rnams// ngan song gsum du 'gro bar 'gyur// de rnams rjes su gzung
101a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i phyir/ / gsang ba 'di ltar bstan pa yin// gang zhig yang dag thob pa nyid// 'dir ni de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur// gsang ba'i bdag po mkhas rnams kyis// tshul mchog 'di ni rnyed gyur
101a3(rgyud 'bum): nas/ / don gsal yang dag rnyed pa dang // de yang nga rgyal dag tu ltung // de rnams ting 'dzin zhi nyid dang // shes rab nyid kyang shin tu ring // rab tu dga' dang ldan pa yis// rnal 'byor pa ni
101a4(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid ces/ / mngon pa'i nga rgyal la rtag dga'// rgyu dang bcos ma'i chos dang ldan// mya ngan 'das dang gzhan 'gro ba// phan tshun dag ni sun yang 'byin// gsang sngags smra ba la brten nas//
101a5(rgyud 'bum): gcig la gcig ni rtsod par 'gyur// de rnams bdud kyi byin rlabs kyis// gal te dngos grub phra thob na// des ni mngon par nga rgyal bas// mkhas pa snyam du shes par 'gyur// tshogs pa'i nang
101a6(rgyud 'bum): du rtsod pa dang / / khyi bzhin kha zas la spyod yul// rang las 'bras las byung ba yi// phan pa la ni gnod pa byed// de rnams dge dang mi dge rnams// bdag cag rnams kyi stobs yin zer// mngon sum
101a7(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas 'dra ba yi/ / slob dpon smod cing bsnyen bkur med// skad cig gcig gis sdang byed cing // de la skad cig gis rjes chags// khyi dang phag dang khwa rnams kyi// spyod pa dag ni ston par byed//
101b1(rgyud 'bum): de rnams phan tshun rnam 'tshe bar// mngon par dga' bar byed par 'gyur// gsang ba 'dus pa mi shes par// dam tshig la sogs byed par 'gyur// gsang ba srung bar mi byed par// thams cad du ni ston par
101b2(rgyud 'bum): byed/ / 'jig rten la ni smad byas nas// gzhan dag la ni rab gsal byed// bdag nyid rtsa ba med pa ni// dam tshig 'das par byed par 'gyur// sgra bcas spror ldan gyis bskul bas//
101b3(rgyud 'bum): rang la rang gis glags rnyed med// de nyid ye shes 'byung ba yi// ting 'dzin de yis shes mi 'gyur// nyes pa cung zad tsam gyi phyir// mngon spyod rab tu byed par 'gyur// rnal 'byor rab sbyor
101b4(rgyud 'bum): dman pa yi/ / sngags pa rnams ni 'grub mi 'gyur// phyi rol bstan bcos la rtag dga'// de yi sbyor la gcig tu mkhas// rang gi dam tshig yongs spangs nas// lcags kyu med pa bzhin du
101b5(rgyud 'bum): spyod/ / sngags dang phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yis// de rnams 'tsho ba bsgrub par 'gyur// gang du rnyed pa thob 'gyur bar// dam tshig chos ni ston par byed// de rnams yang dag sdud byed pa'i// gsang
101b6(rgyud 'bum): ba dgongs pas bshad pa yin/ / dam tshig nyams te gnas pa rnams// 'di yis thams cad dgug par bya// rang gi rjes rig mi shes na// de rnams zhi bar ga la 'gyur// de bas rjes su gzung
101b7(rgyud 'bum): don du/ / tshul 'di dag ni gyur pa yin// de nas bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs// gcig tu 'dus par gyur nas su// de bzhin gshegs kun bdag po la// rang mchod de nyid dam tshig sprin//
102a1(rgyud 'bum): yang dag 'byung bas legs mchod de// phyag 'tshal nas ni 'di skad gsol// de bzhin gshegs pa gsang ba mchog/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun bsdus pa// 'dus
102a2(rgyud 'bum): pa gnyis med rnal 'byor pa'i/ / nyams dga' rdo rje snying po 'di// de nyid bsdus pa rnams kyi mchog/ de nyid bcom ldan pa shad du gsol// de nas de bzhin gshegs kun la// bcom
102a3(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das kyis slar gsungs pa/ / gang yang 'di ltar gsol 'debs pa// de bzhin gshegs rnams legs so legs// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs rnams kyang // the tshom skye bar
102a4(rgyud 'bum): byed yin na/ / byang chub sems gzhan ci smos shes// de bzhin gshegs de rnams la gsungs// de nas ngo mtshar rmad byung nas// the tsom thams cad gcod mdzad pa'i// bcom
102a5(rgyud 'bum): ldan de bzhin gshegs kun gyi/ / bdag po la ni 'di skad zhus// bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs kun gyis// yon tan kun gyis phul phyung yang // gtso bo 'dir ni ston mdzad par//
102a6(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar spro ba mnga' ma gyur// byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas mdzad de// de bzhin gshegs yid bde la sogs// ye shes rgyu 'bras thob pa'i phyir// de ni yang dag bshad du gsol//
102a7(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs kun bdag po ni// de rnams zhu bar mkhyen nas su// ye shes sgron ma rdo rje grags// ting 'dzin zhe sdang rigs 'byung ba// gtso bos mi bskyod snying po ni// sku gsung
102b1(rgyud 'bum): thugs ni dpal ldan pas/ / de nas yang dag phyung ba ni// badz+ra d+h+r-ika ces bya ba'i sngags// de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// zhe sdang rigs byung las skyes pa// de ni rig pa skyes bur
102b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / mi bskyod rgya chen thabs kyis sbyor// zhal gsum gnag dang dkar dang dmar// bdag nyid chen po de zhal yin// rdo rje gsum 'dir de bzhin gshegs// bzhugs pa ye
102b3(rgyud 'bum): shes zhes bya'o/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs bdag po// dam tshig 'byung rdor zhes bya yi// ting nge 'dzin la gtso bo ni// snyoms par zhugs pa nyid du mdzod// de nas dzi na dzika ces pa'i//
102b4(rgyud 'bum): snying po de bzhin yang dag phyung // de nas gsungs pa tsam gyis kyang // gti mug rigs byung las skyes pa// rig bcas skyes bur gyur pa ni// rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs// dkar
102b5(rgyud 'bum): dang gnag dang dmar bcas pa'i/ / zhal gyis mdun du bzhugs par gyur// de nas rin chen byung ba yi// dpal zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la// snyoms par zhugs nas bder gshegs kun// bde
102b6(rgyud 'bum): dang yid bder gyur pa'i phyir/ / yid bzhin nor bu rin chen rigs// de bzhin gshegs kun bdag po 'di// de nas rat+na d+h+rika ces bya'i// snying po dpal ldan de tshe phyung // de ni phyung ba tsam gyis ni// /
102b7(rgyud 'bum): rigs dang bcas pa'i skyes bur gyur// ser dang dkar dang gnag pa yi// zhal dang rin chen 'byung ldan ni// rdo rje gsum gyi bdag po yi// lho phyogs logs su bzhugs par gyur// de yang
103a1(rgyud 'bum): byang du gzigs gyur te/ / mnyam nyid ye shes zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan bdag po de// rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig bdag/ 'dod chags chen po las byung ba// rdo rje
103a2(rgyud 'bum): zhes ni bya ba yi/ / ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te// 'dod chags chen po'i rigs las byung // A ro lika ces bya snying po// rdo rje gsum las de nas phyung // de nas phyung ba tsam gyis ni// de 'og
103a3(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan gtso bo ni/ / rigs dang bcas pa'i skyes bur gyur// 'jig rten dbang po 'od dang mtshungs// dmar dang dkar dang gnag pa'i zhal// dpal ldan rigs chen po yi bdag/ de bzhin
103a4(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa'i bdag po yi/ / nub phyogs su ni bzhugs par gyur// de nas bcom ldan sna tshogs pa// don yod dam tshig ces bya ba'i// ting 'dzin rdo rje yang dag phyung // gtso bo de la snyoms
103a5(rgyud 'bum): zhugs nas/ / snying po mchog gi mchog ces bya'o// dam tshig rnams ni dgug pa'i rigs// snying po pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika ces pa// rdo rje gsum zhes bya las 'byung // de nas phyung ba tsam gyis ni// don yod rdorje
103a6(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba yi/ / de nyid mgon po bcom ldan 'das// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// rigs dang bcas pa'i skyes bur gyur// ljang dang gnag dang dkar ba'i zhal// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag
103a7(rgyud 'bum): yid dbyang phyogs su ni bzhugs par gyur/ / zhe sdang gti mug rigs dang ni// de bzhin yid bzhin rin chen dang // 'dod chags dam tshig ces bya ba// 'dod dang thar pa rab bsgrubs pa'o// de nas khyab
103b1(rgyud 'bum): 'dzi/ 'do chags das tshig 'byung ba yi zhing nge 'dzin su rloms zhugs / rdo rje 'dzin pa btsun mo s+ho// thA k+shas gyul gi rdzas/ da
103b2(rgyud 'bum): sa can thamagasas pa/ ma zhes kyi sa yang dag bsha/ don de bzhin gshegs bdag po// ga bya lam btsun so na so// sra dang gsung dang thugs pa byung
103b3(rgyud 'bum): hUM zhes byar grags/ / rig pa skyes bu zhes bya ba'i// de ni bud me gzugs 'dzin nas// zhal gsum lta bu'i gzugs kyis ni// ma ye phyogs su rnam par bzhugs// de nas rjes
103b4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje lags/ / sku gsung thugs rdo rje las byung // ting nge 'dzin la snyoms 'jug ste// rdo rje gsus las byung ba ni// de ni mo par 'i u0f7f// gang phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang / rig ba t
103b5(rgyud 'bum): ha byung ba ste/ / zhal gsum tha'i nas 'byor sa// gnyis med mnyas pa'i rnal 'byor pas// sangs rgyas kun gyi yid 'ong zhig/ gsang ba bsdus pa'i sbyor ba yis// bden thal phyogs
103b6(rgyud 'bum): rnam par bzhugs/ / denas rjes gas rjen/ tha 'ad+mo rjeg la skyes// ting nge 'dzin pa snyoms grags nas// bde ba chen po byung ba ni// 'di skad dag zung // nam
103b7(rgyud 'bum): mthugapa can te/ / gtso ba phung me gzugs 'dzin pa// nani rig pa skyes par gyur// gos med pa shes las byung ba// rdo rje gsum kyidam tshig sog/ de bzhin gi gsas pa'i du pa
104a1(rgyud 'bum): rlung gi phyogs su rnam par bzhugs/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das bdag po// rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig can// bslu ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs
104a2(rgyud 'bum): nas/ / de bzhin gshegs kun btsun mo mchog/ zhal gsum lta bu'i gzugs can ma// badz+ra ra ti zhes bya ba// rdo rje gsum las phyung bar 'gyur// de ni phyung ma thag tu yang // gtso bo
104a3(rgyud 'bum): rig ma skyes bur gyur/ / bud med kyi ni gzugs 'dzin te// dbang ldan phyogs su rnam par bzhugs// de nas bcom ldan mgon po de// rnam snang rdo rje las byung ba'i// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
104a4(rgyud 'bum): zhugs te/ / sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje la// dkyil 'khor 'dir ni gshin rje gshed// khro bo chen po phyung ba dang // phyung nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// bsnyungs par bya ba'i shar phyogs
104a5(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs/ / de nas bdag po bcom ldan 'das// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// mngon byung rdo rje zhes bya yi// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te// khro bo chen po phyung ba ni// pradz+nyAn+ta krita
104a6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje can/ / de nas dpal ldan phyung ba ni// rig pa skyes bur yang dag phyung // dkyil 'khor chen po'i sbyor ba las// 'od chen phung bu'i gzugs lta bu// rdo rje dam tshig bsnyengs byed pa// lho yi
104a7(rgyud 'bum): sgor ni rnam par bzhugs/ / de nas rin chen 'byung gnas grags// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te// gsung gi dkyil 'khor kun gyi gtsor// rdo rje gsum las khro bo che// pad+mAn+ta kr-ita 'od po che//
104b1(rgyud 'bum): bdag po de nas phyung bar gyur// de nas phyung ba tsam gyis 'dir// gtso bo'i rig pa skyes bur bcas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi'ang // gsung gi tshul du rnam sprul zhing // gos med
104b2(rgyud 'bum): ye shes bla med pa/ / nub kyi sgor ni bzhugs par gyur// bcom ldan de nyid sna tshogs pa// thugs kyi rdo rje ting 'dzin la// kun nas snyoms par zhugs nas ni// de nas gtso bos phyung bar gyur//
104b3(rgyud 'bum): khro bo chen po rnam phyung ba// kun nas bgegs mthar byed pa ste// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis// byang gi sgor ni rnam par bzhugs// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin// dkyil 'khor
104b4(rgyud 'bum): mchog 'di thos pa dang / / mgon po rnam par snang mdzad che// de la slar yang zhus gyur pa// mkha' dang dbyer med sbyor gcig cing // dngos med de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// dga' ba'i
104b5(rgyud 'bum): mchog sogs bgyis nas ni/ / ji ltar de rnams zhu bar 'gyur// 'di dag thog mtha' yod min na// 'di yi gtso bo ji ltar 'gyur// phyogs kyi cha rnams bzhag pa la// 'di ni gang gis
104b6(rgyud 'bum): rnam par sbyang / / gsang ba 'di ni mi srid ces// theg pa gsum po rtog pa dang // so so'i skye bo'i tshig gis kyang // spang ba dag kyang bgyid par 'gyur// gang zhig nyan thos rnams dang ni//
104b7(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin mdo sde las spangs pa'i// zhe sdang sogs dang 'dod lnga sogs// de bzhin gshegs rnams bsten mdzad pa// rjes su spyod dang thun mong ba'i// bya ba de dag phyin ci log/ dga' mtha'i
105a1(rgyud 'bum): spyod pa de rnams ni/ / de bzhin gshegs de rnams mdzad pa// tshig gcig la ni dpag med don// gsang ba dam pa 'di dag ni// mgon po gang zhig ma 'ongs pa'i// skye bos
105a2(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar 'tshal bar 'gyur/ / de nas bcom ldan bka' stsal pa// phyag na rdo rje tshul 'di ni// dgongs pa gsang ba bla med pa// dris pa rnams ni bshad par bya// zhe sdang gti mug de bzhin chags//
105a3(rgyud 'bum): lus la sogs pa'i phung po lnga// 'di dag bdag med rtogs nas ni// rdzogs sangs rgyas ni tshul gsum gnas// pha ni zhi gnas yin zhes bya// ma ni lhag mthong yin par bshad// de bzhin nyid
105a4(rgyud 'bum): shes lus su gyur/ / zhi ba rnal 'byor pa yi zas// ji ltar bzo bos bder gshegs kyi// sku yi gzugs brnyan byas pa ltar// gang zhig sku lta bu yi sku// de bzhin gsung gi rnam pas gsung/
105a5(rgyud 'bum): thugs kyi rnam pas thugs su ni// zhi gnas la sogs pa las byung // phung po la sogs chos rnams ni// stong zhing rten 'brel las byung mthong // ye shes nyi ma shar ba'i gzugs// zhi las
105a6(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor pa rnams byed/ / de bas sku gsung thugs rdo rje// grib ma lta bur byung ba yin// de bzhin phung po khams la sogs// dam tshig gcig la rnam par gnas// de nas tshul gsum don gcig
105a7(rgyud 'bum): pa/ zhi gnas la sogs pa las byung // de nas rdo rje tshul yid 'ong // gsang ba'i bdag po mnyan par gyis// stong pa rten 'brel las byung bar// rnal 'byor pa yi rdo rje zhes// nam mkha' mtha' yas
105b1(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor ni/ / phung po la sogs chos byung ba// lus dang ngag sems kun rtog ni// phung po sogs byung 'byung las gyur// 'di dag dngos med yang dag sbyar// de las ting 'dzin skye bar 'gyur// /
105b2(rgyud 'bum): 'di dag ting 'dzin gnyis med sbyor// mi phyed rdo rje nyid du 'gyur// zab dang rgya chen rtog byang chub// de rtogs pas ni sems dpar gyur// 'di dag nam mkha' mtshungs gyur pa// chen po
105b3(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya shes byed pa'o/ / de la rtogs pa mtha' yas pa// rdo rje theg par ston pa yin// ting nge 'dzin ni de nyid las// rdo rje'i theg pa byung ba yin// 'di las 'jig rten 'das 'gyur zhing //
105b4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin 'jig rten shin tu 'das// dgongs don de bzhin nyid gcig pu// gsang ba 'jig rten pa zhes bshad// ma skyes pa las byung ba ni// kun rdzob dang ni don dam yin// bdud
105b5(rgyud 'bum): gyur lha yi bur bshad de/ / phung po nyon mongs 'chi bdag bcas// 'di las dngos med pas rgyal bas// rgyal ba'i rdo rjer rnam par bshad// lus sogs phyi yi phung por bshad//
