105b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ba/ / de rnams de bzhin yang dag dmigs// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams su 'gyur// ji ltar me long mtshungs gsal ba// dngos po kun gyi bdag nyid can// der ni bdag gis
106a1(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid mthong / / dkyil 'khor mchog 'gyur rnal 'byor pa// phung po de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur// de bzhin nyid las spro bya ba// chos kyi sku can rgyal ba
106a2(rgyud 'bum): yid mchod pa chen por de 'gyur ro/ / 'di ni spros dang bsdus pa dag/ de ni dga' bar yongs su grags// sems can gang zhig longs spyod cig/ de ni gsol 'debs zhes bshad do//
106a3(rgyud 'bum): yang dag shes rab thabs gnyis te// mkha' dbyings dbyer med rab sbyor ba'i// de ni 'dod chags che tshul 'gyur// rnal 'byor pa ni mngon bzhugs pa'o// rdo rje theg pa rnal 'byor cher//
106a4(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid nges par sbyor ba gang // dbang po thams cad bde skyed pa'i// yid bde ba ni skye bar 'gyur// zhal gsum rnam thar gsum du gang // mthong zhing de la phung po sogs// lha yi bdag
106a5(rgyud 'bum): nyid rig 'gyur ba/ / de nyid gsum du bshad pa yin// dngos med pa ni lam gyi mchog/ mya ngan 'das par gnyis med 'jug/ 'on kyang so sor 'gyur pa ste// chos kyi sku las zhe sdang 'gyur//
106a6(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan bdag po de nyid ni// de bzhin gangashegs pa'i rigs 'byung zhing // mya ngan 'das tshul rdo rje can// de nyid bdag po kun byed pa'o// dam tshig la sogs 'byung ba'i chos// rang gis
106a7(rgyud 'bum): rig par ma gyur kyang / / der ni gnas pa yang dag bshad// de ni gti mug de bzhin sems// gang gis ji ltar brtags chos kyis// longs spyod rdzogs zhes bya byed pa// de ni yid bzhin rin
106b1(rgyud 'bum): chen 'byung / / rin chen chen po'i rigs kyi gtso// de nyid bcom ldan 'dod chags ni// kun mkhyen ye shes las byung ba// gnas med gnas pa'i sbyor gyur pa// 'dod chags chen po'i

107a1(rgyud 'bum): 'byung / / nu zho zas kyis bu gso bzhin// srid pa gsum na bcom ldan gtso// sems can bsam dbang ji bzhin du// chos kyi bdud rtsis tshim par mdzad//

107b1(rgyud 'bum): gsung / / de 'dra'i tshul du sbyar nas ni// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// sku gsung thugs rdo rje can la// ched du brjod pa ched du brjod// e ma kun tu bzang po yi//

108a1(rgyud 'bum): mi bskyod de bzhin sems/ / kun gyi gnyis med mi zad pa'i// ye shes ting 'dzin snyoms zhugs te// byang chub sems ni 'di gsungs so// dngos po 'di dag ma
108a2(rgyud 'bum): skyes pas/ / phung por grags pa'i chos nyid med// nam mkha' lta bur blta dka' ba'i// bdag med byang chub ces bya'o// de nas bcom ldan dkon mchog dpal// bdag med rdo rje zhes bya ba'i//
108a3(rgyud 'bum): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// byang chub sems 'di rab tu gsungs// chos rnams thams cad dngos med cing // chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam spangs pa// bdag med chos las yang dag 'byung //
108a4(rgyud 'bum): byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// de nas 'od dpag med mtshan can// ye shes 'bar ba sgron rdo rje'i// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te// byang chub sems ni 'di gsungs so// ma skyes pa yi chos rnams la//

108a6(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems ni 'di gsungs so// chos 'di rang bzhin 'od gsal zhing // gzod nas dag pas mkha' dang mtshungs// byang chub med cing mngon rtogs med// byang chub sems ni yin par bshad// de nas

108b1(rgyud 'bum): mtshungs/ / gsang ba'i tshul ni 'di thos nas// dang po yi ni rtog pa skye// lus la sogs pa gsung sbyor bas// sems ni de rnams skyed par byed// yang dag byang chub du ma'i mthar// 'di la so /

108b3(rgyud 'bum): bar snang mdzad thub pa che/ / legs shes lan gsum gsungs nas ni// lag na rdo rje la 'di gsungs// rnam par mi rtog don de nyid// rab tu phye ste bshad par bya// tshig tu brjod pa dmigs
108b4(rgyud 'bum): par bshad/ / brda dang don dam pa yin no// rkyen dang nyan thos rnams kyis kyang // mdo dang gsang sngags spyod rnams kyis// de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa yi// byang chub sems
108b5(rgyud 'bum): 'di bla na med/ / de bzhin yang dag sbyor ba 'di// dgongs pa'i gsang ba tha na med// gnyis med dam tshig rdo rje dang // pad+ma de las skyed par byed// tshig tu brjod pa thun mong ste// sangs rgyas
108b6(rgyud 'bum): sku ni dmigs can yin/ / gsang sngags de nyid ces bya brda// de bzhin nyid ni don dam pa'o// dang po gcig ni dgu dbus na// gang zhig bcu yis ma bcings pa// de ni bcings med ces bya ste/
108b7(rgyud 'bum): de shes pa ni mchog gi gnas// dbyangs dang gsal byed yi ge ste// grangs dgu yi ni rjes 'jug pa// as bcings phan tshun sbyor ba las// gang gis shes te 'gro ba'i tha// gang zhig shes pa
109a1(rgyud 'bum): rnam grol ba/ / 'bras bu phun tshogs grub 'dod pa// de ni de nyid grub 'dod pa// gzugs med pa ni gzugs spangs pa// 'byung ba'i mtha' ni yang dag ldan// cha la sogs
109a2(rgyud 'bum): pa bcu drug gnas/ / lnga pa lnga dang yang dag ldan// bzhi ni gsum du nges par sbyar// yi ge aM bcas ring por bcas// yon tan sbyor sogs phyis dang mtshungs// thung ngu ma lus ngag tu 'grur
109a3(rgyud 'bum): gcig min du ma ma yin no/ / ya yi don gyis gang yang rung // bya ba'i dngos grub 'dod gyur pa// ra la sogs pa gsum nyid kyis// 'gro ba'i don la rab tu 'jug/ yi ge gang zhig sngar bshad
109a4(rgyud 'bum): dang / / gang yang mngon du phyogs pa rnams// bud med skyes pa ma ning ste// khams la sogs par rab tu brtag/ 'og nas steng du bcas par ni// shes nas blos ni nges par sbyar// drug bshad bzhi
109a5(rgyud 'bum): dang gsum dang gcig/ dngos med ngo bo gcig las byung // de ni ya sogs don sbyar na// dus gsum shes pa'ang 'byung bar 'gyur// mkhas pas sgyu ma mig 'khrul bzhin// 'gro ba rnams ni
109a6(rgyud 'bum): sgyu mthar bya/ / brjod pa yi ni sngags 'di dag/ dngos med ngo bo las byung ba// de ni yongs su gyur pa'i gzugs// lha ru nye bar mtshon pa gang // brda yis de nyid gsum gnas pa// rang bzhin
109a7(rgyud 'bum): bzlas pa'i mtshan nyid do/ / ming med brjod du med pa ste// byang chub sems mchog 'di yin no// gsum po de nyid gcig gyur pa// 'gro ba med cing 'ong ba med// 'gag med rab tu zhi ba ste// rtag dang
109b1(rgyud 'bum): chad pa rnams spangs pa/ / dus gsum mkhyen pas ma byas pa'i// rtog pa nam mkha' dbyer med mtshan// 'di nyid kho na don dam ste// so sor rang rig mtshan nyid do// de 'di sems can kun zhes
109b2(rgyud 'bum): bya'i/ / sangs rgyas byang chub ngo bo nyid// byang chub sems gcig yang dag 'byung // rten cing 'brel 'byung rang bzhin can// gang 'di byang chub sems dag nyid// rnal 'byor pa ni nyid 'drar 'gyur//
109b3(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni rnam rtog kun bral yang // rigs kun la ni 'jug par 'gyur// sreg dang skems dang bde can dang // kun zar 'jug pa'i me bzhin no// 'di ni lhas kyang mchod bya bar// sems can kun la
109b4(rgyud 'bum): rnam par gnas/ / byang chub sems 'dod bdag nyid de// 'dra ba bu gcig bzhin lta zhing // gang zhig bdag dang mnyam gnas pa// byams pa chen po de bskyed bya// phyin ci ma log 'di mthong nas//
109b5(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems ni yang dag 'byung // des ni snying rje cher gyur nas// des ni 'khor ba nges par 'joms// sems can kun dang de bzhin bdag/ byang chub sems las ma mthong na// 'on kyang 'gro ba'i
109b6(rgyud 'bum): don byed pa/ / de las dga' ba skye bar 'gyur// 'khor ba dngos po yod min la// sems can rnams kyang de dang 'dra// byang chub sems ni mthong nas ni// btang snyoms chen por gyur pa yin// de nas
109b7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje 'dzin pa yis/ / thos pa'i byang chub sems dran zhing // slar yang de don mtshan nyid ni// rnam par snang mdzad che la zhus// 'khor dang cig shos zhes bya ba// 'di kun byang chub sems yin na/
110a1(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar so sor gyur nas ni// phan tshun 'gal bar rab tu gnas// bdag nyid kyis ni bdag nyid la// gnyis su 'gog byed gang yang med// gang zhig nor bu gcig
110a2(rgyud 'bum): las byung / / mi mthun phyogs su ji ltar snang // dman dang bar ma de bzhin mchog/ 'khor bar nyon mongs mi bzad pas// sems can kha cig gzir ba dang // byang chub sems la'ang sbyar
110a3(rgyud 'bum): bar gyur/ / de lta'i rnam rtog kun rtog par// ma 'ongs skye bo bgyid 'gyur gyi// rten cing 'brel 'byung las byung ba// 'di dag 'tshal bar mi 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa'i chos rnams la//
110a4(rgyud 'bum): byis pa rnams ni brtsod par 'gyur// de rnams rtsod pa med pa'i phyir// dgongs pa bshad par mdzad du gsol// de nas bdag po bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje can la gsang dgongs pa// shin tu
110a5(rgyud 'bum): rnyed dka' byang chub sems/ / 'di ni yang dag bka' stsal to// phyi ma'i mtha' gang stong pa gcig/ sngon gyi mthar thug de bzhin te// sems de mngon du byas nas ni// ci dga' bar ni bya ba
110a6(rgyud 'bum): yin/ / sems ni de yis ma mthong bas// lta ba so sor gyur pa yin// de bas de rnams 'khor pa ru// 'gro ba drug gi ming du gyur// des na tshangs pa khyab 'jug dang // dbang phyug che la kun
110a7(rgyud 'bum): tu brten/ / zla ba nyi ma bya ba yi// kun tu spyod pa de rnams byed// sum cu rtsa gsum par bshad dang // dga' ldan gyi ni gnas dag dang // de bzhin gzhan dag dmyal bar yang // lta bas skad cig
110b1(rgyud 'bum): dag gis 'gro/ / yi dgas su yang 'gro ba dang // 'gro ba sna tshogs dag tu 'gro// gang tshe ma rig kun brten pas// bdag nyid kyang ni mi shes so// 'du shes can dang 'du shes med// sems
110b2(rgyud 'bum): can du brtags 'di gnas pa/ / de rnams rlung las byung ba ste// rlung las slar yang 'gag pa yin// nyin dang mtshan mo'i cha yis kyang // rang gi rnam par rtog par ltung // de nas 'khor bar skrag
110b3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du/ / sna tshogs 'gro bar de dag 'gro// mi rtog pa yi sems de ni// 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor gnas gyur kyang // di ni phyin ci log gyur pas// khyi dang ce spyad glang po dang // sems de ltar yang
110b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gro bar 'gyur/ / de bzhin du ni phag nyid dang // mi yi rigs ni smig mkhan dang // sme sha can dang rigs ngan dang // bza' dang mi bza' bya kun tu// byang chub sems de skye bar 'gyur// bram
110b5(rgyud 'bum): ze la sogs 'jig rten shes/ / byang chub sems las 'byung bar 'gyur// phung sogs dngos po med 'gyur las// rang gi myong ba shes par 'gyur// de ni 'jig rten shes zhes bshad// 'jig rten pa ni
110b6(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems/ / nye bar dmigs pa'i sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas sku ru 'di 'byung ste// sgyu ma lta bu'i rang bzhin nyid// tshig gis brjod pa tsam du 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can// rdo rje snying
110b7(rgyud 'bum): po'i don gsungs pa/ / 'gro ba'i bla ma gcig pu la// phyag 'tshal nas ni slar gsol pa// 'jig rten pa yi lung nyid ni// byang chub sems ni rab gsungs nas// ji ltar 'jig rten las 'das pa/
111a1(rgyud 'bum): ma 'ongs pa yis ji ltar rtogs// lta ba thams cad rab spang phyir// khyed kyi chos rnams ston mdzad na// ji ltar byang chub sems de nyid// lta ba de ni rab bstan 'gyur//
111a2(rgyud 'bum): dgongs pa'i tshig la rmongs pa rnams// gsungs pa'i don ni ma rtogs nas// gsungs pa 'di las gzhan min zhes// de ni ji bzhin slar 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan sna tshogs pas// lag
111a3(rgyud 'bum): na rdo rje la gsungs pa/ / khyed gsung dgongs pa ma rtogs pa// 'dri bar byed pa legs so zhes// byang chub sems ni rlung gyur cing // nam mkha' la ni rnam gnas pa// sems can kun gyi srog
111a4(rgyud 'bum): gyur gang / / lnga yi bdag nyid bcu ming can// rten 'brel bcu gnyis zhes grags pa// ngo bo nyid rnam gsum du 'gyur// rlung zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems// dbang po kun gyi gtso 'di yin//
111a5(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar mi mngon phra ba las// rtag tu gsal bar brjod pa yin// 'gro ba yul sogs las byed pa// 'dir ni de la brten pa yin// zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang // dbang dang de bzhin mngon spyod
111a6(rgyud 'bum): rnams/ / de nyid gsum gnas la brten nas// de kun byang chub sems kyi byed// ji srid 'jig rten btags pa dang // de bzhin btags pa sna tshogs rnams// rnam rtog byang chub sems
111a7(rgyud 'bum): zhes pa'i/ / rlung las rtag tu 'byung ba yin// bde sdug la sogs chos rnams kyi// sa bon lta bur bshad pa yin// byang chub sems kyi ngo bo 'di// phung sogs gnyis med mkha' dang mnyam// /
111b1(rgyud 'bum): shes rab thabs dang sbyor ba yis// byang chub sems ni 'gro bar 'gyur// klog dang bsam gtan rnam spangs par// bdag por bdag nyid zlos pa de// nyin dang mtshan mo'i dbye ba yis//
111b2(rgyud 'bum): nyi zla rab tu sbyor ba yis// dngos po med par 'gro khyab pa// byang chub sems kyi rlung gcig pu// dge dang mi dge 'bras spangs nas// nam mkha' 'dra bar 'gyur ba yin// 'gro ba'i don ni
111b3(rgyud 'bum): shes pas kyang / / ming ni de bzhin nyid ces bya// dbyangs kyi thung ngu nyin mor bshad// ring po mtshan mo yin par bshad// dbyangs dang gsal byed dbye ba las// de nyid ming las sbyar bar bya//
111b4(rgyud 'bum): e ma'o 'gro ba'i bya ba byung // de nyid gzhan las de nyid gsal// de las 'jig rten pa yi brda// myur du mngon par shes par 'gyur// de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos ni// byang chub sems 'di
111b5(rgyud 'bum): thos pa dang / / gtso bo rnam snang chen po las// khyab bdag la ni slar gsol pa// sems can thams cad skyed pa po// sna tshogs gzugs can sems 'di ni// de bas dngos po med gyur kyang //
111b6(rgyud 'bum): srid pa dag tu rab tu grags// byang chub sems ni mkha' mnyam pa// legs par rjes su myong mdzad pa// 'gro ba'i don ni mdzad pa po// skye bo mchog la de bstan gsol// sgrub pa yi ni thabs tsas
111b7(rgyud 'bum): zhig/ shes nas rgyud la rgyab kyis phyogs// 'di ltar bdag ni slob dpon zhes// ma 'ongs pa na smra bar 'gyur// bdag gi tshig ni 'di nyid dag/ yin zhes smra zhing byas pa'ajig/ des ni dgongs
112a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i byang chub sems/ / ji bzhin don du mi shes so// de bzhin 'jig rten pa rnams ni// skal med chos kun rnams spangs la// rig pa yang ni mi mthong bas// de rnams la
112a2(rgyud 'bum): yang gnas med 'gyur/ / de bas byang chub sems bdud rtsi// de ni smra bar rigs pa yin// 'brel ba'i nyi ma thob pa ni// ma 'ongs pa na 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan sna tshogs pas//
112a3(rgyud 'bum): grags ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa las/ byang chub sems kyis nges pa'i don// slar yang de nyid la gsungs pa// nang na ma yin phyi rol min// gnyis ka ming du'ang 'gyur ma yin// rtag pa ma
112a4(rgyud 'bum): yin skad cig min/ / de ni so so rang rig yin// mi rtog nam mkha' ji bzhin du/ byang chub sems ni rdo rje 'dzin// de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba'i don// yid bzhin nor bu lta bur byung // 'das
112a5(rgyud 'bum): dang ma 'ongs pa nyid dang / / da ltar zhes ni bya ba dang // sangs rgyas sku yang 'byung 'gyur ba// don dam gcig ni kun rdzob yin// rig byed dus dang me yi sgra// nyi zla rlung gi gzugs can te// bzhi
112a6(rgyud 'bum): byed gsum pa dag las byung / / byang chub sems gcig dbye ba nyid// de ni shes rab thabs zung 'brel// de bzhin bde byed 'dzin pa dang // ha ni so la gnas pa yang // gnas skabs ji snyed de
112a7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du/ / ming ni yod pa ma yin pa// de 'di byang chub sems su 'gyur// rdo rje nang du zhugs gyur pa// bsam bya'i snying po'ang de nyid yin// lhod pa gnas zhes bya ba ni// tshag drag bcas pa'i rlung
112b1(rgyud 'bum): yin no/ / rang nyid lhod par byed pa'i mchog/ de ni srog dbang yid kyang yin// nga rgyal dang ni de bzhin tho// de dang ldan pa byang chub sems// bzhir grags cha las yang dag byung // yod med rab tu zhi ba cam/
112b2(rgyud 'bum): dngos po med pa'i sems 'di ni// rang rig gcig pu'i spyod yul yin// de nyid don ni rig byed pa// dgongs pas yang dag bshad pa yin// de nas gsang ba'i dgongs pa 'di// chos kyi yi ge mchog
112b3(rgyud 'bum): thos nas/ / byams pa zhes la sogs pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// ngo mtshar rmad byung legs skyes nas// ched du brjod pa ched du brjod// e ma'o sangs rgyas e ma'o chos//
112b4(rgyud 'bum): e ma'o chos ni ston mdzad pa// dngos kun dag pa'i don gcig pu// dag pa'i de nyid don dag ste// rnam par mi rtog mkha' mtshungs bshad// byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag med chos las
112b5(rgyud 'bum): yang dag byung / / byang chub tshogs ni rdzogs byed pa// ngo bo med cing dmigs su med// byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo// kun bzang gcig las yang dag byung // dgongs don byang chub ster ba po// /
112b6(rgyud 'bum): byang chub spyod mchog rdo rje mchog/ byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo// dag pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pa// rdo rje gsum ni rang bzhin gcig/ byang chub sems
112b7(rgyud 'bum): la phyag 'tshal lo/ / dgongs pa lung ston la dad par// gang gis yid ni bzod gyur pa// dam tshig gsum gyi rdo rje las// des ni de bzhin bya ba yin// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/
112'a1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje gsum gyi gsang ba las// yang dag byang chub sems bshad ga/ le'u gnyis pa yin par bshad// de nas de nyid gsang rdo rje// gsum
112'a2(rgyud 'bum): dang tshul gsum lam gsum mchog/ rnam thar gsum dang dkon mchog gsum// de bzhin gshegs pa kun bdag po// de bzhin gshegs pa kun bkod pa// 'phro ba'i sprin gyi rdo rje dang //
112'a3(rgyud 'bum): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te// de nas rdo rje 'dzin la gsungs// rdo rje dkod pa mchog 'di yi// le'u brtul zhugs bzang po nyon// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa kun// phra mo rnal 'byor
112'a4(rgyud 'bum): / dag pa zhugs// oM ni gcig dang yang dag ldan// shU n+ya tA ni gnyis pa ste// dz+nyA na zhes ni gsum pa yin// badz+ra zhes bya bzhi pa'o// swa b+hA ba at+ma kaHlnga par grags// a haM zhes pa drug
112'a5(rgyud 'bum): par brjod/ / de ltar bder gshegs drug pa ni// skye bo mchog la bstan pa yin// oM shU n+ya tA zung dang po'o// dz+nyA na badz+ra gnyis pa yin// swa b+hA ba At+ma kohaM gyur// de nyid gsum ni 'dir brtags
112'a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / de nyid gsum ni gcig gyur par// mi gsal gsal ba'i ming can no// mkha' dbus sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ni// 'od zer sprin gyi tshogs chen po// yi ge ma yin 'od kyis khyab// kun
112'a7(rgyud 'bum): nas yongs su zlum po'o/ / 'dod yod lnga yis kun tu khyab// mchod pa rnam pa lngas brgyan pa// mdor na de ltar bsgoms nas su// dbus su gzugs ni bsgom par bya// rnam par snang mdzad phyag rgya
112'b1(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ de nyid gsum gyi rdo rjes mtshan// yang na rdo rje gsum mgon gyi// phyag rgya yang ni rnam par bsgom// mi bskyod pa yi phyag rgya che// tshogs ni gnyis med sbyor ba dang // dkon mchog dpal gyi
112'b2(rgyud 'bum): rgya chen dang / / tshe dpag med pa'i 'od byed dang // de bzhin don yod gzugs can rgya// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dag tu bsgom// rdo rje gsum gcig rdo rje can// in+d+ra nI la'i mdog 'dra ba// rab
112'b3(rgyud 'bum): 'bar phyag na rdo rje bsnams/ / rnam par gcig pa 'jigs 'jigs lta// 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser 'od 'dra// sangs rgyas sprin gyis rab tu 'khrigs// da ni phyag na rdo rje che// rtse mo dgu pa rnam par bsgoms
112'b4(rgyud 'bum): shel dang zla ba'i 'od 'dra ba/ / thor tsugs cod pan ngag gis brgyan// rab 'bar lag na 'khor lo bsnams// sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// mar gad ta yi 'od 'dra ba// rdo rje 'bar bas
112'b5(rgyud 'bum): rnam par brgyan/ / 'bar zhing 'bar ba'i tshogs kyis khyab// rin chen de la rnam par bsgoms// 'dod chags chen po rdo rje can// pad+ma rA ga'i mdog 'dra zhing // thor tsugs cod pan dag gis brgyan//
112'b6(rgyud 'bum): phyag na pad+ma bsnams par bsgoms// sna tshogs rdo rje gdon mi za// 'od chen sna lnga'i 'od 'dra ba// zhi ba sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor du// phyag na ral gri bsnams par bsgoms// de ltar rnal
112'b7(rgyud 'bum): 'byor bshad pa dag/ gsang ba'i bdag pos thos nas ni// phra mo'i rnal 'byor cha dag kyang // de bzhin gshegs bdag la zhus pa// phung po khams sogs sbyor ba yis// de bzhin gshegs
113a1(rgyud 'bum): pas bka' stsal na/ / mkha' dbus sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor du// de rnams kyang ni ji ltar 'gyur// cig shos phyi rol du bsgoms pa// dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas
113a2(rgyud 'bum): ming can ni/ / dngos po med pa'i dngos po la// sgom pa po rnams ji ltar brtag/ mgon po phra mo'i rnal 'byor 'di// dkyil 'khor gang zhig bka' stsol ces// gang zhig ma 'ongs pa rnams ni
113a3(rgyud 'bum): 'di ltar mchog tu'ang som nyi 'tshal/ / lag na rdo rje grags ldan pa// phra mo'i rnal 'byor de nyid skyes// 'gro ba gnyis med sbyor ba yis// phra ba dgongs pas gsungs pa yin// rnam lnga
113a4(rgyud 'bum): mngon par byang chub 'di/ / ma 'ongs skye bo'i rgyur gyur te// chos ni yang dag sdud 'gyur gang // ji lta ji ltar ston par byed// phung po nyid ni sangs rgyas gyur// byang chub don gyi rkyen las byung //
113a5(rgyud 'bum): de yang de bzhin gshegs bshad pa// de nyid gnyis med sbyor bas so// ston dang 'jog pa po 'di ni// blo yi dngos grub ston pa po// thog mtha' med pa rnal 'byor ni// phra mo zhes ni bya bar brtag/
113a6(rgyud 'bum): mi gsal gsal bar yang dag sbyor// dngos med ngo bo las skyes pa'o// gzod ma nyid nas rang grub pa// gcig dang du ma rnam spangs pa// rten 'brel chos zhes grags pa ste// dngos
113a7(rgyud 'bum): po thams cad gcig tu byung / / bdag nyid 'di 'drar byas nas ni// chos kyi dkyil 'khor yang dag bri// dmar dang gnag dang de bzhin ser// dkar po nyid ni mdo ru ste// bzhi bzhi
113b1(rgyud 'bum): gcig tu sbyor ba yang / / gos dkar la sogs yang dag bri// de rnams dbus su lha mor bcas// zhi sbyor mchog dang mchog min dang // steng dang thad ka mnyam dang 'og/ ji lta ji ltar gos
113b2(rgyud 'bum): dkar sogs/ / me dang rlung dang dbang chen dang // chu ste so so'i dkyil 'khor la// bco brgyad dag tu yang dag bshad// de yang 'di nyid dag la bshad// ji ltar 'o ma khyad par ni// mar
113b3(rgyud 'bum): gsar gnas par gyur pa yin/ / de bzhin gos dkar la sogs la// zhi ba nyid ni de gnas so// gzugs la sogs pa nang gi chos// mthong ba de ni lhag mthong yin// mi bskyod la sogs
113b4(rgyud 'bum): grangs ji bzhin/ / rtog pa dag ni zhi gnas yin// 'di gnyis dngos po med pa'i bdag/ de bzhin nyid ni zhi zhes bya// de bzhin nyid kyi dkyil 'khor du// sangs rgyas thams cad bzhugs
113b5(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / rnal 'byor pa yi dbugs rngub dbyung // sbyor ba de nyid gcig pa nyid// shes rab thabs la gnas nas ni// sngags kyi yan lag ma nyams bzlas// bya ba thams cad nyid du yang //
113b6(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor rig pas nyal sogs la// ming med brjod du med pa dang // dus gsum 'das pa rtag tu bzla// gos dkar la sogs bzlas bshad pa// brgya phrag gnyis dang nyi shu lnga/
113b7(rgyud 'bum): bzhi pa legs par bsgres pa yis// sbyor bzhis bsdus pas brgya phrag dgu// dgu brgya dag tu gang bstan pa// nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i rim gyis ni// de ni so sor 'byung ba las// nyi shu tshig stong drug brgya'o//
114a1(rgyud 'bum): de 'dir gsang bdagongs pa yis// phra mo'i rnal 'byor bstan pa yin// srog dang bsam gtan med mod kyi// 'on kyang bzlas pa yin par bshad// de ltar rnam pa mang po y-i/
114a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gro sa phan pa'i gsung thos nas// de bzhin gshegs kun bdag po la// rdo rje chen gyis slar yang zhus// gang zhig bsgoms na ma 'ongs 'gro// thams cad mi rtog par 'gyur ba// rdo rje gsum kyi sring
114a3(rgyud 'bum): po mchog/ snying po bcom ldan bshad du gsol// de nyid gsum gnyis med sbyor ba// de ni phra mo'i rdo rje sgom// myur ba la sogs gsum spangs pa'i// rnal 'byor par yang bdag cag 'gyur/
114a4(rgyud 'bum): de ni bdag rig yid ches shing // zhi ba nyid ni mi shes 'gyur// tha mo'i rnal 'byor gtso spangs te// log pa'i rnal 'byor kun tu bsten// ston pa po yi sbyor ba bzhin// phra mo zhes bya de nyid ni/
114a5(rgyud 'bum): ma 'ongs dus na spongs 'gyur ba// de nyid de ni nges par byed// de nas rdo rje 'dzin smra ba'i// lung bstan pa ni gsan pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa kun bdag po// chos nyid ngo bo nyid ces bya'i// ting nge
114a6(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin de kun nas ni/ / snyoms par zhugs pa nyid du mdzad// dpal ldan snyoms par zhugs mdzad nas// gsang sngags 'di ni bka' stsal to// sku gsung thugs ni rdo rjer bshad// khyad par du ni
114a7(rgyud 'bum): byin rlab pa/ / gnyis med rdo rje gsum sbyor bas// de ni yang dag bshad par bya// oM ni dang por shes par bya// d+harma zhes bya gnyis pa'o// d+hA tu zhes bya gsum par bshad// swa b+hA bar grags bzhi pa'o//
114b1(rgyud 'bum): At+ma kaHni lnga pa yin// a haM du gyur drug par 'dod // sngags 'di brjod nas de 'og tu// sgom pa bdag nyid can gyis bsgoms// rin chen kha dog sna lnga pa// yungs kar gyi ni 'bru tshod tsam/
114b2(rgyud 'bum): nyams dga' ri rab rtse mo ru// rnal 'byor pa yis rtag par bsgom// rin chen mi g.yor gyur nas spro// mi g.yor ma gyur spro mi bya// sangs rgyas 'bar ba'i 'od 'dra ba// mchog rab sprin rnams
114b3(rgyud 'bum): spro bar bya/ / 'khor lo rdo rje sprin tshan dang // pad+ma ral gri mtshon cha mchog/ byang chub sems dpa'i sprin chen rnams// spro ba'i bdag nyid can gyis spro// phra mo'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par//
114b4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// bzlas dang sgom pa'i sbyor ba yang // pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor dag tu bsgom// rin chen lta bu'i dkyil 'khor du// dngos la brtson pas rin chen bsgom// dkyil 'khor
114b5(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba las byung ba/ / nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor du bri bya// 'di dag sangs rgyas rab mchog gi/ phra mo rdo rje gsum sgrub pa'o// rdo rje dkyil 'khor las byung ba// thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshul thob pa'o//
114b6(rgyud 'bum): dgongs pa gsang ba zhes pa yi// lung ston dam pa 'di la ni// gang gis sems ni bzod gyur pa// de ni de bzhin byed pa yin// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // rdo rje phra mo de nyid las//
114b7(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni rdo rje dkod pa'i mchog/ le'u gsum pa nyid yin no// // de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad// gnyis su med par gyur nas ni// slar yang rdo rje gsum bdag la/
115a1(rgyud 'bum): bstod pas de rnams gsol ba 'debs// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// zhi ba gnas rnams mchog gyur pa// chos kun gcig tu bdag med pa// dkyil 'khor
115a2(rgyud 'bum): mchog 'di bshad du gsol/ / yongs su rdzogs par yang dag brgyan// mtshan rnams kun gyis mtshan pa'o// kun tu bzang po sku yi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// ye shes
115a3(rgyud 'bum): spyod pa'i don las byung / / zhi ba'i chos ni sbyor ba po// kun tu bzang po gsung gi mchog/ dngos mchog dkyil 'khor bshad du gsol// rang bzhin gyis ni dri med dag/ sems ni kun tu
115a4(rgyud 'bum): bzang po nyid/ / sems can kun gcig che ba'i mchog/ dkyil 'khor snying po bshad du gsol// de nas ston pa bcom ldan 'das// khams gcig khams ni gsum pa po// 'jig rten gsum
115a5(rgyud 'bum): mchog rdo rje mchog/ 'jig rten gsum gyi ston pa'o// nyams dga' de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas// de bzhin gshegs pa kun dag la// thugs de dkyil 'khor 'dra ba ste// dkyil 'khor
115a6(rgyud 'bum): dam pa bka' stsal to/ / de nas sems kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ rdo rje ye shes rab 'dra ba// sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams kyi// dkyil 'khor rab tu bshad par bya// 'di ni gsal ba'i
115a7(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid mchog/ legs sgril de bzhin nyid bstan pa'o// sna tshogs lung gi mtshan ma ni// mtshan ma bzang por de bshad do// kun rdzob dang ni don dam ngag/ gnyis su med pa mdzes pa yin//
115b1(rgyud 'bum): shes rab 'di ni thig yin te// thabs ni de yi rjes 'jug pa'o// shes rab thabs kyi thig gcig gis// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs mchog ni// sems kyi dkyil 'khor thig gdab ste/
115b2(rgyud 'bum): rten 'brel yan lag bcu gnyis pa// 'phags pa'i bden bzhi ngos bzhi ste// tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi grwa bzhi yin// bsdu dngos bzhi grags sgo yin te// re re'ang bzhi yi ming can no// /
115b3(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi de nyid don gyi brda// 'khor lo'i nang gi dkyil 'khor ro// mi phyed ye shes mtshan ma ste// rdo rje in+d+ra nI la rgya// rnam pa lnga yis rab phye ba'i// rtse mo 'khor ba 'jig byed pa'o//
115b4(rgyud 'bum): shar nas me long ngo bo ni// 'khor lo 'bar ba'i 'od kyis brgyan// lho ru kun mnyam ye shes yin// gcig gi ming can rin po che// nub tu so sor rtog pad+ma// pad+ma rA ga'i 'od 'dra ba/
115b5(rgyud 'bum): byang du gong ma'i sems gang yin// 'gro ba'i rnam rtog 'joms byed pa// bya ba sgrub pa ral grir 'gyur// 'od 'phro 'bar ba 'dra ba'i mdog/ shar lho byams pa'ang spyan yin te// sprin
115b6(rgyud 'bum): sngon dang ni mnyam pa'i 'od/ / lho nub snying rje zhes bya ba// mA ma kI ni rigs rdo rje// nub byang pad+ma zhes bya ba// dga' ba legs par gnas pa bzhin// byang shar ut+pal ltar snang ba'i// btang
115b7(rgyud 'bum): snyoms bcas pa sngon po 'dra/ / de bzhin shar sgor sbyin pa ni// tho ba mdangs ldan 'od dang bcas// de bzhin snyan smra zhes grags pa// dbyig pa 'od bzang rdo rje 'bar// nub tu don spyod ces bya ba//
116a1(rgyud 'bum): rta mgrin gyi ni pad+ma'o// don 'thun pa ni rdo rje ste// rdo rje 'khyil ba'i rdo rje can// phyag rgya dgod pa'i mtshan nyid de// 'dini legs par bshad pa yin// ji ltar dbyibs kyis mchod
116a2(rgyud 'bum): pa ni/ / rnam gsum bsgoms pas 'gyur ba yin// dang por chen po yod pa yi// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor yin par bshad// de ltar mkha' dang mtshungs gyur dang // shes nas 'gro la phan par
116a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / rdo rje gsum dang lhan cig 'byung // de tshe zla gzer 'phreng ba yi// skad cig la sogs dus dbye bas// lo grangs bcu drug pa yi ming // ma skyes par 'byung zhi ba ni// bud med ces ni nges par
116a4(rgyud 'bum): bshad/ / zhi ba'i chos dang rjes dran pa// mdangs bzang 'od ni yin par gsungs// rten 'brel bag chags dri yin te// ye shes kha phye me tog go// dngos po med par rigs yin te// kun mkhyen ye shes
116a5(rgyud 'bum): dbus nyid do/ / chos dbyings nyid kyi bud med ni// shes rab 'di 'dras mnyes par byas// nang na ma yin phyi ma yin// gnyis kar ma yin gzhan nas min// gnas med gnas pa'i rnal 'byor gyur// de bas
116a6(rgyud 'bum): mA ma kIr bshad do/ / de yi ngo bo nyid gcig pa// byin gyis brlabs pas de bshad do// nam mkha' dang ni gcig tu gnas// sangs rgyas zhi ba'i gnas su 'gyur// de bas yul du rnam brtags pa// bsdu ba
116a7(rgyud 'bum): dag ni bshang ba yin/ / ye shes dbang po stong pa gcin// rnam dag chos nyid khu ba yin// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes khrag/ rang bzhin chos su yongs brtags pa// de nyid lha rnams zhes bya ste/
116b1(rgyud 'bum): dngos med pa ni dbul ba yin// de byas sangs rgyas sras po rnams// khyad par du ni mnyes par 'gyur// gang yang 'jig rten pas brtags pa// de rnams ji skad bshad pa nyid// mi phyed rdo rje
116b2(rgyud 'bum): gsum bsgoms pa/ / gsar ba nyid du bkal legs dang // shin tu tshad ldan mdzes pa yi// thig gi mkhas pas thig gdab bo// blo ldan dkyil 'khor brtag bya ba// khru ni bcu gnyis tshad
116b3(rgyud 'bum): tsam la/ / dngos bzhi dang ni grwa bzhir ldan// rta babs kyis ni mdzes par bya// de yis dbus su 'khor lo ni// dgongs pas dang por bshad pa ste// de las bzlog pa'i tshul gyis ni// 'di na 'jig
116b4(rgyud 'bum): rten pa rnams rtogs/ / gang zhig 'jig rten 'das la gnas// de ni gzungs kyis dbang bskur ba// dngos med pa ni 'dzin pa dag/ yid ni rtag tu mkha' dang mtshungs// dam pa 'jig rten shin tu
116b5(rgyud 'bum): 'das/ / 'khor ba dang ni cig shos spang // len pa ma yin gtong ba min// med pa ma yin gnas ma yin/ khro ldan kun tu 'di shes pa// rnal 'byor thams cad rig pa mchog/ thugs kyi dkyil 'khor
116b6(rgyud 'bum): le'u 'di ni/ / nges pa'i rnal 'byor pa zhes bshad// dgongs pa lung bstan yid 'ong la// gang zhig yid ni bzod gyur pa// de rnams shes rab thabs dag ni// ji ltar gnas pa de ltar byed//
116b7(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba'i dgongs pa lung bstan las// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog/ rdo rje gsum bdag 'gro ba'i bla/
117a1(rgyud 'bum): slar yang rdo rje 'dzin pa la// sngags spyod don gyis de nyid zhus// sngags kyi brtul zhugs spyod pa cig/ khyad par du ni bsrung bslab pa// de rnams kyi ni dgongs pa'i gsung //
117a2(rgyud 'bum): spyod pa bcom ldan pa shad du gsol// de nas bdag po de bzhin gshegs// rdo rje 'dzin pa dag gi tshig/ gsan nas 'gro ba'i don gcig pu// gsungs pa'i don can bka' stsal to// mi rtog
117a3(rgyud 'bum): don las yang dag byung / / zhe sdang la 'jug mtshan nyid yin// dngos med la gnas gti mug ste// 'dod chags 'dod chags las byung ba// 'dod chags ldan pa'i ming can yin// theg pa mchog
117a4(rgyud 'bum): ni bla med pa/ / 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug ste// 'di dag rigs su yang dag bshad// dngos grub de ni 'di sgrub bo// rigs ngan myur bar shes par bya// smig mkhan dag ni dal ba yin// mtshams med
117a5(rgyud 'bum): byed pa gnyis ka ste/ / gsod pa don gnyer sems pa po// theg pa chen po bla med pa'i// theg pa mchog 'di 'grub par 'gyur// sems can sdig chen byas pa dang // gzhan yang mtshams med byed pa
117a6(rgyud 'bum): pos gang yang slob dpon smod pa yis/ / bsgrubs kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// 'di nyid dad pas myur du ni// zhe sdang dag la gnas pas gnas// gang zhig phung sogs dngos med par// zhi gnas
117a7(rgyud 'bum): las byung sems kyis byas/ / de ni srog gcod byed pa ste// theg pa mchog la gnas pa yin// nang dang de bzhin phyi rol dag/ rten 'brel gnyis su ston pa ni// de ni brdzun smra dga' ba ste// gnas med
117b1(rgyud 'bum): la gnas rnal 'byor pa'o/ / rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi ye shes gang / de ni rdzas su shes bya ste// de 'phrog dang tshul gang yin pa// gzhan gyi nor la chags par 'dod// gang zhig de nyid dngos gcig pa//
117b2(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin nyid la rtag sbyor ba// sems can de de 'dod la dga'// sgrub pa mchog la dam par 'gyur// de yi stong nyid gti mug la// yul ni bshang ba zhes grags te// dbang po gci ba zhes bya la// de
117b3(rgyud 'bum): dag zhi ba za ba yin/ / theg pa chen po chos mchog 'dir// de dag sgrub pa'i snod du 'gyur// de tshe brdzun de 'dod pa dang // bshang gci zas su byed pa po// shes rab pha rol phyin shes rab// chos kyi sku ni
117b4(rgyud 'bum): ma gcig pu/ / gnyis med de bzhin nyid sbyor ba// dngos med ces bya 'dod spyod pa// longs spyod rdzogs dang mnyam gang yin// de nyid sring mo yin par 'dod// rang lha'i rnal 'byor ldan pa yis// gsang
117b5(rgyud 'bum): sngags lus kyis mnyes par bya/ / bshang gci zas su byed pa yi// sprul sku'i gzugs can bu mo de// sgrub pa pos ni bsgom par bya// ma dang sring mo bu mo ni// 'di 'dra rnal 'byor pas mnyes byas//
117b6(rgyud 'bum): theg pa mchog gi chos nyid la// dngos grub rgya chen des thob bo// ji ltar mi rtog nam mkha' ni// kun tu khyab par gnas gyur pa// 'di ni sgom pa zhes bshad de// ting 'dzin bsam mi khyab ces bya// de nyid
117b7(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten par byung ba/ / rtog pa dga' ba'i ming can no// sangs rgyas yul gyi ye shes la// 'dod spyod gos par mi 'gyur te// rnam par mi rtog sbyor gcig gis// myur du sangs rgyas des thob 'gyur//
118a1(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das gsungs ni// sgrib kun sel ba la sogs pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ches// thos nas ngo mtshar rmad du gyur// 'di ni bdag po
118a2(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das/ / de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag/ ci yi slad du tshig ngan pa// de bzhin gshegs 'khor nang du gsung // 'dod chags bral dang chags bcas dang // gti mug bral ba
118a3(rgyud 'bum): rmongs bcas dang / / zhe sdang bral ba sdang bcas pa'o// rigs kyi dngos grub ston mdzad cing // gang gzhan sdig pa'i nyes pa dang // 'tshe ba la sogs yongs spangs pa// 'di ni de byed sems can
118a4(rgyud 'bum): rnams/ / snod yin zhes ni thub gsung ngam// de nas mgon po thugs rje can// sems can kun la phan dgyes pas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang // byang chub sems dpa' la gsungs
118a5(rgyud 'bum): pab 'di ni sa khams dang mnyam pa/ / sems can kun 'dzin gcig pu pa// chu khams rtog dang bral ba po// sna tshogs gsal bar 'gyur ba yin// bdag po me yi gzugs can te// thams cad za
118a6(rgyud 'bum): bar nye bar sbyor/ / de bzhin phyi nang bdag nyid mchog/ 'gro la gos pa'i dri gcig pu// bcom ldan sna tshogs nam mkha' mtshungs// thams cad snang zhing za ba po// de nyid bdag nyid bdag
118a7(rgyud 'bum): yin par/ / bsgoms na rkang gnyis mchog tu 'gyur// snying po zhes bya sangs rgyas kyi// chos nyid dag pa 'di yin zhing // sngags kyi spyod don spyod rnams kyis// byang chub spyod pa'i mchog 'di
118b1(rgyud 'bum): yin/ / de nas brjod mi lang zhes pa// brjod mi lang ba nyid gyur pa// sangs rgyas zhing rdul grangs mnyam de// sgrib pa thams cad sel la sogs// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ches//
118b2(rgyud 'bum): kun nas 'jigs shing skrag gyur nas// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de thams cad// gcig tu brgyal ba nyid gyur to// de nas gsang dbang rdo rje gsung // gnyis med de bzhin gshegs kun gyis/
118b3(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba ru// gzigs nas gtso la 'di skad gsol// mgon po sgrib kun sel la sogs// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// rang bzhin chos nyid ji lta
118b4(rgyud 'bum): bar/ / 'di rnams bslang bar mdzad du gsol// mi g.yo ba 'di gsang ba ste// zhi ba gcig pu bde ba'i mchog/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob byed pa// 'di ni dgongs pas gsungs pa yin//
118b5(rgyud 'bum): dngos po med cing 'khrug pa med// yid 'ong rdo rje tshig gcig pu// 'gro ba'i bsam pa'i dbye ba yis// bye brag mang por gyur pa yin// nam mkha' mtha' yas sbyor ba yis// gzugs la sogs
118b6(rgyud 'bum): pa mtha' yas te/ / de yang de bzhin gshegs mchog dang // byang chub sems dpa' nyid du gyur// de las spro zhing bsdu ba dang // zhi ba nyid las rab sbyor bas// ye shes lus can ye shes can//
118b7(rgyud 'bum): brgyal lo zhes ni shes pa ni// yan lag dbye ba gang dang gang // 'gro ba zhes ni grags bdag pa// de de rang lha'i sbyor ba las// dkyil 'khor mchog ni 'byung bar 'gyur// dkyil 'khor rang lus gang
119a1(rgyud 'bum): yin pa/ / de nyid bsdus pa 'di lta bu// 'di ni 'jig tshogs lus rtog la// byang chub sems dpa' brgyal bar gyur// des ni bden 'di ma shes pas// dbyangs bcas
119a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyal la bskul ba ni/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tsha/ rgyal ba zhes ni bshad pa yin// de nas gsang ba rdo rje gsum// dgongs pa'i tshig gis bshad pa dag/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i tshig
119a3(rgyud 'bum): gsan nas/ / ting nge 'dzin ni mngon du mdzad// gnyis su med par mnyam rdo rje// 'gro la gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i// 'di nyid gsum yul 'jig pa po// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs/
119a4(rgyud 'bum): mgon po snyoms par zhugs pa yi// 'od gang chen por gyur pa yin// byang chub sems dpa' des reg pas// rang gi stan la gnas par gyur// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa kun// ngo mtshar rmad du
119a5(rgyud 'bum): gyur spyan dang / / dgyes shing mgu ba skyes gyur nas// chos kyi dbyangs ni 'di skad gsungs// e ma'o chos e ma'o chos// e ma'o chos kyi don byung ba// bdag med chos ni yang dag dag/ chos kyi
119a6(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po la phyag 'tshal/ / rdo rje gsung gcig dag pa'i don// dri med mkha' dang mnyam pa'o// mi 'gyur don las yang dag byung // rdo rje sku la phyag 'tshal lo// thub mchog gcig pu de bzhin
119a7(rgyud 'bum): gshegs/ / dus gsum dag gi lam du byung // rdo rje dbyings gcig rdzogs longs spyod// nam mkha'i lam gcig phyag 'tshal lo// sku gsung thugs ni nam mkha' ste// spyod pa'i mchog ste/
119b1(rgyud 'bum): chos gcig ldan// de nyid gsum ston sna tshogs pa// spyod pa'i gnas la phyag 'tshal lo// dgongs pa lung bstan la gnas nas// gang zhig spyod mchog 'di rten pa// gsang ba yang dag srung ba dag
119b2(rgyud 'bum): de ni ci dga' bar yang byed/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// dam tshig gsum gyi rdo rje mchog/ sngags rnams kun gyi dam pa yi// spyod pa'i le'u lnga pa yin// / de nas
119b3(rgyud 'bum): dpal chen mi bskyod pa/ / sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba can// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// thugs byin brlab pa zhes bya ba'i// gsang sngags 'di ni gsungs pa yin// oM zhes bya ba dang po
119b4(rgyud 'bum): / yin// sarba ta thA ga ta gnyis// tsit+ta gsum par yongs su brtag/ badz+ra bzhi pa'i gong mar ldan// swa b+hA wa At+ma ko lnga pa// a haM dus kyi ming can yin// sku drug gsum pa'i ming can no//
119b5(rgyud 'bum): de nas dpal ldan rnam snang mdzad// rdul phran rdo rje zhes bya yi// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// sku ni byin gyis brlab pa gsung // oM zhes bya ba tshangs par bshad// sarba ta thA ga ta gnyis/
119b6(rgyud 'bum): kA ya chags thogs dbang phyug ste// badz+ra rig byed yin par bsgrags// swa b+hA wa At+ma ko 'dod lha// a hai skem byed ces brjod de// dgongs pa yis ni yang dag brtags// shes rab dbye bas
119b7(rgyud 'bum): dbye bar bya/ / de nas tshe dpag med ces pa'i// kun tu mi gnyis rdo rje can// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// gsung ni byin gyis rlob pa gsung // oM ni dang por bsgrags pa yin// sarbata
120a1(rgyud 'bum): thA ga ta gnyis/ / bAka ces bya ba gsum pa yin// badz+ra dus kyi ming du 'gyur// swa b+hA wa At+ma ko lnga pa// a haM zhes pa drug pa ste// gsum po 'di dag bshad pa rnams// re re
120a2(rgyud 'bum): zhing drug gsum du bshad/ / thugs dang sku dang de bzhin gsung // rim dang rim gyis min pas gsung // bdag po las ni gcig pu las// rdo rje gsum zhes bya ba 'byung // yon tan chos 'di rdo rje gsung //
120a3(rgyud 'bum): de nyid gsum gyi dam tshig mchog/ de bas 'di ni sgom pa mchog/ g.yel ba med par rdzogs par bya// 'di bshad pa yi blo ldan pa// rab mchog rdo rje gsum byung bas// sgom pa'i bdag nyid can gyur cing /
120a4(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyi mtshan nyid mtshan mar bya// de nas dkon mchog dpal 'di yang // sgron ma rdo rje zhes bya ba'i// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te// de nas gsang sngags 'di gsungs so// oM ni zung gi dang por ldan//
120a5(rgyud 'bum): sarba ta thA ga ta zung // de bzhin nyid ni ye shes tshogs// thams cad me long ming can no// a nu rA ga skye med de// de ni gsum pa yin par gsungs// rkyen dang nyan thos kyis bshig dka'i// badz+ra yang ni
120a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhi bar gyur/ / dngos med bdag nyid can ye shes// swa b+hA wa At+ma ko zhes bshad// ye shes lnga po nyid kyi ming // chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid// a haM so so na rdzogs longs spyod// dngos po med
120a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rang bzhin can/ / bde ba chen po'i ming gyur pa// mchod pa drug pa'i ming can no// dngos med gnas pa'i bdag nyid can// de yi rjes su mnyes bya'i mchog/ de lta'i chags pa'i de bzhin gshegs//
120b1(rgyud 'bum): mgon po thams cad mnyes par bya// de nas dpal chen gdon mi za// don yod rdo rje zhes bya ba'i// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te// des ni gsang sngags 'di gsungs so// oM zhes bya ba dang por
120b2(rgyud 'bum): / ldan// sarba ta thA ga ta gnyis// pU dza rnam par thar pa'i ming // badz+ra sems ni rnam sgom pa// swa bA wa At+ma ko zhes bshad// a haM pha rol phyin zhes bya// lnga po drug dang gsum du bshad// gzugs dang
120b3(rgyud 'bum): sgra dang dri dang ro/ / reg bya dang ni chos kyi dbyings// de dag dngos med gyur byas pa// de ni sangs rgyas mchod mchog yin// mig sogs zhes las yang dag byung // mngon shes lnga yis nye bar mdzes/
120b4(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa lnga bshad 'di rnams kyis// myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang // so sor byang chub ston mdzad pa// rdo rje gsum rig gsang dbang po// thub pa chen pos
120b5(rgyud 'bum): yang gsungs pa/ / sku gsung thugs la dmigs pa la// gang tshe yid ni mgu gyur pa// de nyid gsum la nyer sbyor ba// dngos grub rab mchog de thob 'gyur// bdag med par ni sems dmigs shing //
120b6(rgyud 'bum): lus dang ngag kyang rnam par sgom// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i gnas sgom zhing // sbyor ba rnam gsum rdzogs par bya// rdo rje de nyid gsum dmigs na// shin tu phra ba'ang yod ma yin// sngags kyi rang bzhin
120b7(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba yis/ / sgom pa med cing byang chub med// rdo rje gsum gcig mtshan nyid du// mdor na rnam par brtags nas su// sngags la sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin// gnas la gnas med bsgom par bya//
121a1(rgyud 'bum): de nas de bzhin gshegs dbang po'ang // de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis mchod// kun mkhyen sangs rgyas kun mchog gis// bsgom pa'i mchog 'di bka' stsal to// nam mkha'i
121a2(rgyud 'bum): dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam bsgoms nas// phra mo'i rnal 'byor brtsam par bya// yungs kar gyi ni 'bru tshod tsam// sna yi rtse mo'i bdag
121a3(rgyud 'bum): nyid can/ / rgyu dang mi rgyur yang dag ldan// de ru gnas par mkhas pas bsam// blo ldan ye shes kyis brtags pa'i// gsang ba'i ye shes gnas bsgom mo// gsang ba mchog ces bshad pa ste/
121a4(rgyud 'bum): de nyid gsum ni dam tshig mchog/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// nyi ma zhes bya'i dkyil 'khor sgom// sangs rgyas sku ni rnam bsgom te// de yi steng du gnas bzhag go// dbang phyug chen po
121a5(rgyud 'bum): skeskam byed de/ / gzhi phyed nam mkha' mtshon pa dag/ bdud rtsi zhes ni btags pa gang // de ni hUM zhes bya bar 'gyur// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// 'khor lo dkyil 'khor yid 'ong sgom//
121a6(rgyud 'bum): spyan gyi gzugs su yang dag sbyor// rdo rje pad+mo gnyis sgom pa'o// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// rin chen dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// dang po'i sbyor ba nan tan gyis// de yi steng du rnam par sgom//
121a7(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'di nyid sgom// sangs rgyas zhi ba'i gnas dgod pa// 'khor rnams kyis ni kun nas bskor// ut+pal mthon ka'i mdog 'dra ba// rtse mo lnga
121b1(rgyud 'bum): pa 'od po che/ / nas kyi 'bru tsam nan tan gyis// ri rab rtse mor rnam par bsam// tsa na ka yi 'bru tshod tsam// 'dab ma brgyad pa ge sar bcas// sna yi rtse mo ri rab rtse// byang chub 'dod pas 'di bsgom bya//
121b2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo la sogs sgom pa ni// de yi khyad par dag tu brtag/ yid 'ong dngos grub kun gyi gnas// byang chub gnas mchog bla med pa'o// sangs rgyas yang dag byang chub bzhugs// mdor na da ni spro bar bya//
121b3(rgyud 'bum): gang tshe chos ni legs mtshan pa// rdo rje gcig ni bsgom par bya// de nas de bzhin gshegs dbang po// dag pa chos rnams kun gyi mchog/ 'gro kun don du ston pa pos// gsang ba mchog ni
121b4(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsal to/ / skad cig thang cig yud tsam dang // zla phyed zla ba lo yi dus// bskal pa grangs med gsum po ni// skad cig gcig tu mnyam par bshad// zla ba drug bshad de nyid yin// dngos
121b5(rgyud 'bum): med rdzogs par longs spyod pa'o/ / skad cig gcig tu bsngags pa ste// dus gsum las 'das yin par dgongs// gzugs dang sgra dang ror ldan pa// rnal 'byor pas ni zla drug sgom// mchod
121b6(rgyud 'bum): chen de ni byas nas su/ / gsang ba'i bde nyid rnam par sgom// yul dang dbang po sems pa ni// bshang gci zas su byed pa po// byas na de 'dra'i dngos grub ni// bza' ba rnam rtog med pa'o// de nyid
121b7(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni bla med pa/ / byang chub sems gcig las byung ba'o// rtog med 'dus ni ma byas shing // mi rtog don ni 'grub par 'gyur// ma ni mA ma kIr bshad de// sa ni mngon par byang chub pa'o// bsam
122a1(rgyud 'bum): gtan de ni dga' spyod pa/ / sha zhes bya bar de bshad do// nam mkha' mtha' yas rnal 'byor ni// sha chen de ni yin par bshad// gsang ba pa yi go 'phang mchog
122a2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje gsum ni myur du 'grub/ / dam tshig chen po glang chen rta// de bzhin khyi la sogs pa'i sha// phung po la sogs rigs dbye bas// gang gsungs mnyam pa'i grangs kyis so// gang zhig rnal
122a3(rgyud 'bum): 'byor gnyis med zas/ / bsam gtan dga' ba'i ming gcig pu// 'jig rten rgyang 'phan 'jig rten pa// bza' ba'i rang gi ngo bor gyur// dge ba'i bshes gnyen brtag pa dang // de bzhin drod
122a4(rgyud 'bum): gsher las skyes pa/ / 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// 'di dag zas su kun tu bshad// de nas rdo rje gsum dgongs pa// bcom ldan 'das las thos pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa kun
122a5(rgyud 'bum): bdag po/ / lag na rdo rjes tshig gsol ba// nyan thos rnams kyi dam tshig kyang // phra mo'i rnal 'byor ston mdzad cing // mgon khyod 'jig rten pa dang ni// 'jig rten 'das pa dag kyang gsungs//
122a6(rgyud 'bum): chu dang 'o ma gcig 'gyur bzhin// khyod ni chos rnams ston par mdzad// 'jig rten 'ga' las yang dag pa// ngang pas 'o ma ji bzhin len// ji ltar skom pas gdungs pa yin/ skyes bu la la de bsres
122a7(rgyud 'bum): 'thung / / de bzhin 'jig rten shin tu 'dus// chos kyi bdud rtsi de rnams 'thung // dgongs pas sngags kyi de nyid du// gang zhig gsum du gsungs pa 'di// ji lta ji ltar 'jig rten sogs// mgon po
122b1(rgyud 'bum): gsal bar bshad du gsol/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs mchog gis// grags ldan lag na rdo rje la// bu khyed legs so cher legs te// bye brag gsum khyod la bshad bya// rkyen dang nyan thos zhes
122b2(rgyud 'bum): grags dang / / de bzhin mdo sde la spyod rnams// 'di dag 'jig rten pa rnams te/ bya ba sbyor ba'i bya bar gnas// rnal 'byor grub nas 'jig rten gnas// 'jig rten 'das par gyur pa yin// de ni ting
122b3(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin rnal 'byor yang / / de dang 'dra bar byed ma yin// gang yang 'jig rten shin tu 'das// rnam par mi rtog 'jigs med pa// de ni de bzhin nyid dngos cig/ 'khor ba dang ni cig shos spangs//
122b4(rgyud 'bum): brtul zhugs bzang po'i rnal 'byor 'dis// sangs rgyas rnams ni mnyes 'gyur zhing // blo ldan byang chub sems rnams kyis// byang chub myur du thob par 'gyur// 'dod khams kyi ni dbang phyug dang /
122b5(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor go 'phang 'thob par 'gyur// gzi ldan stobs kyis phyug pa dang // mdangs bzang mthong na dga' ba dang // mthong ngam tshig gi bskul ba yis// 'jig rten 'di dag dbang du byed// gsang ba 'di
122b6(rgyud 'bum): ni mchog yin te/ / sangs rgyas byang chub dam pa yin// de nyid sngags kyi gsang ba 'di// rdo rje gsum las 'das pa'i mchog/ dgongs pa lung bstan yid 'ong la// skyes bu gang zhig
122b7(rgyud 'bum): gnas gyur pa/ / gsang ba yang dag srung ba po// de rnams ci dgar byed par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs kun dam pa ste// dam tshig las ni dam tshig mchog/ rdo rje gsum gyis byin brlab pa'i
123a1(rgyud 'bum): le'u drug pa yin par ba shwad/ / de nas rdo rje gsum gsang dbang // dam tshig chen po de nyid gcig/ ting 'dzin gsang sngags spyod pa'i mchog/ mngon
123a2(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs byang chub 'di gsungs so/ / de nyid dam tshig bzhi po gang // 'dod pa thams cad tsas te bshad// de rnams longs spyod ldan pa yis// ci 'dod par ni bsten par bya// rang gi lhar ni bdag
123a3(rgyud 'bum): sbyor bas/ / bdag dang gzhan ni mchod par bya// de ni 'jig rten mchod 'gyur ba// 'jig rten 'das pa zhi ba nyid// dka' thub myur ba de yin la// sdom pa dam pa yin par 'dod// mi zad pa
123a4(rgyud 'bum): ni gnyis ka ste/ / 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad kyang // gzungs sogs lha rnams yin par 'dod// de dag bsgom pa'i sbyor ba yis// sgrub pa po rnams myur du 'grub// tha dad yi ge slong mo
123a5(rgyud 'bum): yin/ / de 'don pa ni za ba ste// gang zhig zlos la dga' ba de// de dag slong mo za bar 'dod// dka' thub dag ni mi bya zhing // sdom pa mi bzad nyid kyang min// 'dod gsum de nyid longs spyod cing //
123a6(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyi de nyid ma nyams bzlas// rdo rje gsum dbye ba de gnas na// sngags rig byang chub thob par 'gyur// gzhan du dus min 'chi ba dang // shi nas dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub
123a7(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' dang / / gsang sngags spyod pa'i mchog rnams gang // mi 'gyur chos ni brnyes pa yang // rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog/ kun mkhyen ye shes chags ldan pas// 'dod pa'i
123b1(rgyud 'bum): yon tan lnga rnams bsten/ / byang chub sems dpa' mnyes bya zhing // byang chub pha rol phyin chags bya// de ltar gzugs la gsum shes nas// mkhas pa yis ni mchod par bya// de nyid
123b2(rgyud 'bum): gtso bo bcom ldan 'das/ / sna tshogs rnam par snang mdzad che// sgra la rnam gsum shes byas nas// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// 'di ni bcom ldan sna tshogs pa// sangs rgyas rin chen
123b3(rgyud 'bum): 'byung gnas gtso/ / dri la rnam gsum shes byas nas// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa// 'dod chags chos ni 'dzin pa'i gtso// ro la rnam gsum shes byas
123b4(rgyud 'bum): nas/ / lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// de nyid don yod rdo rje grags// sna tshogs gtso bo bcom ldan 'das// reg la rnam gsum shes byas nas// rang gi rigs la dbul bar bya// de nyid
123b5(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan rdo rje can/ / mi bskyod me long gzugs can no// nang dang de bzhin phyi rol dang // gnyis ka rjes su mi dmigs pa// gzugs la sogs gsum de yin te// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya//
123b6(rgyud 'bum): gzugs sgra ro la sogs pa la// sems ni rtag tu sbyar bar bya// gsang ba bsdus par gyur pa ni// snying po sangs rgyas kun skyed de// mkhas pas gzugs sgra la sogs pa// lha nyid du ni rtag tu sgom//
123b7(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin rigs su sgom pa ni// sgom pas der ni bsgom par bya// nam mkha'i rdo rje sbyor ba ni// sangs rgyas rjes su dran par bshad// sangs rgyas rjes dran sbyor bas kyang // chos ni rjes su dran pa sgom/
124a1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje gsum sgom rnal 'byor pas// rdo rje rjes dran sgom pa'o// rigs dbye ji skad bshad pas kyang // chos dang longs spyod sprul skur byung // rigs ni rjes dran sbyor gyur pa/
124a2(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin khro bo rjes dran pa'o// de nyid gsum yongs gyur pa gcig/ rdo rje gsum nyid med chos nyid// lha rnams rjes dran sbyor ba ste// de sgom byang chub thob par 'gyur// bzhi po dag ni re re bzhi// ji lta
124a3(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar mgu bcas sogs/ / de nyid lo yi grangs yin te// bcu drug par ni yongs su brtag/ sangs rgyas kun gyis bstan pa yi// bud med lo grangs bcu drug pa// gzugs bzang phra dang mchod
124a4(rgyud 'bum): pa ni/ / dben pa zhes byar brtsam par bya// byin gyis brlabs nas yid 'ong ba// khyad par gsum zhes bya ba yi// de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo che// spyan sogs nyid ni bsgom par bya// bsgrub
124a5(rgyud 'bum): bya de nyid yang dag sbyor/ / dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor ba'i// dang por sbyor ba 'di bsgoms na// sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// yi ge hUM dang de bzhin oM// phaT kyang der ni bsgom par bya//
124a6(rgyud 'bum): de nyid gsum tshul gsum bdag nyid// ci rigs par ni rnam par spro// 'od zer rnam pa lngas khyab pa'i// rdo rje pad+ma 'di mchog ste// gsang dang snying kha sna rtse ru// rnal 'byor pas ni 'di bsgom bya//
124a7(rgyud 'bum): 'bar bcas zla 'od bzhin dkar bar// shes rab de ni rtag tu sgom// gang phyir yid ni dgar gyur pas// de bas de nang yid 'ong ba'o// gnas med gnas par legs sbyor bar// bzhi mtshungs gcig/
124b1(rgyud 'bum): tu sbyor ba rig/ sangs rgyas rjes dran sbyor la sogs// byang chub 'dod pas bsgom par bya// nyams dga' sangs rgyas kun gyis bsten// b+ha ga zhi ba gcig pu'i ming // rang gi de nyid gnyis med byung //
124b2(rgyud 'bum): / rdo rje de bdag nyid du sbyor// sangs rgyas rjes dran sbyor ba ste/ b+ha ga ling ga yin par bsgrags// gzhug pa gnyis med sbyor ba ste// sangs rgyas gzugs su sgom pa'o// de las zo ldan gyis spro ba/
124b3(rgyud 'bum): spu'i bu ga'i rtse mor gnas// mnyam pa med pas khyad par du// sangs rgyas sprin rnams der spro'o// chos rjes dran pa'i sbyor ba yang // rdo rje chos kyi rab sbyor bas// rdo rje pad+ma yang dag sbyar// b+ha ga'i
124b4(rgyud 'bum): ling gar brtag pa'o/ / de nas pa spu'i bu ka las// 'bad pas chos kyi sprin rnams spro// de nyid bsam kun rdzogs byed pa'o// 'di na chos kyi bdag po yin// rdo rje rjes su dran pa sgom// dngos med gcig
124b5(rgyud 'bum): bu la sbyor ba/ / stong la rdo rje rab sbyor 'gyur// b+ha ga ling ga zhes bshad do// de nas ba spu'i bu ga nas// rdo rje sprin rnams kun tu spro// rdo rje byang chub sems sgom nyid// myur du dngos grub 'thob
124b6(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur/ / rigs rjes dran pa'i sbyor ba yis// mkhas pas stong nyid rdo rje las// de bzhin rnal 'byor pas spros nas// rigs kyi dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// khro bo rjes dran sbyor ba
124b7(rgyud 'bum): la'ang / / stong dang rdo rje gnyis ldan pa'i// khro bo'i ba spu'i bu ga nas// khro bo'i sprin rnams spro bar bya// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin// khyab bdag rnam snang mdzad chen la// rjes dran sbyor
125a1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i dgongs pa ni/ / thub pa che la slar zhus pa// thub khyod kyis ni gang gsungs pa// b+ha ga'i ling ga'i sbyor ba ni// 'jig rten 'das pa'i sbyor 'di las// sangs rgyas la
125a2(rgyud 'bum): sogs spro gyur pa/ / tshul 'di ma 'ongs skye bo la// phyi dus kun rmongs skyes pa ste// bde gshegs rnams kyi bdag pos ni// ci phyir gsungs zhes de rnams smra// 'gro bas nam mkha' mtshan
125a3(rgyud 'bum): ma can/ / rten 'byung khyod nyid mi shes shing // de rnams shin tu rmongs dbye bas// ji bzhin par ni rtogs par byed// mgon khyod bde ba chen po ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi ston gcig pu//
125a4(rgyud 'bum): sku med srid gsum bdag nyid can// dgongs pa gnyis ka'i mtshan dang ldan// de bas khyod ni chos kun gyi// yon tan gsum bdag de nyid gsum// dgongs pa bya ba dri med gsum// sangs
125a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyas kyi ni bdud rtsi 'byung / / khyod 'dir b+ha ga khyab 'jug ste// ling ga drag po'i ming can nyid// khyod ni sa bon tshangs la brtags// khyod ni rten 'byung 'gro ba 'byung // dus gsum las
125a6(rgyud 'bum): 'das rnal 'byor che/ / dus dang rtsis su gyur pa nyid// shes dang shes bya rnam par grol// de bas khyod ni 'gro ba'i bla// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// de la sogs pa'i tshig gsan nas// dam
125a7(rgyud 'bum): tshig rjes su dran sgom pa/ / bcom ldan 'das ni ston par mdzad// rang gi rdo rje pad+mar ldan// dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyor las// rang gi khu ba'i thigs skyes pa'i// sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' sgom//
125b1(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor rjes su dran bdag nyid// dbang po gnyis nyid sbyor ba las// rang gi tshangs pa rtag drangs te// rnal 'byor pas ni kyil 'khor bya// sku rjes dran pa'i sbyor ba yang // sangs rgyas
125b2(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi phung po lnga/ / sangs rgyas de nyid sogs brtag pa// bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar rig/ gsung rjes dran pa'i sbyor ba lnga// rdo rje chos gsung phun sum tshogs// de yi gsung ci 'dra bar 'gyur/
125b3(rgyud 'bum): bdag kyang de dang 'drar chos 'dzin// thugs rjes dran pa'i sbyor ba gang // rdo rje 'dzin pa'i thugs dang ni// kun tu bzang po'i thugs gang yin// bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur// sems can
125b4(rgyud 'bum): rjes dran sbyor ba gang / / sems can rjes dran rdo rje nyid// spyod pa mkha' mtshungs ji bzhin du// bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur// sngags sku rdo rje gsum zhes pa// de sbyor dran pa sgom
125b5(rgyud 'bum): pa ni/ / rdo rje sngags kyi sku gang yin// gsung dang sku ni rnam sgom pa// de nyid gsum mnyam gcig pa nyid// rtag tu gsum 'das gyur pa yi// sngags 'dzin mchog ni ci 'dra ba// bdag
125b6(rgyud 'bum): kyang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ / dam tshig rjes dran rnams kyis ni// de bas tshangs pa shin tu dbyung // dngos med gcig tu sbyor ba yis// mkhas pas cho ga bzhin du gsung // de bzhin gshegs
125b7(rgyud 'bum): mchog che ba ni/ / dngos med ces bya bsad pa ste// blo dang ldan pas 'di bsad na// dngos grub sngags mchog thob par 'gyur// shes rab dam tshig sbyor gyur pa// rjes su dran pa zhes bshad do//
126a1(rgyud 'bum): pha rol phyin pa zhes grags pa// yod med gnyis dang bral ba'o// thams cad rang bzhin dri ma med// ma skyes pa dang zad pa med// byang chub med cing mngon rtogs med/
126a2(rgyud 'bum): khams med 'byung ba'ang med pa'o// ma skyes rjes su sbyor ba gang // der ni ci yang brjod min zhing // ma skyes ming ni gcig pu pa// dran pa de ni yin par bshad// ji ltar nam mkha' 'od gsal ba//
126a3(rgyud 'bum): mtshan ma med cing 'gyur ba med// rang bzhin mkha' dang 'drar gyur cing // gnyis med gnyis su yod min zhing // yan lag bcu gnyis sbyor gcig gang // zhe sdang rdzogs longs spyod pa'i ming // sangs/
126a4(rgyud 'bum): rgyas kun gyis bsten gyur cing // de ni rigs rjes dran zhes bya// rten 'byung las skyes rdzogs sangs te// bud med lo grangs bcu gnyis pa// brtan pa'i sems ni thob pa las// rang gi khu bas mchod par
126a5(rgyud 'bum): bya dngos med bdag nyid dag pa gang / / de ni dag par bshad pa yin// de nyid kyis ni mchod par bsngags// shes rab pha rol phyin pas 'gro// 'di yis lus la mchod pa dang // khyad par du ni de bzhin
126a6(rgyud 'bum): gshegs/ / rdo rje 'dzin bshad de bzhin thugs// chos 'dzin pa yi sku gsung thugs// sku gsung thugs ni gang dag grub// tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// gang bshad rigs ni dman bshad pa// de la'ang
126a7(rgyud 'bum): tshul de grub par 'gyur/ / de nyid mchod par bshad pa nyid// de bzhin so sor rab tu brtag/ mi phyed rdo rje'i sbyor ba yang // gsung gi dbang bskur ba nyid gsal// dgongs pa lung bstan la gnas nas//
126b1(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig sems ni ma rmongs pa// mkha' la gnas pa'i nyi ma bzhin// de ni ci dgar spyod par byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// rdo rje gsum gyi gsang ba ste// sngags spyod pa yi//
126b2(rgyud 'bum): mchog gyur pa// le'u bdun pa rab tu bstan// / de nas dpal ldan de bzhin gshegs// dkon mchog dpal ni 'od chen po// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi//
126b3(rgyud 'bum): bla ma rdo rje gsum gyi bdag/ mgon po rdo rje 'dzin chen po// dbang phyug dbang phyug dam pa dang // sangs rgyas kun gyi ston pa la// bstod pa 'di yis gsol ba btab// nam mkha'i spyod pa rdo rje mchog
126b4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems dpa' thub pa che/ / theg pa chen po'i rnam snang ba// kun tu bzang po brtul zhugs bzang // dngos kun dngos po gcig pa'i mchog/ rigs mchog thams cad yang dag 'byung //
126b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyal ba'i dam pa'i mchod pa'i mchog/ mchod pa kun mchog bshad du gsol// 'dod chags chen po zhe sdang che// gti mug chen po blo gros che// theg pa gsum po rab ston cing // rdo rje
126b6(rgyud 'bum): theg pa ston pa po/ / nam mkha' gcig pu dngos po'i mchog/ ye shes rgya mtsho tha ma che// rdo rje gsum po chags med pa// rgyal gnas mchod pa bshad du gsol// rdo rje gsum po lam gyi mchog
126b7(rgyud 'bum): thar lam gcig pu ston pa po/ / sangs rgyas skal mchog shin tu dag/ mi mchog mchod pa bshad du gsol// dngos po kun gcig shin tu dag/ byang chub sems ni rgya mtsho che// chos kyi 'khor lo
127a1(rgyud 'bum): gcig bskor ba/ / rten 'brel ye shes las byung ba// rdo rje gsum gcig rnam dag don// sna tshogs sangs rgyas bya ba mdzad// bdag med med chos shin tu dag/ phyag 'tshal
127a2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje theg pa la'o/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs bdag po// thams cad nam mkha' mi 'gyur che// thams cad dbang bskur kun dbang po// kun don rin chen mchog 'dzin pa'ang // na chung mig
127a3(rgyud 'bum): yangs btsal nas ni/ / gzugs dang na tshod rnams kyis brgyan// lo grangs nyi shu lnga lon pa// rnyed nas mi yi skye gnas brtag/ rnam par dben nam gtsang ba yi// sa phyogs su ni rgyal bdag nyid
127a4(rgyud 'bum): zhe bzhi pa'i gnas yid 'ong / / bshang gci chu yis byugs nas ni// sangs rgyas byang chub rab ster ba'o// rtag tu mchod pa nyid bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa yi// phung po zhes bya sna tshog
127a5(rgyud 'bum): skyes/ / rdo rje gsum po mi phyed khams// rgyal ba zhes ni bya bar bshad// kun mkhyen ye shes lang tsho ste// len pa mi gsal la sbyor la// de nyid na chung yin par brtag/ 'jig rten pa rnams 'thob byed
127a6(rgyud 'bum): rgya'agro ba'i don ni rab grub pa/ / gang zhig dngos med ces bshad pa// mtha' skyes bzhin du brtag pa yin// gtsang ba rnam dag sems yin te// rnam par dben pa dngos med pa// sa ni spyan zhes bya
127a7(rgyud 'bum): ba yin/ / sa phyogs rgyal ba 'byung ba yin// zhi ba sna tshogs nges 'byung ba// zhi ba'i gnas ni myur la sogs// bshang gci yul dang dbang por grags// chu ni shes rab la sogs drug/ 'odi dag gis
127b1(rgyud 'bum): gang byugs gyur pa/ / rdzogs longs spyod pa'i 'dod 'byung ba// de dag rgyal ba'i chos bshad pa// dgongs pa sbyor ba chos nyid do// mchod pa'i yan lag gnyis pa yis// bkod pa'i yan lag mtshan
127b2(rgyud 'bum): nyid bshad/ / 'jig rten shin tu 'das spyi bo// 'jig rten 'das pa'i snying kha ru// rkang pa'i bar dang lte ba dang // rked pa gsang ba 'jig rten pa// rgyal sras rnams kyi bkod pa ni// rigs ni
127b3(rgyud 'bum): lnga po bya ba yin/ / nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par// ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par sgom// bdag nyid zla ba'i nang gnas par// brtul zhugs can gyis snying khar sgom// chu de sbyor bar gyur pa ni// ma
127b4(rgyud 'bum): ma kIr ni yongs su brtag/ zhi ba rdo rje 'dzin 'dod pas// bsdu ba de yang rab tu bya// rin chen rang bzhin mchod rten ni// 'od zer sna tshogs nyid kyis brgyan// ye shes rgya mtsho dus gsum pa// gnas
127b5(rgyud 'bum): de ru ni bsam bya ba/ / blo ldan pa spu'i bu ga las// ji lta ji ltar spro bar bya// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor mchog gzhol bas// mchod pa'i sprin ni des spro bya// gos dkar pad+mar yang dag dgod// rnam lnga gcig
127b6(rgyud 'bum): la rnal 'byor ma/ / me yi sbyor ba bshad pa ni// de yang mi gsal zhi la gnas// sgron mar ut+pal nyid gyur pa// rlung ste sbyor ba lnga pa'o// 'jug dang gnas dang skye ba dang // de bzhin spang ba'i ming can no//
127b7(rgyud 'bum): de nyid rnam pa gsum byas pas// rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig gnas// de nas blo ldan gyis dbul ba// lha rnams kyi yang dngos med nyid// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog/ khyab bdag rnam sdang chen po las/
128a1(rgyud 'bum): @me tog dgongs pa thos nas ni// rdo rje can gyis thub chen zhus// me dang rlung dang dbang chen dang // chu ru yongs su brtag pa yin// re re'ang dang po sbyor zhes bya// me tog de lnga gsum
128a2(rgyud 'bum): du bshad/ / bya rgod me tog za ba dang // bung ba sha za zhes zer zhing // me tog 'di yi dgongs pa ni// ma 'ongs skye bos mi shes so// ma rtogs pas ni de rnams kyi// dngos grub ring du gnas par
128a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / 'di ltar bdag ni skal min zhes// smra zhing de rnams bdag nyid smod// de ltar bdag nyid kyis smad pas// sangs rgyas thams cad smad par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad smad gyur pas/
128a4(rgyud 'bum): mi las 'das nas gzhan du 'gro// gtso bo sangs rgyas nang na min// phyi rol na min gnyis kar min// tshogs pa las ni ma yin te// rkyen gyis 'gro ba dag la gnas// de bzhin de bzhin gshegs
128a5(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas/ / lus la gsang sngags 'di nyid las// gsang sngags 'grub par dka' ba'i rgyus// des ni bdag dang de dag smod// de rnams rjes su gzung ba'i phyir// dgongs pas de ni bshad du
128a6(rgyud 'bum): gsol/ / rang gi ngo bo ma 'tshal na// mkhas pa dag ni nyams par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan sna tshogs pas// gsang ba'i bdag po la gsungs pa// nyin dang mtshan mo dbye ba yis// me tog don ni
128a7(rgyud 'bum): bshad par bya/ / pad+ma ut+pal nyin mor bshad// dzA ti mtshan mo yin zhes bshad// lnga yi bdag nyid gsum dang gcig/ gnyis lnga gcig dang gsum du 'gyur// de yi thabs ni nyin mor bshad//
128b1(rgyud 'bum): mtshan mo shes rab ces bshad do// nyin dang mtshan mo'i dbye ba yis// 'jug tu 'byung ba nyid du 'gyur// de gnyis dbus kyi sbyor ba gang // dgongs pas yongs su brtag pa yin// de ni sangs
128b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyas snying por 'gyur/ / de bas lha tshogs kyis de min// rnal 'byor pa dang sngags pa rnams// dgongs pa'i chos la rab brtson bya// dgongs pa byin rlabs rgyu yis ni// de rnams kyis ni 'grub
128b3(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / gang zhig rlung ni bcur grags pa// de ni pad+ma ut+pal ming // de nyid ces grags rdo rje gsum// dzA ti gcig pu gsum du 'dod// kar ni ka dang ma li ka/ yug ti ka ra bI ra ni/
128b4(rgyud 'bum): go rims bzhin tu spyan sogs te// sa la sogs par 'dir sbyar ro// dngos med go 'phang la bkod pas// lha rnams kyi ni skur sbyor bas// gcig tu sangs rgyas kun mnyes pa'i// mchod pa chen
128b5(rgyud 'bum): por de 'gyur ro/ / lnga po'i bdag nyid yang dag bzhag/ lnga bcu dag ni gnyis 'gyur byas// de nyid gsum sbyor 'khor lo ni// dpag tshad brgya yi dkyil 'khor ro// der ni mkhas pas rtag
128b6(rgyud 'bum): par ni/ / rigs rnams rab tu dgod par bya// pad+ma 'khor lo rdo rje dang // de bzhin ut+pal rtag tu sgom// dpag tshad bzhi po sbyor gcig pa// dpag tshad rgya khyon de nyid gsum// byams pa la
128b7(rgyud 'bum): sogs gru bzhir 'gyur/ / mdzes pa phung pos brgyan pa yin// gru bzhi de ni rigs su gyur// zhi ba sbyor ba gcig ming can// mchod rten ye shes sems rang bzhin// gsal zhing rang bzhin dri ma
129a1(rgyud 'bum): med/ / rigs rnams mchod phyir de nyid ni// shes rab can gyis gnas sgom mo// mngon shes lnga yi gnas 'dod rnams// de yi mchod pa rgya mtshogs la// rin chen ye shes
129a2(rgyud 'bum): spro bdag nyid/ / gos ni bsdu ba zhes bya'o// mchod pa mchog rnams de dag gis// byang chub 'dod pas mchod par bya// shes rab can gyis mchod mchog las// lha rnams rtag tu mnyes par bya// sbyor
129a3(rgyud 'bum): gcig de las yang dag byung / / rin chen 'byung gnas na chung min/ dga' mgu yang dag ldan pa yin// dngos grub shin tu grub pa'i phyir// nga rgyal la sogs bdun zhes bya// rin chen thams cad
129a4(rgyud 'bum): dbul bar bya/ / chos dang rdzogs longs spyod las byung // rin chen bdun gyi nor de ni// des bkang ba yi zhing 'di ni// shes rab thabs gcig las byung ba'i// dngos grub 'dod pas sbyin pa'i phyir/
129a5(rgyud 'bum): zhing de nyin re dbul bar ni// nam mkha' mtha' yas rnal 'byor pa'i// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin 'dir 'gyur// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus su de// phyag rgya'i bdag por mnyam bzhag ste//
129a6(rgyud 'bum): 'dod chags blo ldan sangs rgyas la// reg par yang dag sbyor ba dbul// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor dam pa sgom// bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs
129a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sku/ / yul dang dbang po sun 'byin pa// dngos med gcig par yang dag 'byung // yul dang dbang po zhes bya ba'i// bshang gci ji lta ji lta bar// de nyid mchod pa rnams kyis mchod//
129b1(rgyud 'bum): skal bzang bzhin ni mdzes pa yi/ bud med gzugs bzang rnyed pa dang // gsang sngags yi ge'i gnas 'gyur bas// rnal 'byor ma de byin brlabs la// byas nas gnyis med sbyor gcig pu/
129b2(rgyud 'bum): rang gi lus ni nang du gzhug/ spyan sogs ji lta ji lta bar// byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas bkod de// mig bzang dag pa'i bya ba yi// rang byung khu ba blangs nas mchod// gang zhig de ltar rtog
129b3(rgyud 'bum): pa de/ / blangs pas rdo rje 'chang bar 'gyur// sa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gang // spyan la sogs par rab brtag pa// de ni 'jug sogs sbyor ba yang // de ni khu ba za bar 'gyur//
129b4(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi mchod pa ste// rdo rje ye shes can gsang gi/ gsang sngags dngos grub byed pas mchog/ rin chen kun gyi 'byung gnas mchog
129b5(rgyud 'bum): dgongs pa lung bstan la gnas nas/ / gang zhig sems ni bzod gyur pa// de ni ji bzhin nyid du'ang byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis// rdo rje gsung gi gsang ba las// bshad
129b6(rgyud 'bum): gci'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i/ / le'u brgyad pa yin par bshad// / de nas de bzhin gshegs mchog gtso// thams cad nam mkha' mi 'gyur che// sangs rgyas dbang
129b7(rgyud 'bum): bskur spyod pa'i mchog/ gzugs don dbang phyug dam pa yin// rdo rje gsum nyid longs spyod pa// rdo rje mi phyed gsum dkyil 'khor// sangs rgyas ye shes sbyor gcig pa'o// gsang ba nyam
130a1(rgyud 'bum): ni dga' bar bshad/ / nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya// rdo rje rtse gcig rdo rje yang // sgom pa'i bdag nyid can gyis
130a2(rgyud 'bum): bsgom/ / 'od 'phro mang po 'bar ba dang // 'od zer sna lngas rab tu gang // dus gsum sangs rgyas yang dag 'byung // bsgoms la rdo rjes phye mar brlag/ rdo rje gsum gcig longs spyod ni// rdo rjes
130a3(rgyud 'bum): phyir brlags med gyur pa'i/ / thugs kyi dngos grub byed bsam gtan// bsgoms na myur du thob par 'gyur// rdo rje mchog ces bya ba yi// rdo rje gsang ba 'di lta bu// rdo rjes rdo rje 'dzin pa ni//
130a4(rgyud 'bum): sems can thams cad bsad na ni// de ni myur bar mi bskyod pa'i// rgyal ba'i sras su skye bar 'gyur// zhe sdang rigs chen de nyid kyis// zhing de 'gengs par byed par 'gyur// de nas dgongs pa
130a5(rgyud 'bum): chos gcig pu/ / gtso bo kun mkhyen thams cad rig/ dam tshig de nyid gsungs pa yi// mgon la phyag na rdo rjes gsol// 'di ltar dngos med mchog gyur pa// khyod ni chos rnams ston mdzad pa//
130a6(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten pa dang 'gal tshig gis// mgon khyod ci phyir ston par mdzad// gang zhig de bzhin nyid dngos gcig/ dus gsum byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams// chos sku gcig pu las 'khrungs pa// ji ltar
130a7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rjes phye mar brlag/ de ni phyer brlags gyur pa las// ji ltar yang dag sems 'grub 'gyur// chos sku gcig pu las byung las// lhag par zhes bya gyur nas su// dus gsum 'byung ba'i
130b1(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas rnams/ / phye mar brlag par ji ltar nus// phyir brlag byed pas dngos med pas// phye ma nyid kyang khyad par du// sangs rgyas sngags don rnal 'byor pa// nus pa bsam mi khyab ldan la//
130b2(rgyud 'bum): de 'dra bar ni phyer brlag par// sngags pa gzhan gyis mi nus so// sems can gyis ni sems can bzhin// sangs rgyas phyir brlag pas// 'di gnyis khyad par med do zhes// ma 'ongs skye bo smra bar
130b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / sangs rgyas gcig pu mthar thug pa// min zhes mi rnams nges smra zhing // gang zhig sangs rgyas kyis gsungs bzhin// rab tu spong bar byed par 'gyur// theg bzang bsgrubs na
130b4(rgyud 'bum): 'tshang rgya ba/ dgongs pa'i bum pa bzang po mchog/ de ni bcom ldan myur sbyor bas/ mi bskyod zhing du skyes 'gyur ram// sems can 'khor bar 'khor gyur pa// de tshe zhe sdang che skye 'am//
130b5(rgyud 'bum): snying rjes gsad par bya'o zhes// sngags pa rnams ni de mi spong // 'das tshe stong par gyur pa dang // da lta rjes su ston mdzad dang // mnyes bya ma 'ongs sangs rgyas rnams// sangs rgyas byang chub
130b6(rgyud 'bum): stsol ba'o/ / mi bskyod gzugs can rdo rje yis// de rnams ji ltar gzhom par bgyi// de nyid sna tshogs don ldan tshig/ de rnams kyis ni ji ltar rtogs// gang zhig shes pas rgyal sras
130b7(rgyud 'bum): rnams/ / dgongs pa'i don la rtog med 'gyur// ma 'ongs sde bo'i don du ni// de nyid bcom ldan bshad du gsol// de nas rdo rje 'dzin smra yis// 'gro la phan pa'i tshig gsan nas/
131a1(rgyud 'bum): de nas gtso bo rdo rje 'chang // khyab bdag gis ni slar gsungs pa// legs so bu khyod cher legs te// kun tu bzang po khyod legs so// dgongs pas bshad pa'i don du ni//
131a2(rgyud 'bum): khyod kyis nga la gang dris pa// gsungs don ji lta ji lta bar// de ni nga yis bshad par bya// phung sogs yan lag gang gyur pa// sangs rgyas sems can rab brtan zhing // sngags dang phyag rgya'i
131a3(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba yang / / dbye ba sna tshogs rab tu bstan// 'khor ba mi bskyod ming can te// de'i sngags rdo rje zhes bya ba// mi gsal rdo rje zhes bshad de// dngos med gcig pu rdo rje nyid// des bshig pa ni bas
131a4(rgyud 'bum): po ste/ / sangs rgyas sems can khyad par du// sna ni tshogs kyi dbang po yi// kha ni rang bzhin nyid du g.yo// rnal 'byor pa yi lag gyur pa// 'gro ba rlung gi ming can no// mi bskyod rdo rje'i sbyor
131a5(rgyud 'bum): ba nyid/ / lag tu rdo rje gzhag nas ni// de tshe myur la sogs bya ba// klu yi rang bzhin sna tshogs nyid// phung sogs brtag pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// sku gsung thugs las yang dag 'byung // de yi
131a6(rgyud 'bum): yan lag phung por bshad/ / de ni phyir 'gyur bsad pa yin// 'di ni zhe sdang rigs yid 'ong // mi bskyod ye shes rdo rje nyid// de yi zhing skyed dam pa yin// dngos grub chen po des 'thob 'gyur// de nas
131a7(rgyud 'bum): dpal ldan bde chen po/ / ye shes thar pa rab sgrub pa// rang bzhin dag gis gos med pa// byang chub spyod pa rab sgrub pas// phyag na rdo rje 'od chen po// gsang ba gsum gyi gtso bo la// bos nas yang
131b1(rgyud 'bum): dag rdzogs sangs rgyas/ / sgrub pa'i dam tshig de nyid gsungs// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// rdo rje dkyil 'khor dam pa la// rnam par snang mdzad bsgom bya zhing // sangs rgyas thams cad
131b2(rgyud 'bum): rnam par sgom/ / rin chen kun gyi sbyor ba yis// rdo rje gzugs ni rnam par sgom// rdo rje gsum mnyam sbyor ba yis// rdzas rnams thams cad dbrog par bya// shes dang dbang po ldog par 'gyur//
131b3(rgyud 'bum): / rnam smin dngos po med pa gang // de nyid dbrog pa'i rdo rje ste// sangs rgyas thams cad rab sgrub bo// rin chen rdo rje mchog sbyor ba// rgyal ba'i sras su 'gyur ba dang // nor gyi rgya mtshos
131b4(rgyud 'bum): gang ba yi/ / yid bzhin nor bu 'dra bar 'gyur// 'di ni gti mug rigs de nyid// dam tshig yin par yongs su bsgrags// rigs kun rgya mtsho zhes bya ste// de las thub pa'i skyes
131b5(rgyud 'bum): mchog 'gyur/ / de nas bdag po bcom ldan 'das// 'dod chags thar par rab 'jug pa// gsang ba dag pa gnas med pa// dkyil 'khor mchog ni bka' stsal to// nam mkha'i dbyings
131b6(rgyud 'bum): kyi dbus gnas par/ / rin chen dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// dpal med chos ni rnam bsgoms te// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu dgang // bud med lta bu'i sbyor ba yang // ting nge 'dzin gyis
131b7(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba yis/ / thams cad de ru bsgom par bya// 'di ni rdo rje tshul mchog yin// dngos med bsam pa'i sbyor ba yis// gsal mi gsal la yang dag sbyar// chos dang rdzogs longs spyod sbyor ba//
132a1(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags kyis sprul dbang po gnyis// sbyor ba bzhi yi sbyor ba yis// dbang po gnyis ni rab 'byor pa'i// snyoms zhugs sbyor ba de yi ni// de dag thams cad
132a2(rgyud 'bum): bar spyod/ / sku gsum mi phyed sngags rnams kyi// 'di ni sgom pa mchog de yin// de nyid dam tshig sbyor ba 'di// 'dod chags rigs gcig sgom pa'o// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//
132a3(rgyud 'bum): 'dod chags chen po'i tshul mchog ste// sngags pa rnams kyis nyin re zhing // rab tu 'bad pas bsgom par bya// de nas gsang dbang rdo rje gsum// rdo rje sngags don sgrub pa'o// bdag med
132a4(rgyud 'bum): ye shes las byung bas/ / gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// don yod rdo rje rnam bsgoms te// sangs rgyas
132a5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad bsgom par bya/ / rdo rje tshig gi brdzun smra ba// rgyal ba thams cad bslu ba ste// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// nam mkha'i gsung ni dri med pa'o// gang zhig brdzun du smra bshad pa/
132a6(rgyud 'bum): brdzun de nyid ni dam pa ste// dpa' bo gang zhig sgom byed pa// de ni rgyal ba'i mchog tu 'gyur// gsang ba'i ye shes dam pa ste// sangs rgyas dngos grub byed pa'i mchog/ dam tshig 'gugs par gang
132a7(rgyud 'bum): gyur pa'i/ / rigs kyi dam tshig la 'jug pa'o// kun tu kun nas 'bad pa yis// ji bzhin don du drang byas te// so sor rtog pa'i sbyor ba yis// de ni dngos grub rgya chen 'thob// de nas bcom ldan
132b1(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs pa/ / mi byed rdo rje gsum rgyal bdag// rdo rje'i dngos grub rab ston pas// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// der ni dkyil 'khor bsgom par/
132b2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas sku ru rab brtag pa'i// dam tshig de ni yang dag bshad// dkon mchog dpal ni rab bsgoms te// gzugs rnams kun gyis sa 'di gang // phung po la sogs grangs mnyam pa'i//
132b3(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kun gyis thams cad du// rtsub pa'i ngag la sogs pa ni// sa rnams dman pa zhes bya ba'i// bsgoms na dngos grub thob 'gyur zhes// bcom ldan thub pas de skad gsungs// de bzhin
132b4(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa kun bkod pa/ / sna tshogs gzugs can 'od po che// bsam pas dpal ldan gcig pu nyid// dpag tu med par gyur pa yin// de nas gang zhig dam tshig sogs// chos dbyings rdo rje
132b5(rgyud 'bum): gsum nyid ni/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis// dam tshig rdo rje dpal la sogs// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// ngo mtshar rmad du gyur nas ni// tshig lam rdo rje zhes bya
132b6(rgyud 'bum): 'di/ / de ni de rnams brjod par byed// ci ni mgon po bcom ldan 'das// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag/ gang zhig khams gsum las 'das shing // 'jig rten thams cad las 'das
132b7(rgyud 'bum): bang de bzhin gshegs pa kun mchog dang / / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen gyi// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// ngo mtshar che ba'i tshig gi lam// gtso bo'i yang dag rdo rje'i tshig/
133a1(rgyud 'bum): dgongs pas ci slad gang gsungs shes// brjod kyis mi lang ba yi yang // brjod mi lang ba rnams kyis gsol// de nas de bzhin gshegs kun gyis// brjod kyis mi lang
133a2(rgyud 'bum): ba yi yang / / brjod kyis mi lang grangs kyi ni// ri rab rdul phran dang mnyam pa'i// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang // dam tshig rdo rje dpal sogs pa'i/
133a3(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems chen la// dngos med las byung gsal ba gsungs// dman dang smad pa'i 'du shes ni// rgyal ba'i sras rnams ma skyed cig/ ci'i phyir zhe na de bzhin gshegs//
133a4(rgyud 'bum): 'byung ba gang 'di spyod mchog yin// 'di ltar sngags kyi spyod mchog 'di// rnam par dag yin rigs kyi bu// sangs rgyas mnyam med 'byung 'gyur 'di// gsang ba'i sngags don spyod pa nyid// 'di
133a5(rgyud 'bum): ltar dper na rigs kyi bu/ / nam mkha' kun tu song ba ste// chos rnams kun kyang der rtogs shing // rab dbye'i sbyor bar gyur pa nyid// 'dod pa'i khams na mi gnas shing // de ni gzugs kyi khams mi
133a6(rgyud 'bum): gnas/ / de bzhin gzugs med khams na'ang min// 'byung ba bzhi la de mi gnas// rigs kyi bu chos thams cad kyang // de ltar don gyi dbang mkhyen nas// dgongs pa'i dbang gis rgyal ba rnams//
133a7(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs rnams dgongs nyid kyis// chos rnams ston par mdzad pa yin// de bzhin du ni khyed rnams kyis// mdor na khong du chud bar bya// yang dag byang chub don rnams kyis// nam mkha'i
133b1(rgyud 'bum): nges tshig sbyor bas ni/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sbyor ba byung // dam tshig rjes su rig par bya// 'di ltar dper na rigs kyi bu// gtsub shing gtsub stan bcas pa dang // skyes bu'i lag pa
133b2(rgyud 'bum): bskyod pa yis/ / rkyen las du ba 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas me yang 'byung mod kyi// gtsub shing la sogs re re nas// 'di ltar so sor brtags na go/ me de ganga'ang mi gnas so// khrag cha
133b3(rgyud 'bum): dang ni gzugs brnyan dang / / sgyu ma dang ni smig rgyu dang // de bzhin chu zla rmi lam ste// chos rnams thams cad de dang 'dra// mgon po pi wang sgra lta bu// rkyen don las tshig yang dag byung //
133b4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin 'gro 'ong gnas pa rnams// cung zad tsam yang yod ma yin// gnas med gnas pa'i sbyor ba yis// gnas pa nam mkha'i mtshan nyid yin// des na khyed kyis rdo rje yis// dam tshig
133b5(rgyud 'bum): rjes su rig par bya/ / de ltar chos rnams dngos med ces// gsang ba'i de nyid don mkhas pas// rnam par smin pa ldog bya'i phyir// phung po de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs// de nas byang chub
133b6(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' rnams/ / ngo mtshar rmad du byung nas ni// rngams pa yis ni mig gdangs te// tshig ni 'di skad ces gsol to// chos 'di ngo mtshar rmad byung ste// nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs pa yi//
133b7(rgyud 'bum): mi rtog rnam par dag pa yang // kun rdzob tu ni bshad par mdzad// dam tshig chen po yang dag gnas// dgongs pa lung ston mchog la ni// gang zhig yid 'ong bzod gyur pa// de ni de bzhin spyod pa
134a1(rgyud 'bum): yin/ / mchog tu dga' ba'i de nyid don// gsang ba chen po zhes bya ba// dam tshig tshul ni yang dag bshad// le'u dgu pa rdzogs pa yin// / de nas
