134a2(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa kun/ / rdo rje gsum 'byung bcom ldan 'das// slar yang dgongs pa 'dus nas ni// bla ma chen po bcom ldan 'das// dam tshig rdo rje de nyid gnas// mngon par byang chub deng
134a3(rgyud 'bum): dpon nyid/ / sku dang gsung thugs gtsang gtso la// btud de de bzhin gshegs pas gsol// snying po sngags ni kun bsdus pas// gsang ba yang dag rdo rje gsum// dngos grub chen po'i
134a4(rgyud 'bum): tshul gyi mchog/ de nyid bcom ldan bshad du gsol// de bzhin gshegs pa kun ye shes// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub gsol// gsung gcig du ma'i rnam par rtog/ yang dag bsdus don
134a5(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gsung / / de nas bdag po bcom ldan 'das// nyon mongs kun gyi rgya mtsho gtso// 'bar ba drag po spyan yangs pas// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// sku la sogs pa'i rdo rje
134a6(rgyud 'bum): gsum/ / sku dang gsung thugs sgom pa ni// mnyam zhing rnam par mi rtog pa// dmigs pa med cing gnas med pa'o// de nas mgon po bcom ldan 'das// rang bzhin dag pa'i de bzhin gshegs//
134a7(rgyud 'bum): pha rol phyin pa sngags tshul gyi// rdo rje zhes bya'i ting 'dzin la// dpa' bo chen po snyoms zhugs te// de bzhin gshegs kun la gsungs pa// gang phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// de bzhin
134b1(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa kun 'di na/ / mgon po mi bskyod la sogs pa'i// de bzhin gshegs pa du ma dang // rig pa bye ba khrag khrig ni// brgya stong du ma zhes bya dang // sems can don bya la rol dang /
134b2(rgyud 'bum): mchog ni de rnams ston par mdzad// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams mchog tu// 'dod pa'i yon tan lngar ldan pas// rol cing dgyes par gyur pa dang // yongs su spyod pa yod kyang ni// sngags
134b3(rgyud 'bum): spyod pa la brtson rnams la/ / kye ma dpa' bo de bzhin gshegs// rang gtso gsang sngags spyod tshul mchog/ chos bdag med pa'i rang bzhin can// 'di dag rdzogs par gyur mnyam nas/
134b4(rgyud 'bum): spyan ras kyis ni 'tsho mi mdzad// de ltar rnam par spyad pa'i don// gsang sngags brtul zhugs spyod rnams la// yang dag par ni byin brlabs phyir// de ni ston par mdzad 'di yin// de nas de
134b5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa mchog/ thub la phyag na rdo rjes gsol// mgon po de bzhin gshegs de rnams// so so skye bar gyur pa la// dngos po med cing dmigs su med// nam mkha'i khams
134b6(rgyud 'bum): dang mnyam gyur nas/ / 'dod pa'i yon tan lngar ldan nas/ ji ltar de rnams rol par mdzad// de rnams phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du// nges par gyur pa'i 'khor rnams dang // sems can
134b7(rgyud 'bum): don gyi bya ba kun/ / 'dod pas ston par mdzad pa yin// mgon po 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams// sbyin sogs drug ces bya bar 'byung // thams cad dag kyang de nyid 'byung // pha rol phyin par
135a1(rgyud 'bum): mnyam gzhag nyid/ / de ltar pha rol phyin 'byung ba'i// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan// 'gro ba'i don gyi bya ba yang // 'dod pa lnga po 'di yis mdzad// 'di rnams
135a2(rgyud 'bum): kyis ni mgon po 'di/ / mi bskyod la sogs rgyal ba rnams// rol cing dgyes par mdzad pa dang // 'gro ba'i don yang mdzad gyur cing // 'jig rten pa dang 'gal bya rnams// de yang de bzhin mdzad gyur pa// dag pa rdo rje'i
135a3(rgyud 'bum): tshig mchog 'di/ / de rnams kyis ni rtogs par 'gyur// phyag byar 'os pa'i rig pa ni// nges par ldan pa nges par 'dod// yod med la sogs byed pa ni// gnyis gyur mtshan ma can du
135a4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / phyogs bcu lam du chos gsungs pa// gang zhig 'jig rten phung po lnga// khams la sogs par mtshon pa gang // gzugs sogs zhes bya'i ming can yin// 'di ni yan lag
135a5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad ni/ / bya ba nyan thos theg pa'o// de nyid rkyen gyi theg pa ste// tshig de ston par mdzad pa 'di// gang zhig rdo rje theg par gnas// de bzhin ji bzhin sgra ru 'dzin// shes rab pha rol
135a6(rgyud 'bum): phyin pa la/ / nges par 'byung ba'i tshul gsum po// chos sku ngo bo la sogs pa// mkha' dbyings mtha' yas rnal 'byor pa// gnas med gnas par sbyor ba yis// 'gro ba'i snying du rnam
135a7(rgyud 'bum): rol pa/ / zhi ba gcig la gnas pa'i mgon// 'khor ba dang ni cig shos spangs// sngags las yang dag 'byung ba de// mi bskyod la sogs par brtags rnams// dngos med gnas la gnas
135b1(rgyud 'bum): pas na/ / sgrub pa po rnams gzigs mi 'gyur// gsang sngags rkyen gyi sbyor ba yis// de ni rdzogs longs spyod gzigs 'gyur// bcom ldan gsang ba gsungs pa 'di// don de 'tshal bar ma
135b2(rgyud 'bum): gyur pas/ / rnam rtog du ma'i kun rtog las// chos nyid de yis shes mi 'gyur// ji skad gsungs pa mi shes pas// phyi dus skye bo la la smra// 'jig rten pa rnams drang bya'i phyir// gsang bar gyur pa
135b3(rgyud 'bum): bstan du gsol/ / de nas bcom ldan sna tshogs pas// lag na rdo rje grags pa che// dgongs pa'i don ni rtogs gyur pa// bu khyod shes rab chen po legs// gang zhig shes pas ma 'ongs pa'i// skye bo
135b4(rgyud 'bum): rnam par mi rtog 'gyur/ / tshig gcig la yang sna tshogs don// yang dag bsdus nas khyod kyis bshad// de nas dam pa bcom ldan 'das// bla ma kun mkhyen thams cad rig/ skyes bu dam pa de dag
135b5(rgyud 'bum): la/ spyan ras kyis ni 'tsho bya'i phyir// rdo rje gsum gyi gsang ba 'di// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mchog/ sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi// gsang ba yi ni mchog gi gnas// snying po sngags rnams
135b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi/ / bskul ba gcig pu zhes bya ba// de bzhin gshegs kun gsang gcig pu// mchog las mchog tu gsungs gyur pa// sku gsung thugs kyi yang dag rtogs// dam tshig la ni dmigs
135b7(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / / rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sku gsung thugs// dam tshig la ni dmigs pa dang // chos 'dzin pa yi sku gsung thugs// dam tshig la dmigs de bzhin no// nyid sku gsung thugs rdo rje las// tshig las
136a1(rgyud 'bum): nges par brjod pa ni/ / de nyid sngags su yang dag bsdus// sna tshogs gsung ba gzugs gcig pu// yi ge hUM ni sku gsungs la// de nas yi ge oM gsungs te// de bzhin mgon
136a2(rgyud 'bum): pos yi ge AH/ / swA ni de bzhin bzhi pa yin// hA yang 'dod lhar gyur pa ste// de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas lnga// hUM oM AHswA de bzhin hA// 'di ni gsungs pa tsam gyis ni// sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa
136a3(rgyud 'bum): kun/ / rab tu 'dar zhing brgyal bar gyur// de rnams gnyis med sbyor la gnas// rdo rje sems dpa' rjes su dran// zhi ba'i sbyor bar chos gcig pa'i// rnam par mi rtog chos gcig skyes// de nas
136a4(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das de yang / / de bzhin gshegs kun bdag po yis// de yi byin rlabs sbyor don du// dam tshig 'di dag bka' stsal to// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// dkyil 'khor
136a5(rgyud 'bum): bkod pa zhes bya ba/ / re re'ang gsum gyi sbyor ba yis// sgom par sbyor ba bsgom par bya// bye brag gsum po gcig brtags pa'o// bkod pa mi gsal ba nyid do// zla ba'i dbus gnas yi hUM/
136a6(rgyud 'bum): rang gi gzugs gcig rab tu brtag/ rdo rje 'od zer rab 'bar ba// rnam par 'phro ba bsam par bya// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs// snying la de yis rnam bsgoms nas// dpal ldan de 'dis
136a7(rgyud 'bum): cig der/ / rdo rje gsum gyi rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje sems dpa' dbang chen gtso// 'di ni kun mchog chen por skye// rang gi sngags kyis bskyed bya ba// sngags kyi cho ga dam pa'o// snying po rang gi rdo rje sngags/
136b1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje bsdus pa zhes bshad do// rang sngags tshul las byung ba'o// skyes bu'i gzugs su bsgom par bya// sbyor ba bzhi po sbyor gcig pus// gnas bzhi dag tu de dgod do// kha dog gsum po zhal
136b2(rgyud 'bum): gsum lha'i/ / de nyid gsum gcig rnam sgom zhes// bcom ldan 'das mchog nam mkha' ni// rdo rje dam tshig gtso bos gsungs// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog/ zhi ba'i bdag nyid thub pa che/
136b3(rgyud 'bum): gtso la phyag na rdo rje yis// gsang ba 'di ni slar zhus pa// hUM oM AHdang swA hA zhes// de nas 'di ni gsungs gyur pas// sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa kun// de nas rab 'dar brgyal gyur cing /
136b4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems dpa' rjes dran pa/ thub chen de 'dir ji lta bur// mgon po de ni phyi dus na// ji skad gsungs pa mi rtogs la// gcig pu mkha' mnyam sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen
136b5(rgyud 'bum): rnams/ / rab tu 'dar zhing brgyal gyur zhes// byis pa rnams kyis mi rtogs so// lan brgya stong dang bye ba yi// grangs dag tu ni ston mdzad cing // ston pa sna tshogs ston mdzad kyang // 'dar zhing brgyal ba
136b6(rgyud 'bum): de ma gyur/ / ma 'ongs dus na'ang 'byung 'gyur ba// mi ni mkhas pa'i nga rgyal can// bla ma'i lung ni blangs nas su// rtags ni rang nyid 'dzin par byed// de ni sngags don gsungs pa yi// mtshan nyid
136b7(rgyud 'bum): gsang 'di mi shes par/ / sngags don de nyid mkhas pa yis// gzhan rnams la ni mi snyan sgrogs// 'khrul pa cung zad tsam mthong na// bzhad gang dag ni byed par 'gyur// reg na dug dang mtshungs
137a1(rgyud 'bum): pa yi/ / mi de zhi bar mi 'gyur ro// gang zhig yid ni rin chen 'dra'i// 'gro la phan pa'i sngags pa rnams// 'di ni ma 'ongs dus su yang // dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur/
137a2(rgyud 'bum): de rnams yang dag bsdu ba'i phyir// skad cig rjes gsungs grub don du// sbyor bar dgongs pa'i bsam pa can// bcom ldan 'di ni bshad du gsol// de nas ston pa bcom ldan 'das// 'gro phan phyag na rdo rje
137a3(rgyud 'bum): de ltar sbyor ba yang dag sbyor/ / sgom pa'i dngos po rtog byed pa// dbang po nyi ma thub pa nyid// gang zhig phyogs bcur gnas pa rnams// sras bcas sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
137a4(rgyud 'bum): cad gyur/ / phung po la sogs grangs mnyam pa'i// lus las skyes te yod pa 'di// stong pa'i rkyen du sbyor ba las// sangs rgyas sras dang bcas gyur 'dod// sngags de sngags pa sangs rgyas de//
137a5(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid de sras yang dag sbyor// zhi sogs mnyam pa'i sbyor ba las// zhi ba'i bde ba de nas brtsam// bdag nyid rang bzhin gyis dag cing // rang bzhin dri ma med byas la// dal dang myur dang gnas
137a6(rgyud 'bum): pa yi/ / sna tshogs de gcig dag la gzhug/ yid dman rim la sogs pas kyang // sbyor ba de nyid dag la gnas// de nas dbang po med gyur pa// gang tshe zhi ba'i bde gcig pu/ rang bzhin dag pa'i
137a7(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba ste/ / de yi chos ni lta ba po// de nas rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sngags// sangs rgyas thams cad 'jam las byung // gang phyir rang ni zlo gyur pa// yi ge hUM gi gsang sngags lnga// de tshe snying las rab
137b1(rgyud 'bum): 'dar zhing / / dbang po thams cad brgyal bar gyur// gang yang phung sogs yan lag ni// sras bcas sangs rgyas thams cad de// de nyid kyi ni grangs mnyam pa'i// rnal 'byor pa yi lus rab 'dar// nye bar
137b2(rgyud 'bum): mtshon sogs tshig rnams ni/ / phung po la sogs bshad pa gang // sangs rgyas sras bcas par gyur te// de ni brgyal zhing 'dar bar 'gyur// de gnyis la ni snyoms 'jug pa// sangs rgyas thams cad
137b3(rgyud 'bum): sras dang bcas/ / rdo rje sems dpa' nyid dran te// de sngags bdag nyid dngos las byung // de 'dir mchog tu bshad pa yin// rdo rje gsang ba rmad byung ba// phra mo'i snying gong dbus gnas par// dkyil
137b4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor rnam par bsam pa'o/ / de yi dbus gnas zhi ba yi// go 'phang mchog ni bsam par bya// de hUM zhes bya'i 'od po che// de yongs gyur pa'i rdo rje ni// 'di ni mchog gyur rtse lnga pa// rnal 'byor pa yis
137b5(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu sgom/ / rdo rje lcags kyu'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje gsum ni bsam par bya// de yi snying khar bsdams nas ni// lha rnams rab tu bskul bar bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rdo rje thams cad
137b6(rgyud 'bum): rab sgrub pa'o/ / 'khor lo pad+ma'i rigs sogs pa'ang // rol mo 'di ni dag pa ste// rdo rje lcags kyu rnams bsgoms nas// snying kha ru ni bskul bar 'gyur// rdo rje yi ni tshul mchog 'di// zhag bdun par
137b7(rgyud 'bum): du byas nas ni/ / ye shes rdo rje can gyi gsang // rdo rje gsum po yang dag sgrub// phung po la sogs sangs rgyas gang // de ni dngos po med lta ba// de nyid mchog gi gsang sngags kyis// skrag pa rnam smin mthong
138a1(rgyud 'bum): ba la/ / skrag pa mi rnams 'di dag ste// gsang sngags gnyis med sbyor gcig byung // mthong bas skrag ste mchog ster cing // 'di dag 'di nyid brtags pa yin// zhi ba gcig pu'i spyor ba la
138a2(rgyud 'bum): sngags lus rdzogs pa nyid gyur nas/ / yid la mgu zhing dag 'gyur ba'i// dngos grub rgya cher ster bar 'gyur// phung po la btags sangs rgyas dang // de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' rnams// sngags kyi sbyor ba'i don
138a3(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pas/ / rmongs pas 'da' ba byas nas ni// de yi srog ni der zad 'gyur// zhi ba nyid kyi sbyor gcig las// 'di ni 'jig rten 'das pa mchog/ de las bzlog pa 'jig rten pa'o// de nas bdag po
138a4(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das/ / 'jig rten gsum gtso ston pa po// 'jig rten gsum mchog rdo rje gtsos// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// gang zhig sngags kyi skyes bur bshad// rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes gzug/
138a5(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni dbang po gnyis sbyor ba'i// gcig par sgom pa rtag tu byed// bdag dmigs sems can yod min pa'i// sngags kyi dbang po rnam sgom pa// dbang po gnyis sbyor bzang po ste// dngos po thams cad rnams
138a6(rgyud 'bum): brtags pa'o/ / 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sngags kyi dam tshig mchog sgom pa'o// rang gzugs rdo rje yang dag sbyor// rig ma dbang phyug bdag kyang sgom// gnyis med gnyis su med chags pa/
138a7(rgyud 'bum): lta ba dam tshig dkyil 'khor ro// gsang ba zhes bya der sbyar ba// de nyid mnyam pa'i bdag nyid do// de nas ston pa bcom ldan 'das// thams cad dbang bskur dam pa ni// mi phyed rdo rje gsum grub pa/
138b1(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba'i dgongs pa bka' stsal to// nam mkha' mtha' yas sbyor ba yis// phung po bdag nyid mi dmigs pa// chos kyi dbyings la sogs pa'i rim// bud med de ni rgya chen 'gyur// rab tu sbyor ba
138b2(rgyud 'bum): 'di yis ni/ / 'gro ba'i bud med ces bya ba// gsang sngags de nyid don gsang nyid// de ni gsang bar nye bar spyod// der ni yid 'ong sangs rgyas rnams// bye ba grangs med rdo rje 'dzin// sngags rig
138b3(rgyud 'bum): dam pa spro 'ong zhes/ / der ni bcom ldan gtso bos gsungs// byang chub sems dpa'i dam tshig ni// ston pa 'dir ni bla ma cher// 'jig rten pa la 'dir bshad de// 'jig rten 'das pa bzlog pa'o//
138b4(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha' lta bu'i byang chub ni// 'di yis shin tu 'thob par 'gyur// byang chub sems kyi yon tan mtsho// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog des 'thob// dgongs pa lung bstan gsang ba la// gang zhig/
138b5(rgyud 'bum): sems ni dang gyur pa// gsang ba 'bad de yang dag srung // de ni rtag tu legs par byed// rdo rje gsum gyi gsang ba las// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi yang // de nyid bskul ba zhes bya ba// le'u
138b6(rgyud 'bum): bcu pa yin par bshad/ / / de nas ston pa bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje gsum mchog mchog gsal ba// de bzhin gshegs pa kun mchog cig/ nyi shu rtsa lnga mchog ces
138b7(rgyud 'bum): bya'i/ / ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// de bzhin gshegs kun rdo rje yis// sngags rig skyes bu zhes bya ba'i// le'u 'di ni bka' stsal to// sngags mchog de ni phyag rgya che// rdo rje
139a1(rgyud 'bum): gsum gyi ye shes sgos/ / rtogs dang bri ba 'thob pa'i phyir// rdo rje ye shes dag gis kyang // tshangs pa la sogs yang dag bshad// ye shes snying po dam pa ste//
139a2(rgyud 'bum): gsum sogs bshad gyur pa// sku yi rdo rje 'thob byed pa'o// AHdang zung ni gsung rdo rje// byang chub bdag med 'thob byed pa'o// hUM ni rdo rje gsum mtha' nyid// sku gsung thugs ni 'thob byed
139a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ de ni 'jug sogs gnas nyid dang // ldang ba dag tu rab tu bshad// nyi shu lnga sogs ming can gyi// skyes bu'i gzugs su 'di 'gyur ro// de bas re re'ang gsum nyid de// rdo rje gsang
139a4(rgyud 'bum): sngags nyid du gyur/ / brjod med sa bon brgyad pa las// de ni nam mkha' las rgyal 'gyur// brgya phyed rlung ni gcig pu la// de las nges par nyi shu lnga// skyes bu nyid du byung ba na// mgrin bcu
139a5(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya'i ming can dang / / sgra sgrogs gsod pa'i dga' byed 'gyur// de nas tshangs pa gcig nyid gyur// tshangs pa khyab 'jug drag po ste// 'jug pa la sogs rim du bshad// 'di dag bsnyengs med
139a6(rgyud 'bum): de gcig pu/ / de ni zhi ba dngos med nyid// de las kyang ni yang dag 'byung // longs spyod rdzogs sku dam pa'o// de nas sngags gcig sprul pa las// 'gro ba'i don gyi bya bar 'gyur// mtshams dang skye
139a7(rgyud 'bum): mched nor lha'o/ / zla ba zung gcig rig byed de// de la sogs pa'i grangs gyur rnams// de ni rig pa'i skyes bur gnas// 'di rnams las gcig gzung nas ni// sangs rgyas rol mo bstan par bya//
139b1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems dpa' de nyid 'di// nam mkha' rdo rje dbus su bsam// dkyil 'khor brgyan pa zhes bshad pa// yi ge b+h+rUM ni des bsam mo// rdo rje sprin ni spro bskyed pa'i// de bzhin gshegs pa drug gi sku/
139b2(rgyud 'bum): de dbus gnas pa'i rnal 'byor par// sgom pa'i bdag nyid can gyis bsgom// sngags rnams kun gyi gtsug tor ni// sngags kyi skyes bu gsang ba pa// gcig pu nyid ni bdag por gyur// sngags spyod
139b3(rgyud 'bum): don ni sgrub pa po/ / chos 'khor lo gcig 'khor lo mchog/ rgyal dang rmad byung che gtsug tor// lus dang rnam par rgyal de bzhin// bya ba mchog tu yang dag bshad// sbyor dang bya ba gnyis med bzhin//
139b4(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba 'ba' zhig nyid la 'di// b+h+rUM ni gtsug tor yin par bstan// ye shes rdo rje snying po 'di// dus sbyor gcig gi ming can no// nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam nyid ldan// sngags kyi skyes bu dngos
139b5(rgyud 'bum): grub stsol/ / rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// oM zhes bya ba de ru sgom// phra mo'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// yi ge AHni rnam par sgom// chos kyi dkyil 'khor sbyor ba la'ang //
139b6(rgyud 'bum): yi ge hUM ni de ru sgom// yi ge bruM ni gnas ming can// rdo rje gsum 'byung bsgom par bya// gsang ba'i dam tshig de nyid de// rdo rje gsum 'byung bka' stsal to// snying po dus gsum sangs rgyas kyi// rdo rje
139b7(rgyud 'bum): gsum ni mnyes byed mchog/ sku dang gsung thugs thog ma mtha'// oM AHhUM gi grangs dang mnyam// sangs rgyas sku mchog gsung gi lam// thugs kyi ye shes 'jigs su bya// rang nyid 'don pa nyid
140a1(rgyud 'bum): du ni/ / re re zhing ni yang dag bshad// sngags kyi skyes bu'i sbyor ba yang // rgyu yi bdag nyid ming can yin// byang chub tshul mchog 'di yin te// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pa'o// /
140a2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje ye shes sprul pa ste// sangs rgyas 'bras bu thob byed pa'o// sngags kyi rig pa zhes bsgrags pa// 'di ni sangs rgyas skyes bu yon// rdo rje gsum mnyam mi phyed pa// rdzogs pa la sogs
140a3(rgyud 'bum): sgom pa yi/ / de bzhin gshegs kun rdo rje ni// gsum po ye shes rdo rje stsol// byin rlabs dpal chen zhes bya ba'i// dam tshig ting 'dzin gyur pa yin// rnam par dben dang ci rigs pa'i//
140a4(rgyud 'bum): stan dag la ni sbyor ba bzhi// rig pa'i skyes bur yang dag sbyor// brtul zhugs can gyis kun tu brtsam// thabs dang shes rab nyi zla phyed// thun gcig tu ni rab tu brtag/ de yi phyed nyid zla phyed kyis//
140a5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje gsum ni nges par 'grub// 'jig rten 'das pa'i rang bzhin nyid// 'jig rten pa'i yang phyin ci log/ rdo rje gsum sbyor stsol dngos grub// grub par 'gyur ba the tshom med// nam mkha'i rdo rje dbus
140a6(rgyud 'bum): gnas par/ / phra mo'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya// rang gi sngags kyi dam tshig dus// bskyed pa yi ge oM bsgom bya// sbyor ba bzhi yi gtan tshigs gang // snying por yongs su brtags pa yin// sna rtse dang
140a7(rgyud 'bum): nirtsa ba nyid/ / spyi bo mtha' ni dga' ldan gnas// gcig dang gsum gyi dngos por 'gyur// dag pa'i gnas kyi grong khyer ba// phye sa gsum gyi ming can ni// rigs kyi dbye ba rdo rje gsum// sna yi rtse mo sbyor
140b1(rgyud 'bum): ba yis/ / rdo rje gsum sbyor brtul zhugs can// mA ma kI dang gos dkar mo// sgrol ma gtogs pa sangs rgyab spyan// 'od zer lnga yi sprin chen po// rnam par snang mdzad gnyis med gnas// rdo rje rnam snang de/
140b2(rgyud 'bum): las ni// dngos grub rgya chen gsol bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas sku yi 'od 'dra ba// skad cig der 'grub rnal 'byor pa// ye shes lnga po bsten nas ni// rdo rje bskal pa gsum du gnas// ye shes 'das
140b3(rgyud 'bum): dang ma 'ongs dang / / da ltar byung ba rdo rje gsum// de 'dir bskal par brtags gyur pa// grangs med ces bya de nyid do// sku yi gsang ba de nyid 'di// 'jig rten 'das pa'i rim par gsungs// zhi ba'i
140b4(rgyud 'bum): bde las shes bya ba/ / rang myong sbyor ba gcig las de// sku yi gsang ba mchog 'di ni// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gsungs// rdo rje 'od zer bkod pa yi// ting 'dzin yang dag bka' stsal to//
140b5(rgyud 'bum): / a dang u ni lkog ma'i dbus// rkan gyi steng gi ming can no// i dang tsa ni lag g.yon nyid// u dang mu ni g.yas par brtag/ ri dzu 'di ni gsang bar dgod// li ti rkang pa cig shos la// dkyil 'khor gcig
140b6(rgyud 'bum): ni de nyid do/ / dkyil 'khor lnga las rgyal gyur pa// ha ni lus skyes gtsug tor dang // gcod ni gsum po gcod pa can// yon tan bzhi yi bzhi po de// lnga po'i lnga po de 'gyur ro// nam mkha'i rdo rje
140b7(rgyud 'bum): gcig phyed sbyor/ / de ni 'od zer lngar 'gyur ro// rig pa chen po de nyid 'di// cha zhes bya bar de yongs bsgrags// dus can bdag nyid sbyor dbang po// de yi rang sbyor gzugs can gcig/ A ni
141a1(rgyud 'bum): thabs 'gyur sbyor ba ni/ / dbang po gnyis po gcig tu'o// nam mkha'i rdo rje dbus gnas par// chos kyi dkyil 'khor mchog bsam pa// rang sngags skyes bu bsams nas
141a2(rgyud 'bum): ni A ni ngag gi lam du bzhag/ kha dog lnga yis kun nas ni// brgyan pa'i rdo rje chen po dag/ 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog bsgoms pas// dam tshig ye shes bsgom par bya// gsung gi dam tshig
141a3(rgyud 'bum): spros par bshad/ / khyab bdag mi zad rtag pa ste// thog mtha' med pa'i mthar thug pa// zhi ba mya ngan 'das zhes bya// chos kyi gsung las rnal 'byor dbang // rdo rje chos dang 'dra bar 'gyur//
141a4(rgyud 'bum): ye shes lnga ldan bsten na ni// rdo rje gsum gyi bskal par gnas// gsung gi gsang ba 'di nyid ni// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gsungs// dam tshig 'byung ba zhes bya ba// ting nge 'dzin du yongs
141a5(rgyud 'bum): su bsgrags/ / nam mkha' rdo rje dbus gnas mchog/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// der ni rang sngags skyes bu dag/ hUM ni sems la gnas rdzogs bya// dam tshig chen po de nyid can// kha dog rnam
141a6(rgyud 'bum): lnga bsgom par bya/ / rdo rje kun dang rgyal ba'i gnas// ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya// ston pa rdo rje'i thugs 'dra ba// yang dag ye shes yon tan mtsho// ye shes lnga ldan bsten na ni// rdo rje bskal pa
141a7(rgyud 'bum): gsum du gnas/ / lkog ma rkan dang de nas mchu// spyi bo sa yi ming can te// rdo rjes gsum thugs gsang ba gcig/ de nas haM las zhugs pa yin// de bzhin gshegs kun ye shes ni// dam tshig
141b1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje zhes bya ba/ / rdo rje ye shes gcig las byung // ting 'dzin gsang bar bshad pa yin// ye shes dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje chen por bsams nas ni// lus kun la ni khams dmigs na//
141b2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje ye shes skye bar 'gyur// dngos po med don gsal byed pa// khams nyid kyis ni thams cad bshad// rlung gi rkyen dang kun sbyor las// khaM du'ang 'gro bar gyur pa yin// sangs rgyas byang chub
141b3(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' yis/ / yang dang yang du mchod pa dang // rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig gnas// gnyis med lhun gyi ngo bo nyid// sangs rgyas de bzhin nyid sbyor ba// so so ru ni yang dag gnas// nam mkha'
141b4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje dam tshig che/ / chos rnams de ni mi gzigs so// sangs rgyas kun ni gnyis med rang // mi snang 'di yi dam tshig yin// dngos po med pa'i gnas thob na// sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi gzigs so//
141b5(rgyud 'bum): sku gsung thugs las yang dag byung // mi snang rdo rje gsum 'di yin// de yi bkod 'phreng zhes bya ba// ting nge 'dzin ni yang dag gsungs// ma 'dres pa yi chos bdag nyid// sku dang ldan pa'i 'od po che/
141b6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'i// rang sngags skyes bu bsam par bya// haM ni rdo rje bzhir bshad pa// snying kha ru ni yaM mdzes pa// rtag tu sbyor bas gzhug pa ni// 'od zer rnam par bsgom par bya//
141b7(rgyud 'bum): sku gsung thugs kyi longs spyod ni// 'jam pa'i dam tshig rdo rje can// sa bcu rab tu gnas na ni// dgongs don de tshe kun tu byung // ye shes nyid ni zla ba 'di// byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje can// sdang ba
142a1(rgyud 'bum): can zhes bya ba yi/ / ting nge 'dzin ni yang dag bshad// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// b+h+rUM ni 'bar ba'i 'od bzang ba// mtshon cha mchog ni rdo rje yis// rdo rje sku dang
142a2(rgyud 'bum): 'dra bar 'gyur/ / 'di ni rdo rje mkha' 'dra sbyor// dam tshig bkod pa'i gnas gyur pa// ting 'dzin dam tshig mi snang ba'i// b+h+rUM ni yang dag 'byung ba bshad// sangs rgyas mngon par shes gnas pa// dam
142a3(rgyud 'bum): tshig tu ni yang dag bshad/ / mngon shes lnga dang 'dra ba ni// de ni skyes bu mchog tu 'gyur// sangs rgyas mngon shes mchog sgrub pa// 'di ni dam pa yin par bshad// de yi dngos grub thams cad
142a4(rgyud 'bum): kyis dngos grub chen po sgrub pa'i mchog/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// sangs rgyas dgongs pa'i mchog bsgoms la// yi ge oM ni bsgom
142a5(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / rdo rje gsum gyi gsang ba 'di// yi ge oM ni mi zad gtso// 'di ni mi phyed sbyor ba yis// bsgom pas mi bskyod 'dra bar 'gyur// mi bskyod pa yi dam tshig mchog/ de sku byang chub rdo rje can/
142a6(rgyud 'bum): ting nge 'dzin du yang dag bshad// de ni skyes bu dam pa yin// mi bskyod mtshungs pa'i sku dang ni// gsung thugs rtse gcig 'dzin pa las// 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du// rdo rje can gyis mchod par
142a7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor brgyan par bsam// nam mkha'i rdo rje rab bsgoms te// de nas rdo rje rnam par bsgoms// rdo rje dam tshig gsum
142b1(rgyud 'bum): bsgoms pas/ / dkon mchogadapal dang 'od 'dra zhing // dkon mchog gsum dpal mtshungs pa yi// bcom ldan dkon mchog dpal 'dra zhing // sku gsung thugs sbyor rdo rje yis//
142b2(rgyud 'bum): ye shes gsang ba'i gnas su 'gyur// ting 'dzin dpag med las byung ba// rdo rje ye shes 'dzin de 'gyur// longs spyod dam tshig ces bya ba// rin chen rdo rje gcig tu 'byung // de nyid gsum
142b3(rgyud 'bum): gsang dgongs pa las/ / rin chen rdo rje de gnas 'gyur// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsam par bya// 'jig rten dbang phyug rab bsgoms la//
142b4(rgyud 'bum): der ni chos kyi oM sgom mo// chos kyi oM ni de tshe yang // rdo rje gsum mnyam sbyor ba yis// rdo rje dpag med 'dra ba ni// bcom ldan dpag med rdo rje can// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yis// dpag
142b5(rgyud 'bum): med tshe dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ / theg pa chen po lam gyi mchog/ 'gro ba'i don ni rab bsgrub pa// ye shes rgya mtsho dpal dang ldan// 'gro don gcig tu 'byung bar 'gyur// don yod pa yi dam tshig mchog/
142b6(rgyud 'bum): sems can don ni sgrub gyur pa// 'od zer ye shes mchog ces bya'i// ting nge 'dzin du yang dag bshad// sems can khams ni ma lus pa'i// longs spyod kun tu 'gyur ba yi// nam mkha'i dbyings
142b7(rgyud 'bum): kyi dbus gnas par/ / sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// de ni rnam snang rdo rjer bshad// 'od zer der ni rab tu sgom// rnam par rgyal ba'i yi ge oM// 'od chen der ni rab tu sgom// de nas
143a1(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni rdo rje gsum/ / rnam par snang mdzad 'dra bar 'gyur// de ni bcom ldan mgon pos bshad// rnam snang rdo rje can de yin// rdo rje gsum gnyis med sbyor las// rnam par snang
143a2(rgyud 'bum): mdzad 'dra ba'i 'o/ / de nyid ye shes rdzogs byang chub// rdo rje sku gsum sgrub pa po// sku dang gsung thugs rdzogs byang chub// de la dmigs pa'i rdo rje can// ting 'dzin zhi ba nyid sbyor ba// 'gro ba'i
143a3(rgyud 'bum): / don ni rab sgrub pa'o// tshig gcig la ni sna tshogs don// sngags kyi de nyid gsal gyur pa'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs mchog la// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po ni// gsang dgongs rdo rje zhes
143a4(rgyud 'bum): bya ba thub pa che la slar yang zhus/ / oM AHhUM ni gsum la sogs// b+h+rUM sogs thog mar gnas pa yis// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// sngags kyi skyes bur de 'gyur ro// oM ni rnam snang rdo rjer
143a5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / AHni 'jig rten dbang phyug gtso// hUM ni rdo rje sems dpar ba shad// skyes bu rdo rje can du 'gyur// b+h+rUM ni gnas kyi mchog tu 'gyur// khaM ni nges par mi snang ba// haM ni 'jam dpal yang dag
143a6(rgyud 'bum): bshad/ / k+ShaM ni rdo rje bkod ces bya// rdo rje sems dpa' rin po che// 'jig rten dbang phyug dngos grub stsol// de bzhin mgon po rnam snang mdzad// oM la sogs pa lnga las skyes// oM AHhUM ni de nyid
143a7(rgyud 'bum): gsum/ / rnam snang rdo rje can gyur pa// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje grags// shin tu rnam par nges par bshad// gsang sngags dkyil 'khor rnal 'byor pa// lnga po bco lngar yang dag bshad//
143b1(rgyud 'bum): khrag gi sbyor ba las byung ba// gsang sngags skyes bu zhes bya ba// gsang sngags chen po'i sbyor ba yang // ting 'dzin skyes bu dam pa yin// sna tshogs sngags don de nyid 'gyur// phyag rgya gcig
143b2(rgyud 'bum): par dkyil 'khor te/ / de dag gsang bar bshad pa ni// dgongs pa gcig las yang dag 'byung // dga' ba gcig cing dga' ba'i ming // de dag ji ltar rtogs par 'gyur// mgon po rkyen dang
143b3(rgyud 'bum): bral ba'i mi/ / pi wang sgra ni mchis ma lags// de bzhin phyag rgya med pa ni// gsang sngags dngos grub mi 'byung ngo // brda gsum gyi ni de nyid 'di// gang gi don du rab gsungs pa// lag pa'i
143b4(rgyud 'bum): sbyor bas rab sgrub pa'i/ / phyag rgya ji ltar gnas par mdzad// sngags dang phyag rgya sbyor ba ni// phyag rgya gcig pu'i sbyor ba dang // gsang sngags gcig pus mi 'grub ces// khyod ni chos rnams ston par
143b5(rgyud 'bum): mdzad/ / 'dir ni sngags sbyor gcig pu las// phyag rgya bstan par ma mdzad na// gsang sngags gcig skyes dngos grub ni// 'jig rten pa rnams ji ltar sgrub// sngags la dmigs pa'i sbyor gyur pa//
143b6(rgyud 'bum): lha rnams kyis kyang sbyor las byung // 'gro ba'i don ni rab sgrub pa// yid bzhin nor bur lta bur 'gyur// 'jig rten 'das pa zhes bya dang // yang na shin tu 'jig rten 'das// mgon po 'jig rten pa rnams
143b7(rgyud 'bum): kyi ji ltar 'gro la de phan 'gyur/ / spyan drangs pa dang gshegs su gsol// 'dir ni ji ltar legs par brjod// gang gis 'dir ni dngos grub 'grub// lha rnams mngon phyogs ji lta bu// 'di dag
144a1(rgyud 'bum): ma 'ongs skye bo yis/ / gang zhig shes na yang dag par// nges par rnam rtog med 'gyur ba// mi yi skyes bu 'di dag gsungs// de nas mgon po bcom ldan 'das// dgongs
144a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i gsang ba dam pa ste/ / phyag rgya'i nges pa 'jig rten pa'i// phyag na rdo rje la gsungs so// rnam rtog sna tshogs lcags zhes bya// nyes pa gsum tshogs bdag nyid las// gsang sngags skyes bu'i
144a3(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba yis/ / de ni mi mchog dag tu 'gyur// gser 'gyur rtsi yi rnam pa yis// lcags ni gser du byed pa yin// de bzhin sngags kyi de nyid kyis// mi ni bder gshegs byed pa yin// nges
144a4(rgyud 'bum): byas sbyor ba'i gsang sngags ni/ / zhi bde dngos grub ster bar 'gyur// phyag rgya med pa'i sngags gcig pus// sngags kyi skyes bur 'gyur pa yin// dngos med pa las yang dag skye// sngags
144a5(rgyud 'bum): kyi skyes bu 'byung ba ste/ / 'di ni phyag rgya chen po ste// 'gro ba'i don ni rab sgrub pa'o// spyan drang bar ni bzhugs pa yis// myur ba yis ni gshegs su gsol// gnas pa yis ni de sgrub pa'o//
144a6(rgyud 'bum): yid ston dngos grub dam pa yin// de ni skyes bu'i sbyor ba yis// phyag rgya che dang gcig sgrub las// myur ba la sogs gsum ldan pa// de ni phyag rgya yin par bshad// 'bad de bla mas slob ma yi/
144a7(rgyud 'bum): rna ba'i drung du bshad par bya// myur ba dang ni 'jug pa dang // gnas pa'i rjes su sbyor ba rnams// spyan drang ba dang gshegs su gsol// 'di dag phyag rgyar yang dag gyur// sgrub pa la ni myur la sogs//
144b1(rgyud 'bum): ci rigs pa ni nges par sbyar// phung po la sogs chos rnams kun// stong zhing rten 'brel las byung ba// mthong zhing de bzhin sbyor ba las// chos kyi skur ni de gnas 'gyur// 'dir ni gsang sngags sbyor
144b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur med/ / phyag rgya'ang chos sku 'di nyid yin// de lta na yang 'gro ba'i don// yid bzhin nor bu lta bur byed// 'on te rdo rje 'dzin gang zhig/ sbyor ba gsum dang ldan pa'i mi// spyan drang ba dang gshegs su
144b3(rgyud 'bum): gsol/ / de bzhin du ni gnas gyur pa'o// nye ba'i tshig ni spyan drang ba// ring nas lag par rab tu sbyor// de bzhin gsang sngags de nyid kyang // gnyis ka la ni yang dag sbyor// rigs kyi dbye ba sbyor ba yis//
144b4(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya bud med yin par bshad// sems kyi rkyen sbyor bdag nyid ni// 'jig rten par ni rab tu brtag/ rang gi mtshan mar yang dag sbyor// rigs kyi dbye ba'i sbyor ba yis// phyag rgyas sa gsum la
144b5(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa/ / sa 'og klu yi bu mo yang // brtul zhugs can gyi sems kyis dgug/ gzhug pa'i rim pa nyid dang ni// de rnams gnas pa'i sbyor ba nyid// dngos med de nyid gcig pu yis// 'gro ba
144b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dgug par bya/ / gzhan yang gsang ba pa yi mchog/ sems kyi rkyen ni nyid ltos dang // dngos med byang chub 'thob pa la// gsang sngags med cing phyag rgya med// 'jig rten na ni rdog
144b7(rgyud 'bum): ci rnyed/ / dus gsum du ni kun 'byung ba// de ni dngos med sems gcig las// rnal 'byor pas ni skad cig rtogs// byang chub kun rdzob ma yin la// de las gzhan du'ang rnyed mi 'gyur//
145a1(rgyud 'bum): gnyis ka las min gzhan las min// mun pa'i sgron ma mtshungs par 'gyur// sems can bsam pa'i dbang gi sngags// gsang ba 'di ni rab ston te// de ni sgrub
145a2(rgyud 'bum): dang bsgrub bya dang / / rnam par mi rtog brtags pa'o// sems can kun gyi longs spyod du// sngags kyi skas bu rab tu gnas// nam mkha' mnyam pa'i sbyor ba ni// rnam par dben par rab tu brtag/
145a3(rgyud 'bum): gsal dang mi gsal yang dag ldan// klung dang 'bab chu la sogs yin// mya ngan 'das pa gnas sbyor ba// dur khrod la sogs pa yi ming // 'di ni sngags rig mchog rnams kyi// bsam gtan
145a4(rgyud 'bum): bsdus las spyod pa'o/ / 'jig rten 'das pa de nyid 'dir// 'jig rten pa ni bzlog pa'o// mi bskyod ye shes la sogs pa// rdo rje nam mkha'i dkyil du bsam// mngon shes lnga yi sbyor ba yis//
145a5(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas mchog gi gnas su sgom// rdo rje mngon shes rdo rje che// dam tshig mchog tu bka' stsal to// rdo rje chen po rab mdzes pa// rtse lnga pa la de bzhin 'bar// rang bzhin lnga ru sbyor ba yis/
145a6(rgyud 'bum): mngon shes lnga po 'gyur ba yin// mngon shes lnga yi ting 'dzin la// gnas nas bla na med pa brtag/ gtso bo me stag mang po 'khrug/ rang sngags 'khor lo bsgom par bya// rdo rje la rab dgod byas pas/
145a7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje mngon shes skye bar 'gyur// nam mkha' rdo rje dbus gnas par// 'khor lo rdo rje 'bar 'od 'dra// sangs rgyas 'jug par rab bsgoms na// sangs rgyas mchog dang 'dra bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas
145b1(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ / lus la rnam par snang mdzad gzhag/ snying khar yi ge oM bsams na// sngags la mngon shes sgom par 'gyur// 'gog pa rdo rje gyur pa'i sems/
145b2(rgyud 'bum): nam zhig bdag nyid bdag las skyes// sangs rgyas kun mchog 'byung ba yi// dpal ldan yid bzhin nor bur 'gyur// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// der ni mi bskyod
145b3(rgyud 'bum): rab tu sgom/ / hUM ni snying kha'i zla gnas par// bsams la sems ni de ru gzhag/ sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// tshe dpag med pa rab tu sbyor// AHni snying kha'i thig
145b4(rgyud 'bum): kher gnas/ / bsams la rdo rje'ang yang dag gzhag/ 'di ni dgongs pa'i mchog gi mchog/ rdo rje mi phyed gsum sbyor skyes// 'gog pa'i dam tshig ye shes te// sangs rgyas dngos grub
145b5(rgyud 'bum): cher 'byung ba'o/ / nam mkha'i rdo rje dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// sku gsung thugs kyi yi ge oM// bsams na bskal pa gcig tu gnas// nam mkha'
145b6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje dbus gnas par/ / sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// lus dang ngag sems yi ge AH// bsams na bskal pa dag tu gnas// mkha' dbyings rdo rje dbus gnas par// rdo rje
145b7(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ / lus dang ngag sems yi ge hUM// bsams na de ni bskal par gnas// bcom ldan bdag po rdo rje gsum// dam tshig rtog pas de skad gsungs// dgu
146a1(rgyud 'bum): mtha' can gyi yi ge 'di/ / sngags kyi skyes bu mchog tu 'gyur// brjod du med cing ming med la// shes dang shes bya rnam spangs pa'ang // kun rdzob la ni legs gnas na//
146a2(rgyud 'bum): tshig gi sngags su 'di brjod do// rdo rje gsum gyi rdo rje can// rnal 'byor 'dir 'gyur phyin chad ni// gang zhig klog gam sems kyang rung // rdo rje ye shes lta bur 'gyur// ji ltar gsang ba'i rgyal
146a3(rgyud 'bum): dbang po/ / dgongs pa lung ston 'di gyur pa// sangs rgyas kun gyis de lung bstan// khyad par du yang byin gyis rlob// klog cing sgom dang ldan par ni// bris nas gang du 'jog gyur pa// de nas
146a4(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ / rigs skyes rgyal ba'i sras su 'gyur// khams gsum thams cad bcom nas ni// myur ba de bzhin gshegs 'gyur zhing // 'khor lo sgyur ba'i bu bzhin du//
146a5(rgyud 'bum): byang chub myur du des 'thob bo// khams gsum sku dang gsung thugs kyi// sngags pa'i yan lag gyur pa ni// sangs rgyas 'dus la brten pa yis// de ni dngos po med par 'joms//
146a6(rgyud 'bum): dngos med gcig pu rdzogs longs spyod// phung sogs yan lag don las spyod// bde gshegs sems can spangs pa ni// sngags pa sngags las gyur pa yin// ji ltar nam mkha' rang
146a7(rgyud 'bum): mtshan nyid/ / skad cig kyang ni 'dor mi byed// de 'isangs rgyas thams cad kyang / rigs las skyes la byin gyis rlob// dgongs pa lung ston la gnas nas// gsang ba'i rin chen
146b1(rgyud 'bum): yang dag srung / / mig gzugs rang gi ngo bo nyid// spyod pa ci dga' byed par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs kun ye shes ni// gsang ba'i dgongs pa'i ming can te// sku dang gsung thugs
146b2(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba dang / / gsang sngags dam tshig de nyid byung // de ni rig pa skyes bu mchog/ bcu gcig par ni yang dag bshad// ras ni bris dang mtshungs par 'byung // 'thob pa'i phyir ni le'ur
146b3(rgyud 'bum): gyur/ / de nas dpal ldan rnam snang mdzad// bskyed pa ye shes bla ma gtso// de nyid dam tshig mchog gyur pa// rdo rje gsung gis bka' stsal to// mkha' dang mtshungs shing mi rtog la/
146b4(rgyud 'bum): rang bzhin gyis ni dam chos can// dngos med shin tu dri med la// dam tshig gcig tu gyur kyang ni// gar dang glu dang rol mo dang // dgod dang sgeg pas rab mdzes pas// 'jig rten sangs
146b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyas gar mkhan gyi/ / rol mo 'di dag rab tu sgom// gzhon nus bsgrubs pa'i sems can ni// ji lta ji ltar ston pa bzhin// gar sogs rtsed mos byang chub ni// myur du de nyid las 'thob 'gyur//
146b6(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa'i yon tan lngar ldan pa// de yi ming ni yid ldan pa// dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su gnas// lhun gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur// sems can gang 'di mthong ba dang //
146b7(rgyud 'bum): thos shing reg par gyur pa ni// de ni u dum pa ra yi// me tog 'dra bar gyur pa yin// sems can kun gyi gtso bo 'di// gsung gi rdo rje chos nyid skyes// gcig dang du ma las grol ba// rten 'byung
147a1(rgyud 'bum): gsal bar byed pa yin/ / de nas gsang ba'i bdag mchog de// chos kyi de nyid rab ston pa// thub chen rnam par snang mdzad la// thal mo sbyar ba byas nas zhus// mgon//
147a2(rgyud 'bum): po de nyid bsdus pa las// rol mo 'dir ni gyur pa dang // 'jig rten pa de gar byed pa// gsungs te ma 'ongs skye bo ni// chos dbyings de ni gar min na// gtso bo ji ltar gar bgyid lags//
147a3(rgyud 'bum): rmongs pa'i 'jig rten rgyang phan gar// gsang mthon myos pas bskul ba yin// chos dbyings de ni glu min na// gtso bo ji ltar glu len 'gyur// rmongs pa'i 'jig rten rgyang phan gru// gsang
147a4(rgyud 'bum): mthon myos pas bskul ba lags/ / chos dbyings de ni rol mo min// gtso bo ji ltar rol mor 'gyur// 'jig rten rgyang pan rmongs rol mo// gsang mthon myos pas bskul ba lags/
147a5(rgyud 'bum): chos dbyings de dgod ma lags na// gtso bo ji ltar rgod par 'gyur// rmongs pa'i 'jig rten rgyang phan rgod// gsang mthon myos pas bskul ba lags// chos dbyings de sgeg ma lags na//
147a6(rgyud 'bum): gtso bo ji ltar sgeg par 'gyur// rmongs pas 'jig rten rgyang phan sgeg/ gsang mthon myos pas bskul ba lags// de ltar rnam pa mang po la// gzhan rnams kyang ni sbyor byed cing //
147a7(rgyud 'bum): bza' dang min las sbyor ba yis// rnal 'byor pa ni bdag yin snyam// rdo rje yi ni tshig mchog 'di// yod med rab tu zhi ba nyid// de yi rang bzhin gcig sbyor ba dag/ yang dag mchog
147b1(rgyud 'bum): bsdus de nyid mchog/ de nas de nyid yang dag bzung // rnal 'byor rigs mchog rnal 'byor pa// de nyid gsum mnyam nyid sbyor ba// sangs rgyas kyi ni rol mo ston// sna tshogs tshul
147b2(rgyud 'bum): gyis rnam dgod pas/ / nor can ming ni nyams la sogs// gcig pu'ang dpag med dngos bshad pa'i// gar gyis skye dgu dga' bar byed// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sogs dngos grub//
147b3(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs khyed kyis gsungs pa rnams// sems zhi ba yi rnal 'byor pa// de rnams lhun gyis grub par 'gyur// mgon po shes rab 'di srid du// thabs kyis mchil par nye bar sbyor//
147b4(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyi gzan gyi sbyor ba yis// khyed ni 'jig rten pa rnams 'dzin// shar du zin kyang mi rig pa// dgongs pa'i gsang ba dam pa ni// gzhan rnams la ni ston mdzad pa// ngo bo nyid ni
147b5(rgyud 'bum): gzhan min pa'o/ / phyi rol sngags don dngos grub ni// de nyid du ni tshol mod kyi// 'gal ba'i rjes 'jug chos nyid can// der yang 'grub par 'gyur ma yin// de rnams gsang ba mi srung zhing //
147b6(rgyud 'bum): sred pa yis ni ston par byed// bcom ldan 'das gsung gsang ba ni// gsang mchog tshig gis sgrogs par byed// khyod bka' las 'das dman pa rnams// sngags kyi nus pa rnam spangs pa/
147b7(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten pa rnams sdang 'gyur zhing // de rnams 'grub par 'gyur ma yin// sred pa 'am dad pa dag gis kyang // rkyen dang de bzhin nyan thos rnams// gsang ba la ni smig rgyu bzhin// rigs
148a1(rgyud 'bum): skyes gzhan yang ltung bar 'gyur/ / mgon po de ni der gnas shing // nyams shing blo gros dman par gnas// de nas tshig min gyur par 'byung // tshig gi bdud rtsi sbyor ba
148a2(rgyud 'bum): las/ / chos kyi tshul 'di thos pa dang // phyi nas 'jigs shing skrag par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' lhung 'gyur bar// bdag nyid che de byed par 'gyur// de bzhin byang chub 'gyur ba dang //
148a3(rgyud 'bum): sngags pa rnams kyang gsang ba lags// shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba// gsang ba mdo sde rnams smra ba// gdong g.yogs pa yi sbyor ba yis// de tshe chog gis rig skyes pa// gsang sngags la
148a4(rgyud 'bum): sogs chos rnams la/ / dad pa rnams ni skyed mi byed// log pa mkhas pa'i nga rgyal ni// byis pa phyi nas byed par 'gyur// a yi dog pa'i ras 'di ni// sbyor ba shes rnams kyi 'di ma yin//
148a5(rgyud 'bum): de rnams dad pas rjes 'jug pa// gtam dag yang ni byed par 'gyur// sgra ni g.yo yi tshul gyis na// rgyal po rnams ni slu bar byed// steng du g.yogs pa dag gis ni// brgyad gnyis pa la tshul
148a6(rgyud 'bum): du byed/ / de ni ma skyes pa yi bdag/ ras kyi rgyu med pa nyid ni// A yi dog ras nyid rgyal po'i// yang dag dngos grub byed pa'i mchog/ dam pa'i skye ba nyid mthong na// de ni longs spyod lam
148a7(rgyud 'bum): skyed min/ / de bas skye bo med gcig pu// bya ba'i sems ni rab tu 'jug/ der ni mche ba can mi 'gro// de la brtsal ba 'ba' zhig yin// rgyal po dngos grub chen po'i ras// bar chad shin tu
148b1(rgyud 'bum): mang po pa/ / bya ba de ni rnam par 'joms// sgrib pa med pa'i rnal 'byor can// de ni tshig de thos pa dang // rgyal po'i bar du yid dga' zhing // dngos grub chen po'i rigs mchog las//
148b2(rgyud 'bum): su zhig bdag ni zlog par byed// ras kyi bar chad byed pa dag/ de la chad pas gcad par bya// 'di la 'jigs pa'i sems bor la// skye bo med par khyed kyis ni// rgyal rigs dag gam rigs
148b3(rgyud 'bum): bzang ngam/ / ngag zhig mi bsrun rigs can rnams// dog pa med pa ras 'jig pa// de dag thams cad brlag par bya// de nas rgyal po sbyin pa ni// rgyud kyi slob dpon bdag nyid che// rin chen
148b4(rgyud 'bum): rin thang med lnga sogs/ / bde ba kun gyi 'bras bu'o// 'di yis gdong ni g.yogs nas su// rgyal po 'bras bu longs spyod cig/ A yi dog pa ras de byin// ji ltar skye bzhin rgyal po byas
148b5(rgyud 'bum): rin chen rin thang med blangs rnams/ / 'di ni ji ltar bzhag nas su// de nas de ni mi snang ba// rgyu ma can des ni de tshe byas// de la sogs pa'i sna tshogs tshig/ rigs skyes pa la de rnams smra//
148b6(rgyud 'bum): rang nyid 'jigs shing gzhan rnams kyang // skrag par byed cing the tsom med// de nas de bzhin gshegs bdag po// 'byin pa ston pa mnga' bdag gtso// phyag na rdo rje go byed pa// snyan pa'i gsung
148b7(rgyud 'bum): gis bka' stsal pa/ / rdo rje rdo rje chen po legs// rdo rje thal mo bstan byas te// rdo rje 'di ni zhus gyur pa// de nyid bsdus pa dam pa'o// rdo rje thal mo de nyid 'di// lung bstan bya yis de nyon cig
149a1(rgyud 'bum): de nyid gsum du gyur pa ni/ / rdo rje thal mor yongs su brtag/ de nyid gsum ni lnga gsum ste// tshangs dang khyab 'jug dbang phyug che// de ru nga ni lha gsum 'gyur// oM AH/
149a2(rgyud 'bum): hUM dang grangs mnyam pa'i// gsang sngags 'jug pa thams cad ni// sna tshogs lus can gcig ming can// zhi ba nyid ni gang du ston// der ni nga yang gnas pa yin// dpral yon de la bzhin mi
149a3(rgyud 'bum): sdug/ de yi skyes bu ming ldan ming // de rnams lag pa'i dbus nas ni// mtheb sogs ji bzhin grangs su bshad// lag pa g.yon ni drag por 'gyur// g.yas pa de bzhin khyab 'jug ste//
149a4(rgyud 'bum): gnyis po sbyor ba tshangs pa yin// de bas yon tan gsum bdag dang // rig dang mchod sbyin snyan tshig ste// rig byed der gyur gsum du bshad// srid bsrungs zhi ba nga yin te// mthar ni 'gro ba gnas
149a5(rgyud 'bum): pa yin/ / lag pa gnyis pa 'di dag ni// bzhi pa'i phyed phyed rnam brgyad pa// byeng po'i tsham gyi haM mchog ni// rab tu zhi bar rab tu bsgrags// nyi ma zla ba mi rnams der// so sor yongs su bsgrag
149a6(rgyud 'bum): pa yin/ / yi ge phyed tsam mchog gyur dang // shis pa zhi ba skyon med pa// yon tan oM dang yi ge phyed// oM zhes gsal bar brjod pa yin// sna yi rtse mor yang dag ldan// gtsug mtha' dang ni lag par
149a7(rgyud 'bum): gnas/ / nyi ma zla ba'i sbyor ba las// ye shes me ni nges par skye// lce dang rkan gyi mtshan ma ni// sbyor las thar par de bshad de// A 'og tu a dang yang dag ldan// de steng yi ge A nyid de// thang
149b1(rgyud 'bum): ka ru ni ma bshad de/ / khyod ni yig phyed zhi ba nyid// yi ge oM ni tshangs pa ste// A ni khyab 'jug yin par bshad// hUM ni rlung du gyur pa yin// de nyid drag po zhes bya'o// zhi ba'i phyed phyed ces bya ba/
149b2(rgyud 'bum): der ni bdag yongs bsgrubs pa yin// gnas dpa 'pho dang skye ba dang // gzhan gyi lus las yang dag 'pho// ye shes rang nyid me yin te// khyab par 'dzin pa de bzhin no// ral gri la sogs dngos grub
149b3(rgyud 'bum): der byang chub phyi rol nyid 'grub 'gyur/ / gnyis po 'di dag gnas pa yi// rnam dag 'di dag rab tu brtag/ tshangs pa la sogs pa rnams der// ma 'ongs pa rnams sgom par 'gyur// de ni mtho ris sogs
149b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gag pas/ / de bzhin 'byung ba sel ba yin// rnal 'byor pa rnams srog spangs nas// gnyis spyad par ni rnam par gnas// shin tu sbyor gcig gyur song bas// 'jug 'gyur ba ni drag po yin// nam
149b5(rgyud 'bum): dgag pa yi sbyor ba yang / / tshangs par gzhol ba'i bdag nyid can// mngal gyi gzugs gyur khyab 'jug ste// de yi dbus na dbus bzung ba// spu yi cha ni stong las gcig/ zhi de rnam par mi rtog nyid//
149b6(rgyud 'bum): thar pa gcig par de ston bya// thar pa'i ngo bo nyid ma yin// de lta bas na 'di log pa// zhi ba nyid ni sgrogs pa'o// ston pa de rnams phye nas ni// zhi ba'i chos rnams smra bar 'gyur// thabs chen de bzhin
149b7(rgyud 'bum): shes rab dag/ 'di 'dra mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// tshangs la sogs pa'i lha rnams kun// khyed kyi thal mo dag la gnas// de rnams phyag rgya ston byed cing // sngag ni bye ba mtha' yas pa// 'di nyid du
150a1(rgyud 'bum): ni nyi zla dang / / sbyin sreg las can me dang ni// lo dang zla ba'i sbyor ba dang // rtag tu 'char dang 'phel 'grib dang // de nyid gsum gyi sbyor skyes 'di// de nyid gcig pu rnam par
150a2(rgyud 'bum): gnas/ / zhi ba nyid kyi sbyor chos la// de yang gcig dang du ma spangs// khyed kyi thal mo las byung ba// de bas de ni 'da' mi bya// de bzhin gshegs kun spangs 'gyur bas// de ni spong bar mi bya zhing //
150a3(rgyud 'bum): 'di dag dngos med la ltos pas// rnal 'byor pa ni mchog tu 'dod// gzhan du rnam rtog nyid las ni// dngos grub 'bras bu'i snod mi 'gyur// de bas thal mo sbyor ba 'di// sems can rjes bzung
150a4(rgyud 'bum): dam pa yin/ / ma bsdus pa yi sems can rnams// bsdu ba'i don du khyod kyis bya// smad bya 'on pa lkugs pa dang // de bzhin long bar gyur pa dang // gang zhig 'phye bo la sogs gyur// de rnams la ni
150a5(rgyud 'bum): phan phyir bya/ / de la sogs pa mdor bsdus pa// de ni khyed kyi thal mor gnas// de ni 'jig rten 'das gtsor gyur// de nyid bsdus pa'i rgyun can no// de ni nang min phyi ma yin// gnyis min gzhan gyi
150a6(rgyud 'bum): rgyu las min/ / phyag rgya tshogs pa las skyes min// 'jig rten rkyen las byung ba min// rdo rje thal mo bsdams pas na// ming ni rdo rje thal mo gyur// sems can rnams kyis rtogs dga' ba'i// snying po brtag
150a7(rgyud 'bum): par bya ba'i mchog/ phyag rgya 'di lta bu 'di yin// phyi nang gnyis kyis ming can no// mi bskyod rin chen dpag med de// dngos grub rnam snang de bzhin gshegs// 'di dag lag pa g.yas pa yi// mthe'u chung
150b1(rgyud 'bum): la sogs rnams la gnas/ / gnyis pos gcig gyur dge 'dun te// de ni skyabs ni gsum yin te// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun rnams// gcig dang gsum du brtags pa yin// phan tshun bcings
150b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rdo rje nyid/ / shes rab thabs kyi gnas mchog yin// thal mo bcings pa tsam gyis kyang // sangs rgyas thams cad nyid thob 'gyur// skyabs mchog gsum dang de nyid gsum// rdo rje gsum dang rnam thar
150b3(rgyud 'bum): gsum/ / zhal gsum mdog gsum spyan gsum dang // lha gsum dang ni khams gsum dang // dus gsum dam tshig mchog gyur gsum// tshul gsum dkyil 'khor gsum du 'gyur// sbyor ba gsum
150b4(rgyud 'bum): dang lam gsum ste/ / ji srid rtogs pas brjod pa rnams// de ni thal mo sbyor 'di yin// 'dod nor yon tan gsum gyi mchog/ rim dang bslab pa ster ba dag/ ma 'ongs skye bos 'thob par 'gyur// de nyid
150b5(rgyud 'bum): du ni der 'gyur na/ / gcig dang du mar rnam par spangs// chos bshad bshad pa dngos med pa// 'gro ba rkyen gyis yang dag sdud// 'di ni mkha' ltar rang bzhin gcig/ gnas med gnas pa zhes
150b6(rgyud 'bum): bya ba/ / bsdu ba byas par gyur pas kyang // sku gsum don gyi chos nyid do// 'di ni thog mtha' med ste// dngos po med cing gnas med pa// mtha' med zad pa med par 'byung // sku gsung
150b7(rgyud 'bum): thugs kyi rkyen las ni/ / rnam pa'i 'jug pa'i ye shes te// de las sangs rgyas snying por gyur// hUM gis sems can yang dag 'byin// sangs rgyas skur ni rab tu brtag/ oM ni thams cad sdud
151a1(rgyud 'bum): pa ste/ / A ni gnas pa par 'gyur ro// gcig pu rnam gsum de bzhin lnga// gsal dang mi gsal sbyor ba ni// rten 'brel chos nyid 'di yin te// de nyid kyi ni sngags
151a2(rgyud 'bum): bshad pa'o/ / zlos na bsam gtan rnam bral bar// de yi lhun grub 'bras bu ster// rang bzhin grub pa 'di yin te// 'dod pa'i bzlas par de bshad do// rnal 'byor pa la de gsal te//
151a3(rgyud 'bum): byis rnams de la phyin ci log/ rkyen las byung ba de nyid gsum// dngos po med par de bshad do// de nyid bsdus pa bshad pa ni// yid min pa yi bzlas par 'gyur// yid ston gcig ni mdor
151a4(rgyud 'bum): bsdus las/ / rings dang dal dang gnas pa rnams// zhi ba'i chos nyid la skye ste// nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam par thim// dngos po med pa'i de nyid 'di// rten 'byung chos zhes bya ba yin//
151a5(rgyud 'bum): longs spyod rdzogs pa'i bsdus te gyur// sprul pa bsam mi khyab ces dben// sdud pa por ni gang gyur pa// de yang phul du gyur pa'i ming // rdo rje la sogs yang dag sbyar// sems can rnams ni de
151a6(rgyud 'bum): sbyor byed/ / dam tshig la sogs sngon de ni// de nyid kyi ni rdo rjer sbyar// sems can dgongs pa'i sbyor ba yis// de yi chos rnams ston par byed// rnam pa dgu po thog mtha' can// sdud pa po rnams
151a7(rgyud 'bum): byas pa yin/ / gsang sngags de nyid gnas dgod pas// sems can rnams ni der 'jog ste// gsol ba 'debs dang phyag 'tshal dang // 'jig rten rnams la gsol ba dang // rdzogs sangs
151b1(rgyud 'bum): rgyas rnams mnyes byed de/ / khyod kyi thal mor gnas pa yin// gang zhig sems can sangs rgyas gyur// de bzhin gnyis med chos nyid can// gnas med gnas pa'i sbyor ba yis// thams cad
151b2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas rnams gnas so/ / sna tshogs mtshon pa de nyid do// mthong ba gsal byed thal mo yin// de bas de rnams mgu gyur pa// chos kyi de nyid rkyen las so// rgyu med rang gi de nyid 'di// khyed
151b3(rgyud 'bum): kyi phyag rgya'i sbyor las byung / / gang zhig shes pas 'dod 'grub pa'i// dngos grub des ni 'thob par 'gyur// A nyid der ni mi gsal ba'i// rgyu las sbyor bar gyur pa yin// dog par de ni yod
151b4(rgyud 'bum): bshad de/ / dngos po med par ras kyi ming // 'phags pa gshin rje gshed bsgoms la// gzhon nu'i gzugs su'ang bsgom par bya// dog pa de yi ras don las// mi snang ba la sogs grub cing //
151b5(rgyud 'bum): yid bzhin nor bu 'dra ba'i mchog/ 'gro ba'i don gcig yang dag byung // A yi dog ras mtshon pas ni// 'jig rten pa la dgongs pas bshad// 'di ni chos dang rdzogs longs spyod//
151b6(rgyud 'bum): sprul pas de ni gsum du 'gyur// byis pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// de ni rnam pa lngar yang 'gyur// tha mal byis pa'i chos rnams gang // rnam lnga gcig pa'i rnal 'byor pa// de yang shin tu
151b7(rgyud 'bum): ldan sems can/ / sems can sogs la rnam par gnas// rtag pa ltar ni so sor snang // 'gro ba dus gsum mtshan nyid gcig/ skye ba med las skyes pas na// gcig dang du ma rnam spangs pa'o//
152a1(rgyud 'bum): shes 'dod de tshe sngags pa ni// 'gro ba byis pa de tshe spyod// de nas gsang sngags grub 'gyur ba// rnam par mi rtog cig shos nyid// ya yi sde sogs gnas byas te//
152a2(rgyud 'bum): sngags ni na ri bri bar bya// rang gi sde bcas gnas dag ni// yi ge a bzhin sngon 'gro ba// so so gzhan pa'i bzhi pa ni// i u dang ni ring por bcas// a ai au u ya ste mtha'// bzhi po
152a3(rgyud 'bum): dang bcas zlum por bri/ / bsam gyis mi khyab sbyor ldan pa'i// 'gro ba mnyam gzhag bskyed pa yin// 'di dag rang skyes gnas gzugs kyi// chu yi yi ger zhugs par 'gyur// de nas gzhon
152a4(rgyud 'bum): nu'i gzugs nyid kyang / / rnam par bsgoms pas skye bar 'gyur// cha bcas dbang gnas sngags pa ni// bla med dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// ra ga yi ni grangs bzhin du// skud sogs sbyor la
152a5(rgyud 'bum): gang gnas pa/ / nyi shu yi ni sngon ma yang // de ni ras te bzhi pa'ang yin// sngon med cha lugs gzugs kyis ni// khams gsum dag ni lta bar 'dod// 'gro ba'i don ni byed gyur pa'ang // mnyam
152a6(rgyud 'bum): nyid ye shes de nyid las/ / yon tan gsum ni brdar byas pa// yon tan med pa'i yon tan ming // gzhon nu'i spyod pa'i lus kyi ming // lta ba 'di ni bar skyes// de ni sgo glegs mtha'i yin te//
152a7(rgyud 'bum): e u dang ni ring por bcas// yi ge gsum bcas thig ler ldan// tsheg drag mtha' yi ring sde can// yi ge a ni yig sbyor ba'ang // bcu gcig par yang gyur pa yin// de nyid ring po ring po'i mthas//
152b1(rgyud 'bum): bcu gnyis pa yi grangs su 'gyur// de nyid yi ge ur sbyor las// yi ge au zhes brjod pa yin// snga ma'i ri mo'i sbyor ba yis// ming ni bcu bzhi par 'gyur ro// ci ste a las sngags pas ni//
152b2(rgyud 'bum): AHnyid du ni blta bar bya// de bzhin A yi sbyor ba las// yi ge a ni ci 'dod par// ji bzhin grangs kyis yang dag blta// re re'ang a yi sbyor bas bsgo// i ri li u'i tshogs las kyang //
152b3(rgyud 'bum): sngags pa ya ra la wa'i gzugs// lkog ma mkha' dang bar dang ni// rkan dang spyi bor gang gnas pa// gang tshe a ka'i sde grangs las// a yi kha yi rgyab na gnas// i tshan phrag pa lag pa
152b4(rgyud 'bum): dang / / tshigs rnams la ni de bzhin no// dpung pa dang ni lag pa dang // lag pa g.yon par rab tu brtag/ dpyi dang baR+Ya dang byin pa dang // rkang pa g.yas g.yon de bzhin no// gzugs de yi/
152b5(rgyud 'bum): ni grangs mnyam pas// ta tshan shin tu dngos grub ster// u tshan de bzhin dbus dang ni// lag pa ru ni yongs su bshad// rkang pa yang ni ri ti'i tshan// 'das pa'i tshul du bzhugs pa yin//
152b6(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin nyid kyi sbyor ldan pa'i// sngags pa rnams kyis shin tu mthong // lhun gyis grub pas dngos grub pa// me tog gis mdzes 'phreng ba bzhin// rang rgyud kyi ni nang nyid du// lha mchog dag ni bya
152b7(rgyud 'bum): ba yin/ / dgongs pa la sogs rnam pa kun// de nyid las ni bdag 'grub 'gyur// tsha ba'i bzhi bzhi snga sbyor bas// mkhas pa yi ni sgo rnams bya// ka tsa Ta ta pa tshan yang // dbus dang shar la sogs
153a1(rgyud 'bum): sngon 'gro/ / 'gro la phan pa'i 'dod pa yang // ma spel bar ni mthong ba yin// thams cad kyang ni rdzogs yi ge/ yi ge hU yis mchod par bya// sna tshogs pa ni 'byin byed cing //
153a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ba dus gsum gcig pa'i dngos// yi ge a ni lus su bya// lhag ma rnam pa dang bcas pa// mtshams med lnga yi sbyor ba las// sngags pa 'gro ba phan par ston// sha thog mthar gnas sngags las
153a3(rgyud 'bum): skyes/ / dbang bskur gsum po spyi las skye// gzugs med rtogs pa'i chos rnams ni// skad cig gcig gis nges sbyor gyur// de tshe dkyil 'khor med byas pa// 'jig rten pa rnams chos dgar 'gyur//
153a4(rgyud 'bum): a ku ha gnas byang phyogs gnas// yod pa nyid kyang dus gsum 'das// gang dang gang nas byung ba yi// gsang sngags bsam pas mi khyab gsungs// de dang de ni bzhugs gyur pa// rang gi mtshan ma cig
153a5(rgyud 'bum): shos nyid/ / gzugs med 'di la gnas yod pa// cha ni gsum zhes bya bar 'gyur// steng 'og phyogs kyi cha rnams su// dngos med pa ni rnam par gnas// dngos po gcig gyur mthong ba dang // 'gro bcas
153a6(rgyud 'bum): tshangs pa 'gro bdag nyid/ / tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi po las// smon lam la sogs bsgom bya ba'o// 'gro ba don gtogs 'dod pa'i yon tan gyur rnams la// dgyes pa'i bde mchog dga' ba'i 'dod pa
153a7(rgyud 'bum): mdzod/ / sngon chad mdzad pa'i smon lam rab mchog dgongs nas ni// thub pa rdo rje'i tshig mchog rnam par dbye bar gsol// nor bu rin chen dag gis rnam brgyan sku yi mchog/ 'gro ba'i don byed sring mo
153b1(rgyud 'bum): bdag la brten par mdzad/ / lhag pa'i snying rje las byung rab mchog ldan pa'i sku// bdag ni yongs su bzung la chos rnams don yod mdzod// sring mos kyang ni khyad par du// de ltar bskul ba tsam gyis ni//
153b2(rgyud 'bum): de nas yongs su 'dzin mdzad de// rig pa'i pad+ma dpal du mdzad// shin tu snyan cing yid 'ong dbyangs kyis ni// phan pas myur du 'gro ba gnyis med 'dir snod gyur// bla ma bdag ni gal te gson par
153b3(rgyud 'bum): mchis bzhed na/ / dga' ba las byung chos dga' ba dag la dgyes par mdzod// 'gro ba dang ni 'ong dang gnas pa tsam 'di ni// nam yang lhod par gyur pa dag gi mnga' ba lags// kun tu song ba'i
153b4(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid can gyi dam tshig ston/ / 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams dang khyed bdag 'dod pa mdzod// dgongs pa'i ye shes rdo rje yis// sangs rgyas yon tan gcig la bzhugs// bzlas brjod sbyin sreg
153b5(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin 'khrus/ / dkyil 'khor yongs su brtags pa mdzad// 'dod pa med cing chags la zhi// de yang don dam dag gyur yin// spyod dus de bzhin sngags pa ni// bzlas brjod dngos po med pa yin//
153b6(rgyud 'bum): bsnyengs pa yang ni yid bzang ldan// mda' dang rig byed yon tan dang // phung dang zla dkyil rnal 'byor pa// dbyangs kyi yi ge gzhag par bya// ha yi sde tshan ka sde dang // bcu gnyis phyed phyed dag tu
153b7(rgyud 'bum): sbyar/ / gshin rje gshed kyi gzugs 'di ni// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dag la dgod// de nas sngags pa mdun 'dug ste// dgongs pa'i don gyis brtag par bya// phung po khams la sogs lta ga/
154a1(rgyud 'bum): brda las ji ltar lus yin bzhin// ma byin len pa byang chub sems// kun rdzob bstan pa brdzun smra ba// phung po srog chags gyur pa ste// tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bud med yin//
154a2(rgyud 'bum): mi sbyin tshig dang rkang pa ste// de bzhin rten pa nyid kyang ni// dus gsum sbyor ba gcig pu ru// sngags pa yis ni de bya'o// bshang ba zhes ni yul la bshad// gci ba zhes ni dbang po yin// de dag
154a3(rgyud 'bum): za bar bshad pa ni/ / ma skyes gcig pur mthong ba'o// khrag ni pags par yang dag bshad// sa bon lus zhes bya ba yin// rkang ni sems kyis kun rtog pa// za ba dngos med gyur pa'o// smon lam dbang
154a4(rgyud 'bum): gis 'di rnams ni/ / bi mu ra shu pa sa 'di// lha rnams sbyor ba'i chos nyid du// bdud rtsi zhes ni brjod pa yin// dgongs pa yis ni bshad pa la// byis pa rnams ni yi ger rtog/ rdo rje theg la
154a5(rgyud 'bum): gnas khyod kyang / / chos nyid de yang mi shes so// rtog pa kun las rnams 'das pas// chos kyi dbyings te mkha' dang mtshungs// de 'dra 'jig rten rgyang phan pa// mthon po'i gsang gis rtog par
154a6(rgyud 'bum): byed/ / yi ge gang gis mi gang zhig/ 'gro la gsal bar rtog byed pa// 'gro don gcig pa'i sbyor ba las// de nyid kyis ni de nyid mthong // gang zhig rnam smin smin pa yi// sems ni dngos
154a7(rgyud 'bum): grub la gzhol ba/ / rdzogs longs spyod pa'i skur sbyor las// dngos po med pa nyid du byung // bdag nyid bsam gyis mi khyab gzugs// kun rdzob don gyi gnyen por 'byung // sprul pa'i lus
154b1(rgyud 'bum): las bsngags pas ni/ / sgyu ma bzhin du ston par byed// gsang ba'i dgongs pa de nyid 'di// 'jam dpal ye shes dam pa'o// rdo rje gsum gnas sbyor ba yis// sgom pa'i bdag nyid can gyis sgom//
154b2(rgyud 'bum): nam mkhar brtags pa'i rnal 'byor la// phung po dgon pa chen por 'dod// gnas med gnas pa'i sbyor ba yis// de bzhin nyid gnas sa phyogs yin// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i dpag bsam shing //
154b3(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub sna tshogs me tog ldan// sprul pa'i 'bras bu shin tu mdzes// yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub ri// dngos med dben pa nyams dga' ba// rdo rje zhes bya des bsgrub bya// phung sogs
154b4(rgyud 'bum): yan lag thams cad de/ / sangs rgyas 'byung ba dngos grub gyur// sngags 'don par ni gang gyur pa// bsdus pa sngags ni gcig pu pa// lus sogs rdo rje gsum la ni// rdo rje 'jam pa
154b5(rgyud 'bum): bsgom par bya/ / lus la sogs pa rdo rje gsum// de nyid gsum nas spro bar bya// rdo rje gsum dang legs sbyor las// 'jam pa'i rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur// nam mkha' mtha' yas yang dag rtog
154b6(rgyud 'bum): sems sbyor ba ni dpag tshad yin/ / lnga bcu gnyis gyur gang yin pa// brgya po rgyab nas mngon phyogs la// ci rigs gcig pa'i yang dag rtogs// sna tshogs rdo rje 'bar gcig stsol// dpag tshad
154b7(rgyud 'bum): brgya yi khyon tsam du/ / 'bar ba'i rdo rje snang ba yis// sa la sogs pa brgyan pa ni// de ni snang ba zhes bshad do// tshangs pa dbang po la sogs lha// dad pas de la phyag kyang byed// 'di ni mi snang
155a1(rgyud 'bum): byed pa ste/ / ting 'dzin 'jam pa'i rdo rje nyid// rnam par smin pa ldog gyur cing // ji skad gsungs pa 'grub par 'gyur// phung po la sogs grangs mnyam par// mi bskyod la sogs
155a2(rgyud 'bum): rab tu brtag/ bshang gci spyang las der gyur pa// gang zhig dam tshig ces bya'o// dam tshig rtse bya de dag mchog/ mi phyed rdo rje gsum 'byung bas// dkon mchog gsum ni mnyam byas te// bdag
155a3(rgyud 'bum): med pa yang bsgom par bya/ / dkon mchog gsum ni lcags gsum yin// bdag med ces bya kha yin te// gang 'di rnam rtog gcig nyid du// bcug pa ril bu yin par 'dod// sangs rgyas rnams
155a4(rgyud 'bum): kyis mi phyed pa'i/ / sgom pa sems kyi dam pa'o// de ltar de nyid shes bsgoms nas// skad cig gis 'jam rdo rjer 'gyur// 'khor lo 'od 'phro mtshungs par 'gyur// rang gi sngags kyis rnam
155a5(rgyud 'bum): bsgoms nas/ / sangs rgyas kun gyis gnas bsgoms nas// sangs rgyas 'dra bar 'gyur bar bshad// sum cu rtsa drug gnas sbyor ba'i// ri rab kyi ni rdul phran rnams// de snyed de yi rjes 'brang
155a6(rgyud 'bum): rnams/ / dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya'o// gnas ni lha yi sbyor ba ste// sna ni ri rab ces bya'o// bdag nyid chen po sum cu bdun// nam mkha' spro ba bsam mi khyab// 'jam pa'i rdo rje bdag po ste//
155a7(rgyud 'bum): 'di dag 'khor du gyur pa yin// 'jig rten pa yi ngo bo ru// phyi yi ri rab brtag pa yin// dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i// 'khor lo'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya// 'khor lo dngos grub rnyed sla ba// skad cig
155b1(rgyud 'bum): sbyor bas sgrub pa'o/ / rdo rje chen po rang sngags kyis// dkyil 'khor dbus su rab bsgoms pa// rdo rje kun gyi gnas mchog ste// thugs kyi rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur// ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi/ rdul phran
155b2(rgyud 'bum): ji skad yod pa yi/ / de snyed bud med de yi ni// gsum 'gyur gnas su 'gyur ba yin// khams gsum gyi ni rdo rje che// drag po yis ni phyag byas 'gyur// rdo rje dam tshig ces bya ba'i// ting
155b3(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin 'di ni yang dag bshad/ / pad+ma chen po 'dab brgyad pa// rang sngags rdo rje las byung ba// chos rnams kun gyi gnas bsgoms na// rdo rje chos dang 'dra bar 'gyur// sum cu rtsa drug gnas
155b4(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba'i/ / ri rab rdul phran grangs snyed kyi// sangs rgyas rdo rje mchog gi ni// dkyil 'khor la ni bdag nyid 'jog/ gos med mnyam nyid ye shes kyi// rdo rje pad+mo gru bcas sbyin// so sor rtog
155b5(rgyud 'bum): pa zhes bya ba'i/ / ting nge 'dzin ni yang dag bshad// shin tu grangs med bskal par ni// grangs kyi ming gis gnas par ni// gnas shing sgom par byed pa yin// de yi ye shes lngar ldan pa/
155b6(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kun gyis dgongs pa ni// 'jig rten phan phyir gsungs pa rnams// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa'i// yon tan gsum ni yongs su brten// 'od zer lnga yi mdog 'dra
155b7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i/ / rang sngags las byung ral gri ni// blo ldan lag par de bzhag na// rdo rje rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// rang gi sngags kyi khongs chud 'di// ho ho hUM de khams gsum pa// pad+ma spangs pa'i tshangs
156a1(rgyud 'bum): pa cher/ / rnal 'byor pa de 'gyur ba yin// khams gsum kun gyis cher mchod cing // tshangs dang lha min phyag byas pa// stong gsum mi yi mchog gcig pu// dbang
156a2(rgyud 'bum): chen po yi tshangs par 'gyur/ / thugs kyi rdo rje mchog bsgoms pas// dngos grub ji ltar 'dod pa dag/ sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las// de ni de ma thag tu 'thob// rang gi rdo rje ting 'dzin 'di// dngos
156a3(rgyud 'bum): med gcig pu yang dag byung / / byang grol la yang de mi gnas// ral gri kha dang 'dra bar 'gyur// oM ni ril bu tsa na ka'i// 'bru tshad tsam du bsams nas ni// dbus su rang gi lha yi
156a4(rgyud 'bum): gzugs/ / bsams te khar bcug rnam bsgoms na// byang chub ye shes 'od po che// blo ldan de ma thag tu 'gyur// 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser mdog gam// nyi ma 'char ba'i mdog 'dra ba'i//
156a5(rgyud 'bum): tsan ka yi 'bru tshod tsam// yi ge'i dam pa AHbsam mo// de yi dbus su lha yi gzugs// khar bcug nas ni rnam bsgoms na// byang chub ye shes 'od po che// de ni de ma thag tu 'gyur//
156a6(rgyud 'bum): 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser mdog dang // nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog 'dra ba'i// nam mkha'i dbus na gnas pa yi// tsa na ka yi 'bru tshod tsam// yi ge hUM ni rnam bsams te// dbus su rang gi lha bsams
156a7(rgyud 'bum): nas/ / khar bcug nas ni rnam bsams na// rdo rje sems dpa' 'od po che// dpal ldan de ma thag tu 'gyur// 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser mdog dang // nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog 'dra ba'i//
156b1(rgyud 'bum): rnam par snang mdzad mkha' dbyings kyi// dkyil 'khor dbus su rab bsgoms la// lag tu 'khor lo rnam bsgoms na// 'khor lo'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// rdo rje'i sku mdog sbyor ba
156b2(rgyud 'bum): yang / / 'di ni ye shes mchog sgrub pa'o// 'khor lo chen po'i rigs bsgoms te// ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya// 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser mdog gam// nyi ma 'char ka'i 'od 'dra ba'i/
156b3(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// rdo rje mi phyed rab bsgoms te// lag tu rdo rje bsgoms na ni// rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// rdo rje mchog gi sgrub pa 'di// rdo rje sku yi sbyor ba las// rdo rje rigs kyi mchog
156b4(rgyud 'bum): bsgoms pas/ / ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya// nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par// rI chen la ni rin chen sgom// de nyid lag tu legs bzhag na// rin chen rig pa 'dzin par
156b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / rin chen mchog gi sgrub pa 'di// rin chen sku yi sbyor ba las// rin chen rigs kyi mchog bsgom pa// ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par//
156b6(rgyud 'bum): tshe dpag med pa rab bsgoms la// lag tu pad+ma bsgoms na ni// pad+ma'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// pad+ma mchog gi sgrub pa 'di// pad+ma'i skur ni sbyor ba las// pad+ma'i rigs chen
156b7(rgyud 'bum): bsgoms pa ni/ / ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// don yod mchog ni rab bsgoms la// lag tu ral gri rab bsgoms na// ral gri'i rig pa 'dzin
157a1(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / dam tshig mchog ni 'di sgrub pa// sku yi dam tshig sbyor ba las// dam tshig rdo rje rigs bsgoms pa// ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya// bsgrub bya'i rdo rje'i dbye ba yis/
157a2(rgyud 'bum): mdung thung rdo rje lcags kyu sogs// sku gsung thugs kyi sgrub pa yis// bsam gtan nyid kyis sgrub par 'gyur// dam tshig chen po 'byung ba yis// dam tshig dngos grub ces bya ba'i// mi phyed rdo rje
157a3(rgyud 'bum): gsum dbang phyug/ sna tshogs bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs// sdug bsngal dang ni kun 'byung nyid// 'gog dang lam ste bzhi po ni// lam gyi bzhi mdor yang dag bshad// sgrub pa po ni gnas ming
157a4(rgyud 'bum): can/ / shing gcig drung du yang dag rtog/ chos dang rdzogs spyod ming can du// sna tshogs mtshan gcig yang dag dgod// mtshan ma rkyen gyi gzugs can no// 'byin dang rngub pa nyid dang ni// gnas/
157a5(rgyud 'bum): pa yis ni nyer mdzes pa// yid ston pa yi mnyam sbyor la// rab tu zhi ba'i zhi gnas su// dus gsum rtog pa gcig las 'das// rdo rje lcags kyu khyad par dang // sgrub pa po ni rtag tu sgrub// sbyor
157a6(rgyud 'bum): gsum sngags kyi skyes bu ni/ / sbyor gsum rdo rje can bsam pa// sku gsung thugs kyi lcags kyu'o// sangs rgyas ye shes blo can gyi// mi gsal gsal bar yang dag ldan// de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo
157a7(rgyud 'bum): las/ / 'gro ba thams cad dgug par bya// rlung gi dkyil 'khor mchog gnas pa// sangs rgyas dgug pa dam pa yin// gnas med gnas pa'i sbyor ba yis// de nyid sngags don rnal 'byor pas//
157b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ba 'dod pa'i longs spyod kyang // mi gsal sbyor bas sbyor bar byed// gang yang dam tshig phyogs rnams ni// mkha' dbyings dbye bas gnas pa rnams// de nyid rdo rje bkug nas ni// sngags rig
157b2(rgyud 'bum): pas ni sprad par bya/ / nam mkha'i khams ni dgug pa 'di// dam tshig chen po rdo rje can// sngags kyi de nyid gcig sbyor las// lcags kyu de rnams 'grub par 'gyur// dam tshig rnams ni dgug
157b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i mchog/ rgyal gnas lcags kyu bsams nas ni// rnam par snang mdzad 'khor lo che// rdo rje pad+ma la sogs bya// me long lta bu'i sngags pas ni// sangs rgyas sku ni rnam par sgom// lag tu
157b4(rgyud 'bum): sku dang gsung thugs kyi/ / lcags kyu la sogs rab tu sgom// de ni sbyor ba 'di nyid kyis// de nyid las ni lha rnams dgod// de ni de ma thag tu yang // dngos grub kun ster las byed 'gyur// sku
157b5(rgyud 'bum): dang gsung thugs thams cad ni/ / mtshan nyid gcig par bsgom par bya// lce yi rdo rje sbyor ba yis// gsung gi rdo rjer de mnyam sgom// brtul zhugs can gyis phyi nang gnyis// gsang ba'i
157b6(rgyud 'bum): mchog mchod do/ / dngos med dam tshig sbyor ba yis// ji lta ji ltar rab sgrub pa// dam tshig gsum gyi rnal 'byor pa'i// de ni yang dag yin par bshad// gsang ba'i snying po bsdus pa
157b7(rgyud 'bum): yis/ / dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu 'dod// bcom ldan dam tshig chen po yi// rnal 'byor pas ni de skad gsungs// de nas phyag na rdo rje ni// go byed gsang ba yang dag gsungs// gang
158a1(rgyud 'bum): zhig shes na rnal 'byor pa'i/ / mnyam gzhag mchog ni 'thob 'gyur ba'i// gsang dbang de nyid dam pa yi// de ni de yis yang dag bshad// rnal 'byor chen po
158a2(rgyud 'bum): gcig bdag nyid/ / nam mkha' dang ni mnyam pa'i gnas// byas na dam tshig yang dag pa// sha chen la ni yang dag sbyar// dngos med pa yi sha chen gyi// dam tshig mchog la gnas nas ni//
158a3(rgyud 'bum): blo ldan padag nyid sgom pa ni// rdo rje dngos grub longs spyod ster// rdzogs longs spyod yul bshang ba yin// de nyid ye shes dbang po gci// dam tshig 'di dag nyid kyis ni// rig pa 'dzin pa'i
158a4(rgyud 'bum): gtso bor 'gyur/ / longs spyod rdzogs phung las byung ba// glang po'i shar ni de rab brtag/ dam tshig gcig tu legs sbyor las// mngon shes lnga bdag thob par 'gyur// dbang po gnyis ni rta
158a5(rgyud 'bum): sha ste/ / dngos med de nyid las sbyor las// dam tshig gcig tu legs sbyor na// mi snang gnas kyi mchog tu 'gyur// dgongs pas cig shos zlos pa yin// phung sogs yan lag gang
158a6(rgyud 'bum): gyur pa/ / dngos med de ni khyi sha yin// dam tshig gcig tu yang dag sbyor// dngos grub thams cad rab sgrub pa'o// rdzogs sangs rgyas can pa lang sha// khro bo'i rgyal po 'grub par 'gyur//
158a7(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig gcig tu yang dag sbyor// rdo rje dgug pa'i dam pa'o// 'di ni 'jig rten par gyur las// dgongs pas cig shos bzlog pa yis// sha chen dang ni bshang gci dang // glang po rta khyi ba lang
158b1(rgyud 'bum): dag/ mi rtog gcig pa'i sgrub pa yis// dam tshig gcig tu de 'grub 'gyur// brtan pas 'di ni sgrub pa ni// sngags kyi longs spyod rnal 'byor pa// rdo rje sbyor ba'i gsang ba yis// sgrub pa 'di
158b2(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan par 'gyur/ / de ni sangs rgyas byin rlob cing // rnam kun rdo rje can gsum dang // snying khar ye shes dam tshig dang // dbu rgyan la ni rdo rje 'dzin// sangs rgyas thams cad tshim 'gyur
158b3(rgyud 'bum): ba'i/ / 'di ni dam tshig sdom pa'o// dngos grub thams cad ster ba'i mchog/ dam tshig mchog 'dis rab tu bya// dam tshig kun gyi dam pa ste// rdo rje zas kyi ting 'dzin no// de nas 'gro la
158b4(rgyud 'bum): phan pa'i mgon/ / gtso bo rnam snang chen po la// gsang ba'i dgongs pa dam pa ni// rdo rje 'dzin pas slar yang zhus// gang zhig spyi bor brtags pa ni// gcig pu nyid du gyur pa des// ri rab
158b5(rgyud 'bum): sum cu rtsa drug tu/ / mu stegs rnams kyis 'tshal mi 'gyur// rang gi bstan bcos brda yis ni// phyi rol pa de rnam rtog la// ting 'dzin brtags pa 'di dag kyang // 'di la rang gi ngo bo med//
158b6(rgyud 'bum): tshangs sgo mdzod kyi rgyud la ni// ri rab gcig dang bcas par bshad// byis pa mchog ni rmongs byed pa// gsung 'di skye bo ltung bar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan bdag po 'dis// rdo rje can la slar
158b7(rgyud 'bum): gsungs pa/ / legs so rdo rje legs pa che// skyes bu dam pa khyod legs pa// rkyen dang nyan thos theg pa dang // 'dir ni nga yis gsal bshad pa// sangs rgyas kyis bshad ye shes dag/
159a1(rgyud 'bum): theg pa chen po mi mthong ngo // tshad yod dang ni yongs chad pa'i// rang gi lus la gang bshad de// ye shes de rnams dri med 'dod// khron pa'i rus sbal zhes bya'o//
159a2(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha' dang ni mnyam ye shes// rdo rje theg pa bla med pa// mchog sbyin nga ni khyed bzhin du// rgya chen de yis mi mthong ngo // rdo rje theg pa rgya mtsho ste// de yis yang dag ma mthong bas//
159a3(rgyud 'bum): rang gi lung ni tshang ma yis// gzhan yod pa ni min zhes smra// theg pa che la gsang ba rnams// srang la bcal te de smra ba// de rnams sngon bzhin gsal min zhes// nga yi tshig las bltas te
159a4(rgyud 'bum): smrangade nyid rjes su gzung ba'i phyir/ / rdzogs sangs rgyas la sgom pa rnams// gang gis shes na rtog med 'gyur// gsang ba dgongs pas gsungs pa yin// sngags kyi de nyi don byang chub//
159a5(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs dngos grub 'bras bu star// dgongs don ji lta ji lta bar// de ni nga yis yang dag bshad// dam tshig rdo rje lce la ni// rdo rje can gyis hUM bsams te// rnal 'byor pas ni bdud
159a6(rgyud 'bum): rtsi lnga/ / zos na rdo rje gsum thob 'gyur// AHdang oM gyi gsang ba dag/ 'di ni rdo rje gsum mchog ste// 'di lta bu yi sbyor ba yis// rdo rje sems dpa'i 'od chen 'gyur// 'di ni rdo rje
159a7(rgyud 'bum): bdud rtsi yi/ / 'phreng 'gyur dam tshig rdo rjer bshad// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag 'byung // ting nge 'dzin ni bshad pa yin// rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig mchog/ sku gsung rdo rje can du 'gyur//
159b1(rgyud 'bum): de nyid sems can thams cad kyi// yid bzhin nor bu'i rgya mtsho che// 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du// sangs rgyas sku dang 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rje dam tshig dngos grub mchog/ rdorje
159b2(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid de snang byed/ / gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed// sangs rgyas zhing ni thams cad du// grub nas 'di ni der sbyor ba'i// rig pa 'dzin par de 'gyur ro// sku yi rdo rje sgom bdag nyid//
159b3(rgyud 'bum): grub mchog dam tshig la gnas pa// mi snang gyur pa kun gyi mchog/ stong gsum dag ni snang bar byed// lha yi bu mo mchog phrogs nas// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor mar legs sbyor// gang+gA'i
159b4(rgyud 'bum): bye snyed ces bya ba'i/ / rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma lus kun// dpe de dang ni grangs gcig pa// sangs rgyas dus gsum rnam spangs pa// lag tu skyu ru ra gzhag bzhin// rdo rje mig gis
159b5(rgyud 'bum): mthong 'gyur/ / sangs rgyas zhing ni gang dag tu// sgra grag pa ni ji snyed pa// rna ba la gnas ma nor bar// skad cig gis ni de kun thos// gang+gA'i byi snyed zhing dag dang // sku la sogs pa gsum
159b6(rgyud 'bum): gyis mtshan/ / sems zhes bshad pa'i sgom pa mchog/ sems can rnams kyi de nyid rig/ bskal pa gang+gA'i bye snyed du// sangs rgyas rdo rje mchog gis 'gengs// rdo rje bsam mi khyab sngon 'gro/
159b7(rgyud 'bum): rang gi rna ba sems bcas pa// gang+gA'i bye ma'i ming can gyi// gnas kyi dngos po bshad pa yin// sangs rgyas rnams kyi mngon shes nas// 'di ni yang dag bka' stsal to// mngon shes drug
160a1(rgyud 'bum): ni don grub bo/ / de ni sangs rgyas 'dra bar 'gyur// gang+gA'i klung gi bye snyed kyi// 'khor rnams kyis ni rab mdzes pas// sku sogs rdo rje gsum 'di ni// 'jig rten
160a2(rgyud 'bum): khams rnams kun tu spyod/ / yid rton bden gcig bsnyen pa ste// de nyid gsum mnyam gnyis med pa// brten te dam tshig gcig gyur pa// ye shes nye bar sgrub pa'o// yid rton mnyam
160a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sbyor ba las/ / sgrub pa yi ni dam tshig 'gyur// 'bras bu mngon sum byas sbyor ba// sgrub pa chen po bzhi pa'o// rkyen dang nyan thos mdo sde pa// 'di dang ldan pa rab tu bsngags//
160a4(rgyud 'bum): sems la dmigs dang 'dir sbyor ba// skad cig gis kyang de 'grub 'gyur// bsnyen pa'i dam tshig sbyor gcig dang // nye bar bsgrub par gang gyur dang // sgrub pa'i dam tshig nyid dang ni//
160a5(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa chen po bzhi pa yin// 'di la yang dag 'jug 'gyur ba// ji lta ji ltar 'jig rten sogs// sa dang shing gi rin chen sogs// lha nyid du ni rab tu brtag/ chos kyi dbye bas shes
160a6(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / rdo rje ye shes sgrub pa po// bsten pa'i dam tshig yang dag sbyor// byang chub mchog ni rnam par sgom// gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri// ro dang reg bya chos rnams la// dngos grub mchog
160a7(rgyud 'bum): ni rnam dpyad pa/ / de ni nye bar sgrub par 'gyur// sngags bdag gang yin bsgoms nas ni// bskul ba sgrub par 'gyur ba yin// rang sngags rdo rje can gyi gzugs// 'di ni sgrub pa chen por 'dod//
160b1(rgyud 'bum): bsnyen pa rdo rje bdud rtsi dag/ sngags pas kun tu brtag par bya// dngos grub 'dod pas gnas pa ni// dbu rgyan la ni mchog gang bsam// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// de nyid gsum
160b2(rgyud 'bum): gsang yang dag 'byung / / sngags kyi de nyid don gnyer ba'i// sgrub pa pos ni dben pa bstan// sna tshogs lung gi yang dag rtog/ sngags ni dgon pa chen por 'dod// de yi dpag bsam shing
160b3(rgyud 'bum): longs spyod/ / sa phyogs zhes ni yongs su bsgrags// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sbyor ba ni// rnam pa'i dben pa chen por bshad// ri 'or rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang // de rigs dngos med las
160b4(rgyud 'bum): byung ba'o/ / de 'dra'i dben pa'i mtshon pa ru// der ni 'od chen rnam gnas te// gnas med pa yi sbyor ba yis// rtag tu dngos grub thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan rdo rje'i sgrub pa ni// chen pos
160b5(rgyud 'bum): de skad bka' stsal to/ / dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs sogs// 'jig rten pa rnams smra ba gsal// bsnyen pa sku yi brtul zhugs mchog/ blo dang ldan pas rdo rje bzhis// rdo rje gsum gnyis
160b6(rgyud 'bum): med sbyor bas/ / bsgoms na dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// me long zhes bya dgon pa che// rin chen zhes bya dben pa'o// chen po zhes bya 'od dpag med// don yod pa ni ri 'or yin// chu ngogs
160b7(rgyud 'bum): dag pa'i chos kyi cha/ / gnas lnga dag tu rab tu brtag/ ji srid don ni sbyor ba bzhis// yi ge oM ni sdom par 'gyur// ji ltar nam mkha'i mtshan nyid gcig/ rang gi mtshan nyid 'dor mi byed/
161a1(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin de nyid gsum bzhi'i byed// yi ge oM gcig sdom pa'o// gnas med gnas pa zhes bya ba'i// oM gcig gis ni 'gro la khyab// de nyid mi gsal sbyor dbang po//
161a2(rgyud 'bum): gtso bo rang nyid zlog pa yin// la la glang po spangs nas ni// rjes la dbyibs ni tshol bar byed// de bzhin ma 'ongs sngags pa ni// oM las sdom pa bzhin du 'dod// gcig gnyis gsum dang
161a3(rgyud 'bum): bzhi dang lnga/ / dus thub de bzhin nor can dang // phan tshun sbyor gnas brjod pa las// bsam mi khyab pa'i grangs su 'gyur// bcom ldan gcig kyang du ma ste// tshig tu brjod pa rnam par
161a4(rgyud 'bum): spangs/ / brda tsam du ni oM zhes bya// dngos med sbyor ba'i chos nyid yin// chos dang longs spyod sprul pa ste// sku gsum du ni yang dag bshad// gsum po yang dag 'dzin pas ni// des na
161a5(rgyud 'bum): oM ni sdom pa yin/ / dang po gcig pu mi bskyod dgod// de nyid sdom par gyur pa yin// brda ru brjod pa sna tshogs pa// bsams nas sdom pa kun tu bshad// mi phyed nam mkha'i sbyor ba yis//
161a6(rgyud 'bum): bsam dang gdon dang rnam par bral// rten 'brel rig las yang dag 'byung // rjes bcas zhes bya de bsgom bya// rtag tu 'byung ba'i ye shes gzhag/ mig la sogs pa bdun brgya la//
161a7(rgyud 'bum): g.yas dang cig shos zla phyed de// shes rab thabs kyang sgrub pa'o// 'di dag zung gyur zla ba ste// rdo rje ming can phyed dang gnyis// de ni sbyor ba 'di nyid kyis// dngos grub sbyar du thob par 'gyur/
161b1(rgyud 'bum): zhag ni thub pa sla phyed dang // zla gcig zla ba phyed gnyis pas// 'jig rten pa yi zhag dbye bas// rgya cher ngas ni bshad pa yin// gsang ba mchog las byung ba ni// zla ba phyed kyis sgrub
