161b2(rgyud 'bum): par gsungs/ / de nyid nye bar 'grub bshad pa'i// sdom pa'i yul ni dam pa yin// gang tshe shes rab thabs ye shes// de bzhin nyid shes las byung ba// sangs rgyas sku 'dzin dpal dang
161b3(rgyud 'bum): ldan/ / rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas// rdo rje byin rlabs mdzad par 'gyur// 'das dang ma 'ongs sangs rgyas dang // gang zhig phyogs bcur bzhugs pa rnams// chos sku mchog gi
161b4(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor pa/ / sangs rgyas de rnams byin gyis rlob// 'das pa rnams ni chos sku yis// bsam mi khyab pa'i phyogs na bzhugs// sngags mchog bsam gyis mi khyab pas// ma 'ongs rnams
161b5(rgyud 'bum): kyis byin gyis rlob/ / sangs rgyas gsum la dbye ba ni// cung zad tsam yang yod ma yin// 'on kyang dngos med las byung ba'i// sngags pa rnams la byin gyis rlob// phyogs bcur bzhugs
161b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ / mi phyed rdo rje gsum bsgoms la// sku ni ji lta bar 'tsham pa// de ltar byin gyis rlob par mdzad// rig dang ma rig yang dag ldan// srog la sogs te bcu gnyis
161b7(rgyud 'bum): bshad/ / dus kyi nyis 'gyur lam la sogs// de nyid zla ba la sogs 'gyur// zla ba la sogs grangs mnyam pas// nyi ma bcu gnyis ming can yin// khyab 'jug de nyid dbye ba yis//
162a1(rgyud 'bum): lam rtsom pa'i ni brtags pa yis// de nyid du ni sgrub pa mchog/ sdom pa yul zhes bshad pa yin// sngags dang dngos med de byed pa// mgal me 'khor lo bskor dang
162a2(rgyud 'bum): mtshungs/ / rtog pa las byung de 'di ni// dngos med pa ni bsgoms pas so// ma 'ongs pa yi skye bo ni// lha yi gzugs la 'dud par byed// mig dang de bzhin rna ba dang // lce dang de bzhin lus
162a3(rgyud 'bum): dag dang / / pags pa rkang par yang dag ldan// 'dzin pa dag ni mi nus pa// lta dang nyan dang dri dang ro// reg bya rnams ni dngos med pa// rang bzhin sems med gyur pa yi// 'jim gzugs
162a4(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas sku can te/ / 'on kyang 'gro ba'i bla ma'i sku// sangs rgyas byin gyi byin rlabs kyis// de bzhin sngags sbyor bdag nyid can// dngos med rdo rje'i sku nyid yin// shing dang sa dang rin chen sogs//
162a5(rgyud 'bum): rang gi lha yi gzugs byas la// rang gi chos ni spangs nas su// tshig gi lam de ston par byed// sku gsung thugs dang ldan pa mchog/ cho 'phrul de la ga las byung // de nas dang sogs yang dag pas//
162a6(rgyud 'bum): slar yang de la gsol 'debs kyang // gsol ba 'debs pa tsam gyis ni// de dang 'dra bar ga la 'gyur// phyi rol chos la gang zhig dga'// lha rnams thams cad spong ba yin// de ltar sku las sku
162a7(rgyud 'bum): byung ba/ / dpal ldan chos 'di'ang gsum gyi lam// byin rlabs pa dag longs spyod na// gsung gi rdo rje can du byed// 'das dang ma 'ongs sangs rgyas rnams// phyogs bcu na ni gang bzhugs pa//
162b1(rgyud 'bum): byung dang 'byung 'gyur de rnams ni// mi phyed gsum gyi lam du 'gyur// yid rton bde ba zhi bdag nyid// de bzhin nyid shes las byung ba// yi ge gcig ni gsum drug 'di// rang nyid 'gro ba'i
162b2(rgyud 'bum): khar brjod do/ / de yis byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas// rdo rje mi phyed rdo rje can// gang gzhan sangs rgyas kyis gsungs dang // 'gro ba'i sgrar ni 'di gyur te// dus gsum bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas
162b3(rgyud 'bum): rnams/ / rdo rje mi phyed gsum rnal 'byor// gsung gi rdo rje mi phyed pa// rdo rje can mchog de byin rlob// 'jug pa gnas pa'i sbyor ba dang // ldang ba dang ni yang dag ldan// gsung gi rdo rje dngos med pa/
162b4(rgyud 'bum): de ni sangs rgyas byin gyis rlob// ji ltar 'khor los sgyur rgyal ni// tshig gis lam gyi las byed 'jug/ gsung byin brlabs pas sngags pa ni// de bzhin don yod nyid du byed// der ni yang dag
162b5(rgyud 'bum): bshad pa 'di/ / sgrub pa chen po zhes bya ba'o// sangs rgyas de rnams byin rlob pa// sdom pa yul ni dam pa'o// rdo rje thugs ni 'dzin rgyal po// de ni bdag la byin rlob mdzad// mi phyed rdo rje gsum sbyor
162b6(rgyud 'bum): bas/ / nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam pa'i gnas// gang zhig byung dang 'byung 'gyur ba'i// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// de yi byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas// lan gsum las
162b7(rgyud 'bum): ni byung ba mdzad/ / sku yis ston pa'i mdzad pa mchog/ rang sangs rgyas ni sgom pa yin// mdo sde pa dang nyan thos kyi'ang // smra ba sgrub pa por gyur yin// sems ni rnal 'byor ldan mchog gis//
163a1(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ba'i don ni rab sgrub pa'o// 'gro 'ong gnas dang bral ba ni// rdo dang sa dang dbyig byed pa// lus la sogs pa mtshon pa yis// 'on kyang de ni gsung du 'gyur//
163a2(rgyud 'bum): sems dang lus dang mi ldan pa'i// de bzhin nyid ni 'gro don can// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje gcig/ gyur kyang so sor brtan pa yin// sangs rgyas rdo rje chos dag gam// de bzhin rdo rje sems
163a3(rgyud 'bum): dpa' yang rung / / sku gsung thugs kyi sangs rgyas sogs// rdo rje gsum po mi phyed brtags// de 'das rmongs pa'i bdag nyid can// so sor rtog pa 'gags par 'gyur// sku la sogs pa'i
163a4(rgyud 'bum): grangs mnyam par/ / sangs rgyas kyang ni gang rtogs gyur// stong pa shin tu sbyor ba yang // de ni gsal bar the tsom med// sna tshogs sbyor gyur sngags rnams ni// gang zhig stong par mngon sum byed//
163a5(rgyud 'bum): 'das pa dag ni de thams cad// rmongs pa'i bdag nyid de 'gas 'gyur// nyan thos rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi// byang chub bsdus nas bshad pa yin// 'jig rten pa yi gang bshad pa// mdor
163a6(rgyud 'bum): bsdus pa ni 'di yin no/ / sangs rgyas yang na rdo rje chos// yang na rdo rje sems dpa' yang rung // rmongs pas 'di las 'das na ni// de ni 'gags par the tshom med// dgongs pa lung bstan la gnas nas//
163a7(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba dam pa yang dag srung // lhun gyis grub pa'i sbyor ba yis// dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya// sku la sogs pa'i gsang ba mchog/ rdo rje sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i// dam tshig sgrub pa'i mchog
163b1(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa'i/ / le'u bcu gnyis gsungs pa yin// dgongs pa lung bstan pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+har+m+ma shrI b+ha dra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba dge slong
163b2(rgyud 'bum): rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ @rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra mA la a b+hi d+hA na ma hA yo ga tan+t+ra sarba tan+t+ra hri da ya ra ha s+ya b+he dka
163b3(rgyud 'bum): ma i ti/ bod skad du/ rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba mngon par brjod pa rgyud thams cad kyi snying po gsang ba rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag
163b4(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
163b5(rgyud 'bum): gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi snying po rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga rnams la tshad med pa'i phyag rgya chen pos mngon par rtogs pas bzhugs te/
163b6(rgyud 'bum): dpag tu med pa'i rdo rje'i rigs dang 'brel ba'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang thabs cig tu thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po mngon par rtogs pa la mngon du bya ba la bzhugs pa
163b7(rgyud 'bum): gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po nyams su myong bas dgyes pas mchog tu pad+ma dgyes pa/ chos thams cad kyang ji lta ba bzhin nyams su myong ba mthong bas rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi de kho na nyid la mngon du
164a1(rgyud 'bum): phyogs pa/ rdo rje 'chang chen po'i dam tshig bla na med pa'i dbang du gyur pa la rab tu mkhas pa 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dam tshig rdo rje dang /
164a2(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhe sdang rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chags pa rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje las dang /
164a3(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje ye shes dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chu rdo rje dang / byang chub sems
164a4(rgyud 'bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rlung rdo rje dang / de lta bu rnams gtso bor gyur pa dam tshig chen po'i rigs dang 'brel pa byang chub sems
164a5(rgyud 'bum): dpa' stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis dang / gzhan yang rigs chen po dang 'brel ba'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
164a6(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po nam mkha' rnam par rgyas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i zla ba dang / byang chub sems
164a7(rgyud 'bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i gtsug tor dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshams rnams kyis nges par grol ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje
164b1(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
164b2(rgyud 'bum): lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje dam tshig dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
164b3(rgyud 'bum): po rdo rje chos dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje longs spyod dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyi bo dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
164b4(rgyud 'bum): rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam rtog med pa'i spyi gtsug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam rtog med pa'i sgra dang /
164b5(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam rtog med pa'i chos dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam rtog med pa'i dam tshig dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
164b6(rgyud 'bum): dga' ba'i rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sna tshogs dga' ba'i rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa'
164b7(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' chen po lhan cig skyes pa'i rdo rje dang / gzhan yang dpag tu med pa'i rdo rje'i theg pas lhag par grol ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so//
165a1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das de'ang chos kyi 'khor lo ni shin tu bskor/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa shin tu yongs su mthar phyin/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs ni shin tu
165a2(rgyud 'bum): yongs su rdzogs pa de 'khor la zhal rab tu 'dzum par bcas pas bzhugs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor rgya chen po rnams la
165a3(rgyud 'bum): gzigs nas/ de nas snod du rung bar bya ba'i phyir rdo rje 'phreng ba mngon par byang chub pa'i rdo rje theg pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las 'od zer
165a4(rgyud 'bum): gyi dra ba chen po bkye ste bzhugs so/ / 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po des kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams la rig par mchog tu dga' ba thob pa ni gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba
165a5(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po ji lta ba bzhin no/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag nyid dga' ba dang / bde ba dang / mchog tu mgu ba skyes nas
165a6(rgyud 'bum): brgyal bar gyur to/ / de nas yang de'i dus su bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spur 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po bsdus par gyur to// bsdus pa de yang rdo rje'i lam nas lcags kyu'i rnam pa can gyi 'od zer chen
165a7(rgyud 'bum): po nye bar phyung bar gyur pa des brgyal ba de dag la reg nas/ rdo rje 'phreng ba lta bu nyid rdo rje'i lam nas gtsug gtor gyi 'khor lo la zhugs nas gnas so// slar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
165b1(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po de dag bde ba chen po rjes su myong bar gyur to/ / rdo rje'i yi ge hUM brjod pa de nyid kyi bde ba chen po de nyid nyams su myong ba nyid kyi thugs ka'i lte ba'i rtsa sbubs nas 'od zer chen po phyung ste rang
165b2(rgyud 'bum): rang gi stan la 'khod par gyur to/ / de nas de rnams chu'i gting nas 'thon pa lta bur sems dga' ba skye ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ngo mtshar chen po'i cho 'phrul mthong nas shin tu mig gdangs te bcom
165b3(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das la dbyangs gcig gis yang dag par bstod do/ / bcom ldan ro gcig gyur pa yi// lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' bas rgyas// bcom ldan mchog tu ngal bso kye// ngag gyi lam gyi
165b4(rgyud 'bum): spyod yul 'das/ / bcom ldan nyid kyi dgyes nyams bltar// 'gro ba gsum po yang dag bde// e ma'o lhan cig skyes bdud rtsi// ro bsten thugs rje chen po ste// bcom ldan sems
165b5(rgyud 'bum): can thams cad kyi/ / sems can don kun gsal bar mdzad// de nyid gsum gyi ro gcig pa// phyag rgya chen po rab dbye ba/ bcom ldan rnal 'byor che la dgyes// 'ching ba thams rang
165b6(rgyud 'bum): gcod mdzad kyi/ / bcom ldan dgyes pa cher mdzad cing // 'gro ba skal bzang nges par mdzad// e ma'o rdo rje theg pa bde// rab tu dga' zhing mgu ba stsol// e ma'o sngags ni rab
165b7(rgyud 'bum): rgyas pa/ / rang byung go 'phang sgrub pa po// e ma'o shin tu zab mo'i chos// dmigs pa med par ston par mdzad// e ma'o rdo rje 'chang chen gtso// gsang ba'i dbang po shin tu gsang //
166a1(rgyud 'bum): e ma'o mchog tu byang chub pa// e ma'o spros pa rnam spangs shing // bden pa'i don ni gsal mdzad pa// theg pa'i sgron mas snang ba mdzad// mgon po bdag cag khyed
166a2(rgyud 'bum): drin gyis/ / rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang thob// mgon po bdag cag lam log zhugs// khyed kyi yang dag lam la bkod// mgon po bdag cag mun par 'thoms// ye shes snang bar thob par
166a3(rgyud 'bum): mdzad/ / dam tshig rdo rje nyi ma kye// phyag rgya chen po'i don ston mdzad// bcom ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// thugs rje'i phyag rgya che bdag nyid// phyag 'tshal gnyis med dga'
166a4(rgyud 'bum): ba'i mkha'/ / dga' ba'i zla ba khyed la 'dud// ces bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa mdzad nas slar yang 'dus par gyur te/ rdo rje'i 'phreng ba
166a5(rgyud 'bum): mngon par brjod pa zhes bya ba shin tu phra ba'i sa ji lta ba'i ngo bo 'dri bar 'dod nas yid la byed pa gcig pa dang / sems rtse gcig gis dga' bar byed pa'i gsung nyan par 'dod nas ba spu ldang ba
166a6(rgyud 'bum): dang / dbugs g.yo ba dang bcas pas yang dang yang du bcom ldan 'das la phyag byed cing rang gi stan la 'khod nas sems re dogs dang bcas pas gnas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de
166a7(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi de lta bu'i sems kyis rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ slar yang rdo rje 'phreng ba mngon par byang chub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ gsang ba'i rdo rje las rang gi
166b1(rgyud 'bum): rig ma phyung ste/ sgeg pa la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan pa bdag nyid kyis 'dod chags dang bral ba'i gzugs spangs nas/ sgeg pa la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan pa'i gzugs blangs nas rang
166b2(rgyud 'bum): rang gi rig ma la 'khyud de/ phyag rgya chen po'i rnal 'byor la rjes su zhugs nas slar yang de dag de lta bu'i gzugs nyid du mthong ste/ ngo mtshar skyes nas mig gdangs te ri mo'i bkod pa lta bur
166b3(rgyud 'bum): mthong ba nyid kyis ci'ang mi smra bar gyur pas/ de la 'khor rnams yang dag par 'khod par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rang gi rig ma yang dag par bskul te phyag rgya chen po'i rnal
166b4(rgyud 'bum): 'byor dor nas/ nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las btsun mo rdo rje rigs kyi snying po 'di gsungs so// oM AHhUM/ de nas de skad du gsungs ma thag bcom ldan 'das kyi ba spu'i bu ga las de bzhin
166b5(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad dang / rig ma dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / khro bo'i rgyal po rnams phyung bar gyur to// phyung nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su rang rang
166b6(rgyud 'bum): gi stan la gnas par gyur te/ kha cig ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi gzugs kyis so// kha cig ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gzugs kyis so// kha cig ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i gzugs kyis so//
166b7(rgyud 'bum): ji srid gnod mdzes rgyal po dang // gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba yi// rgyal po'i bar gyi gzugs kyis so// de nas bcom ldan 'das cung zad cig ci'ang mi gsung bar bzhugs so// gang gi byang
167a1(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyi dbyangs gcig gis ched du brjod nas spras pa ni/ e ma'o rdo rje rigs chen po// rdo rje 'phreng ba'i don ston mdzad// e ma'o rdo rje theg
167a2(rgyud 'bum): gsal ba/ / chos kyi dbyings kyi don ston mdzad// ces lan gsum brjod nas de dag gis rdo rje 'chang chen po la phyag 'tshal nas 'dug par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe skad cig thang cig yud tsam de
167a3(rgyud 'bum): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor rgya chen po 'dus pa de dag mthong nas/ phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan ye shes

167b1(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba yi// rgyud rnams kun gyi don bsdus pa// bla na med pa'i rim pa gnyis// rdo rje 'phreng ba mngon rtogs pa// cung zad 'dri bar 'tshal lags kyis// rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i

167b7(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin sna yi rtse mo gsus// lus kyi stong nyid ye shes dang // lha rnams kyang ni ji ltar gnas// de rnams kyi ni ming ni ci// 'char ba dang ni nub pa ci// mgon po dga' rnams ji ltar ni/
168a1(rgyud 'bum): yang dag skye ba gsal bar gsungs// sngar bshad rtsa rnams rtag tu ni// rdo rje'i lus la ji ltar rgyu// mtshams kyi rtsa gsum de dag ni// gtso bo ru ni ji ltar gsungs/
168a2(rgyud 'bum): rlung rnams ji ltar ldang ba dang // gtso bo de rnams ji ltar thim// de ni mkha' 'gro mar sdud pa// gtso bo ji ltar yang dag 'thob// rnam rtog rlung gi rab bcad nas// rnam rtog med par ji ltar
168a3(rgyud 'bum): 'char/ / rtsa rnams ji ltar nub pa dang // sbyor ba drug gis ji ltar rtsom// dus kyi mtshan nyid ji lta bu// gsang ba'i yang ni 'bras bu ci// chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje dang // rigs kyi dbye ba ji

169a1(rgyud 'bum): rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ gsol ba gdab pa dang / dri ba dang / slob ma'i las nyid la sogs pa rgyud kyi gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ba ste dang

172b4(rgyud 'bum): pa med/ / blo dman ngo tsha med dang mching // ngo tsha shes dang ngo tsha dang // mi ster ba dang mya ngan dang // yid gnyis dang ni rlom sems med// bsgrims dang the tsom ngal ba dang // dbang dang 'khrul
