172b6(rgyud 'bum): yid mi bde dang lhag par rtog/ skrag dang rmugs dang gnyid dang ni// brkam chags rol pa khrung khung dang // 'tshe ba le lo yon po nyid// bsam dang spyod dang zhum pa dang // kun rdzob de nyid don yod
172b7(rgyud 'bum): dang / / ster dang dga' ba'i 'dod pa dang // 'jigs dang 'dar dang pra bdag nyid// gsal dang rnam gsal ldad 'jug dang // 'brel dang rtag pa'i de nyid dang // rus sbal ngoms med gnod pa dang
173a1(rgyud 'bum): mi gsal ba dang yid du 'ong / / gnas med mang du smra ba dang // bdag nyid skyes bu nyid dang ni// ya mtshan dga' dang skye bo ngan// dman pa'i de nyid sdug bsngal gsum// 'khor
173a2(rgyud 'bum): ba la ni chags pa dang / / rtag tu brgya dang brgyad lhag pa// nyin dang mtshan mor rtag tu ni// rlung gi rang bzhin rgyu ba yin// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa
173a3(rgyud 'bum): las/ rdo rje 'phreng ba'i tshig gi dbye ba ste le'u gsum pa'o// / de nas rdo rje gsum nyi ma// gsang ba'i pad+ma kha 'byed pa// bde ba chen po'i go 'phang bzhugs// 'dus
173a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i mchog don rab gsungs pa/ / 'dus pa 'dres pa zhes ni bshad// 'dres pa nga yis khyod la bshad// 'khor lo bzhi dang tha mi dad// sngags kyi lhan cig cho ga bzhin// dpa' bo rnal 'byor
173a5(rgyud 'bum): ma sbyor ba/ / gang tshe gsang ba'i rtsa gnyis ni// yang dag sbyor ba reg gyur pa// de tshe nam mkha' rnam rgyas nyid// nam mkha' las ni skyes pa'i rlung // de yis ma ni rab tu 'bar// rtsa ni stong
173a6(rgyud 'bum): phrag bdun cu gnyis/ / rtsa rnams rab sad gzi brjid kyis// bde ba kun gyi go 'phang mchog/ bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor khyab// bde ba chen po'i byang chub sems// rnam par zhu nas rtsar gnas pa/
173a7(rgyud 'bum): rdor gsum rang bzhin gcig 'gyur phyir// khams rnams ro gcig gyur pa dang // phung po rnams ni yongs bzang dang // ngal bso ba la rlung rnams ni// dga' ba rnams ni yang dag skye// de nas
173b1(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems kyang ni/ / gnas kun nas ni zhu gyur nas// ngo bo gcig tu gyur pa dang // rtsa ni gcig gi 'bras bu ni// ro gcig tu ni gyur pa la// 'dres pa zhes ni de la gsungs//
173b2(rgyud 'bum): phung po khams dang dbang po dang // yul rnams su ni sbas pa rnams// rnam rtog kun nas zad pa las// bde ba chen po yang dag skye// ro gcig pa ni ngal bso ba// de ni 'dus pa 'dres pa ste//
173b3(rgyud 'bum): de kho na nyid mchog gsang ba// rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang gsungs// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'breng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ 'dus pa'i tshig lhag par bshad pa'i le'u
173b4(rgyud 'bum): ste bzhi pa'o/ / // de nas gzhan yang de nyid nyon// stong nyid don ni rab rgyas pa// stong pa nyid ni chos rnams kun// nang du khyad pa'ang chos nyid de// de ni yang dag shes
173b5(rgyud 'bum): pa ni/ / de bzhin nyid dang rnam mi rtog/ bdag dang gang zag chos rnams ni// bdag med rang bzhin gcig pa nyid// stong pa nyid dang rang rig dang // thams cad bdag nyid rtag bzhugs pa// rnal 'byor/
173b6(rgyud 'bum): gcig pus rtogs pa ste// rtog ge pa yi spyod yul min// chos rnams thams cad mdor bsdus pa// 'khor lo drug tu rnam par brjod// de nas nang du'ang khyab pa ni// rtsa yi 'khor lo legs
173b7(rgyud 'bum): rgyas pa/ / de ni nam mkha' khyab cing phra// khyab byed zhi ba'i mtshan nyid can// dmigs pa med cing rten pa med// gzugs med nyon mongs med pa dang // rnam par mi rtog mchog tu zhi//
174a1(rgyud 'bum): rang bzhin med cing dri ma med// gnyis su med cing bya ba med// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs// dus dang dpe las 'das pa ste// ngag gi lam gyi spyod yul bral//
174a2(rgyud 'bum): chos nyid chos ni thams cad kyis// ji lta ba bzhin mngon par brjod// dngos dang dngos med rnam par bral// dge dang mi dge'i srid las grol// de ni kun nas bsgribs pa med// nam mkha'
174a3(rgyud 'bum): lta bu'i mchog tu khyab/ / chos rnams ji lta ba bzhin skye// de ni de bzhin nyid ces brjod// gang nas kyang ni ma 'ongs shing // gang du yang ni 'gro ba med// rmongs dang 'khrul pa gcig pu las//
174a4(rgyud 'bum): de ni rab tu spro bar snang // bde ba dang ni sdug bsngal spangs// 'dod chags zhe sdang sogs mi gos// 'khrul dang rnam par 'khrul par 'brel// rtog pa dang bral dri ma med// bdag dang
174a5(rgyud 'bum): srog dang skye ba po/ / skyes bu de bzhin gang zag dang // shed las skyes dang shed bu dang // byed pa po dang tshor ba po// shes pa po dang mthong ba po// sgro 'dogs pa yi rnam par spangs//
174a6(rgyud 'bum): phung po skye mched khams la sogs// rnam shes dang ni gzungs pa yis// sgrib pa med cing mchog tu phra// nam mkha' mchog la yang dag gnas// de ltar ma lus stong nyid don// brjod dang brjod
174a7(rgyud 'bum): bya'i don dang bral/ / ming tsam gcig pu kho na yang // rang byung mchog tu rmad byung ba'o// brjod pa yi ni kun rdzob tu// de ni nga yis yang dag bshad// rang rig shin tu phra ba'i phyir// de kho na nyid mthong ba
174b1(rgyud 'bum): med/ / bdag nyid rang gi ngo bor rig/ pha rol gzhan gyi spyod yul min// de ni rang rig par bshad do// chos kun gnas ni zhi ba'o// rnam rtog gis 'khrul rtog ge gang // mi shes pa yi rmongs pa
174b2(rgyud 'bum): rnams/ / don dam par ni mi shes shing // kun rdzob dgra yi mdzod 'dzin pa// ye shes mchog ni mi shes shing // rtog ge stong nyid smra bar byed// rnal 'byor bsam gtan rnal 'byor pas// de ni mchog tu
174b3(rgyud 'bum): phra bar spyod/ / stong nyid yang dag nam mkha' che// shes dang shes bya rnam par spangs// rtog pa'i rnam pa rnams dang bral// stong pa nyid kyi 'khor lor brjod// phung po lnga yi bdag nyid lus//
174b4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo drug gi phug nang na// zla ba phyed pa'i cha lta bu// stong nyid rlung gi 'khor lor gnas// phyed min gang ba med pa dang // ji ltar bag chags chu zla bzhin// rlung gi 'khor lo srog tu bshad// mtshan
174b5(rgyud 'bum): byed skad cig ma la 'char/ / de ltar yang dag sgom pa ni// 'di ni stong nyid sgom byed pa'o// don dam gnyis med rnal 'byor gyis// yang na rgyu 'bras sbyor ba'i phyir// de ni rang bzhin 'grub par sgom//
174b6(rgyud 'bum): don dam rang gi ngo bor ni// kun rdzob kyang ni de bzhin du// bsgoms pas 'khor ba 'joms par 'gyur// ji ltar til la til mar ni// gnas pa nyid la mthong mi 'gyur// de bzhin lus la
174b7(rgyud 'bum): stong pa nyid/ / gnas kyang bsgribs pas mthong ba med// bla ma'i zhal las 'di shes par// yang dag rig pas kun rdzob spangs// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par
175a1(rgyud 'bum): rtogs pa las/ stong pa nyid kyi don bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// thig le'i dbye ba bla na med// 'jig
175a2(rgyud 'bum): rten thig le dbye bas dben/ / 'khor bar yang dang yang du 'khor// mdzod spu'i dbus na gnas pa ni// thig le rlung du yang dag bshad// sngags kyi de nyid kyis ni 'byed// rnal 'byor mdud pa
175a3(rgyud 'bum): bkrol nas ni/ / rlung gi de nyid rig pa de// mchog tu 'byed pa'i sbyor ba yis// sbyor ba de yang mi shes par// rlung dang sngags kyi rnal 'byor gyis// brjod dang brjod bya'i dpe las 'das// mi gsal
175a4(rgyud 'bum): log par mthong rnams kyis/ / bsam gtan bsgom bya dang bral ba'i// sangs rgyas rnams ni thob pa dka'// rnal 'byor ma yi drin gyis ni// zhal nas zhal du brgyud nas gnas// bcom ldan
175a5(rgyud 'bum): bde ba chen po la/ / rdo rje sems dpas slar zhus pa// 'gro ba'i mgon gyis bstan du gsol// thig le'i dbye ba rig bcas pa// rnal 'byor mchog ni gang gis shes// sbyor bas mdud pa
175a6(rgyud 'bum): 'byed par byed/ / khams gsum pa yi 'gro ba 'di// myur du dngos grub mchog tu 'gro// de skad zhus nas rdo rje can// rdo rje dbang phyug la gsungs pa// mchog tu gsal ba 'di nyid ni//
175a7(rgyud 'bum): gang du'ang gsal bar ma gsungs pa// thig le'i dbye ba de yang ni// nga yis bshad kyis de nyid nyon// snying gi pad sbubs nam mkha' la// ye shes rdo rje rtag tu bzhugs// steng dang
175b1(rgyud 'bum): 'og la brten nas ni/ / srog dang thur sel rlung chen gnas// de la'ang dbye bar dka' ba yi// dbus su mdud pa gsum gyis dkri// de yis mchog dang bcom byas pas// steng du
175b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ba thob mi byed/ / des bcom slar yang rnam lnga rgyu// srog dang thur sel gyen rgyu dang // khyab byed dang ni mnyam gnas nyid// rtse mo lnga las rgyun du ni// rtsa lnga la ni yang dag brten//
175b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyags dang rnam par rgyas pa dang // myos dang btung dang mdza' bo ste// de dag rtsar ni lngar shes bya// rdo rje'i 'og tu gsal bar khyab// steng gi srog gi dbus na yang // rdo rje'i lte ba'i mkha'
175b4(rgyud 'bum): dbyings 'gro/ / srog ces bya ba'i rlung chen po// lta ba mdud pa dang phrad pas// bcom nas kyang ni rnam lngar rgyu// rtse mo rnams la rtsa lngar ni// zla ba'i cha dang sna dang ni// bsnyen bkur lkog shal
175b5(rgyud 'bum): mchin pa ste/ / rtsa ni lnga yi ming yin no// rtsa ni lnga las rgyu ba'i rlung // klu dang rus sbal rtsangs pa dang // lha sbyin dang ni gzhu las rgyal// de ltar rtsa de dang bcas pa// lus kyi thur du 'gro bas
175b6(rgyud 'bum): nas sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i rtsa rnams ni/ / yang dang yang du bskul bas kyang ni rgyas pa na// gti mug chen pos dbang du byed// de steng chos kyi 'khor lo na// gnas pa'i rtsa ni bskul byas na//
175b7(rgyud 'bum): de rnams lhan cig rtsa de dag/ zhe sdang gis ni dbang du byed// yang dag bskul byas nas bskul nas de steng gi/ longs spyod mchog tu ngo mtshar skye// rtsa de rnams dang lhan cig tu// chags pa chen pos
176a1(rgyud 'bum): dbang byas nas/ / bskul ba dang ni de steng gi/ spyi bo'i 'khor lo'i bde chen du// rtsa de rnams dang lhan cig tu/ byang chub sems kyis gang bar byed// rnam rtog rnam par
176a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyu byed cing / / sna tshogs dbye ba thams cad las// steng ma rnams kyang thur du 'gro// srog gi rab tu bcom nas ni// de dag thams cad rdo rje'i phyir// zhugs nas thur du kha bltas pa'o// de lang
176a3(rgyud 'bum): thur du mi 'gro ste/ / ma rig mdud pa'i 'khor lo ni// rnam par shes pa'i shing rta'i rlung // de ni bag chags dang 'dres pas// mig dang rna ba de bzhin sna// lce ste rnam par shes pa bzhi//
176a4(rgyud 'bum): rtse mo bzhi nas phyung nas ni// bag chags rnam shes dang 'dres nas// rnam shes dbang po lhan cig tu// don ni rab tu rgyas par byed// slar yang lam de nyid nas ni// ji lta ba yi rim pas 'jug/
176a5(rgyud 'bum): de yi dngos nyid de sbyor bas// rnam shes bsten pa'i skad cig la// de yi chags bcas kyis slar 'phel// 'khrul byas 'khor ba'i 'khor lo las// de ltar bag chags kyis bslad pa'i// rnam
176a6(rgyud 'bum): shes las kyi ngo bor 'gro/ / de nyid kyang ni srog sbyor bas// khams gsum par ni 'khrul pa'o// byed po las kyi 'bras bur myong // gzhan nyid du ni 'khor ba med// de phyir 'khor ba gzhom don du//
176a7(rgyud 'bum): thig le go 'phang gsal bar dbye// sgom pa la ni 'bad par bya// ma rig gzhan ni mi shes pa// dbus kyi mdud pa de yang ni// de phyed na ni dngos grub 'gyur// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor grub pa ste//
176b1(rgyud 'bum): ye shes lnga ni thob nas ni// mngon shes lnga ni thob pa dang // mchog tu gsal ba thob nas ni// blo bzang ji lta ba bzhin gnas// 'phreng ba mi dgos sgom mi dgos// bya ba mi dgos dgag mi dgos//
176b2(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyi de nyid gcig pu yis// yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob// las chos dam tshig phyag rgya ni// dbye ba 'di ni ma gsungs so// 'khor lo'i dbye bas ma yin zhing // de bzhin dga'
176b3(rgyud 'bum): pa sogs kyis min/ / phyag rgya chen po'i go 'phang gsal// sngags kyi de nyid kyis ni thob// stong nyid ye shes rdo rje dang // gnyis med bde ba de nyid dang // gsang ba'i thig le'i dbye ba dang //
176b4(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor grub pa'i bde chen po// ma rig sgo nga'i sbubs byed cing // 'jig tshogs lta ba'i ri bo 'joms// phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub dang // rab tu byed pa mchog tu bshad// sngags kyi
176b5(rgyud 'bum): de nyid nges sbyor bas/ / rigs shing yan lag gsal ba gang // rnal 'byor ma yi bka' drin dang // bla ma'i zhal las nges rtogs 'gyur// man ngag med pa'i bzlas pa ni// sngags kyi
176b6(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po zo rmongs byed/ / de yi dka' ba gcig pa dang // chu bsrubs mar ni mi 'gyur ltar// de bzhin man ngag dang bral sngags// skyes bus ji srid 'tsho yi bar// bzlas kyang de yi 'bras
176b7(rgyud 'bum): bu yi/ / cha tsam thob par mi 'gyur ro// mi shes pa yi mi 'ga' zhig/ rgya mtsho'i gzhi yi pha mtha' yi// sa la shin tu 'gro 'dod pa// las ni gang yin mi 'dri gang // de ltar bdag nyid
177a1(rgyud 'bum): 'gro bar byed/ / de bzhin dga' ba cher byed pa'i// man ngag dang bral sgrub pa po// 'bras bu med cing mkhas pa yang // sgrub pa po ni khong khro skye// khong khro skyes pa'i skad
177a2(rgyud 'bum): cig la/ / 'bras bu med cing ngu 'bod 'gro// de phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyis// dad pas bla ma brgyud pa las// man ngag dag ni bslab par bya// gang phyir brgyud pa'i lung gis khyab/
177a3(rgyud 'bum): brgyud pa'i rim pas gnas par byed// de ni rnal 'byor ma zhal dang // bla ma'i zhal las 'bad pa yis// de nyid mchog ni bslab par bya// sngags kyi man ngag brgyud pa'i lung // de thos
177a4(rgyud 'bum): lag na rdo rjes kyang / / rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che// the tshom thams cad gcod pa la// phyag byas nas ni zhus pa ni// khyed kyis bstan pa de nyid mchog/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po ni//
177a5(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyi dngos grub bla na med// gang bslabs skad cig dngos grub 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// sngags kyi de nyid rab gsal ba// de nyid mchog tu gsang ba ni// gang
177a6(rgyud 'bum): du'ang nga yis ma bshad pa/ / skal pa med pa bsam pa'i rgyus// rgyud rnams kun tu sbas byas la// de ni nga yis bshad kyis nyon// sngags kyi rgyal po bla na med// sngags kyi spyad pa spyod pa
177a7(rgyud 'bum): yis/ / gang gi myur du dngos grub 'gyur// thog mar uSh+ma'i tha ma bri// dbyangs yig drug pas rnam par brgyan// sde tshan tha ma'i mtha' dang ldan// dbyangs med pa yi cha dang bcas// uSh+ma'i
177b1(rgyud 'bum): mtha' la dbyangs yig 'di/ / dgu pa dang ni yang dag ldan// mthar ni tsheg drag mchog gi sgra// sngags kyi gtso bo btu bar bya// de ltar yi ge gnyis kyi ming // sngags kyi brda ni rmad byung
177b2(rgyud 'bum): ba'adzin pa thams cad spangs pa'i phyir/ / sgra dang thig le'i ming du byas// rlung gnyis kyis ni phyi nas ni// ma rig mdud pa 'byed par byed// phyag rgya chen po mchog gi rgyu// mchog tu
177b3(rgyud 'bum): zhi ba'i yi ge gnyis/ / man ngag thob pa'i 'dod pa'i don// gang gis zla ba drug bzlas na// thig le'i sgra yi go 'phang gsal// 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub par byed// skye bos dben pa lha
177b4(rgyud 'bum): yi gnas/ / sgra yi tsher ma rnams dang bral// bgegs med skal bzang nyams dga' ba// skyed mos tshal zhi bde ba che// 'dod pa lnga la yongs spyod pas// sngags kyi gtso bo 'grub par
177b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / 'di ni gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// khyim du bde ba'i phyag rgyas gnas// gang gis dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur// sgrub po bde ba'i stan 'dug nas// mig gnyis sna rtser
177b6(rgyud 'bum): gtang byas nas/ / sna ni lte ba'i tshad du gzhag/ phrag gong bsnyams la lce rkan sbyar// so dang mchu ni bde bar gzhag/ dbugs kyi 'byung rngub glong nas ni// cung zad cung zad rtsol bral nas//
177b7(rgyud 'bum): ji lta ba bzhin 'byung rngub ni// rdo rje skyil krung legs gnas pa// de ltar phyag rgya dang ldan pas// yi ge gnyis ni rtag tu 'azlas// thig le'i dbyems pade ba che// tha ba drug gis rnal 'byor
178a1(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ thob 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// rtsa ba'i rgyud ni dang po 'di// a ba d+hU tI dri med gnas// rlung gi de nyid ye shes che// rdo rje sems dpa' yi ni rgyu// ri lu ral gri
178a2(rgyud 'bum): ro langs dang / / rgyal po mig sman bcud kyis len// dmag dpung rengs dang rtsig pa 'bigs// rig 'dzin gyi ni go 'phang mchog/ mi snang ba dang gter mthong ba// 'dod dgur bsgyur dang gzugs
178a3(rgyud 'bum): mthong dang / / gser 'gyur dang ni dug las rgyal// me yi nang du 'jug pa dang // mngon shes lnga yi go 'phang dang // ye shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur// de ltar skad cig gcig la ni/ byang
178a4(rgyud 'bum): chub mtshan nyid go 'phang ngo / / dka' ba spyod pa spangs nas ni// shes rab snying rje yang dag ldan// bshad pa'i bde ba chen po ster// sdom pa mi dgos sbyin sreg min// 'phreng ba mi dgos
178a5(rgyud 'bum): bgrang mi dgos/ / 'di ni bskyed rim dbye mi dgos// gsungs pa'i dka' thub sogs mi dgos// sngags kyi rnal 'byor gcig pu yis// bla ma'i zhal las brgyud pa dang // zla ba drug
178a6(rgyud 'bum): gi mngon sbyor bas/ / go 'phang mchog ni thob par 'gyur// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ thig le'i dbye ba dang rnal 'byor mchog thob par byed pa'i
178a7(rgyud 'bum): le'u ste drug pa'o/ / // de nas gzhan yang de nyid nyon// bla na med pa nA da'i don// gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni// tshe 'di nyid la dngos grub 'gyur// sgra yang mi
178b1(rgyud 'bum): shigs par ni bshad/ / rang bzhin 'od gsal dri ma med// rnam par kun las rnam par grol// lte ba sprul pa yang dag gnas// sbrul gyi lce ltar phra ba ni// gnyis med ye
178b2(rgyud 'bum): shes rmad byung ba/ / tshangs pa khyab 'jug drag po dang // dbang phyug dang ni rtag zhi ba// de dag de ltar rin po che// skyed pa po yi pha dang mas// yi ge med cing gong bu med// 'byung
178b3(rgyud 'bum): pa chen po rnam par spangs/ / dus dang rtog pa rnams las grol// skye med zad med rmad du byung // 'dzin pa kun la zhen la sogs// spangs shing lhag ma med pa dang // mchog gi
178b4(rgyud 'bum): mchog ste zhi ba med/ / dngos po kun gyi dbus na gnas// rnam rtog med cing rten pa med// kun gzhi rnam shes zhes gsungs pa// nyon mongs can gyi yid kyis ni// bems po rnams
178b5(rgyud 'bum): kyi sad par byed/ / mchog tu gnyis med rnal 'byor gyis// thob pa'i go 'phang bla na med// gnyis med mchog tu gsal ba dang // rlung gi de nyid yang dag rten// yi ge hoHyis
178b6(rgyud 'bum): bskul nas ni/ / me yi 'khor lo sad par byed// de lta'i nA da'i go 'phang don// bla ma'i zhal la yang dag gnas// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las
178b7(rgyud 'bum): nA da'i tshig rnam par bshad pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o/ / // de nas gzhan yang gsang ba'i don// bla na med pa bshad kyis nyon// gsang ba b+ha ga zhes su gsungs//
179a1(rgyud 'bum): b+ha ga de bzhin chos 'byung ba// bde ba chen po'i go 'phang ste// dga' ba skyed par byed pa'i rgyu// rdo rje sems dpa' yi ni gnas// ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid gsal/
179a2(rgyud 'bum): ye shes chen po spros pa med// rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs// bral dga'i mtha' ste mchog tu phra// lhan cig skyes dga' kun bdag gnas// dga' bral la sogs skad cig gnas//
179a3(rgyud 'bum): phra ba yang dag byang chub sems// srog la phan par 'tsho ba ste// srang mda'i 'khrul 'khor lta bur gnas// dus bral rnam rtog med pa ste// stong nyid skye med 'chi ba med// sprul pa'i 'khor
179a4(rgyud 'bum): lor thim pa dang / / bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo skye// bsam gyis mi khyab zhi pa ste// chags bral 'gro kun skye ba med// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor bas// bde ba thams cad ster bar byed//
179a5(rgyud 'bum): rlung gi de nyid rig pa yis// rtsa yi dbus su 'dzin par byed// gang de skye ba nyams myong bar// gsang ba zhes ni bya bar grags// de nyid gsang ba yi ni mchog/ bla ma'i zhal la lhag par gnas//
179a6(rgyud 'bum): phan tshun brgyud pa'i rim pa yis// bla ma bzang po'i zhal las shes// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ gsang ba chen po'i tshogs ma lus par bstan
179a7(rgyud 'bum): pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o/ / // de nas gzhan yang sdom pa'i don// de kho na nyid bshad kyis nyon// sdom pa srung bar byed pa gang // de ni byang chub sems
179b1(rgyud 'bum): zhes brjod/ / rdo rje'i rtse mor sems 'dzin pa// de ni srung ba zhes ni grags// dbang po rnams ni yul rnams la// 'jug cing rtag tu gang gnas pa// de ni sdom pa srung ba dang // dam tshig
179b2(rgyud 'bum): srung bar bshad pa yin/ / gdul dka' tshul 'chos g.yo sgyu can// rmongs dang sems khros g.yo can dang // dad med rtog ge ba lhan cig/ rtags kyi nye bar 'tsho ba dang // nyan thos nor la brkam
179b3(rgyud 'bum): chags can/ / de kho na nyid sun 'byin cing / don dam pa ni mi shes pa// med par lta dang tshul khrims 'tshal// gtam dang tshig ni bkyal pa dang // 'dri ba la sogs mi bya zhing // se gol
179b4(rgyud 'bum): gtogs pa tsam du yang / / de dang lhan cig gnas mi bya// las kyi phyag rgya nyams dga' ba// gal te byas pa'i skye bo dang // de dang lhan cig dam tshig ni// mi bya rnal 'byor nyams
179b5(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / skyed na dam tshig dbus zhugs dang // pad snod phyag rgya sogs brtan dang // brkam dang 'brel pas 'jug pa dang // dam tshig la ni 'jug mi bya// snod dang cang te'u gri gug
179b6(rgyud 'bum): dang / / glegs bam dang ni bgrang 'phreng dang // dam tshig med pa gzhan dag la// gang du'ang bstan par mi bya'o// dge slong sdom la gnas pa la// rnal 'byor spyod sogs bya ba dang // man ngag
179b7(rgyud 'bum): rnams ni bstan mi bya/ / ras ris la sogs mi bstan cing // gang gis dam tshig lhan cig tu// ji ltar spyod pa yang dag spyod// bla ma la yang spra min na// gzhan rnams la ni smos ci dgos//
180a1(rgyud 'bum): dbang po yul la spyod pa ni// gang nas de ni bsdams nas ni// stong nyid gnyis med sgyu ma las// sogs pas kun rdzob lhag spyad na// shes rab ye shes dbang bskur
180a2(rgyud 'bum): sogs/ / nyams su myong ba'i bde ba yis// bde ba chen po'i dran pa yis// dbang po rnams ni yul las ldog/ bdag bstod gzhan la smod pa dang // ye shes snyems sogs nges spangs pa//
180a3(rgyud 'bum): blobro ldan rdo rje dbang phyug gi/ yang dag sdom pa bshad pa yin// de lta bu sogs dam tshig ni// rnal 'byor pa yis rtag bsrung bya// gzhan du rnal 'byor nyams par 'gyur// rnal 'byor ldan pa rdo rje can//
180a4(rgyud 'bum): bgrang 'phreng dang ni dbu rgyan dang // rus pa'i rang bzhin phyag rgya dang // glegs bam bsam gtan ras ris dang // thod pa la sogs rnal 'byor ma// thams cad du ni dngos grub phyir// bla ma la yang sba bar
180a5(rgyud 'bum): bya/ sngags ni tshig tu brjod mi bya// mchu 'gul bar yang mi mngon zhing // cung zad mgrin par brjod bya yis// sngags kyi rgyal po de ltar bzlas// gsang las dngos grub mtshungs pa med// gang phyir
180a6(rgyud 'bum): de ni sdom par bshad/ / snod min nor ni chen po dang // ldan yang rgyud las skyon du gsungs// bla mas bla med dngos grub phyir// 'bad pa yis ni spang bar bya// bza' btung gos la sogs pa dang //
180a7(rgyud 'bum): / nor ni chen po la chags shing // snod min slob ma man ngag mchog/ rmad du byung ba smra ba gang // rnal 'byor shes pa tshe 'di la// de ni dmyal ba ngu 'bod 'gro// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng
180b1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ / sdom pa'i tshig gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang de nyid nyon// dam tshig don ni bla na med// bza' ba yi ni dam
180b2(rgyud 'bum): tshig gang / / de ni de yi don bshad bya// bza' ba ru ni bshad pa gang // de ni bdud rtsi lnga ru brjod// rlung gi de nyid sbyor ba yis// zhu nas ro gcig slar yang ni// rdo rje lam nas steng song ste// gcig tu
180b3(rgyud 'bum): gyur pa bza' ba'o/ / dam tshig lus dang ngag yid kyis// de nyid gsum dang gang shar dang // 'khor lo bzhi po rnams la yang // bde ba nyams su myong ba gang // de dang ro gcig rnal 'byor pa// rtag tu
180b4(rgyud 'bum): spyod pa bza' ba'o/ / byang chub sems kyi de nyid mchog/ bde ba chen po'i go 'phang this// zhu ba rlung gi de nyid kyis// bza' ba bsam gtan bzang po'o// spyi bo thod pa'i slad nas ni// de tsam rnal 'byor
180b5(rgyud 'bum): pas rtag tu/ / de la snying rje btung ba ni// byang chub sems dpa' bde ba che// snod mchog gsang ba'i pad+ma phrugs// rten ni bza' ba rab rtogs byed// sems kyis bdud rtsi 'thung byed na// bdud rtsi lnga yi
180b6(rgyud 'bum): rdzas 'thung / / de za ba ni rdo rje 'chang // glang po rta khyi ba glang si// byang chub sems dang bcas pa'i khrag/ bsres nas skad cig de la bza'// de ni bdud rtsi lnga zhes brjod// rnam rtog dang ni kun rtog gis
180b7(rgyud 'bum): stong pa nyid du gsal ba'i snod/ / rdo rje can gyis rtag tu bza'// stong nyid ye shes pha rol 'gro// dga' ba gsum pa'i bde ba ni// lhan skyes lhan cig snod du ni// rdo rje can gyis rtag tu bza'// bde ba
181a1(rgyud 'bum): chen po'i go 'phang gnas/ / rnam rtog rlung rnams thams cad ni// zhi ba'i de nyid snod bzang por// rlung gi de nyid shes pas bza'// rnam rtog med pa'i go 'phang gnas// phyag rgya
181a2(rgyud 'bum): gsum dang yang dag sbyor/ / phyag rgya chen por bshad snod du// rnal 'byor de nyid shes pas bza'// srog dang rtsol ba'i go 'phang gnas// rnam rtog dang ni kun rtog gis// sgom dang sgom min sogs
181a3(rgyud 'bum): 'khrul pa/ / srog chen po yi snod du ni// rnam rtog dra ba'i sa bon tshogs// phung po'i bud shing snod bzang por// ye shes chen po'i me yis min// sngags kyi de nyid rtogs pas bza'// bdud bzhi
181a4(rgyud 'bum): khro bo chen po yi/ / stobs kyi rig pas sgrub pa po// sgrub pos legs par mnyam gzhag nas// rtag tu rnal 'byor snod du bza'// rlung dang sngags dang rdzas rnams kyi// thig le gsum ste bla na med//
181a5(rgyud 'bum): mi shigs go 'phang snod du ni// zos na rnal 'byor pha rol 'gro// stong nyid ye shes mtshung med pa// snying rje'i snod kyis mchog tu ni// ye shes chen po mnyam bzhag nas// btung zhing rtag tu btung ba'o//
181a6(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya'i dam tshig ces su bshad// rdo rje pad+ma yang dag sbyor// de kho na nyid mchog skyes gang // de ni skal ldan snod la ni// rnal 'byor pas 'thungs nyams dga' ba// bsgrub par bya ba'i de nyid
181a7(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ nyon mongs dang bral lhan cig skyes// phyag rgya chen po'i don bsgrub bya// de lta bu sogs dam tshig sogs// gzhan ni gang du ngas ma bshad// rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang mchog/ bla ma'i
181b1(rgyud 'bum): zhal las gsal bar rtogs/ / rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ dam tshig gi don gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas
181b2(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon/ / sgra tsam don ni bshad par bya// gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni// 'pho ba med pa'i go 'phang 'thob// chos kyi 'khor lo'i pad sbubs su// sgra tsam yang dag gnas pa ni//
181b3(rgyud 'bum): chags med snang ba med pa dang // gnyis su med cing dri ma med// dpe bral g.yo ba med pa dang // gzhi med bla gab med pa dang // lha yi dbang phyug ye shes mchog/ 'byung dang rngub par rnam par spangs//
181b4(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor rnams kyi lha dbang phyug/ de lta bu ni rnyed par dka'// mchog tu zhi ba bde ba che// gzugs mchog 'chi ba med pa'i mchog/ rten cing 'brel 'byung rang bzhin gyis// rgun chang ro yis myos pa
181b5(rgyud 'bum): ltar/ / mchog tu nang du song gyur nas// de bzhin rnam pa kun gyis gnas// sngags kyi de nyid rig pa'i rten// rang gi nyams myong rtog pa'i gnas// de nas ston pa bla med pa// rdo rje sems dpas
181b6(rgyud 'bum): zhus pa ni/ / bcom ldan de nyid zhi ba mkhyen// sngags kyi de nyid rab dbye ba// gang gis rnam par shes tsam gyis// de kho na nyid 'grub par 'gyur// de nas rdo rje can gyis gsungs// sngags kyi de
181b7(rgyud 'bum): nyid bla na med/ / mchog dang rab mchog phra ba dang // ye shes chen po mchog chen po// snying po yi yang snying po mchog/ yang dag pa shad kyis mnyan par gyis// rgyud nas kun tu sbas pa rnams// gsang ba'i go 'phang 'pho ba med/
182a1(rgyud 'bum): lte ba'i 'khor lo de nyid mchog/ sgra tsam du ni yang dag gnas// stong nyid chen po'i dbus su thim// bde ba chen po'i go 'phang gsal// gnyis med 'jigs bral zhi ba dang /
182a2(rgyud 'bum): snang ba med cing kun rdzob med// gnyis med ting 'dzin sbyor ba yis// sngags kyi de nyid rab gsal ba// thog ma med cing zhi ba dang // dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid gtso// stong nyid snying rje dbyer med
182a3(rgyud 'bum): pa byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin ni/ / de tshe thog mar stong nyid sgom// snang ba med pa'i go 'phang ni// rang bzhin med gnas nyams dga' ba// rnam rtog med la mchog tu chen// stong cid ma
182a4(rgyud 'bum): mtshungs pa med/ / byang chub sems kyi rgyud dang ni// yi ge hUM las yang dag byung // rnal 'byor shes pa rmad byung che// de nyid gsum ni ro gcig don// a bad+hU tI'i go 'phang gnas// slar yang dga'
182a5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i sbyor ba yis/ / 'jug pa la sogs rnam par spangs// bde ba chen po'i go 'phang ni// byang chub sems ni dri ba med// sna tshogs skad cig dbyer med pa// brjod pa'i bdag nyid dbyangs
182a6(rgyud 'bum): thul ba/ / rtag tu gnas pa'i rgyun gyis kyang // byang chub sems ni 'bab pa ni// sngags kyi rnal 'byor gyis ni thob// skye meng zhi ba'i thig le tsas// sngags kyi spyod ngas srung bas na/
182a7(rgyud 'bum): ye shes mchog ni rang rig pa'o// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ sgra tsam gyi don gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//
182b1(rgyud 'bum): de nas rlung gi de nyid mchog/ don dam pa ni bshad kyis nyon// rnal 'byor pa yis rlung bsgoms na// myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur// rlung gi thig le ye shes che// phra zhing de gnyis go
182b2(rgyud 'bum): 'phang gsal/ / dngos grub kun byed nyams dga' ba// gnyis med rnal 'byor mi zad pa// skye med kun 'gro zhi ba dang // lus rnams kun la khyab pa dang // ma pham stong pa bsam mi khyab//
182b3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// sgoms dang bsam gtan rnal 'byor gyis// thig le rang gi ngo bo shes// chos rnams gcig tu gyur pa'i gnas// sngags kyi de nyid kyi ni rgyu// bag
182b4(rgyud 'bum): chags kun las rnam par grol/ / kun mkhyen bde ba kun gsol ba// sna yi rtse mor de nyid mchog/ 'od zer thig le bsam par bya// srog dang rtsol ba yang dag sbyor// rtog pa rnams kyi
182b5(rgyud 'bum): grangs ster ba/ / skal bzang ye shes lnga yi bdag/ sangs rgyas lnga yi cho ga ni// rin chen lnga yi sbyor ba'i gzugs// 'byung ba lnga yi bdag nyid tsam// thog ma lus kyi phyag rgya'i dngos//
182b6(rgyud 'bum): ngag gi grangs kyi zlos mtshan nyid// yid kyi rnal 'byor che la zhen// rlom pa'i go 'phang mi bzang po// dbugs kyi tshogs ni bgrang ba dang // rlung gi rnam par dpyad pa dang // gnas kyi dbye ba
182b7(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi/ / dus kyi dbye ba rtogs pa dang // rlung rnams kyi ni bzlog pa dang // rtog pa dang bcas spangs pa ste// de ltar mdor bsdus rnam drug gis// 'byung dang rngub pa zhes su brjod// thog
183a1(rgyud 'bum): mar 'byung dang rngub pa rnams/ / nyi khri dang ni tshig stong dang // de bzhin grangs ni brgya phrag drug/ nyin dang mtshan mo nges pa ni// ji srid grangs ni thob pa'i gnas/
183a2(rgyud 'bum): nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bdun du// grangs kyi rjes su sbyor ba yis// grangs ni yang dang yang du brtag/ dus mtshams kyi ni rab dbye bas// de nas rjes su zlos par 'gyur// thun tshod so sor srog
183a3(rgyud 'bum): rnams dang / / rtsol ba ru ni brtag pa ste// nyis stong bdun brgya'i grangs kyis ni// yang dag par ni nges bzung med// yongs su gsal bar bcad nas ni// nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bdun la//
183a4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo bzhi yi dbye ba yis// nyin dang mtshan du nges par ni// de rjes gnas ni rtsol ba yis// tha dad du ni rab tu brtag/ rtsa yi 'khor lo rgyu ba yis// 'byung dang rngub pa nges par ni// nges par
183a5(rgyud 'bum): gzung ba'i sbyor ba las/ / rtsa yi 'khor lo spyad par bya// de yi 'khor lo'i rtsa dbye bas// nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bdun las// de rjes gnas kyi sgrol ba'i sa// gnas kyi dbye bas brtag par bya//
183a6(rgyud 'bum): gnas ni so sor brtags pa yis// brgya dang brgyad ni lhag par rgyu// rnam rtog med pa'i sbyor ba mchog/ rtog pa spangs pa'i mtshan nyid can// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin bdag/ brgya dang brgyad
183a7(rgyud 'bum): ni lhag par rgyu/ / 'di ni yang dag rnal 'byor mchog/ nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bdun gyis// mtshan nyid sgom pa'i rnal 'byor pa// ji ltar gnas par rang ngo bo// rtag dang bcas pa'i rnal 'byor pa//
183b1(rgyud 'bum): de nas rnal 'byor log nas ni// rtog pa dang bral rlung chen po// rtsa yi 'khor lo rnam par rgyu// de thob nas ni log pa dang // kun nas nyon mongs rnal 'byor pas// nges pa la ni don dam pa/
183b2(rgyud 'bum): nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bdun las// las dang po pa'i sbyor ba yis// blo dang ldan pa log pa las// de nas dgag pa de dag kyang // yang dag rnal 'byor stobs kyis ni// srog dang rtsol ba'i rnam
183b3(rgyud 'bum): rtog rnams/ / kun nas rab tu spangs nas ni// rlung gi de kho na nyid rgyu// rnal 'byor mchog ni bsgom par bya// gnyis med mchog gi rnal 'byor gyis// nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bdun la// rlung gi
183b4(rgyud 'bum): de kho na nyid rten/ / 'khrul pa'i rnal 'byor dag pa ni// de la rtse gcig sems kyi ni// rtog med de kho na nyid kyis// rlung gi de nyid rnal 'byor mchog/ yang dag rtsol la byas pa gsal//
183b5(rgyud 'bum): khang bzang byed pa bzhin du ni// thog mar sa ni yongs su sbyang // de stengs bgegs dang bral byas la// gnas ni legs par dag par bya// khang bzang bskal pa nyams dga' ba// blo ldan
183b6(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar 'dod par bya/ / de bzhin rnal 'byor spyod pas mchog/ rlung gi de nyid rnam par sgom// snga ma bzhin du mnyam bzhag nas// srog dang rtsol ba'i sbyor ba dang // rnal 'byor mchog gi ye
183b7(rgyud 'bum): shes che/ / rnal 'byor rig pa bsgom par bya// thog mar rlung gi de nyid dang // de nas sngags kyi de nyid gsal// de la rlung gi 'od zer mchog/ gsal ba chen po'i kha dog lnga// de bzhin
184a1(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa lnga rang bzhin/ / phung po lnga yi rang ngo bo// de ni ye shes lnga dag pa// rlung lnga ru ni rgyu ba byed// mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga'i// de nyid mtshan nyid go/
184a2(rgyud 'bum): 'phang mchog/ sna yi rtse mo de nyid mchog/ rlung lnga dang ni rang ngo bo// rlung gi thig le zhes ni bshad// yang dag de nyid gsal ba yang // sna rtse yungs kar de yang ni// rgyud gzhan rnams
184a3(rgyud 'bum): su gsungs pa ni/ / sna rtser yungs kar de yang ni// srog dang rtsol ba'i brtag pa ste// srog dang rtsol ba la gnas pa// 'od lnga sangs rgyas rnams su sgom// steng gi sna las nges 'byung ba//
184a4(rgyud 'bum): g.yas dang g.yon dang gnyis ka yang // dal bar rgyu dang rnam bzhir 'gyur// nang gi dus ni yin par bshad// lkog ma snying kha lte ba dang // gsang ba'i pad+mar 'gro 'ong ston// thun pad kyi ni
184a5(rgyud 'bum): dus dag tu/ / go rims ji bzhin gnas pas brtan// g.yas pa nas ni 'byung ba'i khams// me yi dkyil 'khor nyid yin te// kha dog dmar zhing gsal ba nyid// pad+ma'i mgon po rgyu ba'o// /
184a6(rgyud 'bum): g.yon pa nas ni 'byung ba'i khams// rlung gi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba// ljang ser dag tu snang ba ste// las kyi mgon po rgyu ba'o// gnyis ka las ni 'byung ba'i khams// gser gyi mdog tu
184a7(rgyud 'bum): snang ba ste/ / dbang chen gyi ni dkyil 'khor nyid// rin chen mgon po rgyu ba'o// dal zhing rgyu ba med pa'i khams// dag pa'i shel ltar snang ba ni// chu yi dkyil 'khor nyid yin te/
184b1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje mgon po rgyu ba'o// lus kun la ni gnas pa'i rlung // bya ba kun la 'jug pa'o// 'di ni rnam snang ngo bo ste// 'chi ba'i lus la 'byung bar 'gyur// rlung gi de nyid gsal ba 'di// ye shes
184b2(rgyud 'bum): lnga yi rang bzhin can/ / rnal 'byor byis pa'i yul min zhing // rtog ge pa yis mi shes so// dngos grub thams cad gsal byed pa// rnal 'byor kun gyi dngos grub pa// de nyid kun gyi go/
184b3(rgyud 'bum): 'phang gsal// rnal 'byor kun gyi don bsdus pa// rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang gsal// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// de nyid mchog ni shin tu phra// tha ma'i zhal las rtog
184b4(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ rlung gi de kho na nyid bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas
184b5(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon/ / bde ba chen po'i gsal ba'i tshig/ rdor sems go 'phang mi byed pa// rang rigs pas ni mchog gi mchog/ kun rtog gis brtags kyis stong pa// bde ba
184b6(rgyud 'bum): chen po zhes 'di brjod/ / lhan cig skyes pa'i dus su ni// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs// bde dang sdug bsngal rnam par spangs// zhi ba gnyis meng rnam par bral// dngos po kun gyis rang
184b7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin bdag/ bde chen zhes ni 'di la brjod// rdo rje ye shes lnga yi dngos// sangs rgyas lnga yi rang bzhin can// lnga ni rtsa nas 'bab pa'i rgyun// stong nyid rdo rje'i go 'phang gsal// rang bzhin
185a1(rgyud 'bum): med cing rten pa med/ / gnyis med dngos po rnams bral zhing // cha med cha ni rnam par spangs// rtag tu rtog pa kun las grol// 'pho ba med cing zhi ba dang // zag med bde
185a2(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad gsal/ / nyon mongs kun las rnam grol ba// bde ba thams cad la 'jug pa// stong pa stong pa chen po dang // shin tu stong pa mchog gi mchog/ stong pa dang gzhan stong pa'i gnas//
185a3(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha' lnga yi ngo bo nyid// mi chod mi 'gyur ngo bo nyid// mi tshig pa dang mchog tu 'bigs// sangs rgyas lnga yi ye shes mchog/ rang bzhin rdo rje zhes ni brjod// snying rje rnal 'byor yang dag 'dres//
185a4(rgyud 'bum): mchog tu skye ba'i bde ba 'di// de nyid gsum po ro gcig pa// brjod dang brjod bya rnam par spangs// bde chen zhes bya'i 'khor lor gnas// dbang po rnams kyi spyod yul min// mchog tu gnyis med/
185a5(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor gyis// zhi ba dga' ba'i mtshan nyid gcig/ 'khor lo bzhi yi rim gyis thob// rnam 'byor bzhi yi go 'phang gsal// stong nyid lnga yis kun nas gang // cha bzhi yi ni rnam bkag pa/
185a6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje rtse mor 'dzin pa ni// sems dpa' zher byar gtan la dbab// nam mkha' lnga yi cha yi gung // 'di ni rdo rje sems dpar brjod// de nyid bde chen go 'phang ste// bzhi pa dga' ba kun la khyab// dpa' bo/
185a7(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor ma sbyor skyes// mi phyed dbye ba rnam par spangs// de yi ngo bo de nyid de// rang nyid tshor ba rig pa'o// pha rol gzhan gyi spyod yul min// dpe bral mtshon par dka' ba dang // rang gi blo la yang
185b1(rgyud 'bum): dag gnas/ / rang rig pa zhes bshad pa'o// gzhon nu ma yin rab dga' bzhin// mchog tu gsal bar nyams su myong // de nyid mchog dang pha rol 'gro// mchog ni thub pa kun la
185b2(rgyud 'bum): sogs/ / rtog pa gsal ba'i go 'phang ni// de ni mchog dang bde ba che// de nyid gsum du mtshan nyid gcig/ dngos dang dngos med las grol bde ba'i bdag nyid 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal
185b3(rgyud 'bum): las ni grol bar rtogs/ / gnyis dang gnyis med rnam dpyod rang bzhin dang bral blo ni zhi ba'i bdag nyid can// gsungs pa'i nyon mongs gcod cing 'jig rten kun rtog dang ni bral ba zhes//
185b4(rgyud 'bum): shes dang shes bya'i rnam rtog dben pa spangs shing bden pa'i rang bzhin dang // mthar gyur kun khyab bzhi pa mchog dang mchog rab de nyid 'gro ba bde la stsol// dus ni dus kyi mtha' zhes
185b5(rgyud 'bum): brjod/ / bzhi pa'i dus sbyor zhes bya ba// 'khor ba 'khrul pa'i rtog spangs shing // mya ngan 'das pa thob pa spangs// mnyam pa'i nyams ni chen por myos// mnyam nyid ye shes mtshan nyid can//
185b6(rgyud 'bum): gzungs pa rnams kyi yul rnams zhes// kun nas gzugs la sogs pa las// 'dzin pa dbang po rnam shes rnams// mig la sog pa'i rang bzhin gyis// de dang bral zhing mchog tu phra/
185b7(rgyud 'bum): ye shes bde ba kun gyis bdag/ sdug bsngal kun las rnam par grol// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs// bde ba sems ni zhi ba nyid// sdug bsngal 'khor ba'i mtshan nyid des/
186a1(rgyud 'bum): de las rnam grol 'jigs pa med// mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa po// stong nyid ye shes chen po'i bdag/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal mi 'byung zhing // thugs rje zhi bar mdzad/
186a2(rgyud 'bum): paba'i phyir// mya ngan 'das pa'i bde mi gnas// nyan thos ye shes zhi ba nyid// gnyis med mchog dang bse ru'o// de dag bde ba stobs pa yi// de dang bral ba'i bde chen po// dgang
186a3(rgyud 'bum): phyir mchog tu dga' ba'i dus/ / nyan thos ye shes zhes brjod do// de mtha' bral ba'i dga' ba ni// rang rgyal mya ngan 'das pa dang // de ni gnyis med ye shes zhi// bde ba yis ni bye brag
186a4(rgyud 'bum): byas/ / dngos po mkhyen pa'i ye shes che// byang chub sems kyang 'dzin par byed// rtsa rnams kun la bde ba ni// bde ba chen po go 'phang gnas// de yi bdag nyid de nyid ni// bde ba chen
186a5(rgyud 'bum): po zhes ni brjod/ / rnal 'byor gcig pus de nyid ni// rtog pa rnam rtog bdag nyid min// bsnyen nas bzlas pa sbyin sreg min// bsam gtan rlung ni bgegs pas min// bya ba ma yin 'phreng
186a6(rgyud 'bum): bas min/ / bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgoms pas min// cung zad bzhi pa'i dbang bskur gyis// bla ma dam pa'i zhal nas 'thob// rnal 'byor ma kun kun spyod ni// mchog gi ye shes bde ba che//
186a7(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ bde ba chen po'i tshig rnam par bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad
186b1(rgyud 'bum): kyis nyon/ / rdo rje pad+ma mnyam par sbyor// gang gis yang dag dngos grub 'gyur// tshe 'di nyid la rnal 'byor pas// mi phyed rdo rje zhes ni brjod// de ni rlung du yang dag grags// yi ge a ni phye ba
186b2(rgyud 'bum): yis/ / rnal 'byor shes pas rtag mchog stsol// de rten snying kha'i pad+ma yis// 'dab ma brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan// chos kyi 'khor lo skal ba bzang // thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs
186b3(rgyud 'bum): de yi 'dab ma la skyes pa/ / rnam shes brgyad ni kun rdzob bo// mig la sogs pa yang dag sten// 'gro ba gsum du rnam par spyod// de dag 'jom pa rlung rdo rje// bgegs mthar byed pa zhes
186b4(rgyud 'bum): ni brjod/ / rnam shes rnams dang gang de la// 'jig rten skyong ba rnams su brjod// 'jig rten gsum du kun nas khyab// 'jig rten pa yi lha rnams gnas// skyong ba yang ni thams cad kyis
186b5(rgyud 'bum): yul la sogs pa'i 'bras bu gnas/ / de la rlung gi yang dag sbyor// rdo rje pad+mo zhes ni brjod// rdo rje snying rjes shes par bya// pad+ma yang ni stong pa nyid// de dag sbyor ba'i mchog tu shes//
186b6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor ba// rdo rje nyi ma zhes ni gsungs// 'od zer tshogs kyi bdag nyid can// de rnams kyi ni 'byed pa gang // de ni pad+ma zhes su brjod// de yi rnal 'byor mchog tu shes/
186b7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor ba// byang chub sems kyang rdo rjer 'gyur// bde chen 'khor lo pad+ma'o// de la'ang de yi sbyor ba gang // sbyor ba mchog de rmad du byung // tha ma'i gsung ni rdo rje ste// slob sa
187a1(rgyud 'bum): bzang gis thos pa'i snod/ / pad+ma de yi gnas de la// de yi sbyor ba'ang mchog tugs la// zhi gnas pad+ma zhes gsungs la// de la lhag mthong rdo rje'o// de gnyis gcig/
187a2(rgyud 'bum): gyur rnal 'byor ni// sgom pa yis ni de nyid mthong // rnal 'byor ma zhal pad+mar gnas// rdo rje bde chen bla na med// pad+ma slob ma bzang gi kha// man ngag gi ni don gyi snod// de gnyis rnal 'byor kun
187a3(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid/ / yang dag de nyid don mthong byed// blo ldan rnam rtog bral ba yi// rdo rje ling ga zhes ni bshad// rnam rtog bral ba'i blo ldan gyis// b+ha ga pad+ma zhes ni brjod// dam tshig gis brlan rnam
187a4(rgyud 'bum): 'byor ma/ / de gnyis dngos gcig yang dag sbyor// gnyis med ye shes mthong bar byed// stong phrag gnyis dang bdun khri yi// rtsa rnams rdo rje zhes ni brjod// byang chub sems ni 'bab pa'i rtsa//
187a5(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma zhes ni yongs su grags// de ni kun tu sbyor ba des// dga' ba skyed par byed pa yi// rdo rje yi yang nyams dga'i stan// rang gi rdo rje 'chang pad+ma// de la de gnyis mnyam sbyor ba// sangs rgyas
187a6(rgyud 'bum): ye shes go 'phang gsal/ / dbang bskur mchog ni rdo rje ste// pad+ma slob ma snod bzang po// de gnyis mchog ni yang dag sbyor// yang dag de gnyis kyi ni rgyu// e ni pad+ma zhes su brjod// yi ge
187a7(rgyud 'bum): baM ni rdo rje nyid/ / thig le de nyid mi shigs pa// de gnyis sbyor ba'i ngo mtshar ni// de ltar sbyor ba mchog tu shes// rdo rje pad snod sdom pa ni// rnal 'byor ma yi man ngag dang // bla ma'i drin
187b1(rgyud 'bum): gyis yongs su shes/ / rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ rdo rje pad+ma yang dag par sbyor ba bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// /
187b2(rgyud 'bum): / sngags kyi de nyid ye shes mchog/ bshad kyis rdo rje can ni nyon// sngags kyi spyod pa spyad pa yis// gang gis dngos grub myur 'grub 'gyur// sku gsung thugs kyi
187b3(rgyud 'bum): rnams/ / sngags ni gzung bzhin bzlas brjod bya// de yis myur du dngos grub 'gyur// rlung gi de nyid pa mthar phyin// rdo rje'i phyag rgya go 'phang zhing // phyag rgya chen po'i sdom pa'i don//
187b4(rgyud 'bum): mchog gi de nyid ye shes che// sngags kyi de nyid bstan pa yin// dmigs pa med pa'i go 'phang gsal// rdo rje sems dpa' nges pa'i rgyu// sngags ni yon tan kun gyi gsal//
187b5(rgyud 'bum): lus ngag yid kyi sdom pa'o// de nyid de skyes ye shes mchog/ de nyid kun gyi don bsdus pa// snying kha'i pad+mar mchog tu gsal// de nyid ye shes bla na med// zla drug bzlas pas 'grub
187b6(rgyud 'bum): par ni/ / 'gyur te gzhan du ma yin no// rnal 'byor mchog gi thabs dang ni// rnal 'byor pas ni yongs su grags// dmigs med ces ni gang gsungs pa// de ni don dam par mi brjod/
187b7(rgyud 'bum): sgra la sogs pa yi dbye ba yis// sngags ni zlos pa gnyis su med// 'on kyang mi phyed de nyid gsum// sngags kyi don kun bsdus pa'o// bzlas pa'i dngos grub mtshungs pa med// yang dag mnyam
188a1(rgyud 'bum): par bzhag bzlas na/ / dngos grub mtshungs pa med par 'gro// rnam dag go 'phang bzang po gsal// gang shes de ni 'gro ba'i tha// sngags don sngags de nyid dang ni// sngags kyi
188a2(rgyud 'bum): san ngag kha brgyud pa/ / sngags kyi man ngag mi gsal ba// gang shes de ni 'gro ba'i tha// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' ni// kun mkhyen 'gro ba'i bla ma la// rdo rje sems dpas yang nas yang // phyag byas nas ni
188a3(rgyud 'bum): yongs su zhus/ / sngags kyi mtshan nyid ji lta bu// bcom ldan 'das kyi ming dang don// rang bzhin ci zhig rab gsal ba// sngags kyi de nyid man ngag ni// sngags kyi sdom don ji lta bu// de nas bcom ldan
188a4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rjes gsungs/ / rnal 'byor gsum gyi 'bras bdag nyid// sngags kyi don dang ming mchog dang // gnyis med ye shes mtshan nyid can// de kho na nyid bshad kyis nyon// snying po snying po'i don bsdus pa/
188a5(rgyud 'bum): thog ma med cing zhi ba dang // dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid gtso// stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa// sngags don rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni// nyon mongs med cing mi gsal ba// rang bzhin med pa'i mchog gi
188a6(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ ming med rang bzhin med pa dang // rnam pa med pa'i chen po'i mchog/ gnyis pa thams cad rnam par spangs// bde ba yang dag 'phel bar byed// skal bzang bde ba 'phel bar byed// thams cad shes
188a7(rgyud 'bum): shing ma dang bral/ / gnyis med ye shes rnal 'byor skyes// de nyid de ni don dam yang // de nyid de bzhin nyid gzhan min// de nyid rdo rje 'chang ba'i dngos// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin nyid// khyab pa kun 'gro stong
188b1(rgyud 'bum): pa nyid/ / nyon mongs thams cad rab tu 'joms// dri med dri bral dga' ba dang // rang rig pa yi go 'phang mchog/ dang po'i lha ste nyams dga' bzang // cha yis tshogs rnams rgyas par byed// man ngag
188b2(rgyud 'bum): gnas kyi bye brag gis/ / 'khor lo'i dbye bas btu bar bya// rtsa dang mgrin pa snying kha rkan// rtsol ba ji bzhin brjod pa yi// de bzhin du ni las bya ba// zhi ba la sogs go rims bzhin// ji bzhin dngos
188b3(rgyud 'bum): grub ye shes dang / / ji bzhin nyams su myong mtshan nyid// rang bzhin rdzogs pa ji lta bu// rgyun gyi dbye ba ji lta bu// rig pa ji bzhin sbyor ji bzhin// 'bras bu ji lta ba bzhin gnas// yang dag bsam
188b4(rgyud 'bum): gtan phyag rgya'i rim/ / gzugs rdzogs pa la sogs pa yi// bla ma brgyud pas yang dag gnas// rab tu 'bad pas bslab par bya// gser dang do shal gos dang ni// rin chen sna tshogs yon tan mchog/
188b5(rgyud 'bum): bran dang las byed grangs med dang // dad cing gus pa la sogs kyis// ji ltar bzhed pa ston pa la// rnyed par dka' ba'i dngos rnams kyis// sngags kyi don ston bla ma ni// dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par bya//
188b6(rgyud 'bum): phyag byas de rjes sngags pa yis// yang dag gzungs nas 'bras bu'i don// mi yi rus pa'i smyug gu dang // sa gzhi rin chen rab 'bar ba// yang na dur khrod thal ba ni// rab brdal dngos grub ster bar byed//
188b7(rgyud 'bum): thog mar dbang bskur blang byas nas// mdun du dkyil 'khor la sogs bya// bgegs mthar bde la gtor ma ni// chen po gtsug lag khang du sbyin// sku gsung thugs ni sgrub byed pa'i// mtshungs pa med
189a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sngags btu bya/ / dang po'i yi ge thog mar bri// dbyangs yig lnga pa yang dag ldan// sde tshan tha ma'i mtha' cha ldan// sku yi sa bon du ni brjod// thog ma'i yi ge nyis 'gyur la//
189a2(rgyud 'bum): / uSh+ma Sha yi cha dang ldan// mtshungs pa med pa'i sngags btu bya// gsung gi rdo rje snying po mchog/ uSh+ma Sha yi cha dang bcas// dbyangs yig drug par yang dag ldan// sde tshan mtha' yi mtha' char bcas/
189a3(rgyud 'bum): thugs kyi rdo rje go 'phang gsal// sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig gsum// 'jig rten gsum yang 'grub par byed// rnal 'byor pa yi de nyid mchog/ sngags btu ba ni bla na med// de nyid dngos grub thams
189a4(rgyud 'bum): cad byed/ / sngags rnams kun gyi don bsdus pa// sngags kyi theg pa kun yin no// rgyu dang mi rgyus nyid la// dngos grub rnams kyi rnal 'byor mchog/ rnal 'byor ye shes bla na med// rdo rje sems dpa'i snying po ni// /
189a5(rgyud 'bum): ye shes bla na med pa'i mchog/ man ngag ji bzhin sngags zlos pa// dngos grub phyir ni lung bzhin gyis// de yi dngos grub rgya chen 'gro// tshe 'di nyid la sngags shes pas// ye shes chen po zhes bshad pa'i//
189a6(rgyud 'bum): sku gsung thugs kyi rnal 'byor che// rab gsal sngags ni mtshungs pa med// 'dod pa kun la longs spyod byed// gang zhig sngags ni mgus pa ru// rtag 'chang de kho na nyid shes// rtog pa kun yang 'grub par
189a7(rgyud 'bum): byed/ / dkyil 'khor kun tu zhugs pa dang // dam tshig thams cad shes pa dang // blo bzang 'jig rten gsum yang 'grub// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las
189b1(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyi de kho na nyid gsungs pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o/ / / de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// grangs kyi rim pa bla na med// ji ltar gnas pa'i rlung rnams kyi// rim pa ji lta
189b2(rgyud 'bum): ba bzhin du/ / gang gis thob pa skal ba bzang // srog ni thams cad bdag nyid gnas// gang gis yang dag yongs su shes// rnal 'byor mchog ni thob par byed// rlung gi mtshan nyid mi shes pa/
189b3(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten gsum du rnam par 'khor// goms pa thob pa de yang ni// bla ma rnal 'byor de shes brgyud// rlung gi mtshan nyid ji lta bu// lo tshigs kyi ni mtshan nyid ni// mdor bsdus nas ni bshad
189b4(rgyud 'bum): bar bya/ / sprin gyi dpal las gsal ba gang // mdor bsdus nas ni dus ni drug/ lo tshigs su ni yongs su grags// sbyor ba gnyis ni dus yin te// dus de nyin zhag drug cu'o// nyin dang
189b5(rgyud 'bum): mtshan du nges pa la/ / nyin zhag gcig ces yongs su grags// nyin mtshan chu tshod drug cu ste// de bzhin dbyug gu rtsa sha'o// 'byung dang rngub pa'i dus drug la// tsa sha zhes ni yongs su grags//
189b6(rgyud 'bum): skad cig ma drug la ni dbugs// de nyid se gol gtogs pa'i tshad// thang cig gsum la skad cig go// de la yungs kar bskor ba tsam// dbugs gsum la ni thang cig go// thang cig de ni yud tsam mo//
189b7(rgyud 'bum): / tha cig gsum la mig btsums te// de yang mig ni 'dzums pa yi// tsam gsum la ni mig btsums te// tsam ni thal mo brdabs pa'o// bde ba 'char ba de gsum tsam// de ni thig le 'pho ba'o// spangs pa gsum
190a1(rgyud 'bum): la bde bar gnas/ / de ni rab 'gyed 'jigs pa brjod// dus gsum la ni 'jigs par bshad// dus ni phra ba skad cig bdag/ 'das pa dang ni da ltar dang // ma 'ongs pa yi
190a2(rgyud 'bum): mtshan nyid do/ / 'das pa'i skad cig gsum du gsungs// da ltar yang ni skad cig gsum// ma 'ongs skad cig gsum du bshad// de las slar yang skad cig gsum// de ltar skad cig gsum gyi ma/
190a3(rgyud 'bum): de las cha gsum de las cha// de srid grangs ni ji srid du// rtog pa stong pa gnyis su med// rnal 'byor mchog ni thob par 'gyur// srog gi gnas ni bla na med// phyogs dang dus kyi rtog pa bral//
190a4(rgyud 'bum): rig pa'i mtshan nyid spangs pa dang // de yi srog ni shar nas thim// gnyis med de ni bsdus pa'o// gzhan yang bshad par bya yis nyon// srog ni thim dang 'char ba yis// gang tshe skad cig la sogs
190a5(rgyud 'bum): rtogs/ / kun nas rab tu ma zhi ba// de srid srog ni rlung gi gnas// grol ba'i gnas ni mi shes so// bshang sgo gsang ba'i dbus na gnas// ming ni ma skyes cha chen po// de yang rnam shes dang bral ba//
190a6(rgyud 'bum): ye shes lus ni bdag med pa// der ni skye ba mchog gi mchog/ srog chags rnams kyi mchog tu brjod// rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo sten// thog mar 'byung ba bzhi po la// sgro 'dogs skyed pa'i ngo
190a7(rgyud 'bum): bopor byed/ / de tshe rang gi gnas su thim// rnam shes las ni skye ba rlung // de las me ni skye bar 'gyur// me las chu ni 'byung bar byed// de las sa ni yang dag skye// de dag rnams las phung por 'byung //
190b1(rgyud 'bum): de phyir skye mched rnams dang ni// de las rnam shes rang bzhin med// brgya dang brgyad kyi lhag pa'i rim// ji ltar skye bo de yi gnas// thim nas 'gro ba'i rang bzhin du// rgyags pa bskyed pa'i rung
190b2(rgyud 'bum): chen po/ / nyon mongs yi ni 'das nas ni// sngags thob nas ni rnam rgyas te// skye mched rnams ni sdud par byed// de las rgyags pas chu yi rlung // rgyags pa bskyed pa za ba'i phyir// phung po rnams
190b3(rgyud 'bum): kyang sdud byed nyid/ / rim gyis lus chen sgra sgrogs byed// de las rgyags pa'i cha ni 'byung // rgyags pa'i chu ni sdud par byed// 'byung ba rnams kyis bsdus nas kyang // go rims ji lta ba bzhin du// de la
190b4(rgyud 'bum): rlung ni btang bzung 'byung / / rgyags pa'i cha ni za bar byed// de nas kyang ni rlung ni sdud// khyab cing phra ba sgrib par byed// de las mi btang bzung ba dang // rnam shes skad cig sgrib par byed// bsgribs
190b5(rgyud 'bum): nas de las rnam shes kyang / / bems por song nas brgyal bar 'gyur// skye mched ma ni sgrib par byed// dag pa'i ye shes mchog gi mchog/ de las thim par gyur pa'i srog/ rnam shes dang ni
190b6(rgyud 'bum): mtshungs par ldan/ / de nyid mchog ni de ltar bshad// srog ni thim zhing 'char ba dang // ji lta ba bzhin yongs su shes// tha ma brgyud pa'i rim pa 'byung // rigs pa gzhan yang bshad par bya//
190b7(rgyud 'bum): rdorje'i sku ni sgrub pa'i phyir// 'chi ba med pa'i sgrub pa ni// gang gis 'chi med lus mchog ni// thob pa yon tan rnams kyi rten// gang phyir sems can tshe thung bas// 'chi med go 'phang sgrub mi nus//
191a1(rgyud 'bum): de phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyis// 'chi ba med par rab bsgrub bya// bcom ldan mgon po ye shes mchog/ rnal 'byor de nyid pha rol byon// rdo rje sems dpas phyag/
191a2(rgyud 'bum): byas zhus// 'chi ba med nyid rigs par ni// ji ltar yang dag thim pa lags// de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// bya ba kun sgrub go 'phang ni// 'chi ba med pa'i rnal 'byor che// yang dag
191a3(rgyud 'bum): de nyid rnam nges pa/ / sems can tshe ni thung ba yis// dngos grub 'grub pa gang yang med// de bas rnal 'byor bzang po rnams// tshe rang ba ni dge ba'o// de la thog mar rnal 'byor mchog/ blo bzang
191a4(rgyud 'bum): nang gi bdag nyid sgrub/ / lce ni rkan gyis dbus sbyar ba// byas nas de kho nyid tshig bzla// sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas nas ni// yang dag rnal 'byor rjes dran bya// sna rtser dbugs ni rgyu bya zhing //
191a5(rgyud 'bum): kha ni gsal bar dgag par bya// skad kyi gnas son zla ba ni// sngags kyi rnal 'byor gyis ni zhu// zhu ba rlung gi rnal 'byor gyis// rtag tu rnal 'byor gtso bos btung // mtshan phyed kyi ni dus
191a6(rgyud 'bum): tshod mthar/ / ji srid thun gcig ma chad par// de srid rnal 'byor pas sngags bzla// rdo rje'i lus ni byed par 'gyur// sde tshan gnyis pa'i gsum pa la// dbyangs bcas pa dang yang dag ldan//
191a7(rgyud 'bum): yan lag ma nyams rtag tu bzla// sgrub pa po yi srog ni 'gugs// rdzas kyang rtag tu bsten par bya// de nyid lnga yi rim pas skye// bzlas pa rdzogs nas rtag tu ni// lus la 'byung ba'i dri ma med//
191b1(rgyud 'bum): lcags lnga'i rang bzhin snod du ni// bzhag nas ji srid nyi ma ni// 'char kar de nas de la yang // yo Shi rak+ta bde ba ni// blugs nas rtag tu rdzas kyi mchog/ bdud rtsi bdun pa'i ming can no// nyal kar/
191b2(rgyud 'bum): yang ni de 'thungs na// rdzas kyis tshe ni 'phel bar byed// sngags kyi rgyal po oM AHhUM// de nas lan bdun pa zla bar bya// lag g.yas pa dan gyis mtshan la// snod bzang de la bkab nas su// yi ge brgya
191b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sngags kyis ni/ / lan gsum du ni dag par bya// de phyir bud med gzhon nu ni// rtag tu mkhur ba bkang zhing btung // de ni bza' ba sbyin pa yang // mar la bstegs pa'i 'bras dang ni// ma sha dang ni nyi
191b4(rgyud 'bum): dga' dang / / ra yi 'o ma kha ra kar// til rnams cha mnyam byas nas ni// myos pa yis ni sbyin sreg bya// nyal kar de la bza' ba sbyin// bla na med pa'i bza' ba po// de ltar rig pas chog shes nas/
191b5(rgyud 'bum): su la'ang smra bar mi bya'o// thams cad sngon bzhin zhi ba ni// myur du dngos grub ster bar byed// zla ba drug tu'ang gang bsten pa// de ni rdo rje'i lus su 'gyur// bcud kyis len dang gser 'gyur sogs//
191b6(rgyud 'bum): dgug pa ni tha na med// rab tu 'bad pas bsten par bya// phyag rgya che don sgrub pa pos// rgas pa med cing srin nad med// snyoms las med cing lkugs pa med// glog skam rlung mkhris nad sogs med//
191b7(rgyud 'bum): nang dang 'bras dang 'brum bu dang / shu ba g.yan pa 'brum phran med// mdze nad mtshan par rdol ba med// dud dang pad dkar dpal lus ldan// 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser ltar 'bar// rig
192a1(rgyud 'bum): pa 'dzin pa'i bu mo mchog/ de ni rtag tu 'gugs par byed// de yi mdza' chen lha rnams te// rnal 'byor ma rnams sems par byed// lus kyi rang bzhin rtag tu ni// phyag bya ba dang
192a2(rgyud 'bum): mchod par 'gyur/ / rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ rlung gi grangs kyi rim pa'i gnas bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// /
192a3(rgyud 'bum): de nas gzhan yang rtsa rnams ni// grangs dang gnas ni bsdus pa nyon// 'khor lo'i grangs kyi dbye ba yis// ji bzhin rmad du byung ba'i mchog/ 'khor lo drug la rten bcu drug/ lus la lha yi
192a4(rgyud 'bum): gzhal yas khang / / rnal 'byor ji bzhin gnas ji bzhin// mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya// rlung gi 'khor lor gnas pa'i rtsa// 'dab drug rlung ni mkha' la spyod// 'dab gsum me yi 'khor lor
192a5(rgyud 'bum): bshad/ / rtsa gsum gnas ni rim gyis 'char// de bzhin longs spyod 'khor lo yang // rtsa ni bcu drug yang dag brjod// chos kyi 'khor lor gnas pa'i rtsa// brgyad ni kun la khyab pa'o// de bzhin sprul pa'i
192a6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo yang / / drug cu rtsa bzhir 'char bar bshad// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo cher// rtsa ni sum cu gnyis su bshad// de ltar mdor bsdus rim pa yang // brgya dang sum cu gcig lhag par// rtsa rnams su ni
192a7(rgyud 'bum): yang dag bshad/ / gzhan dag tu ni rgyas par yang // rtsa ni bdun khri nyis stong du// gnas kyi dbye bas phye ba ni// nges par brjod pa 'bum ster gsungs// rgyud ni chung ngu'ang 'di nyid du// snying po la zhi snying po
192b1(rgyud 'bum): gsungs/ / smin ma'i dbus nas rlung 'khor lo// bye ba 'khril ba mi bzad pa// mi bzang brtan dang mtshan nyid can// rtsa thung drug gi mtshan nyid do// 'dzin pa rtog med gang ba ni// rtsa gsum gru gsum me
192b2(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor/ / mgrin pa'i 'og tu bshad pa yin// dri ma dang bral gsal ba dang // drag po dang ni gsum yin no// yang dag zhugs dang shin tu zhugs// shin tu bzang por de 'gro la// stobs chen dang
192b3(rgyud 'bum): ni mi bzad che/ / mdzes chen mdun du skyes pa che// rgyags pa'i rtags dang rgyags pa'i cha// rgyags pa'i chu dang rgyags spro byed// rgyags dang rgyags pa'i rgyu 'thun dang // rgyags pa'i ran dang rgyags pa
192b4(rgyud 'bum): chang / / rtsub dang mkha' dang 'byung brlang dang // dbugs mi bde dang g.ya' mkhan 'gro// 'dab chags yan lag khwa yi gdong // za phod mi bzad sgra sgrogs dang // ji ldan rdeg dang rdul ba dang // dbyangs dang /
192b5(rgyud 'bum): dbyangs skyes dang ni smin// chu ba mthong dang rgyun ltar sngo// yud tsam gtso bo yud mi skyes// rgyab tu kha bltas dbyug pa dang // dbyug snyoms dang ni snying pa dang // tshigs kyi lto dang tshigs kyi tshig/ tshigs kyi
192b6(rgyud 'bum): tshad dang brtul ba dang / / tshigs kyi gnas dang tshigs kyi gdong // tshigs 'od tshigs kyi lu gu rgyud// dul byed dud 'gro ga 'i brjid dang // dri med dul ba'i snyems pa dang // chu 'phyang lho dang chu 'phyang chags//
192b7(rgyud 'bum): chun 'phyang chun 'phyang phyed sbrang bu// phug gu phrug gu ster dri ba// lo ma lo ma'i mgrin pa dang // rab mchog ma dang rab gsal te// de ltar drug cu rtsa bzhir bshad// lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lor gnas/
193a1(rgyud 'bum): bdud rtsi mchog gis yongs su gang // rin chen chen po pad+ma dang // rdo rje chen po stobs po che// mgon po che dang sgra che dang // nyes dga' chen po myos pa che// 'di brgyad chos kyi 'khor
193a2(rgyud 'bum): lo'i dbus/ / snying kha'i pad+mar yang dag gnas// longs spyod longs spyod ster ldan dang // nyi 'gro gsal dang skal ba dang // sgom pa dang ni thal ba'i gdong // bzang ster bzang dang bkres pa dang // bcud len
193a3(rgyud 'bum): ro ni sgyur ba dang / / ro 'jigs pa dang ro dang ni// khrung khrung longs spyod 'khor lor gnas// grangs ni bcu drug tu ni brjod// de steng rim rigs 'dod pa can// 'dod can ma dang srog gi lus// zla 'thung zla ster
193a4(rgyud 'bum): mdzod dang ni/ / 'dod chags min sma ku sha dang // sha bi spo dang dag pa dang // mi dang mi ro ne tso dang // gang la gnyis ro ldan pa dang // kis ring chang ster bdud rtsi dang // dung can dang ni dung rna dang // dug gi
193a5(rgyud 'bum): mig dang dug gi sna/ / rgyags dbang rgyags pa brkam pa dang // rgyags pas brgyal dang ngo mtshar rgyags// snyems pa dang ni tshogs kyi rten// sum cu rtsa gnyis zhes ni brjod// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo
193a6(rgyud 'bum): che mchog tu dga' ba ster bar byed/ / phra dang reg bya mchog tu phra// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs// rang nyid bde chen rang bzhin dang // gzhan dag la yang ster bar byed// de ltar yang dag rtsa yi rim//
193a7(rgyud 'bum): bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya// rtsa yi rim med nges par ni// phung po la sogs mi 'byung ngo // phung po med na ye shes che// rnal 'byor pa yis thob mi 'gyur// phung po lnga yi bdag nyid lus//
193b1(rgyud 'bum): / mkha' 'gro lngar ni rab tu grags// de nyid 'byung ba lnga yis ni// ye shes lngar ni rnam par gnas// de phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyis// rtsa yi 'khor lo shes par bya// ji ltar chu yi dbus kyi shing //
193b2(rgyud 'bum): myur du yang ni 'phel bar 'gro// de las 'bras bu sogs ldan pa// ster ba 'di la the tshom med// de bzhin phung po shing zhes bya// rtsa yi chu yis 'phel nas ni// 'phel bas yang dag 'bras bu ni// /
193b3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ster byed// lha yi rnam pa'i ngo bo yis// rtsa rnams rang bzhin bsgom par bya// gnyis phrad pa las reg bya gnyis// gal te rdo rje lhag gyur na// de tshe me ni yang dag 'bar//
193b4(rgyud 'bum): de rjes me yi 'khor lo'i dbus// 'khor lo'i ming can pad+ma rnams// rim gyis rim gyis byed par 'gyur// 'di ni rtsa las 'bab de las// byang chub sems ni bde ba che// sprul pa'i snying po yang
193b5(rgyud 'bum): dag thob/ / ngo bo gcig gyur bsdus nas ni// 'bab pa nyi ma zla ba'o// mi dbang dkyil 'khor dbus su yang // gang phyir srad bu'i rnam par gnas// rgyu gcig tu yang shes nas ni// de nyid 'bras
193b6(rgyud 'bum): bu rnam pa gnyis/ / g.yas pa nyi ma'i rnam pa dang // g.yon pa zla ba'i rnam par 'byung // gang tshe g.yas pa'i nyi ma ni// de tshe khrag 'gyur bde ba'o// gang tshe g.yon pa'i zla ba gsal// bde ba
193b7(rgyud 'bum): kun kyang de lta bu'o/ / de gnyis khongs su chud pa'i me// yan lag bdun nyid yang dag gnas// sngon la rlung gi rnam shes ni// brgya lam gang tshe 'khrul 'gyur na// pa yi mkha' la mtshungs par
194a1(rgyud 'bum): gnas/ / de tshe chags pa'i dbang du 'gyur// gsang gnas zla mtshan ldan pa'i rtsa// me dang nyi ma 'char ba na// de tshe lhag par chags pas non// chags pa mchog tu 'dod
194a2(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / rdo rje pad+ma 'dres pa'i gdong // 'jug pa pha yi kha yi rlung // de tshe sa bon du ni 'gyur// sa bon las ni sems can 'byung // de phyir rtsa las yang dag 'char// 'bras bu ngo mtshar
194a3(rgyud 'bum): can ni skye/ / de nyid byang chub sems kyang ni// 'dzin pa srog ni bsdus pa'o// ye shes mchog dang de nyid mchog/ mchog tu bde ba rmad byung che// ye shes rnal 'byor thob pa yis// mchog
194a4(rgyud 'bum): tu bde ba bla na med/ / rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ rtsa'i 'khor lo'i gnas kyi rim par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//
194a5(rgyud 'bum): / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rnal 'byor lus la rim ji bzhin// rtsa rnams rtag tu yang dag ni// brgyud pa yi ni rigs kyis skyes// gsal ba ru ni ma gsungs pa// dad pa'i bsam pa
194a6(rgyud 'bum): rnam spangs pa/ / skye bo skal ba med don du// gang du'ang gsal bar ma gsungs pa// snyigs ma lnga zhes bya ba'i dus// sems can myur du dngos grub don// snod du bya bar 'dod pa yis// rang byung ye
194a7(rgyud 'bum): shes rmad byung ba/ / rnal 'byor lus kyi bde chen po'i// 'khor lo'i rtsa ni sum cu gnyis// byang chub sems ni gsal 'bab pa'i// rtsa rnams yang dag rnam bshad bya// de ni bde ba chen po'i gnas//
194b1(rgyud 'bum): de ni mtshan nyid bshad par bya// ka tsa Ta ta pa'i sde tshan// ya ra la wa Sha shas// de dag rim par shes par bya// slar yang de dag bsdus nas ni// sde tshan tsam ni gcig tu 'gro// de yang zhi pa'i ye
194b2(rgyud 'bum): shes mchog/ byang chub sems la thim nas 'gro// kun rtog thams cad spangs nas ni// bde ba kun gyi gzhi yi mchog/ shes dang shes bya rnam par spangs// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu
194b3(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs/ / de las 'khor lo gsum dbye bas// rtsa ni brgyad kyi dbye ba las// sku gsung thugs kyi sngags kyis ni// gsum phye bdun cu rtsa gnyis gsal// de ni stong du rab phye ba/
194b4(rgyud 'bum): so sor 'phros pa'i bdag nyid can// stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyis// rtsa rnams kyi ni grangs zhes bya// rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan ni// khams gsum gyi ni dbye ba yis// stong
194b5(rgyud 'bum): thag nyi shu rtsa bzhir ni/ / 'khor lo 'khor lo'i dbye ba yis// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud kyi ni// nges pa'i man ngag rjes 'brang nas// phrag rgya'i rnal 'byor de nyid mchog/ lU pi rim pa'i
194b6(rgyud 'bum): mtshan nyid ni/ / rtsa ni so sor dbye ba yis// bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya'o// de las yang ni sdom sbyor bar// song nas phan tshun kun nas rten// slar yang bdun cu rtsa gnyis 'gro// bde chen
194b7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo rtsa yi gnas/ / rtsa ni sum cu rtsa gnyis las// de yang 'khor lo sdom par 'gyur// 'khor lo re re'i gtso bo'i rtsa// brgyad brgyad du ni 'gyur bar gsal// rnal 'byor lus kyi rtsa mchog ces//
195a1(rgyud 'bum): rmad byung sum cu rtsa gnyis ni// yi ge sum cu gnyis dbye bas// rtag tu rnal 'byor gtso bos thob// phung po khams dang don yul nyid// dbang po'i sgo ni srung ba'o//
195a2(rgyud 'bum): sum cu rtsa gnyis dbye bdag nyid// gsal ba yi ni dkyil 'khor mchog/ lus kyi gzhal yas khang du yang // de nyid kyi ni nang bzhugs pa// de bzhin gshegs dang lha mo dang // gzugs la sogs dang rgyal sras
195a3(rgyud 'bum): namA/ / khro bo bcu zhes bya ba yi// de nyid mchog ni yang dag bzhug// slar yang khro bo rgyal sras la// nang du mi snang bar ni 'gro// rgyal sras rnam ni gzug la so ga/ lha mo rnam la bsdus nA ni// de rnam kyang nis sog 'gro// de dag de bzhin gsheg lnga la// sku gsung thug kyi rdo rje la// de dag la yang
195a4(rgyud 'bum): bsdus nas 'gro/ / de kho na nyid bde gcig pu// de la yang ni thim nas 'gro// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnams las grol// bde ba kun rten pa yi mchog/ de yang nyams myong tsam las slar// de ni yi ge tsam
195a5(rgyud 'bum): la thim/ / thig le yang ni sgra la thim// sgra tsam 'od gsal ba la'o// 'od gsal go 'phang yang dag par// spro dang bsdu ba'i mtshan nyid do// rnam par shes dang chos dbyings dang // don dam pa dang
195a6(rgyud 'bum): bde ba che/ / gzung dang 'dzin pa las grol ba// byang chub sems ni dri ma med// rdo rje sems dpa'i zhi ba che// gnyis med ye shes rmad du byung // dbang bskur bzhi pa bde ba dang // bzhi pa'i dga' ba
195a7(rgyud 'bum): go 'phang mchog/ de la sogs ming bye brag gis// go 'phang mchog ni gsungs pa yin// spro dang bsdu ba'i dbye ba yis// rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du// de ltar bskyed dang rdzogs pa yi// rim don bla ma
195b1(rgyud 'bum): brgyud las shes/ / zhi ba gnyis med mtshan nyid can// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ rnal 'byor pa'i lus kyi rtsa bsdus pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// /
195b2(rgyud 'bum): / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// sna tshogs la sogs skad cig bdag/ yang dag gzhung lugs mtshan nyid ni// de nyid ji lta ba bzhin nyon// rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par smin// rnam par
195b3(rgyud 'bum): 'joms dang mtshan nyid bral/ / skad cig ma ni bzhi zhes gsungs// rnam par phye nas slar bshad bya// rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par 'dod// de yi skad cig dbye bar bya// a lig ga dang / tsum+ba na dang /
195b4(rgyud 'bum): tsu ma sha na dang / ku tsa gra ha dang / bu la tra tra ha na dang / da sha na dang / da kha da na dang / do la dang / pu tsi tsi dang / kur ba la sogs pa'i ka ra na dang / rnam pa sna tshogs skad cig go// na li stong phrag bdun
195b5(rgyud 'bum): cu gnyis/ / lus ni bde ba rgyas pa na// mgrin pa dag tu gang phyin pa// rnam smin zhes bya skad cig go// lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes ni// rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mtshan nyid can// thams cad mngon par byang
195b6(rgyud 'bum): chub pa'i/ / rnam pa med pa'i skad cig go/ na li las byung shu kra 'das// rnam pa dang bral skad cig go/ ye shes bzhi dang stong pa bzhi// skad cig ma ni bzhi las rtogs// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud
195b7(rgyud 'bum): dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ skad cig ma'i mtshan nyid rgyas par bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// dga' ba bzhi yi mtshan
196a1(rgyud 'bum): nyid ni/ / lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog pa yi// dga' ba'i bde ba dang po ste// mchog tu dga' ba gnyis pa dang // dga' bral zhes pa gsum pa dang // bzhi pa lhan cig skyes
196a2(rgyud 'bum): par bshad/ / sprul pa'i 'khor lor dga' ba dang // mchog dga' chos kyi 'khor lor gnas// longs spyod bral ba'i dga' ba dang // lhan cig skyes dang bde ba che// lugs bzlog rim pa zhes ni gsungs//
196a3(rgyud 'bum): de rjes lugs 'byung bshad bya ste// bde chen 'khor lo spyi bo la// de ni dga' bar bshad pa yin// longs spyod 'khor lor mchog dga' dang // dga' bral chos kyi 'khor lor gnas// sprul pa'i 'khor
196a4(rgyud 'bum): lor lhan cig skyes/ / dga' ba nyams su myong bar byed// blta dang dgug dang de bzhin brda// kha la tsum pa byed pa yi// dga' ba nyams su myong bar shes// rnam pa sna tshogs mtshan nyid do// rnal
196a5(rgyud 'bum): 'byor rnal 'byor mchog tu bde/ / de bzhin sgra la 'dzin pa dang // rdo rje pad+mar bzhag nas ni// nyams myongs ni skad cig mchog/ snam smin zhes bya gcig pu nyid// de nyid rgyur ni rnam par shes// rtsa yi
196a6(rgyud 'bum): dbus na rab gsal nas/ / gtum mo yang ni rnam rtog 'joms// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo che// mchog gi cha ni zhu bar byed// bral dga'i gnas su myong ba na// rnam rtog skad cig mtshan nyid do// del
196a7(rgyud 'bum): ro gcig rang bzhin no/ / rtsa ni gcig gi brgyun la brten// bde ba chen po'i go 'phang zhing // lhan cig skyes pa'i mtshan nyid ni// rnam pa sna tshogs skad cig gsungs// stong nyid kun gyi gzhi yi mchog/
196b1(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi 'khor lo de las steng // rnal 'byor pa yis bsgrub bya ba// nyams su myong ba mchog dga' ste// rnam smin skad cig mtshan nyid do// longs spyod 'khor lo des las ni// steng du byed pa'i skad cig la/
196b2(rgyud 'bum): nyams myong bral ba'i dga' ba ni// rnam 'joms mtshan nyid skad cig go// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo che// de thob mtshan nyid skad cig ma// lhan cig skyes dga'i nyams myong ba// mtshan nyid dang
196b3(rgyud 'bum): bral skad cig go/ rtsa gsum kun gyi nam mkha' che// rnal 'byor ma tshogs yang dag gzung // de las rab sad nyams myong ba// mtshan nyid dang bral skad cig go/ rtsa gsum kun gyi nam mkha' che// rnal
196b4(rgyud 'bum): 'byor ma tshogs yang dag gzugs/ / de las rab sad nyams myong ba// mtshan nyid gcig par ro mtshungs par// rnal 'byor chen pos nyams su myong // slar yang mtshan nyid med par 'gro// rab tu sad
196b5(rgyud 'bum): pa nyams su myong / / stong phrag bcu drug bdag nyid do// bde chen go 'phang mi phyed pa// gnyis med rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas// de ltar 'di ni dga' dbye ba// gzhan du gsal bar ma gsungs so//
196b6(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor ma yi bka' dron gyis// bla ma rgyud pa las shes bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ dga' ba'i mtshan nyid rnam par dbye ba'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// /

197a1(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems ni zhu byas pa// rdo rje'am ni pad+ma'i rtse// rlung gi bzung ba'i skad cig la// rkan dgug pa yi sbyor ba dang // k+Shu~M gyi sngags kyi sbyor ba yis// rnal 'byor mchog ni thob
197a2(rgyud 'bum): par byed/ / bde ba kun gyi gzhi yi mchog/ chos kyi 'khor lo de nyid mchog/ snying kha'i pad+ma'i lte ba la// dbus su hU~M ni bkod nas ni// thams cad stong pa'i mtshan nyid ni// dngos dang dngos med rnam par grol// de kho na nyid lus skyob pa/
197a3(rgyud 'bum): phyogs yul dus dang rnam par bral// steng dang 'og ni rnam par spangs// sems bral rang gi ngo bor gnas// ngag gi dra ba yongs su spangs// rgyud dang mtshan ma dang bral zhing // rtog pa'i spyod yul rnams dang
197a4(rgyud 'bum): blabral/ / gnyis pa kun las rnam par grol// mchog tu rtag cing zhi ba'o// rlung gi thig le rnal 'byor mchog/ kha dog lnga pa gsal ba che// sna rtser sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor gyis// kun nas kyang ni bsgom par bya/
197a5(rgyud 'bum): yi ge oM ni sngags kyi mchog/ rnal 'byor pa yis bzla bar bya// snga ma bzhin du ye shes lnga// zhi ba la sogs de bzhin sgrub// bag chags rim pa'i mtshan nyid ni// sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis/
197a6(rgyud 'bum): rtsa ni gsum po 'di ni mchog/ bsdus nas slar yang dbye ba ni// phan tshun du ni so sor 'gro// rdzas kyi thig le khong chud pa/ thig le gnyis te sngags dang rlung // sngags kyi thig le de nyid mchog/ thig
197a7(rgyud 'bum): le gnyis ni 'od dang rdzas/ / slar yang rlung gi thig le yang // thig le gnyis kyi nang du 'gro// sngags dang rdzas kyi bdag nyid can// rnal 'byor pa yis yang dag shes// zla ba nyi ma me yi rtsa// gsum zhes
197b1(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i mtshan nyid do/ / la la nA dang ra sa nA// a ba d+hU tI zhes bya'i ming // sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin dang // de nyid du ni yongs su grags// steng dang 'og tu khyab pa nyid// so sor lu gu rgyud tshul du/
197b2(rgyud 'bum): rtsa rnams kun la khyab nas ni// yang dag man ngag rim pas gnas// de ltar rnal 'byor mchog tu phra// shes dang shes bya rnam par spangs// dngos grub thams cad kyi ni gzhi// rnal 'byor chen po'i rmad
197b3(rgyud 'bum): byung che/ / gso sbyor gyis min bzlas pas min// 'phreng bas ma yin 'gogs pas min// grangs min dus min sbyin sreg min// 'byin byed 'gog byed kyis ni min// ye shes chen po'i go 'phang zhi// rnal
197b4(rgyud 'bum): 'byor gcig pus rtogs par byed/ / mngon par shes dang lnga dang ni// de bzhin ye shes lnga yi mchog/ thig le gsum ni rnam sgom pa// zhi sogs bya ba yang dag ni// rnal 'byor mchog gis 'grub par
197b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / stong nyid ye shes mtshan nyid ni// ye shes sems dpa' rdo rje sems// dam tshig sems dpa' zhes bya gsungs// gnas kyi grangs kyi dbye ba yis// bla ma brgyud pa las shes bya// rnal
197b6(rgyud 'bum): 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ thig le gsum rnam par dbye ba'i le'u ste nyi shu gcig pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang de nyid nyon// de nyid
197b7(rgyud 'bum): gsum gyi go 'phang mchog/ sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi// snying po bdag nyid dam tshig ni// yi ge gsum ni sku gsung thugs// snying po yang ni bshad par bya// de ni rnam phye khyed nyon cig/ de ni ji lta ba
198a1(rgyud 'bum): bzhin bshad/ / oM ni sku yi rdo rje yi// snying po ru ni yang dag bshad// yi ge a dang yi ge u// yi ge ma zhes bya ba gsum// A ni chos 'khor pad+ma la// rlung gi 'khor
198a2(rgyud 'bum): la ni khyab/ / sgrib med sgrib pa'i rlung chen po// srog tu gsungs pa thams cad bsdus// cha med cha dang bral ba dang // dngos po dngos med dbus na gnas// thig le 'khor lo'i cha la khyab// nam
198a3(rgyud 'bum): mkha'i khams kyi yi ge mchog/ sngags rnams kun gyi don gyi gnas// sngags rnams thams cad rab sad byed// sngags rnams kun gyi phan byed cing // ngag gi 'khor lo rab sad byed// dngos su
198a4(rgyud 'bum): lan gsum gyi ni gzhi/ / 'byung ba thams cad dbang du byed// zad med 'phel ba med pa'i gnas// byang chub sa bon bde ba che// gzugs med khams su yang dag bshad// 'khor lo bzhi yi don
198a5(rgyud 'bum): bsdus pa'o/ / u ni longs spyod 'khor lor gnas// me dang nyi ma 'dra ba yi// mgrin pa'i mtha' nas spyi gtsug mtha'// khyab pa gzi brjid kyi ni lus// gzugs kyi khams shes bya bar shes
198a6(rgyud 'bum): gnas ris bcu bdun bdag nyid can/ / bde chen 'khor lo zhes byar bshad// yi ge ma ni thig le tsam// gdong tshad mtha' yi sor bzhi tsam// dga' ba'i gtsug tor gnas na gnas// zla ba'i gzugs dang
198a7(rgyud 'bum): 'dra ba yi/ / bde ba chen po'i go 'phang zhi// rtsa ni kun la khyab pa po// mi phyed lus kyi go 'phang ni// 'dod pa'i khams zhes bshad pa yin// bsdus na gnas ris nyi shu'o// de ltar rlung ni gnas gsum gyi
198b1(rgyud 'bum): rtsa gsum gyi ni gnas su 'dus/ / yi ge oM gyi brda shes na// khams gsum rnam par sad par byed// rnam par snang mdzad 'gro ba'i gzugs// spro ba'i bdag nyid can gyi rgyu// rnam par rtog pa'i rlung
198b2(rgyud 'bum): gnyis ni/ / sna yi bu ga nas ni byung // yang dag nyi ma zla ba gnyis// sbas pa nang nas rgyu bar byed// me ni 'bar ba rtse mo la// smin ma'i dbus su srog gi rlung // de ltar gcig pu'ang gsum du bshad//
198b3(rgyud 'bum): gtan pa phab ste de nyid gsum// zhi pa khams gsum la khyab pa// skye ba'i sa bon rgyas pa'o// yi ge a ni ye shes mchog/ gsung gi rdo rje snying po mchog/ a ni gnyis dang yi ge haM// ring po
198b4(rgyud 'bum): byas te dbye ba gsum/ / chos kyi dbyings kyi don bsdus pa// yi ge A ni sngar bshad zin// gnyis pa yang ni srog gi rlung // stong nyid ye shes ming can te// srog dang rtsol ba gnyis su rigs/
198b5(rgyud 'bum): yul dang dbang po bsdus pa'o// kun gzhi dang ni nyon mongs yid// gzung dang 'dzin pa'i ngo bo nyid// ngo bo gcig tu gyur nas ni// gsung gi rdo rje brjod pa'i mchog/ A ni chos 'khor pad+ma las
198b6(rgyud 'bum): mgrin par yi ge A nyid 'gyur/ / srog nyid dang ni thur sel dang // yi ge ha yis kun nas ni// mgrin pa'i dbus na gnas pa bcings// A haM kha nas gsal bar brjod// ro 'bab pa yi
198b7(rgyud 'bum): khrung khrung ni/ / ro sgyur ba zhes bya bar gsungs// bkug nas rtag tu khyab par byed// gzugs kyi khams ni 'bar ba'o// ha dang de bzhin yi ge u// de ni yi ge ma dang gsum// rkang pa nas
199a1(rgyud 'bum): ni mgo mtha'i bar/ / 'khor lo gzhi yi don bsdus pa// ha ni brur sel ming can rlung // bshang sgo gsang ba'i dbus na gnas// yi ge U ni khyab byed rlung // mgrin pa pad+ma'i
199a2(rgyud 'bum): dbus na gnas/ / yi ge ma ni srog rlung yin// dpral ba rlung gi 'khor lo la// de dag gcig gyur snying kha nas// thugs kyi sa bon du ni brjod// mi bskyod snying po kha dog gnag/ gzugs med khams
199a3(rgyud 'bum): kyi ming can no/ / sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi// snying po gsum du rab tu bshad// lag na rdo rjes thal sbyar nas// slar yang thams cad mkhyen la zhus// rdo rje gsum gyi sngags don dang // gnas kyi dbye
199a4(rgyud 'bum): pa 'tshal lags na/ / 'di rnams dbus na bdag po gang // ji lta bu zhig gtso bos gsungs// gtso bo rdo rje 'chang ba che// bcom ldan 'das kyis sngar gsungs pa// gsang ba'i mchod pa gsungs pa yi//
199a5(rgyud 'bum): sbas pa'i don ni khyod 'dri ba// rgyud rnams kun tu ma gsungs pa// rab tu bshad kyis mnyan par gyis// thugs kyis sa bon bdag po ste// kun gyi nang na rnam rtog med// gang phyir gtso bos gzhan
199a6(rgyud 'bum): rnams ni/ / sgrib dang de bzhin 'phrog pa dang // rnam par rtog pa'i rlung gnyis ni// lus kun la ni khyab par byed// sna yi bu ga las ni rgyu// lus la rtag tu 'byung bar byed// 'gro ba drug gi 'khor
199a7(rgyud 'bum): lo'i lam/ / gang gi stobs kyis khyab par byed// gsum pa rnal 'byor pa yis rtogs// rnam rtog med par rmad byung che// rlung rnams thams cad 'gags pas na// skyes pa de ni rtogs pa'o//
199b1(rgyud 'bum): rlung ni thams cad 'gog pa yang // yang dag rigs par nga yis bshad// sprul pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i dbus// rgyud 'di pad+ma gnyis su gsungs// drug cu rtsa bzhi brgyad 'dab gnyis// steng dang
199b2(rgyud 'bum): 'og tu kha bltas nas/ / slar yang kha sbyor tshul du gnas// srog dang thur sel rgyu bar byed// de nyid rtog pa dang bcas pa// rlung gnyis su ni gsal bar gsungs// sku dang gsung gi snying po gnyis// la la
199b3(rgyud 'bum): nA dang ra sa nA/ / a ba d+hU tI mchog gi gnas// de gnyis dbus ma mchog gi mchog/ rnam rtog med pa rlung gi rlung // rtag tu rgyu zhing kun la khyab// rnam rtag gang thob rtag tu ni// las kun byed cing
199b4(rgyud 'bum): mkhas par 'gyur/ / rlung gi rang bzhin bye brag ni// brgya dang brgyad la gang rgyal ba// dus kun tu ni 'bel bar rigs// rnal 'byor byis pas mi shes pa// skad cig gcig mngon rdzogs byang chub//
199b5(rgyud 'bum): de yis thob par rgyud 'dir gsungs// de ni gang tshe skad cig thob// de ni skad cig mchog tu gsungs// de yang ji ltar thob par byed// de la rigs pa ru ni brjod// thog mar rnal 'byor pa chen po// blo bzang
199b6(rgyud 'bum): gis ni zhi gnas sgom/ / bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis// khro bo'i phyag rgya byas nas kyang // dbang po yi ni sgo dgu la// thams cad du ni kun rdzob pa// hUM bzlas pa ni mtshungs pa med// mchog tu rgyun mi
