199b7(rgyud 'bum): 'chad par ni/ / zla ba gcig tu bzlas byas na// de rjes skad cig de la thob// gang phyir de ni bzlas byas na// snying kha'i pad+ma'ang steng bltas 'gro// de nas gsang ba'i pad+ma las// kha sbyor ba ni de bas kyang //
200a1(rgyud 'bum): rnam par rtog pa'i rlung gnyis ni// de las rnam par bcas nas 'gro// rnam rtog med pa'i rlung chen po// sku gsung rdo rje bcad nas ni// rnam rtog med pa'i bde ba ste// sngags kyi de nyid
200a2(rgyud 'bum): kyis ni 'thob/ / a ba d+hU tI'i rgyun la gnas// smin dbus rlung gi phye byas pa// de thob byas pa'i dga' ba ni// rgyun du 'chang zhing mi zad pa// chags sogs bral zhing zhi ba dang // rang rig bde ba
200a3(rgyud 'bum): chen po'o/ / 'dir ni rgyu mtshan bshad par bya// sngags grub pa yi rnal 'byor pas// 'dar dang rdul dang ba spu langs// rtag tu dga' ba'i bsam pa dang // gdong ni zangs mdog yid du 'ong // kun gyis
200a4(rgyud 'bum): mthong dang dga' ba dang / / gra lhags chad pa la sogs dang // 'jig rten chos dang de bzhin gnas// rnal 'byor sngags kyi de nyid ni// gnod pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje
200a5(rgyud 'bum): 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ sku gsum gyi snying po bshad pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// de nyid gsum gyi tshig bstan
200a6(rgyud 'bum): bya bdag nyid sngags sogs byed pa yis/ / ji lta ba bzhin rim pa rnams// bdag gi de nyid rnal 'byor mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi rgyu// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin bdag/ sangs rgyas
200a7(rgyud 'bum): kun gyi sku gcig pa/ / kun mkhyen go 'phang mi gsal byed// rigs kyi dbye bas rab gsal byed// rigs ni lnga yi rnam pa gang // de ni phung po'i mtshan nyid do// tha rags la sogs dbye ba yis//
200b1(rgyud 'bum): thogs bcas thogs med mtshan nyid dang // 'byung ba chen po bzhi yi dngos// 'di ni gzugs kyi phung por gsungs// der ni rnam snang ngo bo dang // thams cad spros par byed pa'i rgyu// bde dang sdug bsngal
200b2(rgyud 'bum): mchog tu zhi/ / grang dang dro ba mchog gi mchog/ gang gis shin tu rig pa ni// de ni tshor ba'i phung por bshad// rin chen 'byung ldan nyid kyi mtshan// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spros bdag nyid// glang po
200b3(rgyud 'bum): bong bu ce spyang dang / / rta dang ri dgas dang ni phag/ pha dang ma dang pha yi spun// mdza' bo snag gi gnyen tshan sogs// gang gis yang dag shes pa ni// 'du shes phung po'i mtshan nyid ni// de bzhin gshegs
200b4(rgyud 'bum): pa 'od dpag med/ / de ni spros pa kun nas gsal// 'gro ba khyab par yongs su shes// dge dang mi dge'i las 'bras bu// gzhan yang lung du ma bstan min// de yi 'du byed du ni bshad// de na yod spro//
200b5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rang bzhin can// 'khor ba dngos dang dngos med sogs// kun rtogs 'byung ba'i bdag nyid can// rnam shes zhes ni rnam par shes// mi bskyod spro ba'i bdag nyid can// de ltar phung po yengs shes na//
200b6(rgyud 'bum): lung dang rig pa'i shes pa skyes// dzi na dzi ka dang rat+na d+h+r-i ka/ a ro li ka dang pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika/ badz+ra d+h+r-ika ces bya ba'i sngags// ci rigs par ni rim bzhin shes// spyan la sogs pa bzhi po gang // de ni khams
200b7(rgyud 'bum): gsum yongs su brtag/ sra ba la sogs bzhir phye bas// sa yi khams su yongs su brtag/ gti mug dga' bas mngon par brjod// de yi spyan du yongs su grags// zhu ba ci mchi khu ba sogs// rdzas kyi rtse
201a1(rgyud 'bum): zag yang dag bsten/ / chu yi khams su rnam par shes// mA ma kI yi bdag nyid can// dro ba bza' btung smin pa dang // gzi brjid 'phro ba nyid thams cad// me yi khams su shes par bya//
201a2(rgyud 'bum): gos dkar spro ba'i bdag nyid can// 'byung ba rngub par rab tu 'phel// rlung rnams kyi ni tshogs kyi mchog/ brkyang ba dang ni bskum pa dang // steng dang 'og tu byed pa dag/ de ni rlung gi khams su shes// sgrol ma spro
201a3(rgyud 'bum): ba'i bdag nyid can/ / de ltar 'byung ba bzhi po yang // rnal 'byor mchog nyid rnam par shes// mo ha ra ti dwe Sha ra ti// rA ga ra ti badz+ra ra ti// de ltar rim pas sngags rnams ni// de dag mngon sum
201a4(rgyud 'bum): cho ga yis/ / gzugs la sogs pa yul gyi tshogs// lha mo'i gzugs kyi mtshan nyid du// rnal 'byor mchog gis rnam par shes// stong nyid gcig pu rgyu gcig pu// sngo ser sogs kyi
201a5(rgyud 'bum): dbye ba dang / / ring dang thung ba'i rnam pa yi// lha mo de gzugs rdo rje ma// phyi rol gzung ba'i rang bzhin can// mkhar rnga sil snyan sbugs rol mo// de bzhin rnga snyan pi wang dang // bstod dang smad
201a6(rgyud 'bum): sogs sgra dag ni/ / sgra yi rdo rje ma zhes bya// gzung ba dang ni rang bzhin mchog/ rnam par shes pa sad par byed// dri nga ba dang dri bzang dang // sbyar ba'i dri yi mchog rnams ni// dri yi rdo rje mar shes
201a7(rgyud 'bum): byagazung ba'i rnam shes cher dmar ba/ / ro drug mchog tu ldan pa ni// lan tshwa sgyur la sogs dbye yis// rdo rje ro mar de shes bya// kun kyang gzung ba'i rnam pa'o// mig sogs dbang po la
201b1(rgyud 'bum): brten pa/ / rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad ni// rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du// byang chub sems dpa' brgyad du shes// byang chub sems dpa'i bdag nyid che// mig gnyis sa yi snying por gsungs//
201b2(rgyud 'bum): gzugs la sogs pa ci rigs par// rang gi ngo bo spro bar byed// sgra yi rnam pa thams cad nas// bye brag so so ci rigs par// sgra yi rnam par shes pa ni// phyag na rdo rjer yang dag bshad// dri yi bye/
201b3(rgyud 'bum): brag la spyod pa// so sor ji ltar rig pa ni// sna yi rnam shes mtshan nyid ni// nam mkha'i snying por rnam par shes// ro yi bye brag la spyod pa// dbye ba so so'i go rims bzhin// lce yi rnam shes mtshan
201b4(rgyud 'bum): nyid ni/ / 'jig rten dbang phyug tu ni shes// reg bya'i bye brag la spyod pa// bye brag so so'i go rims bzhin// reg bya'i rnam shes mtshan nyid ni// sgrib pa rnam par sel bar shes// yid kyi bye brag
201b5(rgyud 'bum): la spyod pa/ / dbye ba so so'i go rims bzhin// yid kyi rnam shes zhes gsungs pa// 'jam dpal zhes bya'i ming can no// rgyus pa kun la yang dag sbyor// dbye ba so so'i go rims bzhin// 'ag
201b6(rgyud 'bum): chags yul gyi bdag nyid can/ / byams pa ru ni rnam par shes// rtsa rnams so so'i mtshan nyid can// bde ba kun gyi gzhi yi mchog/ dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin can// 'di ni kun tu bzang por bshad//
201b7(rgyud 'bum): de ltar rnam shes tshogs brgyad mchog/ yang dag de nyid bla na med// mig sogs dbang po'i rnam shes ni// gzugs sogs mthong ba'i rang bzhin no// rje ngar dpung pa brla thal gong // sgo gnyis dang ni
202a1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi/ / shes pa bcu yi mtshan nyid ni// khyab pa rnams su yongs su shes// gshin rje mthar byed shes mthar byed// pad+ma mthar byed bgegs mthar byed// 'dod pa'i
202a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po mi g.yo ba/ / dbyug sngon dang ni stobs po che// gnod mdzes gtsug tor 'khor lo sgyur// de ltar de rnams gnas dbye bas// ye shes gsum gyi yongs su gsal// ngo bo gcig tu gyur nas
202a3(rgyud 'bum): niyang dag de kho na nyid rten/ / gang gis de nyid cho ga bzhin// bla ma brgyud pa las shes bya// sngags kyi de nyid rnal 'byor mchog/ ye shes chen po legs rgyas pa// skye med zad med mi gsal
202a4(rgyud 'bum): dang / 'gyur ba med cing sgrib pa med// gnyis med 'jigs bral zhi ba dang // bde ba chen po'i go 'phang mchog/ sbrul dang btus dang mtha' med dang // mgo med yongs su dbye ba yis// oM dang
202a5(rgyud 'bum): hUM phaT swA hA'i mtha'/ / sbrul zhes bya ba mngon par brjod// rang ming yon tan dang ni gzugs// btus pa'i mtshan nyid ming can no// oM la sogs pa zhabs med pa// mtha' med ces bya'i ming
202a6(rgyud 'bum): can no/ / sA'i mtha' can oM med pa// mgo med ces ni bshad pa yin// thams cad yod la oM med pa// mgo med ces ni bshad pa yin// de ltar mtshan nyid shes nas ni// sngags kyi de
202a7(rgyud 'bum): nyid bla na med/ / rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas// 'di yi rgya chen don shes bya// ye shes de nyid rnal 'byor mchog/ gnyis pa thams cad rnam par spangs// dbang po thams cad mnyam par sbyor//
202b1(rgyud 'bum): dngos po thams cad gcig pu'i lus// ngag gi rnam rtog kun tu spangs// snang ba thams cad rnam par spangs// bdag byin brlabs pa'i rang bzhin can// kun la khyab pa rmad du byung // rang rig pa
202b2(rgyud 'bum): yi rnal 'byor mchog/ skad cig bzhi yi mtshan nyid ni// cha bral kun 'gro khyab pa dang // rnal 'byor byis pa mi shes shing // kun rdzob yongs su mi shes pa// don dam rang gi ngo bo ni//
202b3(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs pa'i rim pas dbye ba dang // sngags de nyid ni rab tu gsal// a ni de nyid mtha' thig ler// yang dag thim par rnam par sgom// thig le yang ni a la thim// a ni mtha' yi ha
202b4(rgyud 'bum): tsam la'o/ / ha yang yi ge hUM la'o// yi ge A ni haM la'o// yi ge haM yang ai la thim// yi ge a ni thig le tsam// thig le yang ni sgra la thim// sgra yang sgra tsam la ni'o// sgra tsam mchog ni nam
202b5(rgyud 'bum): mkha' la'o/ / de yang 'od gsal ba la thim// 'od gsal go 'phang gsal ba ni// shin tu rnam dag chos dbyings te// gnyis su med pa'i ye shes mchog/ rab tu sad cing rab tu 'char// ngag gi
202b6(rgyud 'bum): spyod pa rnams dang bral/ / gnyis pa thams cad rnam par spangs// phung po lnga ni gcig pu'i gzhi// 'byung ba lnga ni yang dag bstan// rnam shes brgyad ni tshogs dben pa// phyi yi yul drug bsdus pa ni// /
202b7(rgyud 'bum): rlung bcus shes pa bcu bsdus pa// de ltar mtshan nyid kun bsdus pa'o// kun nas spro ba'i rnal 'byor gyis// gang gis bzhugs gnas srid pa gsum// dngos grub kun byed dpal dang ldan//
203a1(rgyud 'bum): skal ba bzang po kun 'phel ba// rdo rje de ni rdo rje sems// rdo rje 'jig byed dbang phyug dang // he ru ka dang dus 'khor lo// dang po'i sangs rgyas thub pa che// kun tu bzang po
203a2(rgyud 'bum): 'jam dpal dang / / sna tshogs spro ba'i bdag nyid can// sna tshogs yon tan tshogs kyi gzhi// kun nas spro ba'i rnal 'byor ni// rnal 'byor chen po dri ma med// ye shes de nyid gsal ba ni// rtog
203a3(rgyud 'bum): pa med cing gnas pa med/ / chos dbyings 'pho ba zhes bshad do// bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i mtshan nyid dag/ sgra yi rtse mo brgyad stong 'dra// shin tu gsal zhing 'od gsal ba// lung dang rig pa'i dbye
203a4(rgyud 'bum): pab yis/ / bla ma brgyud pa las ni shes// de ltar de nyid gsum dam tshig/ zhal nas brgyud pa'i rim pa skye// gsang ba yi ni ye shes mchog/ bzhi pa'i mtshan nyid skad cig mchog/ rnal 'byor chen
203a5(rgyud 'bum): po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ de kho na nyid gsum gyi dam tshig gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad kyis
203a6(rgyud 'bum): nyon/ / sna rtse gsum gyi mtshan nyid ni// gsang ba snying kha gdong sna'i ming // gsum po rgyud las gsal ba ni// 'khor lo gsum gyi dbye ba yis// rnal 'byor pa yi sgom pa'i rim// shin tu chags
203a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dbang song ba'i/ / sems kyi bde ba ster bar byed// rlung gi de nyid sbyor ba yis// rtsa yi 'khor lo sad par byed// bde ba chen po kun nas skye// khams gsum ro gcig gyur nas ni// dgug dbang chog
203b1(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du bya/ / byang chub sems ni bde ba che// lhan skyes skad cig mtshan nyid ni// rdo rje rtse mor gzung bar bya// de nyid bde ba chen po ste// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin can// kun rtog thams cad rnam par
203b2(rgyud 'bum): spangs/ / gsang ba'i sna rtser rdzas thig le// yang dag gzungs pa'i bdag nyid can// chags chen sems ni gcig pa yis// rnal 'byor mchog tu shes par bya// pad 'dab drug cu rtsa bzhi la// rtsa yi
203b3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo rim bzhin 'char/ / de yi lte ba skur ni bshad// gsang bar bde ba thams cad star// snying kha'i pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad// de yang lte ba snar ni brjod// zhe sdang nyid kyi sems ni bsgom// gsang sngags 'bar ba'i ye shes sems//
203b4(rgyud 'bum): yang dag spro bar byed pa'i rgyu// ngag ni rtog pa kun spangs pa// rmad byung chen po ye shes mchog/ rtag tu sngags ni nA da 'byung // rnam rtog med pa'i bde ba che// bsam gtan la sbyor bde ba'i mchog/ man ngag
203b5(rgyud 'bum): thob pas bde ba rgyal/ / zhe sdang myur du dbang byas nas// zhi ba'i de nyid rgyu gcig ni// zla ba nyi ma me dang gsum// lam gsum gyi ni dbus nas khyab// gdong gi sna ni zhes byar bshad// rlung rnams gnas kyi
203b6(rgyud 'bum): mtshan nyid dang / / de la gnas pa'i ye shes che// thig le mu tig gis gnon yin// bsam gtan gti mug mchog las rgyal// dngos po thams cad rnam par spangs// ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid gsal//
203b7(rgyud 'bum): de kho na nyid lnga brtan mchog/ de yi 'od zer thig le tsam// gdong gi sna rtser yang dag brten// rnal 'byor mchog ni bsgom par bya// gti mug rgya mtsho las ni rgyal// de nyid dam tshig sems dpa' yi/
204a1(rgyud 'bum): ming can du ni yang dag bshad// sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig ni// ye shes lnga yi mtshan nyid can// rnal 'byor mkhas pa rnams kyis ni// gti mug mun pa rnams 'joms pa//
204a2(rgyud 'bum): kun mkhyen rtog pa'i mtshan nyid ni// sangs rgyas lnga yi rigs gnas na// sna rtse bu ga las byung zhing // rlung lnga steng du yang dag rgyu// kun rdzob lngar ni rgyu ba yi// sgo de las ni rnam par byung // g.yon pa
204a3(rgyud 'bum): g.yas dang gnyis ka dang / / dal bar rgyu dang rnam pa bzhi// g.yas pa las ni 'byung ba'i khams// me yi dkyil 'khor nyid yin te// kha dog dmar ba bzang po 'di// pad+ma mgon po rgyu ba'o// g.yon pa nas
204a4(rgyud 'bum): ni 'byung ba'i khams/ / rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang 'dres pa// ljang ser dag tu snang ba ste// dbang chen gyi ni dkyil 'khor nyid// rin chen mgon po rgyu ba'o// dal zhing rgyu ba med pa'i khams// dag pa'i shel
204a5(rgyud 'bum): ltar snang ba ni/ / 'di ni chu yi dkyil 'khor te// rdo rje mgon po rgyu ba'o// khams gsum las ni yang dag byung // rten dang brten par bzung ba ni// rnam par snang mdzad rang bzhin te// 'chi ba'i mthar ni 'byung bar
204a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / dkyil 'khor bzhi po de dag ni// mnyam par gzhag pas rtag tu zlos// sngags bzlas pa yi grangs kyis ni// nyin mtshan rtag tu zlos pa yin// de ltar rlung ni sna rtser ni// kha dog lnga par
204a7(rgyud 'bum): rnam par sgom/ / gnyis med mchog gi rnal 'byor gyis// 'od zer tshogs ni dri ma med// de yi zhi sogs bya ba ni// rim gyis sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpar 'gro bar 'gyur// rdo rje
204b1(rgyud 'bum): / sems dpa' 'gro mgon la// de nas lag na rdo rjes zhus// thig le gsum gyi gzhung lugs ni// khyod zhabs bsnyen bkur gyis 'tshal na// 'di la cung zad the tsom mchis// srid pa mthar mdzad gsal bar
204b2(rgyud 'bum): mdzad/ / rdzas dang sngags dang de bzhin rlung // thig le gsum ni bsgom pa na// rnal 'byor pa gcig nyid dam ni// yang na rnal 'byor so sor sgom// de la the tshom kun gcod gtso// bcom ldan rdo rje sems
204b3(rgyud 'bum): dpas gsungs/ / yun rings chags chen dbang song bas// srid pa gsum du skyob pa rnams// de dag 'gro ba'i don du ni// rdzas kyi thig le gsungs pa yin// zhe sdang chen po dbang song ba// mi gang mi bsrun
204b4(rgyud 'bum): pa yi lus/ / de rnams myur du grol don du// sngags kyi thig ler gsungs pa yin// gti mug chen pos kun nas 'khrul// srid pa'i rgya mtsho las skyob gang // de dag dngos grub brgyad 'bras bu//
204b5(rgyud 'bum): thob phyir ye shes rgya mtsho ni// rlung gi thig ler gsungs pa yin// yang dag de nyid spros pa ni// de ltar yang dag thig le gsum// bsam pa ji bzhin sbyor ji bzhin// tshe 'di nyid la grub don du// sgrib pa thams cad
204b6(rgyud 'bum): dag pa'i phyir/ / rtse gcig pa yi sems kyis ni// ye shes gsum gnas nyams dga' ba// me tog 'bras bu chu yi brgyan// skye bos dben pa'i ri yi rtser// dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa ni// 'bad pa yis ni bsgrub
204b7(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ sna'i rtse mo gsum gtan la phab pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad
205a1(rgyud 'bum): kyis nyon/ / stong nyid ye shes mtshan nyid ni// lus la gnas pa de nyid mchog/ thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// chos rnams thams cad snang bar byed// mtshan nyid
205a2(rgyud 'bum): stong pa nyid du 'dod/ / de las ya shes bde ba che// 'od gsal ba ni rnam dag pa// gang phyir a ba d+hU tIr bzhugs// yang dag stong pa nyid du 'dod// chos rnams rnam rtog snang ba mched// rtog pa
205a3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad gcod par byed/ / rnam rtog rlung gi ngal bso ba// de ni stong pa nyid du bshad// gtso bo chen po mi bskyod pa'i// 'jig rten khams ni de nyid do// der ni rtag tu bzhugs pa'i sa// srog
205a4(rgyud 'bum): gi ye shes ming can te/ / gzugs med drag po chen po yi// zhi ba'i rang bzhin mtshan nyid can// de la ye shes bde ba che// byang chub sems kyis gang ba nyid// de nyid bde chen go 'phang gnas//
205a5(rgyud 'bum): ye shes yang dag byang chub sems// de la sogs pa ming gi sgras// brjod bya gcig pu bde ba che// dngos po gcig dang ldan pa nyid// stong nyid ye shes zhes ni brjod// bde ba can zhes de la bshad// bde
205a6(rgyud 'bum): bapa dge ba'i thob mtshan nyid/ / gang de bde bar gnas pa ni// de ni bde ba can zhes brjod// tshe dpag med pa'i zhing khams na// bde ba kun gyi gzhi yi mchog/ byang chub sems ni tshe dpag med// de las
205a7(rgyud 'bum): byung ba'i skyed pa'i 'od/ / de phyir 'od dpag med du shes// bde ba kun gyi gzhi yi mchog/ stong nyid rdo rje dbyings dbang phyug/ de nyid mnyam par sbyor ba ni// stong nyid ye shes zhes ni brjod// shes rab
205b1(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma la la nA/ / zla mtshan nyi ma 'bab pa na// de yang stong par rnam par shes// gnyis pa thams cad rnam par spangs// thabs kyi rdo rje ra sa nA// zla ba shu kra rab tu 'bab// de ni ye shes mchog tu
205b2(rgyud 'bum): gsungs/ / bde ba chen po'i go 'phang mchog/ de gnyis sbyor ba mchog tu shes// stong nyid ye shes mi zad pa// zla ba nya dang de nyid yin// rnal 'byor ma yi zhal las shes// rnal 'byor chen po'i
205b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ stong pa nyid kyi tshig bshad pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// lus ni stong pa nyid kyi
205b4(rgyud 'bum): gnas/ / lus ni gang gis shes pa ni// lha rnams kun gyi pho brang mchog/ longs spyod chos dang sprul pa dang // bde ba chen po yi ni rten// 'khor lo yang ni gang bshad pa// rim pa ji bzhin ma lus
205b5(rgyud 'bum): pas de ltar rtag tu yang dag bzhugs/ / thim dang longs spyod bdag po ni// lha nyid mchog tu gnyis su med// yang dag ngo bo'i go 'phang rten// ye shes chen po'i go 'phang phyir// bde ba chen po'i yang
205b6(rgyud 'bum): dag rten/ / zhe sdang che dang gti mug che// phrag dog che dang chags dngos kyis// khro bo che dang rnam pa'i mchog/ 'khor ba'i mdud pa nges gcod pa// sa dang chu dang de bzhin me// rlung dang nam mkha'i dbye ba yis//
205b7(rgyud 'bum): gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri// ro dang reg bya nyid dang ni// chos kyi dbyings dang mig bzang dang // rna ba sna dang lce dang ni// lus kyi rnam shes chos dang ni// kun gzhi nyon mongs can gyi yid// dad dang
206a1(rgyud 'bum): brtson 'grus dran ting 'dzin/ / shes rab dbang po'i dbye ba yis// dang stobs brtson 'grus stobs dang ni// dran pa'i stobs dang ting 'dzin stobs// shes rab stobs ni
206a2(rgyud 'bum): za na med/ / ji bzhin gnas su yang dag shes// lus kyi lha ru gsal ba yin// sngon bzhin ming gi dbye ba yis// sngags kyi dbye bas rim pa dang // sngags dgod pa yi rnal 'byor gyis//
206a3(rgyud 'bum): rim bzhin gnas kyi dbye ba yis// lung gis rnam par nges byas pa'i// yang dag gnas kyi dbye ba dang // lha mo rtag tu rnal 'byor pas// bdag la byin rlabs go 'phang gnas// 'dod pa lnga la longs spyod
206a4(rgyud 'bum): cing / / rab tu 'bad de mchod pa byas// rdo shing sa yi rang bzhin gyi// phyi rol lha la phyag mi bya// bdag la byin rlabs rim de nyid// gzhan du srid pa gsum na med// de kho na nyid rnal 'byor mchog
206a5(rgyud 'bum): bdag la byin rlabs sgrib med pa/ / sngags dang phyag rgya'i rim pa sogs// phyi yi dngos po mi bsgrung ste// de nyid thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa// rnal 'byor ma la mchog tu ni// 'bad pas byin gyis
206a6(rgyud 'bum): brlab par 'dod/ / bdag byin rlob thabs mtshan nyid do// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ lus kyi lha ye shes kyi mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa
206a7(rgyud 'bum): drug pa'o/ / / de nas gzhan yang lha mo yi// de rnams kyi ni ming bshad bya// 'khor lo bzhi yi dbye ba yis// rtsa yi rim pa'i grangs kyis ni// las dang rdo rje pad+ma dang /
206b1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo la sogs rigs dbye bas// rim pa bzhi yi dbye ba yis// rtsa yi rim pas yang dag bzhugs// 'dir ni rigs ni lnga par yang // de kho na nyid nyams myong mchog/ tshor ba nyams su myong ba yi//
206b2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad la ni khyab par gnas// sprul pa rang gi rigs las skyes// lha mo 'di dag yang dag zhugs// mkhyen ma gtum mo dpa' mo ma// las sgrol ba dang yid gzugs ma// 'khrul 'khor ma dang
206b3(rgyud 'bum): 'bud ma dang / / snying stobs yang dag sangs rgyas ma// rab dang ma dang yid 'ong ma// sgrub ma sprul 'tsho sgra ma dang // gter 'dzin lha yi dbang phyug ma// gser pad+ma dang dri med ma// rlung gi lu gu rgyud
206b4(rgyud 'bum): byed ma/ / bzang mo dang ni khwa yi gdong // gnyid log ma dang mi 'phel ma// 'phar ma sngo bsangs dus mtshan ma// rtse 'joms ma dang skal bzang 'phel// na ga dza na byi gdong ma// chags ma dga' ma rnam
206b5(rgyud 'bum): sgeg ma/ / brtson 'grus 'phel dang dkar mo dang // bdud rtsi lnga ni 'phel ba ma// dngos 'bebs shin tu dpa' mo dang // pad+ma lnga dang 'dod ma dang // sgyu ma yid 'ong mdza' mo dang // skyur dang chang gi dbang phyug ma//
206b6(rgyud 'bum): mi bzad che dang las skal bzang // me tog bzang mo bdug rmongs ma// steng gzigs zhal dang rtse gsum mtshan// mdzes ma dang ni ljang bskyod ma// rtag bam ma dang gar ma dang // ri dgas mig dang chags dga' ma//
206b7(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs rmongs par rol pa so// dkar mo 'jig rten gsum pa mo// ro bran dri med 'gro bstun ma// ral ga rnams ni yang dag bzhugs// rtag tu brgyad dang spel ba'i grangs// zhal gsum phyag drug dri ma med//
207a1(rgyud 'bum): rigs su phyug sa skye bA yis/ mtshan rna rnams kyis ya dag brgyan// de dag snga tshogs rdo rdzogasas// g.yon pa 'gying bas sa smrab// gsus na 'khor po rin chen dang /
207a2(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin ral gri chos 'byung ni// g.yon gyi phyag gnyis la ni 'gyur// sems dpa'i skyil krung gis legs bzhugs// zhal ni ljang khu spyan gsum pa// don yod grub pa'i cod pan can// zhal rnams bzhad
207a3(rgyud 'bum): par sgom pa dang / / bde ba thams cad 'phel bar byed// rang gi ming gi dbye ba yis// yi ge gsum dang rnam par sprul// sngags kyis kyang ni yang dag mchod// 'dod pa'i de nyid rab stsol mdzad// chos kyi
207a4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo rtsa brgyad dbus/ / lha 'di dag ni yang dag bzhugs// rdor dbyings dbang phyug lA ma dang // rdo rje phyag rgya stobs chen mo// rdo rje sgeg mo rdo rje gdong // rdo rje chos ma rdo rje bzang // rdo rje rol mor shes par bya//
207a5(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi 'khor lor dgu bdag nyid// zhal gsum phyag drug rnam pa dang // sems dpa'i skyil krung gis legs bzhugs// rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen dang // g.yas pa yi ni phyag na 'dzin// g.yon na ral gri pad+ma
207a6(rgyud 'bum): dang / / dril bu 'dzin pa bla na med// sku mdog sngon po spyan gsum pa// zhal gyi mche ba cung zad gtsigs// rang ming yi ge gsum dang spel// sngags kyis de dag rab tu mchod// longs spyod 'dab ma bcu drug la/
207a7(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma'i dbus na lha rnams bzhugs// pad+ma'i sgrol ma pad dkar mo// pad+ma ku mu dA 'phel ma// pad+ma'i spyan dang pad gtsug pud// pad+ma'i 'phreng ba bad skyes ma// bad gdan ma yi dra ba ma// de bzhin pad+ma'i 'od dang ni//
207b1(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma'i spyan dang pad bzang ma// pad+ma'i nang bzhugs pad skyes ma// pad+ma'i ge sar pad+ma ma// de ltar 'di ni yang dag bshad// zhal gsum phyag drug rnam pa can// sems dpa'i skyil krung gis legs bzhugs//
207b2(rgyud 'bum): g.yas na pad+ma 'khor lo dang // rdo rje yang ni 'debs par mdzad// g.yon na ral gri dril bu dang // rin po che yis rnam par sgeg/ spyan gsum rnam par 'char ba dang // pad+ma dmar po'i mdor ltar dmar// nyi ma'i
207b3(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor nyer bzhugs shing / / sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs// rang ming yi ge gsum dang bcas// 'di rnams sngags ni bla na med// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo che// pad 'dab sum cu rtsa
207b4(rgyud 'bum): gnyis la/ / rtag tu lha mo rnams ni bzhugs// rab tu sad pa 'bad pa can// 'khor lo'i shugs ma rdo rje ldan// rin chen sgrol ma pad zhugs ma// sna tshogs las ma gti mug dga'// zhe sdang rdo rje dga'
207b5(rgyud 'bum): chags ma/ / rdo rje las chags gzugs rdo rje// sgra yi rdo rje ro rdo rje// reg bya rdo rje chos dbyings ma// spyan 'od ma dang thod dbyangs ma// sna yi snang ba ro dga' ma// sku yi rgyal mtshan yid dga' ma//
207b6(rgyud 'bum): khams bcas ma dang rgyu 'bab ma// gshin rje 'joms pa'i bro yi ni// bye brag rnam par rgyas ma dang // pad+ma'i ral pa gyen du brdzes// bgegs rnams thams cad 'joms pa mo// sbas pa'i mthil dang
207b7(rgyud 'bum): dbyug sngon ma/ / shin tu bstan ma stobs chen ma// rang byung ma dang 'khor lo'i gtsug/ de ltar rtsa yi dbus nas shar// slar yang lha mo zhal gsum dang // phyag drug bde ba 'phel ba can// zla ba'i dkyil
208a1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor la yang bzhugs/ / dri med pad+ma dkar mo'i mdog/ zhi ba zhal gsum spyan gsum pa// g.yas pa'i phyag na bsnams pa ni// 'khor lo lcags kyu rdo rje rim// de bzhin g.yon pa'i
208a2(rgyud 'bum): phyag gsum la/ / pad+ma zhags pa rin po che// 'char dang 'debs dang sgeg par mdzad// pad+ma dkar po 'dra ba'i 'od// spyi bor rnam par snang mdzad 'chang // rang gi ming dang yig gsum ming // 'di dag sngags ni go rims
208a3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin/ / de nyid mchog ni rab tu gsal// sku gsung thugs kyi sdom pa ni// de lta bu yi sdom pa mchog/ lha mo rnams kyi de nyid mchog/ rtag tu gnyid log lus la gnas// 'dod pa lnga yi longs spyod bsten//
208a4(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa nyid kyis yang dag mnyes// rdo rje pad+ma'i bde bas myos// rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang mchog/ mnyes nas slar yang gso bar byed// de yi zhi sogs bya ba rnams// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom mad//
208a5(rgyud 'bum): bsam gtan rnal 'byor sogs spyod dang // sngags dbyibs la sogs bya ba ni// dgos med mchog tu cung zad ni// bla ma'i lung las yang dag skyes// de phyir rdo rje slob dpon ni// 'bad pas dngos grub kyis
208a6(rgyud 'bum): mnyes bya/ / rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ 'khor lo bzhi'i lha mo rim pa rnam par phye ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang
208a7(rgyud 'bum): bshad bya ba/ / 'char dang nub pa'i mtshan nyid ni// phu rnams kyi ni rnal 'byor mchog/ dngos grub thams cad kyi ni gnas// mdun gnas pa yi yul rnams las// yid la byed pas der mi 'gro//
208b1(rgyud 'bum): sngon gyi bag chags nang gnas pa// de tshe dbang po rab tu gsal// de yis de ni rab tu sad// de rnams rtsa la rim bzhin gnas// rab sad de yis sad byas nas// lha mo rang yang 'khor lo las// de yis 'char ba'i
208b2(rgyud 'bum): rim par gsungs/ / nub pa yang ni bshad par bya// yul rnams kyang ni dngos bral med// yid la byed nas gzhan du gnas// bag chags kyang ni sad mi sad// rtsa rnams 'char bar mi 'gyur zhing // lha rnams
208b3(rgyud 'bum): yang dag sad par ni/ / de yi phyir ni mi 'gyur te// snying gi dbus nas bde ba'i dngos// sangs rgyas nyi ma gsal ba'i 'od// gzung dang 'dzin pa'i gzugs kyis kyang // de ni 'od zer bcu gnyis te// 'od
208b4(rgyud 'bum): 'phel 'od zer gzi brjid ma/ / gsal ba 'bar ma 'od 'bar ma// mig la sogs pa la brten nas// phyi rol gzugs sogs 'dzin pa'o// mun sel 'od ma snang ba mo// gsal mdzes gsal 'od nyi ma
208b5(rgyud 'bum): gsal/ / phyi rol gzugs sogs rnam pa'o// drug po 'di dag 'og tu 'dod// lha mo rnams ni gang 'char ba'ang // ye shes nyi ma 'char ba yin// de yang yang dag nub pa ni// de yang mchog tu nub pa'o//
208b6(rgyud 'bum): 'char ba nub pa rnams 'chad pa// go 'phang mchog tu shes par bya// rnal 'byor chen po lags par sad// sangs rgyas nyi ma sdom pa'o// 'di ni rnal 'byor de nyid mchog/ 'char dang nub pa'i mtshan
208b7(rgyud 'bum): nyid do/ / rdo rje gsang ba'i rjes 'brang nas// bla ma brgyud pa las shes bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ 'char ba dang nub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o//
209a1(rgyud 'bum): de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// dga' ba bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid ni// gang gis yang dag shes pa yis// rdo rje sems dpa' go 'phang mchog/ de ni rtsa yi 'khor lo la// slar
209a2(rgyud 'bum): yang rgyas dang bsdus pa yis/ / 'khor lo bzhi yi yang dag sbyor// rtsa rnams brgyad dang gnyis lhag pa// mtshams kyi rtsa yi rim pa yang // rtsa ni bcu drug la yang brten// bzhi dang bzhi yis rtag tu khyab//
209a3(rgyud 'bum): de rnams dga' ba'i rim pa'o// chu khams khong du chud pa can// pad+ma'i rnal ma lta bu yis// de ni de yis khyab byas shing // bde ba chen po phan par byed// 'khor lo so so'i dbye ba yis// cha bzhi pa yi yi ge ha/
209a4(rgyud 'bum): shin tu phra ba'i cha rtag tu// khyab pa brten gyi tshul du gnas// rim pa bzhi yi dbye ba las// rim pa bcu drug dbye bas 'thob// 'phro ba'i bdag nyid rmad byung ba'o// ro gcig pa yi go 'phang 'thob// rim gyis
209a5(rgyud 'bum): so sor nyams myong las/ / sna tshogs chu yi sbyor ba las// rim gyis rgya mtsho chu bzhin du// sbyor ba bzhi yi 'khor lo'i dus// dga' ba bzhi ni de la brjod// rnal 'byor ma rgyud spyod pa las// go 'phang mchog ni
209a6(rgyud 'bum): thob par 'gyur/ / rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ dga' ba bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o// de nas gzhan yang yang dag
209a7(rgyud 'bum): nyon/ / rdo rje bstan pa'i lus kyis ni// rtag tu rtsa rnams kyi ni rgyun// de kho na nyid ngas bshad bya// stong phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni// rtsa ni rtag tu rmad byung ba// byang chub sems ni 'bab par shes// bde ba thams cad rab tu
209b1(rgyud 'bum): 'phel/ / rtag tu rmad du byung ba'i rtsa// stong phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni// khrag 'bab par ni shes par bya// nyi ma 'pho ba'i bdag nyid can// rtag tu rmad du byung ba'i rtsa// stong phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni// rlung rgyu bar ni shes
209b2(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / rgya mtsho chen po'i rgyud las ni// lus kyi gnas ni dbye ba yis// de nyid nyi shu rtsa bzhir brjod// thim dang longs spyod bdag po nyid// grangs ni bdun cu rtsa gnyis brjod// re re'ang 'khor lo stong stong ngo //
209b3(rgyud 'bum): thim pa longs spyod bdag 'dor ba// gtso bo yang ni bsdus pa las// gnas rnams kyi ni grangs su 'gyur// slar yang bsdus nas 'gro ba ni// gsum po brgyad brgyad dbye ba'ang ni// nyin dang mtshan mo'i dbye ba dang // thun
209b4(rgyud 'bum): tshod skad cig sbyor ba yis/ / rtsa rnams gong nas gong du ni// nang du 'gro bar shes par bya// g.yon pa byang chub zla ba 'bab// g.yas pa khrag dang nyi ma 'bab// dbus na rlung rgyu ba yis ni// me sad byed par shes par bya//
209b5(rgyud 'bum): la la nA dang ra sa nA// a ba d+hU tI zhes bya'i ming // de rnams spro ba'i sbyor ba yis// re re'i rim gyis thun brgyad brgyad// gsum po nyi shu rtsa bzhir 'gro// thim dang longs spyod bdag po'i phyir// rim gyis grangs ni bdun cu gnyis//
209b6(rgyud 'bum): slar yang de spro sbyor ba yis// re re'ang stong stong dbye ba yis// rtag tu grangs nyid 'gyur ba ni// stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis so// gtso bo gsum po slar yang ni// sbyor bar gcig pa nyid du 'gro// dang po las ni rnal 'byor
209b7(rgyud 'bum): pas/ / phra ba de ni shes par dka'// bsam gyis mi khyab mchog tu ni// thig le nA da rnam par spangs// bde ba kun gyi gzhi gsang ba// srog gi rten gyi mtshan nyid dang // rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug dang // dus kyi rtsa ni
210a1(rgyud 'bum): rnam par bshad/ / ro gcig go 'phang bdag nyid can// rnal 'byor ma yis rgyud las shes// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ rtswa'i 'bab pa'i
210a2(rgyud 'bum): mtshan nyid kyi go cha zhes bya ba'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o/ / // de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// mtshams kyi rtsa yi ngo bo nyid// rtsa rnams sdoms pa 'char ba ni// gang gis shes na
210a3(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu ni/ / mchog tu dga' ba nyams myong ba// lha yi ye shes gsal bar byed// lha yi sngags su yang dag sbyor// lha yi rnal 'byor don nges pa// de nyid gsum sbyor dri ma med// de gsum cig car bdag nyid
210a4(rgyud 'bum): sdom/ / 'jig rten gsum du khyab cing phra// lus kun la ni yang dag brten// ye shes sems dpa' rdo rje sems// gang phyir dam tshig sems dpa' bde// rnal 'byer mchog tu shes par bya// khyab pa'i de nyid rmad byung
210a5(rgyud 'bum): ba/ mchog rab mchog dang phra ba dang // rang byung ye shes mi zad pa// byang sems sum cu rtsa gnyis 'bab// rtsa ni thams cad mchog tu rgyas// bde ba chen po'i 'khor ler gnas// cha kun bdag nyid rtsa ba ni// de yi
210a6(rgyud 'bum): dbus su rtsa gsum ste/ / gtso bo yang ni yang dag bshad// zla ba nyi ma me rgyu ba// 'byung ba thams cad la ni khyab// ji ltar shing rtswa cung zad cig/ sa la brtan par gnas pa na// sdong bu yal ga 'dab phre'u//
210a7(rgyud 'bum): sogs pa yis ni kun nas khyab// rang bzhin skyes bu mgor ldan pas// phung po khams la sogs tshogs la// mchog tu kun nas khyab pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dngos// de kho na nyid gsum sdom pa//
210b1(rgyud 'bum): 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // rang bzhin mtshan nyid dbye ba gsum// mtshan mo nyin mo mtshams kyis kyang // dam tshig mtshan nyid rnam pa gsum// sangs rgyas dam chos dge 'dun ni// gsum phye dam tshig
210b2(rgyud 'bum): mtshan nyid dang / / stong nyid ye shes rdo rje ni// rnam gsum de nyid mtshan nyid do// rgyu dang 'bras bu nye 'khor ni// rnal 'byor gsum gyi mtshan nyid do// rlung dang bad kan mkhris pa ni// gsum phye khams gsum bsdus
210b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / 'dod khams gzugs khams gzugs med khams// 'jig rten gsum po'i mtshan nyid do// rtsa ba gsum dang 'bras bu gcig/ rim bzhin gyur nas chos 'khor 'gro// de ni sprul pa gsum du gsal// sku gsung
210b4(rgyud 'bum): thugs kyi rang bzhin gyis/ / gang tshe de la rab sbyor ba// de ni gzas zin mtshan nyid do// gang tshe cung zad sbyor ba na// de tshe phyed 'dzin mtshan nyid do// gang phyir srog ni rlung bcom nas// de tshe 'chi ba'i mtshan
210b5(rgyud 'bum): nyid yin/ / rtsa yi gtso bo'ang nyid rnams ni// gsum po nges pa zhes ni bya// rgyas par rnal 'byor ma rgyud las// rnal 'byor pa yis gsal por shes// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon
210b6(rgyud 'bum): par rtogs pa las/ mtshams kyi rtsa gsum gyi nges pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// rlung skye ba yi mtshan nyid ni// dus kyi grags ni
210b7(rgyud 'bum): btsal ba na/ / ji ltar dngos su yang dag shes// bag chags nyon mongs can gyi yid// rang gi ngo bo gzugs gzhan mthong // don ni shes par mi shes shing // rlung cim gcig pus rmongs pa'o// kun gzhi
211a1(rgyud 'bum): rnas shes bzhugs so/ / bag chags nang du rnam pa / bgachags kyis ni rnam shes bzung // bganags dang 'dres rnaMm pa las/ paganags gos pa d
211a2(rgyud 'bum): e rnams thas nan dus sun/ / sangs kyis su 'jug pan// ngom bu 'khrig sa// 'dzes paduni gyur pa dang // gcu gzhi las ni rnas shes ste// ji ltar ma ma myos pa bzhin// gan sa ma
211a3(rgyud 'bum): bag chags las/ / rnam par shes pa'i rgyun ni skye// nyon mongs can ni srog rlung nying // skad cig gcig la yang dag 'gro// thog mar 'pho ba'i dus su ni// nya yi rnam pa 'alta bur 'gyur// 'pho ba gnyis
211a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dus su ni/ / slar yang khrag dang 'dres pa ni// sbrang dang 'og gi dbye ba yis// srog gi rlung ni gnyis su 'gro// thur sel rlung gi 'gro 'ong la// rus sgras rnam par 'dzin par 'gyur// de nas
211a5(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa la/ / khrag dang khu ba zos pa na// thur du sel ba'i rlung gi tshogs// bskams nas gyen du rlung ni 'byung // steng du kha bltos nas ni gnas// phag rgod 'dra ba'i lus 'chang 'gyur// slar yang
211a6(rgyud 'bum): 'tho ba bzhi pa la/ / khrag dang khu ba bsgos pa ni// gyen du rgyu ba'i rlung bkug nas// 'og tu kha bltas nas ni 'gro// seng ge'i rnam pa yis kyang ni// khyab byed rlung ni spro bar byed// de nas 'pho ba lta ba la/
211a7(rgyud 'bum): khrag dang khu ba 'phel nas ni// mnyam gnas rlung ni 'dar nas ni// me yi gzugs red rim bzhin 'gro// mnyam gnas rlung gi khyab byed spro// gang gis 'gul dang 'dar bar 'gyur// phung po lnga ni rdzos/
211b1(rgyud 'bum): pa na// de ltar gsungs pa de las slar// 'pho ba drug pa'i dus tshod la// sa yi khams dang mig gnyis dang // khyab byed rlung gis klu rlung spro// rlung gi dngos po 'phel bar byed// de nas 'pho ba bdun pa la/
211b2(rgyud 'bum): chu yi khams dang sna bug dod// klu yi rlung gis rus sbal rlung // spros nas gnyis su med par spyod// de nas 'pho ba brgyad pa la// me dang sna yi bu ga 'byed// rus sbal rlung gis rtsangs rlung spro// rang gi rang bzhin
211b3(rgyud 'bum): shes par bya/ / de nas 'pho ba dgu pa la// rlung gi khams dang ro ni tshor// rtsangs pa zhes bya'i rlung chen pos// lha sbyin rlung ni spro bar byed// de rjes 'pho ba bcu pa la// lha sbyin rlung gis gzhu rgyal spro/
211b4(rgyud 'bum): rlung kun bsdus pa'i mtshan nyid can// dgu pa'i dbus na khyab pa'i khams// phra zhing thogs med mtshan nyid can// rtsa dang rgyu ma rgyus pa'i sbubs// sgo ni dgu po rgyas par byed// lus kyi mchog tu tshor ba dang //
211b5(rgyud 'bum): gcig tu reg pa'i mtshan nyid 'dzin// rab sad mchog ni nam mkha' la// 'od gsal bzang po yang dag gnas// sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes pa bcu// de lta bu nyid bshad par bya// 'pho ba bcu ni sa
211b6(rgyud 'bum): bcu ste/ / rim pa yis ni rnam par shes// ma ni shes rab pha rol phyin// b+ha ga phyag rgya chen por brjod// byis pa yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas// thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs// mgo bo'i
211b7(rgyud 'bum): sman bregs pa dang / / phru ma'i chos gos dmar po bgos// dpal dang ldan pa thal mo sbyar// spyi bo sa la gtugs pa phyag/ mtshan ni sum cu rtsa gnyis 'chang // dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan
212a1(rgyud 'bum): ye shes chen po legs par sad/ / 'du byed thob pa grol dang bcas// dpa' bo chen po rnam rtog med// skyed byed sha ni 'jigs par byed// bdud rtsi lnga ni ye shes che// rtag tu
212a2(rgyud 'bum): bdud rtsi lnga myang byed/ / dngos po thams cad rnams spangs la// rnal 'byor seng ge bzhin du spyod// 'di gnyis mchog ni gsang ba ste// gang du yang ni ma gsungs so// rlung skye ba yi nges pa ni// bla ma brgyud pa
212a3(rgyud 'bum): las shes bya/ / rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ rlung gis bskrad pa skyes bu skye ba 'jug pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// /
212a4(rgyud 'bum): de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rlung rnams mchog tu nub pa ni// gang gis yang dag shes pa yis// 'chi ba'i skad cig mtshan nyid no// phan tshun du ni yang dag sdud// skye ba'i rim ltar thim par 'gyur//
212a5(rgyud 'bum): rlung rnams yang dag skye ba ni// phan tshun nub pa'i nyi ma bzhin// thog mar lo bcu lon nas ni// rgyags pa'i myos pa'i rlung skyes nas// gzhu las rgyal ba'i rlung zos te// rim gyis sgra gcan zla ba bzhin// de rjes
212a6(rgyud 'bum): lo bcu byin pa ni/ / rgyags chu rung gis yang dag skye// lha sbyin zhes bya'i drung ni za// rlung gi rim pa snga ma bzhin// gzhan yang lo bcu phyin pa ni// rgyags pa'i chu rlung skye bar 'gyur// spangs pa zhes bya'i rlung ni za// de nas
212a7(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang lo bcu phyin/ / lo las skyes pa'i rim pa yis// btang bzung rlung ni chen po yis// rus sbal rlung ni za bar byed// klu yi rlung dang btang zung rlung // stobs dang gzi brjid mtshungs pa'i phyir// dus gzhan
212b1(rgyud 'bum): lo bcur phyin pa na/ / gnod pa byed par mi nus te// stobs dang nus pa mtshungs pa'i phyir// gang gis gang la gnod pa ni// byed pa nyid du mi nus so// bcu pa gzhan du phyin pa'o// long ba btang bzung stobs chen thog/
212b2(rgyud 'bum): klu yi rlung ni rim gyis za// de nas bcu pa gzhan phyin na// khrag dang sha ni rnam par 'phel// rgyags shing myos pa'i rim pa yis// btang ba zung rlung ni za bar byed// de rjes lo bcu lon pa na// myos chu rlung ni bkug
212b3(rgyud 'bum): nas ni/ / tshil dang kha chu rnam par 'phel// de yis btang bzung klu za byed// de nas bcu pa gzhan phyin pa// lo la btang bzung rlung stobs skyes// myos pa'i dus rlung za bar byed// me dang rlung ni 'phel bar byed//
212b4(rgyud 'bum): btang bzung rlung nyid rnam gyur nas// longs spyod chen po 'phel gyur nas// de nas lo bcu gzhan lon nas// rlung gis lus rgyas lci bar 'gyur// chu dang rlung ni 'dres pa na// khyab cing sgrib byas rim pa las// de las lo
212b5(rgyud 'bum): bcu gzhan du phyin/ / chu shing 'bras bu bzhin du med// rtsa ba dang bcas med par 'gyur// las kyi rnam smin mtha' yis ni// de ltar rim pa bcu pa yis// zla ba 'am ni nyin zhag gzhan// tshe ni nyung ngur byas nas ni//
212b6(rgyud 'bum): srog zad par ni shes par bya// mkha' 'gro sdud pa'i rgyud las ni// shin tu rgyas par shes par bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ rlung gi rim pas srog zad
212b7(rgyud 'bum): pa rgyas par bshad pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gsum pa'o/ / / de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// chen po'i chen po ye shes mchog/ bsdu ba'i mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor mchog/
213a1(rgyud 'bum): snying pos snying po'i don bsdus pa// gang phyir mkha' 'gro mas bsdus pa// de phyir bsdus pa'i mkha' 'gro brjod// lte ba'i dbus na rtag bzhugs pa// nyi ma stong dang mtshungs
213a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i 'od/ / kun rtog thams cad 'joms par byed// char pas phung po'i rnam rtog ni// bsregs byas par chad med pa'i lus// rdo rje khams kyi rnam rtog ni// bsdus nas slar yang rang bzhin gyis//
213a3(rgyud 'bum): gzung dang 'dzin pa'i rnas rtog ni// de rjes der ni slar yang sdud// de ltar gang la phye leb bzhin// 'ching ba thams cad sreg par byed// rlung gis de nyid mngon sbyor bas// sngags kyi lus kyi sbyor ba yis//
213a4(rgyud 'bum): rnam par rtog pa tsam yang ni// sreg pa nyid du the tsom med// mkha' 'gro sdud pa'i rgyud las ni// rnal 'byor mchog gi rim shes na// mkha' 'gro ye shes rgyas par ni// rnal 'byor bsten par rig
213a5(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ mkha' 'gro ma bsdus pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon/
213a6(rgyud 'bum): rnam rtog rlung ni rnam par gcod// nyin dang mtshan du shes par ni// brgya dang brgyad ni lhag par rgyu// rlung rnams de ni rnam rtog ni// gang phyir rnam par gcod pa byed// rnal 'byor de ni mchog tu zhi// thams cad
213a7(rgyud 'bum): stong pa'i ngo bor byed/ / the tsom thog mar sbyor ba drug/ rnal 'byor rig pas mchog tu sgrub// de nas dbyangs med yi ge ha// shin tu rgya che ba zlas par bya// gang phyir mdud pa 'joms byed cing /
213b1(rgyud 'bum): bde ba skye ba ster bar byed// de yis rnam rtog thams cad ni// skad cig gis ni gcod par byed// rnal 'byor rjes su rnal 'byor dang // shin tu rnal 'byor rnal 'byor che// de yi dbye ba bco brgyad
213b2(rgyud 'bum): kyis/ / dang po sbyor ba bsgom par bya// bcu bdun rjes su rnal 'byor sogs// de las dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog ni// rnal 'byor mchog la dbye ba lnga// de las kyang ni las rgyal mchog/ rnal
213b3(rgyud 'bum): 'byor dbye ba bcu gnyis so/ / de nyid dbye ba bzhi bcu dgu// bskyed pa'i rim pa bsdus pa yis// mngon sum byed pa'i rnal 'byor ro// de la rdo rje bzlas rim mchog/ rdzogs rim rnal 'byor yan
213b4(rgyud 'bum): lag ni/ / rnam par rtog pa 'joms byed pa// phra ba'i de nyid bla na med// cho ga ji bzhin rnal 'byor pa// blo dang ldan pas sngon bzhin bsgom// srid pa'i 'ching ba gcod par byed// rnal 'byor chen po ye shes che//
213b5(rgyud 'bum): nges par bsgoms pas yang dag ni// rnam rtog rlung ni 'joms par byed// don gyi rjes 'gro bzlas pa yis// dngos med do bo gcig pa dang // stong nyid brten pa mngon par zhen// sgom pa nges par brtan par byed// sgrub
213b6(rgyud 'bum): pos yang dag bsgoms byas na/ / rdo rje bzlas rim bra na med// de yi rim bzhin ye shes mchog/ thob 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ rnam par
213b7(rgyud 'bum): rtog pa'i rlung gcod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o/ / / de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// rnam rtog med pa'i rlung shar na// gang shes rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ 'ang ngos
214a1(rgyud 'bum): go 'phang bzang po thob/ / rnam rtog med pa'i rlung chen po// gnyis pa thams cad rnam par spangs// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin bdag/ sgom dang sgom min go 'phang bral// rnal 'byor
214a2(rgyud 'bum): chen po'i ye shes che/ / gnas pa med cing dri ma med// phra ba'i cha kun dbus na gnas// thig le nA da rnam par spangs// kun la khyab cing zhi ba dang // bdag byin rlabs pa'i mtshan nyid gcig/
214a3(rgyud 'bum): mtshan gzhi mtshan nyid rnams las grol// bag chags rnam rtog rnam par spangs// tshigs dang mdud pa'i cha yi lam// sgom dang bsgom bya rnam par spangs// stong nyid ye shes mtshan nyid do//
214a4(rgyud 'bum): sngags dang phyag rgya'i rnam pa'i cha// rnam pa'i spyod pa rnam par spangs// bya ba spyod pa rnal 'byor gyis// rgyud rnams la yang bklag mi bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud chen po// bshad par bya ba dam tshig mchog
214a5(rgyud 'bum): man ngag ji bzhin cho ga bzhin/ / thog ma nyid du bshad par rigs// de yi rim pa rjes 'gro shes// bla ma brgyud pa'i go 'phang mchog/ rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/
214a6(rgyud 'bum): rnam rtog med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste sum cu rtsa drug pa'o// // de nas rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rtsa rnams nub pa'i rnal 'byor ni// de kho na nyid bshad kyis nyon// yul dang dbang po
214a7(rgyud 'bum): yang dag sbyor/ / rtsa rnams kyang ni 'char bar 'gyur// shar nas sngon bzhin song nas ni// bskyed pa'i rim pa tha na med// rnam rtog skye ba de yi phyir// brgya dang brgyad kyis lhag pa'i rim// de las skye dang rga dang na/
214b1(rgyud 'bum): 'chi zhing slar yang ldog par 'gyur// yul rnams dngos po med pa yi// sbyangs pa'i ye shes de nyid phyir// de nyid de la spyod pa'i phyir// dngos su yul rnams dngos med phyir// dbang po rnams ni
214b2(rgyud 'bum): skye ba min/ / de las gnyis gnyis yang dag sbyor// dngos dang dngos med stong pa nyid// de nas rtsa rnams nub 'gyur te// 'khor lo'i rim pa la yang rten// de rnams bsdus pa las ni zhi// stong phrag bdun
214b3(rgyud 'bum): cu rtsa gnyis ni/ / kun kyang rtsa yi 'khor lor 'gyur// de nyid kun chas nang du khyad// stong nyid sgom pa rnal 'byor las// yul rnams kyi ni ngo bo nyid// nges pa ru ni shes pa zhes// rigs pa'i rdo rjes rnam par
214b4(rgyud 'bum): 'joms/ / rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ rtsa rnams nub pa'i sbyor ba'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa bdun pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis
214b5(rgyud 'bum): nyon/ / sbyor drug go 'phang mtshan nyid ni// ji lta ji lta ba bzhin sbyor// ji ltar 'dod pa'i yan lag brten// rnam pa drug po de las phyed// de bzhin brgyad brgyad de las lhag/ brgyad gnyis brgyad phrag bzhi dang ni//
214b6(rgyud 'bum): de ltar grangs kyis sbyor ba gsal// zla ba phyed pa'i cha lta bu// stong nyid rlung gi 'khor lor gnas// phyed pa ma yin rdzogs pa min// chu yi zla ba lta bur snang // sgyu ma chen po 'gro ba'i ma// thams cad rten pa'i
214b7(rgyud 'bum): mtshan nyid ni/ / rlung gi 'khor lo srog ces bshad// mkhas pa rnams kyi spyod yul min// me yi 'khor lo stong nyid khyab// dbus na thig le lta bu ni// mi 'gyur kun tu 'gro ba dang // rang byung kun la khyab pa dang /
215a1(rgyud 'bum): bde ba yang dag 'phel bar byed// dbyangs dang gsal byed rnam par spangs// 'jig rten gsum ni ma lus pa// gcig tu byas na skyed par byed// mi shigs nA da'i go 'phang can
215a2(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa thams cad rnam par spangs/ / sbrul gyi lce ltar g.yo ba dang // tshangs pa la sogs pha mes dang // 'jigs pa ma yin g.yo ma yin// yi ge dang ni tshig ma yin// 'byung ba'i tshogs ni rnam par spangs//
215a3(rgyud 'bum): grangs bral zad med skye ba med// lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lor gnas// chos kyi 'khor lo'i dbus gnas pa// sgra tsam dri ma dang bral ba// chags bral chags pa med pa dang // bya ba byed dang gnas med pa// dpe med
215a4(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa med pa dang / / srog dang rtsol ba rnam par spangs// lha yi dbang phyug ye shes mchog/ de lta bu yang rnyed par dka'// longs spyod 'khor lo mchog tu gnas// 'ching ba med pa'i rnam pa mchog/ mchog tu khong
215a5(rgyud 'bum): du chud gyur pa/ / rnam pa kun gyis yang dag bzhugs// rten cing 'brel 'byung rang bzhin gyis// chang gi ro yis myos pa bzhin// mchog ni dang po ma lus pa// dngos po kun gyi nang na gnas// thog ma tha ma lhag par gnas/
215a6(rgyud 'bum): mtshan nyid med cing snang ba med// mtshan nyid thams cad rnam par spangs// zhi ba mi 'jigs brjod du med// rang bzhin nyams myong rang ngo bo// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor gnas// bla ma brgyud pa las ni thob// de ltar ye
215a7(rgyud 'bum): shes bye brag che/ / rang gi ngo bo rnam shes drug/ steng dang 'og tu yang dag sbyor// rnal 'byor zhes ni rab tu grags// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ 'khor lo drug sgom
215b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa brgyad pa'o/ / / de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// dus kyi mtshan nyid sdom pa ni// rnal 'byor gang gis rnam par shes// grangs kyi rnal 'byor bla na med/
215b2(rgyud 'bum): dus ni dus tshod ces ni bshad// bsam dang bsam bral rang dngos ni// dus bzang dang ni dus ngan dang // rnam pa gnyis la yang dag gnas// sna yi bu ga las byung nas// phyi yi sgo las rtag tu 'char// nang
215b3(rgyud 'bum): du sdud par dus bzang gsungs/ / 'byung ba yang ni dus ngan 'dod// dus ngan las ni gzhan pa mchog/ dus bzang mchog ste rang nyid ni// rdzogs ldan dang ni gsum ldan dang // gnyis ldan dang ni dus bzang po//
215b4(rgyud 'bum): rtsod pa'i dus ni ngan pa ste// de ltar gsungs pa'i dus mtshan nyid// dga' dang mchog tu dga' ba dang // lhan cig skyes pa dus bzang ste// dga' dang bral ba ngan dus so// dus kyi mtshan nyid de ltar bshad//
215b5(rgyud 'bum): 'jug pa dang ni gnas pa'i dus// dus bzang por ni yongs su grags// ldang ba yang ni dus ngan te// de ltar dus kyi mtshan nyid do// dus ni khams rnams thams cad de// mnyam pa ro gcig go 'phang mchog
215b6(rgyud 'bum): ye shes rnam shes rnam spangs te/ / dus ni gcig ni brjod pa yin// dngos dang dngos med spros bral ba// bzhi pa'i skad cig mtshan nyid 'di// brjod bya rjod byed las grol ba// dus gcig ces ni brjod pa yin/
215b7(rgyud 'bum): chags dang chags bral nges grol ba// bde ba chen po go 'phang spangs// phyag rgya chen po'i don gyi gzhi// dus gcig ces ni brjod pa yin// mtshan nyid med cing snang ba med// grangs ni rnal 'byor rnam par spangs//
216a1(rgyud 'bum): de nyid dus su ngas bshad de// bla ma brgyud pa las shes bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ dus dang dus tshad rnam par bshad pa'i
216a2(rgyud 'bum): le'u ste sum cu rtsa dgu pa'o/ / // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// gsang ba'i 'bras bu mchog nyon cig/ gang gis dngos grub mchog tu 'gro// phyag rgya chen po yang dag
216a3(rgyud 'bum): brten/ / gsang ba sbas pa zhes ni bshad// rnal 'byor byis pas mi shes shing // bzhi pa'i dbang zhes bya ba'i ming // zhal nas brgyud pa'i rim pa rnams// mchog tu zhi ba'i ye shes che// rnam rtog thams
216a4(rgyud 'bum): cad rnam par spangs/ / phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub che// rnal 'byor chen po'i don bsdus pa// rnal 'byor ma rgyud las bslab pa// mchog tu rmad byung ngo bo nyid// ye shes chen po'i ro 'bebs pa// de nyid
216a5(rgyud 'bum): chen po'i yon tan ldan/ / nam mkha' mchog la gnas pa'i sa// rdo rje sems dpa' rang ngo bo// bde ba rnams ni 'phel bar byed// bde ba chen po'i go 'phang 'das// shes dang shes bya rnam par bral/
216a6(rgyud 'bum): sgom dang bsgom bya rnam par spangs// sngags dang rgyud kyi bya bas stong // kun tu rtog pa thams cad spangs// dngos po kun gyi go 'phang gsal// 'jig rten gsum gyi rnam pa'i mi// chags dang chags
216a7(rgyud 'bum): bral rnam par spangs/ / dam tshig chen po la gnas pa// grangs med 'jig rten gsum gcig dngos// dngos grub de kho na yi rgyud// de ltar gsang ba'i 'bras bu gsal// gzhan ni gang du'ang ma
216b1(rgyud 'bum): gsungs pa/ / rnal 'byor mchog gi ye shes mchog/ rnal 'byor ma rgyud las shes bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ gsang ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya/
216b2(rgyud 'bum): paba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// chos kyi dbyings kyi go 'phang mchog/ chos kyi dbyings nas khyab pa'i khams// chos kyi dbyings kyis de la brjod/
216b3(rgyud 'bum): kun khyab mchog tu phra ba dang // kun 'gro rtag tu 'char ba dang // phung po lnga nyid 'byung ba lnga// yul dang skye mched rnam shes dang // de dag yang dag ldan chos kun// bshad de gsang ba'i dbang phyug skye//
216b4(rgyud 'bum): de dag dbus na gnas pa'i khams// khyab cing spyod yul ma yin pa// ji ltar til gyi til mar dang // ji ltar shing la me bzhin du// de bzhin chos rnams thams cad la// khyab kyang mthong ba ma yin no//
216b5(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha' bzhin du dri ma med// chos kun gyi ni gzhi yi mchog/ gzung dang 'dzin pa'i kun rtog gis// khyab kyang mthong ba ma yin no// stong nyid ye shes rnal 'byor gyis// rnal 'byor pa yis gsal
216b6(rgyud 'bum): bar mthong / / chos dbyings b+ha ga zhes ni brjod// b+ha ga rin chen za ma tog/ gang phyir dbang phyug sogs yon tan// ldan pa de phyir b+ha ga brjod// b+ha ga chos rnams su yang bshad// dbyings ni byang chub
216b7(rgyud 'bum): sems su gsungs/ / khams gsum pa yi 'gro ba yi// rgyu ni b+ha ga zhes byar bshad// dbyings ni yang dag sbyor dngos kyis// chu zla bzhin du yang dag gnas// don dam gcig pu'i de nyid shes// lag
217a1(rgyud 'bum): mthil skyu ru bzhag pa bzhin/ / mchog gi de nyid ltar ni snang // rang rig shin tu dri ma med// dngos dang dngos med zad nas ni// rtag tu de nyid mthong zhing snang // chos kyi dbyings kyi
217a2(rgyud 'bum): go 'phang gsal/ / de ltar shin tu rgyas par bshad// gzung dang 'dzin pa dang bral bas// sbyor bral shes pa rmad du byung // rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs
217a3(rgyud 'bum): pa las/ chos kyi dbyings kyi don bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// rdo rje yi ni mtshan nyid mchog/ de yi don du bshad
217a4(rgyud 'bum): kyis nyon/ / ji lta ba bzhin bshad par bya// rdo rje mi phyed ces ni gsungs// ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid mchog/ rtsa lnga yi ni nam mkhar rten// rtse mo lnga yi rang ngo bo// sa dang chu dang de bzhin ma// rlung
217a5(rgyud 'bum): dang nam mkha' nyid dang ni/ / rtswa yi nam mkha'i chu yi gzugs// bla ma brgyud las shes par bya// aM raM laM baM yaM sa bon// brjod pa rtsa ni lnga rnams te// 'bad pa yis ni shes par bya// rdo rjes skye
217a6(rgyud 'bum): ba'i mtshan nyid ni/ / pad+ma lte ba'i dbus gnas pa// thig ler bshad pa'i 'gro ba med// dam tshig gnas ni shes pa dang // bdud rtsi mchog gis rab tu gang // rnam pa kun ldan rnam pa med// de ni
217a7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rjer yongs su grags/ / me long mnyam nyid ye shes dang // so sor rtog dang bya nan tan// rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin no// de yi ngo bo yongs su shes// rdo rje rang nyid
217b1(rgyud 'bum): nyams myong mchog/ nam mkhar cher gnas zhi ba dang // rtog pa med cing nyon mongs med// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag gzhi// bla ma brgyud pa las shes bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng
217b2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ rdo rje bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// rigs kyi dbye ba don bsdus pa// de tshe rigs
217b3(rgyud 'bum): ni rnam pa lnga/ / rtsa ba'i rgyud du gsal bar gsungs// rnal 'byor spro ba dbye ba yis// rnal 'byor chen po'i dam tshig go/ rgyud du grags par dbye ba yi// mthar thug de ni yang dag gsungs// de nyid las
217b4(rgyud 'bum): ni bsdus nas kyang / / rigs kyi dbye ba brgya ru gsungs// sna tshogs spros pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// rdo rje sems dpa' zhes ni brjod// gang gis de yi rnam pa mthong // sna tshogs nor bu ji bzhin no//
217b5(rgyud 'bum): sems can mos pa sna tshogs dang // sna tshogs bsam pa'i bye brag gis// sna tshogs nyon mongs mnan nas ni// 'gro ba'i bla mas grol ba'i phyir// gzhung nas gang gis de yis ni// sna tshogs spro
217b6(rgyud 'bum): ba'i ngo bo nyid/ / grangs med pa yi dbye ba yis// dbye ba grangs med sbyor ba yis// don dam rigs kyi dbye ba nyid// rgyud gzhan rnams su gsungs pa yis// sems can bsam pa'i bye brag gis/
217b7(rgyud 'bum): de ni bsdus na dbye bar 'gyur// rtsa yi 'khor lo'i rim pa yis// stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// de la stong phrag sum cu drug/ lus kyi rdzas dang gnas sogs kyis// rim pa'i dbye bas de las kyang //
218a1(rgyud 'bum): stong phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o// de rjes brgya yis mchog tu gang // bdun cu rtsa gnyis drug cu bzhi// sum cu rtsa drug bsdus pa las// nyi shu rtsa bzhi de las kyang //
218a2(rgyud 'bum): sum cu dang ni dgu yang ngo // de las lnga dang de phyir gsum// gsum yang bsdus na gcig nyid do// rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis// gzhan yang gzhan du 'dres nas 'gro// de yang 'od gsal go/
218a3(rgyud 'bum): 'phang la'o// rnam rtog med pa'i bde ba che// gnyis med ye shes dri ma med// chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid mchog/ rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ rigs kyi dbye
218a4(rgyud 'bum): paba'i don bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs// phyag rgya'i dbye ba bla na med// chos dang las dang dam tshig dang //
218a5(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya chen po mngon par brjod// las kyi rnam smin nges pa yis// kun ras rgyas btab lta bur gnas// gang yang 'di ni las gang gis// de 'bras ji lta ba bzhin 'gyur// chos rnams rang bzhin med pa nyid//
218a6(rgyud 'bum): rang bzhin gyis ni rgyas btab nas// dam tshig rang gi yon tan dngos// rgyal sras rnams kyis rgyas btab pa// stong dang snying rje mi phyed pa// sangs rgyas zhing ni rnam sbyong ba// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam
218a7(rgyud 'bum): tshig ni/ / yongs su dag pa'i mdzad pa yis// de yi rang bzhin rang bzhin med// phyag rgya chen po zhes ni brjod// las kyi phyag rgya yongs shes na// sngags pa las ni thob par skye// bla mas shes rab dbang
218b1(rgyud 'bum): bskur na/ / ji ltar mthong ba'i mtshan nyid ni// rdo rje sems dpa'i rang dngos don// snying rje'i bsam pas gsal ba ni// de las nges par thob nas ni// chos nyid sgo nas nges par byed// de ltar de nyid de ye
218b2(rgyud 'bum): shes/ / de ltar rnal 'byor ma mtshan nyid// dam tshig la zhe na mkhas pa dang // rlung gi de nyid pha rol son// dpal ldan 'dus pa'i don bslabs pa// ngag 'jam shes rab ldan ma dang // mig yangs
218b3(rgyud 'bum): ma yi bu mo rnyed/ / gzugs dang lang tshos rnam par brgyan// ji bzhin rnal 'byor dam tshig la// phyag rgyas lhan cig sgrub par byed// de nas de nyid thob pa na// phyag rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid do// de nyid bde chen go
218b4(rgyud 'bum): 'phang ni/ / kun tu rtog pa thams cad spangs// stong nyid ye shes dri ma med// chos kyi dbyings kyi go 'phang gsal// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// phyag rgya'i dbye ba bla na med// rigs dang pha rol phyin dbye
218b5(rgyud 'bum): bas/ / phyag rgya drug tu yang dag bshad// yaM raM laM baM aM haM dang // lha mo rnams kyi rim pa las// mchod pa'i rim pa ro gcig pa// rtag tu yang ni mchod par bya// gdol pa mo dang khrus mkhan mo// sme sha
218b6(rgyud 'bum): can dang gar mkhan ma/ / ro bsreg ma dang bram ze mo// grub 'gyur don du rnal 'byor pas// bdag nyid rol cing gnas par bya// khrus mkhan rin chen rigs las skyes// gdol pa pad+ma'i rigs las skyes//
218b7(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gar mkhan las kyi rigs// ro bsreg ma ni 'khor lo'i rigs// sme sha can ni rdo rje'i rigs// ye shes phyag rgya bram ze mo// rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs su brjod// 'di ni rigs ni drug tu 'gyur//
219a1(rgyud 'bum): bram ze mo ni ma yin te// khrus mkhan mo ni sring mor brjod// gar mkhan mo ni bu mor shes// sme sha can ni chung mar grags// ro bsreg mo ni mna' ma ste// sgyug mo gdol pa ma zhes
219a2(rgyud 'bum): byashes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis/ / rnam rtog med pas brjod par bya// gang phyir rnam rtog med gyur na// dngos grub kun la dus kun tu// sems ni ma ru gyur nas ni// sring mo dag tu yang dag
219a3(rgyud 'bum): bshad/ / lus ni bu mor shes par bya// srog ni chung mar rab tu gsal// mna' ma mthur du sel ba'i rlung // dbu ma'i rlung ni sgyug mor brjod// ma ni rgyags pa'i rtsa yi cha// sangs rgyas rin chen khra ma tog/
219a4(rgyud 'bum): sring mo khu ba 'bab pa'i rtsa// spyi bo'i gnas na yang dag gnas// bu mo khrag rgyu ba yi rtsa// de ni phyed phyed lhag par gnas// chung ma gcin ni 'bab pa'i rtsa// de nyid kyi ni dbus na gnas// mna' ma mchi ma
219a5(rgyud 'bum): 'dzag pa'i rtsa/ / mgrin pa'i gnas su lhag par gnas// ma ni sa ru yang dag bshad// chu yi khams ni sring mor brjod// me ni bu mor shes par bya// rlung ni chung mar rab tu grags// mna' ma nam mkha'
219a6(rgyud 'bum): ru ni bshad/ / sgyug mo nam mkha' chen po'o// mngar bar gyur pas nam mkha' ni// sgyur ba sring mo ru ni brjod// kha ba rang gi bu mo dang // lan tshwa chung mar yongs su grags// bska ba sgyug mor
219a7(rgyud 'bum): shes par bya/ / tsha ba mna' mar yongs su grags// de dag 'bad pas 'dod bya zhing // dngos grub 'dod pas bstan par bya// las kyi phyag rgya dbye ba 'di// de yi yon tan bsten pa'i mchog/
219b1(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig de dang rtog par 'jug/ phyag rgya chen po'i bde ba che// rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang zhi// ye shes mchog ni bla na med// de ltar phyag rgya'i go 'phang gsal// rnal 'byor ma rgyud spyod yul lo//
219b2(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ phyag rgya'i dbye ba rgyas par bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang
219b3(rgyud 'bum): yang dag bshad/ / phung sogs skye mched mtshan nyid ni// rgyal ba rgyal ni gzugs zhes bshad// rdo rje 'dzin ni rnam shes dang // rin chen 'dzin la tshor bar gsungs// 'khor ba las rgal 'du
219b4(rgyud 'bum): shes gsungs/ / shes rab 'dzin ni 'du byed dang // de ltar phung por rab tu gsungs// sa ni gti mug dga' mar bshad// de bzhin chu ni zhe sdang dga'// me ni chags gsal dga' ba dang // de bzhin
219b5(rgyud 'bum): rlung ni rdo rje dga'/ / nam mkha' rdo rje dbyings dbang phyug/ gzugs ni gzugs kyi rdo rje dang // sgra ni sgra yi rdo rje ste// dri ni dri yi rdo rje dang // ro ni ro yi rdo rjer bshad// reg bya'i rdo rje reg byar 'gyur// chos
219b6(rgyud 'bum): kyi dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma/ / mig gnyis sa yi snying po dang // rna ba phyag na rdo rje dang // sna ni nam mkha'i snying po dang // lce ni 'jig rten mgon po dang // lus ni sgrib pa rnam sel brjod// yid ni kun tu
219b7(rgyud 'bum): bzang po dang / / rtsa ni byams pa ru ni brjod// ye shes mchog ni 'jam dpal nyid// khyab pa ru ni yang dag bshad// de bzhin lus kyi chos rnams ni// khro bo bcur ni yang dag bshad// de ltar lus kyi
220a1(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor gsungs/ / phung po la sogs skye mched sogs// rnal 'byor gnyis med mchog gis ni// bla ma brgyud pa las shes bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phe
220a2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ phung po la sogs pa dang skye mched kyi mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// phyag rgya chen po'i don
220a3(rgyud 'bum): mtshan nyid/ / rnal 'byor chen po'i 'bras bu zhi// ye shes chen po'i don bsdus pa// bde ba chen po'i skal ba che// ro mchog chen po'i bdag nyid can// sgyu ma chen mo mchog tu phra// chen po'i chen po
220a4(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha' che/ / phyag rgya de bzhin gshegs ye shes// rnam rtog med pa'i go 'phang sten// mi phyed rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas// rnam rtog med pa'i bde ba che// nam mkha' bzhin du gos pa med// rang bzhin
220a5(rgyud 'bum): med cing gzhi dang bral/ / gnyis med bdag med brjod du med// rnal 'byor rnams ni rang rig pa// phung po khams dang skye mched che'i// kun rtog chos ni yongs su spangs// sgom dang bsgom bya snyoms
220a6(rgyud 'bum): 'jug dang / / rim pa gnyis ni rnam par spangs// rnam shes ye shes dang bral ba// sngags dang bzlas brjod bsnyen pa spangs// dngos po kun gyi gnas las brgal// ye shes chen po rab gsol
220a7(rgyud 'bum): ba/ / dngos grub chen po 'dir shes bya// phyag rgya chen po bla na med// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ phyag rgya chen po'i don rnam par nges pa'i le'u ste/
220b1(rgyud 'bum): bzhi bcu rtsa drug pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// nyams kyi mtshan nyid dbye ba ni// gang gis yongs shes rnal 'byor pa// rnal 'byor chen po dag shes par// /
220b2(rgyud 'bum): gyur nas kyang ni ye shes che// de nyid rnal 'byor kun las bsgyings// 'dar dang rdul dang ba spu langs// dbyangs 'gyur ba dang ldibs pa dang // mdog 'gyur mchi 'dzag thim pa dang // snying stobs can
220b3(rgyud 'bum): gyis 'di brgyad nyams/ / dga' ba rgyas pa'i rtsa yi cha// rgyags pa'i cha yi rtsa dga' na// khong stong 'dar bar skyed par byed// rgyags pa'i chu yi rtsa sad na// rab tu rdul byed skyed par byed// de bzhin
220b4(rgyud 'bum): rgyags pas g.yengs pa'i rtsa/ / khong stong pa spu ldang bar byed// de bzhin na sa ra yi rtsa// khong stong tshig ni ldib par byed// rus sbal chen po'i rtsa rgyas na// kha dog 'gyur ba skye bar byed// mgo bo chen
220b5(rgyud 'bum): bo'i rtsa rgyas na/ / brgyal zhing sdug bsngal bcas par byed// 'ur 'ur chen po'i rtsa byed na// ba spu langs pa skyed par byed// dga' ba chen po'i rtsa rgyas na// khong stong mchi ma 'dzag par byed// myos pa chen po'i
220b6(rgyud 'bum): rtsa byed na/ / srog gi rlung ni thim par byed// brgyal dang sems med bde ba che// de nas dran pa nyams par 'gyur// sgeg pa la sogs nyams su shes// sngar bshad rim pa sad par byed// dzaHhUM baM hoHde bzhin du//
220b7(rgyud 'bum): a la la la la ho sngags// rab tu bskul bas rgyas nas su// nyams ni so so'i dbye bas shes// de ltar de ni dbye rgyud pa'o// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las
221a1(rgyud 'bum): nyams kyi dbye ba bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa'o/ / / de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// bdag ces bya ba sgra yi rten// gang gis yang dag shes pa
221a2(rgyud 'bum): yi/ srid pa'i 'ching ba'i mtshan nyid ni// a haM 'khor lo'i 'ching ba dag/ de ni yongs zad grol ba'o// a ni dngos po kun gyi mchog/ lus rnams kun la lhag par gnas// rnam pa kun gyi mchog dang
221a3(rgyud 'bum): ldan/ / kun khyab kun mkhyen zad pa med// thogs med snying stobs zhes bya ba// thabs cig tu ni skye bar byed// srid dang srid rtse brtse ba med// sprul pa'i sku yi mchog dang ni// don kun byed pa la mkhas
221a4(rgyud 'bum): pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbugs 'byung ba'o// haM ni dngos po dang bral ba// lus la gnas kyang lus bskyed min// dbang po las 'das mi gsal ba// rnam pa thams cad rnam par spangs// dngos
221a5(rgyud 'bum): dang dngos med las grol zhing / / gang la'ang lhag par gang gnas pa// dngos po thams cad nub pa dang // chos kyi sku yi ngo bo nyid// sems ni rdo rje 'chang dbugs phyung // don kun byed pa dang bral ba// stong pa'i rang
221a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin mya ngan 'das/ / ye shes sku yi rang bzhin nyid// rjod dang brjod bya rnam par grol// de yang yi ge haM du grags// thams cad a haM kun la khyab// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// a haM dngos
221a7(rgyud 'bum): / po thams cad la// khyab pa'i sa ni lhag par gnas// a haM dang bral skyes bu ni// rtsa ba bcad pa'i shing bzhin no// haM ni dpral ba'i sgra mtshams na// a ni lte bar yang dag gnas// 'dir ni a las zla bar
221b1(rgyud 'bum): bshad/ / 'od zer stong 'gyed pa yi haM// 'dir yang a yi ming la brten// brten pa'i haM du rab tu grags// a ni srog gi rlung du bshad// de bzhin thur sel haM du brjod// de gnyis gcig gyur 'khor ba ste//
221b2(rgyud 'bum): des na a haM zhes par grags// rnam rtog bral ba'i gnas pa ni// a haM gang du gnas pa med// gzhan ni 'ga' zhig 'di la yang // don dam par ni dmigs su med// de ltar a haM nga yis bshad// /
221b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyud rnams kun tu rnyed par dka'// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ a haM gi sgra'i don bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// /
221b4(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// stong nyid dbye ba bsdus pa ni// rnal 'byor pa ni gang gis shes// stong nyid de ni shes par 'gyur// mi mthun pa dang gnyen po'i phyir// stong nyid sgom par yongs su
221b5(rgyud 'bum): gsungs/ / nang gi bdag nyid chos rnams ni// kun tu rtog pa'i gnyen po dang // phyin ci log ni rnam dag pa// phyin nas stong pa nyid du 'dod// phyi rol dmigs pa dang bral ba// nang gi bdag nyid chos
221b6(rgyud 'bum): rnams dang / / phyi rol tu yang mi rtog pa// 'dir ni phyi dang nang gi ni// stong pa nyid du yang dag bshad// snod kyi 'jig rten dang bral ba// chen po stong pa nyid du brjod// ye shes gang gis de stong par// mthong
221b7(rgyud 'bum): ba de yang stong par rjod/ / me long ye shes rdzogs pa la// rjes su dmigs par byed phyir ro// de yi mi mthun phyogs stong pa// dngos med stong pa nyid stong nyid// don dam par ni brdzun pa'i dngos// shes pa don
222a1(rgyud 'bum): dam stong pa nyid/ / 'dus byas sbyin pa la sogs kyang // dge ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir// rang gi rnam rtog mtshan nyid spyod// 'dus byas stong pa nyid du bshad// yang
222a2(rgyud 'bum): dag byang chub 'dus ma byas/ / rgyu mtshan yang ni dmigs su med// dngos dang dngos med rnam par spangs// 'dus ma byas pa'i stong nyid gsungs// sems can don du smon lam sogs// rang dga' sogs/
222a3(rgyud 'bum): pa dmigs pa med// shin tu stong pa nyid du bshad// kun rtogs thams cad rnam par spangs// mtha' las 'das pa'i stong nyid gsungs// thog mtha' med pa'i 'jig rten gyi// 'gro ba'i phyir ni smon
222a4(rgyud 'bum): lam nyid/ / rlom sems med par de brjod de// thog mtha' med pa'i stong pa nyid// mya ngan 'das la dmigs pa med// dge ba'i bdag nyid mi stong pa// rlom sems med pa zhes bshad do// dor ba med pa
222a5(rgyud 'bum): stong pa nyid/ / 'dod chags la sogs dri ma ni// bdag ni rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i// de ltar rlom sems med gsungs pa// rang bzhin stong pa nyid du gsal// mtshan dang dpe byad la sogs pa//
222a6(rgyud 'bum): sku gzugs de yi yon tan ni// gzhan rnams la yang mi dmigs pa// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid// byang chub phyogs kyi chos rnams nyid//
222a7(rgyud 'bum): spyod pa la yang rlom sems med// chos rnams thams cad stong par bshad// bdag dang skyes pa'i chos rnams ni// sgro btags dngos po med pa'i mchog/ 'ching ba thams cad rnam par gcod// dngos med
222b1(rgyud 'bum): stong pa nyid du gsungs/ / ji ltar sngon gsungs stong pa nyid// de ltar dngos po med shes pa// slar yang mi dmigs pa nyid ni// dngos po med pa stong nyid 'dod// de ltar stong nyid dbye ba yang //
222b2(rgyud 'bum): bag chags rnams kyi gnyen po'i phyir// rgyu yi gnyen po mi mthun phyogs// bla ma brgyud pa las shes bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ stong pa nyid kyi
222b3(rgyud 'bum): mtshan nyid kyi dbye ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// stong pa nyid ni skye ba'i rgyu// rnam pa med pa'i nyams myong dngos// lus rnams la
222b4(rgyud 'bum): ni khyab pa dang / / phung po lnga ni rang bzhin lus// 'khor lo drug la khyab pa dang // chos rnams kun gyi dbus gnas phyir// ring ba ma yin nye ba min// de ni kun rdzob dang dbyer med// stong pa nyid ni don
222b5(rgyud 'bum): dam mo/ / rdo rje 'phreng ba de ltar bshad// srog gi rten cing mtshan nyid ni// sku mdog sngon po zhal gsum pa// spyan gsum po la phyag drug mchog/ rdo rje 'khor lo nor bu g.yas// g.yon pa dril bu pad+ma dang //
222b6(rgyud 'bum): ral gri shin tu rnon po dang // phyar ba go rims bzhin du bsnams// A li kA li las byung ba// zla ba nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs// sna tshogs pad rgyas gdan la ni// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis
222b7(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs/ / hUM gi sa bon rdzogs pa dang // rdo rje chen po'i rigs las byung // kun rtog rnams ni bskyed pa'i rlung // rnam par gcod cing thim par byed// gnod byed de dag sel bar byed// gnyis pa
223a1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad rnam par gcod/ / sgyu ma chen mo stong pa che// sangs rgyas sa ni rmad du byung // sangs rgyas nyid kyi 'bras ster ba'o// 'di yi sngags ni brjod par bya// oM dang badz+ra
223a2(rgyud 'bum): mA le dang / / de bzhin AHdang hUM dang gnyis// phaT dang swA hA yang dag ldan// sngags mchog btus pa bla ni med// rlung 'phrog de kho na nyid kyis// yid kyis rnam rtog sel bar byed// zhi ba'i
223a3(rgyud 'bum): gnas dang chu 'gram dang / / shing gcig lam gyi bzhi mdo dang // yang na sum mdo 'bum phrag bcu// gsal bar yang ni bzlas par bya// da ni dngos grub mchog tu 'gro// rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i
223a4(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor gyis/ / de yi yon tan gsal bar 'byung // zhi ba la sogs 'bad mi dgos// skad cig gcig la mngon par rtogs// de ni de nyid rigs mchog shes// dpa' bo gcig pu'i cho ga/
223a5(rgyud 'bum): 'di// dpa' bo gcig pu nyid sgrub pa// de yi mtshan nyid sgom pa gang // rnam rtog spangs pa'i rnal 'byor pa// shin tu rnam dag nam mkha'i dngos// rang gi dngos grub mchog tu 'gro// rnal 'byor chen
223a6(rgyud 'bum): po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'brang ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ stong pa nyid kyi rdo rje'i 'phreng ba bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste lnga bcu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs//
223a7(rgyud 'bum): mtshan mo shes rab shes par bya// 'byung po thams cad thim nas 'gro// mtshan mo'i cha ni zla bar 'gyur// zla ba mya ngan 'das mtshan nyid// kun rdzob dang ni don dam gyi// shes rang rnam pa gnyis zhes bya//
223b1(rgyud 'bum): kun rdzob shes byar shes par bya// don dam reg bya rnam par spangs// reg bya dang bral bde ba gang // bde ba mchog de thob par dka'// nyin mo slar yang thabs su bshad// thabs ni nyin mor gyur pa dang /
223b2(rgyud 'bum): gang tshe dngos las skyes nyi ma// rtag tu b+ha ga'i bdag por 'gyur// 'khor ba'i rnam pa nyi mar 'gyur// nyi ma las ni zla ba skyes// de las gnyis med ngo bor bshad// 'bar ba'i phyir ni nyi mar 'gyur// rnam par dpyad pa'i
223b3(rgyud 'bum): don dam dang / / chags bral mchog tu phra ba dang // mi snang ba dang stong pa'i lus// 'od gsal ba yi go 'phang zhi// gang du yang dag mi gnas so// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las
223b4(rgyud 'bum): mtshan mo nyin mo rgyas par bshad pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa'o/ / / de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// A li kA li'i dam tshig ni// rgyud rnams gzhan du ma gsungs pa'i// rgyal sras
223b5(rgyud 'bum): rnams la dgongs pa yi/ / 'od gsal go 'phang las skyes pa'i// snang ba mched pa'i mtshan nyid ni// gsal byed sum cu rtsa gsum ldan// kA li'i dkyil 'khor rgyas pa'o// snang ba mched pa'i go 'phang ni// snang ba las
223b6(rgyud 'bum): byung zad pa med/ / dbyangs ni bcu drug dang ldan pa// A li'i dkyil 'khor rgyas pa'o// de gnyis gsang ba'i sbyor ba las// dbus su skyes pa'i bde ba che// A li kA li'i dam tshig ces// dgongs pa'i tshig gis bye brag byas/
223b7(rgyud 'bum): shin tu phra ba'i ye shes mchog/ bla ma brgyud las shes par bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ A li kA li rgyas par bshad pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o//
224a1(rgyud 'bum): de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// mtshams kyi mtshan nyid bla na med// snang dang mi snang bral ba'i mtshams// shes rab rdo rje las byung ba// gnyis med 'dres pa'i dbus na gnas/
224a2(rgyud 'bum): 'bags shing gos pa rnam par spangs// rdo rje pad+ma 'chi med skyes// zla ba nyi ma yang dag 'dres// mthar ni yang dag mi 'gro gang // mtshams med 'khor ba dag par byed// rang gi ngo bo rnam pa mchog/ phra
224a3(rgyud 'bum): ba'i mtshan nyid bsam mi khyab/ / sems can kun gyi mtshams kyi ni// rdo rje 'chang gi btsun mo dang // 'char ba mchog tu dag par bshad// dga' bral la sogs rnam par spangs// mdud pa'i
224a4(rgyud 'bum): rtser gnas mchog tu zhi/ / tsa na ka yi tshig gu tsam// mtshan mo bdag po de shar ba// gang phyir steng gi go 'phang gnas// la la thig le'i rang ngo bor// rnam pa bzhi yis yang dag gnas// la lar
224a5(rgyud 'bum): thog ma la sogs spangs/ / la lar de yang dmigs su med// gang phyir rang gi bdag nyid can// de phyir brjod du med pa'o// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las//
224a6(rgyud 'bum): mtshams kyi 'char ba'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// rnam pa nyi shu'i ming tsam ni// slob dpon las su yongs su bshad//
224a7(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyi rnal 'byor legs rgyas pa// sngon du bsnyen pa sa sbyang dang // 'byung po bskrad pa nyid dang ni// sa gzung nyid dang thig skud ni// spyan drang lhag par gnas pa dang // bgegs bskrad de bzhin dkyil 'khor gyi
224b1(rgyud 'bum): thig ni rab tu gsal ba dang / / phur bus yang dag gdab pa dang // bum pa byin gyis brlab pa dang // bcom ldan 'das kyi lhag gnas dang // khrus dang rab tu sbyang ba dang // mchod pa rab gnas gtor ma dang //
224b2(rgyud 'bum): slob ma lhag par gnas pa dang // ma la sbyin sreg cho ga bzhin// dbang bskur ba dang gshegs su gsol// de ltar cho ga nyi shu'i las// gang gis de shes 'gro ba'i bla// dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pas bya// bdud
224b3(rgyud 'bum): las sdigs mdzub de ni mchog/ yi ge gsum zlos pa la zhan// rdo rje theg pa lhag par 'gro// zhi ba la sogs las gang gis// rtag tu lag pa'i mthil la gnas// de yi yang dag cho ga yis// cho ga mchog ni
224b4(rgyud 'bum): bya ba yin/ / rnal 'byor rjes su rnal 'byor sogs// cho ga la sogs brtsam par bya// bgegs mthar byed pa'i snying po'i sngags// yi ge nyi shu rtsa bzhi mchog/ stong phrag bcu ni yongs su bza// thog mar mkhas pa
224b5(rgyud 'bum): ji bzhin du/ / bgegs rnams thams cad bsal ba'i phyir// sngon du bsnyen pa zhes ni bshad// de 'og yi ge gsum khrir ni// bsam pa kun gyis bzlas byas na// yid la 'dod pa'i dngos grub ster// slob ma
224b6(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi dngos grub rgyur/ / skye bos dben pa'i phyir bcas// sa bzung chu ni nye bar bcas// grong dang ha cang mi nye zhing // ring por yang ni brtsam mi bya// shin tu 'jam zhing srog chags med// rgyal po'i pho brang
224b7(rgyud 'bum): shin tu ring / / gang khyim tshong dus las rgyang ring // yang na bde gshegs rten la ni// thog mar sor mo rnams la ni// bde bar gshegs pa'i sngags dgod bya// khru gang sor ni bzhi pa yi// seng ldeng phu rab byas nas ni//
225a1(rgyud 'bum): yi ge gsum sngags chu yis bkru// yi ge brgya pa lan bdun dang // yi ge gsum gyi sngags kyis brko// sa ni chu yi mthar thug pa// yang na khru ni phyed dang gsum// yang na sems
225a2(rgyud 'bum): kyis sbyang bar bya/ / de la gnas pa'i 'byung po ni// yang dag 'gror ni 'jug par bya// oM ma hA kro d+ha dz+wA lA ka/ hUM phaT mtha' dang yang dag ldan// de ltar lag mthil sngags bkod la// 'byung po rnams ni bskrad
225a3(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / sa la thal mo lan gsum du// brdab par byas nas sngags bzlas te// ud gastA da yan gnyis brjod// sarba b+hU ta gra hA ud ga ts+tsha// yi ge gsum ni mtha' ru brjod// badz+ra sa twa be shad de// las ni thams
225a4(rgyud 'bum): cad par gsungs pa'i/ / gtor ma byin nas 'gro ru gzhug/ sa ni yongs su bzung rjes la// rdo rje slob dpon gyis brtsam bya// tsha sgo med cing ma gas la// mnyam zhing zug rngu med pa dang // me long lta bur 'jam pa dang //
225a5(rgyud 'bum): mnyam pa yang ni mkhas pas bya// pa yi lci ba la sogs pa// rnam pa lnga yis byug par bya// byugs nas rdo rjes khrus byas la// slob dpon khro bo'i sku dang ni// dkyil 'khor 'jam pa'i rdo rje yis// mchog tu mi g.yo
225a6(rgyud 'bum): gzugs kyis ni/ / 'jam pa dang ni sum sgril gyis// ras sam yang na gso ma yis// yi ge gsum gyis rnam par sbyang // thig skud kyis ni kun nas mnyam// gru bzhi par ni byas nas kyang // rdo rje can gyis khru gsum
225a7(rgyud 'bum): gsum/ / gru bzhi par ni gzung bar bya// de yi dbus su lte ba'i cha// sgrib pa'i skyon ni spang bar bya// sku gdung dang ni rin chen bzhugs// legs par bsangs nas byin gyis brlab// yi ge gsum yang swA hA'i mtha'//
225b1(rgyud 'bum): phaT kyi dbus su yang dag sbyar// sngags 'di yang ni bzla bar bya// brgya dang brgyad kyis lhag par gsal// tshangs pa'i thig ni btab nas ni// yi ge brgya pa bzla bar bya// de rjes de la me tog char//
225b2(rgyud 'bum): sngags ni brjod nas gtor bar bya// oM dang a mo g+ha pad+mo// de bzhin du ni phyi nas su// ba su d+ha ri d+ha ra gnyis// d+ha ra Ni maN+Da li hUM// yi ge brgya pa'i sngags dang ni// lan gsum bar du thig skud la//
225b3(rgyud 'bum): zhabs bsil chu yis bsang bar bya// yi ge gsum gyis thig gdab bya// zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rdo rje can gyi mtshams bzhi pa// thog mar shar dang byang dang ni// ji srid lho dang nub dag dang /
225b4(rgyud 'bum): mtshams su yang dag thig skud dang // slar yang yang dag gdab par bya// shar dang lho yi mtshams dang ni// nub dang byang gi mtshams su ni// thig skud kyis ni tshad gzhal bya// zur bzhi dang ni thig skud bya//
225b5(rgyud 'bum): bskor thig gsum ni sgo bzhi pa// rdo rje 'phreng ba gsum gyis mdzes// tshangs pa'i thig gnyis btab nas ni// de las dbang po'i pho brang ni// rnam pa kun gyis yang dag thig/ rgyal ba kun gyi
225b6(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs gnas gsal/ / de la rig pa 'dzin pa bri// slar yang rin chen phye ma 'am// tshon sna lnga rnams me tog dang // rdzas sam las kyis sbyor ba las// rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du// mtshan ma'i
225b7(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya la sogs bri/ / mi bskyod sku mdog phyag rgya sogs// rigs ni dbus su dgod par bya// rgyal ba rgyal dang rin chen 'chang // 'khor ba 'das dang shes rab 'chang // rim bzhin sku
