226a1(rgyud 'bum): mdog dbye ba yis/ / shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su dgod// gti mug zhe sdang chags pa dang // rdo rje dga' sogs rim pa bzhin// me la sogs pa'i mtshams
226a2(rgyud 'bum): rnams su/ / ji lta ba bzhin dgod par bya// sna tshogs pad+ma zla ba yi// gdan bdun gzhan gyi nyi ma gnyis// 'khor dga' zhe sdang dga' bar bcas// ka yi 'phreng gis rnam par brgyan//
226a3(rgyud 'bum): zhal gsum phyag drug rnam pa brgyan// g.yon na shes rab ral gri bsnams// gzugs dang dbyibs rnams ji bzhin du// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor mchod par bya// phyi rol gzugs kyi rdo rje
226a4(rgyud 'bum): / sogs// mtshams kyi char ni rnam par dgod// shar la sogs pa'i snam bu la// byams pa sa yi snying po shar// 'jam dpal phyag na rdo rje lhor// mkha' snying 'jig rten dbang phyug ni// kun
226a5(rgyud 'bum): nas nub tu bsgom par bya/ / sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang // kun tu bzang po byang du dgod// zhal gsum phyag drug rnam pa can// g.yon na ral gri dgod pa dang // phyag na rdo rje dri med pa'i//
226a6(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi ni gdan// lha mo rnams la zla ba'i gdan// sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng na gsal// rnam par snang mdzad rigs las byung // mtshan ma'i phyag rgya la sogs dgod// shar la
226a7(rgyud 'bum): sogs pa'i sgo rnams su/ / gshin rje gshed la sogs pa dgod// zhal gsum phyag drug rnam pa can// de bzhin ral gri g.yon na 'dzin// mi g.yo la sogs mtshams rnams su// gshin rje
226b1(rgyud 'bum): gshed kyi rang ngo bo/ / zhal gsum phyag drug rnam pa can// g.yon na ral gri rnam par bsam// gang phyir shes rab rang bzhin g.yon// de bzhin g.yon na ral gri brjod// gnod mdzes de bzhin
226b2(rgyud 'bum): gtsug tor ni/ / 'og dang steng du rnam par dgod// khro bo rnams ni nyi mar bzhugs// de bzhin sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdan// de bzhin phyag rgya dbyug la sogs// nye bar mtshon nas dgod par bya// de bzhin
226b3(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa rnam dag pa'i/ / ri mo lnga ni rnam par dgod// de la rdo rje 'bar ba'i 'phreng // ra ba gnyis ni yongs su bskor// rin chen dra ba rnga ma dang // lha mo rnams kyi snam bu yis// ka ba rta babs 'khor
226b4(rgyud 'bum): sor mtshan/ / ri dgas rnams kyis mtshan pas brgyan// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan sogs// rnga yab me long la sogs kyis// brgyan pa ru ni rnam par bshad// sangs rgyas rnams kyis yang
226b5(rgyud 'bum): dag brten/ / slob dpon mchog gi dkyil 'khor ni// rang gi lus kyi gzugs brnyan no// rdo rje slob dpon gyis bya ba// bgegs bskrad pas ni sngon song bas// sum b+ha'i sgra dang ni sum b+ha// thog
226b6(rgyud 'bum): / mar oM dang ngo mtshar che// hUM gnyis phaT kyi mtha' dang ldan// shar gyi sgo ru dgod par bya// oM dang gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na zhes// hUM gnyis phaT dang yang dag ldan// tho dang ldan pas lho ru dgod// oM dang gr-ih+Na
226b7(rgyud 'bum): pa ya gnyis/ / hUM gnyis phaT kyi mtha' dang ldan// nub tu yang dag spro bar bya// oM A na ya ho b+ha ga bAn bid+ya rA dza dang // hUM gnyis dang ni phaT mtha' dgod// de rjes yang ni byang du dgod// 'di yis
227a1(rgyud 'bum): gdug pa bkug nas ni/ / de nas sngags pas phur pa gdab// seng ldeng las ni byas pa yi// phur bu sor ni bcu gnyis tshad// zur gsum yi ge gsum gyis mtshan// yi ge
227a2(rgyud 'bum): brgya pa so sor bzlas/ / sngags kyi chu yis bsangs nas ni// phyogs dang mtshams su dgod par bya// oM dang yi ge g+ha lan gnyis// de bzhin g+hA ta ya ni gnyis// sar+b+ba duSh+TAM phaT ces dang // de bzhin kI la ya
227a3(rgyud 'bum): / gnyis dang // sarba pA paM phaT dang ni// hUM gsum badz+ra kI la ya// badz+ra d+ha ra A dz+nyA pa ya ti// kA ya bAka hr-it+taM badz+ra dang // kI la ya hUM phaT yi ge'i// mtha' can gyis ni phur bus gdab// oM dang badz+ra mud ga ra/
227a4(rgyud 'bum): badz+ra kI la ya A ko Ta// ya dang hUM gnyis phaT mtha' dang // sngags dang phur bus brdung ba brjod// rdo rjes bgegs ni 'jug la sogs// bskrad don rdo rje ra ba dang // steng du mda' yi dra ba dang // 'og tu
227a5(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs rdo rje dang / / gtsug tor gnod mdzes sngags kyis ni// byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga yis// bum pa bcu 'am yang na drug/ rin chen las byas rnam dag pa// sman lnga dang ni 'bras bu lnga// 'bru lnga
227a6(rgyud 'bum): la sogs kyis gang ba/ / rin chen lnga dang sna ma sogs// lo ma lnga yis rnam par brgyan// gur kum gla rtsi ga pur dang // tsan dan chu yis gang bar bya// me tog la sogs kyis mchod bya// rang rang sngags kyis
227a7(rgyud 'bum): / byin gyis brlab// badz+ra d+h+ri ka dang dzi na dzi ka/ rat+na d+h+r-ika dang A ro li ka/ de bzhin pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika sngags dang // lcags kyu'i rnam pa'i 'od zer gyis// 'og min 'jig rten khams nas ni// bum pa rang gis bskur byas pa/
227b1(rgyud 'bum): de nas spyan drangs nas ni gzhug/ de nas lha mo'i gzugs spros nas// de rjes gzhan la dgod par bya// oM dang ru ru s+phu ru dang // de las dz+wa la tiSh+Tha gsal// de bzhin sid+d+ha lo tsa na// sar+b+ba ar+tha sA d+ha na
227b2(rgyud 'bum): / swA hA zhes ni de la bzlas// spyan gyi rnam pa rdzogs nas ni// bum pa'i dbus su mchod par bya// oM dang shaM ka re dang yang // de las shAn ti ku ru dang // de bzhin g+hu ta g+hu ti dang // g+hu ti ne dang g+hu ti ne// g+hA ta ya ni lan
227b3(rgyud 'bum): gnyis brjod/ / swA hA'i mtha' can sngags brjod bya// mA ma kI yi rnam pa rdzogs// bum pa'i dbus su mchod par bya// oM dang ka Te bi ka Ta// ni ka Ta ka TaM ka Te// ka ro Ta bIr+ye swA hA/ gos dkar rnam par rdzogs nas ni/
227b4(rgyud 'bum): bum pa'i dbus su mchod par bya// oM dang tA re tut+ta re// tu re swA hA dgod par bya// sgrol ma'i rnam par rdzogs nas ni// bum pa'i dbus su mchod par bya// gshin rje gshed sogs gzhan rnams la//
227b5(rgyud 'bum): gcig la las ni thams cad pa// oM na maHsa man+ta kA ya bAka tsit+ta badz+rA NAM/ na maHbadz+ra kro d+hA ya/ ma hA daMSh+To ta ka Ta b+hai ra bA ya/ a si mu sa la/ pa ra shu pA sha hastA ya/ oM a mri ta kuN+Da li/ kha kha khA haM
227b6(rgyud 'bum): / khA hi/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ gar+dz+dza gar+dz+dza/ bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya/ sar+b+ba big+h+nAM bi nA ya kAn/ ma hA ga Na pa ti/ dzI bi ta an+ta ka rA ya hUM phaT swA hA/ sngags 'di lan bdun bar du ni/
227b7(rgyud 'bum): las ni thams cad pa yin te// snying po'i sngags ni bzlas byas la// rigs kyi dbang phyug mchod par bya// yi ge brgya pa'i sngags kyis ni// lan bdun bar du bsgom par bya// brgya dang rtsa brgyad rim pa yis/
228a1(rgyud 'bum): yi ge gsum yang bzlas pa ni// de nas rang lha'i rnal 'byor gyis// mchod yon snod du mchod par bya// de nas du gu la ras ni// ga pur a ka rus bdugs pa// bkab nas rang rang
228a2(rgyud 'bum): sngags dang ni/ / de la rim bzhin lhag gnas bya// zhal gsum phyag drug rnam pa can// sprin bral nam mkha' lta bu'o// de lta bu yi sku mdog phyag/ rang snang ba yi sku la 'khyud// A li kA li las byung ba// sna
228a3(rgyud 'bum): tshogs pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs/ / gzhal yas khang dbus nyams dga' ba'i// 'og min zhing khams na bzhugs pa'o// dkyil 'khor 'khor dang bcas pa ni// sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan can// bsgoms nas
228a4(rgyud 'bum): de las 'od zer spro/ / kha dog lnga dang lcags kyu yi// de yis spyan drang slob dpon gyis// sngags brjod nas ni spyan drang bya// e h+ye hi dang b+ha ga ban// sa ma ya ma nu sma ra// tiSh+Tha gnyis dang sa ma ya// de la a nu sma
228a5(rgyud 'bum): ra gnyis/ / sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dang // swA hA yi mtha' lan gsum brjod// 'jam pa'i rdo rje spyan drang bya// dkyil 'khor pa dang yang dag ldan// dkyil 'khor dbus su spyan drang ba// rang gi gdan gyi dbye ba la//
228a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs shing yang dag mchod par bya// rang rang sngags dang rim ji bzhin// lha yi me tog sogs kyis mchod// 'khor lo mchog ni mchod par bya// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin
228a7(rgyud 'bum): grong / / yo byad ci 'byor pa yis ni// dkyil 'khor mchod pa bgyi bar 'tshal// thugs ni brtse bar nyer dgongs te// mgon pos mchod pa 'di bzhes shig/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA nAM/ pU dzo pasta nA ya At+ma nAM niR+ShaH
228b1(rgyud 'bum): yA mi/ tha mas yi ge gsum ni brjod// lha yi rnam par byas nas ni// de rjes bdag la mchod par bya// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta// pU dza badz+ra swa b+hA ba// At+ma ko haM zhes ni brjod// rang lha'i nga rgyal byas nas ni// ji ltar
228b2(rgyud 'bum): bskyed pa'i yum rnams dang / / gnod byed kha na ma tho med// zhe sdang chen po'i rigs las byung // dkyil 'khor dbang phyug mchod bya zhing // de las lha rnams lhag gnas bya// yid 'phrog sna tshogs lha yi gos//
228b3(rgyud 'bum): ga pur a ka ru yis bdug/ sngags kyis dag byas dgab par bya// oM dang tiSh+Tha badz+ra hoH// brjod nas dkyil 'khor lhag gnas bya'o// oM dang s+pha ra badz+ra hoH// blo dang ldan pas sngags 'di brjod// me tog spar bas gtor
228b4(rgyud 'bum): nas ni/ / lhag gnas der ni gshegs par bya// rnam pa kun dang yang dag ldan// dkyil 'khor mchog ni mthong bar bya// rigs lnga'i rang bzhin bzang po yis// bcom ldan gzugs brnyan bsgoms nas ni// ma
228b5(rgyud 'bum): kholong sogs la khrus bya zhi na/ / de bzhin rdzas dang 'o ma sogs// ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis kyang // de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol ba// de bzhin bdag gis sku khrus gsol// cod pan dbang phyug rdo rje sems//
228b6(rgyud 'bum): / dbus su yi ge gsum dang spel// swA hA'i mtha' can brjod par bya// las kyi de nyid cho ga shes// de rjes sbyar ba'i gtor ma bya// oM sar+b+ba A ba ra Na// shud+d+ha sarba pA paM dang // bi shud+d+ha badz+ra hUM phaT// swA hA mtha'
228b7(rgyud 'bum): can sngags brjod bya/ / pad+ma bskor ba'i phyag rgya dang // yungs kar dkar po bsregs byas nas// nyon mongs pa ni sel bar byed// 'khyud cing bskor bas dor bar bya// de nas cho ga bzhin lags mchod// sil snyan
229a1(rgyud 'bum): @grul sogs pa dang / / bcom ldan 'das la dbul par bya// rang rang sngags dang go rims bzhin// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta// puSh+pa pU dza ma g+ha dang // sa mu rba dang sA ra Na/ sa ma pa dang shri la
229a2(rgyud 'bum): hUM gi sngags ni rjes su brjod/ / rdzas rnams kun la rang ming ni// gzugs la sogs pa snga ma bzhin// cho ga bzhin du yang dag brjod// rdo rje sems dpa' legs bsgyings pa// rdo rje slob dpon cho ga shes/
229a3(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'di yis ni rab gnas bya// oM dang su pra tiSh+Tha dang // badz+re swA hA'i mtha' can bzlas// yi ge gsum gyi snying po ni// sku gsung thugs la bkod nas ni// me tog char ni dbab par bya// slob dpon slob ma'i
229a4(rgyud 'bum): tshogs dang bcas/ / glu yis yang dag bskul nas ni// sad pa na ni phyag kyang bya// las kun bdag nyid rnal 'byor bdag/ gtor ma don kun grub par byed// las la byang zhing mkhas pa dang // cho ga bzhin du bsgyings
229a5(rgyud 'bum): bcas dang / / chang dang sna tshogs sha dang ni// de bzhin la du 'o ma dang // 'bras chan phye yi 'khur ba dang // sran 'khur bye ba mang po dang // mchod yon me tog sogs kyis mchod// snod bcu chu yis gang ba la'o//
229a6(rgyud 'bum): gsungs pa'i khro bo bcu sngags kyis// snga ma bzhin du cho ga yis// de dbus 'byung po kun la ni// ngo mtshar chen po'i gtor ma sbyin// snga ma bzhin du cho ga yis// til bsregs bza' bas khyad par du// blo dang ldan
229a7(rgyud 'bum): pas sngags bzlas bya/ / 'di ni don kun sgrub byed pa// oM prah+ma de ba tA sar+b+ba/ in+d+ra da sha lo ka rak+Sha ka/ nA ga gan d+harmA kuM b+hAr+N+Na/ yak+Sha b+hU ta ga nAH/ ta thA br-i ta ut+ka ta/ bi shA tsa~M a pa bA re/ DA ki nI gra ha/ big+h+nAM mA traH
229b1(rgyud 'bum): / NAHsar+b+ba ta thA ga ta ag+ni ma ra gra hA/ oM dzo b+hak+Sha ma hA te dza// ma nuSh+Ta nAm/ bi haM sa ka/ mu drA man+ta a d+hi d+ho b+haH/ gra hA ni k+Sha tra ma nu Sha/ i me ba li/ pra gr-ih+Nan+tu/ sid+d+hi m+me pra yats+tshan+tu me san+na/ sa t+ya ma ne Shu kar me Shu/
229b2(rgyud 'bum): sata sa ha/ ya b+ha ban+tu tse/ d+hA na d+hA na/ su ba ra NAny+tsa/ d+ha rAn+tu ma ma te shI ta/ i ti u pA tra Na tro Sha Ni/ satwA nA ma nA sha yan+tu tse/ thog mar au dang AHhUM phaT// swA hA'i mtha' can lus kun byed// de ltar
229b3(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'di snod la bzlas/ / rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par rol// slob ma lhag par gnas par byed// mtshan nyid yon tan gyis brgyan pa// tsan dan ga pur gla rtsi yi// chu yis kyang ni khrus byas te// dad pa'i chu
229b4(rgyud 'bum): ni 'chang ba yis/ / sems kyi dri ma rnam par 'khrud// bdog pa thams cad gtong bar byed// gos gtsang ba ni mchog tu bgo/ khang pa brtsegs ma byas nas ni// ras kyi yol ba kun nas bre// yi ge gsum dang
229b5(rgyud 'bum): yang dag ldan/ / rdo rje can gyis sngags chu ni// lan bdun gdong la gtor ba yis// las skyes dri ma sbyong bar byed// de nas sa yi snying po sogs// mig la sogs la rnam par dgod// sor mo dbu ma gnyis kyis ni//
229b6(rgyud 'bum): dbang po so so la reg pas// sngags brjod bya zhing byin gyis brlab// lus kyi dkyil 'khor rnal 'byor gyis// oM dang tsak+Shu tsak+ShuHdang // sa man+ta dang tsak+Shur+Na bzlas// mai tri sa twa lo tsa ne/ sar+b+ba ar+tha sA d+ha ni/
229b7(rgyud 'bum): swAhA'i mtha' dang sngags 'di brjod// mthe bong gung mo yang dag sbyar// zhabs bsil chu dang mnyes nas ni// sngags de lan gsum bzla bar bya// slob mo'i mig la so sor ni// mthe bo'i phyag rgyas reg par dag/
230a1(rgyud 'bum): khru gang ba la sor bzhi pa'i// skud pa zhags pa 'dra ba la// yi ge brgya pa'i sngags lanA gsum// bzlas nas zhabs bsil chus bsang bya// skud pa lan gsum bkris pa ni/
230a2(rgyud 'bum): rdorje gsum ni mdud par ldan// dpung pa g.yon par bcings pa ni// sngags 'di lan gsum brjod par bya// oM dang lo tsa ne yi sgra// ya ta tAta taM saM pra taM// maM b+ha bi Sh+yan+ti yi sgra// raM dang rat+na tra yA ya// sid+d+ha
230a3(rgyud 'bum): nani da dang / / ya sA ny+dza yi sngags 'di ni// theg pa bla med lan bdun bzlas// slob ma la ni me tog gtor// de nas rdo rje 'chang gis ni// sor ni bcu gnyis gzhal ba yi// zur ni gsum du yongs su bya//
230a4(rgyud 'bum): yi ge gsum gyis byin rlab sgom// slob ma'i lag tu gtad par bya// oM dang pra ti badz+ra dang // sa man+ta dang I shwa ri// AHhUM swA hA'i mtha' can sngags// bzlas nas slob mas dor bar bya// sar bab pa yi
230a5(rgyud 'bum): phur bu ste/ / phyogs ni gang du lta ba nyid// slob dpon dang ni slob ma yis// de yi phyogs bltas nyal bar bya// nam nangs yang dag bla ma la// ji ltar mthong ba'i don kun zhu// de la dmigs nas sbyin sreg ni//
230a6(rgyud 'bum): zhi ba la sogs rab dbye bas// las ni thams cad pa nyid dam// bgegs zhi ba yi don du bya// rdo rje sems dpa' bsgyings bcas pas// rnal 'byor ji bzhin cho ga bzhin// sngar bzhin 'dir yang gtor ma ni//
230a7(rgyud 'bum): bgegs rnams zhi phyir sbyin par bya// de nas gsol 'debs slob sa ni// rdo rje slob dpon thugs rjes khyab// thal mo sbyar ba byas nas ni// mdun du 'dug nas phyag byas te// dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa pas//
230b1(rgyud 'bum): slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol// byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa// mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo// dam tshig de nyid sprul du gsol// sdom pa rnams kyang bdag la gsol// thar pa chen po'i grong
230b2(rgyud 'bum): mchog tu/ / mgon po bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal// de nas bla mas de la yang // bya dang mi bya gsungs pa ni// sems can las kyi srad bus gdab// rdul tshon bkye ba'i rim pa dgye// 'gro ba 'di dag dkyil
230b3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor te/ / rang bzhin dag pa gnyis med pa'o// thog mar dkyil 'khor rnal 'byor ba dag/ rdo rje slob dpon rang nyid sgom// slob ma bdag nyid 'drar dmigs nas// de 'og thams cad rab bsgrub bya// bla ma
230b4(rgyud 'bum): bzang la dbang bskur phyir/ / slob mas de rjes gsol ba gdab// 'di nas 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho la// nyon mongs chu srin na kras khyab// las kyi rlung gis dpa' klong 'khrug/ bdag bying thugs rje'i rgya mtshor skye//
230b5(rgyud 'bum): mi shes ling tog gis bsgribs mig/ nyon mongs dbang du bya ba ni// bde pa sdug bsngal 'jigs las skyob// thugs rje'i rgya mtshos bdag skyabs mdzod// de 'dra tshig gsan rdo rje can// thugs rje'i thugs
230b6(rgyud 'bum): ni yongs su gang / / slob ma la ni yongs su gsungs// khu khyod dus 'di nas bzung ste// rdo rje theg pa'i gzhung lugs bstan// rnal 'byor mchog ni khyod kyis bzung // rdo rje sems dpa'i spyod pa'i gnas// bu khyod
230b7(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni bdud rtsi ste/ / srungs shig ma bsrungs na ni bsreg/ bsrungs na dngos grub kun 'grub 'gyur// nyon mongs thams cad sel ba'i rlung // oM dang pany+tsa a mri ta// u da ka dang AHhUM Tha// slob mas bdud rtsi lnga
231a1(rgyud 'bum): btung bya/ / rdo rje ye shes rmang byung ba'o// gsang ba dran na skyon 'gyur phyir// rdo rje slob ma la ni dbab// ji chen dri chu la sogs pa// mtshal 'bab pa yi bu mo'i gos// khrag dang khubs yang dag
231a2(rgyud 'bum): bsgos/ / gu gul dang ni rnam par bsres// yi dgas me ni blangs nas su// pad+ma'i snod du gzhag nas ni// der ni thams cad gzhug par bya// khro bo rdo rje gsum bdag nyid// g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas gnas//
231a3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje 'chang dbang slob ma la// rmad byung chen po'i bdug pas bdug/ 'bab par 'gyur ba the tsom med// oM tiSh+Tha ma hA kro d+ha// de bzhin A be sha ya hUM// rnal 'byor pa yis sngags 'di brjod// slob ma la ni gsas
231a4(rgyud 'bum): bar dbab/ / badz+ra sa twa hi ma he// bid+yA rA dza ya bid+yA ma he// de ltar sngags ni 'di yis kyang // slar yang slob ma dbang bskur nas// rang bzhin gyis dag rang gi lus// dkyil 'khor mchog 'di mthong ba na// de bzhin
231a5(rgyud 'bum): gshegs dang lha mo dang / / rgyal ba'i sras kyis yang dag gzhi// khro bo khyab pa'i gsang ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' rten dang ni// phyi dang nang gi dkyil 'khor ni// gnyis po de la bstan par bya// slar yang
231a6(rgyud 'bum): slob mas gsol ba gdab/ / bdag la dbang bskur mdzad du gsol// rnam rgyal bum pa blangs nas ni// pad+ma'i snod ni bzang po la// de yi dbus su bro bzang po// hUM rdor las byung mi bskyod sgrom// rang nyi
231a7(rgyud 'bum): ye shes sa bon gyi/ / 'od zer yang dag bskul bas byung // slar yang ye shes sems dpa' sgom// mi bskyod pa yi rnam pa mchog/ mi bskyod ngo bo de nyid kyis// rnam par shes pa'i phung po sgom// slob ma'i mgo
231b1(rgyud 'bum): / bor lag pa gzhag/ rdo rje slob dpon thugs rjes khyab// oM dang ma hA sa ma ya// de bzhin I shwa ra tAM dang // a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi swA hA/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta// a b+hi She ka sa ma ya/ shri ye AHhUM de nas bzla/
231b2(rgyud 'bum): chu yi rdzing nas slob ma la// dbu rgyan dbang bskur don du ni// cod pan 'jig rten gsum rgyal po// sems can kun gyis don sgrub pa// snying rjes khyab pa ngas byin gyis// rdo rje sems dpa'i yon tan gnas// sa
231b3(rgyud 'bum): bon traM las byung ba yi/ / rin chen 'byung ldan bsgoms nas ni// ri mo dar sogs cod pan dang // slob ma'i mgo la sbyin par bya// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta// rat+na su ku Ta sgra dang // de bzhin sgra dang pU dza ya// a tiSh+Tha dang AHhUM dang //
231b4(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'di dag ni brjod nas ni// me tog mgo la sbyin par bya// slob ma rdo rje dbang bskur phyir// slar yang bla ma la gsol gdab// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin dngos// rdo rje brtul zhugs ngas byin gyis// gang gis
231b5(rgyud 'bum): ma rig sgo nga 'byed/ / ye shes thob 'gyur nga yis byas// hriHlas pad+ma rdzogs par ni// 'od dpag med du rnam par sgom// rdo rje lag pa g.yas par sbyin// slob ma la ni 'di skad brjod// ngas khyod de ring dbang bskur
231b6(rgyud 'bum): bya 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad de/ / kun tu bzang po'i brtul zhugs brtan// dngos grub bzang phyir rdo rje long // khaM las byung ba'i ral gri'am// don yod grub pa'i rang ngo bo// rdzogs par lag pa g.yon
231b7(rgyud 'bum): pa ni/ / slob ma bsgyings pa'i phyag rgya 'dzin// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// dril bu sgra yi rjes 'gror brjod// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang // byang chub mchog ni rgyal ba'i gzhi// rdo rje dril bu bzung
232a1(rgyud 'bum): rjes la/ / rdo rje sems dpa' rang ngo bo// rang bzhin yon tan rnams kyis gang // bdag po yi ni rnal 'byor 'gyur// rnam par snang mdzad rang ngo bo// slob ma'i mgo la lag bzhag ste// rdo rje
232a2(rgyud 'bum): can gyis ming dbang bskur/ / gzugs kyi phung po rnam par sgom// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta// che ge mo zhes badz+ra sa tAM// a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi swA hA// phung po lnga yi rnam dag pa// thog mar chu nas ming gi mthar// dbang bskur ba
232a3(rgyud 'bum): ni mchog tu shes/ / rmad byung chen po bshad par bya// sangs rgyas lnga ni dag pa 'di// dbang bskur lnga ni thob par 'gyur// ma rig pa ni bsal nas ni// ye shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur// de nas rdo rje sems dpa'
232a4(rgyud 'bum): yi/ slob ma 'dod don sngags dbang sbyin// sngags kyi dbang bskur ye shes mchog/ ngas byin dngos grub ster bar byed// de nas yi ge drug sngags phaT// swA hA'i mtha' can yi ge gsum/ kha ni dam tshig gis bkang nas//
232a5(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyi sku yis dag pa dang // bla mas zhal las yang dag brjod// bla mas dngos grub sbyin bya'i phyir// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// snying po yi ni ye shes mchog/ sangs rgyas thams cad bsdus pa ni//
232a6(rgyud 'bum): khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang // de nas slob ma spyod brtul zhugs// sna tshogs bsam pa'i bye brag gis// gang gis spyod pa rnam dag pa// 'dod la thugs rje'i gtso bo yis// sems can don ni byed pa'i
232a7(rgyud 'bum): thabs/ / nga yis spyod pa'i brtul zhugs sbyin// de nas glegs bam dung la sogs// mda' gzhu ral gri 'khor lo dang // sngon bzhin sngags kyis dag par byed// slob ma'i lag tu rim bzhin sbyin//
232b1(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni kun bzang spyod brtul zhugs// bsam pa sna tshogs rnam dag byed// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang // sems can kun gyi don gyis byos// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta// de bzhin d+hi Ta ra tAM dang // de ltar sngags
232b2(rgyud 'bum): 'di dgod par bya/ / de nas lung bstan thob don du// bsam pa dang bas bla ma la// da ltar sangs rgyas rigs su 'jug/ khyed kyis bdag la lung bstan gsol// don yod rdo rje zhes bya khyod// rigs kyi dbang
232b3(rgyud 'bum): phyug lung bstan bya/ / de nas slob ma dbugs dbyung 'dod// bla ma'i zhal snga nas ni kye// mgon po yang dag bdag dbugs phyung // byang chub spyod pa'i brtul zhugs brtan// de nas rdo rje chos gos mtha'//
232b4(rgyud 'bum): g.yon pa'i lag pas bzung nas ni// g.yas pa mi 'jigs sbyin byas la// dbugs dbyung ba yi mchog bya ba// nga yis rdo rje gsung bdag khyod// sangs rgyas kun gyi go 'phang mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' mngon par brjod//
232b5(rgyud 'bum): khams gsum gyi ni rgyal po che// dpal ldan yon tan 'byung gnas bdag/ bdud kyi stobs ni kun las rgyal// grong khyer mchog tu khyod zhugs so// de nas slob ma don 'dod la// phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang
232b6(rgyud 'bum): bskur bya/ / phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur che// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la stsol// de nas ye shes rdor dbang phyung // ye shes sems dpa'i 'od zer gyis// spyan drangs sangs rgyas lnga la sogs// lha mo'i 'khor lo
232b7(rgyud 'bum): rim bzhin 'byung / / de yis ye shes chus bkang ba'i// bum pa phyag bsnams de bzhin gshegs// rdo rje 'dzin dang rgyal ba rgyal// rin chen 'dzin dang 'khor ba sgrol// shes rab 'chang ni rim pa bzhin// gti mug zhe
233a1(rgyud 'bum): sdang 'dod chags la/ / de bzhin rdo rje dga' ma sogs// gshin rje mthar byed shes rab byed// pad+ma mthar byed bgegs mthar byed// 'di yis kun nas dbang bskur bas// rdo rje slob ma
233a2(rgyud 'bum): rnam par bsam/ / dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje che// khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas pa// gsang ba gsum gyi gnas las byung // sangs rgyas kun ni nga yis sbyin// de nas de bzhin gshegs lha mo// khro bo rang gi
233a3(rgyud 'bum): gnas su dgod/ / 'jam dpal rnam par bsgoms nas ni// ye shes rdo rjes rnam par brgyan// oM dang su pra tiSh+Tha dang // badz+ra swA hA zhes ni dgod// blo bzang gis ni sngags brjod nas// slob ma la ni me tog gtor//
233a4(rgyud 'bum): de nas me tog sogs kyis mchod// slob ma'i dkyil 'khor 'khor lo 'dra// thugs rjes khyab pa'i bla ma yis// de nas slob ma rjes gnang bya// de nyid shes pa'i rnal 'byor pas// mi bya ba ni ci yang med//
233a5(rgyud 'bum): dpal chen khyod kyi bka' drin gyis// da ni 'dod yon lnga la spyod// sgyu ma rmi lam 'drar shes nas// rten 'brel las byung chos rnams ni// gzugs brnyan lta bur shes nas ni// sems can don ni mnyam med byos// khyab
233a6(rgyud 'bum): byas pa'i slob ma ni/ / ci bde bar ni sgrub par gyis// de nas bla ma la yon dbul// bstod cing kun nas phyag kyang bya// skye bo bzang dang lhan cig tu// de nas bla ma gsang don gnyer// thur du kha bltas kha sbyar te// ji ltar
233a7(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid chen po khyod/ / bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar mdzod// de nas rigs lnga las byung ba'i// las dang chos sogs dbye ba yis// sngags kyi theg pas lhag par grol// skal ldan bud med phyag rgyar bshad// skye bos
233b1(rgyud 'bum): dben pa'i mtshan phyed na/ / ro yi gzhi yi gnas song nas// thugs rje chen pos khyab pa yi// rdo rje slob dpon yon tan 'byung // de ltar ji ltar rnyed phyag rgya// snyoms 'jug la ni gang byung ba'i// bla na med pa'i rang
233b2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gyi/ / sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa ni// rnal 'byor ma yis yang dag ltung // kun rdzob byang chub sems gang yin// gsung ba de yis dbang bskur bya// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// dam tshig chen po
233b3(rgyud 'bum): rnam byung ba/ / khams lnga las byung bcud kyis len// bde ba chen pos myang bar gyis// slob ma rtog pa dang bral bas// pad+ma la gnas de myang gis// 'das pa'i rdo rje 'chang ba yis// rgyal sras ji ltar dbang
233b4(rgyud 'bum): bskur bya/ / byang chub sems kyi chu yis ni// bu khyod de bzhin dbang bskur bya// de nas shes rab dbang bskur phyir// bla mas don 'dod slob ma la// dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa ni// bdag la khyod kyis dbang
233b5(rgyud 'bum): bskur stsol/ / de nas slob dpon bdag nyid che// phyag rgya yang dag byin gyis rlob// mchog ni thob par bya ba'i phyir// de 'og slob ma la ni sbyin// lha mo phyag rgya chen po 'di// dpag med bde ba rab ster ba/
233b6(rgyud 'bum): bu yis kun nas blangs nas ni// bla na med pa'i mchod pa gyis// de nas shes rab ye shes de'i// sgrub pa'i mchog tu 'dod pa'i don// lha mo'i ye shes de nyid mchog/ dngos grub don du nga yis sbyin// lha mos de la
233b7(rgyud 'bum): bka' bsgo ba/ / dpa' bo'i bu ni bla na med// dpa' bo khyod ni spro 'am ci// byang chub sems ni za nus sam// yang dag de ni nges par ni// ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du smos// ji ltar gsungs pa'i dam tshig mchog/
234a1(rgyud 'bum): lha mo ci phyir bdag mi nus// de nas lha mo de dgyes nas// skra bkrol gos ni bor nas kyang // pad+ma dag ni 'byed byed cing // badz+ra mok+Sha ho zhes gsungs// b+ha ga'i pad+mo'i dbus
234a2(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa/ / bde ba kun tu rgyu ba'i rtsa// sor mos bskul nas dga' bar bya// dza~M hAs kyang ni rol par bya// lhan cig skyes pa'i bde byed pa// 'di nyid rig pa bzang bsten na// mchog tu dga' bas nyams myong nas/
234a3(rgyud 'bum): lhung ba'i bde bas da myang bya// de nas bcom ldan ma dgyes nas// b+hAny+dza mo k+Sha'i sngags gsungs zhing // rkang pa g.yon pa mgo la gzhag/ bka' yis de nyid yang dag bstan// de ring phan chad bu khyod kyis//
234a4(rgyud 'bum): ji srid byang chub snying po'i bar// rmi lam bzhin du sems can gyi// bla na med pa'i don byos shig/ bskyed pa'i rim pa sgom pa yi// 'di la man ngag la mi shes// rig pa 'di ni dor byas nas// thabs gzhan gyis ni/

234a7(rgyud 'bum): / gnas gshegs badz+ra muH// de nas lhag ma'i gtor ma sbyin// 'khor lo lhag par 'byung ba'i rim// uts+tshi Sh+Ta k+She tra pA la// a ti tsakra uts+tshiSh+Ta// su b+he dza nAM bi ba gnyis// b+hak+Sha gnyis dang sar+b+ba dang // srid+d+hi pra ya tsA me dang /

234b4(rgyud 'bum): po'i rgyu mtshan ci/ / de yi 'bras bu ci zhig 'gyur// chen po'i chen po ji skad gsungs// de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// las kyi rgyu mtshan 'bras bu dang // sngon du bsnyen pa'i las kyis ni// rgyu mtshan 'jig rten dngos grub
234b5(rgyud 'bum): brgyad/ / ser sna la sogs bsal ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas mchod pa rnam sgom zhing // sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus bsam gtan rab tu rdzogs// shes rab ye shes dbang bskur gyis// shes rab pha rol phyin pa
234b6(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs/ / gsang ba la sogs la gnas pa// skye bo chags pa'i rgyu mtshan no// kun tu spyod pa'i chos rnams kyis// mnyam nyid ye shes rgyu yis ni// bla ma dad pas mchod pa ni// rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang don// chu sogs
234b7(rgyud 'bum): ming ni mthar thug pa/ / ye shes lnga yi rnam dag phyir// spyod pa phyir mi ldog pa'i mtha'// sems can bsam pa rnam dag phyir// shes rab brtul zhugs sogs kyi mtha'// dpe yis bde ba bstan pa'i phyir// dkyil 'khongs
235a1(rgyud 'bum): tshon phra rab dang / / mtshungs pa de bzhin gshegs pa kun// mchod pa nyid du 'gyur ba dang // de ltar 'bras bu 'khor lo 'jug/ sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa ni// las kyi sgrib pa dag
235a2(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / shin tu rnam dag chos kyi dbyings// dbang bskur ba ni thob pa dang // dngos po'i ngo bo'i ji bzhin du// shes rab ye shes kyis ni thob// bla ma yis ni sgrub pa yang // mchod pa de yi go 'phang

235a7(rgyud 'bum): mchod par bya/ / gang phyir sems kyi rang bzhin kun// sems las gzhan pa yod ma yin// rang nyid rdo rje sems dpa' dang // sems kyi rang bzhin la ni gnas// lha yi gzugs ni bla med pa// sems ma gtogs pa gzhan ni med/

235b2(rgyud 'bum): 'byor skal yod skal med ces/ / nam yang smra bar mi bya'o// phyag rgya'i rnam pa sngon po sogs// de bzhin gzugs la'ang dbye ba gsum// gzugs rdo rje ma bkug nas su// sa snying la ni dbul bar bya//

239b4(rgyud 'bum): su gsol/ / me thab thig la tsam du gsungs// blugs gzar nam yang mi 'pho ba// sangs rgyas gti mug dga' la sogs// gzugs rdo rje sogs rgyal sras rnams// khro bo'i rgyal po bcu la ni// rtag tu
239b5(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg gis tshim bya/ / rdo rje sems dpa' mchod pa gang // de yang dgang blugs su ni brjod// hUM phaT yang dag ldan sngags kyis// cho ga bzhin du sreg blugs dbul// de yis lus gnas mnyes 'gyur na//
239b6(rgyud 'bum): / lha yi dam tshig bla na med// yid la ji ltar 'dod pa rnams// de ltar dngos grub stsal nas ni// sbyin sreg 'di ni mchog tu gsungs// dngos grub kun gyis 'bras bu stsol// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje
239b7(rgyud 'bum): 'thang ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ nang gi bdag nyid kyi sbyin sreg gi le'u ste drug cu tham pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// bdud rtsi lnga ni bza' ba ni/
240a1(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub kun byed de nyid mchog/ ji ltar rigs pa'i rim pa bzhin// rnam snang mdzad dang mi bskyod dang // don yod grub dang 'od dpag med// rin chen rgyal mtshan lnga po ni//
240a2(rgyud 'bum): bdud rtsi lnga yi mtshan nyid do// khrag ni rin chen dbang phyug dang // byang chub sems ni 'od dpag med// de bzhin don yod grub pa sha/ mi bskyod de bzhin rdo rje chu// dri chen rnam snang mdzad du bshad// de dag bdud
240a3(rgyud 'bum): rtsi lnga ni mchog/ bas mtha' nyams dga' skye bos dben// sgra yi tsher ma rnam par spangs// de la khang pa bya ba ni// khang pa nyis brtsegs sgo dang bcas// sa 'og khang pa gcig bya zhing // gzhan dag de yi steng du bya/
240a4(rgyud 'bum): gzhan ni gsang nas bya ba ste// 'jig rten pa ni gcig tu shes// sgrub pos de nyid kun shes shing // sngags shes bsam pa rgya che ba// brtan zhing snying rje mkhas pa dang // yul la phrag dog rnam par spangs// sgrub po ga
240a5(rgyud 'bum): bo'i yon tan gang / / de lta bu nyid sgrub grogs mchog/ chags dang chags bral rnam par spangs// brtson zhing brkam chags med pa dang // khro med dang bcas dpa' ba dang // mang du thos shing yod par blta//
240a6(rgyud 'bum): thog ma gnyis ka yi ni lus// 'bras bu sogs kyis dag bya ba// gnod mdzes skul byed 'bum phrag gcig/ de rjes sngags pas bzla bar bya// oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+Na
240a7(rgyud 'bum): pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM hUM phaT/ oM A na ya ho b+ha ga bAn bid+yA rA dza hUM hUM phaT/ de nas zla gcig yi ge gsum// sgrub pos mi smra ba zlas par bya// kun tu bzang po 'gro ba'i gtso// de ni skad cig rmi la ma mthong // des ni
240b1(rgyud 'bum): bka' yis bsgo ba ni/ / ka n+yA mchog ni rten gyis la// sems can don ni mtshungs med byos// ji ltar de nyid rdo rje 'chang // bu mo skal ldan mig yangs ma// gzugs dang yang tshos rnam par brgyan// brkam
240b2(rgyud 'bum): chags med cing chags bcas sems/ / sgeg pas myos shing bsgyings dang bcas// nu rgyas sngo bsangs nyams dga' ba// rnam rtog med cing mang du thos// sgrub pos de srid 'dod par bya// ji srid khu ba dang
240b3(rgyud 'bum): bcas gyur/ / de nas gdong ni pad+ma gnyis// gnyis ka 'byung ba blangs nas ni// pad+ma'i snod der gzhag par bya// mtshan nyid bzang por zhag bdun du// glang po rta khyi ba lang mi// dpyid zla tha chung gnyis ka shar//

240b5(rgyud 'bum): cing dben pa'i gnas/ / tsan dan bzang po byugs nas ni// dzaHhUMHbaM hoH'i sngags bkod pa'i// pad+mo'i snod la gzhag par bya// ra yi 'o ma til gyi mar// mar dang li kha dkar po dang // cha bsnyams bskol ba
240b6(rgyud 'bum): byas nas ni/ / de dang lhan cig snod bzhag bsre// rgya shugs tshig gu tshad tsam gyis// blo dang ldan pas ril bu bya// grib ma la ni bskam byas nas// rim gyis bskyed cing bza' bar bya// rdo rje ming sring spun dang ni//
240b7(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor ma dang lhan cig bza'// zla ba gcig nas de nas lhag/ mdza' bo rnams dang yang dag bsgo// mar ngo'i tshes brgyad tshes bcu 'am// yang na bcu bzhi nas brtsams te// de la gtor ma bya ba ni// las kun
241a1(rgyud 'bum): la ni bla na med/ / de las kyang ni dngos grub ste// b+hag rgya chen po mngon rdzogs dang // dngos grub rgyas dang zhi ba sogs// de yis 'bad mi dgos par thob/ rlung gi de nyid yang dag srog/
241a2(rgyud 'bum): mamakha' spyod nyid ni thob par 'gyur// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ bdud rtsi lnga bza' ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa gcig pa'o//
241a3(rgyud 'bum): de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga mchog/ gang gis mchod pa las byung ba// rgyal sras rnams kyi dngos grub mchog/ rnal 'byor che dang lhan cig tu// sgrub pa'i phyir ni yang
241a4(rgyud 'bum): dag gnas/ / phyag rgya brda ni yongs shes shing // de dang dam tshig la ni 'jug/ de rnams tshogs ni rab mchog dang // tshogs kyi 'khor lo zhes ni brjod// kun kyang dam tshig la gnas pa// rtog pa thams cad
241a5(rgyud 'bum): rnam par spangs/ / bla ma la dang dam tshig gnas// gtong sogs yon tan rnams kyis brgyan// thabs shes bya ba bgegs med na// tshogs kyi 'khor lo la ni 'jug/ gzhan du skyon ni 'byung 'gyur te//
241a6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo la yang 'grub mi 'gyur// shes rab kyang ni thabs dang mtshungs// mdza' bo bzang dang rab tu mkhas// lo ni nyi shu rtsa lnga lon// lhag pa yongs su spangs nas ni// thabs dang so sor shes rab dang //
241a7(rgyud 'bum): kun la gcig ni phan yon med// thog ma yid 'ong nyams dga' bar// me tog gi ni dkyil 'khor bya// de nyid sna tshogs mchod pa ni// legs par mnyam par gzhag nas mchod// gtso bo dngos po kun
241b1(rgyud 'bum): gyis ni/ / rdo rje sems dpa' bzhin du mchod// tshogs kyi mchod pa byas rjes la// dkyil 'khor lugs 'byung lugs bzlog pas// dad pa dngos pos kun nas ni// mnyam pas blta bas bsgoms nas ni//
241b2(rgyud 'bum): bstan bcos nyams myong 'jig rten dang // 'gal ba de ni gzhug mi bya// gzhan yang bstan bcos las gsungs pa// mtshan phyed na ni dgug par bya// slob dpon mgon la yang dag mchod// ji ltar gdan stengs
241b3(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs gsol nas/ / gdan ni rdo rje sems dpa' yi// phyag rgya chen po yang dag ldan// rdo rje slob dpon de nyid kyang // mkhyen pa 'khor lo'i dbus na bzhugs// dkyil 'khor pa ni gzhan rnams dang // de bzhin
241b4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo gnas pa gzhag/ dkyil 'khor pa bzhin shes par bya// tshogs kyi 'khor lor gtam smra dang // rtsod dang de bzhin sgrub pa dang // mchil snabs dor zhing dgod pa dang // rkang pa la sogs rkyong ba dang /
241b5(rgyud 'bum): yang dang yang du ldang ba ni// de la dus kun tu mi bya// phyag rgya brda yi tshogs rnams kyis// bya zhing bya bar shes par bya// shes bzhin du ni gar dang glu// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du mi bya// gtso bo la ni snod kyi
241b6(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ dum bu gcig pa mtshan nyid bzang // de med dum bu gsum pa la// me tog sna tshogs rnams kyis mchod// lha yi chang la sogs pa gang // legs par mnyam par gzhag ste dbul// tshogs rnams la
241b7(rgyud 'bum): yang so sor snod/ / me tog tshogs kyis yongs gang ba// thog mar gtor ma chen po sbyin// sngon bzhin bza' ba la sogs ldan// gang gis dga' ba rnams nyams pa// de 'dra btung bar mi bya'o// yang dang yang du
242a1(rgyud 'bum): @/ phyag byas nas// phyag rgya bcings nas brdung bar bya// de nas bza' ba thams cad ni// sbyang bya sogs kyis yang dag sbyar// oM dang AHhUM gis ni// sbyang dang sa dang rtogs par bya// lu /
242a2(rgyud 'bum): tsan ngan dpa' bo dang // gangs dang ri dgas lte ba dang // 'di ni dag byed bdud rtsi lnga// bza' ba 'di rnams rab tu spyod// sbom po ming med sbyor ba yis// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rim bzhin// gang gis lce rtses myang bar bya/
242a3(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma'i dbus su dus kun tu// kha la sems ni rnam par bkod// bla na med pa'i mchod pa bya// pad+ma'i lte ba'i dbus la ni// dpa' bo rnams kyi gdan du brjod// dpa' bo'i don gyis mtshan nyid rnams// gal te dpa'
242a4(rgyud 'bum): bo mi shes na/ / dngos grub thams cad gsol ba yi// 'khor lo de yi 'bras bu med// de lta'i rim pa cung zad gang // phyi nang bdag nyid yang dag spyod// de cis yang dag dngos grub 'gyur// tshogs kyi
242a5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo'i 'bras bu ster/ / rnal 'byor ma dang lhan cig 'dres// rab tu bshad kyis de nyon cig/ gdug pa'i mkha' 'gro ma dga' zhig/ sems rtogs pa yi phyir 'ongs nas// de la de tshe smra ba yang // sgrub pa

242a7(rgyud 'bum): gang nyid rdo rje sems/ / las kyi rdo rje gzhan 'ga' med// sna tshogs kyi ni rnal 'byor ma// yang dang yang du dgug par bya// de la g.yo ba'i spyod pa med// slob dpon dpa' bo bzhin du spyod// gang yang skyon gyi spyod pa ni// de yi lus
242b1(rgyud 'bum): ni ltung bar 'gyur/ / shin tu dga' ba yang dag skyes// bka' bsgo gar gyi spyod pa bya// rdo rje bcing bas de yang bya// lha rnams ji ltar mnyes pa nyid// ma 'am sring mo bu mo 'am// gal te mchod par 'dod pa na//

242b3(rgyud 'bum): tratra pA lA ya swA hA sngags brjod bya/ / gal te de la rab byed pa'i// rnal 'byor ma ni slar yang mthong // de ltar de ni yongs shes nas// rnal 'byor pa yi mtshan nyid mchog/ gang gis gdong ni 'bar ba'i

242b5(rgyud 'bum): dang / / kha dog ser po yid 'phrog pa// 'di yi dpral bar yi ge gsum// ji srid sgra mtshams bar du gnas// g.yul du 'chi ba rnams kyis ni// 'dzum dag la ni rtag tu nyan// 'di 'dra'i mkha' 'gro
242b6(rgyud 'bum): mthong na ni/ / mdung gi phyag rgya bstan par bya// rkang pa g.yon pa bskum pa dang // de yi bar byed rab tu ston// g.yon pas yongs su bskor nas ni// phyag rgya lan gyis bstan par bya// sna tshogs pa yi gos la
242b7(rgyud 'bum): dga'/ / rin chen 'byung ldan rigs las byung // kha dog gnag cing gos kyang gnag/ swa ni 'khyim cing dar gyis bcings// dpral bar gzhu yi rnam pa yis// de 'dra'i mtshan ma mthong nas ni// rtag tu de ni sems gsol/
243a1(rgyud 'bum): ma mo zhes ni rab tu grags// dril bu'i phyag rgya bstan par bya// de yi g.yon pas phyag rgya ston// mi bskyod rigs las byung bar shes// mtshan mo'i sa nas 'gro ba'i mchog/ thung ngu lho sbom
243a2(rgyud 'bum): dog dkar/ / byin pa sbom zhing shin tu mdzes// sa spyod mar ni shes par bya// dung gi phyag rgya lan yin no// rnam par snang mdzad rigs las byung // mig yangs rdzi ma stug pa dang // yan lag kun la ba spus brgyan//
243a3(rgyud 'bum): sngo bsangs mig ni dmar ba dang // yan lag phra zhing dpung pa ring // de ni mkha' 'gro ma ru grags// don yod grub pa'i rigs las byung // de 'dra ba yis rab mthong nas// ba dan gyi ni phyag rgya dang // g.yon pa'i phyag rgya'i lan
243a4(rgyud 'bum): yin no/ / de ltar 'bad pas shes nas ni// mkhas pas mtshan mo song nas ni// de la cung zhig 'jigs mi bya// gang phyir de nyid gang mchod bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ tshogs

243a6(rgyud 'bum): rnams su/ / rigs kun las byung rnal 'byor ma// mtshan mo 'du ba'i dam tshig ni// 'di 'dra ba yi tshigs rnams dang // de lta bu yi gsang ba ni// bshad kyis dang ba'i sems kyis nyon// saM bo tA kaM chang 'thung
243a7(rgyud 'bum): bi raM sha ru mngon par brjod/ / na li ni pa taM thod dang // ku laM laM mi'i rus pa'i rgyan// kun da raM 'dod yang dag sbyor// tsa ro ro drug bza' ba'o// saM pu taM dbang po gnyis sbyor ba// a li gang yod pa yi ming /
243b1(rgyud 'bum): shang rim ga kaM skal yod shes// tsi tra ka ni skal med shes// ru sha raM ni zhu bar shes// me ga ma dam gla rtsir brjod// tsan dra ma ni khrag tu bshad// ga naM bshad par yongs su grags// g+ha naM sha chen du ni bshad//
243b2(rgyud 'bum): ni dzaM da du ra ru brjod// b+ha ha naM ni chu ru bshad// ba k+ShaM yan lag rab tu bshad// shu paM bzang po zhes ni brjod// ho ni tshim pa zhes ni grags// marga ltogs pa ru ni brjod// g+hi taM laM du bshad pa dang // byo ma gaM naM pa

243b6(rgyud 'bum): ces brjod par bya/ / pa laM sha ni nya shes brjod// di na mar skyes bu ni bshad// nam tAM sbyin sreg tu ni bshad// marta a hA 'dab chags brjod// hi ra phyu ni me tog brjod// sha drul lam ni spos su bshad// mA la

244a1(rgyud 'bum): ni so ru brjod/ / bal la po ni mchu ru shes// ba sha mgrin pa ru ni grags// hUM so phrag pa ru ni bshad// a gu ro ni dpung bar brjod// so so ru ni lag par bshad// shri bang le ni nu mar
244a2(rgyud 'bum): brjod/ / dza ta~M ba laM rkang par brjod// da la naM ni lte bar brjod/ pad+ma dza la mags pa'i gnas/ ka taM ba kaM brla gnyis so// be saM dz+ra dar du ni bshad// tshA ga na ni rkang par brjod// ba ra a ka ke sa ra// sen mo zhes ni yang dag bshad/

244a4(rgyud 'bum): a k+Sha raM rim mi zhim bshad// mI gaM mi smra bar ni bshad// pa go la mu daM glu len// mi tra gar zhes bya bar brjod// shap+ta tshul 'chos su ni bshad// spar sha zhags par rab tu grags// rangs sgeg mo yi ro

244a6(rgyud 'bum): bya bar bshad/ ku ru ta ra mkhas par bshad// na ya na ni rnam shes brjod// a b+hi na baM dgod par bshad// ru d+hi ra ni 'chang bar brjod// ku mu ra ni nyin mor bshad// kan nya mtshan mor rab tu

245a2(rgyud 'bum): cad rnam sel ba/ / de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhugs so// lus kyi tshigs ni thams cad la// de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'o// lag pa g.yas pa'i rtsa bar ni// de bzhin gshegs pa gshin rje gshed//
