245a7(rgyud 'bum): dpa'i dbye ba yis/ / rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma lus 'di// lus pa med pa sangs rgyas sku// skye ba 'di la rnal 'byor pa// mya ngan 'das pa myur du 'thob// khyod kyi dge ba yongs sbyin pa// de bas rdo rje slob dpon
245b1(rgyud 'bum): gyis/ lus la rgyal ba thams cad bzhugs// mthong na don ni yod pa kye// phyi ma'i dus na sems dpa' che// de bas sems can thams cad kyis// lha yi mchod pa'i yo byad kyis// rab tu 'bad de bla ma bsten// de nas
245b2(rgyud 'bum): mthong ba don yod bcas/ / byang chub sems dpa' grags pa che// dga' zhing mgu bas phyag byas te// bcom ldan 'das la mchi ma blags// gsung dang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bzhugs// legs so bya ba byin
245b3(rgyud 'bum): nas ni/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad gsungs// a A i I u U dang // r-i r-I l-i l-I a ai// o au aM AHdbyangs zhes bya// ka tsa Ta ta ba sde tshan// ya ra la wa sha Sha sa// ha dang gsung gi dkyil
245b4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor shes/ / ngag kun rab tu spro dang ldan// 'dod chags la sogs bag chags kyang // grangs ni nyi shu brgyad kyis so// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor legs rgyas pa// dpal mchog las ni shes par bya//
245b5(rgyud 'bum): de ltar 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor rnams// rdo rje gsum ni dam tshig mchog/ mchog tu rmad byung rgyas pa ni// sgrub pa'i dbang pos yang dag shes// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa
245b6(rgyud 'bum): las/ sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bshad pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// sangs rgyas dam chos dge 'dun dang // bla ma ston pa slob
245b7(rgyud 'bum): dpon dang / / rdo rje 'chang dang slob ma yi// mtshan nyid thams cad bsdus pa ni// dri med sems ni sangs rgyas 'gyur// chos ni ngag tu yang dag gsungs// sku ni dge 'dun zhes bya ste// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs
246a1(rgyud 'bum): kyi gnas/ / sangs rgyas yi ge hUM du bshad// gsung ni yi ge AHru brjod// dge 'dun zhes bya yi ge oM// kun nas 'phro ba'i bdag nyid do// sangs rgyas a ba d+hU tir 'gyur// chos kyang
246a2(rgyud 'bum): la la nA ru brjod/ / dge 'dun ra san du brjod// 'di ni gsum po'i mtshan nyid do// gzugs med khams ni sangs rgyas 'gyur// gzugs kyi khams ni chos dang ni// 'dod khams de bzhini dge 'dun te// de ltar
246a3(rgyud 'bum): khams gsum mtshan nyid mchog/ snying por gyur pa rang srog las// khams gsum na ni gzhan med do// sgyu ma rlung gi khams gsum pa// rmi lam rmi lam bzhin du mthong // khams gsum bdag nyid de bzhin du//
246a4(rgyud 'bum): gcig pur myur ba mthong bar 'gyur// byin gyis brlabs nas de bzhin nyid// dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// sangs rgyas longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// dam pa'i chos dang chos kyi sku// dge 'dun sprub pa'i
246a5(rgyud 'bum): skur ni 'gyur/ / de ni sku gsum bdag nyid can// snang ba sangs rgyas kyi ni gzugs// chos ni snang ba thob pa'o// dge 'dun snang ba mchod par 'gyur// de ni snang ba gsum mtshan nyid// zhi ba la sogs las
246a6(rgyud 'bum): la byang / / sngags dang rnal 'byor cha rnams shes// cho ga nyi shu bya ba bslabs// de ni bla mar mngon par brjod// tshul khrims dag cing sbyin pa gtong // bzod dang brtson 'grus mchog tu ldan// nyin dang mtshan
246a7(rgyud 'bum): du sgom la zhen/ / shes rab ldan zhing bzod la mkhas// bla ma'i spyir ni yon tan tshogs// dpal ldan slob dpon zhes ni brjod// nang gi gsang 'dus la rab dga'// phyi rol nyan thos la spyod pa// de lta'i
246b1(rgyud 'bum): man ngag rim pa yis/ / slob ma rnams la rjes su bslab// de ni ston par yongs su gsungs// de skad smras pa de bzhin byed// rtog pa rnams dang dkyil 'khor tshogs// dam pa'i don gyis bya ba dang //
246b2(rgyud 'bum): slar yang snang ba gsum dang ni// rnal 'byor mchog gi spyod pa la// slob cing gzhan yang slob tu 'jug/ de ni slob dpon zhes bya'o// de nyid bcu ni yongs shes nas// dkyil 'khor la sogs bya ba shes//
246b3(rgyud 'bum): slob ma rjes sdud nus pa dang // gsang ba'i dbang ni bskur ba dang // shes rab ji snyed yang dag ldan// rgyud kyi man ngag la mi 'jigs// zab cing rgya chen yang dag ldan// rdo rje sems dpa' gnyis pa
246b4(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ tshar gcod phan 'dogs pa la mkhas// de ni rdo rje 'chang du bshad// dad cing bla ma la yang gus// rtag tu dge ba'i las la gnas// gnyis med rgyu yang med pa dang // rtog pa ngan pa rnam par
246b5(rgyud 'bum): spangs/ / lung ni mang du thos pa dang // gsod pa dang ni 'tshe ba spangs// sems can rnams ni 'don pa'i blos// kun tu brtson dang yang dag ldan// de la sogs pa'i yang dag ldan// dad pa chen po'i
246b6(rgyud 'bum): slob ma bzang / / stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa// gang la de nyid nges shes bya// gong na med pa'i spyod rab mchog/ sngags dang rnal 'byor rim pa sogs// ye shes lnga ni rnam dag dang // sangs rgyas lnga ni rang
246b7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin nyid/ / mngon par byang chub rnam lnga yis// snang ba gsum gyi mtshan nyid dang // chos dang longs spyod sprul pa dang // sku gsum rnam par sgom pa dang // bde chen yon tan mtshan nyid ni// dga' ba la sogs
247a1(rgyud 'bum): dbye ba dang / / de bzhin sgeg sogs nyams dang ni// rnal 'byor rjes su rnal 'byor dang // shin tu rnal 'byor rnal 'byor che// dang po sbyor ba mdor bsdus pas// de bzhin
247a2(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog/ las kyi rgyal po rnal 'byor mchog/ 'jug dang gnas dang ldang ba ni// rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor dang // de gnyis dbugs 'byung gnyis la sogs// gang la
247a3(rgyud 'bum): rgyas bshad de nyid rgyud/ / rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud du brjod// yon tan ji lta bu yi rgyud// thos sogs yon tan mchog gi ni// rten dang snod ces bya bar gsungs// mtshan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa
247a4(rgyud 'bum): dang / / ji ltar seng ge'i 'o ma ni// sa yi snod du gzhag mi bya// de bzhin rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud// snod min dag la sbyin mi bya// slob ma skad cig de la 'chi// 'di dang pha rol tu ni phung // snod min
247a5(rgyud 'bum): man ngag rab bshad na/ / slob dpon dngos grub nyams par 'gyur// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ sangs rgyas dang / dam pa'i chos dang / dge 'dun
247a6(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi tshig rgyas pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa lnga pa'o/ / / de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// slob ma'i bya ba'i spyod pa ni// zhi ba la sogs bya ba yang //
247a7(rgyud 'bum): sngags dang rnal 'byor rim pa yi// lham dang gdugs dang gtsul tor dang // so rtsi la sogs myang ba dang // snabs kyi gong bu mchil ma sogs// 'dor zhing rkang pa rkyong ba dang // gzhan du blta dang spyi brtom sla/
247b1(rgyud 'bum): nor gyis snyems dang ngar 'dzin dang // rgyan la sogs pa blta ba dang // bag med par ni smra ba dang // bla ma'i grib ma 'gom pa dang // de la sogs pa skyon gyi tshogs// bla ma'i mdun du rnam par spangs//
247b2(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs pas thal mo sbyar nas ni// spyi bor phyag rgya bka' lung nod// rab bdog kun gtong dam bcas pas// ngo mtshar bcas shing gdong smad pas// slob mas bla ma'i mdun gnas bya// gal te dngos grub
247b3(rgyud 'bum): mchog 'dod na/ / bla ma'i mdun du slob ma rnams// de lta bu sogs spyod ces bya// dam tshig sdom pa sngar bshad pa// de rnams slob ma'i spyod pa'o// de yi zhi sogs bya ba ni// bla mas bstan par bya ba'i
247b4(rgyud 'bum): rigs/ / de la mdor bsdus bshad par bya// thun mong cho ga'i mtshan nyid ni// zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa gnyis// zla ba yar gyi ngo la bya// dbang dang mngon spyod kyi ni las// zla ba mar gyi ngo la brtsams// byang du kha bltas
247b5(rgyud 'bum): zhi ba la/ / de bzhin rgyas pa shar du blta// drag po'i las la lho phyogs su// dbang gi las la nub tu blta// gsod pa nyid la me yi phyogs// sdang bar bya la bden bral du// gnas nas bskrad la rlung gi phyogs//
247b6(rgyud 'bum): rengs pa la ni dbang ldan phyogs// zhi ba'i kha dog dkar po ste// rgyas pa la ni ser po bya// dbang dang dgug pa la ni dmar// kha dog nag po gsod pa la'o// byams pa'i sems kyis zhi ba la// dga' ba'i sems
247b7(rgyud 'bum): kyis rgyas pa la/ / chags pa'i sems kyis dbang dag la// khro ba'i sems kyis gsod pa'o// zhi la phal cher tho rangs bya// de bzhin rgyas par snga dro bya// dbang dang mngon spyod dag gi las// nyi ma gung dang
248a1(rgyud 'bum): mtshan phyed la'o/ / de ltar rigs par yang dag bshad// sngags kyi rgyud gsungs mtshan nyid kyis// zhi ba la sogs dngos grub brgyad// blo ldan cho ga bzhin du sgrub
248a2(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ slob ma'i spyod pa rnam par dag pa dang zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi 'bras bu bstan pa'i le'u ste drug cus drug pa'o//
248a3(rgyud 'bum): / de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// khro bo bzlas pa'i mtshan nyid ni// gang gis rnal 'byor dngos grub bshad// thob 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// khro bo'i sems kyi bzlas pa ni//
248a4(rgyud 'bum): khro bo'i bzlas pa zhes ni brjod// yang na khro bo'i rgyal po rnams// sngags bzlas pa yi sbyor ba yis// khro bo'i bzlas pa de shes bya// dngos grub brgyad kyi 'bras bu stsol// 'jigs su rung ba'i dur
248a5(rgyud 'bum): khrod du/ / 'jigs pa 'jigs par byed pa'i gnas// skyes bu thod pa khrag gis gos// rma med pa yi mtshan nyid blangs// skyes bu'i khu ba zla mtshan dang // bsres nas bri bar bya ba ni// de na bsgrub
248a6(rgyud 'bum): bya'i rnam pa dang / / gsal dang 'jigs pa skrag pa dang // g.yon brkyang ba yis mnan nas ni// zhag bdun bar du dus gsum du// gshin rje gshed kyi sngags 'dis ni// dngos grub rgyur ni bzlas
248a7(rgyud 'bum): pabar bya/ / na maHsa man+ta kA ya bAka tsit+ta badz+rA NAM/ oM kha kha khA hi khA hi/ sarba duSh+Ta satwa da ma ka/ a saM mu sa la pa ra shu pA sha hasta/ kha Da ga bA ma ta ra tsa ni haSh+Ta/ tsa tur mu kha / tsa tur b+hu dza
248b1(rgyud 'bum): Ta nA ra Na/ A gar+b+ha A gar+dz+dza/ sarba duSh+Ta pA Na ya ba hA ri Ne/ ma hA big+h+na g+hA ta ka/ bi kr-i ta yA naM/ sar+b+ba b+hU ta b+hA ya~M ka ra/ a rbaT a Ta Tha thA sa na di ne b+hA b+hA tsam+b+ha ni bA san/ ku ru ku ru/ sar+b+ba kAr+m+ma Ni/
248b2(rgyud 'bum): ts+tshin+na ts+tshiH/ sar+b+ba man tAM/ b+hin b+hiH/ pa ra mu drA na/ A kaR+Sha ya A kAR+Sha ya/ sar+b+ba b+hU tAM/ ma tha ma tho/ ni mtha ni rmA tha/ sar+b+ba duSh+TAn+ta/ za be sha ya pra ba shA ya/ saN+Da la ma d+h+ye/ ba ba shA
248b3(rgyud 'bum): dI bi ti an+ta ka ra/ ku ru ku ru/ ha na hA na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ mA bi lam+ba mA bi li bi/ sa ma ya ma nu s+pha ra/ hUM hUM/ tardza ya/ be ga na/ phaT phaT/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ kA ra kA ra/ sar+b+ba
248b4(rgyud 'bum): A na na bIr pU rA ya/ haM si b+ha ga bAM/ kin+ti rA ya si na/ na ma/ sar+b+ba adz+nyA na sa twa ya hUM phaT swA hA/ thog mar khro bo'i bzlas pa 'di// dbang du bya dang dgug pa mchod// bskrad par rab tu bshad par bya/
248b5(rgyud 'bum): / khro bo gnyis pa'i bzlas pa yang // skra tshe lan tshwa yungs mar dang // dug dang da du rA khu ba// sdigs mdzub khrag dang bsres nas su// dur khrod ras dang bya ba ni// zla ba phyed pa lta bu mchog/ rlung gi dkyil
248b6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor bri bar bya/ / logs gnyis rdo rjes mtshan par bya// de dbus sgrub pa'i ming bris la// g.yon brkyang bar ni gnas nas ni// sngags ni yongs su bzla bar bya// sngar bzhin bsgrub bya'i ming bkug nas//
248b7(rgyud 'bum): mtshan phyed kyi ni dus su ni// kun nas zhag bdun par du bya// bskrad par yang ni 'grub par 'gyur// na maHsa man+ta kA ya bAka tsit+ta badz+rA NAM/ na mo badz+ra kro d+hA ya/ ma hA da~MSh+To ta ka Ta b+hai ra bA ya/ a si mu sa la/ bar
249a1(rgyud 'bum): shu bA sha hastA ye/ oM a mri ta kuN+Da li/ kha kha khA hi khA hi/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ gar+dz+dza gar+dz+dza/ s+pho Ta s+pho Ta/ bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya/ sar+b+ba big+h+na bi nA ya kA
249a2(rgyud 'bum): ma hA ga Na pa ti/ dzI bi ta an+ta ka rA ya hUM phaT swA hA/ sngags 'dis gdug pa'i sems can ni// bskrad pa'i don du byas pa yin// zhi ba'i las ni bshad bya ba// gzhan gyis mi thub ming dang ni// khro bo
249a3(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa bzlas nas ni/ / me dang sbrul sogs zhi bar byed// lag pa gnyis la nyi ma gnyis// de la hUM gnyis bsgom par bya// bsgrub bya'i mgo la lag gnyis kyis// brabs la de la zhugs nas ni//
249a4(rgyud 'bum): bsgrub bya'i snying la de gnyis kyis// 'byung po sregs par bsam par bya// me dang 'byung po 'jigs byed pa'i// 'di yi sngags ni bshad par bya// na maHsa man+ta kA ya bAka tsit+ta badz+ra NaM/ oM a pa rA d+hi/
249a5(rgyud 'bum): rI tiM ri ti rI dzi hUM phaT/ che ge mo 'byung ba'i gdon las grol bar mdzod cig/ d+hIHdug sel ba yi sngags kyis ni// bzhi pa bshad kyis de nyon cig/ khro bo rta mgrin bzlas pas ni// yang dag mi
249a6(rgyud 'bum): mtshungs pa yi mchog/ bsgrub bya sems dpa' sum brtsegs sgom// snying khar zla gnas ye shes sems// de yi 'od zer gyis rab gang // bsgrub bya'i lus la mchog tu bsam// rab tu 'bar ba de yis
249a7(rgyud 'bum): dug/ de nas lag g.yas bsam pa ni// zla ba haM gis rnam par brgyan// kha dog dkar por sor mor dgod// de ltar sgrub pa po la bya// hUM d+hIHdzaM k+ShI sA d+ha dgod// las rnams kun ni 'grub par byed// bsgrub
249b1(rgyud 'bum): bya'i mgo bo nas brtsams te/ / rkang pa'i mtha' yi bar du sgom// chu rgyun rgyun mi 'chad pa ni// dug ni 'og gdang rim pa yis// 'dir ni sngags 'di bzlas bya ste// rta mgrin du ni mngon par brjod// na maHsa san+ta/
249b2(rgyud 'bum): ya bAka tsit+ta badz+rA NAM/ oM hUM hUM hUM/ ta ru la bi ru la/ sar+b+ba bi Sha g+hA ta ka ta ka dz+wa li ti bi s+phu li ka/ aT Ta hA sa nA da sa hi tA/ kA sa ri sa do pa taM ad de badz+ra khu ra g+hA ta na/ tsa ta ba su d+hA ta la ni shA sa ma
249b3(rgyud 'bum): ru tra uta kip+sA d+ha ra Ni d+ha ra/ bau Sha na a nu hA sa a pa ra mi ta wa la be rA kra ma Ar+ye ga b+ha ti/ bud d+ha bud d+ha/ ha ya grI ba kha kha ts+tshin da ts+tshin da/ A be sha ya/ sar+b+ba gra he Shu/ a pra ti ha to bA wa/ badz+ra
249b4(rgyud 'bum): / kiny+tsi rA ya si i daM duSh+Ta gra haM daMSh+Ta/ sar+b+ba bA/ d+hu na d+hu na/ ma tha ma tha/ mar da mar da/ bud+d+ha d+har+m+ma ra d+ha/ bud+d+ha d+har+m+ma saM g+he a nu dz+nyA na kar+yaM ku ru swAhA/ che ge mo'i dug la sogs pa sel bar mdzod cig hUM
249b5(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba dang sngags spel lo/ / rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs te// lhag ma rgyas par shes par bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ khro bo'i bzlas pa dang zhi ba la
249b6(rgyud 'bum): sogs dngos grub brgyad kyi le'u ste drug cu rtsa bdun pa'o/ / / de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya// dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa ni// sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes mchog
249b7(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub la sogs mtshan nyid ni/ / sa snying phyag na rdo rje dang // 'jam dpal sgrib pa sel ba dang // byams pa lnga po 'di dag dang // yi ge gsum dang rnam par spel// mig dang rna ba yid dang lus/
250a1(rgyud 'bum): rtsa ba'i 'khor lo byin gyis brlab// mtshan gsum nyin mo de dang 'dra// mngon shes lnga nyid thob par byed// bzhi pa yis ni dbang bskur bas// blo ldan de nyid mthong bar 'gyur
250a2(rgyud 'bum): snang ba mtshan mo'i cha ru 'gyur/ / nyin mo snang ba mched pa'o// mtshams ni snang ba thob pa'o// de ltar snang la sogs mtshan nyid// mtshan min mtshams dang nyin mo min// kun rtog rlung ni spong bar byed//
250a3(rgyud 'bum): de ni skad cig mngon byang chub// mtshan nyid skad cig mar ni brjod// tha mar 'byung dang thog mar 'byung ba 'am// dbus min 'byung ba'ang dbus su 'byung ba 'am// mtha' min 'byung ba'ang mthar ni
250a4(rgyud 'bum): 'byung ba 'am/ / de ni thams cad stong pa'i skad cig gcig tu gsungs// gang du 'gro ba dang ni 'ong med cing // zad med 'phel med dngos med min// ngo mtshar gzugs can yin zhing ngo
250a5(rgyud 'bum): mtshar min/ / gnas par 'gyur min myur du 'gro ba min// gang zhig yod dang med pa'i tha snyad rnams dang bral// bsod nams gzugs min sdig pa'i gzugs ma yin// bsod nams
250a6(rgyud 'bum): sdig gi bdag min mchog gyur pa/ / de ni thams cad stong pa'i skad cig gcig tu gsungs// skad cig gcig la mngon byang chub// mtshan nyid 'di ni skad cig mchog/ rdo rje rtse mo byung sems ni//
250a7(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pas lus kyi brtan pa nyid// de yis de nyid byang sems ni// rlung gi de nyid rab sbyor bas// rigs pas steng du byed pa ni// rgas pa med par the tsom med// hUM ho rim bzhin shes pa ni//
250b1(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pa steng du rnam par spel// sngar bshad pa yi bdud rtsi lnga// 'di ni bcud kyis len du brjod// 'di nyid kyis ni grub par byed// lcags kyi gser 'gyur byas nas ni// rdo rje phyag rgya dngos grub che//
250b2(rgyud 'bum): zung du 'jug pas thob par 'gyur// bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba dang // de bzhin rdzogs pa'i rim pa yang // gang la de gnyis gcig 'gyur ba// de ni zung du 'jug par bshad// 'khor ba dang ni
250b3(rgyud 'bum): mya ngan 'das/ / rtog pa gnyis po spangs pas ni// gang du dngos po gcig 'gyur ba// zung du 'jug ces de la bshad// kun rdzob dang ni don dam dag/ rtog pa gnyis dang rnam par bral//
250b4(rgyud 'bum): gang du yang dag 'dres gyur pa// de ni zung du 'jug par bshad// rdo rje bzlas pa'i rab sbyor bas// rlung gi mtshan nyid shes nas ni// rnam rtog rlung rnams rnam par gcod// sems la dmigs
250b5(rgyud 'bum): pa thob par 'gyur/ / bdag la byin rlabs rim pas kyang // dngos grub brgyad ni thob par 'gyur// snang ba la sogs dbye ba shes// mngon par byang chub rim pa thob// zung 'jug rim pa la gnas pa/
250b6(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa ni// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// rnal 'byor pa yis the tsom med// phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub cher// zung du 'jug pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// rnam rtog med par
250b7(rgyud 'bum): zhugs nas ni/ / thob pa 'di la the tsom med// lus ni gzhal yas khang du 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyis yang dag brtan// zur bzhi pa ni mdun rgyab dang // g.yas dang g.yon gyi dbye bas so// steng rtog/
251a1(rgyud 'bum): sgo yi dbye ba yis// sgo bzhi zhes ni bshad pa yin// sna rtse bzhi yi dbyigs kyis ni// rta babs bzhi ni brjod par bya// dra ba rgyu mar yang dag bshad// rgyus par gyur pa drab byed
251a2(rgyud 'bum): cha ni zla ba phyed pa dang / bum pa lto bar yang dag shes// rje ngar brla dpung lag ngar ni// ka ba brgyad du yang dag bshad// mig gi rnam shes ma long sogs// sgra yi rnam shes rol mo dang / sna yi rnam
251a3(rgyud 'bum): shes me tog 'phreng / / rin chen pha gu lce rnams shes// lus kyi rnam shes ras 'phan dang // yid kyi rnam shes ri dgas so// mig ni 'khor lo'i mtshan ma dang // rna ba kun nas rdo rje rnams// sman
251a4(rgyud 'bum): ba dan du ni bshad/ / lce ni dril bu ru ni gsungs// rnga yab la sogs rnam dag pa// lus kyi tshogs zhes bya bar bshad// yid ni dbus kyi pad+ma gsungs// rnam rtog rlung ni yang dag brten// ye shes
251a5(rgyud 'bum): lnga ni rnam dag pa/ / re khA lngar ni yang dag brjod// phung po lnga ni rnam dag lnga// rnam dag kha dog lnga ni dbye// de dag gzhal yas khang du sgom// dang por sbyor bar shes par bya// mngon par byang chub
251a6(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa lnga/ / rigs kyi dbye ba rang ngo bo// de nyid phyi rol gnas par brjod// dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'o// khams bzhi'i rang bzhin bdag nyid ni// gzugs kyi phung po mdor bsdus na/
251a7(rgyud 'bum): gzugs kyi phung po rnams dang ni// mig gi rnam shes sa snying po// phyi rol gzugs kyi rdo rjer bshad// byams pa rtsa rgyus dbus na bzhugs// de bzhin khro bo'i rgyal po gnyis// shar dang lho yi
251b1(rgyud 'bum): mtshams su ni/ / me long ye shes su ni bshad// rnam par snang mdzad rnam dag nyid// bde dang sdug bsngal 'jigs dang skyo// tshor ba'i mtshan nyid du ni 'dod// tshor ba chu yi khams dang ni//
251b2(rgyud 'bum): phyi rol sgra ni rdo rje dang // rna ba phyag na rdo rjer bshad// rigs ni gnyis po 'dres pa nyid// dri yi rdo rje phyi rol 'gyur// sna yi rnam shes mkha' snying po// khro bo gnyis po rnam par shes// mnyam
251b3(rgyud 'bum): nyid rin chen 'byung ba dang / / dngos dang dngos med sogs 'du shes// snga ma rjes dran mtshan nyid can// 'du shes phung po ma khams dang // phyi rol dri yi rdo rje dang // lce yi rnam shes 'jig rten mgon//
251b4(rgyud 'bum): bzhin khro bo'i rgyal po gnyis// de ni so sor rtog ye shes// 'od dpag med kyi rigs las 'byung // dge dang mi dge'i las rnams kyis// bag chags 'du byed mtshan nyid ni// 'du shes phung po rlung
251b5(rgyud 'bum): gi khams/ / phyi rol ro yi rdo rje dang // lus kyi rnam shes sgrib rnamasal// kun bzang tshigs kyi mtshams dbus bzhugs// de bzhin khro bo'i rgyal po gnyis// bya ba nan tan grub ye shes// don yod grub pa'i
251b6(rgyud 'bum): rigs las byung / / dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin ni// ye shes mtshan nyid rnam shes brjod// rnam par shes pa nam mkha'i khams// yid kyi rnam shes 'jam rdo rje// de bzhin khro bo'i rgyal po gnyis// shin tu
251b7(rgyud 'bum): rnam dag chos kyi dbyings/ / mi bskyod pa yi rigs las byung // mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga// gzhal yas khang na 'di dag bzhugs// de nyid khams kyi dbye ba yis// rim pa ji bzhin bshad par bya//
252a1(rgyud 'bum): sgra rus phyi sa mchil ma snying // so ni rnam snang bdag nyid do// spu dang gnas dang nye ba'i snying // sen mo chu yi khams su shes// rin chen 'byung ldan bdag nyid kyi// rigs kyi rten du shes
252a2(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / so dang pags pa sha dang snying // me yi khams shes bya bar brjod// 'od dpag med kyi rang bzhin dang // rigs kyi dbye bar shes par bya// rgyus pa sha dang rtsibs logs snying // rlung ni don yod grub
252a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / dri ma rgyus pa mkhris pa snying // de ni nam mkha'i khams su grags// mi bskyod pa yi rang bzhin dang // snying ni rnam shes lnga zhes bya// re re la yang so sor ni// rnam pa lnga ni spro ba shes// de bzhin gshegs
252a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i phung po lnga/ / nang gi bdag nyis rdzas phye ba// sha rtsa rgyus pa sha kham tshad// klad pa dang ni klad rgyas dang // rus pa rkang dang gnye ma dang // mkhal ma snying dang lto ba dang // glo ba mcher pa gcin dang ni// bshang
252a5(rgyud 'bum): pa pho ba long ka dang / / zhag dang chu ser rnag dang ni// khrag dang mkhris pa bad kan dang // ngar snabs skra dang kha spu dang // sen mo sma dang pags pa dang // lag pa rkang mig yan lag sogs// 'tshogs ma dpung pa
252a6(rgyud 'bum): zhes ni brjod/ / de dag rim par shes par bya// gzhal yas khang ni rnam dag pas// de la gnas kyi dbye ba ni// mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya// pu lI ra ni mgo bor shes// spyi gtsug dza lan d+ha ra dang // rna ba
252a7(rgyud 'bum): g.yas pa au r+yan dang / / spyi bo'i rgyab ni arbud// go dA ba ri rna ba g.yon// rA me shwa ri smin ma'i dbus// mig gnyis de bi ko Ta dang // mA la wa ni dpung pa'i rtsa// kA ma ru pa mchan khung gnyis// o tre nu ma gnyis
252b1(rgyud 'bum): su grags/ / ko sa la ni lte bar shes// tri sa ku ne rna ba'i rtsa// kha yi pad+ma ka ling ka/ mgrin pa laM pa kar ni brjod// snying ni kAn cir shes par bya// hi ma la ya mdoms su shes// mtshan ma gr-i ha de ba dang // pre ta
252b2(rgyud 'bum): pu ri bshang ba'i lam/ / brla gnyis su war+N+Na dwI pa// sau raSh+Ta ni byin pa gnyis// rkang pa'i bol ni sin du'i yul// sor mo rnams la na ga ra// mthe bong gnyis ni ma rur shes// ku lu tA ni rkang pa'i mthil//
252b3(rgyud 'bum): de ltar gnas kyi rnam dag dang // sa bcu rnam par dag pa nyid// de nyid dang ldan shes par bya// thim dang longs spyod bdag po nyid// 'jug pa la sogs bye brag gis// rim gyis rdo rje sems dpa'
252b4(rgyud 'bum): nyid/ / de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// rlung rnams kyi ni mtshan nyid mchog/ srog gi rlung ni snying khar gnas// mi bskyod bye brag rigs las skyes// mdoms na gnas pa'i thur sel ni// rin chen
252b5(rgyud 'bum): 'byung ldan bye brag skyes/ / stod du rgyus pa lkog mthar gnas// 'od dpag med pa'i rang bzhin no// me dang mnyam gnas lte bar gnas// don yod grub pa'i rang bzhin no// khyab byed yan lag kun la gnas//
252b6(rgyud 'bum): rnam snang mdzad kyis byin gyis brlabs// dbang po'i sgo yi rgyun las ni// srog dang rtsol ba rgyun 'di dang // dus kun tu ni rgyu ba ni// srog ces bya ba yin par bshad// srog dang rlung dang phyi sa dang // de bzhin
252b7(rgyud 'bum): du ni khu ba sogs/ / 'og 'dren 'di ni thur sel rlung // rtag tu rnal 'byor pas shes bya// rgod dang za dang bldag pa dang // kun tu 'thung dang 'jib pa dang // gang zhig rtag tu mnyam gnas dang /
253a1(rgyud 'bum): mnyam du gnas pa zhes byar brjod// gyen du 'gro zhing sdud pa dang // bza' dang myang ba la sogs pa// shes dang lhan cig 'byor pa dag/ gyen rgyu'i las su shes par bya/
253a2(rgyud 'bum): khyab dang 'dzin pa nyid dang ni// de bzhin 'gro dang ldog pa sogs// tshig kun tu ni khyab pa'i phyir// khyab byed ces ni bya bar bshad// rlung gi mtshan nyid bshad pa ni// de nas de yi 'jigs par brjod// /
253a3(rgyud 'bum): snga ma bzhin du btang bzung sogs// phan tshun du ni gnod par byed// gzhan ni gzhan la 'tshe ba yin// stobs ni thob pa'i rang bzhin gyis// gcig ni gcig la thim par 'gro// ji ltar zla ba
253a4(rgyud 'bum): gzas bzung la/ / rlung rnams rim gyis nyams 'gyur ba// snga ma bzhin du gong nas gong // rang gi bdag nyid la thim par// btang bzung slar yang 'gro bar byed// ji ltar mes bsregs dngos
253a5(rgyud 'bum): med dang / / rgyu med par ni thim par 'gro// slar yang srog gi rlung shar ba// las kyi rlung ni sna tshogs pa// de ni lhan cig rnam shes dang // slar yang 'jig rten gsum du gnas// de las las dang de
253a6(rgyud 'bum): las skyes/ / de las chags sogs bag chags dang // de las slar yang 'chi dang skye// de ltar 'khor lo bskor ba 'dra// sngon bzhin rdo rje bzlas la sogs// rim gyis de yi dbye bar 'gyur//
253a7(rgyud 'bum): de nas sems dpa' chen po kun// de nyid mig sman thur ma yis// thams cad 'khrul pa'i long ba bsal// yang dag dngos po nyid ni mthong // de nas yang yang phyag byas te// mchi bcas mig gis
253b1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan la/ / lan gsum du ni bskor byas nas// rdo rje 'chang la yang dag bstod// e ma ho kun 'gro kun dbang phyug/ nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs pa brnyes// e ma'o dam tshig de nyid
253b2(rgyud 'bum): gsum/ / mchog tu rmad byung ston par mdzad// khams gsum las ni rnam par grol// chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid// 'dod pa rnams kyis ma gos pa// dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//
253b3(rgyud 'bum): phung po rnams dang khams rnams dang // skye mched rnams la mi rten cing // srid dang mya ngan 'das las grol// dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// de ltar nam mkha' gnas med cing // spros pa
253b4(rgyud 'bum): med cing gos pa med/ / mkha' dang mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' ba// dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spu// 'jig rten gsum las rgyal gyur pa// 'jig rten
253b5(rgyud 'bum): gsum 'di rnam par g.yos/ / bdud rnams bcom par mdzad nas ni// 'jig rten gsum gnas lha las rgyal// khro bo bcu ni kun nas ni// 'jig rten gsum rgyal gtso bo yis// 'di ltar bka' ni bsgo bar 'gyur//
253b6(rgyud 'bum): sa yi cha ni gang na 'di// rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon brjod pa'i// rnal 'byor chen po'i dam tshig rgyud// dus kun tu ni spyod 'gyur zhing // rgyun du de nyid rang nyid kyis// khro bo bcu yis de las ni// rtag tu phur
253b7(rgyud 'bum): bus dgegs kun la/ / bsrung ba'i don du yul 'khor der// rang rang 'phreng ba'i sngags kyis ni// de rnams la ni gtor ma dbul// sems can yongs su gzung ba'i phyir// sna tshogs sprul pa bstan nas ni//
254a1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems dpa' dus kun tu// shin dang mtshan du bzhugs par 'grus// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud pal rdo rje 'theng ba'i mngon par rdzogs pa las/ dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa
254a2(rgyud 'bum): le'u ste drug cu rtsa brgyad pa'o/ / rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dngal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ rgyud thams cad kyi snying po gsang ba rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba
254a3(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs so/ / / thugs dam sa'i snying po tho ling snying po dpal dpe med lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag khang du rgya gar gyi mkhan po su dza na shrI dz+nyA na dang / sgra bsgyur gyi lo tsa ba
254a4(rgyud 'bum): chen po bod kyi lha btsan po bla ma dge slong zhi ba'i 'od kyi zhal snga nas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ / rgya gar skad du/ tsa tsu de bi ti ba'i brits+tsha/
254a5(rgyud 'bum): bod skad du/ lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// lha mo bzhi dang mnyam ldan zhing // sangs rgyas gzugs kyis nyer brgyan pa// shin tu dga'
254a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sbyor chen la/ / rdo rje sems dpa' cher bzhugs so// 'od zer 'chang zhing 'khrigs pa yi// gsang chen chos kyi 'byung gnas la// byang chub sems ni 'phros nas su// chos kyi dbyings gnas
254a7(rgyud 'bum): zhu mdzad do/ / zhu ba'i dngos po de mthong nas// lha mo spyan mas yongs zhus pa// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' la// tshig 'di dag ni gsol ba ste// chos kyi dbyings rnams 'phro ba ni// gang las
254b1(rgyud 'bum): skye bar 'gyur ba lags/ / dang po ji ltar 'ong ba yin// de bzhin phyir 'gro ji ltar lags// yan lag med pa gang de ni// yan lag dang bcas 'gyur nas su// lus dngos 'gyur ba ji ltar lag
254b2(rgyud 'bum): mig dang rna ba sna dang ni/ / de bzhin lce dang lus dang yid// dbang po phung po'i dngos rnams dang // khams rnams su ni 'jug pa yang // ma rig bag chags sred pa yis// bcings pa'i nyon
254b3(rgyud 'bum): mongs 'dod chags sogs/ / rnam par shes pa sna tshogs pa// ji ltar dngos su 'dus pa lags// dngos po med pa sgom pa'i gzugs// gzugs sogs spyod yul mtshan nyid rnams// rang
254b4(rgyud 'bum): bzhin med cing dmigs med la/ / dmigs pa dang bcas ji ltar lags// de dag ngo mtshar chen po ni// bdag gi the tshom lhas bka' stsol// de ltar zhus ma thag tu ni// bcom ldan rdo rje sems
254b5(rgyud 'bum): dpas gsungs/ / shes rab zab pa zad med ni// nyon cig spyan ma bshad par bya// dpyad du med cing shes bya min// de bzhin dpyad mkhan gyis shes dka'// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang chen
254b6(rgyud 'bum): ni/ nam mkha'i spyod yul lo// mi shes mun pas bsgribs pas na// nyan thos rnams kyis shes pa min// spyod yul bag chags shes mkhan ni// rang sangs rgyas su sprul pa ste// de dag
254b7(rgyud 'bum): kun gyis kyang mi shes/ / shes med so so'i skye gnas dang // ma 'ongs pa dang 'das pa dang // da ltar byung ba'i dus gsum la// byol song bag chags las byung ba'i// dud 'gro yi dgas skye ba
255a1(rgyud 'bum): rnams/ / de kun gyis kyang mi shes te// sangs rgyas spyod yul gsang chen no// snying po shin tu snying po'i mchog/ gang de kun bdag la gnas pa'i// sangs rgyas kun
255a2(rgyud 'bum): gsang chen ni/ / lha mo khyod la bshad par bya// byang chub sems dag 'od gsal ba// zla ba shel dang mnyam pa'i 'od// de nyid ye shes lnga yi dngos// yungs kar che ba'i tshad tsam mo// de yi dbus
255a3(rgyud 'bum): su bzhugs pa'i lha/ / mi gsal gsal ba'i gzugs can te// phyed tsam tsam gyi phra mo'i mchog/ yid kyi dngos po'i thig le'i gzugs// rtag tu snying gi dbus gnas pa// 'od zer
255a4(rgyud 'bum): / chen po 'bar ba can// ji snyed dgu pa'i bar du ni// dpral ba la gnas rkang mthil bar// thig le de kho nar bsdu ste// lte ba'i dbus su rnam par gnas// cha shas lnga pa can yin te// bcu ga cis
255a5(rgyud 'bum): kyi ni tha ma la/ / cha shas drug gis mtshan pa nyid// nga ro thig les brgyan byed pa// rdo rje khong nas phyung nas su// sa bon skye gnas dbus bzhag ste// chos kyi dbyings ni zhu bar byed// de ni rim par
255a6(rgyud 'bum): skyed byed na/ / sgo dgu la ni kun tu 'gro// khyab cing khyab gnas 'gro kun la// mi g.yo la sogs g.yo dang bcas// tshangs sogs lha dang lha min gyi// gzhi ni de las gyur pa'o// gang las gtso bor
255a7(rgyud 'bum): skyed byed la/ / sa dang nam mkha'i de zhes gsungs// ji snyed lus la gnas pa'i bar// de yis las dang las min byed// dge dang mi dge bsam pa yang // bya ba'i las kun byed pa yin// sbyor ba rtag tu
255b1(rgyud 'bum): de gsungs te/ / mchod pa sgom par gsungs pa yin// gang tshe las kyi lus zhig na// de tshe de yi rang mthu yin// de 'dra'i lus su de 'gyur te// gang gis g.yo dang mi g.yo khyab// nam mkha' mnyam pa
255b2(rgyud 'bum): nyid 'dra ba/ / de ni gnas par shes par bya// bcu yi gnyis mtha'i tshig gi don// gang gis rtag tu bsgom byas nas// des ni dngos grub rgyas pa yi// rdo rje 'dzin par bdag nyid 'gyur// so dang chu dang
255b3(rgyud 'bum): rkan dang lce/ / mgul gnas gang la yod pa ni// gang la de ni yig 'bru nyid// de ni zad dang gnas phyir ro// brjod pa med cing the tsom med// sgra yig rnam par spangs pa ni// rang gi phyi nang de bzhin nyid
255b4(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems ni 'dir gsungs so/ / lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa las/ lha mo spyan mas yongs su zhus pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas lha mo mA ma kIs// rdo rje
255b5(rgyud 'bum): can la 'di zhus te/ / byang chub sems kyi rim pa yis// kha snying lte ba gsang ba la// 'gro dang phyir 'ong bstan pa ni// rdo rje chen pos bka' stsal 'tshal// cha shas rnam pa du zhig gsungs//
255b6(rgyud 'bum): gnas kyi rnam pa bsgyur ba du// kha dog rnam pa du zhig gsungs// de bzhin gdan yang ji ltar 'tshal// rdo rje can gyis bka' stsal pa// cha shas bzhi dang mnyam ldan zhing // pad+ma bzhi la yang dag
255b7(rgyud 'bum): gnas/ / snying kha'i pad+ma la gnas gnag/ kha yi pad+ma la gnas dkar// nga ro lte ba'i pad+mar gnas// gsang ba'i pad+mang ro mtha'// stabs kyi mtha' ru 'gro byed pas// thig le'i sbyor bar rab tu
256a1(rgyud 'bum): gnas/ / bsnam byed pa dang thos byed pa// de tshe mthong byed za byed pa// reg par byed kyang de go nas// bde dang sdug bsngal tshor byed pa'o// gang las bzhad byed bzla byed pa//
256a2(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin cho nge dang ngu ba// 'byed pa gcod pa de kha nas// cho ga rnam pa mang po shes// rgyal po don yang byed par 'gyur// dbang phyug don yang byed par 'gyur// bram ze rgyal po rje'u rigs dang //
256a3(rgyud 'bum): dmangs rigs smad pa'i rigs rnams dang // bud med du ma sprul par byed// dud 'gro yi dgas skye ba dang // gzugs can rnams dang gzugs med dang // de bzhin 'dod pa'i srid rnams las//
256a4(rgyud 'bum): 'byung ba thams cad skud byed pa// de nyid kho na rdzu 'phrul gnas// mo gzugs dang ni pho yi gzugs// bde ba chen po go 'phang gnas// de ltar de bzhin nyid shes pa// dam pa'i yig 'bru shes pa
256a5(rgyud 'bum): gang / / des ni gsang chen shes pa ste// gang de bdag nyid kun gnas pa// kha dog med cing kha dog dmar// kha dog dkar dang ser ba yi// thig le'i gzugs su bsgyur ba 'dis// 'gro dang phyir
256a6(rgyud 'bum): 'od rnam par bstan/ / gang de rig pa rdzu 'phrul che// mtha' yas bcas pa sna tshogs gzugs// skye dang bsdus dang 'jig pa la// thig le'i gzugs su rab gnas so// gang gis brgyad khri rtsa bzhi'i
256a7(rgyud 'bum): chos/ / stong phrag brgya ru shes na yang // de yis de nyid mi shes te// de dag kun kyang 'bras med do// bcu gnyis lnga yi lnga pa yang // brgyad kyi mtha' ru 'byung ba 'dus// sgra yig dang po yi ge a//
256b1(rgyud 'bum): lnga pa yis ni yang dag brgyan// snying rje chen po las byung ba// kha mar bltas pa'i drug pas btags// gdod ma mtha' ma med pa'i lha// de ni spyi bor bstan pa yin// de dag gsang chen dam pa yin/
256b2(rgyud 'bum): lha mo bdag gis rab bstan no// lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa las/ lha mo mA ma kIs zhus pa ste le'u gnyis pa'o// / de nas lha mo gos dkar mos// yan lag kun
256b3(rgyud 'bum): gyis btud nas su/ / thal mo snying khar sbyar byas te// rdo rje sems dpa' la gsol pa// chos kyi dbyings kyi bsdu ba dang // sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi// rang bzhin nyid ni ji ltar lags// lha
256b4(rgyud 'bum): yi dbang phyug khyod la zhu/ / gang gis 'od kyi gong bur bsdu// rdo rje sems dpa' ji ltar lags// gsungs shig de nyid yog 'bru'i tshig/ 'dus pa gsungs pa ji ltar lags// chu khams dang /
256b5(rgyud 'bum): ni me yi khams// ji ltar ro ni mnyam par 'gyur// ma las skye ba gsum tsam dang // de bzhin pa las skye ba gsus// de dag drug sogs gong bu las// ji ltar mi rnams skye ba lags// sangs rgyas
256b6(rgyud 'bum): gzugs ni bdag mi 'tshal/ / thub pa chen pos bka' stsal mdzod// rdo rje can gyis bka' stsal pa// gsang ba shin tu gsang gyur pa// nyon cig lha mo bshad par bya// skye gnas dbus su
256b7(rgyud 'bum): rtsa gnyis ni/ / g.yon dang de bzhin g.yas pa ste// g.yon du byang chub sems shes bya// g.yas su de bzhin rak+ta'o// de gnyis phrad nas gcig 'gyur ba// chos kyi dbyings ni 'dus pa yin/
257a1(rgyud 'bum): mun pa sku ste rdul gsung gzugs// thugs kyi rang bzhin snying stobs te// rdul ni rak+ta byang chub sems// mun pa de bzhin bskyed pa yin// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyar nas/
257a2(rgyud 'bum): rang bzhin mnyam pa'i ror 'gyur ro// dri chen chu dang shel me tog/ de bzhin lnga pa byang chub sems// bdud rtsi lnga dngos gong bur bsdus// de las rdo rjer 'dir gsungs so// rma shas gnyis pa dang
257a3(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa/ / de bzhin dgu pa dag yin no// de skad gsungs pa bcu dang ni// de bzhin lnga pa'i sa bon te// rma shas gnyis pa lnga yi ni// drug gis btags pa des byung ba// de ni thig ler gsungs
257a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ge bruM// skye gnas pad+ma la gnas pa// de nyid sa bon swA hA mtha'// 'dus pa la ni shes par bya// chu khams pa las skyes shes bya// me yi khams ni ma las skyes/
257a5(rgyud 'bum): sha dang khrag dang pags pa yang // ma las skyes pa zhes bshad do// tshil dang rkang dang khu ba ni// pha las skyes zhes bshad pa yin// gong bur yang dag 'dus pa ni// de dag tsam du bshad pa yin//
257a6(rgyud 'bum): gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang // de bzhin 'du byed rnam shes rnams// sangs rgyas dngos po lnga yi gzugs// phung po zhes byar bshad pa'o// lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa las/ lha mo na
257a7(rgyud 'bum): bza' dkar mos zhus pa ste le'u gsum pa'o/ / / de nas bzhad pa'i zhal gyur te// lha mo sgrol ma bcom ldan mas// rdo rje sems dpa' la zhus pa// chos kyi dbyings kyi
257b1(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa ni/ / gsungs shig rdo rje can chen po// rdzas rnams sgrub pa bka' stsal 'tshal// de bzhin rig pa'i sngags rnams kyang // dkyil 'khor rnams ni btags pa dang // sbyin sregaso sor
257b2(rgyud 'bum): bya ba dang / / de bzhin mchod pa'i cho ga yang // khyad par du yang bka' stsal 'tshal// de ltar lha mos zhus ma thag/ rdo rje sems dpas bka' sprul pa// chos kyi dbyings kyi sgrub thabs ni//
257b3(rgyud 'bum): nyon cig lha mo bshad par bya// gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ni// de bzhin ro dang reg la sogs// khams bco brgyad po de dag kyang // chos kyi dbyings shes bya ba'o// de dag nyid las byung ba ni/
257b4(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems zhes shes par bya// byang chub sems las gong bu skye// gong bu las kyang yid skyed do// yid las nam mkha'i khams kyang ni// khams rnams dang ni skye mched rnams// dbang po
257b5(rgyud 'bum): phung po 'byung ba rnams/ / de ltar dbyings su bsdu ba ste// bsdu ba de ni bstan byas pa// chos kyi dbyings kyi sgrub pa yin// de bas nan tan thams cad kyis// sgrub pa yang dag spyad par bya// 'di ltar
257b6(rgyud 'bum): gal po zhes dngos kyis/ / bsgrub par bya ba rab tu brtag/ chos dbyings sgrub pa bshad nas su// rdzas brgyad yan lag sgrub pa bshad// ril bu mig sman dngos grub dang // sa 'og ral gri'i dngos
257b7(rgyud 'bum): grub dang / / nam mkhar 'phur dang mig ldan dang // 'chi ba med dang nad 'joms dang // mi dang glang po che dang rta// glang dang khyi dang bong bu dang // rnga mi mase srung gi rnams// ma ni mnyam por bya ba'o//
258a1(rgyud 'bum): mthe bong tshigs tshad tsam du ni// shin tu mnyam par bzhag nas sbyar// dri chen chu dang rak+ta dang // byang chub sems nas tshad tsam ni// sngags bzlas nas ni sbyar byas te/ byin
258a2(rgyud 'bum): gyis brlabs kyang bya ba'o/ / phyag 'tshal dang ni yi ge AH// dbus su de bzhin hUM byas te// 'bar ba'i hU~M yig 'bar byed pa// dgu po de ni rab tu sgrub// lan ni nyi shu rtsa gcig tu// sngags bzlas
258a3(rgyud 'bum): nas ni phye mar btags/ / yungs kar lnga yi tshad tsam du// lnga dang lnga ni 'byor par bya// tshes brgyad dang ni bcu bzhi la// ril bu rnams ni byas nas su// pad+ma'i snod la bzhag byas te// stong phrag brgyar
258a4(rgyud 'bum): ni bzla bar bya/ / mtshams bzhi la ni bsgom byas nas// nyin dang mtshan du bza' bar yang // de ni bskal pa'i mtha' bar yang // dngos grub rgyas par 'gro ba ste// gzi brjid mdangs dang stobs brtson
258a5(rgyud 'bum): 'grus/ / lnga pa la ni smon lam yang // mngon par shes pa lnga thob pa// ril bu chen po zos phyir ro// rdzas kyi sgrub pa rnams rdzogs nas// rig pa'i sngags rnams bdag la stsol// yi ge e dang baM
258a6(rgyud 'bum): yig dang / / laM yig dbus su yang dag gnas// dang po'i mdog ni dmar po ste// gnyis pa yi ni mdog dkar ba// gsum pa kha dog ser ba rnams// b+ha ga'i dbus su bsgom par bya// 'khor lo ltar ni
258a7(rgyud 'bum): bskor ba ni/ / nyin phyed dang ni mtshan phyed la// rig pa de ni rab 'byor na// de ni skad cig kho nar 'grub// lha mo lha min bu mo dang // mi yi bu mo rnam pa bzhi// sa yi dkyil 'khor kun tu ni// sngags kyis bkug
258b1(rgyud 'bum): nas spyad par bya/ / sgom pa de bzhin rig pa'i sngags// bdag gis bshad pa zin byas te// dkyil 'khor rnams ni bshad par bya// dga' ma sems kyis rtse gcig nyon// dkyil 'khor lus shes
258b2(rgyud 'bum): gsungs pa ste/ / dkyil 'khor b+ha gar bstan pa yin// dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dang ni// dkyil 'khor gsum du brtags pa yin// brtags pa rnams kyang 'dus pa ste// gang du gtso bo skyed
258b3(rgyud 'bum): par byed/ / phung po rnams ni sangs rgyas gsungs// 'byung ba rig mar brtags pa'o// chags pa lcags kyu kho na ste// zhags pa pad+mar chur byed pa// kha phrad pa ni sgrog yin par// sgra bsgrags
258b4(rgyud 'bum): pa ni dril bur bshad/ / spos ni dri chen zhes gsungs te// me tog rak+Sha zhes 'dod do// mar me sha rnams kho na yin// dri ni byang chub sems zhes 'dod// sgeg mo ling gar bstan pa ste//
258b5(rgyud 'bum): 'phreng ba b+ha ga kho na yin// dbyangs ma dbugs su bstan pa dang // gar mkhan ma ni rnal 'byor te// bcom ldan 'das kyis bzang por gsungs// de rtogs pa ni skal bzang yin// rdzogs pa/
258b6(rgyud 'bum): de rnams byams pa sogs// de ltar nang gi bdag nyid gsungs// dkyil 'khor gzhan ni sngon bshad zin// sbyin sreg las ni bshad par bya// nyon cig sbyin sreg rnam pa bzhi// sbyin sreg phyi
258b7(rgyud 'bum): dang nang gsungs te/ / phyi ni sngon du bstan pa yin// nyon cig khyod kyis nang gi ni// padra ba'i rnams 'byor pa ni// lus kyi dbus su nye bar gnas// me dang de bzhin rlung dang ni// dbang chen dang
259a1(rgyud 'bum): ni chu de bzhin/ / rlung gis me ni 'bar byas te// chu yis yongs su smin par byed// dbang chen dkyil 'khor las byung ba// gang du ma ni bskyod pa'o// ra yig mngon spyod yi ge /
259a2(rgyud 'bum): ya yi dbang gi las kho na// la yig rgyas par 'gyur ba ste// ba yig zhi ba zhes gsungs so// gang zhig zas dang btung ba ni// de dag thams cad tshul ste// pad+ma ra k+Sha yig kha mar lta// snying gi pad+ma
259a3(rgyud 'bum): btsud par bya/ / lte ba'i pad+mar 'gro phyi rol// kha sbyor tshul gyi sbyor ba yis// gsang ba'i pad+mar 'gro ma thag/ thal bar mtha' ru rnam par bstan// de ltar sbyin sreg bdag bshad pa// nyin dang nyin du bya ba
259a4(rgyud 'bum): ste/ rtag par rgyun du zas zos na// tshe 'dir kho nar 'grub par 'gyur// rgas pa med cing nad kyang med// 'chi ba med cing 'bras rnams med// de ni blo bur 'chi ba med// 'tshe ba thams cad zad 'gyur zhing //
259a5(rgyud 'bum): rmi lam ngan yang zhi bar 'gyur// bzang po skal bar gson pa ste// sems can thams cad dga' bar smra// mthong ba tsam gyis skul byed do// sbyin sreg las rnams bshad byas nas// lha mo mchod pa bstan
259a6(rgyud 'bum): bar b+ha/ / dri dang 'phreng sogs gos rnams dang // spos me zas dang lha bshos kyis// dbang po gnyis ni rab 'byor nas// bdag la mchod pa rnams ni bya// bdag ni thams cad sangs rgyas nyid// sangs rgyas
259a7(rgyud 'bum): kun gyi gnas yin te/ / de bas nan tan thams cad kyis// rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu mchod// gang zhig 'ga' yang bya ba'i las// rnal 'byor pa yis mchod par sgom// khas dang btung ba de bzhin gos//
259b1(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin rje dang 'phreng po nas// rigam bzhi yis rnam brgyan pa'i// bdag nyid lnga nyid bsam par bya// de ltar bshad nas rdo rjed// cung me gsung ba'i dngos por bzhugs// de nas ldam ba rnas
259b2(rgyud 'bum): kyis/ / phyag gis thal mo sbyar gyur te// dgyes pas rab tu zhal bzhad nas// rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis ni// rnam par mi rtog pa thob ste// cang mi gsung bar bzhugs gyur to// lha mo bzhis yongs su nus
259b3(rgyud 'bum): ba las/ lha mo sgrol mas zhus pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchog dam pa gsang chen zhes bya ba'i rgyud lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa dpal oM r+yan gyi
259b4(rgyud 'bum): yul nas byung ba rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i de kho na nyid rdzogs so/ / / rgya gar gyi mkhan po smi tI dz+nyA na kiN+Di nyid kyis bsgyur cing zhus te bshad nas gtan la phab pa'o//
259b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyu gar skad du/ badz+ra dz+nyA nas muts+tsha ya nA ma tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
259b6(rgyud 'bum): dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / ji skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis mau / rdo rje kun las btus pa'i rgyud las ji lta ba bzhin du gsungs pa'o// byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems
259b7(rgyud 'bum): dpa' drug stong gis/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa dang / sems las byung ba dang / sems zhes bgyi bci lags/ bcom ldan 'das de banan
260a1(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu nyon cig/ ye shes gsum rdo rje las yang dag par byung ba de'i phyir ye shes
260a2(rgyud 'bum): gsum rdo rje'i rang bzhin no/ / byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes gsum rdo rje'i ngo bo ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yang dag pa'i mtha' zab pa/ 'gag pa
260a3(rgyud 'bum): med pa/ skye ba med pa de'i rkyen gyis ma rig pa ste/ ma rig pa zhes bya ba dang / snang ba nye bar thob pa dang / stong pa chen po'o// de yang rtogs par dka' ba'o// 'on kyang snang ba dang bcas par brjod
260a4(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis sems las byung ba ste/ de ni snang ba mched pa dang / shin tu stong pa zhes gsungs so// sems las byung ba'i rkyen gyis sems te/ de ni snang ba dang stong pa
260a5(rgyud 'bum): ste/ sems dang sems las byung ba dang / ma rig pa'i rang bzhin bdag med pa'o// gsum po de dang de 'od gsal ba las byung ba'i rdo rje'i rang bzhin no// de nas byams pa la sogs pa byang
260a6(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur pas cang mi smra bar gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rjes/ byang chub
260a7(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams cad mi smra bar 'dug pa mthong nas bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu ci'i phyir cang mi smra bar gyur pas 'dug/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po de rnams kyis
260b1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal te gtugs nas gzhan yang zhus pa/ e ma'o ston pa rtogs par dka' ba rnam par shes pa gsum gyi dbye ba mchog tu zab pa bcom ldan 'das bshad
260b2(rgyud 'bum): du gsol/ / bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang 'od gsal ba las byung ba rnam par shes pa de nyid sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya la/
260b3(rgyud 'bum): de ni chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba ste/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i bdag nyid de las rtog pa gnyis su gyur te bdag dang gzhan dag tu'o// rnam par shes pa de'i bzhon pa rlung ngo // rlung
260b4(rgyud 'bum): las me'o/ / me las chu'o// chu las sa'o// de rnams las phung po lnga dang / skye mched drug dang / yul lnga ste/ de dag thams cad ni rnam par shes pa rlung dang 'dres pa'o// de nas rnam par shes pa
260b5(rgyud 'bum): gsum gyi rang bzhin gyi snang ba rab tu gsal bar spyod pa rjes su myong bar byed de/ snang ba'i rgyus rang bzhin rnams yang dag par 'byung ngo // de la 'od gsal ba/ gnas pa med pa/ 'gag pa med pa/
260b6(rgyud 'bum): skye ba med pa/ don dam pa'i bden pa/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ de las byung ba'i mun pa'i snang ba ni ma rig pa'o// de'i rang bzhin lta ba dang / 'khrul pa dang / rnam par g.yeng ba dang / brjed ngas pa
260b7(rgyud 'bum): dang / le lo dang / mi smra ba dang / mi gsal ba'o// ma rig pa las sems las byung ba ste/ nyi ma'i snang ba lta bu dang / shin tu gsal ba'i smig rgyu ba lta bu'o// de'i rang bzhin 'dod chags dang /
261a1(rgyud 'bum): dga' ba dang / bajog tu dga' ba dang / drag tho ma sogs pa dang / kun rdzob tu mngon sum du skyes pa'i gzugs dang / lha'i tshogs dang / mtshan ma dang
261a2(rgyud 'bum): brda'o/ / sems las byung ba las sems te/ zla ba'i snang ba dang / shin tu gsal ba'i chu'i zla ba lta bu'o// rang bzhin ni 'dod chags dang bral ba la sogs pa'o// kun rdzob tu ni mngon sum
261a3(rgyud 'bum): gyi bud med dang / b+ha ga dang / pad+ma dang / lha mo'i tshogs kyi brda'o// rdo rje dang pad+ma yang dag par sbyor ba las shes rab kyi ye shes byung ba las rang gi rdo rje'i 'bad pa las me'o// me las chu ste/
261a4(rgyud 'bum): nur nur po'i rnam pa dang / de las mer mar po dang / nar nar po dang / gor gor po dag go// de nas 'dod chags dang bral ba'i snang ba la khrag gi gong bu mkhrang gyur rnams so// de khu ba dang khrag dag
261a5(rgyud 'bum): gis bskyed pa'o/ / de nas dbang po gnyis mnyam par sbyor ba las 'dod chags so// 'dod chags las 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / bar ma'i 'dod chags rab tu shes par bya ste de'i phyir lus te// lus
261a6(rgyud 'bum): las byung ba'i skyil krung bcing ba la sogs pa dang / gsung gi phyag rgya'i thabs su gyur pa A li kA li las yang dag par byung ba'i sngags dang / sems kyi phyag rgya'i thabs su gyur pa sa bon dang mtshan ma
261a7(rgyud 'bum): las lhar dmigs pa'o/ / gzugs la sogs pa'i yul ni dbang po gnyis snyoms par zhugs pa'i thabs su gyur pa'o// rdo rje dang pad+ma yang dag par sbyor ba ni sems dang sems las byung ba dag gi
261b1(rgyud 'bum): thabs su gyur pa'o/ / sems dang sems las byung ba mnyam par sbyar ba ni bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi thabs su gyur pa'o// de sgyu ma'i dpes nye bar mtshon pa ste/ de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing gAd+mang+ga'i klung
261b2(rgyud 'bum): gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni sgyu ma lta bu dang / chu zla dang / mig yor dang / mig rgyu dang / rmi lam dang / sgra brnyan dang / dri za'i grong khyer dang / mig 'phrul dang / dbang po'i gzhu dang /
261b3(rgyud 'bum): glog dang / chu bur dang / me long gi gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis kyi bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin nye bar mtshon par byed pa yin no// ji ltar 'o ma bsrubs pa las mar dang / ji ltar til
261b4(rgyud 'bum): las til mar te/ de bzhin du rdo rjes ni thabs kyi ye shes nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir dang / pad+mas ni shes rab kyi ye shes nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir ro// ji ltar 'o ma dang til dag yang dag par mngon par 'dus byas pa mang
261b5(rgyud 'bum): par mar dang til mar mi 'byung ba de bzhin du/ sngag dang phyag rgyas mngon par 'dus byas pa'i rdo rje dang pad+ma ma'am par sbyar ba meng par rnam par shes pa gsum nye bar mtshon par mi nus so// gang gis b+ha ga dang ling
261b6(rgyud 'bum): ga yang dag par sbyor bar mi nus pa des ni bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin mi rnyed do/ / bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin 'ba'o zhig la lhag par mos pa tsam gyis ni las dang po pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur te/ phyir mi
261b7(rgyud 'bum): ldog pa la'ang slob par 'gyur ro/ / gang rdo rje dang pad+ma mnyam par sbyor ba'i bde bas rang bzhin snang ba yang dag par nye bar mtshon par byed pa de ni bde ba chen po'i go 'phang la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro//
262a1(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni sbas pa'i bshad pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das spyi'i don ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
262a2(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsal pa/ nyan thos la sogs pa 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos spyod pa rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags las ma grol ba rnams/ rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dag tu btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs
262a3(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'dod chags kyi chos gsal bar byed pa/ ngo mtshar can gyi rdo rje'i tshigs thos nas smod par byed pa de rnams dang mi 'gal ba'i sgo nas bshad pa de ni spyi'i don du bshad pa gsungs
262a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags la spyod pa'i chos kyi tshul du mthar thug pa bshad pa ji ltar lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
262a5(rgyud 'bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams legs so lags so// byang chub sems dpa' chen po snying rje mchog dang ldan pa rnams nyon cig/ mtha' ni mu ste/ 'od gsal ba yang dag pa'i tshul
262a6(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya bar mthar thug pa'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das thabs gang gis mthar thug pa thob pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phung
262a7(rgyud 'bum): po dang / khams dang / skye mched la sogs pa'i mtha' stong pa gsum mo// stong pa gsum gyi mtha' 'od gsal ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das stong pa
262b1(rgyud 'bum): gsum 'od gsal ba'i mtha' ji ltar 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ji ltar mas shing bsregs te thal bar byed pa de bzhin du 'od gsal bar shes rab kyi ye shes yun ring
262b2(rgyud 'bum): pos rnam par sbyong bar byed do/ / ji ltar ta la'i lo ma thal bar byed pa de bzhin du thabs kyi ye shes rnam par sbyong bar byed do// ji ltar ras bal gyi 'dab ma bsregs pa de bzhin du snang ba thob pa'i ya
262b3(rgyud 'bum): shes mchog tu myur bas rnam par sbyong bar byed do/ / de bas na rim pa 'dis shing ta la'i lo ma dang / ras bal gyi 'dab ma thal bar gyur pa de bzhin du stong pa dang / shin tu stong pa dang / stong pa chen
262b4(rgyud 'bum): po rnams thar 'od gsal bar 'gyur ro/ / 'di ni mthar thug pa'i bshad pa gsungs pa'o// byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor gyi rgyud du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
262b5(rgyud 'bum): mtha' drug gis bshad pa ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dgongs pas bshad pa dang / dgongs pa ma yin pas bshad pa dang / drang ba'i don dang / nges pa'i don dang
262b6(rgyud 'bum): sgra ji bzhin pa dang / sgra ji bzhin pa ma yin pa rnams so// byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar bzhag ste tshig re re'i bshad pa bka' stsal du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
262b7(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsal pa/ gang mthar thug pa bshad pa de nyid dgongs pas bshad pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags ma yin pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba ma yin pa dang / bar ma nye bar mi dmigs pa zhes bya
263a1(rgyud 'bum): ba la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig rnams ni dgongs pas bshad pa'o/ / lus dang / ngag dang / yid med pa dang / bdag med pa dang / thams cad stong pa dang / dag pa dang /
263a2(rgyud 'bum): 'od gsal ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig ni dgongs pa ma yin pas bshad pa'o// ga pur dang / khrag chen po dang / tsan dan dmar po dang / rdo rje dang / pad+ma dang phyag rgya zhes bya ba la sos
263a3(rgyud 'bum): pa rdo rje'i tshig rnams ni drang ba'i don te/ ga pur ni khu ba dang / khrag chen po'i zla mtshan gyi khrag dang / tsan dan dmar po'i khu ba dang bsres pa ni tsan dan dmar po'o// rdo rje ni mtshan ma ste thabs
263a4(rgyud 'bum): so/ pad+ma ni b+ha ga ste shes rab dang / phyag rgya dang / btsun mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig rnams ni nges pa'i don to// gnyis ka dang / spyod pa dang / bya ba'i rgyud rnams su don
263a5(rgyud 'bum): gsal bar gsungs pa 'di lta ste/ dkyil 'khor dang / mchod sbyin dang / gtor ma dang / sman dang / zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi tshogs rnams dang / de bzhin du 'jig rten pa'i
263a6(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub chen po brgyad gsungs pa rnams ni sgra ji bzhin pa ste/ de ni yi ge'i don gyi bshad pa'o// ko TA khya/ ko TA ba/ ko TA/ ko TA ba sh+tsa/ ko Ta rA ga/ ko la khya/ ko la wa/ ko la ko la @
263a7(rgyud 'bum): ko la sta tha/ 'dis dbang po dang yul gsungs te/ de lta bu la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig rnams ni sgra ji bzhin pa ma yin pas bshad pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' chen pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
263b1(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dang / gnyis ka'i rgyud dang / spyod pa'i rgyud dang / bya ba'i rgyud dang / rtog pa'i rgyud rnams kyi tshad ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/ rnal 'byor
263b2(rgyud 'bum): chen po'i rgyud kyi ming stong phrag bcu gnyis zhes bya ste/ rgyas par bya na grangs med do// gnyis ka'i rgyud stong phrag drug go// spyod pa'i rgyud stong phrag brgyad do// bya ba'i rgyud stong phrag bzhi'o//
263b3(rgyud 'bum): rtog pa'i rgyud stong phrag bzhi'o// de dag ni stong phrag sum cu rtsa bzhi ste/ rgyud dang rtog pa'i ming gi mtha' ma'i yi ge ji snyed pa ni/ ka kha ga g+ha nga/ tsa tsha dza dz+nya nya/ Ta Tha Da nA Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha
263b4(rgyud 'bum): ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa hak+ShaH/ 'di dag ni ming gi yi ge'i mtha' ma rnams so// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyi byed pa dang / cho ga dang /
263b5(rgyud 'bum): bsgrub bya dang / sgrub pa de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ don dam pa'i bden pa las bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim gyis langs te 'dod chags las byung ba'i byang chub kyi gnas
263b6(rgyud 'bum): rab tu bstan pa'i phyir/ btsun mo'i 'khor gyi dbus su 'khor los sgyur ba'i gzugs kyis bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyis btsun mo'i b+ha ga la yang dag par bzhugs te/ 'jig rten gyi spyod pa dang 'gal
263b7(rgyud 'bum): barmad du byung ba'i rdo rje'i tshig gi mtha' drug gis rab tu dpyad de sgrub par byed pa ni rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud la bzhugs so/ / rig pa'i lha mo rnams dang lhan cig dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la dgod pa dang /
264a1(rgyud 'bum): de las byung ba'i byed pa dang / las dang sgrub pa la sogs pa de kho na nyid rnam pa bcu rab tu dpyad de sgrub par byed pa gnyis ka'i rgyud la bzhugs so// las kyi bya ba sna tshogs phyag/
264a2(rgyud 'bum): rgya chen po bya ba'i rgyud kyi phyag rgya dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu dpyad pas bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa ni spyod pa'i rgyud la bzhugs so// 'jigs par dmigs shing shin tu gtsang sbra byed pa dang /
264a3(rgyud 'bum): ye shes sems dpa'i bde ba dam pa med pa dang / bdag nyid lha'i snyoms pa med pa dang / rmad du byung ba'i spyod yul ma yin pa dang / skyon gyis rgyu'i rtog pas rab tu spyod pas sgrub par byed pa ni
264a4(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i rgyud la bzhugs so/ / sngags dang / sman dang / sbyin sreg dang / phye ma dang / mig sman dang / rkang mgyogs la sogs pa dngos grub chen po brgyad rab tu dpyad pa sgrub par byed pa ni rtog
264a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rgyud la bzhugs so/ / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rgyan rnam pa bdun ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gleng bslang ba rnam pa lnga
264a6(rgyud 'bum): dadang / / mtha' drug gis bshad pa dang / rigs pa rnam pa bzhi dang / bshad pa rnam pa bzhi dang / dbye ba rnam pa gnyis dang / gang zag rnam pa lnga'i slob ma brtag pa dang / bden pa rnam pa
264a7(rgyud 'bum): gnyis kyi dgongs pa rnams so/ / gleng bslang ba rnam pa lnga ni/ 'di lta ste/ ming dang / gang gi don du byas pa dang / byed pa po dang / tshad dang / dgos pa rnams so// mtha' drug tu bshad pa ni/
264b1(rgyud 'bum): 'di lta ste/ dgongs pas bshad pa dang / dgongs pa ma yin pas bshad pa dang / drang ba'i don dang / nges pa'i don dang / sgra ji bzhin pa dang / sgra ji bzhin pa ma yin pa rnams so// rigs pa rnam pa
264b2(rgyud 'bum): bzhi ni rgyud dang / gleng gzhi dang / nges tshig dang / rgyu rnams so// bshad pa rnam pa bzhi ni yi ge'i don dang / spyi'i don dang / sbas pa dang / mthar thug pa rnams so// dbye ba rnam pa gnyis ni
264b3(rgyud 'bum): 'di lta ste/ tshogs la bshad pa dang / slob ma la bshad pa'o// gang zag rnam pa lnga'i slob ma brtag pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ rin po che dang / tsan dan dang / pad+ma dang / pad+ma dkar po dang ut+pal
264b4(rgyud 'bum): rnams so/ / bden pa rnam pa gnyis kyi dgongs pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang / don dam pa'i bden pa'o// rigs kyi bu kun rdzob ni mi brtan pa dang g.yo ba'o// de'i bden pa ni chu rtswa
264b5(rgyud 'bum): lta bu'o/ / don dam pa'i bden pa ni stong pa chen po bco brgyad do// de'i mtha' ni gnas so// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gsol pa/ don dam pa'i bden pa la rab tu gnas pa'i rnal 'byor chen /
264b6(rgyud 'bum): pas las kyi rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin la brten nas sems can gyi don ji ltar rab tu spyod par bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ji srid du zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyis
264b7(rgyud 'bum): sems can gyi don mi byed pa de srid du yang dag pa'i mtha' la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro/ / gang du sems can gyi don bya bar mthong ba de'i tshe bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pas yang dag pa'i ma
265a1(rgyud 'bum): las langs te sems can gyi don byas nas yang dag pa'i mtha' nyid du 'jug par byed do/ / de nas byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dga' zhi
265a2(rgyud 'bum): mgu la yi rangs te dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas cang mi smra bar gyur to/ / ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las/ bde ba chen po'i le'u ste rim par phye ba
265a3(rgyud 'bum): gnyis pa'o/ / rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na ka ra'i zhal snga nas dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba khu ston dngos grub kyis bsgyur/ spang nas bla ma de nyid
265a4(rgyud 'bum): dang / dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas zhus shing gtan la phab pa'o// ye shes rdo rje kun las btus// rnal 'byor chen po'i gsal byed yin// ye shes rang bzhin 'khor ba dang // mya ngan 'das
265a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i ngo bo'o/ / de gnyis dbyer med rdo rje ste// kun 'dir 'dus pas kun las btus// de ston pa la der brtags nas// gzhung la'ang ming don 'tshams pa yin// /
265a6(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra hri da ya a laM kA ra tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud ces bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gi
265a7(rgyud 'bum): thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi snying po bud med bcu'i dkyil na cha shas lnga pa'i tshul du bzhugs so// brjod du med
265b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i 'khor rdo rje dang pad+mar sbyor ba la bzhugs pa 'di lta ste/ dam tshig yongs su spyod pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / ye shes kyi lus yongs su 'grub pa zhes bya
265b2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / sgra brnyan lta bu'i rdo rje'i gsung 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / gzhan gyis shes par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / rtse gcig tu 'dris pa zhes
265b3(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / gzhan las 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / rten par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / rlan par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang
265b4(rgyud 'bum): smin par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / skyod par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / go 'byed par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / hA ra nu pU ra la sogs pas mdzes pa
265b5(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / gi tA mgrin la sogs pa'i glu mkhan zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / sbrul gyi snying po la sogs pa'i dri ldan ma zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / tshong ma
265b6(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs za ba'i ro ldan ma zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / rtsen pa sna tshogs kyis 'khyud mkhan ma zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang / gsum rig par byed pa dngos med ma zhes bya ba'i rdo rjem
265b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ma la sogs pa ri rab kyi rdul dang mnyam pa'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro thams cad dang / rdo rje mkha' 'gro chen mo nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa 'di lta ste/ gzugs kyi mtshan nyid zhu ba zhes bya ba'i rdo rje
266a1(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gro chen po dang / tshor ba'i mtshan nyid sim pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro chen po dang / 'du shes kyi mtshan nyid nub pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro chen po dang / 'du
266a2(rgyud 'bum): byed kyi mtshan nyid la rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro chen po dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro chen po la sogs pa nam mkha'i dbyings
266a3(rgyud 'bum): dang mnyam pa rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di til gyi gang bu lta bur gang bar snang ngo // de nas rdo rje mkha' 'gro de dag thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas/ mkha' 'gro chen po rdo rje 'dzin pa
266a4(rgyud 'bum): chen po la mchod pa'i sprin spros pa du ma yid las byung ba lha dang mi'i mchod pa las khyad par du 'phags pas mchod nas phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad
266a5(rgyud 'bum): kyi/ gsang gsum bsdus pa'i spyod pa'i mchog/ rdo rje snying po'i rgyan gyi rgyud// 'dren pa mchog gis bshad du gsol// de nas rdo rje chen pos gsol ba btab pa'i tshigs gsan nas/ mkha' 'gro
266a6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad rnam par bltas te cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro de dag thams cad kyis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
266a7(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug gis yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro chen po la sogs pa'i 'khor du 'chad du mi bzhes pa de bdag cag la mi dgyes su ma mdzad cig/ de nas
266b1(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par bltas te tshigs su bcad pa gsungs pa/ sems dpa' chen pos zhus pa legs// sa 'og ma yi
266b2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kyang / / 'di yi gzhung gis sems rmongs na/ sems dpa' gzhan ni smos ci dgos// sangs rgyas chos nyid dag pa 'di// byis pa rnams kyis mi rtogs phyir// byin gyis brlabs nas
266b3(rgyud 'bum): 'chad pa ni/ / ston pa rnams kyis chos nyid do// de nas rdo rje mkha' 'gro de dag thams cad rab tu dga' nas yang mchod pa'i tshogs kyis mchod de phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
266b4(rgyud 'bum): 'das legs so legs so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug gis bdag cag byin gyis brlab par mdzad du gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba thun mong ma yin pa bstan
266b5(rgyud 'bum): cing rnam pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug gis bdag cag byin gyis brlab par mdzad du gsol/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang phyug gi rdo rje mkha' 'gro de dag gis gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas/ sems
266b6(rgyud 'bum): dpa' thams cad byin gyis rlob pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di
266b7(rgyud 'bum): rang gi thugs ka las phyung ngo / / oM AHhUM sa ma ya badz+ra/ de nas phyung ma thag tu de'i 'od zer gyis rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i 'khor de dag thams cad bsdus nas rang gi snying khar btsud nas/ bud med kyi dkyil na
267a1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad brgyal bltar gnas so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug gis de bsrung ba'i phyir mkha' 'gro thams cad 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
267a2(rgyud 'bum): zhugs so/ / snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de dag dran pa slar thob cing ji lta ba bzhin du gnas so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug gis 'khor lo rnam par dgod pa zhes bya ba'i ting
267a3(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu rdo rje mkha' 'gro de dag thams cad rang rang gi gnas ji lta ba bzhin du 'khod par gyur to// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i phyi
267a4(rgyud 'bum): gyi rlabs kyis nam mkha'i dbyings na gnas pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug gis
267a5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje snying po rgyan gyis rgyud 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ sems can gyi khams thams cad mnyam pa nyid du dmigs te/ dbugs rngub par mi mdzad/ 'byung bar mi
267a6(rgyud 'bum): mdzad/ lus 'gyur bar yang mi mdzad/ lus gnas par yang mi mdzad/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mi gzigs/ mi dgongs/ nye bar mi 'jig go/ thabs dang shes rab
267a7(rgyud 'bum): stong par yang mi mdzad/ shin tu 'gal ba can yang dag par 'dzud par mi mdzad/ mtho ris la'ang mi 'jog/ ma dad pa rnams dad par yang mi mdzad/ ma dul ba rnams dul bar yang mi mdzad/ nye bar
267b1(rgyud 'bum): 'tshe ba zhi bar yang mi mdzad/ ma 'gag pa rnams 'gag par yang mi mdzad/ ma bskul ba rnams bskul bar yang mi mdzad/ ma rgyas pa rnams rgyas par yang mi mdzad/ rnam par rmongs
267b2(rgyud 'bum): pa rnams rmongs pa sel bar yang mi mdzad/ dga' bar gyur pa rnams mi dga' bar yang mi mdzad/ mi dga' ba rnams dga' bar yang mi mdzad/ ma khros pa rnams khros par yang mi mdzad/ mi
267b3(rgyud 'bum): sdug pa rnams sdug par yang mi mdzad/ drag po ma rungs pa chen po dang / gtum po chen po dang / lha dang / lha ma yin dang / log 'dren dang / gdug pa chen po dang / yi dgas dang / sha ba dang /
267b4(rgyud 'bum): gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / shin tu gdug pa'i dug chen po dang / tsha ba'i gdon dang / nad dang / sbrul dang / sems can thams cad la 'tshe bar byed pa rnams nye bar zhi bar yang
267b5(rgyud 'bum): mi mdzad do/ / rnam par dul bar yang mi mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ brjid pa dang bcas par gar mdzad cing zhal 'dzum pa dang / 'dor ba dang / bskum
267b6(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / spyan mdzes pas smin rings bskyod cing bsgyur ba dang / pad+ma'i phyag gi sor mo g.yas g.yon gar gyi 'phreng ba'i tshul gyis sa'i ngos la zhabs 'phen cing bsgyur
267b7(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / 'dor zhing bskul ba dang / 'jog cing 'degs pa'i rnam par gnon pa'i nam mkha'i dpying 'di thams cad kun tu khyab par mdzad de/ rlung gi khams chen por kun tu khyab par mdzad/
268a1(rgyud 'bum): de la khyab nas me'i khams chen por kun tu khyab par mdzad de/ de nas chu'i khams chen por kun tu khyab par mdzad/ de nas sa'i khams chen por kun tu khyab par
268a2(rgyud 'bum): mdzad do/ / de'ang kun tu khyab nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems la kun tu khyab par mdzad do// ri dang sems can thams cad dang // sna tshogs phra ba sbom po dang // bud med gzhon nu
268a3(rgyud 'bum): rgan pa dang / / skyes pa dang ni ma ning dang // lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang // gdon dang skar ma gshin rje dang // chu bdag brgya byin la sogs dang // 'byung dang 'byung 'gyur thams cad la// bcom
268a4(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das ni bde chen po/ / kun tu bzang po rdo rje 'dzin// kun tu khyab par byas te gnas// dpal rdo rje snying po'i rgyan gyi rgyud las/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro byin gyis rlob pa'i le'u ste

268a6(rgyud 'bum): bapar bya'o/ / oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM A d+ya nut+pa na na twA ta/ gtor ma'i sngag so// a hA/ i I/ u U/ e AM/ oM A~M/ oM aH/ bud med do// r-i r-I/ l-i lAM/ ma ning ngo // ka kha ga g+ha nga/ tsa cha
268a7(rgyud 'bum): dz+nyanya/ Ta Sha Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ skyes pa'i 'o// ya ra la wa/ 'byung ba'i 'o// sha Sha sa ha/ 'jigs pa la sogs pa'o// k+ShaHchos kyi dbyings kyi sa bon no//
268b1(rgyud 'bum): badz+rab+hU/ hUM/ daM na dzi kadz+dza/ rat+na d+h+r-ik+Shasa~M/ A ro li ka d+hI/ pra d+h+r-ikA la~M/ mkha' 'gro chen po lta'i'o// de lta tinA~M/ so sa ra t+ti l-I/ rag ti / badz+ra d+hi trA~M/ ro ma 'gro rten pa
268b2(rgyud 'bum): pa la sogs pa'i'o/ / k+Shi ti gad+ha k+Shi/ badz+ra pA ti dzI/ ga ga nag d+hA khaM lo ke shwa rA ya ga/ nai ba ra NA bzhi s+thA ni kaM/ sa man+ta b+hadzas/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro dam tshig sprad pa la sogs pa'i'o/
268b3(rgyud 'bum): rU pa badz+rAHshASh+Tha badz+ra hU~M/ gan rdza badz+ra ba/ ras badz+ra hoH/ sAr sha baHShe/ tham d+ha tu badz+rar/ rdo rje mkha'i' 'gro mdzes par byed pa la sogs pa'i'o// ya mAn+ta k+She)/ pradz+nyAn kr-it+ta/ pad+mA na kr-i/
268b4(rgyud 'bum): big+h+na ta kr-iH/ kinanI yang d+d+ha/ ma hAb la/ a tsa ye kan swad+hana~M d+ha/ tsakra bi d+hi ni hU~M dz+dza/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'i'o// wA ra~M dzi na b+h+rUM/ te dzo g+har+b+ha b+h+rU~M/
268b5(rgyud 'bum): tsakr-i b+h+rUM/ ba ra d+ha na b+hUM/ bi sa ra Na b+h+rUM/ bi ra dzi na b+h+rUM/ ka ro b+hA ba b+h+rU~M/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro gtsug tor rgyal ba la sogs pa'i'o// hUM hrIHkha/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i 'o// oM me de ni 'adz+ri gri ba ba
268b6(rgyud 'bum): 'amadz+dza hUM/ sa'i mi oM badz+ra prakA re NanArba d+hu/ ra ba'i'o// oM badz+ra bltar hUM la hU~M/ dra ba'i'o// oM badz+ra bi tAn d+hu She hU~M/ gur gyi'o// oM badz+ra sha rang sa dzA sa tAM/ mnga'i'o// mi
268b7(rgyud 'bum): yAn lArka nAM hUM hUM/ 'od kyi'o// oM shu n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma kohaM/ stong pa nyid kyi sngags so// oM d+harmA d+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma eH/ chos kyi dbyings kyi sngags so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta ka sa
269a1(rgyud 'bum): tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma kohaM/ sku la sogs pa byin gyis brlab pa'i 'o// badz+ra sa ma ya sU traM mA ti kra ma hUM/ thig gdab pa'i 'o// badz+ra tsi tra sa ma ya hUM/ mtshon dgye ba'i'o//
269a2(rgyud 'bum): hUM haHA dz+dzaH/ dbab pa'i'o// badz+ra kI la ya mud ga ra A ko Ta ya hUM phaT/ phur bus brdung ba'i 'o// de la sogs pa'i mtha' yas pa// 'jig rten gsum du rnyed dka' ba'i// sngags kyi
269a3(rgyud 'bum): tshogs rnams ji snyed pa/ / de kun sngon du rgyas pa ru// gsang ba dang ni 'dzegs byed dang // bde mchog sogs la nga yis ni// las dang bcas par rab bshad pa// rnal 'byor rtogs pas shes bya'o
269a4(rgyud 'bum): dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las/ sngags kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas mkha' 'gro grong khyer mchog/ dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa bri bar bya// las kyi cho ga shes pa
269a5(rgyud 'bum): yis/ / ci rigs par ni las rnams bya// nyi shu rtsa lnga'i srad bu ni// sems med las byung byas nas su// byin rlabs mi bskyod rtag pa ru// byas te thig ni gdab pa'o// gru bzhi pa la sgo
269a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhi pa/ / tA ra Na bzhis brgyan pa ste// dar dang me tog 'phreng bas grubs// srad bu bzhi dang rab ldan pa// thur gyi cha ni thams cad du// zla ba rin chen rdo rje dgod// las kyi bye brag shes pa yis
269a7(rgyud 'bum): blotho dang ldan pas phyag rgya dgod/ / in+d+ra nI la lta bu yi// 'jigs byed rdo rje dbus su bri/ shar du lce brgyad 'khor lo dkar// lho ru rin chen grur dgu ljang // nub tu 'dab brgyad pad+ma mar/
269b1(rgyud 'bum): thung ngural gri sngon po bri// me yi mtshams su 'khor lo ston// bden thal ut+pal dmar po dang // rlung gi mtshams su pad+ma dmar// dbang ldan ut+pal ser po ste// rdo rje thob shar gyis/
269b2(rgyud 'bum): lho yi sgo ru rdo rje dbyug/ pad+ma'i sdong bu nub kyi sgo// byang sgo rdo rje kha bye ba// sbyor ba ldan pas dgod par bya// rnam pa nyi shu rtsa lngar ni// tshon rtsi dag kyang bsgom bya ste// rdul tshon lnga la sogs pa
269b3(rgyud 'bum): rnams/ / rim pa bzhin du gdab par bya// de nas bum pa gzung bya ba// rtsa ba nag nog med pa yi// zhabs brtan mgrin ring mchu 'phyang ba// lha yi grangs tsam sta gon gnas// mgul par ras
269b4(rgyud 'bum): kyis yang dag dkris/ / ldum bu yis ni kha mdzes pa// rin chen sman 'bru sna lnga dang // spos chu yis ni rab bkang nas// bum pa mngon par bsngags par bya// rnam rgyal bum pa dkyil 'khor gyi//
269b5(rgyud 'bum): bdag po lha mo rnams kyi bzhi// lha rnams kyi ni bum pa bzhi// sgo yi phyogs kyi bum pa ni// las kun byed pas bzlas byas te// ku sha'i chun pos sems can che// 'jug pa kun la gtor bar bya/
269b6(rgyud 'bum): yon dang gtor ma mchod phul nas// de dag phyi grwar rab bkod de// g.yas su rgyal ba spyan drang ngo // de nas lha rnams rab gnas pa'i// bsam pa'i sbyor bas bsam bya ste// phyag rgya bral ba
269b7(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba ni/ / lus can byin gyis mi rlob pas// bu mo gzugs bzang lang tshos brgyan// dbang thob lus rgyas thob pa mo// g.yon ma rgyan gyis rab brgyan te// de yis 'khor lo sprul par bya/
270a1(rgyud 'bum): de la mar me brgya sogs pa'i// mchod pa phul nas bstod bya ste// bshang gci khu ba khrag rnams ni// dung chen po ru bzhag bya ste// lnga rnams la ni dbul bar bya// de nas
270a2(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gro grong mchog tu/ / slob ma rnams ni gzhug bya ste// rdo rje ye shes rab thob pa'i// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// pho brang dkyil 'khor dam pa 'dir// bdag gis slob ma gzhug
270a3(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / de nas slob ma de yis kyang // me tog sngags 'dis gtor ba'o// pra tits+tsha badz+ra hoHzhes bya// de nas tshig 'dis gdong g.yogs dgrol// de ring dad pa'i shugs kyis ni// dkyil 'khor du
270a4(rgyud 'bum): 'dir blta bar bya/ / sangs rgyas rigs su khyod skyes so// sngags dang phyag rgyas khyod byin brlab// dngos grub thams cad phun sum tshogs// dam tshig mchog tu 'grub par byed// rdo rje pad+mo rol pa'i
270a5(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ sngags kyi bdag 'ad shes par bya// pa sh+ya badz+ra/ gang dag me tog gsang ba ste// de de de yi lha yang dag/ de yi sbyor ba rab sbyin te// de yi nan tan du sgrub po// dung chen bdud rtsi lnga
270a6(rgyud 'bum): brudrung de/ / dmyal ba'i chu 'dis khyod la ni// dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed// dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub pa'i// 'thung zhig rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu// badz+ra u da ka/ de nas sangs rgyas thams
270a7(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi/ / dam tshig dang ni sdom pa rnams// bla mas slob ma sdig bral la// ji lta ba bzhin bsgrag par bya// dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las/ ri mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste
270b1(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa'o/ / // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// dbang bskur ba yi cho ga'i mchog/ gang gis legs par byed 'gyur na// de ni sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub//
270b2(rgyud 'bum): slob dpon mtshan nyid thams cad ldan// yang dag shes shing rgyud shes pa// de nyid bcu la sogs pa yi// gsang rig cho ga shes pa pos// bsgrims te slob ma yang dag gzung // bla ma la gus
270b3(rgyud 'bum): da pa'o/ / dge sgom lha rnams mchod byed pa// gtong phod yon tan ldan pa'o// de nas slob ma de yis kyang // langs te zhabs la mgos gtugs nas// rgyal po dbang phyug bde dam pa// gos dang rgyan gyis
270b4(rgyud 'bum): legs par bgos/ / steng du bla re bre bar bya// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan pa ngan dang // lAm dang tshangs pa'i skud pa dang // gdu bu dag dang ska rags dang // bkra shis tshigs bcad sna tshogs kyis// slob ma sdig
270b5(rgyud 'bum): dang bral ba la/ / slob dpon gyis ni dbang bskur ro// dang po rnam rgyal bum pa dang // de nas lha mo bzhi rnams dang // lha rnams kun gyi bzhi po bzhis// bkra shis tshigs bcad glu sgra dang // rdo rje dril
270b6(rgyud 'bum): bu gsil ba yis/ / skyob pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon sum du// til gyi gang bu bzhin gang ba'i// rgyal bas bum pa bzung nas ni// de nyid la ni dbang bskur bar// dkyil 'khor de nyid rig par bas
270b7(rgyud 'bum): de lta bu ni bsams nas kyang / / chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan par bya// de nas yid 'ong bu mo ni// legs par goms pa dbang thob pa// rgyan gyis rab brgyan rab mdzes pa// btsal te bla ma la phul nas/
271a1(rgyud 'bum): de nas rgyal dbang slob ma de// nang ni sbas pa btus pa yi// gsang ba mnyam par 'jug pa yi// sbyor dang ldan pas dbang bskur bya// rdo rje pad+mo las drang ba// sbom po mtha'
271a2(rgyud 'bum): ltalhag rtse sbyar nas/ / rkan du rdo rje gzhag par bya// kye ma'o bde ba bde ba che// kye ma'o dam tshig bde brjod cing // kye ma'o bde ba blang bar bya'o// 'di ni gsang ba zhes bya ba'i// de dbang bskur ba'i thabs
271a3(rgyud 'bum): mchog go/ yang na shin tu dang ba dang // gzugs bzang sgrub la dga' ba dang // sbyor goms bla ma la ni dbul// bla mas byin brlabs lha mo dang // sgrub pa de la sbyin par bya// de yis blangs nas
271a4(rgyud 'bum): brtson pa'i tshogs/ / ji skad gsungs bzhin rab byas nas// rang gi lha dang sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams kun// mnyes byed cho gas sems brtags te// mngon sum bde
271a5(rgyud 'bum): ba rang byung ba/ / gzhan gyis gang du bsgrag mi nus// go ba'i yul de bde ba che// bla ma de la dbul bar bya// bla ma gzhan la de bzhin du// ci dga' ba yi yon yang dbul// slob dpon cung zad ci
271a6(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa/ / yid la bsams pa dbul bar bya// dam tshig 'da' bas 'jigs pa'i phyir// bsgrims te de bzhin dbul bar bya// slob dpon gyi ni yul gyi mchog/ rigs kyi khyad par gyis ni lnga//
271a7(rgyud 'bum): bum pa'i dbang sogs dbye ba yis// yang na gsum du 'gyur ba yin// rang gi ma dang seng ge'i gdan// yon gyi mchog ste sangs rgyas rigs// gser dang glang po rin chen dang // sring ma
271b1(rgyud 'bum): bla ma la dbul ba/ / rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs yin te// yon te yon gyi mchog yin no// shing rta rta ni shin tu brgyan// rang gi chung ma dbul bya ste// rin chen sna tshogs rnam dag pa/
271b2(rgyud 'bum): yon de rin po che yi rigs// mu tig 'phreng ba shin tu mdzes// bu mo rin chen 'dra ba yis// brgyan te bla ma la dbul ba// yon de pad+ma'i rigs yin no// rgyal po dang ni dbang phyug dang // chung ma 'phrul
271b3(rgyud 'bum): gyi bzhon pa sogs/ / glang po rta ni shin tu brgyan// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi rje// nan tan bla ma dbul bya ba// sna tshogs rdo rje'i rigs yin no// de rnams bzhi dang 'gyur ba dang // mi 'gyur ba yi
271b4(rgyud 'bum): bye brag gis/ / gsum du shes bya bla ma la// blo ldan rdo rje slob ma yis// ci ste bde ba kun 'dod na// dad mos sems kyis dbul bar bya// yid la gang bsams ma phul lam//
271b5(rgyud 'bum): khas blangs de ni ma phul na// yi dgas dmyal ba rnam gnyis su// nges par skyes te rlag par 'gyur// de bas de rnams rab phul nas// gsol ba dag ni rab tu gdab// rdo rje dkyil 'khor
271b6(rgyud 'bum): chen po yi/ / dkyil 'khor du ni bdag zhugs so// sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po yi// dkyil 'khor du ni bdag zhugs so// sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po yi// dkyil 'khor bdag
271b7(rgyud 'bum): gis de ring mthong / / gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po yi// dkyil 'khor du ni bdag dbang bskur// de nas bla ma de yis kyang // de la dbang bskur sbyin bya ste// dri dang me tog 'phreng bas brgyan//
272a1(rgyud 'bum): bsgrims te yang dag brtag par bya// dang po la ni bus pa'i dang // gnyis pa la ni gsang ba'i dbyung // gsum pa shes rab ye shes te// bzhi pa de yi ye shes te/
