272a2(rgyud 'bum): bla ma las ni thob pa'o// dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyis rgyud las/ phan yon dang bcas par dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // gang gis thabs kyis rigs
272a3(rgyud 'bum): lnga'i don/ / rang gi don gyur kun tu bzang // 'di dag gzhan la rab bde'i phyir// rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub thabs bshad// yid 'ong dben pa'i sa phyogs su// ci bder gnas la
272a4(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha' kun/ / sems kyis khyab par byas nas su// rnam brtags e ma'o 'jig rten kun// sdug bsngal chos kyis kun nas gtses// byang chub sems nyams sems can rnams//
272a5(rgyud 'bum): kun las 'byung zhes dam bcas pa'i// sngags pas spyi bor gzhag pa ni// AHsems kyi rdul phran cha drug rnams// phyogs bcu dag tu phye nas su// chos kyi don rnams nges bsal nas// shin tu
272a6(rgyud 'bum): dri mang sems dag pa/ / 'das dang ma 'ongs pa yi sems// da ltar yang ni dmigs su med// gnyis med de la gnyis med med// nam mkha' zhes pa'ang gnas pa med// de ltar kun tu brtags nas su// 'gro
272a7(rgyud 'bum): ba thams cad shin tu stong / / dri med rnal 'byor nyid kyi yin// dngos po med par rang sems bsam// 'gro ba 'di ni de lta bu'i// dngos po gang dag yod min na// sdug bsngal sna tshogs gang dag lags// sems
272b1(rgyud 'bum): nyams sems can 'byung bar sgom/ / 'on kyang sngon gyi smon lam shugs// dbyangs yig spel ba'i glu ldan bya// rin chen sems ni rmugs pa la// bde gshegs rnams kyis bskul bar snang // shUn+ta tI ti yo ga bArda
272b2(rgyud 'bum): / swAhA/ pra b+hA bI A kA shA ta mA pa ga ta sa ma ya/ u pa ta pa yan+ti sug ta su ga te shrI badz+ra swA hA/ pU pu s+t+waM haM/ rnam rtog kun spangs dri med pa'i// rnam par mi rtog sgom pa'i sems// sngags kyi de nyid bskyod byas la/
272b3(rgyud 'bum): hUM zhes pa yi gzugs su brtag/ ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang 'gyur na// gang phyir de ni bsgoms pas thob// dam pa nam mkha'i dbyings la gnas// byang chub sems tshogs der bcas la// rnal 'byor yid kyis kun
272b4(rgyud 'bum): bsams nas/ / rgyas par rnam par brtag par bya// yi ge bruM gyis lha yi gnas// rdo rje rin chen gyis ni brgyan// sgo khyud rta babs ka ba dag/ dar gyi 'phreng bas rnam par klubs// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa//
272b5(rgyud 'bum): dril bu'i dra ba ngag gis brgyan// rtag par do shal ma long dang // me tog 'phreng bas rgyan rnams bres// de yi dbus su seng ge'i gdan// seng ge brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan// smon lam dbang gis de dag kun/
272b6(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' mthu bo che// shar phyogs pa glang shin tu rgyas// lho phyogs rta yi gdan bzang ste// nub phyogs su ni rma bya bshad// de bzhin byang phyogs nam mkha' lding // mi bskyod khro bo bsam pa ni//
272b7(rgyud 'bum): mthing kha dkar po dmar po'i zhal// rdo rje phyag rgya thugs ka na// mthing kha kha dog gsal la bzang // g.yas na rin chen 'khor lo ste// ral gri pad+ma g.yon pa na// 'jig rten khams ni kun 'khrug pa'o// brtul
273a1(rgyud 'bum): zhugs can gyis zhal gsum bsam/ / dang po yi ni stong pa nyid// gnyis pa de bzhin mtshan ma med// gsum pa smon pa med pa yi// zhal du mkhas pas rig par bya// phyag drug rtag tu
273a2(rgyud 'bum): 'bar bar sgom/ / mtshon cha sna tshogs rnams dang ldan// pad+ma la ni mnyam bzhag nas// ye shes phyag rgya snying kha nas// dbus kyi gnas su bsam pa ni// rdo rje skyil mo krung du gnas// shar gyi gnas su bsam
273a3(rgyud 'bum): pa ni/ / sngags pas rnam snang thub pa ste// dkar dang mthing kha dmar ba'i zhal// 'khor lo phyag rgya snying kha na// rdo rje 'bar sogs 'od gsal ba// rin chen rdo rje g.yas pa na// ral gri pad+ma g.yon pa na// rnal 'byor
273a4(rgyud 'bum): can gyis rtag par bsam/ / thor tsugs dbu rgyan dag gis brgyan// rin chen mgon po lho phyogs na// ser dang mthing kha dkar ba'i zhal// rin chen phyag rgya snying kha na// mar gang lta bur snang ba'o//
273a5(rgyud 'bum): g.yas na 'khor lo ral gri ste// rdo rje pad+ma g.yon na'o// rtag par rnal 'byor pas bsam pa// rin chen char du 'bebs pa'o// nub phyogs gnas su dgod bya ba// snang ba mtha' yas bsam pa ni//
273a6(rgyud 'bum): dmar dang mthing kha dkar ba'i zhal// pad+ma rA ga'i mdog lta bu// pad+ma'i phyag rgya snying kha na// rdo rje rin chen g.yas pa na// 'khor lo ral gri g.yon pa na// pad+ma la ni mnyam gzhag bsam// byang phyogs gnas su
273a7(rgyud 'bum): don grub ni/ / ljang khu mthing kha dkar ba'i zhal// ral gri phyag rgya snying kha na// 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas mnyam pa'o// pad+ma rdo rje g.yas pa na// 'khor lo rin chen g.yon pa na// zla ba'i dkyil
273b1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor dbus gnas pa/ / byang gi gnas su bsam par bya// sngags pas phyag drug bsam pa ni// spyan de zhal gsum dkar mo yi// rnam par snang mdzad phyag rgya bzhin// de yi don du rnam par sgom// sA ma kI/
273b2(rgyud 'bum): yang bsam pa ni// ut+pal dang ni mthing 'dra ba// zhal gsum phyag drug chags pa ste// mi bskyod phyag rgya mchog 'dzin pa'o// chags pas chags pa rigs kyi sngags// zhal gsum phyag drug dge ba ste// sbyor ba'i
273b3(rgyud 'bum): sa ni dkar mo bsam/ / pad+ma rA ga'i phyag rgya'o// sgrol ma kha dog sar mo ste// 'khril bag rgyan gyis rab tu brgyan// zhal gsum phyag drug rab tu bsam// thogs med rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o// sgo bzhi sgo srungs dgo
273b4(rgyud 'bum): bya ba sgo rnams su ni khro bo bsam/ / khro bo chen po gshin rje gshed// gzhan gyis mi thub de bzhin te// thub par dga' ba rta mgrin dang // khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa bsam// de dag kun kyang zhal gsum pa
273b5(rgyud 'bum): drag cing drag por gnon pa'o/ / mthing kha ser po de bzhin dmar// ljang khu dag ni kha dog tu'o// mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa ste// thod pa'i 'phreng thogs de bzhin no// gdon rnams thams cad skrag byed pa
273b6(rgyud 'bum): gnod sbyin srin po 'phra man ma/ / ma he seng ge stag rnams dang // ba lang zhon pa rnam bzhi'o// rnam par 'gyur ba'i khro gnyer can// khro bo spyan ni kun nas bsdus// sngags 'di rnams kyis bsam pa ni/
273b7(rgyud 'bum): gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'o// sngags kyi de nyid rjes mthun par// sngags pas dkyil 'khor bsgrubs nas su// sa yi snying po la sogs pa// sems dpa' rnams ni der gnas bsam// lus dang ngag dang sems
274a1(rgyud 'bum): @de nyid/ / hUM zhes bya ba'i yi ge mchog/ sems ni de ru zhugs par bsam// mi bskyod pa ni bdag nyid che// dbang po'i lam du byung nas su// dang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis ni brgyas
274a2(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid gcig cing gcig 'gyur bar/ / skad cig gis ni brtag par bya// khyod ni rdo rje sems zhes bya// de la sogs pas bstod par byed// de nas rnam snang mdzad la sogs// rang gi snying khar
274a3(rgyud 'bum): rab tu gzung/ / gzugs rnams kyi ni rang bzhin du// rnam par snang mdzad thub pa bzhugs// tshor ba rin chen mgon po yin// mtha' yas 'od ni 'du shes su'o// 'du byed kun tu gdon mi za/
274a4(rgyud 'bum): mi bskyod pa ni phung po lngar// de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rnams ni// sngags 'di rnams kyis bzhugs par bsam// sa yi khams kyi rang bzhin du// de nas spyan ni bzhugs bya ste// rnal 'byor
274a5(rgyud 'bum): yid kyis bsam pa ni/ / de yang spro bar gnas par bsam// mA ma kI yang chu yi khams// brlan zhing khrag ni rgyu ba'i phyir// rnal 'byor pas ni yid kyis bsam// de yi lus ni rgyas par 'gyur//
274a6(rgyud 'bum): me yi khams kyi rang bzhin du// gos dkar mo yang bzhugs par bya// kun tu khyab par zhugs pa yi// 'od rnams su ni der 'gyur ro// sgrol ma rlung gi rang bzhin du// bzhugs par de
274a7(rgyud 'bum): ni bsam par bya/ / rlung ni rnam pa lnga ru 'gyur// de bzhin yid mgyogs rdzu 'phrul 'grub// rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma// nam mkha'i rang bzhin dag tu 'jug/ de lus khong stong nyid
274b1(rgyud 'bum): la ni/ / rang sems yon tan sgom pa'i sems// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi rnal 'byor gyis// sangs rgyas sgyu ma'i sbyor bas su// dag pa'i bdag nyid ci 'dod par// de nas ri rab phul nas
274b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gro/ / sa yi snying po bdag nyid che// sangs rgyas spyan ni bdag nyid de// mig gi phyogs su zhugs nas ni// 'phrul gyi mig tu rtag tu 'gyur// phyag na rdo rje bdag nyid che// rna ba'i rnam shes sbyor
274b3(rgyud 'bum): bas na/ / sgra rnams thams cad shes pa de// rna ba'i rnam shes de bzhin 'gyur// nam mkha'i snying po bdag nyid che// sna yi rnam shes sbyor bas na// sangs rgyas shangs ni bdag nyid shes/
274b4(rgyud 'bum): de yang de yi ngo bor 'gyur// 'jig rten dbang por rab chags pa// rdo rje rtse yi sbyor bas su// ro yi dngos po myong ba des// skad cig gcig la de ru 'gyur// blo ldan sgrib pa thams cad ni/
274b5(rgyud 'bum): rnam par sel ba'i ming dang ldan// nyon mongs thams cad rnam par sel// nye ba'i nyon mongs pa yang 'jig/ me long gi ni rnam pa ltar// rten pa'i tshul gyis 'byung ba ni// gzugs brnyan
274b6(rgyud 'bum): gyi ni sbyor bas su/ / skad cig gis ni de ru 'gyur// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' dpal// rnam pa bcu dang drug tu dang // sbyor ba de ni byin brlabs nas// sngags pas de ni sems la
274b7(rgyud 'bum): gzhug/ khro bo lcags kyu dpung pa yis// zhags pa lta bu gnyis pa'o// su gu rgyud kyi kha sprad gsum// rgyal mtshan gzhug par khyab par gzhag/ de ltar don rnams rab tu zhugs/
275a1(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bor bdag/ rdo rje phyag rgya dang ldan pa// g.yon pa dril bsnams sta zur brten// rdo rje sems dpa' de gnas 'gyur// rnal 'byor chen po
275a2(rgyud 'bum): dkar ba'i gzugs/ / dkar dang mthing kha dmar po'i dbu// stong nyid la sogs bdag sbyor ba// rdo rje sems dpa' zhes su smra// rdo rje phyag rgya rjes su chags pa la// oM sarba ta thA ga ta
275a3(rgyud 'bum): a nu rA ga Na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma kohaM/ sangs rgyas mchod pa la/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta pU dza badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma kohaM/ rang gi dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin// mdun du bsams nas nam
275a4(rgyud 'bum): mkha' la/ / khyab pa'i sbyor bas gcig byas te// dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bsams bzlas// bcom ldan mi mnyam gzhug bcing bzhugs// rdo rje phyag rgya thugs kar bsnams//
275a5(rgyud 'bum): g.yas par 'khor lo rin po che// pad+ma ral gri g.yon pa'o// de nyid gsum gyi tshul gyis ni// ci tsam nus par bzlas pa bya// skyo na yid kyis drangs nas ni// de dag thams cad snying khar
275a6(rgyud 'bum): gzhug/ mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas 'dug na// lus kyis ci tsam bskyod pa dang // tshig tu rab tu 'phro ba'i rnams// de dag sngags dang phyag rgyar 'gyur// rtag tu sgom pa'i sbyor bas ni//
275a7(rgyud 'bum): de la sems dpa'i gzhan ma yin// rnal 'byor ngo bo gzugs can la// lha mo rnams kyang de la 'dzin// dbang po lam du gang gyur pa// de dang de yi ngo bo dag/ shin tu mnyam gzhag sbyor
275b1(rgyud 'bum): bas su/ / bdag nyid lhag pa'i ltar bya'o// dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las/ lha'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po sku/
275b2(rgyud 'bum): dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis tshig 'thun par sgra dbyangs gcig
275b3(rgyud 'bum): gis gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs kun gyi// ye shes gces pa dri med pa// byang chub sems ni rin po che// bla na med pa bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan
275b4(rgyud 'bum): 'das la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab par thugs su chud nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems ni lus kyi rnam pa yin la/
275b5(rgyud 'bum): lus kyang sems kyi rnam pa yin zhing / sems kyang tshig gis rab tu brjod pa yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs
275b6(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba thob nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ / kye ma kun tu bzang po 'di// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// chos rnams skye ba med pa ste// g.yo ba med rang gnas med pa// rtog
275b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dri ma spangs pa yin/ / bskyed par bya zhes rab tu gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa gsung spros pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa
276a1(rgyud 'bum): zhugs nas/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsung ngo // dngos po 'di dag ma skyes te// chos can med cing chos nyid med// nam mkha' bzhin du dmigs med pa'i// byang chub
276a2(rgyud 'bum): sems ni bstan pa yin/ / zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mi 'khrugs pas gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis
276a3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dmigs su med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsung ngo // dngos po 'di dag dngos med de// chos kyi mtshan
276a4(rgyud 'bum): nyid spangs pa yin/ / bdag med chos las legs byung ba'i// byang chub sems ni brtan pa yin// zhes bcom ldan 'das rin chen tog gis gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
276a5(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyis rdo rje me lce 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// dngos po skye ba med pa ste// dngos po ngo bo yod min
276a6(rgyud 'bum): pas sanam mkha'i go 'phang thob po zhes/ / dngos rnams rab tu brjod pa yin// zhes bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med kyis gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don
276a7(rgyud 'bum): yod grub kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla ma'i yang bla ma'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// chos rnams rang bzhin
276b1(rgyud 'bum): 'od gsal ba/ / gzod nas dag cing rnyog pa med// sems can med cing srog kyang med// sangs rgyas nyid dang byang chub med// rmi lam sgyu ma ltar snang ba'i// byang chub sems ni brtan pa yin//
276b2(rgyud 'bum): zhes bcom ldan 'das don yod grub kyis gsungs so// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung
276b3(rgyud 'bum): dang / thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi sems rnam par dag pa thob nas ngo mtshar skyes par gyur te tshad du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod de// kye ma'o sangs rgyas kye ma'o dag/ kye ma'o chos
276b4(rgyud 'bum): ni bstan pa rnams/ / bdag med chos las legs byung ba// byang chub sems khyod phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems kyi sgom pa yi// mi g.yo yi ge las byung zhing // rmi lam la sogs ma skyes pa//
276b5(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems khyod phyag 'tshal lo// gnas dang stan ni rnam bsams te// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas nas// dang por rang bzhin dag go zhes// dag pa'i chos kyi tshul la gnas// yid kyis hUM
276b6(rgyud 'bum): byas rdo rje can/ / rdo rje sems mas byin gyis brlab// rin chen lus mya nga rgyal bya// lag po stong de bskor ba ni// lcags kyu yis ni spyan yang drang // byin nas drang por phyogs bcing ste/ dam tshig
276b7(rgyud 'bum): mchog kyang dbul bar bya/ / gdan rnams so sor phul nas su// mchod yon 'dul ba'i sbyor ba bya// dbang bskur mtshon cha go cha sogs// sil snyan mchod sogs ngo bo bya// rnam pa kun gyis mnyes bya ba/
277a1(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor bdag nyid can gyi bdag/ rnal 'byor rnam gsum shes bya ste// byin gyis brlabs dang yongs brtags dang // gzugs nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dag/ rnal 'byor yin zhes
277a2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas gsungs/ / sngags kyis byin brlabs nga rgyal bskyed// rnal 'byor byin rlabs yin par gsungs// byang chub sems ni dag pa dang // gsang sngags sa bon skye ba che// phyag rgya tshogs su
277a3(rgyud 'bum): brtag pa yi/ / rim gyis gzugs kyi rdzogs bya ba// de ni brtags pas brjod pa ste// rnal 'byor cho ga yin par gsungs// bsdu dang spro bar bya ba las// rnam pa'i mchog kun ldan pa dang // skad
277a4(rgyud 'bum): cig ye shes kyis rdzogs pa/ / rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor zhes brjod do// dang por dam tshig byin brlabs par// rnal 'byor rig pa dag gis brtag/ rab tu rdzogs par bya ba dag/ 'di ni rnal
277a5(rgyud 'bum): 'byor cho gar bshad/ / nyon mongs dri mar bcas pa'i sems// byang chub sems kyis dag bya ste// de ni rang bzhin dag pa'o zhes// brjod cing thal mo gsum gyis sbyar// ngag gyur de nas blo yis ni//
277a6(rgyud 'bum): sems la so sor brtag par bya// sems la so sor brtags nas kyang // phyi rol rang bzhin stong par bya// sems tsam la ni gnas nas su// byang chub tshogs kyi bag chags des// bsgom par bya ba'i ngo bo dag
277a7(rgyud 'bum): zla ba'i gzugs su rnam par brtag/ dag pa'i pad+ma la gnas pa// oM gyi myu gus bskrun pa yi// yan lag kun gyi mtshan nyid gzugs// rdo rje sku ni bsgom par bya// AHzhes bya ba'i spros med gsung /
277b1(rgyud 'bum): sems ni hUM zhes bya bar sprul// yi ge gsum gyis byin brlabs lus// snying la gan+d+ha pa zla ba'i gzugs// de la rang gi yi ge ni// mdog gzugs 'od ni byed bsams te// nga rgyal bskyed nas de
277b2(rgyud 'bum): la ni/ / rdo rje'i bdag nyid bdag nyid brjod// rgyan kun yongs su rdzogs pa dang // 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa// cha shas kyis ni dra ba can// ye shes sems dpa' rdzogs par brtag/ de 'og
277b3(rgyud 'bum): lag pa'i phyag rgya yis/ / go cha mtshon cha la sogs bya// rdzogs sangs rgyas lnga dbang bskur te// cod pan 'phreng ba rnams kyis klubs// de nas de 'og sangs rgyas kyi// sprul pa mdzad pa'i
277b4(rgyud 'bum): sgyu ma 'phro/ / yan lag bzhi pa dpung ldan pa'i// phyogs bcur khro bo bcu dag dang // bsnyems ma dang ni tog ldan ma// mtshon cha ma dang rtsed mo can// sgyu ma'i cha byad rnam pa'o// rnam par
277b5(rgyud 'bum): 'phrul pa byin gyis brlab/ / kun la khyab par byed pa yi// sna tshogs dbus su gzhag nas ni// de nyid chen po bdag nyid lngas// phyogs bzhi 'khor la khyab bya ste// dga' bas dga' byed bzhi
277b6(rgyud 'bum): yang spro/ / ting 'dzin kun gyi dga' ba la// 'os par byed pa'i sngags pa yis// 'khor lo dang ni rdo rje'i gzugs// pad+ma'i gzugs la de dag ni// 'khor lo kun la pad+ma yi// ngo bo yis
277b7(rgyud 'bum): ni rol pa dang / / e zhes bya ba 'phro ba las// mdog ldan bdag nyid gzugs su bya// mdzes pa'i rgyan rnams kun ldan pa'i// nyid kyi gdan la bzhugs par lta// sgeg dang glu dang gar rnams dang /
278a1(rgyud 'bum): rgyal mtshan la sogs mtshon dgye dang // sil snyan mchod pa'i rnam pa ni// sna tshogs rnams kyis mchod pa bya// rnam pa kun dang ldan par ni// bdag nyid kyi ni lus bsgoms
278a2(rgyud 'bum): nas myur ches bya ba bul ba dang / / mi gsal gug kyang nyams pa dang // rtog pa ngan pa rnam par spangs// de nas gsang sngags bzlas brjod bya// bzlas pas skyon lag g.yas kyis// bsgrims
278a3(rgyud 'bum): nas rdo rje gsor nas su/ / g.yon pas dril bu la gsil zhing // rdo rje gru tshul sna tshogs dang // ba ngan tshul du byas pas mchod// bzlas pa yis ni mjug brtul nas// gshegs su gsol
278a4(rgyud 'bum): dang rang nyid 'grub/ / lus dang ngag dang sems bsgoms te// brtan por ci bder 'gro bar bya// bar chad du ni gyur nas kyang // yi ge brgya pas byin gyis brlab// de ltar bsgoms pas sgom byed
278a5(rgyud 'bum): pa/ rdo rje theg pas rab rdzogs pa'i// byang chub de ni myur thob nas// zla nyi dkyil 'khor lta bur snang // sna tshogs las kyi thob 'dren cing // rin chen rgyal mtshan rab dga' byed// rgyal byed
278a6(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma'i gdung brgyud can/ / gnas tshan 'jig rten dbang phyug 'gyur// dpal ldan rig sngags kun gyi gtso// dga' chen 'dod dgur lcags kyu 'gyur// sgyu ma bzhin du kun shes shing //
278a7(rgyud 'bum): dregs pa 'joms byed khro bor 'gyur// dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las/ byang chub kyi sems sgom pa'i ye shes sgrub pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / sbyin sreg de nyid
278b1(rgyud 'bum): la gnas pa'i/ / me ni lha yi zhal yin pas// sna tshogs las rnams grub byed pa'i// sbyin sreg las ni rab tu bshad// sbyin sreg las ni lha rnams tshim// tshim par gyur na dngos grub
278b2(rgyud 'bum): ster gsang sngags lhag chad gang yin pa/ / thams cad sbyin sreg dag gis bskongs// de phyir sku gsung chos mchog gis// sbyin sreg rab tu bsngags par mdzad// gtsub shing las
278b3(rgyud 'bum): ni byung ba'i me/ / dge ba yi ni las rnams byed// gdol pa'am dur khrod byung ba yi// me ni las rnams rab tu sgrub// thab khung zlum po gru bzhi dang // zla gam dang ni zur gsum dang / dkyil
278b4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gyi ni kha khyer la/ / rdo rje mtshan ma dag gis brgyan// sbyin sreg de nyid tshul rigs pas// thab khung rnams kyi dbus su ni// pad+ma'i steng gnas gtsug tor dang / rdo rje rin chen pad+ma gzhag
278b5(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar dmigs pas 'dug nas su/ / lag gnyis pus mo'i bar bzhag ste// dgang gzar mar gyis bkang nas ni// blugs gzar bkang ste de bzhin sreg/ sbyin sreg la dgos g.yas su gzhag
278b6(rgyud 'bum): g.yon du chu yi snod dgang ngo / / las kun byed pas bzlas nas su// bsang gtor dang ni 'thor 'thung bya// ku sha rtse mo rnon po yis// thab khung khor yug bskor bar bya// me ni 'bar bar shes pa dang /
278b7(rgyud 'bum): g.yas pa mi 'jigs thob spyod cing // gsang sngags 'dis ni cho ga bzhin// me yi lha ni spyan drang ngo // tshur spyon tshur spyon 'byung po yi// lha yi drang srong bram ze mchog/ sreg blugs zhal zas pazhes
279a1(rgyud 'bum): nas kyang / / 'di nyid du ni bzhugs su gsol// oM ag+na ye A di byA A bi she A bi she ma hA shri ye ha bya ka bya bA hA nA ya swA hA/ phyag g.yon rdo rje bsang gtor te// mchod yon
279a2(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa rnam lnga dbul/ / me yi phyogs nas bos pa yin// gsus po che la mig gsum pa// gdong bzhi pa la lag bzhir ldan// mdog dmar ral pa'i thor tsugs can// me yi dkyil 'khor la gnas
279a3(rgyud 'bum): shing las kyi 'od zer rnams kyis brgyan/ / lag pa dang po mchog sbyin la// gnyis pa na ni sngags nor 'phreng // g.yon pa ril ba spyi blugs te// gnyis pa na ni be con nyid// mdog dmar rgyan ni
279a4(rgyud 'bum): med pa la/ / drang srong rnams kyis yongs bskor ba// 'di lta'i gzugs ni bsams nas kyang // thab kyi dbus su bzhugs su gsol// de la sbyin sreg la dgos pa// kun la lan gsum sreg blugs
279a5(rgyud 'bum): dbul/ / de nas 'thor 'thung byas nas su// 'bar ba'i rnam par bsgyur bar bya// rim pa 'di yi tshul gyis ni// mkhas pas lha rnams tshim par bya// legs par tshim byas bzod gsol te// 'dod
279a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dngos grub gsol ba gdab/ / bum pa rgyal mtshan rdo rje gdugs// pad+ma'i lcags kyu'i rnam pa dang // me lce mdog dkar snang ba dang // 'khyil ba'i mtshan mas mkha' las brtag/ des ni myur du
279a7(rgyud 'bum): 'byung 'gyur ba/ / bsgom dang bzlas la 'bad par bya// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang la ni// oM zhes pa dang swA hA mthar// dbyangs kyi rgyud ni sring pa ni// bar chad med pa'i dbyangs kyis sbyar// zhi ba'i sems ni zhi
279b1(rgyud 'bum): ba la 'byor pas rgyas pa mngon par spel/ / dregs bde stabs tshul bcas pa dang // dbang du gyur pas dbang du bya'o// drag shul spyod tshul la gnas pa// hUM zhes pa dang phaT dang bcas// lus
279b2(rgyud 'bum): ni me lce 'bar ba dang / / 'jig rten gsum po bzar bsams nas// bskul ba'i tshig dang spel ba yi// gsang sngags yi ge nges par sbyor// sngags grub cho ga shes pa yis// sbyin sreg
279b3(rgyud 'bum): cho ga thams cad la/ / sna tshogs las dang ldan pa yi// yang dag yin par mchod par bya// sbyin sreg de nyid la bskul zhing // dang po dgong blugs sreg cing dbul// phyis ni rim bzhin rnam
279b4(rgyud 'bum): pabapar spel/ / zhi dang rgyas dang dbang rnams la// dge ba'i rdzas rnams sbyin sreg bya// bshang gci khrag rkang rus pa dang // sha chen dag kyang sbyin sreg bya// ci ste ye shes sems dpa'i zhal// mi gtsang
279b5(rgyud 'bum): ba yis bkang na go/ ji ltar sdig pa skye mi 'gyur// gal te sdig 'gyur 'bras bu gang // sems can mi shes pas rmongs pa// thabs dang shes rab rnam spangs shing // phyi rol dngos la mngon zhen pa// rnam
279b6(rgyud 'bum): rtog dra bas blugs byas gang / / de dag gis ni dge sdig gi/ phung po gnyis su rnam par brtags// chos 'di rang bzhin gyis dag ste// skye ba med cing gnas med kyang // sems can shes pa spel ba'i phyir//
279b7(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas rnams kyis thabs su bstan// dam pa'i don du dge spangs nas// bsod nams min pa ci zhig smos// dper na mi gang chu klung gi/ pha rol 'gro ba'i sems can dag/ rtswa dang shing la sogs
280a1(rgyud 'bum): bsdus nas/ / chu la rgal ba'i gzings byas te// de la 'jug ste legs brgal nas/ bor te bde bar 'gro ba ltar// de bzhin 'khor ba'i pha rol gyi// chos kyi lam gyi bskyed
280a2(rgyud 'bum): byas kyang / / chos dang chos min rnam spangs nas// byang chub bde ba thob pa ni// de phyir rnam rtog rnam spangs la// zab mo yi ni chos spel te// de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs rnams la// sngags
280a3(rgyud 'bum): rig rnam rtog ma byed cig/ rnam rtog rmongs pa chen po ste// 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor ltung byed pas// nam mkha' lta bur dri med pa'i// rnam par mi rtog ting 'dzin gnas// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam
280a4(rgyud 'bum): sbyar te/ / lus dang ngag dang sems bsdus nas// nga'o snyam pas gzi skyed lus// rnam pa kun gyis rnam brgyan na// rnal 'byor ldan pas tshe 'di la// ye shes rdzogs pa nyid du 'gyur// las las
280a5(rgyud 'bum): byung bar bstan pa yi/ / skyes pa bud med gzugs mngal// mnyes pa nyid du mi bya 'di// rdo rje lus can dam tshig yin// ngan rtog bzang rtog dra ba yi// sems kyis sems can rnams la ni// sna tshogs
280a6(rgyud 'bum): gdung bas sun mi 'byung / / rdo rje dang ldan dam tshig yin// sred pas bskyed rtsub phra ma yi// tshig dag rnam par mi smra zhing // mnyan na bde ba byed pa 'di// rdo rje ngag can dam tshig yin// rnam par snang mdzad chen
280a7(rgyud 'bum): 'khrug mchog/ sha yi khams la gnas pa yin// rkang la mi 'khrugs rgyas pa ste// khrag la rin chen 'byung ba gtso// sems can rnams kyi rus phung gi/ rus gong la ni 'od dpag med// rtsa yi tshogs rnams
280b1(rgyud 'bum): rnam 'brel la/ / thub pa skyes mchog don yod la// dam tshig shes pa rnams la ni// gsang chen pa yis bstan pa 'di// blo ldan rdo rje rnams kyis ni// rtag tu bsten cing bsgom par bya// 'dod chags de bzhin
280b2(rgyud 'bum): gti mug rmongs/ / sred dang 'du byed rnam sel ba'i// chos ni rnam pa lnga po 'di// thub pa skyes mchog rnams kyis gsungs// bshang gci khu chu mchil ma khrag/ 'dzag pa 'byung ba bzhis
280b3(rgyud 'bum): bsdus pa/ / sgom pa'i blo gros rtogs pa yis// dam tshig brtan par bya ba ste// rtag tu bza' zhing sbyin par bya// dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las/ sbyin sreg gi le'u sna bdun pa'o//
280b4(rgyud 'bum): / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// 'gro ba mi shes mun bsal phyir// ye shes nyi ma shar ba las// bkag pu mun pa bsal tshul gsungs// gshin rje gshed la sogs
280b5(rgyud 'bum): pa yi/ / mdog dang phyag mtshan la sogs pa// de kun mngon du rgyas pa ru// bye brag gis ni rgyas par bstan// de ni las kyi khyad par gyi// dbang du byas pa khro bo tshogs// gzhan du ma gsungs gang yin
280b6(rgyud 'bum): pas de dag 'di ru bshad par bya/ / bruM gyi ye shes las byung ba// gtsug tor gzi brjid phung po ste// zhal gsum ser po mdangs dang ldan// phyag drug nyi ma la sogs pa// 'dzin cing skyil mo
280b7(rgyud 'bum): krung bcas pa/ / ral pa'i gtsug tor gyis brgyan cing // 'jig rten khams kun 'khrug byed pa'i// gzugs kyi spros pas nam mkha'i gar// rig mas sku la rab 'khyud pas// chags phyir
281a1(rgyud 'bum): spro ba'i rtsol ba can/ / 'di 'dra sgom par byed pa la// bgegs kyis gnod pa yod dgos// skyon med rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// yang ni bruM gyi ye shes las//
281a2(rgyud 'bum): byung ba sngags kyi 'khor lo can// zhal gsum gsar 'dra mdangs po che// phyag drug 'khor lo la sogs pa// ral pa'i gtsug tor gyis brgyan pa// 'dzin cing stag gis smad g.yogs te/
281a3(rgyud 'bum): thod pa'i 'phreng bas sku la brgyan// rig ma dang ldan chags pa po// 'jo sgeg nyams kyi sbyor ba mdzad// 'di sgom spro bar byed pa la// nyin dang mtshan du rdo rje sems// 'khor bcas gnas su byon
281a4(rgyud 'bum): nas su/ / rtag tu srung ba nyid du byed// bka' bzhin byed pas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de bzhin bruM gyi ye shes las// byung ba'i khro bo gtsug tor rgyal// zhal gsum ser po mdangs
281a5(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan/ / phyag drug lcags kyu la sogs pa// 'dzin cing sbrul gyis yang dag brgyan// 'og tu bgegs kyi gtso mnan nas// gad mo'i sgras ni 'debs par byed// ral pa'i gtsug tor gyis
281a6(rgyud 'bum): brgyan pa/ / khro bo 'di 'dra sgom byed pa'i// rnal 'byor gang la sangs rgyas kyi// sprul pa'i bgegs kyang rlag byed na// gzhan ma rnams ni smos ci dgos// snying 'gugs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i
281a7(rgyud 'bum): ting nge 'dzin to/ / bruM las yang ni byung ba yi// gtsug tor dam tshig spyod pa can// zhal gsum gser zhun mdangs ldan pa// phyag drug ka pA la sogs pa// 'dzin cing sna tshogs rab tu 'bar//
281b1(rgyud 'bum): ral pa'i gtsug tor gyis brgyan pa// zhabs rnams bsgyur zhing rnam par 'phen// spro dang bsdu ba'i blo gros can// 'di 'dra gang zhig sgom pa la// bi na ya ka la sogs pa'i// bgegs
281b2(rgyud 'bum): kyis skabs ni mi rnyed phyir/ / ji bzhin rab tu bsgom par bya// gzhan gyis mi thub pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// bruM gyi yi ge las kyang byung // ming gi gtsug tor rnam par mthong // zhal
281b3(rgyud 'bum): gsum gser ni btsom 'dra/ / phyag drug tri shU la sogs pa// 'dzin cing srog song steng na gnas// rol pa'i stabs kyis bgegs mchu bcings// ral pa'i gtsug tor gyis brgyan pa// sangs rgyas
281b4(rgyud 'bum): sprin ni spro ba'o/ / gang zhig de 'dra sgom byed pa'i// rnal 'byor de yis go cha bgos// sra ba'i ngang tshul can yin pas// bgegs lus gang gis mi g.yo'o// bgegs las rgyal ba'i rdo rje
281b5(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ / bruM gyi ye shes mthu las byung // gtsug tor rnam par 'joms pa'i mchog/ zhal gsum gser 'dra'i nyi 'od mtshungs// phyag drug rdo rje la sogs pa// 'dzin cing
281b6(rgyud 'bum): tshems kyis sgros mnan te/ / chags ldan rig mas 'khyud pa'o// ral pa'i gtsug tor gyis brgyan pa// khrag can ljags kyang 'dril ba ste// bla med byang chub thob 'dod pa// 'di 'dra sgom par
281b7(rgyud 'bum): byed pa la/ / bskal pa brgyad bcu'i bar du yang // bgegs kyis gnod pa yong mi 'ong // bgegs kyi stong pa ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// yang ni bruM gyi ye shes las// yang dag
282a1(rgyud 'bum): byung ba'i skabs dkar po/ / zhal gsum gser zhun lta bur gnas// phyag drug gdugs la sogs 'dzin cing // skyabs med 'phongs pa'i skyabs mdzad cing // ma ning
282a2(rgyud 'bum): rnams dang za ma la/ / bu ni sbyin par byed pa po// ral pa'i gtsug tor gyis brgyan pa// rim ma dang ldan sku chen 'di// rnal 'byor gang gis sgom byed cing // bzlas pa rtse gcig tu byed na// bgegs
282a3(rgyud 'bum): kyi gnod pas de mi brji/ / rim chen gyi skabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rnal 'byor khyad par can gyis ni// 'di rnams byang chub thob pa'i phyir// 'khor lo gtso bor rab bsgoms na// 8
282a4(rgyud 'bum): gi bgegs kyis yong mi tshugs/ / byang chub snying po don gnyer bas// 'di 'dra'i 'khor lo can bsgoms na// bsgrims nas rnal 'byor bsgoms pa yis// ring po mi thogs 'dod pa 'thob//
282a5(rgyud 'bum): dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyis rgyud las/ byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan gtsug tor 'byung ba'i le'u ste brgyud pa'o// / de nas yang rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma thams cad 'dus
282a6(rgyud 'bum): nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// 'di yi dpal ni gang zhig lags// rdo rje dang ni snying po dang // de bzhin
282a7(rgyud 'bum): rgyan gyi don ni ci/ / kye he mchog de bstan du gsol// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug rdo rje 'dzin pas/ de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'di ni thun mong ma yin/
282b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i gsang ba'i rgyud du rab sbas pa// ji bzhin gnas pa'i de kho na// yang dag bstan gyis rtse gcig nyon// lus ngag yid gsum bde dam pas// lha mo las ni bskyed bya ste// byang chub chen
282b2(rgyud 'bum): po bde ba yis/ / tshul bzhin du ni sngags pas bya// bskul ba'i snying pos 'di smra ste// dzaHzhes skad cig skad cig tu// rang gi gnas na gnas pa yis// de nyid lha nyid bskyed par bya//
282b3(rgyud 'bum): bcu drug cha dang yang dag ldan// zla ba gsang ba'i thig le la// me tog dang ni 'dra ba nyid// rlung gis phul bas bskyed par bya// de bzhin bskyod pas bsgrub par bya// de bzhin du yang bskal bya/
282b4(rgyud 'bum): bas rgyud kyi 'phreng ni 'od gsal bzhin// steng dang mdun du rtsa gnyis las// bcu drug gnas su yang dag gnas// de las snying dbus rab zhugs te// rlung gi sbyor bas phul byas pas// steng
282b5(rgyud 'bum): dang mdog rab mdzes rdzogs sku/ / bdag gi dpal du shes par bya// de las byung ba'i dngos grub che// nor bu la gnas rtog bral ba// thig le yig med bsdus pa'i sku// lhan cig skyes par shes
282b6(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / de la de yi gzugs kyi sku// nam mkha'i khams kun gang ba yi// bral ba'i shes pas don byed pa// gzhan gyi dpal du shes par bya// de rnams rgyu las byung ba yi// ye shes shes rab
282b7(rgyud 'bum): shin tu gsang / / gsang ba rnam par 'grub pa yi// rdo rje snying po'i rgyan ces bya// lha mo las byung bde dang ldan// 'ja' tshon ltar gsal rgyud dag pa// snang ba'i sku de mi shigs pa// rdo rje nga yis yang
283a1(rgyud 'bum): ngag bsgrags/ / snang zhing srid pa'i chos rnams kun// bsdus phyir bsags pa'i sku dam pa// rtog bral rgyud du sim gnas pa// 'byung phyir snying po zhes su bsgrags/
283a2(rgyud 'bum): dag dang ma dag thams cad la// 'khor ba ji srid par snang ba// gnyis ka mdzes par byed pas na// rgyun du yang dag bsgrags pa yin// dpal dang rdo rje snying po dang // rgyan ces bya ba bzhi po ni// 'brel
283a3(rgyud 'bum): cing grub par byed pa'i phyir/ / rgyud ces bya bar bshad pa'o// chos kyi phung po brgyad khri dang // bzhi stong gi ni grangs snyed kyi// mtshan gyi don ni 'di don du// yang dag 'dus par ngas bshad do//
283a4(rgyud 'bum): gzhan du don ni ma bsgrags pa// bla ma la ni gus pa yi// slob ma la ni ma rtogs pa'i// rgyud gzhan dag tu sbas pa'o// don 'di yang dag ma shes na// ji snyed don ni bsam yas pa/ shes kyang de yi
283a5(rgyud 'bum): 'bras bu med/ / de 'dod mnyes byas yang dag blang // dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las/ ye shes gsum gyi mtshan 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // rtag par
283a6(rgyud 'bum): mi phyogs smra ba dang / / bla ma smod byed brtson pa la// dam tshig phyir ni yongs bsgral bya// de yi sha khrag klad pa rnams// drangs te tshogs kyi ston mo bya// de ltar ma byas sdug bsngal tshogs// gti mug
283a7(rgyud 'bum): can des thob par 'gyur/ / nad thams cad dang khros chen dang // 'jigs dang nye bar 'tshe ba yi// bskal pa grangs med bye ba ru// sdug bsngal chen po rab rnyed cing // 'i dod 'bod pas sbrul gyis brgyan//
283b1(rgyud 'bum): bstir med chen por rtag par 'gro// de bas las 'dis rgyas gdab bo// bdag nyid rdo rje mkha' 'gro yi// khro bo gzugs can nyid gyur nas// ut+pal mthing kha 'dra ba yi// zhal gsum pa la phyag
283b2(rgyud 'bum): drug pa/ / rdo rje tri shU la phur bu dang // thod pa gri gug 'khor lo 'dzin// mi sdug khros pa lce lnga pa// bsams nas de 'og nam mkha' la// bsgrub bya rgyas par dmigs nas su// rdo rje phur pa la
283b3(rgyud 'bum): sogs pa/ / sems can dkyil 'khor gnas pa la// sgrub pos de yi nyes pa bsgo// de nas phyag mtshan tri shU la dang // phur bu drag po mchog dag gis// mgo dang snying kha lte ba dang // rkang pa
283b4(rgyud 'bum): gnyis dang lag pa yi/ / gnas lnga rab tu phug bya ste// rtse lnga'i 'od zer lnga po yis// srin bu 'dza' lu ka bzhin du// khrag kun sngags kyis drangs nas su// thod par phab nas btung bar bya//
283b5(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin sha rnams yang bsdus nas// bza' ba ru ni rab tu brtag/ rus pa rnams kyang 'chos byas nas// shes pa rdo rje pad+mar sbyar// 'di ni don grub rab byed pas// zla ba phyed ni tshun chad kyis//
283b6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po yang // 'chi bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za// rdo rje gsang ba 'di lta bu// bsgrub bya legs par bsgrub byas nas// las ngan bdag gis de mi 'khor// sangs rgyas su ni skye ba
283b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / rnal 'byor de yang de yi mthus// khro bo mkha' 'gro zhes 'gyur te// khams gsum gsang dang gso ba dang // sems kyi rdo rje brtan byas nas// skad cig tsam du byed par 'gyur/
284a1(rgyud 'bum): gsal bar nus pa gdon mi za// dpal rdo rje snying po rgyun gyi rgyud las/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro khro bo'i sbyor bas dgra gsad pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// de nas
284a2(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ / 'dod chags thabs chen po yi rgyud// gang gis legs par shes na ni// tshe 'di dngos grub sbyin par bshad// gsang ba 'dus pa stong phrag gcig/ rdo rje 'phreng ba 'bum phrag
284a3(rgyud 'bum): gsum/ / dgongs pa lung ston stong phrag bzhi// lha mo bzhis lus brgya bdun cu// u dar tan tra nyis brgya brgyad// de yi nye bar bshad pa'i rgyud// dam tshig chen po lnga bcu lnga// rdo rje lnga 'dus
284a4(rgyud 'bum): stong phrag gcig/ kun las btus pa 'bum phrag gcig/ mnyam nyid rnam rgya mi nyis brgya bcu// zla gsang thig le stong bdun brgya// rdo rjes 'og brgya nyi shu// cod pan rdo rje bdur brgya lnga// khro ba/
284a5(rgyud 'bum): thig le 'bum phrag lnga// rdo rje rnam rgyal brgya dgu brgya// mnyam nyid gsang ba stong phrag lnga// rdo rje gsang rgyun stong phrag lnga// rdo rje gsang mdzod stong phrag bdun// nor bu gsang thig 'bum phrag gcis
284a6(rgyud 'bum): snang mdzad sgyu 'phrul stong dang brgya/ / rdo rjes dbargyan stong phrag gcig/ rdo rje thod panyis brgya brgya// de nyid brgya stong brgya stong bdun// dam tshig mngon can stong phrag 'bum// 'jam dpal
284a7(rgyud 'bum): bo'i 'bum phrag gcig/ gsang chen bsdus pa brgya lnga bcu// rin chen sdong po dgu brgya bdun// dus kyi thig le brgya brgyad cu// lha mo bstan chos lnga brgya bdun// 'di rnams dgos pa'i bye brag gis
284b1(rgyud 'bum): nga yis yang dag bstan par bya/ / 'di ni gnyis po 'khyud pa yi// rgyud kyi dbye ba bstan pa'o// de bzhin du ni lag bcangs dang // dgod dang blta bas shes par bya// de bzhin zhe sdang gti mug gi/
284b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyud rnams kun kyang shes par bya// mkha' 'gro ma yi rgyud kun yang // 'di yi rim pas shes par bya// phyi nang dbye ba shes pa yis// rgyud kyi dbye ba shes par bya// nang du bstan pa bla ma'i las// /
284b3(rgyud 'bum): yang dag blangs te bsgrub par bya// ji bzhin gnas pa la dgongs te// bde bar gshegs pas rgyud kun bstan// rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud// mkha' 'gro ma dang mkha' 'gro ba// rgyud rnams kun gyi
284b4(rgyud 'bum): phyi mo ste/ / gzhan du ma bsgrags don gang zhig/ 'di ru yang dag bstan pa ste// rnal 'byor gang zhig len pa 'am// sgom par byed dam 'chad pa 'am// klog par byed pa rnal 'byor che// de yang nga
284b5(rgyud 'bum): dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ / dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud thams cad kyi dbye ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// sna tshogs mdo dang
284b6(rgyud 'bum): rgyud rnams kyi/ / sdom pa yang dag shes 'gyur na// mkha' 'gro chen por 'gyur bar bshad// gang gis nyan thos rab 'byin pa// spong ba ltung ba'i bye brag bshad// bslab pa dang ni rdzas
284b7(rgyud 'bum): grags kyis/ / 'di ru shes kyang yongs rdzogs byed// tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa gsum// dge pa'i chos ni sdad pa dang // sdom pa nyi shu la sogs dang // sems can don byed pa'i tshul
285a1(rgyud 'bum): khrims/ / byang chub sems dpa' rab 'byin pa// lus ngag yid gsum rab byung ba'i// sdom pa des kyang mkha' 'gro yi// rgyud rnams yang dag sbyor bar byed// zla ba
285a2(rgyud 'bum): snyam dang gtsang sbra bsdam/ / grong dang gnag lhas thang la yang // ngag lus yid kyis sems can la// gnod pa dag ni yong mi byed// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sdom pa mchog/ bla na med pa'i
285a3(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems/ / 'gro ba'i don byed byang chub sems// bde gshegs thob phyir rab tu gzung // rdo rje mi bskyod rigs chen po// rdo rje dang ni dril bu dang // slob dpon yang ni bzung byas pas// de yi
285a4(rgyud 'bum): yon tan thob par byed/ / rin chen tog gi rigs mthon po// nyin mo mtshan mo lan gsum du// zang zing mi 'jigs chos dang dbang // byin pas de yi yon tan 'thob// pad+mo snang ba'i rigs dag
285a5(rgyud 'bum): laphyi dang nang dang gsang ba yi/ / dam tshig rab tu gzung ba yis// bla med byang chub thob par byed// rnga sgra las kyi rigs mang po// dam tshig dang ni sdom par ldan// bsnyen bkur mchod pa
285a6(rgyud 'bum): sems can don/ / byas pa de yis yon tan thob// srog mi gcod cing g.yem mi bya// ma byin mi blang brdzun mi smra// phra ma 'khyal pa'i tshig rtsub mos// smra bar mi bya ba rnab sems dang // gnod
285a7(rgyud 'bum): sems log par lta ba rnams/ / nam yang bya ba ma yin no// dkon mchog gsum ni yong mi spang // lha dang bla ma de bzhin no// nyes pa kun gyi rtsa ba'i phyir// chang yang rnam par spang bar bya//
285b1(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya bzhon pa mtshon cha sogs// mtshan ma 'am ni lha yi grib// 'gom dang bza' bar mi bya ba// de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa'i// sdom pa gang de gsungs pa rnams// 'di ru dang
285b2(rgyud 'bum): po'i las can la/ / de yis yang dag 'jug par byed// thun mong ma yin pas pham pa// bcu bzhir grags pa gang 'di ni// sngags pas don kun 'grub byed pas// spang zhing dor bar mi
285b3(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / slob dpon snying nas smod pa dang // bad gshegs bka' las 'da' byed dang // zhe sdang gis ni mched sun 'byin// byams sems med par sems can spangs// byang chub sems
285b4(rgyud 'bum): chen 'dor ba dang / / bdag gzhan grub pa'i mtha' smod byed// snod mi rung la gsang ba bstan// rgyal ba'i bdag nyid phung po smod// dag pa'i chos la som 'i byed// gsum ldan khro la byams
285b5(rgyud 'bum): ldan te/ / stong pa thal byung la rtog pa// dad ldan sems ni sun 'byin byed// dam tshig dang ldan gtso mi byed// shes ldan bud med smod par byed// sngags pas de dag yongs spangs na// nges
285b6(rgyud 'bum): par dngos grub thob par byed/ / de la sngags pa yong 'das na// nges par bdud dang phrad par 'gyur// nad dang sdug bsngal 'phel 'gyur te// bstir med spyi'u tshugs dmyal bar 'gro//
285b7(rgyud 'bum): sbom po ltung byed nyes dmigs kyang // de dang 'dra bar shes par bya// dam tshig mi ldan rig mar bsten// tshogs kyi 'khor lor rtsod par byed// gsang ba'i chos ni ston pa dang // dang ldan
286a1(rgyud 'bum): rnams la gzhan du ston/ / nyan thos nang du lhan rings gnas// snod mi rung la gsang ba bstan// kha na mtho sdom 'gyur te// sngags pa de yi dam smos zad // zad pas
286a2(rgyud 'bum): 'grub par yong mi 'gyur/ / de bas nyin lan gsum du// kha ton gyis ni bklag par bya// dkyil 'khor mthong dang zhugs pa dang // dbang bskur ba la sogs tshul gyi// rdo rje mkha' 'gro thob
286a3(rgyud 'bum): pa bzhin/ / byang chub sems dang nyan thos dang // byang dang gnyis ka rnal 'byor rgyud// dgongs gsungs rnams kyis de lta min// de lta bas nA sdom pa'i mchog/ nga yis yang dag bstan par bya/
286a4(rgyud 'bum): dri chen dri chur k+ta dang // shes dang byang chub sems rnams ni// bza' ba'i sbyor bas yang dag bza'// b+ho yi ye shes mes sbyangs phyir// phyi rol zas las khyad par 'gyur// de bzhin grang chen
286a5(rgyud 'bum): sha dang / / baM lang khyi sha sha chen rnams// ye shes lnga yi ngo bo'i phyir// dga'o ba'i sems kyis bza' bar bya// de bzhin sems can gsad par bya// ma byin par yang brang bar bya'o// bud med thams
286a6(rgyud 'bum): cad 'dod pa spyad/ / brdzun tshig dag kyang smra bar bya// de ltar byas pas sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpa' mnyes par 'gyur// sems can rnams kyang tshim zhing dga'// de bzhin rnal 'byor skyeng
286a7(rgyud 'bum): yis/ / sangs rgyas dang ni byang chub sems// rang 'dren nyan thos sku gzugs sogs// rang nyid dag pa gsum sbyor bas// phyag byas na ni mi rung 'gyur// kun tu rdo rje sems dpa' yi// lus ngag yin
286b1(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor las/ / rang nyid bsam gtan gsum sbyor bas// dbyer med blo yis mi bya'o// dkyil 'khor dag kyang mi bri'o// glegs bam dag kyang mi bklag go/ mchod rten las kyang yong mi bya// lag
286b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i phyag rgya rnams kyang spang / / nyin re zhing ni dus bzhi ru// bu mo legs par goms pa las// ga pur tsan dan khas blangs te// cho ga bzhin du lus 'khor mchod// rol mo'i thabs ni sna tshogs pa//
286b3(rgyud 'bum): nga yi rgyud las rab bstan pas// bcu drug thig le ngal so las// sngags kyi snying po brtag par bya// bla ma dam pa thugs rje ches// yang dag bstan pa la dmigs pas// phyin ci log khur yongs 'dod de//
286b4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje 'dzin pa nga 'drar 'gyur// dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las/ dam tshig dang sdom pa dbye ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas ro langs chen mo yi// sgrub pa yang da
286b5(rgyud 'bum): bshad par bya/ / sgrub pos legs par shes gyur na// dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba'o// nag po yi ni tshes brgyad dang // yang na bcu bzhi gang yang rung // shing gcig dur khrod ma mo 'am// yang na mi
286b6(rgyud 'bum): med grong bar du/ sngon du sgrub pa'i bdag nyid can// las kun 'grub par byed pa sgrub// mda' mkhan ma dang sme sha can// gdol pa mo dang gar mkhan sogs// mdun gyi so la lhag yod pa// byad dang
286b7(rgyud 'bum): mdangs ldan rma med ma/ / lo ni sum cu rtsa gnyis bsngags// yang na nyi shu rtsa lnga'o// yang na chu dang dang por skyes// sbyangs nas shi ba ma sbags pa// yang dag blangs te pha bong steng // gzhan yang
287a1(rgyud 'bum): bu mo sgra bzung ste/ / lha bzhad dang ni dbang po lag/ dkar po dang ni ri sgra dang // gru gnon chu yis bkru bar byas// de nas tsan dan dkar po yis// bu mo lus byugs rgyan
287a2(rgyud 'bum): dang gos/ / yang dag brgyan te mdun bzhag nas// dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa bri bya ste// rtsa sogs gsang sngags rab tu bzla// 'byung po'i gtor ma yang byin te// sha ni nag po mdangs dang ldan// myos
287a3(rgyud 'bum): byed bsregs pa ro yi khar/ / mtshan gcig thog thag sbyin sreg bya// de nas tho rangs dus su yang // khrag chen phyogs bzhir gtor nas ni// mar khu chen po ro la bku// de nas ro de langs 'gyur te// khro dang
287a4(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa'i ag tsar gyis/ / sa gsum mo yi sgras 'gengs byed// da cha sgrub po skrag mi bya// mA ma kI yi sbyor ba sogs// srung ba'i 'khor los bsrung bar bya// skrag na de ma thag tu gsod// de tshe srung
287a5(rgyud 'bum): bas bsrung byas nas/ / bdag nyid langs te de yi ror// yungs kar gyis ni brdeg par bya// de nas de ni babs gyur te// sgrub pa po yi mdun gnas nas// bka' nod 'di skad smra bar byad// sems
287a6(rgyud 'bum): can chen po khyod ci 'dod/ / bdag la yang dag bka' stsol cig/ ral gri mig sma na sa 'og gam// rkang mgyogs de bzhin bcud kyis len// mi snang 'gugs pa las gang dag/ bdag gis
287a7(rgyud 'bum): gcig cig sbyar bar bya/ / de nas sgrub po de yis kyang // gang 'dod smras nas cang te'u brdung // de nas ro langs kha de nas// du ba 'thul zhing me 'bar ba// de nas sbrul nag lta bu ru// ro yi kha nas
287b1(rgyud 'bum): 'byung bar byed/ / de de sgrub pas kha yis blang // byung ste gser gyi ral grir 'gyur// de thogs tshangs pa'i 'jig rten khams// steng du nges par 'gro bar byed// de bzhin kun tu 'gro bar byed// de bzhin
287b2(rgyud 'bum): rdzas kun gang la bstan/ / thams cad gser 'gyur rtsi lta bu// de bzhin thabs sgrub de byas nas// ro ni snga mkho bzhin 'gyur te// de yi sbyin sreg rab byas nas// dkyil 'khor yang dag tshim par bya//
287b3(rgyud 'bum): de bas 'di ni sgrub pa'i mchog/ don kun yang dag 'grub byed pa// las thams cad kyi gtso bo ste// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpas gsungs// dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las/ ro langs chen mo'i
287b4(rgyud 'bum): le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o/ / // da ni nga yi sgrub po yi// dngos grub slob dpon las byung phyir// rgyud rnams kun las gsungs pa yi// slob dpon bkur ba'i cho ga bshad//
287b5(rgyud 'bum): slob dpon med par gyur na ni// dngos grub thob par mi 'gyur bas// slob dpon grangs dang mtshan nyid ni// yid gcig bsdus la mnyan par gyis// dam sdom gyi ni snod gtsang la// slob dpon mtshan nyid
287b6(rgyud 'bum): yongs rdzogs par/ / byed cing dang po las 'jug par// byed pa rgyu yi slob dpon no// ri bong 'dzin pa skul byed cing // de yis sgrub po zhing dag cing // ye shes sgyu ma'i snod rung byed// rkyen gyi slob dpon
287b7(rgyud 'bum): chen po'o/ / lhan cig nyan par gang gyur pa// de las dga' ba yang dag thob// thos pas yang dag rab mthar phyin// lhan cig byed pa'i slob dpon no// mi 'gyur byams ldan shes rab can// sngags rgyud sbyor
288a1(rgyud 'bum): shes dkyil 'khor mkhas/ / de nyid bcu shes theg chen dga'// gsang ba zungs thub slob dpon yin// mig bzang ya so bcu drug pa// khu 'khrig rtog pa yang dag spangs//
288a2(rgyud 'bum): bla ma dga' ba dang mos can// shin tu rgyan gyis rab brgyan pa// dad ldan sbyor ba la goms pa// gzugs bzang 'dod chags kyis myos byed// shin tu 'dul ba khyad par can// bskul ba'i gnas
288a3(rgyud 'bum): su yang dag blangs/ / dge dang sgom pa la dga' ba// rtag tu bla ma la gus pa'i// slob mas bla ma 'di ltar blta// bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// de nyid rtag tu rdo rje 'chang // de bzhin gshegs pa rin
288a4(rgyud 'bum): chen 'byung / / de ni ye shes rgya mtsho che// yid bzhin nor bu rin chen sbyin// de yi yon tan thams cad gzung // skyon kun sems kyis kyang mi bsam// yon tan gzung na dngos grub thob// skyon gyis dngos grub
288a5(rgyud 'bum): nyams par byed/ / mchod rten bshig dang sdig 'dra'i phyir// de yi grib ma'ang mi 'gom ste// stan dang lham dang bzhon pa dang // 'gom par bya ba smos ci dgos// rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu ba'i// mchog kun da
288a6(rgyud 'bum): yis spangs par 'gyur/ / slob dpon smod par byed pa de// rmi lam du yang mthong mi bya// de ni bgegs dang log 'dren dang // rims dang spug dang gshin rjes 'dzin// 'chi bar rab tu 'gyur ba ste//
288a7(rgyud 'bum): ngan pa gtum po blun chen te// phyogs bzhi dag tu song gyur kyang // blo ldan rnams kyis mi bsrung bar// mdung la sogs pa'i mtshon cha yis// kha na ma tho byed pa bsad// mdo sogs bstan pa'i
288b1(rgyud 'bum): dmyal ba ru/ / slob dpon smod par byed pa de// gnas par 'gyur bar nga yis bstan// de bas bla ma'i zhabs drung du// bag ma bzhin du ngo tsha srung // glal dang dgod pa lud pa sogs//
288b2(rgyud 'bum): kha la lag pas bkab nas su// shin tu 'jam par smra bar bya// mgo thod bcing dang tshon byug pa// bla ma'i drung du mi bya'o// bro brdung ba dang brkam tshig dag/ thos pa'i yul nas mi bya'o//
288b3(rgyud 'bum): mdun 'gro ba dang rkang pa brkyang // yang dag nyid du mi bya'o// las ni gang dag byed pa 'am// mnyan par la sogs 'dod pa la// gzung phyir thal mo ma bshig par// gnas nas langs te mthong
288b4(rgyud 'bum): yul du/ / rgyab kyis phyogs par mi bya ste// mtshan mo dang ni chu rgal dang // gcong rong dag tu gnas gyur na// bka' lung gnyer du dgum pa'i phyir// mdun du 'gro ba nyes mi 'gyur// de bas thabs
288b5(rgyud 'bum): ni thams cad kyis/ / rdo rje 'dzin pa bla ma mchog/ rjes su 'thun pas mnyes par bya// de mnyes sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes// gang gis slob dpon yang dag smad// de yis rgyud kun sgrub pa'i
288b6(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ gnyid dang 'du 'dzi rnams spangs te// bskal pa stong du legs bsgrubs kyang // dmyal sogs sgrub par byed pa'o// de phyir kun gyis rab bsgrims te// bsam pa 'bras bu smin byed pa'i//
288b7(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas 'bras bu 'dod pa yis// sems can dang dang ldan pas mchod// dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyis rgyud las/ bla ma bkur ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / rdo rje pad+mo spyod
289a1(rgyud 'bum): pa las/ / yang dag ye shes skye 'gyur bas// sgyu ma'i mchog ni bud med de// de yi ming dang mtshan nyid bstan// ha sti nI dang shang khi nI// ka ma lA dang tsi tran// thams cad
289a2(rgyud 'bum): rigs ni bzhir 'gyur te/ / hasti rak+ta ro tsha ba// sbom mo 'dod chags yang dag che// pad yangs kha nas sha rul bro// dkar 'chang mtha' phra go sbom byed// shang khi rak+ta ro sgyur ba// rked pra
289a3(rgyud 'bum): sna lags cung zad khro/ / kha nas dud 'gro 'gros dal legs// dkar 'chang dpal gyi 'bras bu 'dra// ka ma'i rak+ta'i ro dmar zhing // shang khi rak+ti ro sgyur ba// phra sbom ran pa dmar mo ste// 'dod
289a4(rgyud 'bum): chags mig ni mi 'dzums blta/ / dkar 'chang a ri sha 'dra ba// tsi tra rak+Sha ro mngar zhing // thun run khro bag dang bcas pa// chags min lta byed ngo gnag pa// dkar 'chang g.yas g.yon
289a5(rgyud 'bum): dgye ba ste/ / 'di rnams yang dag phrad gyur na// sgrub pa po la tshe 'di ru// dngos grub yang dag ster ba ste// de bas 'di rnams 'bad pas btsal// yang dag rnyed nas gang rung du// ba lang
289a6(rgyud 'bum): bza' ni mnga' yi nang / / btung bas shel khams rnam par 'phel// de ni thabs kyis sten pa yis// yang dag tu ni rang bzhin brtag/ rang bzhin nam mkha' lta bu ste// dngos po thams
289a7(rgyud 'bum): cad zad pa ste/ / rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang // bral ba'i dga' ba yang dag zab// bsam med zad med phra mo ste// dam pa zhi ba rnam dag pa// 'chi med rdo rje bdud rtsi brjod// gang gi
289b1(rgyud 'bum): dbus su 'dab brgyad pa/ / snying po lnga yis yang dag brgyan// de dbus de gnas cha nas lnga// cha gnyis pa ni brgyad mthar dbyung // sum cu bcu pa lnga yi ni// cha gnyis lnga pa drug pa yi//
289b2(rgyud 'bum): thig le ru ni gzhug pa ste// skyes bu gang gis de la ni// mig gis 'od zer gyis blta ba// de la ji bzhin gnas pa yi// ye shes skye ba the tsom med// nam zhig 'gog pa'i sems gyur na//
289b3(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kun gyi mchog 'dzin pa// dpal ldan mkha' 'gro 'dra bar 'gyur// de ring phan chad bu khyod ni// dkyil 'khor yang dag 'dri ba dang // sgrub po rgyud pa yi// slob dpon chen po nyid
289b4(rgyud 'bum): du 'gyur/ / 'di ni sangs rgyas kun gyis kyang // dbang bskur bar ni rab bsngags te// thams cad sngags ni sgrub 'gyur te// las mchog khyad par can yang 'grub// bu mo 'di ni khyod dang 'thun//
289b5(rgyud 'bum): sems can khyod kyis 'dod pa gyis// yid du 'ong ba'i rig ma 'di// bde gshegs kun gyis khyod spyod gnas// stong pa la ni sems sbyor na// khyod ni yang dag dam par 'gyur// 'di ni bde
289b6(rgyud 'bum): gshegs bde mdzad pa/ / khyod nyid 'di las rab byung ngo // dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las/ dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i shes rab kyi mtshan nyid brtag pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// /
289b7(rgyud 'bum): / de nas yang ni bshad bya ba// dngos kun chog shes med na// sgrub po dngos grub 'byung mi 'gyur// de phyir 'dir ni brtul zhugs bstan// sbyor ba'i rtsol ba thams cad ni// de nyid
290a1(rgyud 'bum): rig pas spang bar bya/ / rdo rje sems dang des 'dug pa// spangs nas gzhan du mi bya'o// dag pa de nyid la gnas pas// sbyor ba rnams kyang mi bya ste// bdag med gnas pa'i
290a2(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba yis/ / ji srid bar du so sor brtag/ dngos med go 'phang la gnas dang // thabs bzang dag dang ldan pa yis// rgyud las gang ci 'byung ba rnams// ma brtags pas ni 'byung bar 'gyur//
290a3(rgyud 'bum): sgom pa'i sbyor ba'i stobs kyis ni// dngos grub mtshan nyid gang yang rung // de kun skad cig tsam la ni// rang nyid gnas par gyur pa yin// de bas dge slong dngos gnas dang // de bzhin rtog dga'
290a4(rgyud 'bum): rgan po dang / / rang gi bu dang rgyal po la// de nyid yang dag bshad mi bya// ji ltar mar me bum nang gnas// pha rol tu ni 'od mi gsal// bum pa de nyid chag par gyur// de 'og mar me gsal bar 'gyur//
290a5(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin rang lus bum pa nyid// de nyid mar ma nyid lta bu// bla ma'i kha yis lags bcag nas// sbyor ba'i de nyid ston pa yin// sbyor ba de nyid la gnas na// gang tshe brtan pa mi rtag la// gnas shing
290a6(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten pa spangs te/ / spyod pa thams cad byas na ni// de la de tshe sangs rgyas gzigs// kun tu the tsom gcod pa yi// rig pas byis pa bzhin du spyad// gang tshe chags med rnal 'byor pa// de tshe
290a7(rgyud 'bum): phun sum tshogs 'phel 'gyur/ / sdig pa ma lus ldan pa dang // gti mug sgrib pa rab gnas pa// smon pa'i rnal 'byor sbyor ba yis// zla drug gis ni don yod grub// rang nyid sangs rgyas kun mthong zhing //
290b1(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa kun gyis rab tu 'gengs// zad med gzhom du med pa dang // dang ba'i sku tshe 'byung bar 'gyur// bla na med pa'i byang chub mchog/ 'bad pa med par yang dag 'thob// 'dod pa kun gyi dga'
290b2(rgyud 'bum): mos rnams/ / 'bad bral bas ni 'grub par 'gyur// 'gro dang 'dug dang gnas pa na// mchog tu zab pa'i gnas la brtag/ 'od gsal ye shes lam mkhan pa// mtshan nyid rtog pa'i rnal
290b3(rgyud 'bum): 'byor pa'i/ / bsam gtan sbyor ba 'di yis ni// sems kyi rin chen brtan par 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub rab bzhugs pa// byin gyis brlab pa'ang mdzad par 'gyur// de ltar gyur
290b4(rgyud 'bum): pas zhugs nas kyang / / ji srid sems ni mi skyo bar// mnyam gzhag yid ni bzang po dang // de la 'bad pas bsgom par bya// de 'og la ni ci dga' ga'i// spyad pa yis ni gcig
290b5(rgyud 'bum): byas na/ / cung zad spyan phye ba yi mtshan// byang chub rgya chen thob par 'gyur// dgod dam smra 'am 'gug pa 'am// la la rab tu gar byed par// ji srid skyo bar mi 'gyur bar// sgom pa'i sems
290b6(rgyud 'bum): la zhen par bya/ / de lta'i dam tshig ldan gyur cing // rnam par mi rtog sngags pa yis// dus kyi nges pas yongs spangs nas// bla med byang chub thob par 'gyur// dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi
290b7(rgyud 'bum): rgyud las/ shes byed kun tu spyod pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// // de nas mkha' 'gro de dag thams cad gcig tu 'dus te/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la
291a1(rgyud 'bum): tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin las// 'byung ba'i lha ste khyod mchog pas// sems dpa' kun gyi phyag rgya che// mkha' 'gro chen
291a2(rgyud 'bum): po phyag 'tshal lo/ / gti mug thams cad 'od gsal ba// mkha' 'gro sangs rgyas chen po ste// gzugs snang chos ni rnam dag pa// bde gshegs mkha' 'gro khyod phyag 'tshal//
291a3(rgyud 'bum): nga rgyal thams cad 'od gsal ba// mkha' 'gro ra 'dod skong ba ste// sim sogs chos ni rnam dag pa// rin chen mkha' 'gro khyod phyag 'tshal// 'dod chags thams cad 'od gsal ba//
291a4(rgyud 'bum): skyon gyis gos med mkha' 'gro che// mtshan mar 'dzin pa rnam dag pa// pad+mo mkha' 'gro khyod phyag 'tshal// phrag dog chos ni 'od gsal ba// mkha' 'gro sna tshogs las byed pa// mngon
291a5(rgyud 'bum): par 'du byed chos kun dag/ sna tshogs mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal bstod// mtshan mchog 'di yis khyod bstod pas// gang zag 'di yang bsod nams tshogs// ye shes tshogs chen yongs
291a6(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs nas/ / sangs rgyas 'gyur bar the tsom med// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos kun tu bzang po'i bde ba chen po nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du khyab pa'i bdag nyid chen
291a7(rgyud 'bum): pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po mi shigs pa'i zla ba skul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ / rang gi thugs ka'i mi shigs pa'i thig le las shin tu
291b1(rgyud 'bum): dgyes pa chen po zhes bya ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs phyung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i snying po zla ba'i thig le'i dbus su rgyas par byas te/ nam mkha'i dbyings thams
291b2(rgyud 'bum): cad du'ang snang bar byas nas steng 'og tu'ang bzhugs te/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i ri dang / sems can thams cad la gsal bar byas nas shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde bas mnyes
291b3(rgyud 'bum): par byas te slar log nas/ bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba'i bdag po'i snying po'i mchog gi zla ba'i thig le'i dbus na bde bar bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
291b4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'od zer gyi tshogs kyi phres pa mchog tu bde bar gyur pa'i snying po des bskul ba na gar mdzad cing rang rang gi ting nge 'dzin du dmigs nas/ bcom ldan
291b5(rgyud 'bum): 'das dpal kun tu bzang po'i thugs ka'i zla ba'i thig le'i dbus su gsang ba'i dgyes pa chen po'i bde bar gcig tu bsdus par gyur te/ rang rang gi sku bud med kyi tshul du bskyed nas bcom
291b6(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas mngon par byung bar gyur to/ / de nas mkha' 'gro'i tshogs de dag thams cad rab tu dga' nas ca co'i sgra yang dag par 'byin cing dpyad chen po brjod par gyur to//
291b7(rgyud 'bum): kye ma'o rdo rje sems dpa' yi// rdo rje shin tu dgyes chen po// kye ma'o sna tshogs thabs ni bde byed che// sna tshogs ye shes bde ba che// kye ma'o kun tu bzang po yi// dge ba'i ye shes bde byed che//
292a1(rgyud 'bum): gang bde'i phyir ni rig ma yi// pad+mo la ni gnas par mdzod// kye ma'o reg pa shin tu zab// shes rab pha rol phyin ma 'di// sems can kun la shes rab kyis// mun pa
292a2(rgyud 'bum): thibs po sel bar mdzad/ / kye ma 'o thams cad ngo mtshar che// mkha' 'gro dra bar gar mdzad cing // rnam par snang mdzad myang ba dang // mnye ba dang ni 'phrog pa mchog/ kye ma'o shin tu rab tu
292a3(rgyud 'bum): dgyes/ / skal ldan skal spyod pa dang ni// sna tshogs skal bas bde byed che// sna tshogs rdo rje shin tu mdzes// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'chang chen pos ting
292a4(rgyud 'bum): nge 'dzin las bzhengs te 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par bltas te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / A li dang ni kA li dang // de byung zla ba rnam pa gnyis// me long lta bu'i ye shes te/
292a5(rgyud 'bum): gcig tu gyur pa mnyam nyid do// sa bon mtshan mar gyur pa ni// so sor rtog par ngas pa shad do// de byung sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// 'gro don byed pa bya/
292a6(rgyud 'bum): na tan// gzugs brnyan rdzogs pa chos dbyings te// lha yi dbang po sang+yas bskyod// de la bar mas khu bas bskyed// bskur bas rang gi lhar bskyed nas// byin gyis brlab par bya ba ni// rgyud
292a7(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi ni thun mong ngo / / gsang dang gsang chen shin tu gsang // rnal 'byor rnal 'byor chen po dang // rjes su rnal 'byor zhes bya dang // stong pa dang ni shin tu stong // chen po stong pa zhes bya dang // dga'
292b1(rgyud 'bum): dang dga' ba bar ma dang / / dga' bral gyi ni dga' ba rnams// rgyud rnams kun gyi spyi bo'o// phyir bzlog gnyis kyi cho ga dang // gsang dang shes rab ye shes dang // kha sbyor 'byed pa'i cho ga dang /
292b2(rgyud 'bum): gtor ma rdo rje'i bzlas pa dang // drag shul sgrub pa'i cho ga dang // rab tu gnas dang dkyil 'khor sgrub// gsang ba'i de nyid bcu yin no// dkyil 'khor ting 'dzin phyag rgya dang // stang stabs 'dug
292b3(rgyud 'bum): stangs bzlas brjod dang / / sbyin sreg mchod pa las sbyar dang // slar sdud pa yi rnam pa ni// phyi yi de nyid bcu yin no// yang dag de nyid dngos po mi shes par// gsang sngags smra ba pa yin zhes brjod/
292b4(rgyud 'bum): pa de dag mngon pa'i nga rgyal gsang sngags cho ga 'chad// de ni dam nyams 'di dang pha rol brlag/ nyams pas bdud kyis bzung nas shi nas dmyal bar 'gro// sems can rnams la rab brten te//
292b5(rgyud 'bum): byang chub dam pa thob 'gyur ba// sems can slu bar mi bya ste// bde gshegs las la sems can sbyar// gang zhig sbyor 'di mi brtson pas// rkang lag mig sogs sbyin pa dang // dka' thub ci 'dra/
292b6(rgyud 'bum): spyad byas kyang // bdud rtsi ro thob mi nus so// rnal 'byor gcig cig shes byas nas// dben par song sde rab 'bad na// sdig dag tshe 'dir sangs rgyas 'grub// chos bdag med par rab bsgoms nas/
292b7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad mkhyen pa khong du chud// thabs shes gnyis kyi 'jo sgeg gis// gsang ba lnga yis bdag nyid mchod// dngos po thams cad dngos med par// bzhi bcu'i don ni rtogs pa dang // rdo rje
293a1(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma dbang bskur ba/ / bdud rtsi yis ni dga' bar byed// gsang bar bya ba'i chos gsang bas// gsang zhing sbas te spyad par bya// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la ni// rnal 'byor sems
293a2(rgyud 'bum): pas spyad bya zhing / / de bzhin bza' dang btung byas nas// sems can thams cad dbang du byed// 'di la khrus dang gtsang sbra med// de mchod phyir thob pa yang med// dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg med de dus dang
293a3(rgyud 'bum): gza' tshes med/ / gtor ma la sogs bya bar bya ba med de mchog gi mchog dang ba// rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub pa yang dag 'di nyid yin te brtson par bya// de nas mkha' 'gro de dag thams cad rab tu dga'
293a4(rgyud 'bum): nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la legs so zhes gsol te/ legs so legs so bde byed che// legs so legs so ye shes che// legs so legs so bde ba che// legs so legs
293a5(rgyud 'bum): so sna tshogs cha/ / legs so legs so dgyes pa che// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos thugs rje chen po'i thugs rang gi thugs yang dag pa la dmigs nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so//
293a6(rgyud 'bum): dpal rdo rje snying po rgyun gyi rgyud rnal 'byor chen po'i de kho na nyid nges pa zhes bya ba dpal yo rgyan gyi gsang ba'i dgon pa nas byung ba rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la gup+ta da
293a7(rgyud 'bum): bong gyi lo tsab chen po mnga' bdag lha ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing nus te gtan la babag/ @/ stong phrag gi tshang du'i ma'i dkyil 'tsha
293b1(rgyud 'bum): chen po byin gyis brlabs nas/ de'i dbus su gnas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'dus par gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rje bo
293b2(rgyud 'bum): la gsol ba btab bo/ / rdo rje chos phyir khyod legs so// rdo rje'i spyan phyir khyod legs so// rdo rje ye shes phyir khyod legs// sangs rgyas ye shes phyir khyod legs// gong bzhin du sbyar ro// de nas bcom
293b3(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas kun la phan par mdzad// sems can mgon
293b4(rgyud 'bum): la gsol ba ni/ / khyab bdag theg pa chen po'i tshul// theg pa'i mchog ni bstan du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad la 'di skad ces bka'
293b5(rgyud 'bum): sprul to/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad de skad ma zer cig/ spro ba mchog gi de kho na nyid kyi tshul nges par bsten par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rab tu gsungs so//
293b6(rgyud 'bum): ci'i rgyus rdo rje 'dzin rab tu gsung / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad kyis dgongs/ de nyid kyi tshe 'khor chen po'i dkyil 'khor du byams pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems
293b7(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po rnams theg pa chen po mchog gi don gyi tshul chen po 'di thos nas/ rnam pa stong du rnam par bsnyil bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol pa/ khyod kyis zhi bar byin
294a1(rgyud 'bum): brlabs pas/ / sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam pa can// khyab bdag de nyid rdo rje can// byin rlabs mnyam par kun tu spyod// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes spyan
294a2(rgyud 'bum): gdangs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la legs so byin nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'khor lo chen po'i 'od zer gyis bkang nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
294a3(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi thugs yang dag par skul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ / snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po bzhi rab tu byung bar gyur te/
294a4(rgyud 'bum): shar gyi phyogs su mi zad pa'i gzugs 'dzin ma zhes bya ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po rab tu shin tu byung bar gyur to// lho phyogs su rin po che yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rdo rje zhes bya/
294a5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po rab tu shin tu byung bar gyur to// nub phyogs su 'chi med rdo rje zhes bya ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po rab tu shin tu byung bar gyur to// byang phyogs su don
294a6(rgyud 'bum): yod pa'i dam tshig gi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po rab tu shin tu 'byung bar gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byung
294a7(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po ston to/ / rdo rje'i spyod pa mngon par brtson pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin
294b1(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid kyi phyogs bcu rnams su de bzhin no/ / de bzhin du yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / de bzhin du yon tan dang ldan
294b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang thabs cig tu phyogs bcur bzhugs so/ / 'di lta ste/ yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams mkha' snang gi 'od zer gyis
294b3(rgyud 'bum): g.yogs par gyur to/ / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi 'od zer gyis lhan cig pa dang 'thun pa tsam du'ang mi bzod pa'i 'od zer du byas pa de lta kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa thams
294b4(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi 'od rdo rje sems dpa'i 'od kyis mog mog por gyur nas kun tu gnas so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad phyag na rdo rje la byang chub sems dpa' dang de bzhin
294b5(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa'i sprin rnams kyis yang dag par mchod de/ kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba bskyed de cang mi gsung ba'i rnam par gnas par gyur to// de nas kun tu bzang po rdo rje 'chang chen
294b6(rgyud 'bum): po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rang gi thugs la bzhag nas ye shes kyi rigs de bskyed pa gsang chen dang bcas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba gsal bar byed
294b7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rgyu rang gi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ ye shes kyi rigs rang gi ting nge 'dzin ston to// logs bzhi pa la bur bzhi pa// rin chen bzhi dang yang dag ldan// 'o ma zho ni kun bkra
295a1(rgyud 'bum): par 'byas nas bsam gtan yang dag brtsam/ / de yi dbus su pad+ma che// shel dang zla ba mnyam pa'i 'od// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor yang dag ldan// dkyil
295a2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor rgyun du bsgom par bya/ / 'bar ba'i dus pa de rnams su// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam par sgom// kun nas yongs su zlum po ni// khru ni nyi shu bsam par bya// cho ga shes pas de
295a3(rgyud 'bum): dbus su/ / rang gzugs dge ba bsgom par bya// bdag dang bdag gir rnam rtog pa// dor ba'i bsam gtan yang dag brtsam// ye shes rigs kyi cho ga yis// gsang sngags sems la
295a4(rgyud 'bum): rjes dran bya/ / oM sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na ku la swa b+hA ba At+ma kohaM/ 'dis phyag rgya mnyam par 'dus pas/ sdig pa thams cad yongs su dor bar bya'o// 'od zer stong phrag bcu pa ni//
295a5(rgyud 'bum): dang por bsams nas dri ma dbyung // ye shes rigs kyi cho ga yis// rig pa'i rgyal po rnam par sgom// 'od dkar phra mo 'bar ba ni// deng ni kun tu rnam par dgod// thams cad de nyid
295a6(rgyud 'bum): du bya ste/ / bsgom par bya/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba 'di gsungs so// rang lus shin tu bstan byas nas// 'od kyi tshul gyi cho ga
295a7(rgyud 'bum): rnams/ / sangs rgyas gzugs ni 'dus pas ni// mtshon pas rdor sems bskyed pas so// cho ga shes pas rab brtsams na// de yi dngos grub rnyed mi dka'// rang gi gzug ni mi g.yo bar/
295b1(rgyud 'bum): byas nas rdor sems cho ga rnams// ji srid nam mkha' 'gongs gyur pa// cho ga shes pas spro bar bya// sangs rgyas gzugs dang rang gzugs shing // brus nas kun sbyor ma tshan nyid kyi/
295b2(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor bsam gtan dus su ni// rdzogs bya de la rab tu gzhug/ rang gi gzugs dang sangs rgyas gzugs// ji ltar gnas ltar blo dang ldan// ji ltar rigs par sbyor ba ni//
295b3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems dpar bsgom par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi rje// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gsungs so// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od// rang lus bsgom bya rnal 'byor
295b4(rgyud 'bum): pa de nyid rdo rje'i tshul gyis ni/ / rdo rje dbyer med de sgom mo// 'od lnga shin tu phyung nas ni// byang chub sems ni rnam par sgom// snying khar/ sangs rgyas kun ni mchod par bya// de bzhin
295b5(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa kun gyi rje/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gsungs so// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od// dkyil 'khor lnga ni bsam par bya// sangs rgyas gzugs ni 'dus pas
295b6(rgyud 'bum): nibakang ste sngags ni bsgoms pa las/ / sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan ltar byas nas// sgom pa'i bdag nyid can bsgom bya// rang gi gzugs ni der bsam bya// rtog pa bskyed pa'i cho ga
295b7(rgyud 'bum): las/ / thugs la byang chub sems kyang ni// bsgom bya de la rnal 'byor skyes// rdo rje sems dpas rnam par brgyan// cho ga shes pas dbyung bar bya// der yang rdo rje sems dpa' la/
296a1(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam bsgom bya// cho ga shes pas sangs rgyas gzugs// yi ge phra mo rnam par bsgom// yi ge rnams su'ang thams cad du// sangs rgyas gzugs
296a2(rgyud 'bum): ni rnam bsgom bya/ / de rnams dang ni yi ge gnyis// rang gzugs rnam par mnyam bsgoms la// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni// mkhas pas rang gzugs bsgom par bya// ji srid nam
296a3(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gongs gyur pa/ / zhing 'di khyab par g.yogs par bya// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni// rdo rje'i rnal 'byor rnam bsgom bya// sbyor rnams su/ sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam bsgom
296a4(rgyud 'bum): bya nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni/ / 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir spro bar bya// ji srid nam mkha' 'gongs gyur pa'i// zhing 'di khyab par g.yog par bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis
296a5(rgyud 'bum): ni/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom pa las// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam bsgom pa// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam bsgoms pas// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam
296a6(rgyud 'bum): bsgom pa/ / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam bsgom pa// chos kyi rgyal/ pad+mar rnal 'byor cho ga yis// bsgom pa thams cad brtag par bya// bsgom pa la sogs
296a7(rgyud 'bum): yongs 'dzin las/ / gzhan du mchod bya min pa nyid// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam bsgoms nas// shin tu brtan par brtan pa'i sems// byang chub sems ni yang dag bskyed// rgyun du bdag nyid
296b1(rgyud 'bum): rnam bsgom pa/ / 'di ni rdo rje'i tshul 'i bya// rnon po ba'i drung mnyam pa'i 'od// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam bsgoms pasu// nog shes pas dgang bar bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang
296b2(rgyud 'bum): pos gsungs so/ / de nas kun tu bzang po rdo rje 'chang chen po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi thugs las phyung ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams nam
296b3(rgyud 'bum): mkha'i khams thams cad bkang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mchod pa'i sprin rnams kyis yang dag par mchod de/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po la 'dud pa dang ldan par kun tu
296b4(rgyud 'bum): gnas par gyur to/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'dus par gyur nas/ kun tu bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chen po la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa'i
296b5(rgyud 'bum): sprin chen po rnams kyis yang dag par mchod de phyag 'tshal nas/ byang chub kyi sems rdo rje la rab tu zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer kun tu gang ste/ 'od zer de
296b6(rgyud 'bum): rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yang dag par bskul bar gyur to/ / de nas kun tu bzang po rdo rje 'chang chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad brtan par mdzad nas
296b7(rgyud 'bum): ye shes kyi rigs 'di rgyas par byed pa'i rgyud rang gi gzugs rnam par snang mdzod kyi gzugs su byin gyis brlabs nas/ rang gi gzugs kyi rnam pa'i 'od zer rnams kyis phyung ste/ de bzhin gshegs
297a1(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi snying po ye shes rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u gsum gsungs so/ / de nyid thams cad byed bzhin pa'i// bsam gtan kun sbyor mtshan nyid
297a2(rgyud 'bum): kyis cho ga shes pas rab tu brtsam/ / 'di ni de nyid tshul dag pa'o// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mchog gyur pas// khrug ni stong phrag bsam par bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas
297a3(rgyud 'bum): par wa yig de la bsgom par bya/ / kun nas yongs su zlum por ni// mthe'u chung ma tsam bsam par bya// 'bar ba de la cho ga shes// sna tshogs kha dog rnam par sgom// de ni 'bar ba yang
297a4(rgyud 'bum): dag skyes/ / sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnams bsgom bya// phyogs rnams kun tu oM yig ni// kha dog sna tshogs rnam bsam bya// rnam snang la sogs rnams bsgoms pas// cho ga shes pas
297a5(rgyud 'bum): bskyed par bya/ / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom pa'o// bdag nyid de la bsam pa ni// dga' ba skyed pa'i cho ga las// snying gi dbus son phra mo ni// dri med zla

297b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyas gzugs su rnam par sgom/ / 'jig rten khams rnams rim par 'das// slar yang de la rab gzhug bya// khru yi tshad las 'das pa yi// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor sgom pa ni// rdo rje sem

297b4(rgyud 'bum): tonyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ / rang gi gzugs ni bsgom bya dge/ zur du rnam snang gzhag bya ste// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam bsgom bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems

297b6(rgyud 'bum): 'das rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs so/ / rang gi gzugs la bgegs 'joms par// sems la brtan par bsgom par bya// hUM yig dbugs nas phyung nas ni// 'od zer rnam par rab
297b7(rgyud 'bum): tu gzhug/ ces bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs so// rang gzugs la sogs mtshungs pa'i 'od// lha ru skad cig de 'gyur ro// yi ge rnams kyi tshad
298a1(rgyud 'bum): kyis ni/ / wa yig gzugs ni rnam bsgom bya// sngags pas dbus su yi ge nyid// byin nus las ni kun tu brtsam// sngags pas dpral ba'i steng nas ni/
298a2(rgyud 'bum): ji srid lte ba zhes par dran// gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po las/ rnam par dgod pa'i le'u dang po rdzogs so// / shing rtir
298a3(rgyud 'bum): lo'i tshad du ni/ / pad+ma chen po rnam bsgom bya// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// pad+ma'i chu ba de rnams sgom// las kyi rdo rje yang dag bskyed// rang gzugs de la bsgom par bya//

298a7(rgyud 'bum): gzugs dang thams cad du/ / lha la sogs pa rnam sgom byed// khru gang tsam las 'das par ni// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor sgom pa ni// bgegs rnams 'joms pa ltar byas nas// 'jig rten
298b1(rgyud 'bum): / khams su 'di spro bya// rang gi phyag rgya snying kha ru// bsams nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus// sangs rgyas rnam par cho ga shes// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// de dbus yi ge
298b2(rgyud 'bum): byin nas ni/ / 'jig rten khams su 'dri spro bya// gdul ba la sogs can byas nas// slar yang de nyid la sbyar bya// khru gang tsam las 'das par ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya//
298b3(rgyud 'bum): / rdo rje ral gri yang dag bskyed// 'jig rten khams ni yongs bgrod bya// pad+ma dkar po'i 'od 'bar deng // byang chub sems kyis rnam par brgyan// dbus su rang gi lha yi gzugs// gzhog
298b4(rgyud 'bum): su btsun mo dgod par bya/ / cho ga shes pas de ltar gzung // rang gi rdo rje de la gzhug/ 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du// sangs rgyas nyid kyis mchod par bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das
298b5(rgyud 'bum): kun tu bzang pos gsungs so/ / ji srid yang dag thob sbyor skyes// sngags pas slar ni bsdu bar bya// mtho gang tsam las 'das par ni// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par ni// rang gzugs
298b6(rgyud 'bum): shin tu brtan byas nas/ / lha la sogs pa rnam par sgom// snying khar sngags kyi yig byin nas// sangs rgyas kun ni mchod par bya// mtho bdun tsam las 'das par ni// dkyil 'khor bzhi
298b7(rgyud 'bum): ni sgom par byed/ / lha yi gzugs kyi dbus gnas par// snying khar de la bsgom par bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dam tshig gis ni gsungs so// rang gzugs spyan zhes bya bar ni// byas
299a1(rgyud 'bum): nas sangs rgyas rnam par sgom/ / thugs ka nyid dang thams cad du// mkhas pas rang gzugs bsgom par bya// de ru snying po'i tshul gyis ni// sems dpa'i rnal 'byor

299a4(rgyud 'bum): par ni/ / byang chub sems ni rnam par sgom// lha ni yang dag bskyed nas ni// sngags kyi yi ge rnam par sgom// mtho gang tsam las 'das par ni// pad+ma'i tshul du rnam par sgom// rang lus drim
299a5(rgyud 'bum): med byas nas/ / gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor sgom pa'o// de dbus legs par brtan byas nas// rang gzugs deng nas dang por sgom// 'od dkar 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba sogs// pad+ma lnga po rnam
299a6(rgyud 'bum): bsgom bya/ / de yi dbus su rang gzugs dang // gzhogs su btsun mo dgod par bya// rang gi khu ba deng sogs 'byung // cho ga shes pas spro bar bya// sangs rgyas gzugs kyis nam mkha'i khams//
299a7(rgyud 'bum): kun tu gang bar sgom pa ni// rang gzugs ral gri ltar byas nas// kun gyi snying khar dgod par bya// rang gzugs sangs rgyas yang dag sbyor// mtshan nyid la sogs chog rim gyis// byang chub
299b1(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' nam mkha'i khams/ / yang dag gang bar rnam bsgom bya// rang gzugs zhags pa yang dag sbyor// khyab bdag sangs rgyas gzugs dgod bya// ji srid nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor du//
