299b3(rgyud 'bum): yang dag bskyed/ / 'od zer 'bar bas rnam par brgyan// rang gzugs sangs rgyas mtshungs par ni// cho ga shes pas dbyung bar bya// rang gzugs de la gzugs gnas par// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba
299b4(rgyud 'bum): mnyam pa'i 'od/ / spyan zhes bya ba yid dga' ba// cho ga shes pas dbyung bar bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// spyan ni snying khar rnam par dgod// cho ga shes pas 'od rnam par// rdo rje
299b5(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' rab gzhug bya/ / zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rang gzugs myur ba'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bskyed// lha yi rnam par yang dag sbyor// bsgom
299b6(rgyud 'bum): bya rtsom pa gzhan min no/ / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// rdo rje sems dpar yang dag bskyed// lcags kyu'i rnam pa zhags pa sogs// byas nas slob ma rab gzhug bya// rdo rje sems dpa' yang
299b7(rgyud 'bum): dag bskyed/ / rang gzugs snying khar rnam dgod bya// dgod pas byas nas lag sogs kyis// de nas grangs ni yang dag brtsam// bzlas pa sogs sam btung bya ba// tho ldan des ni de bya'o// sgrub
300a1(rgyud 'bum): po rnams kyis rnam bzlas bya/ / gzhan du yang dag grub min nyid// bcom ldan lade bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gis de skad ces gsungs
300a2(rgyud 'bum): rang gi gzugs ni yang dag bskyed/ / dbus su rang gi rigs sgom mo// mthar yang dgra dang bgegs 'joms par// snying po de ru sgom par bya// 'di rnams kyi ni cho ga yis// sgom pa la sa
300a3(rgyud 'bum): ga'i rim/ / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni// rig pa'i rgyal po rnam bsgom bya// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'khrugs 'bar ba'i// khro bo'i gzugs su bsgom par bya// kha dog gang de kho nar
300a4(rgyud 'bum): brjod/ / de nyid mthar thug de nyid brjod// de nyid de yis bsam par bya// gzhan du grub pa min pa nyid// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi kun tu bzang pos de skad ces
300a5(rgyud 'bum): gsungs so/ / rang gzugs dkyil 'khor byas nas ni// dbus su 'bar ba mnyam pa'i 'od// 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad du// de nyid shes pas snying khar dgod// de la bdag nyid
300a6(rgyud 'bum): yang dag bskyed/ / de yi rang bzhin der brtsam bya// rang gzugs pad+ma'i dbus gnas par// snang byed la sogs mnyam pa'i 'od// snying khar yi ge byas nas kyang // rdo rje sems dpa' rnam bsgom bya/
300a7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems dpa' 'dus pa la// sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam bsgom bya// rig pa'i tshul du yang dag bskyed// dngos grub thams cad thob 'gyur// de phyir sngags pas khyad par gyi// rig pa'i
300b1(rgyud 'bum): / tshul ni mchog tu 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpas de skad ces gsungs so// thams cad de nyid bya ba ni// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni//
300b2(rgyud 'bum): gzugs ni rnam snang mdzad bsams nas// snying khar sngags ni rnam bsgom bya// de nyid sngags su rjes su dran// rig pa'i tshul gyi cho ga las// slob dpon yid ni dga' ba ru// cho ga shes pas
300b3(rgyud 'bum): dbyung bar bya/ / snying kha rnams dang thams cad du// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor sgom pa'o// rang gi gzugs ni yang dag bskyed// de la ral gri la sogs sgom// cho ga shes pas yang dag bskyed/
300b4(rgyud 'bum): 'bar ba lnga ni rnam sgom bya// gzugs dang kha dog rnam par shes// 'jig rten khams su 'di spro bya// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan gyis de skad ces gsungs so//
300b5(rgyud 'bum): gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ ye shes rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan
300b6(rgyud 'bum): 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi gzugs su byin gyis brlabs nas/ de rnams kyang dkyil 'a
300b7(rgyud 'bum): chen po 'dus pa rnams su rang gi gzugs su gzhag go/ / bsdus pa'i rigs kyi ting 'dzin gyis// le'u bka' rnams stsal bar mdzad// 'o ma dang zhor bsams nas su// 'phags pa'i b
301a1(rgyud 'bum): zhi po dang / / dbus su'ang sngags pas ut+pa la// bsgom bya gzhan du mi bsam mo// ye shes dkyil 'khor yang dag sbyor// de yi steng du rnam bsgom bya/ khro
301a2(rgyud 'bum): bo'i rnam pa yang dag bskyed/ / 'od zer yang dag sbyor ba sgom// der ni 'od zer 'dus rnams su// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam bsgom bya// cho ga shes pas der rang gzugs// dbus su
301a3(rgyud 'bum): yang dag gzhag bsgom bya/ / bcom ldan 'das dam tshig rdo rjes de skad ces gsungs so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na swa b+hA ba At+ma kohaM/ gsang sngags rgyal po 'di yis ni// rang gi rnam
301a4(rgyud 'bum): rtog yongs 'dor bya/ / rang gzugs hUM yig ces brjod pa// byas nas kun tu rnam bsgom bya// cho ga shes pas de rnams su'ang // ha yig mthar thug rnam bsam bya// rang gzugs la

301a6(rgyud 'bum): mthong bas bsgom par bya/ / bcom ldan 'das dam tshig rdo rjes de skad ces gsungs so// gnas lngar yang dag sbyar bya ba// rtse mo lnga ru rnam bsgom bya// sngags kyi yi ge thams cad du//

301b1(rgyud 'bum): skad ces gsungs so/ / rang gzugs sems dpa'i tshul gyis ni// sems dpa'i mtshan mar bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas zhing rnams kun tu ni// cho ga shes pas spro bar bya// rang gzugs
301b2(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa'i tshul gyis ni/ / lha yi snying khar bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas gzugs de dbyung bar bya// 'jig rten khams 'dir spro bar bya// rang gzugs ye shes zhes brjod pa// 'bar
301b3(rgyud 'bum): ba'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ / byang chub sems de la phyung na// 'jig rten khams su 'di spro bya// rang gi gzugs zhes brjod pa ni// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba mnyam pa'i 'od// rang gi gzugs
301b4(rgyud 'bum): kyi 'od zer gyis/ / zhing 'dir khyab par rnam bsgom bya// rang gzugs lcags kyur bcas byas nas// rang gi gzugs kyi lag par dgod// cho ga shes pas kun nas kyang // sangs rgyas
301b5(rgyud 'bum): gzugs la rab gzhug bya/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rje bos de skad ces gsungs so// rang gi gzugs kyi tshul gyis ni// gsang sngags yi ge rnam par
301b6(rgyud 'bum): sgom/ / rdo rje sems dpa' rnam bsgoms pas// cho ga shes pas spro bar bya// byang chub sems su rang gzugs ni// de nyid sgom pas bsgom par bya// dgegs ni sngags lus yang dag bskye
301b7(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten khams su'ang spro bar bya/ / mi sdug gtsigs shing 'jigs pa ni// bgegs kyi dgra de dbyung bar bya// byang chub sems su de phyung nas// 'jig rten khams 'dir spro bar ba/
302a1(rgyud 'bum): gzugs nyi ma'i dbus gnas par// rnon po 'bar bas rnam par brgyan// las kyi rdo rje shin tu mdzes// cho ga shes pas dbyung bar bya// dang po'i rnal 'byor yang dag
302a2(rgyud 'bum): bskyed / / shin tu brtan pa brtan pa'i sems// cho ga nye bar mthong ba yi// dang po'i rnal 'byor yang dag brtsam// rang gzugs ut+pa lar bsams nas// sna tshogs 'od zer mnyam par ldan// lha
302a3(rgyud 'bum): yi gzugs su yang dag sbyor/ / de yi steng du rnam sgom bya// ji srid nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor du// sngags pas 'jig rten gsum du spro// sangs rgyas gzugs ni yang dag bskyed// kha dog dkar po shi
302a4(rgyud 'bum): tu mdzes/ / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// yid dga' ba ni bsgom par bya// tho ba'i rnam pa yang dag sbyor// cho gas rtag tu bsgom par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' sogs gsungs pas/
302a5(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar rigs par pi Tu'i ta// rang gzugs gsal ba 'bar ba'i 'od// mA ma kI sogs rnam brgyan pas// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bskyed// 'jig rten gsum du yang spro bya// rdo rje ye shes yang dag
302a6(rgyud 'bum): bskyed/ / khro bo'i yang dag sbyor bsgoms pas// rang gzugs 'bar ba mtshungs pa yis// cho ga shes pas spro bar bya// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// mkhas pas rang gi gzugs bsgom bya//
302a7(rgyud 'bum): rtse mo lnga yi rdo rje che// 'jig rten khams su yang spro bya// khro bo'i gzugs su yang dag bskyed// rang gi sngags kyi yi ges brgyan// sangs rgyas gzugs su rna bsgom bya// cho ga shes pas 'khor lo lhal
302b1(rgyud 'bum): 'od zer tshul du rnam bsgom bya/ / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyis de skad ces gsungs so// rang gzugs 'khor lo'i tshul gyis ni// 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// rang gzugs sangs
302b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyas dang mtshungs pa/ / cho ga shes pas dbyung bar bya// rang gzugs 'khor lo'i tshul gyis ni// ral gri'i 'od zer gyis brgyan pa// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'khrugs gsal ba// kun nas rnam par 'phro ba'o//
302b3(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma rang snying dbus gnas par// bram ze tshangs par rnam par brgyan// byang chub sems su yang dag bskyed// de la sngags kyi yi ge dgod// snying por ut+pa lar bsams nas// sna tshogs 'od zer rnam par brgyan//
302b4(rgyud 'bum): cho ga shes pas byang chub sems// bsams nas sngags gsum rnam bsgom bya// snying kha'i dbus son phra mo ni// in+d+ra nI la mtshungs pa'i 'od// ye shes sbyor ba kun bskyed nas// sangs rgyas
302b5(rgyud 'bum): gzugs su bsgom par bya/ / rang gzugs phra mo'i dbus gnas par/ sna tshogs 'bar ba mnyam pa'i 'od// snying por yi ge bsams nas ni// rang gzugs de la bsgom par bya// bcom ldan
302b6(rgyud 'bum): 'das rdo rje ye shes kyis de skad ces gsungs so/ / khru gang tsam las 'das pa yi// phra mo'i dkyil 'khor sgom pa ni// rang gzugs yi ger yang byas nas// rdo rje 'bar bar rnam bsgom bya// khru
302b7(rgyud 'bum): gang tsam las 'das pa ru/ / ye shes dkyil 'khor bsgom pa ni// dbus su gzugs ni yang dag bskyed// bsams nas bzlas pa brtsam par bya// khru gang tsam las 'das par ni// nyi ma'i dkyil
303a1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor sgom pa ni/ / rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bskyed// bsams nas babs pa brtsam par bya// khru gang tsam las 'das pa ru// chos kyi dkyil 'khor sgom pa ni// bgegs
303a2(rgyud 'bum): dgrar yang dag bskyed bsams nas/ / bzlas pa kun tu brtsam par bya// mtho gang tsam las 'das pa ru// ye shes dkyil 'khor sgom pa ni// rnam snang mdzad kyi gzugs bsams nas// 'jig
303a3(rgyud 'bum): rten khams su 'di spro bya/ / mtho gang tsas las 'das pa ru// pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor sgom pa ni// dbus su gzugs ni yang dag bskyed// gzhogs su sangs rgyas yang drag sgom// rgyang grags tsas
303a4(rgyud 'bum): las 'das par ni/ / phra mo'i dkyil 'khor sgos pa ni// dbus su gzugs ni yang dag bskyed// 'jig rten khams 'dir spro bar bya// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can gyis de skad ces gsungs so//
303a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyang grags tsam las 'das par ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor sgos pa ni// sangs rgyas gzugs ni yang dag bskyed// gzhogs su btsun mo dgod par bya// btsun mo rnams ni thams cad du// 'od zer lnga ni
303a6(rgyud 'bum): rnam bsgom bya/ / me tog yid dga' 'di rnams kyis// cho ga shes pas mchod par bya// 'phrog byed dri yi sprin la sogs// bsams nas sangs rgyas mchod par bya// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i spyan
303a7(rgyud 'bum): gyis de skad ces gsungs so/ / cho ga shes pas btsun mo ni// ser po lta bur bsams nas ni// sangs rgyas sras po 'dus pa ni// rnal 'byor bskyed de bsgom par bya// de dbyung ji lta bar bkod la/
303b1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems dpa' rnam bsgom bya// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bskyed// rigs kyi dbye ba bsgom par bya// rgyang grags tsam las 'das par ni// ye shes phra mo rnam par sgom// rang gi gzugs kyi
303b2(rgyud 'bum): / tshul gyis ni// dbus su yang dag bzhag bsgom bya// cho ga shes pas rdo rje'i rtser// rnam pa lnga ru rnam bsgom bya// dkar po ye shes rigs rab brjod// nag po bsdus pa'i rigs su dran/
303b3(rgyud 'bum): dmar po pad+ma'i rigs zhes bya// ser po 'dod pa'i rigs su dran// mdzes pa'i gzugs ni rab gsal bar// rig nas sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan// pad+ma rab tu rgyas byas nas// rang gi rdo rje de la
303b4(rgyud 'bum): gzhug/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas de skad ces gsungs so// de ltar byas pas gang ldan pa// de ldan ye shes rnyed par dka'// rang gzugs shin tu brtan byas nas// bsam
303b5(rgyud 'bum): gtan brtson rab tu gzhug/ mdzes ldan ma dga' lta ba na// gzugs dang ldan par de 'gyur ro// btsun mo mthong ba cam gyis ni// 'thung 'gyur 'di ni the tshom med// rdo rje sems dpas zhing
303b6(rgyud 'bum): 'dir ni/ / yongs su gang bar rnam bsgom bya// sangs rgyas gzugs ni brtan byas nas// rdo rjes rnam par ltung bar bya// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gsum dbyer mi byed pas de skad ces gsungs so//
303b7(rgyud 'bum): gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ rigs bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u gsum pa rdzogs so// / de nas bcom ldan
304a1(rgyud 'bum): 'das phyag na rdo rjes chos kyi rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u bka' stsal to/ / dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// thams cad du ni de nyid bya// chos kyi dkyil 'khor nas sgos pa
304a2(rgyud 'bum): cho ga shes pas rab tu brtsam/ / chos kyi kun sbyor mtshan nyid kyi// rnam par rtog pa yongs dor bya// gsang sngags dbye bar brjod nas ni// thams cad rnal 'byor rnam bsgom bya// oM sarba ta thA
304a3(rgyud 'bum): gta d+harmA dz+nyA na swa b+hA ba At+ma kohaM/ dam tshig chen po'i rnal 'byor nyid// cho ga shes pas yang dag brjod// dngos po thams cad yang dag bskyed// dngos med bsgom bya min pa nyid// ba
304a4(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug gis de skad ces gsungs so/ / blo gros ldan pas pad+ma bsam// pad+ma rA ga'i dbang mtshungs pa// dkyil 'khor de la bsam bya ba// gzugs brnyan dbus
304a5(rgyud 'bum): su rnam bsgom bya/ / rig pa'i rgyal po yang dag bskyed// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba mtshungs pa'i 'od// 'bar ba'i 'dus pa de rnams su// 'jig rten dbang phyug rnam bsgom bya// bcom ldan 'das
304a6(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten dbang phyug gis de skad ces gsungs so/ / nam mkha'i khams ni kun tu dgang // slar yang de nyid la bsdu bya// rang gi gzugs dang zla dbus gnas// sna tshogs kha dog mtshungs
304a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i 'od/ / snying kha ru ni rnam bsgoms nas// lce la gsang sngags sgom pa'o// rang gzugs de yi dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas ye shes rnam par brgyan// 'jig rten dbang phyug yang dag bskyed//
304b1(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten khams 'dir spro bar bya// rig pa'i rgyal po yang dag bskyed// pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// 'jig rten dbang phyug rab bsgoms nas// gzugs kyis nam mkha' 'gengs par byang
304b2(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ / 'jig rten dbang phyug rab bsgoms nas// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bskyed// 'jig rten khams su 'di spro bya// bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos
304b3(rgyud 'bum): skad ces gsungs so/ / chos kyi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bskyed// ji ltar rigs par gnas lnga ru// khyab bdag 'jig rten dbang phyug dgod// ces bcom ldan
304b4(rgyud 'bum): 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug gis de skad ces gsungs so/ / snying kha'i dbus son phra mo ni// chos kyi dkyil 'khor mchog gyur pa// chos der yang dag bskyed nas su// 'jig rten khams su 'di
304b5(rgyud 'bum): spro bya/ / snying kha'i dbus son phra mo ni// chos kyi dkyil 'khor dri med pa// pad+ma de la rnam bsgoms shing // sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam bsgoms nas// sangs rgyas gzugs rnams thams cad du/
304b6(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten dbang phyug rnam sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos 'chang bas de skad ces gsungs so// snying kha'i dbus son phra mo ni// chos kyi dkyil 'khor mchog gyur pa// sangs rgyas lnga ni rnam bsgoms na//
304b7(rgyud 'bum): der yang de bzhin bsgom par bya// lte ba'i dbus son phra mo ni// chos kyi dkyil 'khor mchog gyur pa// rang gzugs la sogs rnam bsgoms pas// cho ga shes pas bskyed par bya// mtho gang
305a1(rgyud 'bum): tsas las 'das par ni/ / chos kyi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// cho ga shes pas rim pa bzhin// 'jig rten khams su mchod par byed// bcom ldan 'das chos 'cha
305a2(rgyud 'bum): bas de skad ces gsungs so/ / rgyang grags tsam las 'das par ni// chos kyi dkyil 'khor sgom par ni// 'jig rten dbang rab bsgom pa yis// rang gi gzugs ni rnam bsgom bya// rgyu grags
305a3(rgyud 'bum): tsam las 'das par ni/ / pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom pa ni// gzhogs su btsun mo byas nas su// sangs rgyas gzugs ni mchod par bya// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni// chos kyi dkyil
305a4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor sgom pa ni/ / 'jig rten khams ni kun nas su// cho ga shes pas mchod par bya// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor sgom pa ste// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
305a5(rgyud 'bum): mchog byas nas/ / rang gi gzugs ni dgod par bya// sngags pas steng gi rim par ni// ji srid nam mkha' 'gengs pa zhes// pad+ma rA ga'i 'od mnyam pa'i// pad+ma lnga ni rnam bsgoms nas// cho ga
305a6(rgyud 'bum): shes pas rang gzugs ni/ / dbus su yang dag gnas bsgom bya// sangs rgyas gzugs ni kun 'byung ba// shar du rnam par bsgom par bya// lhor ni bsdus pa zhes byas nas// rnal 'byor yang
305a7(rgyud 'bum): dag brtsam par bya/ / nub tu chos 'chang byas nas ni// byang du 'dod pa 'byung ba'o// 'khor lo ye shes rigs zhes brjod// ral gri chos kyi rigs zhes brjod// rdo rje bsdus pa rigs su grags//
305b1(rgyud 'bum): rje gsum 'dod pa'i rigs su bshad// nam mkha'i khams ni kun gang bar// byas nas khyab bdag chos 'chang ba// lag tu ral gri yang dag bskyed// rang gzugs kyis ni gzhom par bya// 'dod mdzod/
305b2(rgyud 'bum): kyis ni 'joms byas nas// chos kyi dbyings kyi cho ga rig/ lag tu mdung ni yang dag bskyed// rang gzugs kyis ni phye mar brlag/ gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni// ye shes rigs ni
305b3(rgyud 'bum): zlog par byed/ / ye shes dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni// bsdus pa'i rigs ni rnam ltung byed// chos kyi dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni// chos kyi rigs ni nges ltung byed// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni//
305b4(rgyud 'bum): chen po'i rigs ni nges ltung byed// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni// rigs kun nges par ltung bar byed// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang bas de skad ces gsungs so// gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid
305b5(rgyud 'bum): rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen por/ / chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin te le'u bzhi pa rdzogs so// // de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag ni rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa
305b6(rgyud 'bum): de rnams thams cad rang gi rdo rje chen po la gzhag nas/ ye shes kyi rigs la sogs pa can de la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis rab tu bcug cing brtan par byas nas/ dkyil 'khor
305b7(rgyud 'bum): chen po de rnams su rang gi gzugs kyi rnam pas kun tu gnas pa dang / gzugs chen po lnga chen po'i lha'i rnam par yang dag par sbyar nas/ 'dod pa'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin 'di gsungs so//
306a1(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul las ni// thams cad de bzhin kho nar bya// cho ga shes pas rab brtsam bya// gzhan du bsgom bya min pa nyid// 'dod pa'i rigs kyi cho ga yis/
306a2(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags rig pa rjes dran bya// oM kA ma dz+nyA na swa b+hA ba At+ma kohaM/ ji ltar rigs par brjod nas ni// rnal 'byor 'dis ni yang dag brtsam// kar ni kA ra mtshungs pa'i 'od// pad+ma chen po yang dag
306a3(rgyud 'bum): bskyed/ / de nyid dkyil 'khor byas nas ni// rang gi gzugs ni dgod par bya// 'dod mchod gzugs ni kun bskyed nas// 'jig rten khams su 'di spro bya// rang gzugs 'dod mchod tshul gyis ni//
306a4(rgyud 'bum): gzugs kyis nam mkha' 'gengs par byed// sna tshogs 'bar ba rnam brgyan pa'i// tshangs pa'i gzugs ni yang dag mnan// 'dod mchod gzugs ni kun bskyed nas// 'jig rten khams su 'di
306a5(rgyud 'bum): spro bya/ / cho ga shes pas re re bar// gzugs gsum rnam par bsgom par bya// bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa'i mchod pas de skad ces gsungs so// khru gang tsam las 'das par ni// pad+ma chen po rnam sgom
306a6(rgyud 'bum): pa 'tshangs pa'i gzugs kyi srid pa 'dir/ / cho ga shes pas spro bar bya// khru ni brgya phrag 'das par ni// pad+ma chen po rnam bsgom bya// 'dod mchod gzugs ni yang dag dbyung // sangs rgyas de nyid la bsgom
306a7(rgyud 'bum): bya khru ni brgyad brgya 'das par ni/ / pad+ma chen po rnam bsgom bya// khyab 'jug gzugs ni yang dag bskyed// sangs rgyas la sogs der bsgom bya// sangs rgyas gzugs ni yang dag bskyed//
306b1(rgyud 'bum): tshangs pa'i gzugs kyis 'di spro bya// chos kyi gzugs ni yang dag bskyed// khyab 'jug gzugs kyis 'di spro bya// sems dpa'i gzugs su bstan byas nas// 'dod mchod mtshungs pa'i gzugs
306b2(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis/ / 'jig rten khams ni kun tu yang // cho ga shes pas spro bar bya// khru gang tsam las 'das par ni// tshangs pa'i gzugs kyis rnam bsgom pa// snying khar de rnams yang dag bskyed// sangs rgyas
306b3(rgyud 'bum): gzugs su rnam bsgom bya/ / cho ga shes pas sangs rgyas gzugs// gzugs la gzugs su rnam bsgom bya// bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa'i mchod pas de skad ces gsungs so// khru gang tsam las 'das
306b4(rgyud 'bum): par ni/ / khyab 'jug gzugs ni rnam sgom pa// snying khar de rnams kun bskyed nas// sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam bsgom bya// sangs rgyas gzugs rnams thams cad du// 'dod pa'i mchod pa
306b5(rgyud 'bum): mtshungs pa'i gzugs/ / sgeg pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan gyur pa// cho ga shes pas dbyung bar bya// ji srid gzugs su yang dag sbyor// de srid du ni btsun mor 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa'i
306b6(rgyud 'bum): mchod pas de skad ces gsungs so/ / rigs kyi dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni// gzugs su bskyed nas bsgom par bya// cho ga shes pas dang po'i sbyor// mnyam par gzhag pas bsgom par bya// nam mkha'i
306b7(rgyud 'bum): khams ni kun bkang bar/ / mkhas pas byas nas brjod pa'i rnam par gsol ba gang ba// mnyam par bzhag pas de ltung bya// cho ga shes pas lha'i rnam pa// sangs rgyas 'od dang mnyam pa'i
307a1(rgyud 'bum): gzugs/ / ji ltar rig par sngags pas sbyin// gzhan du 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// cho ga shes pas lha mo lha'i// rang gi gzugs ni rnam bsgom bya// gzhan du rdo rje sems
307a2(rgyud 'bum): dpa' rnams/ / dkar sogs cho ga 'byung ba yi// sgeg pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan gyur pa'i// rang gzugs rnon po'i tshul gyis ni// cho ga shes pas lha mo der// byas nas mtshon cha rnam bsgom bya//
307a3(rgyud 'bum): / chog shes pas rdor pad+ma// kun sbyor cho ga 'byung ba yis// rigs kyi gzugs ni kun bskyed nas// rang gi khu bas de ni mchod// rgyal ba chu skyes rigs kyi lha// gzhan du grub pa nyid mi 'gyur// phyag
307a4(rgyud 'bum): na rdo rje'i rigs brjod pa'i/ / lha nyid grub pa nyid mi 'gyur// dang po dang mthar thams cad du// 'di ni thun mtshams bzhi ru bya// rgyal ba chu skyes rdo rje skyes// gzhan du 'grub pa nyid ma yin/
307a5(rgyud 'bum): ma mo'i gzugs ni kun bskyed nas// 'od zer sna tshogs mnyam pa'i 'od// rang gzugs 'dod mchod tshul gyis ni// khams gsum par yang spro bar bya// 'dod pa'i mchod pa mtshungs pa'i gzugs//
307a6(rgyud 'bum): sring mo bzhir ni yang dag sbyor// gzugs kyi mtshan nyid tshul gyis ni// mnyam par bzhag pas smra bar bya// ge sar ser po dang mtshungs pa'i// tshangs pa'i gzugs ni rnam bsgoms nas// cho ga
307a7(rgyud 'bum): shes pas sangs rgyas gzugs/ / byas nas de ni rab bsgom bya// bcom ldan 'das rdo rjes 'chang bas de skad ces gsungs so// gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las
307b1(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste lnga pa rdzogs so/ / / de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rang gi dkyil 'khor du bzhag
307b2(rgyud 'bum): nas rang gi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ gnyis su med par mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen por dngos grub thams cad kyi dam tshig gi ye shes mchog gi le'u 'di bka
307b3(rgyud 'bum): stsal to/ / blo ldan 'dod pa thams cad la// rnam rtog bya ba min pa nyid// sangs rgyas thams cad 'joms pa ni// sems dpa' spang bya min pa nyid// dga' dang rtsod pa'i mtshan nyid kyis//
307b4(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas thams cad slu ba dang // gzhan du de la lha'o zhes// sems ni brtan bya min pa nyid// sangs rgyas kun gyi rdzas gang yin// skye ba med pas yon tan 'byung // sems ni shin tu
307b5(rgyud 'bum): brtan byas la/ / btsun mo la sogs rnam par sgom// 'jig rten gsum pa'i dbang phyug ma// rig ma chen mo spyan mar grags// de yang btsun mor byas nas kyang // kun tu nye bar longs spyod do//
307b6(rgyud 'bum): cho ga shes pas ye shes rigs// lhan cig 'joms par yang dag brtsam// srog chags rnams kyi dge 'joms pa// bsdu ba'i don ni rtag tu bya// chags la chags pas sbyor bya ba// chos kyi
307b7(rgyud 'bum): rigs la rtag tu bya/ / 'dod mchod rigs ni mtshungs pa la// rtag tu brdzun yang smra bar bya// kun la rang de ltar 'di bya// gzhan du grub pa min pa nyid// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam bsgoms nas
308a1(rgyud 'bum): snying khar de ni rnam bsgom bya/ / thams cad de bzhin kho nar bya// gzhan du de dag mi 'gyur ro// ye shes rigs ni rnam 'joms pas// dga' ldan rnams su bar sku/
308a2(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi rigs ni rnam 'joms pas// bde ldan du ni skye bar 'gyur// chos kyi rigs sogs dbye ba yis// bsdus pa zhes ni grags par 'gyur// 'dod mchod rigs ni 'joms pa yis// khams
308a3(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa la sogs par 'byung / / gnas med lus dang bral ba yis// lus dang ldan pas gnas par 'gyur// de yi gdong ni gzi rgyas par// chos rnams kun tu skye bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das de
308a4(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rje bos de skad ces gsungs so/ / sems can khams kyi mthar thug par// bdag ni rdo rje lta bur brtan// srid pa sgrol bar yang dag sbyor// sangs rgyas bka'
308a5(rgyud 'bum): yis dgod par bya/ / ye shes dge ba kun 'byung ba// sangs rgyas chos tshul 'di rnams kyi// sems dpa' bsdus pa yang dag 'byung // gzhan du mchod bya min pa nyid// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i
308a6(rgyud 'bum): thabs/ / ye shes chen po kun btus pas// sems la rtag tu'ang sbyar bar bya// chos bsdus pa ni thob par 'gyur// byang chub sems ni sems chen po// rdor sogs mtshan nyid min pa nyid//
308a7(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du ni ye shes kun// snying po kun las btus pa 'di// pha rol phyin pa btus pa 'dir// sangs rgyas rnams kyi btsun mo brtan// de rnams sangs rgyas thob par gyur// kun sbyor mtshan nyid
308b1(rgyud 'bum): 'di rnams kyis/ / sgra dri ro la sogs pa rnams// ji ltar nus pa 'bral bar byed// rang gzugs sangs rgyas tshul gyis ni// de la dbus su rnam bsgom bya// 'od zer 'bar ba 'khrugs byas nas// snying
308b2(rgyud 'bum): khar de rnams rab gzhug bya/ / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang bas de skad ces gsungs so// bsdus pa zhes rigs su brjod pa'i// gar mkhan chen po yang dag 'byor// de la ngo mtshar gsol btab pa//
308b3(rgyud 'bum): de la 'joms par byed par dgongs// phyag rgya chen po'i go 'phang brjod// mi rnams rigs ni bzhi po yang // byas nas dam tshig tshul gyis ni// mnyam par gzhag pas bsgom par bya// sems ni sems
308b4(rgyud 'bum): can thams cad kyi/ / rang bzhin phul byung chen po ste// rnam rtog dam tshig la gnas pa// skye ba rnams dang dman par smra// bsod nams bsod nams kyis de'i lus// gos pa 'am yang na de min nyid// de ltar
308b5(rgyud 'bum): shes nas ci rigs par/ / gzhan du bsgom bya min pa nyid// pad+ma ut+pal la sogs pa// 'dam skyes yang dag byung ma skyes// sems la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyang // de nyid la kun shes par bya// byang
308b6(rgyud 'bum): chub sems ni brtan byas nas/ / sangs rgyas rnams kyang yongs su gzung // rdo rje de nyid las skyes te// gzhan du 'byung ba min pa nyid// sems can gyi ni sa rnams kyis// 'grub par 'gyur bar grags pa
308b7(rgyud 'bum): yin/ / de bzhin gang 'di dag pa che// ye shes lcags kyu'i tshul chen no// bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos de skad ces gsungs so// gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen pos
309a1(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub thams cad kyi dam tshig gi ye shes mchog gi le'u ste drug pa rdzogs so/ / / de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa
309a2(rgyud 'bum): rnams thams cad nges par byung nas kyang sems dpa' chen po'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs par kun tu gnas par gyur to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po rdo rje thams
309a3(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi dam tshig gi ye shes byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dang po'i rnal 'byor dam tshig thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi ye shes 'du bar byed pa bskyed pa dang bcas pa'i
309a4(rgyud 'bum): gsang chen bka' stsal to/ / sangs rgyas gzugs su yang dag bskyed// 'od zer sna tshogs mtshungs pa'i 'od// 'od zer snying po sogs tshul gyis// 'khor lo dkar po dang mtshungs pa// tsa na ka yi 'bru tshang
309a5(rgyud 'bum): kyis nga kun nas yongs su zlum po ru/ / sngags pa'i dpral ba'i steng du ni// mnyam par gzhag pas bsgom par bya// cho ga shes pas zla ba gcig/ de yis de ltar 'di spro bya// nam mkha' la sogs rab 'byams
309a6(rgyud 'bum): dus zla gnyis nang du rgyas par bya/ / dzA ti'i me tog sogs g.yogs par// dkyil 'khor de ru rnam bsgom bya// mtshan ma phul byung bcas mthong nas// mtshan nyid brjod pas mtshon par bya// 'bar ba'i
309a7(rgyud 'bum): 'phreng bas rnam brgyan pa'i/ / rdo rje sems dpa' rnam bsgoms nas// gang du dkyil 'khor sogs tshul gyis// nas tsam du ni bsgom par bya// rtse mo lnga pa'i rdo rje che// sna yi rtser ni rnam bsgom bya// in+d+ra
309b1(rgyud 'bum): nI la sogs tshul gyis/ / de yi kha dog rnam bsgom mo// ut+pal la sogs g.yogs pa la// dkyil 'khor de la bsgom par bya// kun tu de nyid bya ba ni// ye shes rigs kyi cho ga las// cho ga shes
309b2(rgyud 'bum): pas chos sems dpa'/ / bskyed nas bsgom par bya ba ni// nam mkha'i khams ni kun dkang bar// byas nas 'od zer yang dag bsdus// rgya shug tshig gu'i tshad kyis ni// pad+ma yang dag sbyar bsgom bya//
309b3(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma rA ga'i 'od mtshungs pa'i// 'dab ma brgyad pa rnam bsgoms nas// ji ltar rigs par snying khar de// bsgom bya gzhan du mi bsam mo// thog ma par ni rnam spangs nas// sgom pa de yi dgongs po'o// me tog pad+ma/
309b4(rgyud 'bum): sogs g.yogs par// de phyogs su ni rnam bsgom bya// cho ga shes pas 'dod mchod pa'i// sems dpa' 'od mtshungs bsgom par bya// 'od zer 'bar bas rnam brgyan pa'i// rtse gsum shin tu brtan
309b5(rgyud 'bum): byas nas/ / cho ga shes pas nas tsam du// bsams nas lte bar bsgom par bya// kar ni kar sogs me tog che// ser po 'bar ba bsgom par bya// bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos de skad ces gsungs so//
309b6(rgyud 'bum): kun tu rnal 'byor bzhi rnams su// rnam pa bzhi po rnam bsgom bya// ji srid nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor du// cho ga shes pas spro bar bya// gang yang sngags pas zla gnyis su// thun bzhir rnam par bsgom
309b7(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / rnam par dben dang yid 'ong dang // skye bo bral bar bsgom par bya// nya dang sha sogs can bza' la// brtul zhugs can gyis mar gsar btung // bslus pa dang yang sa la 'jigs
310a1(rgyud 'bum): de ltar gang 'di brtul zhugs can/ / cho ga shes pas sangs rgyas gzugs// dngos nyid du de lta bar byed// rang gzugs rnam shes bya min nyid// sgra ni nyan par byed min ring/
310a2(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa gnyis su de yi sems// skye ba min zhing yang yang min// gang zhig kho nar bsgom par bya// gzhan du de dag mi 'gyur nyid// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor sbyor la sogs// bskyed nas de la bsgom par bya//
310a3(rgyud 'bum): bdag po'i rnal 'byor kun bskyed nas// mnyam par gzhag pas bsgom par bya// 'bras bu'i chos su skyed 'gyur te// gzhan du bskyed par 'gyur min nyid// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems kyis de
310a4(rgyud 'bum): skad ces gsungs so/ / gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ dang po'i ye shes kun las btus pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas
310a5(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams thams cad rang gi ba spu'i khung bu rnams su rab tu bcug nas/ dam tshig thams cad kyi ye shes 'byung ba byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
310a6(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ / snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu yang bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams thams cad rang gi gzugs bud med kyi gzugs su byin gyis brlabs pa kho
310a7(rgyud 'bum): nanar ba spu'i khung bu rnams nas mngon par byung bar gyur to/ / de nas btsun mo de rnams thams cad kyis ye shes chen po'i rin po che de'i mchod pa thams cad kyi bkod pas yang dag par mchod de/ nam mkha'i khams
310b1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kun tu bkang zhing snang bar byas nas sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rnams su gnas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes btsun mo thams cad kyi b+ha ga rnams su rang gi rdo
310b2(rgyud 'bum): rje yang dag par sbyor ba'i rnam pas yang dag par sbyar nas rang gi gzugs de'i chang du byin gyis rlob par byed pas byin gyis brlabs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang de'i tshe tshad de bzhin
310b3(rgyud 'bum): kho na bzhin du mkhas pa rnams kyis snga ma ji lta ba'i phyag na rdo rje rigs thams cad dam tshig gi ye shes de kho na nyid byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ye shes chen po'i dam tshig bka' stsal to/ /
310b4(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor bzhi yi tshul gyis ni// dbus su sngags su rnam bsgom bya// snying khar dkyil 'khor byas nas ni// rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom par bya// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
310b5(rgyud 'bum): / thams cad kyi rje bos de skad ces gsungs so// dkyil 'khor bzhi yi tshul gyis ni// rnam snang la sogs rnam sgom pa// de nyid kyis ni kun bskyed nas// de nyid mchod par byed par 'gyur//
310b6(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor bzhi yi tshul gyis ni// rdo rje sems dpa' bsam par bya// sangs rgyas gzugs ni yang dag bskyed// de yi mchod pa byed par bshad// dkyil 'khor bzhi yi tshul gyis ni// rang rigs
310b7(rgyud 'bum): la sogs rnam par sgom/ / dbus su gzugs ni brtan byas nas// de yi mchod pa byed par bshad// sna tshogs brgyan gyis brgyan pa yi// spyan ni yang dag bskyed nas su// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni//
311a1(rgyud 'bum): dmangs rigs dkar mo rnam bsgom bya// kun sbyor la sogs mtshan nyid kyis// sna tshogs brgyan dang yang dag ldan// ut+pal sngon po dang mtshungs pa'i// mA ma kI ni rtag bsam
311a2(rgyud 'bum): byang me tog chun sogs kyis don bzhin/ / ji ltar rigs par rnam brgyan pa// rig ma chen mo dkar mor grags// khrag dang mtshungs par bsam par bya// yid kyi kun sbyor phun tshogs kyis// bsdus
311a3(rgyud 'bum): pa yis ni rnam par brgyan/ / ulpa na mtshungs skal bzang mo// sngags pas rtag tu bsam par bya// bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos de skad ces gsungs so// mar gsar la sogs kun sbyor gyis/
311a4(rgyud 'bum): yid du 'ong ba de bsgom bya// chang nyid yid kyis sbyor byed pa// gang de nyid ni sgom bzhin du// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// rang gi sngags kyis yang dag bskyed// skrod par byed pas cho ga kun// 'dir/
311a5(rgyud 'bum): ni bskyed cing bsgom par bya// lag pas mgrin pa la sogs bzung // rkang pa de la sbyar bar bya// me tog gnyis sogs mtshan nyid kyis// rang gi rdo rje gzhug bsam bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yang
311a6(rgyud 'bum): dag sbyor/ / khu ba de la ltung bar bya// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gis de skad ces gsungs so// nam mkha'i khams ni kun bkang bar// byas nas de nyid kyis bsgom bya// me tog bzhi la sogs tshul
311a7(rgyud 'bum): gyis/ / de la mchod par byed ces dgongs// nyer spyod lnga yi mchod pa yis// mchod bdag kun sbyor las mchod bya// dri gzugs ro dang reg bya ni// thams cad du de nyid kyis sbyin// rdor sems rnams ni
311b1(rgyud 'bum): blo ldan gyi/ / sangs rgyas kun gyis bskyed pa dang // mnyes dang mchod par rab tu brjod// dges par yang ni brjod pa yin// 'di yis gsang sngags grub pa ni// sgrub pa po rnams rnam par 'gyur/
311b2(rgyud 'bum): byed rgyas par sgrub don du// sangs rgyas nyid sogs yang dag 'thob// gal te chos nyid mi 'gyur ba// 'di ni sangs rgyas chos nyid do// sangs rgyas sogs kyis yongs bzung ba// gzhan du
311b3(rgyud 'bum): 'thob par mi 'gyur ro/ / sems kyi mi dge bya min nyid// smad pa'i kun spyod bya min nyid// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// chos nyid mi 'gyur kun las btus// gang gzhan btsun mo rnam
311b4(rgyud 'bum): nyid ni/ / 'dod pa nye bar longs spyod pa'o// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor sbyor ba ni// ji ltar 'os par mchod bya ba// sbyin dang tshul khrims de bzhin bzod// brtson 'grus su yang brtan par brjod// 'di na
311b5(rgyud 'bum): sngags pa mkhas pa yis/ / cho gas lhag par gnas par bya// rang gi sngags ni yang dag brjod// zla ba lta bur sbyar bar bya// der ni rdo rje la bsdus pas// slar yang sngags pas gzhug par bya// gzhog/
311b6(rgyud 'bum): su rin chen rnam sgom pa// ze 'bru nyid la bya ba'o// de rnams kha dog bsdus pa yis// rigs kyi dbye ba rtog par bya// rigs gsum la yang thun mong du// rdo rje sems dpa'i yon tan 'byung // de yi yi ge yang dag
311b7(rgyud 'bum): bskyed/ / gzhug la bsam gtan lhur len pas// las kyi dbye ba sogs rnams kyis// bya ba'i mtshan nyid de rab grags// ye shes rigs la ut+pal sngo// bsdus pa shes pa la yang grags// 'dod mchod rigs
312a1(rgyud 'bum): la pad+ma dang / / chos kyi rigs la'ang dgongs pa yin// cho ga shes pas lo bcu pa'i// btsun mo ye shes rigs la shes// bsdus pa zhes la brtag bya ba// yon tan mdangs ldan bcu gnyis
312a2(rgyud 'bum): lo sngags pas rtag tu chos shes par/ / bcu drug lo ma kun tu brtsam// kun tu 'dod mchod rigs la ni// nyi shu'i lo can bsten par bya// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi
312a3(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor gyis de skad ces gsungs so/ / ji srid khu ba yang dag bsdus// bcu gnyis lo dang ldan par bya// mdor na gang gang 'dod gyur pa// sna tshogs rgyan dang yang dag ldan// me tog chun po sogs brgyan
312a4(rgyud 'bum): pas ji ltar rigs par bya ba yin/ / rnam par snang mdzad sogs byas nas// de nas mchod pa yang dag brtsam// rigs kyi dbye bas las rnams ni// tsan dan gur kum rab tu brjod// bde bar bzhugs shing mdzes
312a5(rgyud 'bum): byas pa/ / dkyil 'khor de nyid kyis de bya// thams cad bsdus pa de bya ba// ji ltar dbye ba mi shes na// gal te dbye ba de yi ni// sangs rgyas kyang ni 'grub mi 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
312a6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi thugs kyis de skad ces gsungs so/ / mtshan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa yis// rgyan du byas pa'i bu mo bdun// bcu drug lo yi rnam pa des// ji srid bco brgyad lo lon par/
312a7(rgyud 'bum): shin tu ring min thung ba min// phra min rnam par skyes pa'ang min// mtshungs med gzhon nu ma sgrub bya// gzhan du 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// cho ga shes pas de bzung la// de nyid sgrub thabs kyis bsgrub bya//
312b1(rgyud 'bum): 'dzam bu'i gling du dbyangs sogs kyi// mtshan nyid thams cad kyis brgyan pa// bcu drug bsgrubs na cho ga shes// 'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tsom med// khru bzhi pa yi dkyil 'khor ni// bris nas rtag tu sgrub
312b2(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / rig pa'i tshul gyi cho ga yis// mkhas pas 'bum phrag lnga ru bzlas// mar me la sogs tshad kyis te// gzhan du bsgrub bya min pa nyid// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas thams cad kun tu snang
312b3(rgyud 'bum): bas de skad ces gsungs so/ / khru yi tshad kyi dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bskyed// bdud rtsi zhes bya'i khro bo che// byin nas yang dag las rnams brtsam// cho ga shes pas de ru yang /
312b4(rgyud 'bum): mtshan ma bkod nas bsgrub par bya// dri dang me tog sogs mchod pa// byas nas bsgrub bya gzhan du min// mtsho dang chu 'gram yid 'ong dang // ri bo dben pa rnams su yang // cho ga shes pas bsdus pa
312b5(rgyud 'bum): yis/ / rang nyid dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// rin chen kun gyi mchod pa ni// rdo rje sems dpa'i mchod pa ste// spyan ras gzigs kyi mgon po yi// mchod pa zhes ni de la bshad// thun tshod dang po las 'das
312b6(rgyud 'bum): par/ / gnyis par yang dag nyer gnas pas// rnal 'byor pa yi sgrub par sgrub// de kho nyid kyis 'grub par 'gyur// thun tshod phyed du yang dag 'byung // lnga yi bar ma chad rnams su'ang // phyag na rdo rje byin
312b7(rgyud 'bum): brlabs pas/ / sgrub po rtag tu 'grub par 'gyur// rigs kyi bdag po ltar gyur nas// 'jig rten khams ni kun tu yang // btsun mo grangs med po Ti yis// dngos grub rtogs phyir rnam par spong // de yi bya bas
313a1(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas nyid/ / ri rab kyi ni rdul phran gyi// phyag na rdo rje kun 'byung ba// sems can rnams kyi byed pa yin// gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i
313a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po chen por/ dam tshig thams cad kyi sgrub thabs chen po gsang ba'i mchod pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa rdzogs so// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang
313a3(rgyud 'bum): yang dag par 'dus nas/ byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams tham cad kyi ya sha khong du chud pa zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags
313a4(rgyud 'bum): chen po'o/ / dam tshig sgrub pa po rnams kyi seng ge rnam par rol pas dam tshig gi ye shes byed pa myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba
313a5(rgyud 'bum): bstan du gsol/ / de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyi tshig nye bar gsan nas/ rdo rje de rang gi snying khar bzhag ste de bzhin gshegs
313a6(rgyud 'bum): pa de rnams la gsung 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rgyu ci'i phyir de skad gsung / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gang
313a7(rgyud 'bum): nges par bstan nus pa ni med do/ / yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'di la ye shes kyi 'od zer yang rnam pa stong du rnam par zhigs par gyur to// gzhan du na ga la 'gyur zhes so// de bzhin
313b1(rgyud 'bum): d u ni de lta bu byas nas de nyid bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka dang spyi bor zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rang ga gzugs
313b2(rgyud 'bum): su gnas par byed do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes ye shes kyi dam tshig khong du chud pa zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyi dam tshig bka' stsal to// grangs med 'byung po thams cad ni// de nyid sbyor
313b3(rgyud 'bum): bas gsad par bya/ / skye ba 'dir nyid sangs rgyas nyid// thob 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// sangs rgyas bye ba yongs rdzogs pa// ye shes sbyor bas gsad par bya// skye ba 'dir ni 'grub 'gyur te//
313b4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems dpa' thob par 'gyur// pad+ma chen po tshad kyis ni// sems can phung po rnam gzhom bya// chos kyi de nyid ting 'dzin gnas// bcom pas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// cho ga shes pas pad+ma'i tshad//
313b5(rgyud 'bum): 'joms byed 'dren pa gsad par bya// 'dod mchod de nyid bsgoms pa yis// de yi dngos grub che zhes bya// bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid dag pas de skad ces gsungs so// nam mkha'i khams ni kun bkang bar/
313b6(rgyud 'bum): mtshan nyid des ni gsad par bya// de ltar yang 'dir sangs rgyas nyid// skye ba 'di nyid kho na la// rnam pa sna tshogs yang dag thob// sems can sems ni cho ga yis// yang dang yang du sbyang bar bya// gsod/
313b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i bdag nyid sogs 'byung ba// gzhan du sbyor bar mi 'gyur nyid// sems can kun gyis sems gang yin// gsal ba zhi ba 'od gsal bar// sna tshogs dngos pos ma gos pas// sems su brjod pa'i
314a1(rgyud 'bum): de nyid sgom/ / cho ga shes pas sangs rgyas yun// de nyid nye bar longs spyad bya// gsang sngags dge ba 'byung ba kun// gzhan du grub pa nyid mi 'gyur// de de sngags pa ma lus pas//
314a2(rgyud 'bum): mchog gi tshogs ni yang dag 'byung // rdo rje sems dpa' dge 'byung ba// gzhan du dgas par 'gyur min nyid// nye bar longs spyod bya kun tu// nye bar longs spyod kun brtsam bya// gzhan du gal te bdag rmongs
314a3(rgyud 'bum): pas/ / mnar med lta bur 'tshed par 'gyur// thams cad bdag nyid bza' bar bya// chang ngam gzhan yang rang gis btung // sangs rgyas kun gyi sbyin par 'gyur// myur du 'grub par 'gyur ba nyid//
314a4(rgyud 'bum): sha chen rtag tu bza' bar bya// til mar yang rung rang btung bya// cho ga shes pas bshang gci'ang rung // bza' ba'i bdag nyid can gyis bza'// rma yi sgo las byung ba'ang min// sangs rgyas sogs
314a5(rgyud 'bum): la dbul bar bya/ / me tog dri zhim sprin chen po// byas nas thams cad don ji bzhin// sngags pas rtag tu smad pa yis// btung ba nyid ni 'byung bar bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// ye shes blo
314a6(rgyud 'bum): yis dam tshig brjod/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rjes su gnang bar byed pas de skad ces gsungs so// sngags pas rtag tu dkyil 'khor ni// bshang dang gcibs so so ru// nyal
314a7(rgyud 'bum): bar byed pa la sogs sam/ / bsam pa shin tu sra brtan bya// bshang dang gci bas bkang ba yi// gru bzhi kun tu bskyed nas ni// rang gzugs de yi dbus su ni// sna rtser nas kyis dgang bar bya// bcom ldan sangs
314b1(rgyud 'bum): rgyas 'byung ba ni/ / des chags bdag po dka' ba min// gang gzhan gsum po bsdus pa yis// 'dir gzhan so sor gnas de min// cho ga shes pas phyi 'dir ni// bya de gzhan rnams dang sbyar bya//
314b2(rgyud 'bum): ye shes 'khor los bskul ba yis// dngos grub yangs pa der 'gro 'gyur// rang ngam gal te gzhan yang rung // de nyid sbyor bar mi byed do// ji srid nam mkha' kun 'byung ba// sangs rgyas nyid
314b3(rgyud 'bum): ni thob mi byed/ / nga ni mnar med nga 'jigs rung // nga ni sdug bsngal nga bde ba// zhe sdang nga la de bzhin rmongs// nga ni 'dod chags so sor gnas// zhes so// gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam
314b4(rgyud 'bum): par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes khong du chud par byed pa zhes bya ba'i mchog tu gsang chen gyi le'u ste dgu pa rdzogs so//
314b5(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes thob pa'i 'bras bu dang rgyu dag gis rdo rje sems dpa' thams cad kyi bcud kyi dam tshig chen po bka'
314b6(rgyud 'bum): stsal pa/ dgra bcom la phyag bya min nyid// dge slong yang rung phyag bya min// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas nyid// thob pa phyag ste phyag bya min// rang gzugs su ni rang gzugs kyis// bsams
314b7(rgyud 'bum): nas de nyid cho ga las/ / snying khar rdo rje sogs byas nas// yang dag mchod byar de sbyar bya// gal te rdo rje sems dpa' yang rung // kha cig phyis 'di las 'gongs na// rang gi byang chub sems smras pas/
315a1(rgyud 'bum): mgo bo tshal pa bdun du 'gas// b+ha gar ling ga rab bzhag nas// gsang sngags yang nas yang du bzlas// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bskyed// rang gzugs la ni bsgom par bya//
315a2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas slob dpon de nyid 'di// rtag tu srung ba'i khyad par las// gzhan du slob dpon rnams kyis ni// sangs rgyas nyid ni 'thob mi 'gyur// rang gi gzugs su rnam bsgoms nas// de nyid las ni phra
315a3(rgyud 'bum): mo'i gzugs/ / byang chub sems ni yang dag bskyed// slob dpon sangs rgyas su bsgom bya// sgrub po rnams kyi ye shes 'di// de nyid dam tshig 'byung ba'o// dam tshig la sogs sbyor ba 'dis// sangs rgyas kyi
315a4(rgyud 'bum): yang 'grub mi 'gyur/ / dam rgya shin tu rnal 'byor gyis// rang gi snying khar gzugs bsgom bya// de la rdo rje yang dag bskyed// ji srid 'dod pas bsten par bya// dus la ltos pa la sogs ldan// 'di ni dam tshig
315a5(rgyud 'bum): mchog yin no/ / ji srid dngos grub bsgrub bya ba// rtag tu de yis bsrung bar bya// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems kyis de skad ces gsungs so// rang gi gzugs ni yang dag bskyed// rang gzugs la
315a6(rgyud 'bum): sogs mtshan nyid kyi/ / snying khar bdud rtsir brjod pa ni// de yi sngags ni yang dag brtsam// 'di yang dam tshig ye shes te// kun tu dri ma bsal ba nyid// 'dod pa'i dngos grub brtan pa ni// brtul
315a7(rgyud 'bum): zhugs brtson pas bsrung bar bya/ / sangs rgyas thams cad rnam bsgom nas// bsgrub bya'i rnam par bsam par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bskyed// snying po de la bsgom par bya// cho ga shes
315b1(rgyud 'bum): pas 'di rtag tu/ / dus gsum du ni bsgom par bya// gal te gzhan du bzlas byas sam// sgrub na de nyid ma yin nyid// rig ma gzugs dang gzugs sogs can// 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas rgyan byed
315b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i/ sems dpa' rin chen yang dag bskyed// de yi lag tu'ang rnam bsgom bya// bsdus pa yis ni sgom bzhin du// ji srid dngos grub rab mthong byed// gzhan du gal te bdag rmongs ngan// de yi sbyin
315b3(rgyud 'bum): pa der mi 'gyur/ / shin tu rnam bkra shin dri med// ye shes rin chen cod pan du// bzhag nas sgrub pa yi ni mchog/ sa stengs lhan cig rgyu bar byed// rdor sems bdag nyid dngos grub pa // rdo rje sems
315b4(rgyud 'bum): dpas byin gyis brlabs/ / rtag tu rdo rje ye shes chos// go 'phang du ni bsgral bar bgyi// ye shes rdo rjes dngos grub pa // bdud rtsi zhes sogs byin gyis brlabs// nam mkha' mchog tu phra ba yi// bzang
315b5(rgyud 'bum): po nga ni rnam dpyod byed/ / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad ces gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang /
315b6(rgyud 'bum): thugs dang / ye shes kyi gsang sngags yongs su dag pa'i de kho na nyid byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig bka' stsal to// rdo rje sems dpa' skye sgom pa// thugs
315b7(rgyud 'bum): kyi rdo rje zhes rab brjod/ / sems la de ni bsgoms nas ni// ye shes rdo rje rab gzhug bya// rdo rje rang bzhin dag pa'i don// gsung ba'i rdo rjer yongs su brtag/ dag pa'i ye shes rnam bsgoms pas// sku gsung
316a1(rgyud 'bum): dag pa rnam bsgom bya/ / rdo rje'i byin rlob shin tu gsal// mi phyed rdo rje'i sku nyid do// sangs rgyas sku yi rang bzhin nyid// cho ga shes pas byin gyis brlabs// rdo rje 'di yis byin//
316a2(rgyud 'bum): brlabs pa// 'di yis byang chub thob par byed// cho ga shes pas zla drug gis// sangs rgyas nyid 'dir thob par gyis// chags skyes chos kyis ma gos pa'i// rdo rje de rnams thams cad 'byung // de ltar
316a3(rgyud 'bum): de nyid cho ga byas nas/ / dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa yin// de nas phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi kun tu spyod pa'i dam tshig bka' stsal to// mi slu ba yi tshul gyis ni/
316a4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje ye shes gsum 'byung bas// de kun nye bar longs spyod pa// sangs rgyas kun spyod nyid du 'gyur// nam mkha'i khams ni kun bkang ba'i// sangs rgyas rnams ni gal te bcom// skye ba 'dir nyid sangs
316a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyas nyid/ / rdo rje slob dpon bsdus pa'o// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// rdo rje'i gzugs ni yang dag bskyed// mkha' khams sangs rgyas gzugs kyis ni// yongs su gang bar rnam bsgom bya//
316a6(rgyud 'bum): snying khar sngags ni yang dag bskyed// mnyam par bzhag pas bskul bar bya// kun tu dgyes pa'i dam tshig gang // rdo rje slob dpon rtag bsgom bya// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rang gi
316a7(rgyud 'bum): sngags ni yang dag bskyed/ / mkha'i khams gzugs kyis yang dag bkang // snying khar thams cad rnam bsgom bya// de nyid de ni byed bzhin pas// sangs rgyas bka' nyid go 'phang gnas// zla ba'i dkyil
316b1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor dbus gnas par/ / rang gi sngags ni yang dag bskyed// cho ga shes pas gzugs rnam par// gnas lnga rnams su bsgom par bya// byang chub sems ni yang dag bskyed// de kun bskul bya brtul
316b2(rgyud 'bum): zhugs can/ / chos kyi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// rang gi sngags ni yang dag bskyed// cod pan du de rnam bsgoms nas// mchod par bya zhing bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas slob dpon bde ldan gang //
316b3(rgyud 'bum): de nyid rnal 'byor pa'i bde de// kun tu skrag pa kun spangs pa'i// sngags pa seng ga bzhin du spyod// skye ba 'dir nyid sangs rgyas nyid// skad cig de la nges sbyor byed// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
316b4(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gis de skad ces gsungs so/ / gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por/ dam tshig gi le'u ste bcu pa'o// /
316b5(rgyud 'bum): / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsdu bas byon nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs dang / ye shes kyi mchod pa'i sprin gyi bkod pas
316b6(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la yang dag par mchod de 'di skad ces gsol to/ / dngos grub thams cad byed bsam gtan// bsam gtan dkyil 'khor mchog gyur pa// dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa/
316b7(rgyud 'bum): de nyid bcom ldan bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba 'debs par byed pa'i tshig gsan nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
317a1(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dam tshig thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi ye shes kun tu spyod pa'i phyir dkyil 'khor chen po 'di
317a2(rgyud 'bum): ston par mdzad do/ / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste// rdo rje ye shes lta bu ste// sangs rgyas byang chub rab gsal byed// 'o ma dang zhor bsam bya zhing // pad+ma phra mos nye
317a3(rgyud 'bum): bar mdzes/ / sna tshogs me tog chun pos gang // rab tu 'bad pas bsgom par bya// logs bzhi pa dang zur bzhi par// mkhas pas rab tu brtag par gyis// 'dzam bu nA da yang dag byung // de la dbus
317a4(rgyud 'bum): su bsgom par bya/ / khru ni bcu drug tu bya ba// sangs rgyas slob dpon cho ga gnas// cho ga shes pas grwa rnams su// rtse mo lnga pa rnam bsgom bya// ji ltar rigs pa'i gnas lnga ru// zla ba yi ni dkyil 'khor brtag/
317a5(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor rnams ni sgom byed pa// lag pa gcig tu yang dag bskyed// ji ltar rigs pas shar gyi ni// mi bskyod yongs su brtag par bya// cho ga shes pas lho yi ni// deng ni rin chen dgod par bya//
317a6(rgyud 'bum): nub kyi dpag med ces brjod pa// byang du don yod grub pa'o// cho ga shes pas ser po'i mdog/ de nyid sgom pas bsgom par bya// dbus su khyab bdag rnam snang mdzad// sangs rgyas bskyed nas bsgom
317a7(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / slob ma'i rnam par thams cad du// cho ga shes pas rnam bsgom bya// rig ma chen mo spyan la sogs// grwa rnams nyid du rnam bsgom bya// cho ga shes pas bdud rtsi zhes// sgo rnams kun tu bsgom
317b1(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / de rnams kha dog bsdus pa yis// so so so sor rtogs par bya// de rnams kun gyis gzugs rnams su// rdo rje sems dpar rnam bsgom bya// 'od zer lnga po yang dag bsgyu
317b2(rgyud 'bum): / lnga rnams bsdus pa yis// khyab bdag la ni dbul bar bya// sangs rgyas slob dpon cho ga las// mkha' khams sangs rgyas kun gyis ni// yongs su gang bar rnam bsgom bya// de ni khu ba thams ca
317b3(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa sgom par grags pa yin/ / dam tshig thams cad kyi dngos grub ces bya ba bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs so// // de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes su
317b4(rgyud 'bum): yang gdon mi za ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor gsungs pa/ blo ldan sangs rgyas slob dpon gyis// de bzhin nyid du thams cad bya// phra mo'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni
317b5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad der ni rnam bsgom bya/ / shar gyi chos rnams kun gyi mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' dgod par bya// sngags pas lho ru brtag pa ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dgod par bya// nub tu ye shes rdzogs
317b6(rgyud 'bum): byang chub/ / sangs rgyas slob dpon dgod par bya// byang du thams cad kun skrag pa// rdo rje sems dpa' dgod par bya// dbus su khams gsum pa mnyam pa// rdo rje gzugs su rnam bsgom bya//
317b7(rgyud 'bum): dkar po'i mdog tu rnam bsgoms nas// nag po'i dbus su bsgom par bya// btsun mo rnams ni kha phye nas// de nyid la ni rdo rje gzhug/ rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang phyug ma// gnas gzhi rnams su
318a1(rgyud 'bum): 'bad pas so/ / ji ltar rigs par mdog kun dang // sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam bsgom bya// cho ga shes pas thams cad du// khro bo'i mchog gi rnam par bsam// sngags
318a2(rgyud 'bum): bas 'dod yon lnga rnams kyis/ / sngags kyi mchod pa yang dag brtsam// mkha' khams rdo rje sems dpas ni// yongs su gang bar bsgom par bya// rdo rje kun gyi khu sogs kyis// mchod pa ru ni rnam bsam
318a3(rgyud 'bum): bya gdon mi za ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs so/ / // de nas phyag na rdo rje slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje
318a4(rgyud 'bum): byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'dod chags chen po'i chos zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs pa/ chos kyi dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni//
318a5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad der ni rnam bsam bya// cho ga shes pas shar gyi ni// chos 'chang 'bar ba dgod par bya// lho ru ye shes chos ni deng // sgom pa'i bdag nyid can gyis bsgom// nub tu pad+ma longs spyod pa// byung du
318a6(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi dbyings las skyes/ / ji ltar rigs par bsgoms byas nas// dbus su chos kyi dbang phyug dgod// dkar po'i mdog tu rnam bsgoms nas// dbus su dmar po rnam par sgom// cho gas chos kyi dbang
318a7(rgyud 'bum): phyug ma/ / grwa bzhi ru ni bsgom par bya// khro bo chen po rta zhes pa// sgo rnams nyid du rnam bsam bya// chos kyi rnal 'byor thams cad la// 'dod yon lnga yis mchod par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bskyed//
318b1(rgyud 'bum): gzhogs su rnam par bsgom par bya// khu ba nyid kyis nam mkha'i khams// rin chen gang bar rnam bsam bya// ji ltar rigs par chos kyi sku// de nyid sbyor bas mchod par bya// 'dod chags kyi chos zhes bya ba'i
318b2(rgyud 'bum): bsam gtan chen po'i gsang chen rdzogs so/ / / de nas phyag na rdo rjes slar yang dam tshig thams cad 'byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas
318b3(rgyud 'bum): 'dod chags thams cad kyi tshul zhes bya ba'i bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so/ / sku yi dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni// thams cad der ni rnam bsam bya// shar du dgra rnams nges
318b4(rgyud 'bum): 'joms pa/ / sna tshogs mdog tu rnam bsam bya// lho ru me tog yang dag sbyor// ngo bo nyid kyis bsgom par bya// nub tu ye shes yang dag dag/ zhi ba'i gzugs ni rnam bsam bya// byang du rnam
318b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyal zhes bya yang / / brtson pa'i bsam pas bsgom par bya// dbus su 'dod mchod yang dag sbyor// rang gi gzugs kyi sgom pa las// cho gas 'dod pa'i dbang phyug mar// bsam bya sems dpa'i
318b6(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid can/ / cho ga shes pas pad+ma'i phyag/ grwa rnams nyid du rnam bsam bya// 'dod yon kun gyis mchod pa la// mchod par byas nas mchod par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' de phyung nas// gzhogs su rnam par
318b7(rgyud 'bum): bsam par bya/ / khu ba 'dod mchod tshul gyis ni// bskyed nas khyab bdag mchod par bya// 'dod pa'i slob dpon gyis brtag bya// mchod pa la sogs yongs su gzungs// 'dod chags thams cad kyi dam tshig
319a1(rgyud 'bum): bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor chen po rdzogs so/ / // 'di nyid kyi ni dkyil 'khor du// sangs rgyas slob dpon rtag tu bya// thams cad du yang dkyil
319a2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor du/ / rdo rje'i slob dpon gyis bsgoms nas// 'dod pa'i slob dpon ci gsungs pas// bya'o dkyil 'khor gzhan du min// de nas phyag na rdo rjes slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
319a3(rgyud 'bum): gtsug tor gyi snying po kun tu skul bar byed pa'i de kho na nyid byin gyis rlob pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ gtsug tor thams cad kyi snying po bskul ba zhes bya ba'i bsam gtan
319a4(rgyud 'bum): gyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/ / zho ru byas pa bsams nas ni// pad+ma mdzes pa sogs brgyan pa// shel de yi ni dbus su ni// thams cad du ni rnam bsam bya// logs bzhi pa la grwa bzhi pa// sgo
319a5(rgyud 'bum): bzhi par ni rab tu brtag/ chos kyi dkyil 'khor dam par ni// de la dbus su bsgom par bya// sngags pa cho ga shes pas dbus// 'khor los sgyur ba dgod par bya// cho ga shes pas rnam snang
319a6(rgyud 'bum): mdzad/ / shar nyid du ni rnam bsgom bya// cho ga shes pas byang du ni// gyen 'phags zhes bya rnam bsgom bya// lho ru dpag med zhes bya ni// bsam pa brtan pas bsgom par bya// ji ltar rigs par
319a7(rgyud 'bum): nub tu ni/ / gzi brjid phung po rnam bsgom bya// btsun mo'i rnam pa mtshungs pa yi// chos kyi gzugs ni yang dag bskyed// mtshan ma rdo rje sogs mtshan nyid// cho ga yis ni de rnams sbyin// rig ma chen
319b1(rgyud 'bum): mo spyan la sogs/ / grwa rnams kun tu bsam par bya// gzhan gyis mi thub khro bo che// sgo dang sgor ni rnam bsgom bya// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag dbyung // de kho nyid gang sbyar bar bya// ye shes
319b2(rgyud 'bum): sbyor bas thams cad la/ / 'dod yon lnga yis mchod par bya// khu ba de la yang dag bskyed// mchod par byed pa bskyed par bshad// mkha' khams gtsug tor thams cad kyis// yongs su gang bar rnam
319b3(rgyud 'bum): bsgom bya/ / gtsug gtor gyi snying po kun tu skul bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs so// / de nas phyag na rdo rjes slar yang 'dod pa'i khams thams cad mnyam par 'jug pa
319b4(rgyud 'bum): 'byung bar rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rigs thams cad kyi thun mong gi seng ge rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba'i bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs pa
319b5(rgyud 'bum): cho ga shes pas sna tshogs mdog/ 'o ma dang zhor rnam bsgom bya// rin chen bzhi yi rang bzhin dbus// ri bo de la bsgom par bya// logs bzhi pa la grwa bzhi pa// sgo bzhi par ni rab tu brtag/ pad+ma ut+pal kun
319b6(rgyud 'bum): tu bkram/ / gzhogs rnams su ni rnam par bsam// rin chen kun gyi gdan dang ni// rtag tu zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid// sangs rgyas slob dpon khyad par gyis// bsam gtan brtson pas sbyar bar bya/
319b7(rgyud 'bum): sngags pas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor can// de yi dbus su bsgom par bya// mthe'u chung mtho las 'das pa las// sor bzhi'i ngos dang grwa rnams su// ngos rnams su ni rtag tu bya// bdud rtsi zhes ni bsgom
320a1(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba la sogs gang // mi sdug mche gtsigs 'jigs par byed// sngags pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor can// gnas lnga rnams su rnam bsgom bya// dbus su
320a2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje ral gri ni/ / shin tu rnam mdzes shin tu mdzes// 'od zer 'bar bas 'khrugs shing 'bar// pad+ma rA ga dbang po mtshungs// 'od dkar 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba gsal// kha dog dkar po shin tu
320a3(rgyud 'bum): mdzes/ / ral pa'i cod pan kun rdzogs pa// sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan gyur pa// sangs rgyas slob dpon cho ga yis// shar phyogs su ni rnam bsgom bya// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bskyed// sna tshogs
320a4(rgyud 'bum): / rin chen rnam brgyan pa// 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrugs shing 'bar// ut+pal sngon po dang mtshungs pa// lho ru rtag tu slob dpon gyis// bsgom bya gzhan du mi sgom mo// chos kyi rdo rje yang dag bskyed
320a5(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma rA ga mtshungs pa'i 'od/ / me tog chun po dmar pos gang // nub phyogs su ni bsgom par bya// 'od zer 'bar bas rnam brgyan pa'i// 'dod pa'i rdo rje yang dag bskyed// gsar dag gi ni ya
320a6(rgyud 'bum): shes rdzogs/ / byang du yang ni bsgom par bya// grwa ru lha mo ri dbang phyug/ ji lta'i gnas su gnas bsam bya// bud med mtshan nyid yongs rdzogs pa// mi mo'i rgyan gyis brgyan gyur pa// chags
320a7(rgyud 'bum): dang chags bral skad cig ma/ / sngags pas yid 'ong bsgom par bya// sgo yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// rig ma gzhan gyis mi thub ma// g.yas brkyang zhabs kyis mnan pa yi// 'jig rten
320b1(rgyud 'bum): gsum 'jig 'phrog pa mo/ / de rnams thams cad rang gzugs su// rdo rje sems dpa' rnams bsgom bya// sangs rgyas slob dpon de rtag tu// 'dod yon lnga yi mchog rnams kyi// 'bul bar byed/
320b2(rgyud 'bum): pa rtag tu bya// de ltas dgyes 'gyur gzhan du min// rang gi khu ba yang dag bskyed// mchod pa bskyed par bshad pa yin// gzugs brnyan des ni nam mkha'i dbyings// yongs su gang bar rnam
320b3(rgyud 'bum): bsgom bya/ / dpag bsam ljon shing rin chen tshe// yid bzhin nor bu shin tu mdzes// rigs kyi dbye ba shes pa yis// de rnams kha dog rnam bsgom bya// ji skad gsungs pa'i gzugs
320b4(rgyud 'bum): des ni/ / dbang bskur ba ni gzung bar bya// cho ga shes pas de yi tshe// bya ba bum pa bsam par bya// sangs rgyas gzugs sogs thams cad kyis// mchod bzhin par ni rnam par bsam//
320b5(rgyud 'bum): yang dag sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid 'dis// shin tu dbang bskur mnyam pa can// skye ba 'dir nyid sangs rgyas nyid// thob ste 'dir ni the tshom med// rang sngags khro bo mtshungs pa yi// phan pa'i sbyin
320b6(rgyud 'bum): pa sbyin par byed/ / de ni dus yun mi ring bas// dngos grub skye ba lta bur thob// blo ldan sangs rgyas slob dpon gyi// rtag tu de yi dam tshig ni// gang kho na yi rigs 'byung ba// 'bad pa yis
320b7(rgyud 'bum): ni 'di ltar 'os/ / gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen por/ bsam gtan chen po'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das
321a1(rgyud 'bum): p hyag na rdo rjes slar yang nam mkha'i khams thams cad ye shes kyi snang bas yang dag par skul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te
321a2(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid skyed par byed pa'i sngags 'di gsungs pa/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA nod b+ha bA ya swA hA/ sngags 'di gsungs ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa brjod
321a3(rgyud 'bum): du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa brgya stong phrag g.yos shing rab tu g.yos so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes slar yang kun nas kun tu snang ba'i dam tshig rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa
321a4(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'di la snyoms par zhugs te sngags 'di gsungs so/ / oM saM gra ha dz+nyA nod b+ha bA ya swA hA/ de kho na nyid snying po chen po 'di gsungs ma thag tu/ de nas gang nam mkha'i khams thams
321a5(rgyud 'bum): cad 'od zer 'bar ba chen pos kun tu snang zhing yang dag par mthong bar gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes slar yang rang bzhin dag pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
321a6(rgyud 'bum): nas sngags 'di gsungs so/ / oM d+harma dz+nyA nod b+ha bA ya swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gsungs ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi mthar thug par ye shes kyi rjes su 'thun pas kun tu snang bar gyur to//
321a7(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes slar yang rang bzhin gyis dpal kun tu 'byung ba yang dag par 'byung ba rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sngags 'di
321b1(rgyud 'bum): gsungs so/ / oM kA ma dz+nyA nod b+ha bA ya swA hA/ de bzhin nyid du kun shes phyir// de nyid du ni sbyar bar bya// rang gi gzugs kyis bzhag nas ni// de kun de la bsgom par bya// bskyed pa la sogs kun
321b2(rgyud 'bum): 'byung ba/ / rang gi sngags nyid kyis ni bya// mang po phan tshun yang dag sbyor// phyag rgya der ni rnam bsgom bya// blo ldan ye shes rigs la ni// sor mo'i rnam pa sbyor bar bshad// rdo rje'i rnam pas kun sbyar
321b3(rgyud 'bum): nas rin chen rnam pas sbyar bar bya/ / pad+ma'i rnam pas kun sbyar nas// 'di ni chos kyi rigs su brjod// rtsa gsum rnam pa'i dbye ba yis// de nyid du ni bcing bar bya// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems
321b4(rgyud 'bum): kyis de skad ces gsungs so/ / bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba sems dpa' chen po bskyed par byed pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa rdzogs so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag
321b5(rgyud 'bum): na rdo rjes slar yang bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dam tshig chen po'i dngos grub kyi dkyil 'khor chen po
321b6(rgyud 'bum): 'di gsungs so/ / de nas yang dag rab bshad bya// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa 'di// rdo rje ye shes lta bu ste// dngos grub chen po zhes bshad do// gsar pa legs par bkal ba yi// tshad dang ldan pa mdzes
321b7(rgyud 'bum): pa yis/ / thig gis mkhas pas ci nus kyis// dkyil 'khor la ni thig gdab bo// grwa bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi yis brgyan pa dang // thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// dar dang me tog chun
322a1(rgyud 'bum): pos brgyan/ / grwa yi cha rnams thams cad dang // sgo khyud kyi ni mtshan rnams su// rdo rje rin chen gyis spras par// phyi yi dkyil 'khor thig gdab bo// rtag tu bsdus pa'i cho ga
322a2(rgyud 'bum): yis rim pa gsum ni bya ba yin/ / cho ga shes pas shar du ni// ye shes zhes ni dgod par bya// lhor ni 'bad pas bsdus pa zhes// brjod pa rtag tu bya ba'o// cho ga yis ni byang phyogs su//
322a3(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi rigs ni rtag tu bya// sngags pas 'dod pa kun rigs la// gsum pa ru yang mnyam par bri// shar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gdugs dkar dang // rig ma chen
322a4(rgyud 'bum): / mo spyan dang ni// mdzod pu yang ni nye bar ro// rdo rje 'chang gi lho ru ni// brdud rtsi zhes dang stobs po che// rdo rje khu tshur mA ma kI// nye ba nyid du gzhag par bya// bcom ldan 'das kyi byang du ni// pad+ma 'chang ba
322a5(rgyud 'bum): zhi ba bskyed/ / khro gnyer rim par ldan pa dang // rig ma chen mo dkar zhes dang // khro gnyer can ma'ang mnyam par bri// cho ga shes pas de dbus su// rig ma mi thub can ma bri// phyag rgya thams cad nyid du ni/
322a6(rgyud 'bum): rtse mo lnga pa rnam bsgom bya// dkyil 'khor gsum pa slob dpon gyis// yang trits+tsha ya sa sU traM bri bar bya// sgo rnams thams cad nyid du ni// rdo rje lcags sgrog la sogs bri// ji ltar rigs pa phyogs kun tu//
322a7(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten skyong ba dgod par bya// shar phyogs dbang po lnga rgyal dang // 'dod pa spyod pa'i lha rnams dang // gnas gtsang ma yang dgod par bya// me phyogs kun tu me yi lha// drang srong chen po lnga mngon shes/
322b1(rgyud 'bum): lho phyogs yi dgas rnams kyi bdag/ gshin rje dang ni ma mo bdun// bden bral phyogs su yi dgas kyi// dbang po dang ni 'byung po kun// nub kyi phyogs su klu yi bdag/ chu lha dang ni klu rnams kun// rlung gi phyogs
322b2(rgyud 'bum): su rlung lha dang / / rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad dang // byang gi phyogs su gnod sbyin bdag/ lus ngan dang ni gnod sbyin kun// dbang ldan phyogs su dbang phyug ni// 'byung po kun gyi bdag po dang // ji skad gsungs
322b3(rgyud 'bum): pa cho ga yis/ / bum pa dgod dang gdan sogs bya// lha rnams kun gyi rgyal po ni// der ni dgod par bya ba yin// mkhas pas me tog dri sogs kyis// mchod pa'i cho ga byas nas ni// mnyes pa'i rigs
322b4(rgyud 'bum): pas mnyes par bya/ / de ltar dgas 'gyur gzhan du min// 'dir ni sngon mthar de rnams kyi// nya dang chang sogs rab sbyin bya// cho ga shes pas gsang ba'i mchod// sgo bzhi rnams su brtag par bya// khu ba de ni
322b5(rgyud 'bum): bzung byas nas/ / thams cad du ni dbul bar bya// rig ma'i tshul gyi cho ga yis// de ni yang yang dgyes par bya// mkhas pas dga' ba'i rnam pa yis// thog mar gtor ma sbyin par bya// cho ga shes pas
322b6(rgyud 'bum): 'phrog ma yis/ / gnyis pa ru ni yang dag gzung // sngags pas khyad par gsum pa ru// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sbyin par bya// de nyid brjod pa de yis ni// gang gsungs sbyin sreg las rnams bya// de tshe slob
322b7(rgyud 'bum): ma dbang bskur ba'i/ / las rnams so sor bsgrub par bya// de bzhin bsam pas bum pa ru// rdo rje sems dpa'i rab sbyor gyis// lhag ma'i sangs rgyas zhes bya bar// de nyid rigs par yang dag bskyed//
323a1(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu sangs rgyas slob dpon gyis// de yi tshul ni smra bar bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig gang // lam gsun lam ni 'jug byed pa// dbang bskur chen po de yi ni// nam mkha' ji
323a2(rgyud 'bum): srid yang dag 'byung / / khyad par du yang 'dir smras pa// bdag gi yang 'di yang dag 'byung // yid bzhin rin chen nor bsten nas// de nyid 'byung bas 'dir dbang bskur// gzhan yang gal te sems
323a3(rgyud 'bum): can gang / / mthong bar 'gyur zhes bya ba nyon// skye ba bdun gyi nang du sa// thob cing phyag 'os mchog tu 'gyur// sangs rgyas slob dpon gang nyid du// ye shes rgya mtsho gnas par 'gyur// thub chen
323a4(rgyud 'bum): de nyid shes pa gang / / rtag tu sangs rgyas mchod byed pa// sangs rgyas slob dpon ci gsungs pa// de yi rang gi slob ma de'i// dam tshig lnga po byin nas ni// rab tu 'bad pas smra bar bya// sangs rgyas
323a5(rgyud 'bum): kun gyi dam tshig che/ / dkyil 'khor de nyid shes dkyil 'khor// sgrub po rnams kyis ci 'dra der// yid bzhin nor bu lta bur blang // dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs so//
323a6(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje slar yang de bzhin shegs pa thams cad kyi thugs la bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad nam mkha'i khams thams cad du spro ba'i rdo rje
323a7(rgyud 'bum): byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ / snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid de nam mkha'i khams thams cad du sems kyis gang bar
323b1(rgyud 'bum): byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la rab tu stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po/
323b2(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig sgrub pa'i mchog ces bya ba rig ma'i tshul la sogs pa'i las can gsungs pa// khru ni sum cu'i khyon tsam du// kun nas yongs su zlum por ni// in+da
323b3(rgyud 'bum): nI la mtshungs pa'i 'od/ / 'od zer 'bar ba de phyung nas// nam mkha' ru ni 'di byas pa// bsam gtan sbyor bas bsam par bya// 'dzam bu'i gling ni thams cad du// 'o ma dang zhos kun tu
323b4(rgyud 'bum): 'khrugs/ / shing rta'i 'khor lo'i tshad kyis ni// pad+mas g.yogs pa rnam bsgom bya// khro bo chen po gshin rje gshed// drag tu rgod pa chen po sogs// rtag tu de yi dkyil 'khor gyi// de yi
323b5(rgyud 'bum): gzugs ni rnam bsgoms nas/ / khro chen khro gnyer rim par ldan// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od// ji ltar rigs par kun bskyed nas// sgom par byed pa de der bshad// khro bo chen po dbyug
323b6(rgyud 'bum): pa sngo/ / 'jig rten gsum 'jig 'phrog byed pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes su// 'joms pa po ni rab tu gnas// ji skad gsungs pa'i gzugs gsum gyis// nam mkha'i khams ni kun tu gang //
323b7(rgyud 'bum): yi ge'i gzugs ni kun bskyed nas// bdag nyid snying khar rnam bsam bya// snying kha'i gzugs ni de rnams su// lha yi rnam par sgom par byed// slar ni sngags pas bsdu bar bya// de nyid la ni gzhug
324a1(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / cho ga shes pas bskal pa'i mer// bsams nas bsams gtan yang dag brtsam// zla 'od lta bur 'bar ba ni// btsun mo rtag tu bsgom par bya// lha nyid yang dag
324a2(rgyud 'bum): bskyed nas ni/ / de yi dbus su rnam bsgom bya// rang gzugs snying khar bsams nas ni// de yi dbus su rnam bsgom bya// rang gzugs snying khar bsams nas ni// ha yig tu ni rnam bsgom bya// 'di de
324a3(rgyud 'bum): sngags rnams thams cad kyi/ / bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs byed// 'di ni dang po'i bsam gtan brjod// rab tu 'bad pas bsgom par bya// rtag tu rigs kyi bdag po yis// bskal par bsregs
324a4(rgyud 'bum): par rnam bsgoms nas/ / sngags pas de yi rnam pa de// bsam gtan brtson pas bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas gzugs kyis rab sbyor gyis// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor sgom pa ni// rang gi gzugs kyis kun
324a5(rgyud 'bum): bskyed nas/ / ba spu'i khung bu 'di spro bya// ji skad gsungs pa'i gzugs gsum gyis// nam mkha'i khams ni kun tu bkang // 'od zer lnga yi rab sbyor gyis// rang lus su ni rab gzhug bya// rig ma
324a6(rgyud 'bum): rgyal mo sogs sbyor bas/ / de rnams thams cad yongs brtag bya// sangs rgyas kun gyis mkha' khams ni// yongs su gang bar rnam bsgom bya// rang lus su ni rnam bsgoms nas// thams cad der ni rab
324a7(rgyud 'bum): gzhug bya/ / gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por/ rig ma'i tshul la sogs pa'i las can gyi le'u ste bcu gsum pa rdzogs so// // de nas
324b1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen pos gsang sngags thams cad kyi gsang chen rig ma'i tshul gyi las gsungs pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par// dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa//
324b2(rgyud 'bum): dpag tshad kyi ni grangs kyi khyon// kun nas yongs su zlum por ni// gsal ba gsal bar mtshungs bsams nas// dbus su bdag nyid rnam bsam bya// 'bad pas gnas lnga rnams su ni// rnam snang
324b3(rgyud 'bum): mdzad chen gzugs bsams nas/ / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// de rnams thams cad yongs brtag bya// snying khar rdo rje sems dpa' ni// yang dag bskyed nas rnam bsgom bya// cho ga shes
324b4(rgyud 'bum): pas nyi rnam par/ / nam mkha'i khams ni gang bar byed// lha la sogs pa'i sbyor ba yis// slar yang de ni rab gzhug bya// de nyid tshul ni dge ba 'di// rigs kyi dbye bas rtogs par bya//
324b5(rgyud 'bum): gzhan du gsang ba'i bsam gtan ni// rnam par spangs pas 'grub mi 'gyur// gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por/ rig ma'i las kyi le'u ste bcu
324b6(rgyud 'bum): bzhi pa rdzogs so/ / / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad lha thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi tshul bzlas pa'i cho ga ston par mdzad do// nam mkhar 'bru ni ston par
324b7(rgyud 'bum): ram/ / gang du sems ni rab dgyes byed// dbang chen dkyil 'khor bsams nas ni// rang gi dkyil 'khor mchod bsgom bya// me tog bzang po de dbus su// de nyid sbyor bas bsgom par bya// rang gzugs
325a1(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya chen po ni/ / bsgom bya gzhan du brtson mi bya// snying kha'i dbus son phra mo ni// dri med ye shes dkyil 'khor ni// gsal ba 'od dkar 'bar la sogs// chu yi rnam par dgod/
325a2(rgyud 'bum): par bya// de la sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig/ dang po gsang ba rnam bsgom bya// rtse mo lnga pa rnam bsgoms nas// slar yang de nyid la sbyar bya// blo dang ldan pas gnas lta ru// gzugs brnyan yang ni yang dag bskyed
325a3(rgyud 'bum): de nyid yi ge'i tshul mthun pas/ / bsam gtan 'byung ba bsgom par bya// cho ga shes pas yig rnams kyis// 'phreng ba bskyed nas bsgom par bya// nas kyi tshad 'di thams cad du// bsam gtan 'byung ba
325a4(rgyud 'bum): bsgom par bya/ / rab tu 'bad pas 'og der ni// rtag tu nam mkha' gang bar bya// de nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gang ba de la grags pa yin// yi ge gcig gi gsang sngags kyi// rang gzugs rnam par
325a5(rgyud 'bum): bsgom par bya/ / rigs kyi bdag po 'byung ba ni// yi ge gsum gyis rtag shes bya// yi ge lnga la sogs bzung bas// ji srid yi ge 'byung ba'o// 'od dkar 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba sogs// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba
325a6(rgyud 'bum): mnyam pa'i 'od/ / rigs kyi dbye bas las rnams kyi// thog ma tha ma 'di bya'o// ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab rnam par// in+d+ra nI la mtshungs pa'i 'od/ 'od zer 'bar 'khrugs gtso bo'i yum// yid kyi bsams
325a7(rgyud 'bum): pas 'grub par 'gyur/ / pad+ma rA ga dbang mdog 'od// dmar po 'bar ba mtshungs pa'i 'od// 'jig rten khams ni kun nas su// cho ga shes pas snang bar bya// ge sar ser po dang mtshungs pa// ser po 'od zer 'bar
325b1(rgyud 'bum): la sogs/ / sgom pa'i go 'phang gis bsgom bya// the tsom med par bsgrub par bya// de nyid 'byung ba gang gsungs pa// rang gzugs yang dag bskyed nas ni// snying khar me tog bsams nas ni// dkyil 'khor de la
325b2(rgyud 'bum): bsgom par bya/ / cho ga shes pas de'i steng du// snying po phyag rgya rnam bsgom bya// ji lta'i go 'phang kun bskyed nas// ye shes de nyid rnam bsgom bya// b+ha gar a yig nges phyung nas// sangs rgyas mchod pa la
325b3(rgyud 'bum): sogs bya/ / 'jig rten khams ni kun nas so// cho ga shes pas spro bar bya// thog ma bar dang tha mar ni// slar yang bsdu bar bsam par bya// zla 'od lta bur yang dag sbyor// rang lus su yang bsgom par bya/
325b4(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni de nyid tshul dge ba// rigs gsum du yang rtog par bya// bya dang byed pa yang dag sbyor// sgom pa de ni 'grub par byed// sems kyi kun sbyor mtshan nyid kyi// gal te chags la chags par 'gyur//
325b5(rgyud 'bum): bsam gtan 'dus la rab bzhugs nas// de la gzhug par bsgom par bya// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi sgrub pa po// sgrub po rnams kyi de nyid 'di// dngos grub sgrub la dam tshig
325b6(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam bsgoms nas// ral pa'i cod pan 'dzin bzhin pa// sangs rgyas slob dpon yang dag bskyed// snying khar de ni dgod par bya// drag sngags mchog gi phyag rgya ni// bsams
325b7(rgyud 'bum): nas de yi snying khar dgod/ / 'thung dang za ba'i dus rnams su// nye bar longs spyod byed rnams su'ang // dri dang gzugs sogs bya ba rnams// 'di ni de kho na nyid brjod// lha sbyor sangs rgyas slob dpon gyi// rang gi
326a1(rgyud 'bum): bde ba rtag tu ni/ / cho ga shes pas dbul bar bya// gzhan du 'grub par mi byed nyid// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs byed// ye shes rnams ni kun/
326a2(rgyud 'bum): gyis gsang // sngags kyi dngos grub byed de nyid// rang gzhan sems can thams cad kyi// 'chi ba de bzhin 'phrog par byed// de bzhin rang gzugs bsams la sogs// bsten dang yon rnams kun dang ldan//
326a3(rgyud 'bum): 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas ye shes rab sgrub pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa' rab sgrub pas// rdo rje ye shes sprul pa'o// gnas gzhi rnams kyi kun sbyor gyis// lha yi sbyor ba mtshungs pa la//
326a4(rgyud 'bum): cho ga shes pas gzung bar bya// rig pa 'dzin par de brjod bya// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// de nyid bya ba dri med bzang / de yi sngags kyi sku byed pa// bsdus pa yis ni bsgom par bya// thun bzhir bas
326a5(rgyud 'bum): gtan 'di nyid ni/ / de nyid dam tshig gar mkhan no// thams cad du ni rigs dbye ba// bsdus pa yis ni bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam bsgoms nas// 'khor lo de yis rnam bsgom
326a6(rgyud 'bum): byang rang lag tu ni yang dag bskyed/ / ji srid srog de gtang mi bya// rdor sems la sogs sgom byed pa// bsdus pa yis ni rigs gsum du'am// rdo rje sems dpa' byin rdibs// sgrub pos rtag tu
326a7(rgyud 'bum): bsgrub par bya/ / 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// dngos grub thams cad rab bsgrub pa'o// sngags rnams kun gyis mnyes pa dang // dngos grub dam tshig ston pa po// de nas bcom ldan 'das
326b1(rgyud 'bum): rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'byung ba'i rdo rje zhes
326b2(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di ston par mdzad do/ / dam tshig dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa// gang de thams cad nyid bya ste// shar du rang gi phyag rgya yis// mi bskyod pa ni dgod par bya// lho ru de la cho ga las//
326b3(rgyud 'bum): rin chen 'byung ldan bri bar bya// cho ga shes pas nub tu ni// 'od dpag med ni mnyam par bri// cho ga shes pas byang phyogs su// don yod grub pa mnyam par bri// dbus su rtag tu bsdus pa yis// sangs
326b4(rgyud 'bum): slob dpon kun tu bri/ / rtse mo lnga pa'i rdo rje che// 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas rnam brgyan pa// rnam kun sangs rgyas slob dpon gyis// rab tu 'bad pas bsgrub par bya// phyag rgya rnams ni thams cad du// ut+pal sngon
326b5(rgyud 'bum): po mtshungs pa'i 'od/ / rtse mo bcu gcig chen po yi// rdo rje'i rnam pa kun tu bri// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// phyag rgya thams cad kun tu bri// mkhas pas phyag rgya chen po ni// 'khor los
326b6(rgyud 'bum): sbyar ba zhes bshad do/ / snying po'i dkyil 'khor grwa rnams su// pad+ma dang ni u t+pal bri// rin chen bzhi yi kha dog tu// de rnams dbus su mnyam par bri// 'dod pas lha rnams thams cad kyi// lha gzhan de
