326b7(rgyud 'bum): ni yang dag 'byung / / sgo ru bdud rtsi 'byung ba dang // 'thun pa ru ni mnyam par bri// dkar po nag po de bzhin dmar// ser po ljang khu nyid dang ni// rtag tu bsam gtan gdan la gnas// de la dgod par bya ba yin/
327a1(rgyud 'bum): cho ga shes pas de re rer// 'joms byed bdag nyid can gyis gzhom// de la rtag tu gsang ba'i mchod// sgo bzhi ru ni rab tu brtsam// slob mas ma dang chung ma mchog/ sring mo dang ni bu mo
327a2(rgyud 'bum): bri cho ga shes pas longs spyad bya/ / dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni// rgyal byed rgyal ba'i rigs de la// phyag rgya dgod par rab tu grags// dziHrdo rje chen po'i rigs mchog la// dzaHyig rnam par rtag
327a3(rgyud 'bum): tu bya/ / dzaHphyag na pad+ma'i rigs byung la// AHyig dag ni rtag tu bya// AH'dod pa'i rigs kyi cho ga las// ji ltar rigs pa'i AHyig go// AHde bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'byung ba'i rdo rje
327a4(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po rdzogs so/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das sgrub pa dang nye ba'i sgrub pa ston par mdzad do// nya chang bza' ba'i gsang mchod sogs// mngon dgyes gyur nas
327a5(rgyud 'bum): gang du sems/ / sems can mi ldan gnas par byed// de la dam tshig chen po yi// rnal 'byor brtsam par bya ba ste// de yi sangs rgyas sogs dngos grub// zla ba gcig gis de mthar phyin// ye shes 'khor los
327a6(rgyud 'bum): bskal pa yis/ / de tshe de bzhin 'grub par 'gyur// thog mar zla ba gsum du ni// dang po'i rnal 'byor brtsam par bya// phyag na rdo rje'i rigs 'byung la// 'dir ni sngags chen bsgrub par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes
327a7(rgyud 'bum): kyi rigs la sogs pa rnams kyis dngos grub kyi dam tshig rin po che 'chang bar byed pa gsungs pa/ rnam par snang mdzad ces gzugs su// de ru bdag nyid yang dag bskyed// rang sngags tsakr-i zhes brjod na// 'khor lo'i
327b1(rgyud 'bum): rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ / rnam par snang mdzad ces par bshad// der ni bdag nyid yang bdag bskyed// rang sngags khan+taM zhes brjod na// ral gri'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// rang nyid rnam par snang
327b2(rgyud 'bum): mdzad ces/ / der ni bdag nyid yang dag bskyed// rang sngags pad+ma zhes brjod na// pad+ma'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// rang nyid rnam par snang mdzad ces// der ni bdag nyid yang dag bskyed// rang sngags
327b3(rgyud 'bum): tri shU laM zhes brjod/ / rtse gsum rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// rnam par snang mdzad ces bshad par// der ni bdag nyid yang dag bskyed// rang sngags badz+raM zhes brjod na// rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin pa
327b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / rang sngags rnam par snang mdzad ces// der ni bdag nyid yang dag bskyed// rang sngags aM ku shaM byas na// lcags kyu zhes par mngon par brjod// rang nyid rnam par snang mdzad ces// der ni
327b5(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid yang dag bskyed/ / rang sngags pA shaM zhes brjod na// zhags pa'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// phyag rgya che sogs mtshan nyid kyis// rang gi gzugs ni yang dag bskrad// de nyid yid bzhin nor bu
327b6(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ rigs gzhan dbye bas rtogs par bya// 'di ni dam tshig sgrub thabs te// sgrub pa po yis bsgrub par bya// skye ba 'dir ni 'grub par 'gyur// rang sngags dril bu'i tshul gyis ni// rang nyid bdag
327b7(rgyud 'bum): rang nyid du/ / khru gang tsam du yang dag bskyed// sangs rgyas kyis kyang mthong mi 'gyur// cho ga shes pas bzhi rnams kyi'ang // de nyid sbyor bas bsgom par bya// gzugs ni dbus su rnam bsgoms nas//
328a1(rgyud 'bum): myur du 'grub 'gyur gzhan du min// gzugs su sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid kyis// der ni bdag nyid yang dag bskyed// rang sngags ut+pal laM byas nas// ye shes rig pa 'dzin
328a2(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / zla ba'i gzugs su rnam bsgoms nas// nam mkha'i steng du yang dag brtsam// snying khar rdo rje yang dag bskyed// ye shes rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// zla ba'i gzugs ni yang dag bskyed//
328a3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje rin chen rnam bsgom bya// ji srid dag pa'i bdag nyid 'dod// de srid mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur// zla ba'i gzugs su yang dag bskyed// rdo rje pad+ma lag par dgod// pad+ma'i spyan ni bsgom par
328a4(rgyud 'bum): byangs bdun gyi ni dbang phyug 'gyur/ / zla ba'i gzugs ni rnam bsgoms nas// 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrug pa'i 'od// sangs rgyas gzugs ni kun bskyed nas// sangs rgyas rig pa
328a5(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin par 'gyur/ / rdo rje'i gzugs su rnam bsgoms nas// sangs rgyas lnga ru rnam bsgom bya// 'od zer lnga yis kun bkang nas// sangs rgyas sku dang mtshungs par 'gyur// rgyas pa'i nyi
328a6(rgyud 'bum): gzugs rnam bsgoms nas/ / las kyi rdo rje snying khar dgod// rang gi sngags ni yang dag bskyed// rdo rje'i sku dang mnyam par 'gyur// zla ba'i gzugs ni rnam bsgoms nas// badz+ro haM zhes bsgom
328a7(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / snying khar rtse mo lnga pa 'am// rdo rje'i sku dang mnyam par 'gyur// zla ba'i gzugs su rab bsgoms nas// rdo rje 'bar bas rnam brgyan pa// rdo rje sems dpa' rang gi gzugs// sems dpa'i
328b1(rgyud 'bum): gzugs ni 'dzin par 'gyur/ / zla ba'i gzugs su yang dag bskyed// 'khor lo 'bar bas rnam brgyan pa// rang gi gzugs ni sangs rgyas gzugs// sangs rgyas gzugs ni 'dzin par 'gyur//
328b2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i gzugs ni yang dag bskyed// pad+ma 'bar bas rnam brgyan pa// rang gi gzugs ni chos kyi gzugs// chos kyi gzugs ni 'dzin par 'gyur// zla ba'i gzugs ni yang dag bskyed// dkar po
328b3(rgyud 'bum): 'bar bas rnam brgyan pa/ / 'dod pa'i mchod pa rang gi gzugs// 'dod mchod gzugs ni 'dzin par 'gyur// dang por yi ge gcig pa sogs// rig pa'i rgyal po stobs po che// rigs kyi bdag
328b4(rgyud 'bum): po'i phyag rgya yis/ / rang gi phyag rgya sogs bsgoms pas// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ru// mchog tu phra ba'i bdag can bya// de nyid dam tshig dbus su ni// rdo rje'i gzugs ni sgom pa'o// nyi ma'i
328b5(rgyud 'bum): gzugs ni rnam bsgoms nas/ / mu dro haM zhes sgom pa ni// snying khar sngags yig byas nas ni// bskyed de 'dir ni the tsom med// sngags pas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor can// bsams nas dbus su gzugs
328b6(rgyud 'bum): bsgom bya/ / rdo rje'i gzugs ni yang dag bskyed// bsam gtan 'byung bas bskyed par 'gyur// nye sgrub cho ga byas nas ni// dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya// rdo rje sems dpa'i cho ga las// de yis 'jig
328b7(rgyud 'bum): rten gsum skab 'gyur/ / dang por rang gnas ri gnas su// zla ba drag tu bzlas byas nas// sgrub pa po yis rtag tu bsgrub// rdo rje sems dpa' lhag par gnas// ji ltar klu mo lha'i bu mo// mi mo'am yang
329a1(rgyud 'bum): lha min mo/ / ji ltar rigs par bkug nas ni// gsang ba'i mchod pa yang dag brtsam// rnam par dben dang yid 'ong dang // nags dang dgon pa rnams su yang // de ru bkug nas
329a2(rgyud 'bum): nyer longs spyod/ / 'dod yon lnga yi mchog rnams kyis// ye shes rdo rje rab bskul bas// dam tshig mnyan par bya ba yin// rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid kyang // cho ga shes pas dgug par bya// rang gi phyag rgya
329a3(rgyud 'bum): de rnams gzugs/ / rang gi brjod pa de rnams sngags// de nyid phyag rgya bcings nas ni// rang gis sngags 'di bzlas par bya// mtshan mo phyed du ji ltar bya// nyi ma'i gung la'ang de bzhin brjod// lcags
329a4(rgyud 'bum): klu'i snying po de nyid kyis/ / de rnams rab tu bsgrub par bya// bskal pa bsreg pa ltar bsams nas// rdo rje mtshungs pas// snying pos lcags kyu sbyar byas nas// bkug la dbang du bya ba yin// khro bo chen po
329a5(rgyud 'bum): gshin rje gshed/ / de bzhin du ni rta mgrin dang // rdo rje'i dbyug dang bcom ldan 'das// 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag por brjod// khro bo chen po mi g.yo ba// khro gnyer can yang gang zhig 'gyur// khro bo chen
329a6(rgyud 'bum): po stong po me khams gsum yang dag dbang du byed/ / bdud rtsi zhes bya'i khro bo che// stobs chen pha rol gnon pa po// rdo rje mi phyed gsum gnas pa// sangs rgyas kyang ni skyod par byed// rig ma chen mo dra
329a7(rgyud 'bum): sogs ni/ / bcas pa'i phyag rdor stobs kyis ni// rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid kyang // khams gsum pa yang 'bebs par byed// pho nya chen mo rdor sen mo// rab gtum la sogs rdo rje can// nam
329b1(rgyud 'bum): mkha'i khams kun gang ba yi/ / dug ni skad cig la 'joms byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dam tshig thams cad rnam par skrod par byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
329b2(rgyud 'bum): par zhugs nas/ rdo rje gshin rje mthar byed ces bya ba'i rdo rje'i sngags 'di gsungs so// na mo badz+ra dz+nyA nA ya/ sa ma ya satwA nAM/ ka ra ka ra/ ku ru ku ru/ ma ma kAr+yaM b+hany+dza b+hany+dza sar+b+ba big+h+nAM da ha da ha/ sarba bi
329b3(rgyud 'bum): nA ya kA mur+N+Na Ta ka dzI bi tAn+ta ka ra/ ma hA bi kr-i ta/ rU pi ne pa tsa pa/ sarba duSh+TaM/ ma hA ga Na pa Ti/ dzI bi tAn+ta ka ra b+han+d+ha ban+d+ha/ sarba gra haM/ Sha Da mu kha Sha Da b+hu dza/ Sha Ta tsa ra NaM/ ru dra mA na ya/ biSh+Nu mA na ya

330a1(rgyud 'bum): pa zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di ston par mdzad do/ / oM badz+ra khu ra bi kr-i tA na na hUM phaT/ de nas 'di ni gsungs cam la// bcom ldan chos 'chang de nyid ni// de bzhin gshegs
330a2(rgyud 'bum): kun kun skrag pa'i/ / ched du brjod 'di ched brjod mdzad// e ma'o sngags rnams thams cad kyi// rnam kun de nyid stong pa po// 'joms byed rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis// sangs rgyas thams cad gzhag
330a3(rgyud 'bum): par gyur/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po nam mkha'i khams thams cad kun tu snang bar byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ sngags chen po 'di ston par byed do//

330a7(rgyud 'bum): par zhugs nas/ mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di gsungs so// na maHsa man+ta badz+ra NAM/ a tsa la kA na he he mo ha ya mo ha sa/ ha sa ha sa/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ A bi sha A bi sha/ ma hA ba mar+d+ha tsa la d+hu na d+hu na/
330b1(rgyud 'bum): / ti na ti nA/ khA da khA da/ big+h+na mA ra ya mA ra ya/ duSh+TAM b+hak+Sha ya b+ha ShA ya/ sar+b+baM ka ra ka ru/ ki ri ki ri/ mA hA bi Sha ma badz+ra s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya hUM hUM traM ba li ta radz+nyA nan+ta kaHAt+ma A hA A hAM/ a tsa la tseH
330b2(rgyud 'bum): s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ hUM a/ !sa man+ta ki tra Ta/ ma hA be la sA ta ya/ traM hAM mAM shud+d+han+na lo ka stu Shu tu/ bad+d+hi na mo stu a pra ti ha ta ba le b+h+yo dzA la ya tra Ta/ a sa ha ni maHswA hA/ de nas mngag gzhug gi khro

330b7(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi kun tu snang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi gnas pa ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod par mdzad do// e ma'o sngags rnams kun gyi ni// chos kyi 'dod chags kun
331a1(rgyud 'bum): bsdus pa/ / rdo rje ye shes lta bu ste// sngags kyi dngos grub ces bshad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das slar yang kun nas spro pa'i rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting
331a2(rgyud 'bum): nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje stobs po che zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA ba la ha na da ha pa tsa bi d+h+waM sa ya uts+tshaSh+ma kro d+ha hUM phaT/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam la
331a3(rgyud 'bum): b com ldan 'das gsang ba chen po 'dzin pa de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa gang yin pa ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod par

331a6(rgyud 'bum): ban d+ha ban d+ha/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ ha na ha na/ gar+dz+dza gar+dz+dza/ bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya/ dz+wa la dzA ya/ pra dz+wA la pra dz+wA la/ gra saMs gra sa/ sarba big+h+na bi nA ya kAM/ bid+yA d+ha re ke lI ki la dz+wa li ta hu ta ba ha shi ra ma hA
331a7(rgyud 'bum): / b+haib+he ra be nir+g+ho Sha/ saMn+nin+da ts+tshin+da ma hA badz+ra d+ha ra tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ b+han d+ha b+han d+ha/ bdag che ge mo'i bi nA ya ka hr-i da yAM s+pho Ta ya/ gar+b+ha dza hr-i da yAM s+pho Ta yi/ nA ga hr-i da yAM s+pho Ta ya/ yak+Sha hr-id yAM s+pho Ta ya/ brah+ma rak+Sha sa hr-i da yAM s+pho Ta ya/ sarba gra
331b1(rgyud 'bum): ha hri da yAM s+pho Ta ya/ sarba dzA ra hr-i da yAM s+pho Ta ya/ sarba ts+tsha tur+b+bi ka hr-i da yAM s+pho Ta ya/ hUM kA re phaT phaT/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ bi kurba bi kurba/ A bi sha A bi sha/ ma hA badz+ra d+ha ra A dz+nyA pa ya ti swAH

331b4(rgyud 'bum): so/ oM e h+ye hi b+ha ga ba ti ma hA badz+ra gan+d+ha ri tra yA nAM/ rat+na nAM/ sa t+yain/ A kaD+D+h+ya A kar+N+Na/ ba la de baM/ ma he shwa raM/ ga ru NaM/ biSh+Nu/ ku mA raM/ brah+maNAM/ in+d+ra/ tsan+d+ra/ A di t+yaM/ ya maM'aM/ ba ru NaM/ ku ba ra/
331b5(rgyud 'bum): d+h+r-i ta rAm+b+ha/ bi nAn+ta kaM/ biR+ShA pA k+ShaM/ shang+ku kar+N+NaM/ dwi kir+N+NaM/ tri kaN+DaM/ go kar+N+NaM/ s+phu la kar+N+NaM/ ma hA kar+N+NaM/ nan+di kre shA raM/ b+h+r-i gau rI Ti/ nA ya kaM/ bi nA ya kaM/ pAny+dzi kau/ lo ha kau/ ShaSh+NI de dI/
331b6(rgyud 'bum): r-i/ ai kA raM/ dur+m+ma kA t+yA ya d+h+waM/ tsaN+Da kA d+hA ya NAM/ ma hA kAM t+ya ya NAM/ aM shA nAM/ na r-i tAM/ kA lI/ mA hA kA lI/ badz+ra kA lAM/ ya sha sI nI/ sa kA lI/ b+hadra kA lI/ ag+ne yAM/ bA la b+haM/ ha li kA/
331b7(rgyud 'bum): baibidz+r-i/ shAk+ti/ shaMtAM k+ShaM/ in+naN+DaM/ brah+ma NAM/ kau be bI mA haM shwa r-I/ baiSh+Ta ShI/ su b+ha gAM/ tsA mur+N+NaM/ rau dr-i/ bA rA NI/ kau be rI/ ye tsA n+ye/ ma ma ye na/ tiSh+Than+ti tA n+ya brta yi Sh+yA mi shIg+h+raM gr-ih+Na gr-i h+Na
332a1(rgyud 'bum): phul hu lu/ tsu lu tsu lu/ mu lu mA lu/ d+hu ma d+hA ma/ rang+ga rad+na/ b+hu ra s+ya pU ra ya/ A bI shwa a bi shwa/ b+ha gu ba ti/ mahA badz+ra gAn+d+ha ri sid+d+h+ya ts+tshid+d+ha/ badz+ra p+tAN+Di nA dz+nyA pa yat+ma/
332a2(rgyud 'bum): haHhaHhaHhaHhUM phaT swAhA/ 'di gsungs pa tsam la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje chen po'i tshul gyis bskor bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshi rigs pa thams cad kyi rig ma de sgom pa
332a3(rgyud 'bum): byed pa 'di ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod pa mdzad do/ / e ma'o sngags rnams kun gyi ni// kun gzhi 'bebs par byed pa bdag/ rdo rje rtsa can gang 'di dran// sangs rgyas la sogs 'bebs par
