332a5(rgyud 'bum): mu khi/ ha na ha na/ pa tsa pa tsa/ rang+ga rang+ga/ alpA alpa/ A bi sha A bi sha/ ha ya grI bA pa ya ti swA hA/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam la ji srid du dug chen po de rnams thams cad de rab tu bsgom
332a6(rgyud 'bum): pas bcom bzhin du gyur to/ / de nas rig ma de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rab tu btud nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod pa mdzad do// e ma'o sngags rnams kun gyi ni// dug rnams thams
332a7(rgyud 'bum): cad sel ba bdag/ pho nya'i mchog gang de brten nas// sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par sbyangs// de nas bcom ldan 'das slar yang rdo rje gsum mi phyed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhug nas
332b1(rgyud 'bum): / rdo rje gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di gsungs so// oM dzi na ri Ti TaM hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po 'di sems
332b2(rgyud 'bum): can thams cad kyi bde ba'i nor gyis nye bar bkang nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod par mdzad do/ / e ma'o sngags rnams kun gyi ni// bskyed pa yang dag 'byung ba dag/ sangs rgyas
332b3(rgyud 'bum): byang chub rab sgrub don/ / bskal pa'i rgya mtshor bdag gnas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das slar yang chos kyi dbyings su spro bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas
332b4(rgyud 'bum): / ral pa gcig ma zhes bya ba'i rig ma'i rgyal po mchog 'di gsungs so// na maHsarba ta thA ga ta b+h+yaHsarba bid+yA ga Ne b+h+yaHoM e h+ye hi b+ha ga wa ti/ yak+Shi NI ye/ mA pa Ti i Ti pa TaM dzo su ra su ra
332b5(rgyud 'bum): pra ma tha ni/ aM ka dza Ti ni rak+ta sa hi de bi ma bi he tha ya ni/ ri pi ti ri ka ri/ ta pI ri/ ka pA lats+tsha dra/ pri ye ma hA ka pA li bi le/ ma hA tsa pa le/ sid+hi sarba ar+thA sA ya/ sarba satwa big+h+na pra sha ma ni
332b6(rgyud 'bum): swA hA/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das pad+ma 'chang ba de nyid nam mkha'i khams thams cad rnam par spros nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi cod pan du gnas nas ched du brjod nas
332b7(rgyud 'bum): ched du brjod par mdzad do/ / e ma'o sngags rnams kun gyi ni// sngags kyi bdag nyid can 'byung ba// rgyal ba kun gyi zhi gang de// rnam par bsgoms pas mchod par byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das
333a1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo thams cad kun tu skrag par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje chen po khro gnyer can 'di gsungs so// oM b+ha ya nA shA ni trA sa yA trAs
333a2(rgyud 'bum): yang b+h+r-i ku Ti ta Ti bai ta Ti shwe te dza Ti ni swA hA/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam la bcom ldan 'das zhi ba 'chang ba de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par mchod nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched
333a3(rgyud 'bum): du brjod par mdzad do/ / e ma'o sngags rnams kun gyi ni// Ta gang sangs rgyas yang dag 'byung // chos kyi yum ni rab sgrub don// 'di ni bskyed par gsungs pa yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das
333a4(rgyud 'bum): slar yang ye shes 'du bar byed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang gi rigs kyi snying po 'di gsungs so// oM A ro li ka/ de nas bcom ldan 'das sems can thams
333a5(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rigs kyi yum 'di gsungs so// oM ru ru s+pha ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa ne sarba ar+tha sA ni swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das slar
333a6(rgyud 'bum): / yang rang gi sku rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ sngags 'di gsungs so// oM shang+ka re shAn+ti ka re g+hu Te g+hu Ta g+hu Ti ni g+hu Ti ni/ g+hA ta ya g+hA tA ya/ g+hu Ti ni phaHhUM swA hA/
333a7(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes bskyed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang gi sngags 'di gsungs so// oM shwe te pA NA ra bA saM ni dzaT+Ta
333b1(rgyud 'bum): mu ku Ta d+hA ri Ni swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rig pa'i rgyal po 'di gsungs so// oM d+huH/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
333b2(rgyud 'bum): rig pa rgyal po la bka' stsal pa/ i sum+b+ha ni sun+d+hu nAM/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM/ A na ya ho b+ha ga wAn bid+yA rA dza hUM phaT swAhA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das chos rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba
333b3(rgyud 'bum): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ sngags 'di gsungs so// oM oM mri tod+ha bod+b+ha bA ya swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das nyon mongs pa 'joms pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
333b4(rgyud 'bum): nas/ nyon mongs pa za ba'i sngags gsungs so// oM kle shA Sha ni bi dza ye swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ chos kyi 'khor lon
333b5(rgyud 'bum): gtsug tor 'di gsungs so/ / oM ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ dIp+ta tsekra hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzi brjid kyi mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
333b6(rgyud 'bum): par zhugs nas/ gzi brjid kyi phung po 'di gsungs so// oM dz+wa la dz+wa la/ d+ha ka d+ha ka/ da ra da ra/ bi da ra bi da ra/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das slar yang rnam par
333b7(rgyud 'bum): rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rgyal ba'i gtsug tor 'di gsungs so// oM dza~M liSh+T+r-i Shadz+wa le dz+wa la ban+d+ha b+han+ta da ma da ma/ hUM hUM hUM/ ha na ha na hUM phaT/ de nas bcom
334a1(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das dkar po 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ gtsug tor gdugs dkar po 'di gsungs so// oM ma ma ma ma hUM niH/ de nas bcom
334a2(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rig ma chen mo'i mchog 'di gsungs so// oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ de nas bcom
334a3(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nges par sgrogs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ khro bo gzegs ma'i sngags chen po 'di gsungs so// oM ka ni d+hu ni hUM phaT/
334a4(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten gsum 'gugs par byed pa'i sngags shin tu na ma rungs pa'i las te/ ji srid du gdon gzhan 'byung ba gang yin pa de'ang de kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor bsgoms pas las rnam pa gsum byed do// /
334a5(rgyud 'bum): mi g.yo zhes bya khro bo che// gshin rje mthar byed gsum byung ba// kun nas sangs rgyas zhes rnams su// khams gsum pa yang nges 'joms byed// khro bo chen po rta mgrin dang // khro gnyer rim par ldan gyur
334a6(rgyud 'bum): gang / / rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid kyang // khro bo 'di yis 'joms par byed// stobs chen bdud rtsi zhes grags dag/ mi shes 'jig cing 'phrog byed pa// nam mkha'i khams dang mtshungs pa yang //
334a7(rgyud 'bum): the tshom med par 'joms par byed// 'bum du bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis// kun tu son par byed pa yin// blo ldan sangs rgyas nyid thob pa'ang // 'gugs par byed par the tshom med// khro gnyer tse kaH
334b1(rgyud 'bum): rig ma/ / 'jigs pa yang ni 'jigs par byed// lha min chen po sogs sbyor bas// g.yul du rgyal bar byed pa yin// khro bo gzegs mi mchog rtsor skyes// sngags pas 'bum phrag gcig bzlas bya//
334b2(rgyud 'bum): khro bo'i sems kyis sbyar byas nas// nges par sangs rgyas kyang 'jig byed// lag par de ni yang dge bskyed// mi sma der son bsam pa yi// pha rol dpung ni rings par byed// brgya byin gyi yang the tshom med/
334b3(rgyud 'bum): gzi brjid phung po bzlas nas ni// 'bum phrag gsum du legs bskor nas// brgya byin sde yang rengs par byed// 'ga' zhig min par 'joms par bstan// sgrol ma sgrol len yang dag 'byung // 'bar
334b4(rgyud 'bum): ba'i ye shes dge 'byung ba/ / 'og gi sbyor ba bsgoms pa yis// rdo rje'i ste yang rangs par byed// de yi snying po'i mchog skyes gang // rigs dang rigs dbang rigs par byed// de dang yang ni 'di nyid du/
334b5(rgyud 'bum): sbyor bar bsams nas bsam gtan gyi// ting 'dzin bsgoms pas ser po 'am// gzhan du dmar po nges sbyar bya// bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de skad ces gsungs so// sngags thams cad kyi
334b6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u bco lnga pa rdzogs so/ / / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis sngags thams cad kun las btus pa'i le'u gsungs so// zhi brgyas pa
334b7(rgyud 'bum): sogs las la/ / rang gzugs rnam pa bsgoms pa yis// thugs kar ye shes yang dag 'byung // cod pan ye shes chos dbang phyug/ sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam bsgoms nas// rin chen sna
335a1(rgyud 'bum): tshogs mtshungs pa'i 'od/ / rnal 'byor pas bsdus gong bur bya// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam bsgom bya// khro bo rnams kyi ston pa 'di// rdo rje 'byung ba sgom byed pa// de yi
335a2(rgyud 'bum): ngo bo rnam bsgoms pas/ / rigs dang rigs su 'di bstan no// rigs kyi dbang phyug rnam bsgom nas// kha dog lnga pa legs mdzes par// bsgoms pa'i go 'phang gis bsgom bya// slar yang rigs
335a3(rgyud 'bum): kyi bdag po'i sngags/ / 'di nyid bsgom par bya ba ste// gtsug tor yang ni rnam bsgom bya// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// dgyes dang mgu bar byed par bshad// dngos grub thams cad byed par
335a4(rgyud 'bum): 'dod/ / rdo rje ye shes sogs rdzogs byed// rig ma la sogs thams cad kyi'ang // rig pa'i rgyal po rnam 'joms byed// pho nya mos kyang thams cad kyi// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam bsgom pa// 'dod
335a5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur sngags rnams thams cad kyi/ / rang gzugs rnam pa bsgom pas so// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// sngags kyi dam tshig 'byung ba ste// sangs rgyas kun gyis phan 'dod pas// rdo rje dpa'
335a6(rgyud 'bum): bopo'i mchog gis gsungs/ / sngags thams cad kun las btus pa'i le'u bcu drug pa rdzogs so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
335a7(rgyud 'bum): skrod par byed pa'i las 'di gsungs so/ / skrod pa la sogs bya ba la// sangs rgyas de nyid ye shes can// khro bo gsum po bsdus pa yi// rdo rje 'byung bas grags pa nyid// gshin rje gshed ni ye shes rigs//
335b1(rgyud 'bum): bsdus pa'i 'don la mchog rtser skyes// khro bo chen po rta mgrin ni// chos kyi ye shes rigs su bshad// stong phrag gam ni brgya yang rung // ther 'bum gcig tu bzlas nas ni// rang nyid sangs
335b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyas zhes pa yang / / cho ga shes pas sprod par byed// thod pa gsum la kun bzhag nas// lho yi phyogs kyi dur khrod du// 'dod pa 'di ni yang dag brtsam// rdo dang shing gi sbyor ba yis//
335b3(rgyud 'bum): dngos po med pas yang dag brtsam// rdo dang phub ma yang dag ldan// gza' dang gsal byed rnam par spangs// khrag dang phabs su yang dag ldan// nim pa'i 'dab mas bza' bya ba// ta la'i 'dab
335b4(rgyud 'bum): ma la bri bya/ / sngags pas 'khrul 'khor smad par bya// tsher ma can gyis bris nas ni// nim pa'i 'dab ma khar bcug nas// sbyor ba'i gnas su gzhag par bya// lha chen po yi 'og tu ni/
335b5(rgyud 'bum): dri ma med pa kun bzang bya// cho ga shes pas lan bdun du// mngon par bsngags te yang dag brtsam// dgra yi sgro lam yang na grong // grong khyer ram ni kun 'byung ba'i// gnas 'di rnams su phung
335b6(rgyud 'bum): po ni/ / kun nas skrod par byed pa yin// snying po de la mdor bsdus pas// bya ba cog pu'i rten la 'dug/ dri ma med pa'i gzugs byas nas// khro bo khro bo'i mchog 'byung ba// yon tan stong phrag kyang
335b7(rgyud 'bum): bskyed nas/ / rtag tu sangs rgyas kyang thob byed// nyi ma bdun nam so sor byas// gal te 'ga' zhig mi 'gro na// mgo bo tshal pa bdun du 'gas// mi phyed rdo rje rang gis gsungs// de bzhin gshegs pa
336a1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad skrod pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa rdzogs so/ / / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje sems dpa' mnyes par byed pa'i
336a2(rgyud 'bum): las 'di gsungs so/ / sangs rgyas slob dpon 'dab bzang nyid// rdo rje'i skyil krung du gnas te// bya dka'i nye bar longs spyod kyis// gang de 'tsho zhing gnas par byed// brjod pa'i lhag ma bstan par bshad//
336a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ba dang ni gar nyid dang // de bzhin 'bel gtam du mi 'gyur// mthon po min nyid slob ma yis// chos kyi dus su'ang sdig pa sogs// gnas bya gal te rmongs pa de// mnar med gnas su 'tshed par
336a4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / sngags tsam gal te tshangs pa la// lag pa gnyis kyis yang dag brtsam// ji srid nam mkha' yang dag 'byung // mnar med gnas su 'tshed par 'gyur// bud med gsang min brjod bya min// gang
336a5(rgyud 'bum): zhig la la slob dpon ched/ / bde dang lus sems sdug bsngal ba// sbyor ba ji srid 'tsho yi bar// gal te slob dpon rnams kyi bka'// dga' ba'i sems kyis byas gyur na// de tshe bdag la sangs
336a6(rgyud 'bum): rgyas sogs/ / 'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med// de la ji srid 'tsho yi bar// brda yis kun tu gnas par bya// dku ru brten pa'i lag pa sogs// ji srid 'tsho bar mi bya'o// dngos grub 'bras bu don
336a7(rgyud 'bum): gnyer bas/ / slob dpon ming nas smos mi bya// ji srid nam mkha' yang dag 'byung // mnar med dmyal bar 'tshed par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa ji lta ba de bzhin du bya'o zhes so// bza' ba la yang rang
336b1(rgyud 'bum): slob shes/ / sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam bsgom bya// de yi ming gi yi ge gang // ji srid 'tsho bar brjod mi bya// sangs rgyas grangs med bsad byas nas// sdig pa 'di ni khyad par 'phags// gang
336b2(rgyud 'bum): tshe kha cig yon tan 'dis/ / bstod na bsod nams yang dag 'byung // de tshe slob dpon rtogs med pas// gzhan du gal te rmongs pa bdag/ de tshe ngu 'bod du 'tshed 'gyur// gang tshe ba
336b3(rgyud 'bum): mA pA ti/ / gus pas nyan sogs bsnyen pa gang // de tshe slob ma sngags zhu dang // ji ltar kha cig slob dpon rnams// bang ba dngos su mthong bar 'gyur// gang zhig la la slob dpon rnams/
336b4(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid thig nag 'tshod cing 'tshed// de dag ngu 'bod du 'tshed 'gyur// slob dpon gang nyid tshol byed pa// de ni de la dbul bar bya// gzhan du dngos grub med pa nyid// ji srid slob ma'i ma rtag
336b5(rgyud 'bum): slob dpon gyi/ / chung ma'i don du bsgrub par bya// yang na sring mo de byin nas// 'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med// slob dpon gang zhig slob ma'i phyir// phyag 'tshal ba ni bsgrub par bya// bskal pa drug
336b6(rgyud 'bum): cur de dmyal ba'i/ / sdug bsngal myong bar 'tshed par 'gyur// de ltar yon tan khyad 'phags kyi// zla ba drug gis rab gsal bya// gal te gzhan du bdag rmongs na// mnar meng lta bur 'tshed par
336b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / gang nyid slob dpon tshol byed pa// de nyid so sor bsgrub par bya// rdo rje ye shes rab bskul bas// dngos grub yangs par de 'gro 'gyur// yon tan 'di rnams gang gis 'gas// bsod
337a1(rgyud 'bum): nams 'byung bar shes par bya/ / slob dpon 'di yi rgyud la sogs// de lta bu sogs gsal bya min// de ltar bdag nyid dag pa thob// chos kyi de nyid cho gas gnas// de yi/
337a2(rgyud 'bum): slob rab gsal bar bya// myur du 'grub 'gyur gzhan du min// sangs rgyas gnas la gnas pa yis// gang de mgu nas rdor sems mchog/ myur du 'grub byed gzhan du min// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas
337a3(rgyud 'bum): nyid 'thob pa/ / de mgu byed pa mchog 'byung 'gyur// de yis 'jig rten gsum 'grub ste// sangs rgyas ye shes nyid kyang ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba rdo rje sems dpa' mnyes par byed pa'i le'u
337a4(rgyud 'bum): bco brgyad pa rdzogs so/ / / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen pos sngags thams cad kyi le'u gsungs so// skyed mos tshal dang rnam par dben// chu klung rab tu
337a5(rgyud 'bum): 'bab pa dang / / ri dang rnam par bkra ba ru// bsgrub pa'i go 'phang gis bsgrub bya// zla ba gcig gis grub par 'gyur// gal te min na de 'grub min// dben dang gzhan pa'i yul rnams su// sems ni gang du rab
337a6(rgyud 'bum): dgyes byed/ / gsang sngags 'bar bas byin brlabs pa// de las sangs rgyas nyid 'grub 'gyur// rgya mtsho dang ni chu klung che// ri bo chen po'i rtse rnams su// yan lag tha dad min sngags bzlas// nges par zla bas
337a7(rgyud 'bum): 'grub par byed/ / ske tshe dug dang yang dag ldan// rig ta'i shing gi sbyin sreg gis// bsnyen pa sogs ni de bskyed nas// gsang sngags sgrub pa kun spyad bya// de la sdom pa bzung nas ni// nges par 'grub byed
337b1(rgyud 'bum): gzhan du min/ / gsang sngags cho ga kun thob nas// sngags pas bsnyen par 'grub par byed// de phyir sngags pas khyad par gyi// sdom pa so sor bsgrub par bya// gang nyid sdom par yang dag brjod//
337b2(rgyud 'bum): de nyid brtul zhugs can gyis bsrungs// gzhan du nam mkha' ji srid par// mnar med dmyal bar kun tu 'byung // ji srid 'tsho bar cho ga bzhin// slob dpon sdom pa srung ba la// de yi sangs rgyas
337b3(rgyud 'bum): nyid du 'grub/ / sna tshogs 'dzin pa kun gzhi yi// mnyam med gsang sngags bzlas nas ni// sgrub pa'i bdag nyid can gyis bsgrub// zla nyi gcig gis 'jig rten gsum// de yis 'grub 'gyur
337b4(rgyud 'bum): the tshom med/ / rnam shes las kyang byung ba'i sngags// 'bum phrag drug tu bzlas nas kyang // rdo rje sems dpa' phyag byas nas// zla ba nya la de 'grub 'gyur// sngags dang phyag rgya'i rab dbye bas//
337b5(rgyud 'bum): nges par sangs rgyas kyang thob byed// phyag rgya'i dbye ba rab bkod pa// nges par lha rnams spyan drangs med// dag bdag gang nyid tshol byed pa// de nyid rtag tu 'bad bya'o// mkhas pas rab mchog sangs rgyas
337b6(rgyud 'bum): la/ sogs pa'i phyag rgya bcings byas nas// de rnams sngags ni bzlas nas ni// rtag tu nges par sbyin par bya// sngags pas rgyal po'i bu mo gang // gal te sangs rgyas bu mo'ang rung // bzung nas nye bar longs
337b7(rgyud 'bum): spyad bya/ / ji srid yid ni tshim par gyur// dug dang ske tshe yang dag ldan// yungs kar til mar bsres pa dang // rus pa rdo bar yang dag ldan// ma tri traM de phye mar bya// bshang dang gci ba rab bcug nas/
338a1(rgyud 'bum): brtul zhugs can gyi khyad par gyis// zur gsum mgrin pa'i me la bsreg/ nges par myur du 'grub par byed// lha sbyin zhes ni byas nas ni// gang gis 'di ni rab gsal byed//
338a2(rgyud 'bum): gal te 'dir ni sangs rgyas rung // gang gis de thal bar byed par 'gyur// mkhas pas mtshan mo phyed la yang // nyi ma'i gung la sbyin sreg byo// bskal pa gcig gi bar gyi yang // sbyin byed gzhan du
338a3(rgyud 'bum): nam yang min/ / gal te sangs rgyas sam 'ga' zhig/ rmongs pa'i sems kyis 'das na ni// mgo bo tshal pa bdun du 'gas// byang chub sems ni rang gi gsungs// rengs dang 'bebs pa dang por
338a4(rgyud 'bum): grags/ / gnyis pa sa zhes bya bar brjod// gsum pa lha yi mchog yin no// bzhi pa 'phags pa'i yul du yang // phyag na rdo rjer grags pa yin// snying po kun gyi sbyor ba yis// bya ba myur du
338a5(rgyud 'bum): 'grub par byed/ / rig pa sna tshogs sogs dang gnas// skyed mos tshal dang dbang ston tshe// dkyil 'khor de la bya ba ni// bdug pa byin nas yang dag brtsam// gal te brgya byin nas tshangs pa/
338a6(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas sam yang blo gros che// cho ga shes pas zhag bdun gyis// 'joms 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med// cho ga shes pas khrag gis byugs// rang nyid rang gi lus su bya// skra grol gtsug
338a7(rgyud 'bum): tor gyur nas ni/ / mi sdug mchog gtsigs 'jigs par byed// dur khrod khyim du yang dag sbyor// rang gis de yi ming bri bya// stong phrag gcig tu bzlas nas ni// nges par sangs rgyas kyang 'dzin //
338b1(rgyud 'bum): cho ga shes pas gshar ba'i gos// khro bo'i sems kyis rab zhugs nas// ling ga rkang pas mnan nas ni// sangs rgyas kyang ni nges par 'joms// khyab 'jug lha min la sogs lha// rkang par byas
338b2(rgyud 'bum): nas brtsam par bya/ / cho ga shes pas nyin bdun gyis// khams gsum po yang 'joms par byed// bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po sngags thams cad 'chang bas de skad ces gsungs so//
338b3(rgyud 'bum): le'u bcu dgu pa rdzogs so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen pos sgrub po thams cad kyi sdom pa'i le'u gsungs so// bshang dang gci ba bza' bar
338b4(rgyud 'bum): bya sems can kun la bde ba sbyin/ / rdo rje 'chang rgyal de nyid ni// kun mchog sa yi dbang phyug go/ sma dgu las ni yang dag byung // 'ga' zhig tu ni bza' bar bya// rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal//
338b5(rgyud 'bum): kun mchogs yi dbang phyug go/ 'dod chags bza' bar bya ba ni// phan dang bde ba thams cad sbyin// de ni rdo rje 'chang rgyal po// kun mchog sa yi dbang phyug go// zhe sdang bza' bar bya ba ni/
338b6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje ye shes rab rtogs byed// de nyid rdo rje 'chang rgyal po// kun mchog sa yi dbang phyug go/ gti mug bza' bar bya ba ni// ye shes thams cad rtog pa po// de nyid zhi ba na rgyal ba// sangs
338b7(rgyud 'bum): rgyas rnam par snang mdzad gzhi/ / bde sdug bza' bar bya ba ni// slob dpon ji srid 'tsho yi bar// de nyid zhi ba 'dzin rgyal po// sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad gzhi// slob dpon ji srid 'tsho yi
339a1(rgyud 'bum): bar nga chos dang chos min bza' bar bya/ / de nyid rdo rje 'chang rgyal po// kun mchog de nyid ston pa po// ji srid 'tsho bar 'ga' zhig tu// sems can khams ni bza' bar bya//
339a2(rgyud 'bum): de nyid rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// kun mchog sa yi dbang phyug go/ ji srid 'tsho bar smad pa yi// bya ba thams cad mi bya'o// de nyid pad+ma 'chang rgyal po// kun mchog sa yi dbang phyug go/ de nas de bzhin gshegs
339a3(rgyud 'bum): pa rnams thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi chos nyid dang yi ge thos nas ngo mtshar thob nas/ rdo rje 'chang thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni ngo mtshar
339a4(rgyud 'bum): tegang du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bdag po de dag gi ming yang shes par bya ba ma yin na gzhan lta ci smos zhes so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
339a5(rgyud 'bum): mdzad chen po'i thugs kar gnas nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags yid bzhin nor bu'i le'u bstan par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa
339a6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni g.yo bar byed pa zhes bya ba bstan du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams
339a7(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi gnas lngar yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i sngags kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u 'di gsungs so/ / byin rlabs la sogs sngags sogs kyis// de nyid sna tshogs rnam sgom pa// cho ga shes pas de steng du// yi ge
339b1(rgyud 'bum): bzhi ni rnam sgom pa/ / bdag nyid dbus su son byas nas// rang gi gzugs su gzugs mtshon pa// rang sems byang chub yang dag 'byung // cho ga shes pas kun dgod bya// de yis sangs
339b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyas nyid 'grub 'gyur/ / sgom pa 'di 'di rab sgrub kyad// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// shel dang zla ba mtshungs pa'i 'od// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// lnga yi yi ge
339b3(rgyud 'bum): rnam bsgom nas/ / yi ge lnga ni rnam bsgom bya// sngags pas lus kyi dbus son par// oM yig ser po dang mtshungs pa// 'od zer lnga po kun tu 'khrugs// der son bdag nyid sngags pas
339b4(rgyud 'bum): bsgoms/ / dbus su hUM yig yang dag sbyor// rang gzugs dge ba bsgom par bya// 'dzam bu nA da mtshungs pa'i 'od// gzugs brnyan tshul gyis bskyed nas ni// mtshan nyid thams cad yongs
339b5(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs pa/ / yid du 'ong ba sgom par gyis// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan de rnams su// 'od zer lnga ni rnam bsgom bya// rnam snang mdzad gzugs 'od zer gyis// nam mkha'i khams ni kun bkang
339b6(rgyud 'bum): bar bsams nas cho ga shes pas der/ / bsdus nas de la ltung bar bya// zla ba 'char bas mtshan pa yi// mnyam med gzugs ni bskyed nas ni// gsal ba'i ral pa 'chang zhi ba// cod pan lnga ni
339b7(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pa po/ / sna tshogs 'od zer mnyam pa'i 'od// sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam bsgoms nas// dkyil 'khor du gzhug bsams nas ni// de yis sngags ni rnam bsgom bya// sangs rgyas gzugs ni de rnams su/
340a1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems dpa' rnam bsgoms pas// gtsug tor de yi bzlas par bya// khro bo gang gzhan 'byung bas kyang // rigs rnams thams cad nyid kyi yang // bskyed pa'i cho gar 'gyur ba
340a2(rgyud 'bum): yin/ / rdo rje gsum kun tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rdzogs so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje 'chang chen po rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
340a3(rgyud 'bum): gsungs so/ / cho ga shes pas de thams cad// oM yig dbus su rnam bsgom bya// 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas rnam brgyan pa'i// hUM yig mthar ni rnam bsgoms nas// dbus su rdo rje 'chang bsams nas// in+d+ra nI
340a4(rgyud 'bum): la mtshungs pa'i 'od/ / zhi ba ral pa'i cod pan 'chang // phyag na rdo rje rnam bsgom bya// rnam par snang mdzad rnam bsgoms nas// 'od zer sna tshogs mtshungs pa'i 'od// bsams nas de yi thugs ka
340a5(rgyud 'bum): ruzla bar sngags kyi yi ge sgom/ / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rdzogs so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos bcom ldan 'das spyan
340a6(rgyud 'bum): ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ting nge 'dzin 'di gsungs so/ / de bzhin nyid du kun byas nas// dbus su haM yig sgom pa ni// ngos su rang gi gzugs ltar bya// rdo rje dmar po rnam bsgom bya// dbus su chos
340a7(rgyud 'bum): 'chang bsams nas ni/ / pad+ma rA ga'i dbang mtshungs pa// phyag na pad+ma 'dab brgyan pa// de yi dbus su rnam bsgom pa// thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// bsams nas sngags ni rnam bsgom bya//
340b1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbang phyug gi ting nge 'dzin gyi cho ga rdzogs so// / cho ga shes pas gzugs byas nas// ngos su haM yig yang dag sbyar// dbus su rang gi
340b2(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa sgom/ / 'dzam bu nA da mtshungs pa'i 'od// 'dod mchog gzugs ni bskrad par bya// lag tu mdung rtse gsum bsgoms nas// de yi snying khar dkyil 'khor dgod// chos kyi dbang phyug
340b3(rgyud 'bum): gzugs bsgoms nas/ / phyis nas bya ba yang dag brtsam// sgron ma 'byung ba zhes bya ba// bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa'i mchod pa'i ting nge 'dzin rdzogs so// // yang na
340b4(rgyud 'bum): brtul zhugs can gyis ni/ / bsdu bas sangs rgyas gzugs bsgom bya// gtsug tor sngags dang khro bo dang // rig pa'i rgyal po rig bcas pa// las rnams thams cad pa yi sngags// go rims
340b5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du de bzlas bya/ / dbus su bdag po bsgoms nas ni// ngos su lha rnams dgod par bya// snying po sbyor ba de rnams su// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// sngags kyi yi ge mchod bsgoms nas/
340b6(rgyud 'bum): de yis lha rnams rnam bsgoms pas// thams cad kyi ni lag par ni// rdo rje 'khor lo pad+ma sgom// mdung dang yid bzhin nor bu yang // bsgoms nas myur du sgrub par byed// sngags pas rang sngags bzlas byas/
340b7(rgyud 'bum): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms pa yis// ngos su zla ba yang dag sbyor// dbus su ser po rnam bsgom bya// bsdus te gong bu'i tshul gyis ni// rang gi lus la dgod par bya// sangs rgyas thams cad rab bskul bas//
341a1(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni rengs par byed pa'i mchog/ dus rnams kun tu rnam bsgoms nas// nges par bskal par de gnas 'gyur// cho ga shes pas mi bskyod sogs// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la dgod//
341a2(rgyud 'bum): bya rigs kyi dbang phyug rnam bsgoms na// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dgod pa ni// thog ma tha mar bsam gtan 'di// bzhi yi dbus su bsam par bya// de yis sangs rgyas nyid sgrub na// yun mi ring
341a3(rgyud 'bum): bar sangs rgyas 'gyur/ / de yi rang gi sngags kyi mchog/ phyag rgya shes nas sgrub pa po// cho ga shes pas bskyed par bya// myur du 'grub byed gzhan du min// phyag rgya chen por rab bsgoms nas// nam
341a4(rgyud 'bum): mkha'i lam gyi dbus las ni/ / dbus su nyi ma dang mtshungs pa'i// dkyil 'khor dge ba bsgom par bya// sngags pas dkyil 'khor las ngos su// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// bdag po'i gzugs ni
341a5(rgyud 'bum): yang dag bskyed/ / de yis mi g.yo bsgom par bya// rin chen bzhi byung sgro nga ru// sbrang rtsi mar gyis rab tu dgang // sngags kyi yi ge rnams bsgoms nas// bsam pa de yis sbyin sreg bya// dkyil 'khor
341a6(rgyud 'bum): lnga yi tshul gyis ni/ / dbus su hUM gi yi ge 'gengs// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba'i 'thibs pa ni// kun nas rnam par 'phro bar byed// de la gnas pas lha yi gzugs// tshim pa'i dam tshig gsum 'byung bas// cho ga
341a7(rgyud 'bum): shes pas gtsug tor gyis/ / gtsug tor rnams ni bsgom par bya// bdag po'i sngags ni yang dag bskyed// mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom par bya// kun nas sor mo bcu gnyis pa'o// ut+pal chen po 'das
341b1(rgyud 'bum): brgyad pa/ / chos kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// de nyid kyis ni bsgom par bshad// rtse mo lnga pa'i rdo rje che// ut+pal sngon po mtshungs pa'i 'od// 'phreng ba bcu drug yang dag ldan// rtag tu bsgom bya
341b2(rgyud 'bum): 'grub par 'gyur/ / sngags pas sor mo nyi shu pa'i// rtsa gsum ser po dang mtshungs pa// cho ga nyid kyis bsgoms byas nas// 'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tsom med// pad+ma las kyi rdo rje dang // yid
341b3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin nor bu gsum pa can/ / bdag po'i sngags ni yang dag bskyed// myur du sgrub byed gzhan du min// 'khor lo de bzhin pad rdo rje// bsams nas rdo rje'i cho ga las// sgom pa'i go 'phang gis
341b4(rgyud 'bum): bsgrub bya/ / gzhan du 'di ni 'grub mi 'gyur// rdo rje chen po dung sogs bcas// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba mtshungs pa'i 'od// kun gyi las can gsang sngags kyi// brjod pa rnams kyis brjod byas
341b5(rgyud 'bum): nas ral gri 'bar bas 'khrugs pa'i sems/ / 'phro zhing 'thibs pa kun tu 'khrug/ khru gang tsam du yang dag bskyed// khro bar byed pas khyad par bya// pho nya mngag gzhug sogs sngags rnams//
341b6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor sgom pa'o// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor sbyor ba las// sgom pas mchog tu mtho bar 'gyur// dbyug pa tho ba dgra sta dang // zhags pa panI sa sgom pas// cho gas bsgom par byas nas ni//
341b7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje 'chang rnams mnyes par byed// 'di de sngags rnams thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi sgom pa ste// rdo rje ye shes can gyis gsang // ye shes dngos grub can du brjod// bcom ldan
342a1(rgyud 'bum): 'das rdo rje 'chang gis de skad ces gsungs so/ / gang zhig dngos grub mchog 'dod na// cho ga shes pas sbyin sreg bya// de nyid gsang ba'i ting 'dzin gnas// rnam pa
342a2(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs sbyin sreg brtsam/ / dkyil 'khor bzhi yi sbyor ba las// rigs kyi las ni sgrub par byed// oM yig sngags kyi dbye ba yis// sgom pas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhi ba can la
342a3(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor zlum/ / rgyas pa can la zur bzhi pa// mngon spyod la ni gru gsum mchog/ dbang bya gzhu yi rnam pa'o// zhi la ma yi dbus son par// bdud rtsi lta bu bsgom par bya// de nyid la ni lha yi
342a4(rgyud 'bum): gzugs/ / rang gi tshul gyis bsgom par bya// bdag nyid bdag po'i tshul gyis ni// 'di ni rdo rje'i tshul las byung // kha ni rab tu gdangs byas nas// me stag 'thibs pas 'khrugs pa yi// sngags pas lce
342a5(rgyud 'bum): yi dbus son par/ / hUM yig de yis bsam par bya// bcom ldan 'das sbyin sreg rdo rjes de skad ces gsungs so// cho ga shes pas 'o ma sbrang // mar ni zhi ba'i rigs la spyad// mar khu chen po'i bye brag
342a6(rgyud 'bum): las ye shes rdo rje'i rigs su brjod/ / zhi ba rdo rje slob dpon gyi// snying kha'i dbus son rnam bsgom bya// yid bzhin nor bu lag bsams nas// 'di ni dag pa'i tshul mchog go// rnam par snang mdzad
342a7(rgyud 'bum): gzugs brnyan che/ / pad+ma'i yon tan 'byung ba la// gzugs ni 'dod chags rigs mchog go// gzugs ni 'dod mchod rdo rje can// las bzhi'i rab tu dbye ba las// sngags kyi yi ge dgod byas nas//
342b1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i sbyin sreg rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad ces gsungs so// gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
342b2(rgyud 'bum): sngags yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i le'u ste nyi shu pa rdzogs so/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das phyuphyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs kyi sngags kun
342b3(rgyud 'bum): las btus pa zhes bya ba'i snying po'i le'u 'di gsungs so/ / sangs rgyas rdo rje chos chen po// 'dod pa'i dam tshig dgyes pa po// sngags rnams thams cad yang dag dmigs// de yi bsam
342b4(rgyud 'bum): gtan rab bskul bya/ / dam tshig ye shes sangs rgyas kun// rigs dmigs dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni// gzugs ni sangs rgyas mtshungs pa'i 'od// oM yig ye shes dbye ba yis// 'di
342b5(rgyud 'bum): ni rdo rje'i tshul bstan pa'o/ / ral pa'i cod pan longs spyod pa// kha dog dkar po shin tu mdzes// phyag bzhi pa la spyan yangs pa// me stag 'thibs pas kun tu 'khrug/ rnal 'byor mchod
342b6(rgyud 'bum): phyir thog la sogs/ brgyan cing dkyil 'khor la sogs pa// cod pan du ni rdo rje sems// mdzes pa'i gzugs ni rgyal ba'i gzhi// dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyor bas// 'di ni bsam gtan tshul
342b7(rgyud 'bum): mchog go/ sku yi rdo rje sbyor sogs kyis// mngon shes lnga yi rab sbyor las// rkang gnyis mchog de nyid shes pas// thod pa can gyis gtso bo brjod// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'di ye shes// rigs
343a1(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin no/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms
343a2(rgyud 'bum): par zhugs te/ rdo rje thams cad kyi dam tshig gi snying po 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni// dbus su gzugs ni rab brtag bya// nag po shin tu rnam
343a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ba/ / ma rungs zhal ni rnam par gdangs// me stag 'thibs po 'bar ba ste// 'jigs pa yang ni 'jigs par byed// phyag bzhi pa ste rab 'bad pas// dbang po gnyis kyi rab sbyor las//
343a4(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni rdo rje tshul bstan pa'o// rdo rje thugs sogs yang dag grub// rab tu gnas pas de bsgrub bya// 'dod chags rdo rje rab bskul bas// dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya// rdo rje dam tshig ces
343a5(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes chos thams cad 'chang ba'i dam tshig byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ chos 'chang ba'i dpal
343a6(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so/ / chos kyi dkyil 'khor sbyor ba las// dbus su gzugs ni rnam bsgom bya// dmar po 'dod chags 'dzin pa 'bar// sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa yi// phyag bzhi pa la
343a7(rgyud 'bum): yid 'ong ba/ / dbang po gnyis kyi rab sbyor bas// 'di yi cho ga bsgoms pa ni// 'di ni 'dod chags tshul bstan pa'o// gsung gi rdo rje gtso dngos grub// rdo rje chos rab sbyor sogs kyis// snying rje'i bdag
343b1(rgyud 'bum): nyid can gyis sgrub/ / sgom pa yang ni myur 'grub byed// chos 'chang ba'i dam tshig gi dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyug na rdo rjes rdo rje dam tshig gi rigs byin gyis rlob
343b2(rgyud 'bum): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di gsungs so// 'dod pa'i dkyil 'khor bsam gtan gyis// gzugs
343b3(rgyud 'bum): ni dbus su dgod par bya/ / khyab bdag zhi ba ser po'i mdog/ spyan gsum brtul zhugs can gyis bsgom// kun tu dag pa'i shal dang mtshungs// me stag tshogs ni kun tu 'khrugs// phyag bzhi par
343b4(rgyud 'bum): ni cho ga yis/ / bsgom bya myur du 'grub par byed// rdo rje'i mthar thug nor dngos grub// rab tu gnas pas de bsgrub bya// 'di de sngags rnams thams cad kyi// thar pa'i ting nge 'dzin snying po can// sku
343b5(rgyud 'bum): gsung thugs kyi bsgoms pa ni/ / rdo rje sems dpas sprul pa yin// rdo rje mdung gi dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// ji srid gzugs ni kun sbyor ba// de la lha nyid rab tu grags// slar yang 'di
343b6(rgyud 'bum): yi tshul gyis ni/ / skyed par byed pa'i cho gar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas de skad ces gsungs so// rang gi sngags yig dbye bas sam// yang na rigs kyi rig pa yis// rigs kyi bdag
343b7(rgyud 'bum): po'i sngags kyis sam/ / brtul zhugs can gyi rig rgyal pos// thams cad las can sngags kyis dang // gtsug tor sngags kyis rnam bsgom bya// 'di de sngags rnams thams cad kyi// gsang ba'i
344a1(rgyud 'bum): de nyid gsungs pa yin/ / bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes de skad ces gsungs so// zhi ba'i las kyi rab dbye bas// rigs kyi sngags su rab tu grags// rgyas pa can la rigs
344a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi sngags/ / sgom pas nges par 'grub par byed// dbang du bya ba'i cho ga la// rig pa'i rgyal pos bsgom par bya// thams cad las can sngags ni// mngon spyod rnam par sgom par byed// skrod par
344a3(rgyud 'bum): byed pa'i cho ga la/ / gtsug tor du ni rnam bsgom bya// sngags shes pas ni phur gdab sogs// pho nya pho nya mo bsam bya// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes de skad ces gsungs so// 'od zer lnga yi
344a4(rgyud 'bum): tshul gyis ni/ / rtog pas de la bsgom par bya// gzhan du dngos grub med pa nyid// sgom pa rnams su shes par bya// rigs kyi las kyi rab dbye bas// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi rnam bsgoms pa'o// sngags
344a5(rgyud 'bum): kyi yi ge'i rab dbye bas/ / bsgom bya dngos grub thob par 'gyur// snying kha'i dbus son phra mo ni// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi rnam bsgom pa// stong du bkod pa'i dbye ba yis// 'di ni bsam gtan tshul mchog go//
344a6(rgyud 'bum): / dkar gnag dmar po'i sbyor ba las// bsam gtan thams cad du brtag bya// gzhan du dngos grub med pa nyid// sngags rnams kun tu bzlas par bya// hUM yig oM yig dbye ba yis// swA hA hUM yig gzhan gyi
344a7(rgyud 'bum): gzugs/ / bskyed pa'i cho ga byas nas ni// bsnyen pa gang zhig nges bsgrub bya// rigs gsum la yang hUM yig dang // oM yig ye shes rigs mchog yin// sngags kyi yi ge la sogs rnams// dpral
344b1(rgyud 'bum): bar bkod nas rnam bsgom bya/ / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gis de skad ces gsungs so// thun bzhi'i sbyor ba la sogs kyis// rdo rje can la bdud rtsi'i gzugs// spro ba dang ni gnas par bya// 'di ni dngos
344b2(rgyud 'bum): grub tshul bstan pa'o/ / sgrub pa rang gi lha yi gzugs// rdo rje can la bdud rtsi'i gzugs// nye bar sgrub pa 'dus pa la// 'di ni dngos grub tshul mchog go/ bdag gi sgrub pa'i las can la//
344b3(rgyud 'bum): bdag po'i gzugs dang yang dag ldan// bsten pa'i dus su rab sgrub pa// gtsug tor gzugs dang yang dag ldan// me stag 'thibs pas 'khrugs pa yi// rang lha'i gzugs dang yang dag ldan//
344b4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje phra rab dbye ba yis// dus gsum sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'o// grags par ldan pa'i dngos grub kun// 'di nyid kyis ni byang chub thob// de yi mchog tu bsgrub par bya// dngos grub chen po'i yon
344b5(rgyud 'bum): tan 'byung / / bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad ces gsungs so// gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po'i sngags thams cad kun las btus
344b6(rgyud 'bum): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa rdzogs so/ / / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'dus par gyur nas/ phyag na rdo
344b7(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i bkod pas yang dag par mchod nas/ gsung gi rdo rje chos kyis gsung gi lam nges par bskyed pa'i rdo rje tshul 'di ston par
345a1(rgyud 'bum): mdzad do/ / gsang ba dag pa dmigs pa med// ye shes yon tan kun gyi gzhi// kun nas ye shes bdag med pa// gsang ba'i ye shes phyag 'tshal bstod// gsang ba'i de nyid
345a2(rgyud 'bum): don dang ldan/ / mchog gi spyod pa rgya mtsho che// kun nas 'dod pa yang dag 'byung // rdo rje ye shes phyag 'tshal bstod// gtso bo'i ye shes ji ltar gnas// rdo rje mi phyed gsum gnas pa// rigs kyi pha
345a3(rgyud 'bum): rol phyin pa thob/ / byang chub spyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// sems can kun skyes can gyi mchog/ sangs rgyas byang chub rab bzhugs mdzad// rang bzhin dag pa dag pa'i mchog/ sems can skyob la
345a4(rgyud 'bum): phyag 'tshal bstod/ / chos sku thar pa chen po ste// yid bzhin nor bu mthong ba che// sems can kun dgyes byed pa po// dag pa'i spyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// de nas yang yid bzhin nor bu'i dam tshig
345a5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpas/ phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de'i mthong ba'i chos kyi yon tan gyi khyad par
345a6(rgyud 'bum): so sor 'dod par bya ba gang ji ltar lags/ de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ byang chub sems dpa' de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// the tshom med par mnyam
345a7(rgyud 'bum): par shes/ / sangs rgyas chos sku 'dong bar bya// the tshom med par 'du shes pa// chos rnams thams cad 'dod par bya// the tshom med par 'du shes pa// 'du byas thams cad 'dod par bya// 'di lta ste/
345b1(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bu zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi sprin gyi sa la rab tu gnas pa ste// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sku dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi longs spyod
345b2(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs pa'i sku dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sprul pa'i sku rnams su rnam par rtog pa med cing the tshom med pa de bdag go zhes chos thams cad kyang nam mkhar mthong bar gyur to//
345b3(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bu mdor bsdus na byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje ye shes zhes brjod par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
345b4(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi skyes bu'i mchog la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das sngags kyi spyad pa spyod par byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di don dam pa'i gsang ba la
345b5(rgyud 'bum): da par ji ltar 'gyur/ 'di lta ste/ yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba stong gsum gyi 'jig rten khams su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su yang dag par byang chub
345b6(rgyud 'bum): nas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ji ltar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gcig pu mngon par rdzogs par
345b7(rgyud 'bum): 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ / rdo rje 'chang bas gsol pa/ ji ltar mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ 'di lta ste/ gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul
346a1(rgyud 'bum): phra rab kyi cha shas su gyur pa'i gzhi'i sems can rnams mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad phyag
346a2(rgyud 'bum): na rdo rje'i tshul 'dir blta bar bya'o/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' de rnams ya mtshan thob cing dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba thob nas de lta bu'i dbyangs 'di gsungs so// e ma'o ye shes ye shes che//
346a3(rgyud 'bum): rdorje chen po rab tu mthong // rmad du byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi// ye shes mig ni rnam sbyangs pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos// de bzhin
346a4(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad dang gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ / snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyis gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dang
346a5(rgyud 'bum): mnyam pa'i 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phyung nas/ shar dang lho la sogs pa'i phyogs mngon par brjod du med pa'i yang mngon par brjod du med pa'i gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul
346a6(rgyud 'bum): phra rab dang mnyam pa'i sku gsum gyi ye shes kyis gang ba mdzad do/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams byon nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// byang chub rang bzhin yang dag
346a7(rgyud 'bum): thob byang chub sems dpa' snying po byin/ / nam mkha'i khams la longs spyod pa'i// rdo rje byang chub rab tu gnas// mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la// spros pa dag ni yod ma yin// rdo rje'i rang bzhin
346b1(rgyud 'bum): ye shes kyi/ / nam mkha' lta bur dri ma med// ces so// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs nas/ rdo rje chos la bos par gyur to// sems dpa' chen po dam tshig gang yin pa de mthong
346b2(rgyud 'bum): ngams bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje skyes bu chen po de'i sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi dbye ba rin po che sbom bu nges par rig nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
346b3(rgyud 'bum): cad dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams rang gi thugs su zhugs par mdzad do/ / de ji lta ba bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rang gi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs nam
346b4(rgyud 'bum): mkha' lta bur sbyor bas yang dag par gnas par gyur to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs yongs su dag pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa rdzogs so//
346b5(rgyud 'bum): / 'phags pa gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so// // mkhan chen thar pa lo tsa ba'i phyag
346b6(rgyud 'bum): dpe'i gseb nas shog yar lnga byung ba sngar bsgyur ba las/ phyis nyang stod smon 'gro'i gtsug lag khang nas rgya dpe lhag ma rnams rnyed nas bsgyur bar rtsom pa na/ dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i phyi nang gzhan gsum
346b7(rgyud 'bum): gyi tshul la mi 'jigs pa'i spobs pa thob pa'i bla ma yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po/ legs par sbyar ba'i skad kyi brda sprod pa'i tshul la blo gros shin tu byang ba'i 'jig rten gyi mig chos grags dpal
347a1(rgyud 'bum): bzang po'i bkas bskul zhing sbyin bdag mdzad nas/ bu ston gyis bsgyur ba'i yi ge pa ni dge slong rin chen rgyal mtshan no// rgyud min rgyud ltar bcos pa yis// chos min sun dbyung bya phyir
347a2(rgyud 'bum): dang / dam tshig snang ba sbal ba'i phyir// ji ltar nus bzhin bsgyur ba lags// 'di don 'byed pa'i 'grel pa dang // rgya dpa'i dpe dbang ma rnyed cing // don zab sgra ni rtogs dka' la// saM skri ta la ma byang bas// sgra don
347a3(rgyud 'bum): ji bzhin ma 'byor pa'i/ / nongs de mkhas rnams bzod mdzad cing // phyis 'byung skad gnyis smra rnams kyis// ma dag shes na bcos par zhu// rgyud chen 'di ni bsgyur ba las// dge ba bdag gis gang thob pa//
347a4(rgyud 'bum): de yis mtha' yas 'gro ba kun// rdo rje 'chang chen nyid gyur cig// sh+ye/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya nI lA ma ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA Ni ru dra tri bI na tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/
347a5(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can drag po gsum 'dul zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das bdud rnam
347a6(rgyud 'bum): par 'joms pa bdud kyi sde dang lhan cig tu 'og min gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi pho brang na thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi
347a7(rgyud 'bum): bye ma snyed kyis rjes su gnang ba 'di lag na rdo rjes zung zhig ces bka' sprul to/ / de nas phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ gnod sbyin bye ba stong phrag bye ba dpag tu med pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ mche ba
347b1(rgyud 'bum): gtsigs pa dang 'tsham pa/ mig me mdag gi phung po 'dra ba/ dbugs me lce ltar 'bar ba/ 'jigs pa'i nga ro can/ pad+ma dang chu lhas lag pa dang dpung pa brgyan pa/ nor rgyas dang dung skyong gis dbu la brgyan
347b2(rgyud 'bum): pa sbrul rin po che 'bar ba'i cod pan thogs pa/ klu dga' bo dang nye dga' bo 'bar bas snyan cha byas pa/ rkang pas sbrul gdug pa 'bar ba mnan cing za ba/ klu'i rgyal po 'dab bzang ska rags su bcings pa/ sbrul
347b3(rgyud 'bum): nag po sa ral khar thogs pa/ bzhin rgyas pa/ smin ma khro gnyer du bsdus pa/ ya sos ma mchu mnan pa/ lce glog ltar 'gyur ba/ gshin rje'i cha byad can/ gsus po che sbrul za ba/ rgya mtsho'i zabs su dpag
347b4(rgyud 'bum): tshad brgyad khri yod pas rkang pa'i pus mor phyin pa/ dbang po dang nyi ma'i steng na bzhugs pa/ lag pa brdabs pa'i sgras 'jigs par byed pa/ a la la zhes bsgrags pas skrag par byed pa/ klu thams cad rlag par byed
347b5(rgyud 'bum): pa gad rgyangs chen po rgod pas kun tu 'khrug par byed pa/ gshin rje'i gzugs can khams gsum 'jigs par byed pa/ klu rnams 'dul bar byed pa de la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes byang chub sems dpa' phyug na
347b6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rjes bstod nas gsung du gsol zhes smras so/ / de nas nam mkha' de nyid la gzhal yas khang dang / 'khor lo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa'i drag po chen pos 'khor bsdus nas/ phyag na rdo rje drag po che/
347b7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje khro ba drag chen 'joms// rdo rje gzi brjid sngags kyi gtso// rdo rje mi thub 'jigs byed che// rdo rje 'phrin las kun don mdzad// thabs 'dul 'khor lo che sku la// 'byung ba lnga yi bdag nyid che/
348a1(rgyud 'bum): mdzes ldan 'od zer can dang ni// mdangs can sgra dbyangs rlung 'byin te// skyed byed las kun sgrub pa la// 'gugs shing sdud dang sdom zhi mdzad// mtha' brtul las rnams
348a2(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa la/ / thig le'i rang bzhin me shigs la// kha sbyor nyi zla'i 'phro 'du las// bgegs rigs stong phrag 'joms mdzad pa// 'khor lo'i bdag po khyod la bstod// sa bon rab tu 'bar ba yis//
348a3(rgyud 'bum): / thabs dang shes rab bsreg gso mdzad// bde chen rab tu gsol mdzad nas// sdug bsngal nyon mongs 'joms la 'dud// oM a kA ro mu khaM sar+b+ba d+har+m+ma NaM A d+ya nut+pan+na twAta oM AHhUM/ zhes bcom
348a4(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das kyis dkyil 'khor gyi lha la bstod nas 'dzud do/ / byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas 'khor rnams spros te/ de nis phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das legs so/
348a5(rgyud 'bum): legs so// de'i phyir 'di'i gsang sngags las thams cad sgrub pa/ sdig pa thams cad 'joms pa/ drag po gsum 'dul ba 'di gsung du gsol zhes brjod nas bskor ba byas te spyan sngar 'khor
348a6(rgyud 'bum): rnams dang lhan cig tu 'dug go/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis gsungs shing byin gyis brlabs pa'i rig sngags 'di gdug pa can rnams 'dul ba'i don du brjod
348a7(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / tad+ya thA/ b+ho b+ho paM nA ga a d+hi pa ta ye/ i daM nI lAm+ba ra d+ha ra sha rI ra/ badz+ra pA Ni hr-i da yaM/ yaHsa mA ti kra mA ta tha/ mA ku la uta sA da naM b+ha bi Sh+ya ti/ tad+ya thA/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ bi bud+d+ha bi bud+d+ha/ mA ti
348b1(rgyud 'bum): kra ma tha/ ha ra ha ra nA gA nAM/ pra ha ra pra ha ra nA gA nI/ ts+tshin+na ts+tshin+da nA ga hr-i da yA ni/ b+hi da b+haM da nA gA marmA Ni/ bi shIR+Shan+ta nA ga sha rI rA Ni/ bi s+pho Ta ya nA ga na ya nA ni hUM phaT/ tad+ya thA/ hUM phaT/ nA ga bi dA ra NA ya hUM phaT/
348b2(rgyud 'bum): nA gota sA da nA ya hUM phaT/ nI la ba sa nA ya hUM phaT/ a pra ti hi ta ba la pa rA kra mA ya hUM phaT/ kr-i tAM tA ya hUM phaT/ kr-i tAn ta rU pA ya hUM phaT/ ro Sha Na ya hU~M phaT/ trA sa nA ya hUM phaT/ kuSh+mA Na Do ta sA de nA ya tsU
348b3(rgyud 'bum): / phaT/ pre ta pi shA tsa bi nA sha ka rA ya hUM phaT/ yak+Sha a pa sma ra bi nA sha ka rA ya hUM phaT/ ha sa ha sa/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ mA ra yA mA ra yA/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ sar+b+ba big+h+nA na bi nA sha ka rA ya hUM phaT/ sar+b+ba sha trUM saM g+ha bi/
348b4(rgyud 'bum): nA ya sha ka rA ya hUM phaT/ oM nI lAm+ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA Ni rA dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ de'i cho ga ni gnod sbyin gyi gdon gyis zin pa la chu la sngags btab ste gtor na gtang bar 'gyur ro// klu zlog par byed na smag shad kyi
348b5(rgyud 'bum): lcug ma 'am/ bal po se'u'i lcug mas bya'o// yi dgas dang brjed byed rnams la ni skud pas bya'o// rims nad med par bya ba dang / gzhogs phyed na ba dang / yi ga 'chus pa la ni skud pa sngon pos bya'o//
348b6(rgyud 'bum): nor 'dod pa la ni zhag gcig smyung bar 'dug ste spos bdugs ni rmi lam du dge ba dang mi dge ba'i don thams cad ston no// mchod rten sku gdung dang ldan pa'i drung du me tog sngon po la sogs pas
348b7(rgyud 'bum): mchod la sngags stong bzlas nas gsol ba btab na gser gyi dong tshe bdun stong sbyin par byed do/ / rgyas btab pa 'grol bar 'dod na thal bas bya'o// sgo lcags dbye bar 'dod na nyungs kar gyis bya'o//
349a1(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs pa thams cad las srung ba la ni rtsi mar rnying pa dang / thal ba dang / nyungs kar gyis bya'o// nad kyis 'jigs pa thams cad la ni skud pa sngon po la srung ba'i mdud pa
349a2(rgyud 'bum): byas te mgul du btags na srung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/ / byis pa gdon gyis nyen pa thams cad la ni tshon sna lnga pa'i skud pa mgul du btags na srung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// chom rkun bzlog par
349a3(rgyud 'bum): 'dod na sas bya'o/ / dug la ni rtswa ku shas byab par bya'o// bdag srung ba la ni yid kyis sam chus bya'o// gzhan srung ba la ni skud pa sngon pos bya'o// las de dag thams cad la sngags brjod pa ni gcig gam
349a4(rgyud 'bum): gsum mam/ lan bcu bzhi 'am/ nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/ brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na 'grub par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje dang / bdud
349a5(rgyud 'bum): dpung dang bcas pa rjes su yi rang ste bstan pa la 'khod do/ / 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can drag po gsum 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud rdzogs so// / bal po'i paN+Di ta
349a6(rgyud 'bum): ba pu N+ya ma ti dang / lo tsa ba dge slong chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// // / rgya gar skad du/ ru dra tri tan+ta gu h+ya bi wa ra ti bI na ya nA ma/ bod skad du/
349a7(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba'i rgyud rnams kyi rnam par 'byed pa drag po gsum 'dul zhes bya ba/ 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas phyag na rdo rje yis// gsang ba'i don 'di yang dag zhus// sgrub dang gnas dang mtshan
349b1(rgyud 'bum): nyid gang / / rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa// shes rab snying rje gsang dbang ldan// lcags 'dri'i ri dang bya skyibs dang // nags tshal 'thug dang mchod rten nang // zhal gsum phyag drug 'jigs
349b2(rgyud 'bum): pa cheb mche ba gtsigs pa nag po ste/ / dkar po g.yas te khros pa'i mdog/ hUM sgrogs ma lce 'bar ba'i dbugs// dmar ser g.yon te bzhad pa'i zhal// spyan dmar me dpung dang 'dra ba// zla ba rgyas
349b3(rgyud 'bum): pa lta bu'i zhal/ / nor rgyas dung skyong ser pos dbu// dga' bo nye dga' snyan cha dmar// dpung pa pad+ma chu lha dkar// se ral 'dab bzang rigs ldan gnag/ tsham rngam rdo rje sdigs mdzub dang //
349b4(rgyud 'bum): thal mos bdud 'joms sbrul nag 'dzin// zhal gsum pa ste 'jigs pa che// sku gsum dag gis rab tu mtshan// pho nya gsum gyis gdug pa 'dul// klu yi gnyen po'i gnod sbyin bdag/ bdud
349b5(rgyud 'bum): 'dul tshangs pa'i pho nya ni/ / zla dang nyi ma dag gi steng // glang chen kar ka gser gyi gdan// brgya byin ser po rdo rje 'dzin// tshangs pa ral gri pad+ma 'dzin// klu 'dul sbrul nag 'dzin pa'o// bdud 'dul
349b6(rgyud 'bum): dbang po nyi ma'i steng / / gnod sbyin zla dang stobs kyi sde// klu 'dul ri steng rgya mtsho'i nang // sbrul nag 'khyil ba stobs ldan te// mkha' dang ri bos mnan pa'i steng // gsar mdog stobs ldan gnyis
349b7(rgyud 'bum): kyi gdan/ / brgyad khrir zhabs bzhag ri rab mnan// me dpung sku la 'khrugs pa'i 'od// khams gsum khyab mdzad khro bo 'phro// sangs rgyas 'dus pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor
350a1(rgyud 'bum): nis rdo rje me dpung 'od dang ldan/ / de nyid mkha' dang 'byung ba las// dur khrod brgyad dang ldan pa'i gnas// bdag po'i sa bon las byung ba// bla nyi thod pa rdo rje las// drug po'i rtags/
350a2(rgyud 'bum): ldan gtso bo che// mdzes ldan sku la yang dag 'khril// drag chen 'dul mdzad dri za'i gtso// mdog dkar rtse gsum 'bar ba 'dzin// 'od 'phro dkar mo sku la 'khril// 'joms mdzad spu gri 'bar ba 'dzin//
350a3(rgyud 'bum): mgon po gzi brjid gshin rje'i bdag/ mdog ser dbyug tos gshin rje 'dul// mdangs ldan ser mo sku la 'khril// 'ja' 'dra ba yi zangs gri bsnams// 'brug sgra sgrog pa'i klu yi gtso// mdog dmar kla
350a4(rgyud 'bum): 'dul sbrul gyi zhags/ / sgra yi lha mo sku la 'khril// mdog dmar gcod pa'i ste'u bsnams// 'phrin las khro bo gnod sbyin bdag/ ljang nag be con gnod sbyin 'dul// rlung 'byin ljang khu sku la 'khril//
350a5(rgyud 'bum): 'bar ba'i 'khor lo phyag na bsnams// 'gugs pa lcags kyu lcags kyu ste// sdud pa zhags pa zhags pa'i bdag/ sdom pa lcags sgrog lcags sgrog ste// zhi mdzad dril bu dril bu zhi// kha sbyor ba de dang longs
350a6(rgyud 'bum): spyod dang / / chos dang sprul pa'i 'khor lo la// sa bon rab tu 'bang ba yis// thabs dang shes rab bsreg gso mdzad// nyi ma zla ba'i 'phro 'du las// thig le'i rang bzhin mi shigs la// gsang
350a7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rgyud kyi rnam par 'byed pa drag po gsum 'dul zhes bya ba las le'u dang po'o/ / / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// gsang ba'i sngags ni khyod kyis zung // las rnams
350b1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad 'grub pa dang / / sdig pa dag ni zhi ba'i phyir// klu dang gnod sbyin bsdigs pa dang // bdud rnams ma lus zhi byed pa'i// dus gsum sangs rgyas byin brlabs pa'i// rdo rje can gyi sngags bshad
350b2(rgyud 'bum): byatad+ya thA/ b+ho b+ho pan nA ga a d+hi pa ta ye/ i dA nI lAm+ba ra d+ha rA sha rI raM/ badz+re pA Ni hr-i da yaM/ yaHsa mA ti kra mtha/ mA ku la uta sA da naM/ b+ha biSh+yat+ti/ tad+ya thA/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ bi bud+d+ha bi bud+d+ha/ mA tI
350b3(rgyud 'bum): kra ma tha/ ha ra ha ra nA gAnAM/ pra ha ra pra ha ra nA gA nAM/ ts+tshin+d+re ts+tshin+da nA ga hr-i da yA ni/ b+hin+da b+hin+na nA ga marmA Ni bi shIr+yaM tu nA ga sha rI rA Ni/ bi s+pho Ta ya/ nA ga na ya nA ni/ tad+ya thA hUM phaT/ nA ga bi d+ha ra NA ya hUM phaT/
350b4(rgyud 'bum): na gota sA da nA ya phaT/ nI la ba sa nA ya phaT/ a pra ti he ta ba la pa rA kra mA ya phaT/ kri tAM tA ya phaT/ kr-i tAM ta rU pA ya phaT/ ro Sha NA ya phaT/ trA sa nA ya phaT/ kusmr-i Do ta sA da nA ya phaT/ pre ta pi shA tsa bi nA
350b5(rgyud 'bum): sha ka rA ya phaT/ yak+Sha a pa sma ra bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ ha sa ha sa/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ sar+b+ba big+h+na na bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ sar+b+ba sha tr-I saM g+ha bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ nI lAm+ba ra
350b6(rgyud 'bum): / d+ha ra badz+ra pA Ni rA dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ zhes pa 'phreng ba'i gsang ba'i sngags so// sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gis gsungs pa'i rig sngag 'di ni/ sdig pa thams cad 'dag pa dang / ma rungs pa thams cad 'jom
350b7(rgyud 'bum): pa/ las thams cad 'grub pa yin te/ de'ang rig pa 'dzin pas sgrub ste dam tshig dang ldan pas so// de yang bla ma la gus shing // yi dam dkon mchog la dad cing // byang chub sems dang sdom pa dang // lha dang
351a1(rgyud 'bum): sngags la gus pa dang / / rgyun du rnal 'byor dang ldan te// rgyud don don la brtson ldan na// las rnams thams cad 'grub pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi
351a2(rgyud 'bum): bka' bzhin mdzad de/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ dam tshig dag las 'das na las rnams mi 'grub/ dag pa med don med dag ste las rnams mi 'grub/ 'bras bu gang du skye zhes zhus pas/ rdo rje dmyal
351a3(rgyud 'bum): ba'i nang du mi bzad pa'i 'bras bur 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe'i tshad ji tsam du sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur zhes zhus pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje
351a4(rgyud 'bum): khyod legs so/ / skrag par ma byed cig/ 'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs bshig ste/ thugs dang 'gal bas rdo rje gdan zhig tsam na thar par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das
351a5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i gdan nam 'jig par 'gyur zhes zhus pa dang / nam mkha'i khams kyi sems can thams cad sangs rgyas pa'i 'bras bu thob ste rdo rje gdan 'jig ste thar par 'gyur ro// bar ma do dang skye gnas
351a6(rgyud 'bum): 'jig pa dag yod do/ / de'i gsang ba'i sngags ni zla ba'i steng du yi ge a bkod de/ chos nyid dag pa'i sngags brjod do// na maHsa ma~M ta badz+rA NAM/ sar+b+ba d+harmA mri ta badz+ra satwa hUM/ zhes phyogs bcur
351a7(rgyud 'bum): kha bltas te rdo rje thal mo sbyar la ye shes kyi 'od kyis gsol ba btab la rdo rje sems dpa'i skur bya'o/ / oM badz+ra satwa hUM/ zhes pa 'bum brjod do// rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams pa zhi bar 'gyur ro//
351b1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje rdo rje 'jigs byed che// me long me long gsal ba'i sku// zhal gsum phyag drug 'jigs pa che// mtshon cha 'dzin la phyag 'tshal bstod// de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs// chos dbyings//
351b2(rgyud 'bum): / chos dbyings rnam par dag/ zhal gsum phyag drug mtshon cha 'dzin// de bzhin gshegs la phyag 'tshal bstod// so sor kun rtog kun rtog bral// pad+ma dri med pad+ma'i bdag/ zhal gsum phyag
351b3(rgyud 'bum): drug mtshon cha 'dzin/ / rgya mtsho skyes sku phyag 'tshal bstod// rin chen bai DUr gzi brjid 'bar// mnyam pa mnyam nyid ye shes sku// zhal gsum phyag drug mtshon cha 'dzin// rin chen rgya mtsho phyag
351b4(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal bstod/ / las kyi sku ste 'phrin las mdzad// bya ba bya ba sgrub pa'i bdag/ zhal gsum phyag drug mtshon cha 'dzin// 'phrin las rgya mtsho phyag 'tshal bstod// oM a nan+ta pa ra swA hA/ oM
351b5(rgyud 'bum): sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hUM/ A kaR+Sha yai baM d+ha ya swA hA/ ha ya grI ba ban+d+ha sho ka ya swA hA/ oM a pa re a pa rA dzi tA swA hA/ ro Sha Na ye b+h+yaHphaT/ de nas lha'i gsang sngags brjod par bya'o// oM badz+ra kro d+ha trai
351b6(rgyud 'bum): / lo kya bi dza ya hUM phaT/ mA ra ya tsit+ta rbang rbang / oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hI kA lA ya hUM phaT/ tsit+ta la kro d+hi duny+dza/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha nA ga hUM phaT/ mA ra ya rak+ta rngubs rngubs/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha a mri te hUM phaT/ mA ra ya sod
351b7(rgyud 'bum): song rbang / de nas lha ma srin sde brgyad kyis rig pa phul ba/ ma hA de ba mA ra ya song sod/ ma hA dak+Sha a su ra mA ra ya ha na ha na/ nA ga rA dza mA ra ya dzaHdzaHma hA ma ni mA ra ya ni mA ra ya rngubs rngubs
352a1(rgyud 'bum): ma hA b+h+yAM mA ra ya tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ma hA yak+Sha mA ra ya b+hin+na b+hin+da/ kharga mA ra ya khos khos/ ma hA ta brah+ma de ye phaT/ mA ra Na sod sod/ mA ra Na bying bying / mA ra Na mugs mugs/
352a2(rgyud 'bum): mA ra Na ha la ha la/ mA ra Na d+h+yA na d+hu na/ mA ra Na myos myos/ mA ra Na bying bying / thum ri li li/ thum ri li li/ dza dza/ bum pa legs par ldan pa yis// sman gsum rtsi sman sna tshogs dang // kha dir
352a3(rgyud 'bum): yi lo 'dab bcas/ / lcags kyi rdo rje'i khong seng du// gsang ba'i sngags ni brjod par bya// gnas lcags mchu ni stong pa ru// sprin bral ser ba gcad pa'i phyir// gsang ba'i sngags 'di brjod par bya'o//
352a4(rgyud 'bum): / tad+ya thA/ oM Tak+ki tsa ti gu h+ya li mi Sha sha gu gu/ sha ti bi ti/ hu ya hu ya pU ra ta swA hA/ oM badz+ra pA Ni badz+ra DA ki nI ga he he/ hu ya hu ya/ hu lu hu lu/ pu ru te pu ru te swA hA/ oM many+dzu shrI ya mAn+ta kA/
352a5(rgyud 'bum): / e ka a pa ra hUM phaT/ oM ma Ni pad+me be sha pra be sha/ mA ma ru la be sha kha thun b+h+yo/ oM brah+ma swa ti/ puSh+Ti su ra kau shi ka/ ru dra I shwa ra/ biSh+Nu/ I sha ni/ ku mA ra shaM ka ra/ sma ra Sha dz+nyA swA hA/ au
352a6(rgyud 'bum): karkoT/ ku li sha/ pad+ma/ ma hA pad+ma/ a nan+ta/ tak+Sha ka/ bA su ki/ shaM kha pA la/ nA ga rA dza swAhA/ oM A di t+ya/ so ma aM ga ra bu taHbri hiM sA tiH/ shu kraHsha nai shwar/ kai tu swA hAM/ oM nak+Sha
352a7(rgyud 'bum): karti ka/ ro hi Ni/ mri ga shi raH/ ar+thaHpu narba suH/ pu Sh+yaHa shre ShaH/ ma g+hA/ pUrba phal gu NI/ uta ta ra phal gu NI/ hastA tsi tA sA ti/ bi shwa khA/ a nu rA d+h+wa dz+yeSh+Ta/ mU laM pUr+d+raShID+ha/ ut+ta rASh+Ta
352b1(rgyud 'bum): shra ba NaHa b+hi dzi da/ sha ta b+hi ShA d+ha niSh+Ta/ pUrba b+hA dra pA da/ ut+ta ra b+ha dra pA da/ rai ba tI a shrI nI b+ha ra NI swA hA/ oM in+d+ra ya/ oM ya ma ya/ ba ru Na/ ku be ra/ ag+ni/ rAk+Sha sa/ bA ya be/ I
352b2(rgyud 'bum): nA sUr+ya/ tsan+d+ra lo ka pA lA ya sA hA/ bai shra ba Na/ d+h+r-i ta rASh+Ta/ bi rU D+ha ka/ bi rU pAk+Sha swA hA/ oM dang nA ga rA dzI su ra gaM d+hArbaM sh+tsa/ ga ru Da/ kin+da ra/ ma ho ra ga/ kuM b+hUr+N+Na swAhA/ ha ra ha ra nA ga phuHts+tshin+na
352b3(rgyud 'bum): ts+tshin+da nA ga hr-i da yA ni phuH/ b+hin+da b+hin+da nA ga marmA Ni phuHbi shIr+yen+tu nA ga sha rI rA Ni puH/ bi s+pho Ta ya nA ga na ye nA ni phuHnA ga bi dA ra NA ya phuH/ nA go tA sA da nA ya pu swA hA/ yak+Sha bi dA ra Na ya hUM phaT/ yak+Sha krong+ga
352b4(rgyud 'bum): sA da nA ya hUM phaT/ yak+Sha nI la ba sa nA ye phaT swA hA/ yak+Sha a pra ti ha ta ba lA ya phaT/ yak+Sha pa rA kra mA ya phaT/ yak+Sha kri tI tA ya phaT/ yak+Sha kr-i tAn+ta rU pA ya phaT/ yak+Sha ro Sha NA ya phaT/ de skad ces
352b5(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsal nas thams cad dbang du 'dus par 'gyur ro/ / gsang ba'i rgyud kyi rnam par 'byed pa drag po gsum 'dul zhes bya ba las/ gsang ba'i sngags kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// /
352b6(rgyud 'bum): de nas cho ga yang dag bshad/ maN+Dal me tog bcas pa'i steng // mchod rten sku gdung ldan pa dang // bum pa sngon po mgul chings bcas// mchod pa rnam lnga dang ldan pas// sgrub po dag ni bsnyun ldan pas//
352b7(rgyud 'bum): rmi ltas rim pa gsal ba yis// nad pa dag la nyung sngags so// bcom ldan mgon po zhal gsum dmar// phyag drug rdo rje bsdigs pa g.yon// drag po'i thal mos 'jigs par byed// tha ma sbrul gdug
353a1(rgyud 'bum): ri rab mnan/ / 'khor du gnod sbyin chen po ste// sha za rab 'jigs ral pa can// gdong ser seng gdong gnod sbyin mo// bong bu'i rna brna ba 'phyang // ral pa gyen 'greng ral gri so// gnod
353a2(rgyud 'bum): sbyin 'khor de lnga brgyar bcas/ / yak+Sha bi dA ra NA ya hUM phaT/ yak+Sha kro d+ha sA d+ha nA ya hUM phaT/ yak+Sha nI la ba sa nA ya hUM phaT/ yak+Sha pra ti ha ta pA lA ya hUM phaT/ yak+Sha pa rA kra mA ya phaT/ yak+Sha kr-i tAn ta rU pA ya phaT/
353a3(rgyud 'bum): yak+Sha ro Sha NA ya phaT/ ces brjod do// chu la bsngags shing gtor na gnod gyi gdon las thar ro// mchod rten sku gdung ldan pa'i drung // tshon sna lnga dang ldan pa yi// mchod pa lnga dang ldan pas mchod// sgrub po dag ni
353a4(rgyud 'bum): bstan ldan pas/ / rmi ltas rim pa gsal ba yis// nad pa dag la tshon snas bcing // bcom ldan 'das mgon zhal gsum ldan// phyag drug rdo rje bsdigs pa g.yon// drag po thal mos 'jigs par byed//
353a5(rgyud 'bum): tha me sbrul gdug ri rab mnan// mkha' la rdzu 'phrul dang ldan bdud// dga' rab dbang phyug thod 'phreng can// bum sma sen dgu sha za bdud// btsun mo me tog mdzes pa dang // 'od zer 'phrog dang mdangs 'phrog ma//
353a6(rgyud 'bum): / gdon rigs stong phrag brgyad cu'i 'khor// ma lus bcas pa'i sngags 'di ni// gnad la bor ba'i srog sngags so// pra ta pi shA tsa ka bi dA ra NA ya hUM phaT/ pre ta pi shA tsa kro d+ha sA da nA ya hUM phaT/ pre ta pi shA tsa nI
353a7(rgyud 'bum): ba sa nA ya hUM phaT/ pre ta pi shA tsa a pa ti ha ta ba lA ya phaT/ pre ta pi shA tsa pa ra kra mA ya phaT/ pre ta pi shA tsa kr-i tAn tA sa phaT/ pre ta pi shA tsa kr-i tAn ta rU pA ya phaT/ pre ta pi shA tsa ro Sha NA ya phaT/ nyi ma zla ba dag gi
353b1(rgyud 'bum): bar du rlung la bskyon te tshon sna lngas bcings te bskrad par bya'o/ / mchod rten sku gdung ldan pa'i drung // maN+Dal me tog bcas pa'i steng // smyung bas khyi yi sha la sgrub// rmi lhas rim pa ldan pas brtag/ brgyad khri
353b2(rgyud 'bum): zhabs nub 'jigs pa'i me/ / gad rgyangs bzhad mdzad zhal gsum pa// nag po zhabs gdub gdug pa 'dzin// stobs chen rab tu gau non pa po// klu chen ma rungs gdug pa can// nor rgyas dang ni dung skyong
353b3(rgyud 'bum): dang dga' bo dang ni 'jog po dang / / pad+ma pad+ma chen po'o// stobs kyi rgyu dang rigs ldan rnams// rgya mtsho dag la gnas pa yi// klu dang gnyen dang sa bdag gsum// sprul pa las la grub pa yi//
353b4(rgyud 'bum): / glen pa nga rgyal rdzu 'phrul can// sprul pa 'bum sde 'khor bcas pa'i// ma lus pa yi sngags 'di ni// gnad la bor ba'i rtsa sngags so// ha ra ha ra nA ga phu/ pra ha ra pra ha ra nA ga phu/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da nA ga phu/
353b5(rgyud 'bum): b+hin+da b+hin+da nA ga phu/ bi shIR+Shan+d+ha nA ga sha rI rA Ni phu/ bi s+pho Ta ya nA ga na ya nA ni phu/ nA ga bi dA ra NA ya phu/ nA ga kro d+ha sA da nA ya phu/ bal po se'u dag dang ni// smyug shad dag gi lcug mas bya ba// de ni klu bzlog
353b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i cho ga'o/ / nA ga du na dus/ nA ga shon dus/ hi li hI li nA ga dus dus/ klu chen nA gi'i srog snying ste/ gnad la bor ba'i srog snying ngo // lto 'phye dag gi kha nas khar// bcom ldan sku ni gsal bas bzlas
353b7(rgyud 'bum): de nas rdo rje 'dzin la bka' stsal pa/ las rnams bzhi yis las rnams 'grub// sa gzhi dag ni so sor brtag/ zhi ba dkar zlum pad+ma can// rgyas ser gru bzhi'i 'khor lo yi// dbang dmar zla gam lcag
354a1(rgyud 'bum): kyu ste drag po mthing nag rtse gsum pa'o/ / zhi ba rgyus pa sor bzhi dang // khru dang khru do mnyam pa'o// dbang dang drag po sor gsum ste// khru do khru gang khru gsum khru// 'o ma can dang dri zhim
354a2(rgyud 'bum): zhing 'bras bu dang bcas zhi rgyas shing / / tsher ma dur khrod shing dag ni// kha dog dmar nag dbang drag la// ku sha dag kyang dgram byas te// las kyi bum pas bsang bar bya'o// zhi ba zho dang mar dang ni// 'o ma dri zhim
354a3(rgyud 'bum): me tog dkar/ / 'bras dang nas dang gro dang ni// zho yi cha dang bsres pa dbul// rgyas pa zho sbags dkar gsum ste// mngar gsum 'bras bu gsum dag ste// yam shing 'o ma lo 'dab bcas// til ni dkar po
354a4(rgyud 'bum): shis pa'o/ / khwa dang 'ug pa bya rog brun// ske tshe nim pa nyungs kar dang // khrag gis sbags pa'i rdzas kun te// yam shing tsher ma mar dag dang / sha dang tshil dang gzugs bcas pa// til ni nag po
354a5(rgyud 'bum): shis pa'o/ / shar du bltas na zhi ba ste// byang du bltas na rgyas pa'o// nub tu bltas na dbang du sdud// lho ru bltas te gsad par bya'o// sbyin sreg byas pas las kun 'grub// g.yas brkyang gar gyis
354a6(rgyud 'bum): gdug pa ste/ / g.yon brkyang bas ni gsad pa'o// bum pa kha dog sngon po ste// gnam lcags sor ni bcu drug tshad// sman lnga 'bru lnga rin po che// 'bras gsum 'bru gsum bcas pa ste// dri zhim lo 'dab
354a7(rgyud 'bum): bcas pa'i shing / / ba yi rnam lnga khru do tshad// gru bzhi khru gang zlum po ste// seng ldeng bzhi la byas pa yi// phur pa tshon sna dang bcas pa'i// dkar gsum mngar gsum bcas pa yi// gdengs ka can la dbul bar bya'o//
354b1(rgyud 'bum): grub pa khrus bya bsrung bar bya'o// 'bras chen bu ram hwags dang ni// 'bru yi chan dang dri zhim dang // dkar gsum mdur gsum chu dag dang // mdun du byas te phyogs rnams su// sha dang khrag dang rus
354b2(rgyud 'bum): / pa dang // nas dang 'bras dang gro la sogs// la phug sgog pa 'bru la sogs// chang dang bcas pa mdun du dbul// oM brah+ma/ oM biSh+Ti/ oM ru drA ya/ oM karti ka/ oM ga na pa ti/ oM in+d+ra ya
354b3(rgyud 'bum): oM ma hA kA la/ oM ma hA brah+ma ye/ ba li ta ta le/ ba li ta ta la swA hA/ stag dang khab len ti tsha dang // maN+Dal gru gsum stang du gzhag/ nag po'i thod pa gri gug can// srung dang ldan pas gsang
354b4(rgyud 'bum): / sngags sgrub// ma hA kA la ni rU pa NA/ oM shri gri bo bed dza dza dza ha ha/ sa ma ya gags sol/ lcags kyi snying phyung / zhes pas lcags bya'o// nad kyi srung ba dag la ni// byang chub sems dpa'i sku

354b7(rgyud 'bum): rnam par 'byed pa drag po gsum 'dul zhes bya ba las/ las bstan pa'i le'u gsum pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po de ba pu N+ya ma ti dang / lo tsa ba dge slong chos kyi
355a1(rgyud 'bum): bzang pos bsgyur ba'o/ / rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra pA Ni nI lAM ba ra tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi rgyud/
355a2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ gnod sbyin thams cad yongs su rgyu ba/ shin tu dben pa/ shin tu yongs su dag pa na/
355a3(rgyud 'bum): gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can zhes bya ba/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis las kyi khro bor dbang bskur ba/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ yid khros pa lta bu/
355a4(rgyud 'bum): mig me mdag gi phung po 'dra ba/ dbugs me lce ltar 'bar ba/ 'jigs pa'i nga ro can/ lag pa dang rkang pa klu nor rgyas kyi bus brgyan pa/ klu nag po se ral khar thogs pa/ klu dga' bo dang nye
