355b6(rgyud 'bum): khyod ci/ bde gshegs kun gyi sprul pa 'am// gal te bsdus pa'i sku yin nam// las kyi khro bor dbang bskur ram// bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa rnams// ji lta bu yi dus gsum bka' nyan te/
355b7(rgyud 'bum): las dang bya ba thams cad bka' stsal mdzod// drag po'i ting 'dzin bstan du gsol// zhes gsol to// gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas lag na rdo rje drag po
356a1(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs te 'di skad ces gsungs so/ / phyag rgya gsang sngags mthu sbyor las// khro bo'i rgyal po bsam par bya// khro bo rdo rje'i ting 'dzin gyis/
356a2(rgyud 'bum): byin rlabs ya mtshan sna tshogs ldan// ting 'dzin de la dbang thob nas// las rnams sgrub la thogs pa med// zhi rgyas dbang dang drag po dang // gsad rmongs sna tshogs nges par 'grub// de nyid grub
356a3(rgyud 'bum): par gdon mi za/ / rang gzhan 'phags dang bla ma dang // shin tu bla ma dam pa yang / mchod gnas dngos grub myur du 'byung // gal te gzhan la phan 'dogs na// sku de sna tshogs sku ru snang /
356a4(rgyud 'bum): snang ba'i sgyu ma'i sku yin yang // gdug par 'dul phyir rags par snang // sna tshogs de nyid bsam bral ba'i// dngos gzhi yang dag thar pa gcig/ le'u gnyis pa'o// /
356a5(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang gsang sngags sbyor ba ni// da ha sreg sogs gsang sngags kyis// thogs med las rnams grub pa yin// gnyis kyi 'og mas gsum pa brgyan// ri yi mtha' ni gsum pa'i mtha'//
356a6(rgyud 'bum): / de la gnyis kyi gong ldan pa// zung dang bar zung ming dang ldan// yang ming skal ldan bsam gtan ni// lcags kyu'i sbyor ba rab tu bya// oM badz+ra pA Ni ma hA yak+Sha nI lAM ba ra hUM phaT/ mjug rdzogs gong dang
356a7(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa'i mtha'/ / lan gnyis gong bzhin brdegs sngags shes// gsum pa'i dang po gnyis pa dang // drug pa'i dang po yi ge ni// lan gnyis gong bzhin gtogs byed sngags// gnyis kyi dang po
356b1(rgyud 'bum): g+ha dang pos/ / drug po dga' ba'i sa bon ldan// lan gnyis ldan gyur las grub pa// gong ma bzhin du mchod byed do// le'u gsum pa'o// de nas 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos
356b2(rgyud 'bum): sngon po can sna tshogs mngon par 'grub pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'di skad ces gsungs so/ / oM badz+ra pA Ni ma hA lak+Sha nI mAM bar da ha ni badz+ra rU paT+Ta/ gang zhig ting 'dzin rnal 'byor de/
356b3(rgyud 'bum): nyes pa kun las rab tu thar// legs pa'i yon tan thams cad 'thob// 'bras bu yang dag mngon par 'grub// sngags ni gang yin ming yin te// gdul bya'i mtha' dang ldan pa la// mtha' ma las
356b4(rgyud 'bum): sngags mtha' dang ldan/ / le'u bzhi pa'o// / de nas gos sngon po can 'khor lo mngon par 'grub pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'di skad ces gsungs so//
356b5(rgyud 'bum): 'byung bzhi'i sangs rgyas rab bsgoms nas// so sor las kyis sgom pa ni// me brgyad rlung gnyis ldan par bsam// chu brgyad dngos po nyid yin te// de bzhin sa brgyad hUM 'bras ldan// rlung brgyad me
356b6(rgyud 'bum): gnyis ldan pa ste/ / 'bras bu rim gyis gnod sbyin gtso// sgrub pa sngags bzhin mngon par 'grub// i dang so so'i mtha' dang ldan// me la gong mas mngon par 'grub// rgyun du rtsa ba'i gsang sngags
356b7(rgyud 'bum): bzlas/ / le'u lnga pa'o// / de nas 'phags pa gos sngon gyis// las bcu mngon par 'grub par ni// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// las bcu'i sbyin sreg 'di gsungs so//
357a1(rgyud 'bum): zhi la shan+tiM ku ru ste// rgyas pa puSh+TiM ku ru'o// dbang la ba shaM ku ru'o// drag po mA ra gsum par ldan// thab khung dbyibs ni las bzhi ste// shing ni rigs dang sbyar bar bya/
357a2(rgyud 'bum): zhi la dkar po'i shing rnams te// rgyas la gser shing la sogs pa'o// dbang la seng ldeng shing bsregs te// drag po tsher ma can gyi shing // gzhan ni tsan dan shing las byas// thab khung 'dab brgyad dbyibs
357a3(rgyud 'bum): yin te/ / bi d+h+waM sa ya/ uts+tsha ta ni/ mo ha ya mo ha ya/ s+yAm+b+ha ya stam+b+ha ya/ udA ma na/ ud ma na/ A kaR+Sha ya A kaR+Sha ya/ kha shi ka ra kha shi kA ra/ rak+Sha ya rak+Sha ya/ mo ha b+hA ya/ sarba karma ku ru
357a4(rgyud 'bum): hUM phaT/ le'u drug pa'o// / de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin// gdul dka' ba ni gdul ba'i mchog/ gsang ba'i bdag po gos sngon can// drag po chen po rab 'bar ba'i// ting nge
357a5(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/ / 'khor gyi klu tshogs dbang bsdus te// nyen rnams zlog pa'i cho gar gsungs// gnas khang rim pa gsum dag la// phyi rol smra ba sregs dpral bar bya// bar du phyi nang
357a6(rgyud 'bum): khrus byas te/ / mnyes pa'i las kyang ci nus bya// nang du bum pa'i dbang bskur bas// nyen rnams zlog la the tshom med// kye ho nyen rnams gdul ba'i mchog/ e me gsang chen drag po che// e ma ma rungs
357a7(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs pa can/ / e ma gsang sngags rnal 'byor che// phyag na rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal// phyogs bral khro bo khyod phyag 'tshal// le'u bdun pa'o// / de skad ces gsungs nas
357b1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor thams cad dga' ba'i rjes la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / thams cad ldan pa'i gtor ma la// raM gyis sbyangs nas yaM gis bus// khaM gis bkrus te dag pa la// baM las bdud rtsi chu rgyun bskyed//
357b2(rgyud 'bum): yaM raM dbab pa'i sbyor bar bya// dza yis bkug ste gtor mar bstim// bsam gtan lha mos mchod pa 'bul// de nas 'khor la 'di skad bsgos// nga ni khro bo gos sngon can// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus
357b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sku/ / sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs// dbang bskur mchog thob nga yis sku// ci ste nga yis dam 'das na// gtor ma dug gi rang bzhin gyis// khyed rnams thal ba rdul du rlog/ gal te
357b4(rgyud 'bum): / dam tshig ma 'das na// gtor ma ye shes bdud rtsi yis// khyed kyi sgo gsum sgrib pa sbyangs// nges par legs pa'i yon tan thob// oM A kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM/ Ar+ya nu ta pan na tAta A hUM swA hA/
357b5(rgyud 'bum): le'u brgyad pa'o// / de nas dpal ldan gos sngon can// gdul dka' 'dul ba'i bdag po des// bsam gtan 'khor lo med pa la// sngags kyi nges par bshad par bya// ted+ya thA/
357b6(rgyud 'bum): / b+ho b+ho pan nA ga a d+hi pa ta ye/ i daM nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra sha rI raM/ badz+ra pA NI hr-i da yaM/ yaHsa mA ti kra ma tha/ uta sA da naM/ b+ha bi Sh+ya ti/ las thams cad pa'i sngags so// las so so ba la klu 'dul ba'i sngag/
357b7(rgyud 'bum): tad+ya thA/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ bi bud+d+ha bi bud+d+ha/ ma hI prAp+ta/ ha ra ha ra nA gA nA na/ pra ha ra pra ha ra nA gA nAn/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da nA ga hr-i da yA ni/ b+hin+da b+hin+da nA ga marma Ni/ bi ShI r+yan tu nA ga sha rI rA Ni/ bi s+pho Ta ya/ nA ga na
358a1(rgyud 'bum): ya naM tAd+ya thA/ hUM phaT/ nA ga bi dA ra NA ya hUM phaT/ nA ga uta sA da nA ya hUM phaT/ yi dgas thams cad bzlog pa ni// ni lAM ba sa nA ya hUM phaT/ a pra ti ha ta ba la pa rAkra
358a2(rgyud 'bum): ma ya phaT/ kr-i tAn+tA ya phaT/ kr-i tAn+ta rU pA ya phaT/ ro Sha NA ya phaT/ trA sa nA ya phaT/ ku b+ha Do ta sA da nA ya phaT/ gshin rje bzlog pa'o// pre ta pi shA tsi bi nA shaM ka rA ya phaT/ yi dgas thams cad bzlog
358a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / yak+Sha a pa smai ra bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ gnod sbyin la sogs pa bzlog pa'o// ha sa ha sa/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ sarba big+h+nA nA shaM ka rA ya phaT/ bgegs thams cad bzlog
358a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / sarba sha trUM saM g+hA bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ dge 'dun gyi dgra 'dul ba'o// nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra pa NI rA dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ rdo rje be con drag po che// rdo rje 'jigs pa sngags kyi bdag/ rdo rje khro bo
358a5(rgyud 'bum): bgegs kyi gshed/ / rdo rje mi thub 'jigs pa che// rdo rje las kun grub pa che// rdo rje las rnams kun mdzad pa// sngags kyi bdag po khyod phyag 'tshal// sngags kyi ngo bo khyod phyag 'tshal// le'u dgu pa'o//
358a6(rgyud 'bum): / de nas klu dgug pa'i sngags bstan te// rdo rje lcags kyu rlung gi sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur// de bzhin me yis kyang ni 'dul bar nus pa yin// de ltar nus phyir dgug pa'i sngag
358a7(rgyud 'bum): ni bshad par bya/ / oM badz+ra pA Ni ma hA yak+Sha nI lAM ba ra nA ga hriHgr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM phaT/ A kaR+Sha ya A kaR+Sha ya hUM phaT/ bsam gtan drag pos bzlas pa bya// bzlas pa 'di la rab 'bad bya// klu rigs du ma thams
358b1(rgyud 'bum): cad kun/ / 'gugs 'gyur 'di las gzhan du min// ji srid 'gugs pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// khugs par gyur pa'i klu rnams kun// zangs gzhong nang du spyan drangs te// khro bo'i che ba brjod nas ni// dam tshig
358b2(rgyud 'bum): bsre zhing dug rnams gzhom/ / sman gyi mchog gis gsos nas ni// gang gnod phyogs su gshegs su gsol// le'u bcu pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ste// zhi ba'i las kyi
358b3(rgyud 'bum): / mi 'dul ba'i// klu gzir drag sngags bstan par bya// oM badz+ra pA Ni ma hA yak+Sha nI lAM ba ra nA ga ha na ha na hUM phaT/ nA ga da ha da ha hUM phaT/ nA ga s+pho Ta s+pho Ta hUM phaT/ nA ga bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya hUM phaT/ nA ga gardza
358b4(rgyud 'bum): gadz+ra hUM phaT/ nA ga b+hin+da b+hin+da hUM phaT/ bsam gtan rdo rje thogs pa yis// gdul ba'i steng na gdab par bya// 'og tu me yi 'khor lo bsam// me phung chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis// me 'bar grog chen
358b5(rgyud 'bum): dkyil dugazir/ / yungs kar yungs nag ske tshe yis// brdeg cing khro bo'i sprul pa spro// khra spyang la sogs rtsa lnga'i gsob// gcan gzan sna tshogs mche sder dang // mchu sder dbab cing sprus pasgo/
358b6(rgyud 'bum): myur du thar pa gdon mi za// le'u bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas 'phags pa gos sngon can gyis nyid la nyid kyis mchod pa phul ba/ hUM rdo rje bdug pa ma// bdag nyid dri yis
358b7(rgyud 'bum): rgyas mdzad ma/ / badz+ra d+hU pe pU dza me hUM/ hUM rdo rje me tog ma// bdag nyid yongs su bkra mdzad ma// badz+ra puSh+pe pU dze me hUM/ hUM rdo rje dri chab ma// bdag nyid dngos po dag mdzad ma// badz+ra gan+d+he pU dza me hUM/ hUM rdo rje
359a1(rgyud 'bum): mar me ma/ / bdag nyid dkyil 'khor gsal mdzad ma// badz+ra A lo ke pU dza me hUM/ ji srid thams cad mchod pa che// ji srid mchod pa bde ba che// ji srid mchod pa bla na med// ji srid
359a2(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa yang dag che/ / e ma ho/ le'u bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// bcom ldan gsang ba gos sngon can// bsdu ba thabs kyi ting 'dzin gyis//
359a3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gyi klu rnams sdud mdzad nas// me yi 'khor lo snyoms zhugs tshe// gsang ba me yi sngags bzlas pas// klu rnams ma lus tshig par mdzad// bral nas dpag tshad gnas su bros// slar bsdus bdud
359a4(rgyud 'bum): rtsi sman gyis gsos/ / las bcol so so'i gnas su 'khod// de nas khams gsum rnam par rgyal// thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad gsol// me brgyad 'khor lo'i bdag nyid che// rtag tu me yi ting 'dzin
359a5(rgyud 'bum): laya snyoms zhugs khyod ni rgyal gyur cig/ bde ba'i rol mo me glong du// sreg mdzad ma brgyad khyod phyag 'tshal// rang bzhin rnam dag khyod phyag 'tshal// chu yi ngang la gnas 'dod na// chu brgyad ting 'dzin
359a6(rgyud 'bum): la gnas te/ / de tshe 'khor gyis 'di skad bstod// chu brgyad 'khor lo'i bdag nyid che// rtag pa chu yi dkyil 'khor can// 'byung ba'i gtso bo'i chu yi bdag/ chu brgyad mnga' bdag khyod phyag 'tshal//
359a7(rgyud 'bum): rlung brgyad ting 'dzin la gnas na// 'thor zhing 'bud pa'i bdag nyid che// rlung chen drag po rtsal shugs ldan// rlung lha gos sngon khyod phyag 'tshal// sa yi ting 'dzin la gnas nas// mi g.yo
359b1(rgyud 'bum): brtan pa'i las mdzad pa/ / gser ldan rol mo sna tshogs ldan// sa brgyad 'khor lo khyod phyag 'tshal// le'u bcu gsum pa'o// / de nus dpal ldan gos sngon
359b2(rgyud 'bum): can phra mo'i ting 'dzin la gnas nas/ 'khor gyi gnod sbyin mang po kun// shin tu yid dga' dang pa zhus// phra mo'i thig le chen po yis// cir snang dngos po gcig tu 'dus// de nyid
359b3(rgyud 'bum): mtha' 'das rang bzhin med/ / de nas dpal ldan gos sngon can// 'dod chags ting 'dzin la gnas pas// 'khor gyi gnod sbyin mang po kun// sngangs dang dus dang brgyal ba las// bsrang ste tha
359b4(rgyud 'bum): med don bstan pas/ / thams cad 'dod chags mngon sangs rgyas// 'khor gyis sku la mngon par bstod// kye ho gsang bdag gos sngon can// bla med rdzogs pa'i glong dkyil na// 'dod chags dag
359b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i blo ldan pas/ / mngon par sangs rgyas khyod phyag 'tshal// le'u bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis// 'khor gyi gtso la mngon par bstod// lcang lo
359b6(rgyud 'bum): can gyi pho brang nas/ / gsang ba'i bdag po gos sngon can// yon tan thams cad sku la rdzogs// dngos med dag pa khyod phyag 'tshal// 'khor gyi klu tshogs 'dul ba'i phyir// klu brgyad sku la rab btsun nas/
359b7(rgyud 'bum): klu tshogs zhal du gsol mdzad pa// klu 'dul byams pa khyod phyag 'tshal// sna tshogs dag pa'i sku mnga' zhing // rigs drug sde brgyad 'dul bar mdzad// skyon gyis ma gos rang sangs rgyas// thogs med
360a1(rgyud 'bum): kun 'dul phyag 'tshal bstod/ / ji ltar bsam pa'i dngos po kun// khyod las 'byung bas mi zad gter// sna tshogs yid bzhin 'phrul po che// yid bzhin nor bu khyod phyag
360a2(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal/ / nad dang rims kyi gshed po mdzad// nor dang zas kyi bdag po mdzad// 'jigs pa kun las skyob par mdzad// bla med skyob mdzad khyod phyag 'tshal// zhes bstod nas rjes su yi rang ngo //
360a3(rgyud 'bum): lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin la sogs pa'ang yid dga' ba'i mchod pas khyab par gyur to// mi la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa'i nyen dang ldan pa thams cad bde ba la bkod do// le'u bco
360a4(rgyud 'bum): lnga pa'o/ / // 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi cho ga rdo rje be con gyi rgyud rdzogs so// / de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos 'khor de dag la rnam par
360a5(rgyud 'bum): gzigs nas rang nyid mkha' dbyings rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ / ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu srid pa gsum yang rnam par g.yos so//
360a6(rgyud 'bum): de nas rang nyid sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rnam par dag pa'i rdo rje las sngags 'di phyung ngo // oM na mo/ gsang sngags rgyal po smras tsam gyis// sa steng lha rnams brgyal bar gyur// klu rnams
360a7(rgyud 'bum): kun tu skrag nas ni/ / gsang bdag nyid la phyag 'tshal lo// snying rje ldan zhing mos pa brtan// gus shing byang chub sems ldan pa'i// phyogs su 'gro bas yid gnas pa'i// lha dang bla ma mnyam mchod cing //
360b1(rgyud 'bum): brtson 'grus shes rab che ba des// rang nyid dang ni gzhan dag tu// bde zhing nyams dga'i ri phug gam// tshal lam mtsho 'am ljongs rnams su// sa yi dkyil 'khor rnam dag par// byas nas dri chus
360b2(rgyud 'bum): legs byugs nas/ / bde ba'i stan la 'dug byas te// gsang ba'i bdag po bsgrub par bya// gzhan ni ri khrod rtsub pa 'am// dur khrod ya ma'i khang pa yang // 'khrug cing g.yeng dang bcas pa dang /
360b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyal pos bzung zhing gtum mo rgyu// 'jigs pa'i phyogs nas gang dag rnams// rgyal ba sgrub pa'i gnas yin no// dus 'dir byung ba'i blo zhan rnams// 'jig rten 'di yi g.yeng ba dang // cho
360b4(rgyud 'bum): gas thams cad skyed par byed/ / chags pa'i stobs kyi chos nyid ni// yang dag mi rtog de ni skyon// sprul pa'i glang po dang mtshungs so// stong nyid spros med rang bzhin las// sgyu ma'i sku ni yongs
360b5(rgyud 'bum): 'byung zhing / / dang po stong nyid rdo rje ste// gnyis pa la ni yi ge hUM// gsum pa rdo rje rtse dgu pa// bzhi pa bcom ldan gsang ba'i bdag/ lnga pa lha ni yongs su rdzogs// me long dang ni mnyam nyid dang /
360b6(rgyud 'bum): chos dbyings ye shes las grub pa'i// sku ni ye shes bdag nyid do// de rdzogs ye shes chen po'o// ye shes sku las ye shes kyis// sprul pa'ang ye shes nyid du gnas// 'khor ba'i nyon mongs las
360b7(rgyud 'bum): 'das nas/ / mi rtog ye shes phung po la// gsang ba'i bdag nyid legs par bzhugs// rnam grol rnam dag grol ba'i rgyu// sngags dbyibs chos bdag don rnal 'byor// skad cig skad cig ye shes las//
361a1(rgyud 'bum): sgyu ma lta bu'i sgyu ma'i sku// sgyu ma nyid la rnam grol tshe// kye kye ha ha dpa' bo che// gru yi sgrar gyur 'jigs byed pos// gsang ba'i bdag po rdo rje can// nyon mongs las rgyas 'jig/
361a2(rgyud 'bum): su rung // dbang phyug khams gsum las rgyal ba'i// de bas brtson ldan gang yin des// shin tu sgrub pas bsgrub par bya// bstan pa'i yid sos par byed pas// rgyal ba gsang ba'i bdag po'o//
361a3(rgyud 'bum): de nas gsang ba'i bdag po nyid dngos grub nges par 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rnam par dag pa'i rdo rje las byung ba/ oM badz+ra pA Ni
361a4(rgyud 'bum): sarba ar+tha sid+hi ku ru ku ru swA hA/ lha klu mi min dri za 'am// yang na mi yi bu mo yi// dpral bar thig le bris nas ni// lag tu lcags kyu thogs la gzhag/ dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham pa la// brten
361a5(rgyud 'bum): nas bum pas ba sgrub par bya/ / rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa ni// sman la sogs pas legs bkang nas// ras kyis dkris la gzhag par bya// rgyun du de las bsgrubs gyur na// zhi dang rgyas sogs
361a6(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub dang / / gzhan yang dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag po mi 'gyur bar byed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dug thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i
361a7(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje yang dag pa las nges par phyung ngo // oM na gu nA ge pro tig ma Ni// tsa ra pa raM ya ra bA rA h+ye ha re ni thaM// rin chen snod du chu thugs nas// sngags kyi rgyal po
361b1(rgyud 'bum): 'di la ni/ / brgya nas ji srid stong gi bar// brjod na 'gro ba'i dug nad sel// gzhan yang gsang sngags rgyal po ni// gsang ba'i bdag po sbyor ba dang // bcas pas mang du brjod byas nas//
361b2(rgyud 'bum): bsgrubs pas ci yang 'grub par 'gyur// zla ba spyang kis bzung dus su dpral bar go ro tsa nas thig le byas te/ kha shar phyogs su gyur nas gsang sngags 'di brjod na ci 'dod pa dbang du byed do//
361b3(rgyud 'bum): yang zla ba 'am nyi ma ga zas bzung ba'i tshe klu'i gan nas mi khrag gis lus byugs te sngags 'di brjod na klu thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// 'di la the tsom med do// gzhan yang sbyor ba bshad bya ba//
361b4(rgyud 'bum): gur kum dang ni gi'u wang gis// rtsibs brgyad pa yi 'khor lo la// dang po'i sngags bzhi dag dang ni// tha ma'i sngags rnams bri bar bya// mu khyud gnyis la rtsa ba yi// gas sngags rgyal por rim gyis
361b5(rgyud 'bum): bri rin chen snod bzhag mchod byas nas/ / gsang sngags stong sogs brjod nas ni// rgyal mtshan rtse la gdags par bya// gzhan gyi rig sngags gcod par byed// gal te char pa dbab par 'dod na
361b6(rgyud 'bum): sa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi par byas te/ dbus su pad+ma'i 'dab ma brgyad pa bris la/ de'i steng du klu'i rgyal po brgyad kyi gzugs byas te bzhag la/ rang nyid khro bo'i rgyal po gos sngon po can du byas te/
361b7(rgyud 'bum): sman sna tshogs dang / 'o ma dang / 'bras chan dang / zho la sogs pa rnams dang / kar dang bu rim la sogs pas mchod nas gos dkar po bgos te/ hUM 'brug gi sgral bu brjod pas mgo 'dren pa'i
362a1(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags kyi rgyal po brjod pas char 'bebs par byed do/ / gal te mi 'bebs na klu rnams bsdigs pa'i phyir// dkyil 'khor de'i steng du khrag sna tshogs dang // dug/
362a2(rgyud 'bum): shing la sogs pas sbyin sreg bya'o// des myur du char 'bebs par byed do// gal te char ches pa'am/ ser ba gcad par 'dod pas nyar shing dang dug kad pa'i rtsa ba la yi ge bris te/ dkyil
362a3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor dkar po'i dbus su btsugs la yungs kar dang thal ba la mang du bzlas par bya'o/ / gal te mi 'dod na bsngags pa tsam gyis kyang nges par 'byung ngo // rta'i khrag dang dug sgra sna tshogs
362a4(rgyud 'bum): kyis brgyal ba sos par byed do/ / rlung zhi bar 'dod na dbang phyug gi gos la tsa ta pa la ri rtsa bas sngags bris te/ dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag nas/ sngags kyi rgyal po stong la sogs pa ci
362a5(rgyud 'bum): nus pa brjod nas khang pa'i steng du bzhag na rlung zhi bar byed do/ / gal te yams zhi bar 'dod pas gur kum dang / gi'u wang gis rtse mo bcu gnyis par bris nas dang po'i sngags rnams dang /
362a6(rgyud 'bum): tha ma'i sngags rnams rtsibs la bris te// mu khyud la sngags lhag ma bris te me tog dang 'bras bu ser po thams cad kyis mchod cing gsol ba btab nas gtsug lag gi rtse mo 'am/ dge 'dun gyi
362a7(rgyud 'bum): 'du ba'i sgo gong la btags na ci 'dod pa 'grub cing nad yams thams cad 'chad par 'gyur ro/ / gal te bu 'dod pas se ru skya dmar po'i gdong bu la steng du sbyin sreg byas na bu ster bar nges so//
362b1(rgyud 'bum): gal te gter 'dod pas sa 'am rin po che la rnam thos sras kyi gzugs khru gang ba byas nas/ rin po che 'am spang leb kyi steng du bzhag nas/ mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs phul nas gsol ba btab na
362b2(rgyud 'bum): zhag bdun na rin po che ster bar byed do/ / gal te shi bar dogs pas dkyil 'khor khru gang zlum po ser por byas nas/ dbus su bum pa legs par gzhag pa'i nang du sman sna tshogs blugs nas ras
362b3(rgyud 'bum): dkar pos kha bkab par byas te/ gsang sngags kyi rgyal po mang du brjod nas phyis bum pa la dngos grub blangs na ci 'dod pa 'grub bo// de ltar yang yang byas pas tshe'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro//
362b4(rgyud 'bum): gal te mchog grub par 'dod pas sa 'am rin po che la phyag na rdo rje zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa gdan pad+ma dang nyi ma la gnas par byas nas/ de rin po che'i snod du bzhag la/ maN+Dal dkar po
362b5(rgyud 'bum): khru gang ba byas pa'i steng du khri'u'i steng du bzhag la me tog dang gos dkar pos mchod cing tsan dan dkar po'i chus ci nus par mchod pa byed cing / yang tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang / bco
362b6(rgyud 'bum): lnga dang / gnam stong la de'i dus su sbyang ba byas nas/ phyis ni brgyad stong gi grangs su gsang sngags 'don par byed cing rang nyid kyi spyi bor yi ge a dkar po 'od dang ldan pas bdud rtsi'i chu
362b7(rgyud 'bum): 'bebs par bsams pas/ khams gsum pa'i nad thams cad zad par bsam zhing slar rang nyid kyi rim gyis zhu bar byed pa ni rgyud las grub pa'i bsam gtan te/ 'di goms pas gang dang gang
363a1(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa thams cad 'grub cing khams gsum gyi dbang phyug tu 'gyur ro/ / gsang ba'i bdag po nga la nyon// 'jig rten kun las rnam rgyal ba'i// sku ni sangs rgyas
363a2(rgyud 'bum): kun bdag nyid/ / gang gis bgos par 'gyur ba las// ci 'dod rnyed par byed pa mchog/ gal te rtog med de bral na// ye shes nyid ni bla na med// rgyal ba'i stobs kyis rtogs par byed//
363a3(rgyud 'bum): nyon mongs kun las rgyal byed cing // nad rnams thams cad zad byed cing // gal te nad med nad bcas byed// dbang dang rengs dang dgug pa dang // brgyal dang gsad dang dbang phyug dang //
363a4(rgyud 'bum): zhi dang srung dang dpal byed dang // phyir rgol ba rnams brlag pa yi// phra mo 'grub pa smos ci dgos// 'jig rten las grol bde ba'i lus// rgyal ba'i gsung gis legs thob bo// sku ni 'dir
363a5(rgyud 'bum): brjod med pas te/ / spyod tshul rnams las 'das pa'o// ming dang tshogs las rnams 'das na// nyer zhi spros las shin tu 'das// tshig gi yul ni rnam pa bral// rdo rje sgo la de dag ni// tri
363a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin don ni shes 'gyur gyi/ / gzhan du bskal pa stong du yang // cis kyang shes par ga la nus// gal te dmigs pa zad 'dod pas// mi dmigs spros med gang zhig la// rang gi sems nyid
363a7(rgyud 'bum): gzhag par bya/ / de la thar pas grol ba'o// gal te dga' 'gyur yid yod na// dngos 'di shes pas ci ste stong // de stong spros dang bral ba la// shes pa nyid ni ci la brten// gsang sngags
363b1(rgyud 'bum): / drag po'i sbyor ba 'di// dbang bskur snang ba med pa dang // tshul ngan lang tsho phra ba dang // nga rgyal dregs shing khengs pa dang // theg pa che la ma mos la// yi ge tsam yang bstan pa min// gal te brgya lam rmod//
363b2(rgyud 'bum): pa 'gas// bstan na rang nyid phung bar byed// de skad du khams gsum las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer de slar rang gi thugs kar bsdus nas zhal thams cad zhal la thim zhing / phyag thams cad
363b3(rgyud 'bum): phyag la thim nas/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis por gyur te/ hUM hUM hUM zhes pa'i glu blangs so// 'di la ji ltar dmigs byas bzhin// lha rnams kun la dmigs par 'gyur// gsang sngags 'bum du
363b4(rgyud 'bum): brjod byas nas/ / bsnyen pa'i dam pa 'di 'grub bo// 'das dang ma 'das 'ong 'gyur ba'i// sangs rgyas rnams kyis sngags 'di bshad// 'di ni sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // ye shes chen po zhes brjod do//
363b5(rgyud 'bum): denas 'khor de dag thams cad ni gtso bo'i thugs kar thim par gyur to// kA ye rdo rje chen po ni// lag na rdo rje stobs po che// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba'i mdzod 'dzin gyur pa'o//
363b6(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi rdo rje gdengs pa'i rgyud las/ khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i le'u rdzogs so// / paN+Di ta a Da ya shrI ma ti zhes bya ba
363b7(rgyud 'bum): dang / thod kyi lo tsa ba ban de chos kyi dbang phyug grags kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// @/ rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+re tsaN+Da tsit+ta gu
364a1(rgyud 'bum): h+ya tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud/ dpal gtum po phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/
364a2(rgyud 'bum): 'og min gyi gnas lcang lo can gyi pho brang na sku dang / gsung dang / thugs dang / yon tan dang / 'phrin las la gzigs pa'i bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sku las longs spyod
364a3(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs pa'i sku dang / sprul pa'i sku dang / rdo rje'i sku dang / mngon par byang chub pa'i skus 'gro ba'i don mdzad do// brjod med don gyi gsung dang / dgongs pa brda'i gsung dang / tshangs pa
364a4(rgyud 'bum): dbyangs kyi gsung dang / dbyer mi phyed pa'i gsung dang / rig pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi gsung gis 'gro ba'i don mdzad do// chos kyi dbyings kyi thugs dang // me long lta bu'i thugs dang /
364a5(rgyud 'bum): mnyam pa nyid kyi thugs dang / so sor kun rtog gi thugs dang / bya ba grub pa'i thugs kyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad do// gnas dang / gdan khro dang / 'khor dang / 'dul ba'i zhing dang
364a6(rgyud 'bum): sku 'od zer bsam gyis mi khyab pas 'gro ba'i don mdzad do/ / zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang / dbang dang / drag po dang / lhun gyis grub pa'i 'phrin las kyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad do// de'i mod
364a7(rgyud 'bum): dus na bcom ldan 'das rigs lnga dang rigs gsum la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sems can 'dul ba'i dus la bab par gzigs nas/ ma chags pa'i thugs rjes rnam pa sna tshogs
364b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sprul pas 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'o/ / de'i tshe na lha ma srin shin tu dregs pa dang dregs pa'i ru tha zhen chags kyi 'dam na gnas pa/ nga rgyal gyi ri rab la gnas pa/ phrag dog gi rlung sems
364b2(rgyud 'bum): la 'chub pa/ gti mug mun pa'i g.yung drung na gnas pa/ de lta bu dag 'dul ba'i dus la bab par gzigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thugs gcig tu gyur te/ mi gnas pa'i
364b3(rgyud 'bum): ye shes chen po las rdo rje'i rigs dang / bud+d+ha'i rigs dang / rin po che'i rigs dang / pad+ma'i rigs dang / las kyi rigs su gyur te so so'i yum dang chas nas bzhugs te/ thugs 'dus pa'i byin
364b4(rgyud 'bum): gyi rlabs las thams cad kyi rigs kyi sangs rgyas sku bai DUR+Ya'i rang bzhin ltar sngo ba/ sngon por snang ba/ sngo bar gyur pa/ rin po che in+d+ra nI la ljang khu lta bu'i kha dog tu snang ba/ lcang lo can gyi cha byad
364b5(rgyud 'bum): phyag na rdo rje bsnams nas thugs kar brtan pa byung ngo / / byung bar gyur to// de'i mthu dang stobs kyis 'jigs rten na gnas pa'i dregs pa can btul te dam la btags nas byang chub mchog tu sems
364b6(rgyud 'bum): bskyed do/ / dpal rdo rje gtum po thams cad gsang ba'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// / yang de'i tshe na nyon mongs pa la gnas pa'i sems can zhi bas mi 'dul
364b7(rgyud 'bum): bar gyur pa dag gnas pa las/ rigs lnga'i bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsang ba'i bdag po la bka' bsgo ba ste/ kye gsang sngags dang / rig sngags dang / gzungs sngags kun gyi
365a1(rgyud 'bum): bdag po zhi bas mi 'dul ba'i sems can la thams cad khros pa'i tshul gyis gdul du gsol zhes bka' stsal to/ / oM badz+ra pA Ni kro d+ha kro d+ha hUM hUM/ zhes ched du brjod pa
365a2(rgyud 'bum): lan gsum ched du brjod pas/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can mche ba gtsigs shing 'tsham pa/ mig me mdag gi phung po ltar 'bar ba/ dbugs dur khrod kyi me
365a3(rgyud 'bum): ltar 'bar ba/ 'jigs pa'i nga ro bskal pa'i dus mtha' ltar sgrog pa/ lag pa dang rkang pa klu'i rgyal po nor bu dang nor rgyas kyi bus brgyan pa/ klu'i rgyal po nag po dang nye gnag pos se ral khar
365a4(rgyud 'bum): brgyan pa/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo 'bar bas rna tsha byas pa/ sbrul gdug pa 'bar ba za ba/ bzhin rgyas pa/ smin ma sar nag dpral ba la bsdus pa/ gshin rje'i cha byad can/ lce
365a5(rgyud 'bum): glog ltar 'gyu ba/ gsus pa che sbrul za ba/ lag pa'i thal mo brdabs pa'i sgras 'jigs par byed pa/ klu'i rgyal po 'dab bzang ska rags su bcings pa/ a la la zhes 'jigs par byed pa/ smug
365a6(rgyud 'bum): par byed pa/ rgya mtsho'i zabs su dpag tshad brgyad khri yod pa rkang pa'i pus mo tsam du phyin pa/ dbang po dang nyi ma phrag pa la khur ba/ klu thams cad rlag par byed pa/ ha la'i gang rgyangs chen pos dgod
365a7(rgyud 'bum): bas kun tu 'khrug par byed pa/ khams gsum 'jigs shing skrag par byed pa/ klu rnams 'chi bar byed pa zhig byung ste/ rang gi gzungs sngags 'di ched du brjod do// tad+ya thA/ b+ho b+ho ban nA ga a d+hi
365b1(rgyud 'bum): pa ta me/ mad nI la m+ba rad+hA ra shA dAr/ badz+rA pA Ni hr-id lA~M/ yar+tha samA ti kram thA/ ut+pa s+yA da na b+ha bish+tsa ti/ tad+ya thA/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ bi bud+d+ha bi bud+d+ha/ mahe prA byAt+ta/ ha ra ha ra nA kAn+d+ha/ pra har prahA/
365b2(rgyud 'bum): ra nA gAn+d+ha/ ts+tshin+dats+tshin+da nA ga hr-id ya na~M/ b+hin+da b+hin+da nA ga dA mA ni/ b+hi She maN+Da nA ga sha rI raM/ thi s+pho Tha ya nA ga na yan/ tad+yathA/ hUM phaT/ nag bo dA ra Na sa phaT/ nA gota mA mA la phaT/ ne zha bas mA ma la/
365b3(rgyud 'bum): a tha tin ta bi la bI rA kra mA ya phaT/ kr-i tan+t+ra ma phaT/ kr-i tan ta nu pA ya phaT/ ro Sha N+DA la phaT/ trA sa nA la phaT/ kuM b+hUr+N+Na ud sAd nA la phaT/ pre tA bi shA n+ya binA sha ka rA ya paT/ yak+Sha a da mA ra dzin
365b4(rgyud 'bum): sha ka rA ya phaT/ ha sa ha sa/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ mA raM ya mA ra ya/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ sarba big+h+nAM bi nA sha ka rA ye phaT/ sarba shatrU~M sa~M g+ha be nA sha karA ya phaT/ nAM lAM bar d+ha ra badz+ra pA N+Di rA dz+nyA pa ya ti sar+b+ba/ de skad ces
365b5(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsal ma thag tu dregs pa can phal pa dag ri mo bzhin g.yo ba med par gyur te brgya la/ rab tu brgyal ba las phyir dran pa sangs nas 'di skad ces gsol to// kye gsang ba'i bdag po khyod
365b6(rgyud 'bum): ni thugs rje'i mnga' bdag kun gyi mgon dang skyabs su gyur pa lags na/ bdag cag gi sdug bsngal 'di las thar bar mdzad du gsol zhes gsol to// de nas dregs pa can de dag dam la
365b7(rgyud 'bum): btags te dbang bskur/ dam tshig phog nas byang chub tu sems bskyed do// dpal rdo rje gtum po thams cad gsang ba'i rgyud las/ dregs pa can phal pa btul ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//
366a1(rgyud 'bum): de nas 'jig rten gyi dregs pa can dag shin tu'ang dregs par gyur pa dag klu rgyal rigs kyi rgyal po rgya mtsho zhes bya ba dang / rje'u rigs kyi rgyal po kun nas gdugs
366a2(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba dang / bram ze'i rigs kyi rgyal po chu lha zhes bya ba dang / gdol pa'i rgyal po shI la pu ka ra zhes bya ba dang / bdud kyi rgyal po skos rje brang dkar dang / gza' rgod chen po dang /
366a3(rgyud 'bum): dkar po dung gi thor tsugs can dang / btsan gyi rgyal po dmar po srog len dang / gshin rje'i rgyal po dmigs pa dang / ma mo'i rgyal mo mkha' dbyings kyi yum ga shin rje'i sring mo phung byed re ba
366a4(rgyud 'bum): ti la sogs pa dang / shin tu dregs pa can gyis 'jig rten phung bar byed pa dag ma thul ba las longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku lngas/ kye gsang ba'i bdag po dregs pa pho mo dag thul bar
366a5(rgyud 'bum): ma gyur te/ thams cad kyi thabs kyis dregs pa nyon mongs pa gdul bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal to// dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyang gsang ba'i bdag po la 'di skad ces gsung ngo // /
366a6(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten gyi dregs pa 'di dag 'dod chags la gnas pas sems can la rnam par 'tshe'i/ kun gyi lus dang srog ma rungs par byed pas khyod kyis thams cad khros pa'i tshul gyis thul cig ces
366a7(rgyud 'bum): bsgo'o/ / phyogs bcu'i zhing khams rnam par dag pa na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rigs so sor kun nas 'dus pa rnams kyang gsung gcig gi nga ros 'di
366b1(rgyud 'bum): skad ces gsung ngo / / gsang ba'i bdag po khyod shin tu khros pa'i tshul gyis ston lam 'phyis pa'i stobs kyis dregs pa can thul cig ces bsgo'o// gzhan yang rig sngags dang / gsang sngags
366b2(rgyud 'bum): dang gzungs sngags kyi bdag po thams cad 'dus te/ rigs kyi bdag po dang / rigs kyi yum dang / rigs kyi khro bo dang / rigs kyi sprul pa dang / rigs kyi pho nya mo la sogs pa thams
366b3(rgyud 'bum): cad 'dus nas mgrin gcig tu bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba'i bdag po gdul bya'i zhing 'di dag zhi ba'i cha byad kyis mi 'dul bas/ zhe sdang dang gdug sems su bcas pa/ nyon mongs pa rang
366b4(rgyud 'bum): dga' mar spyod pa/ 'dod pa'i skom gyis gdungs pa 'di dag khyod kyi mthu'i stobs kyis shin tu khros pa'i cha byad ston la ma 'phyi bar myur bar rab tu thul cig ces bka' bsgo'o// de nas sku mi snang ba
366b5(rgyud 'bum): ye shes chen po'i ngang la bzhugs so/ / dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud las/ khro bor bka' bsgo ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas rigs lnga yab yum
366b6(rgyud 'bum): gnyis su med pa'i mkha' las thugs rje khros pa'i sa bon hUM mthing nag ha la nag po'i mdog lta bu 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba/ rab tu 'bar ba/ kun tu rab tu 'bar ba dag byung ste/ de'i byin gyis
366b7(rgyud 'bum): rlabs las thugs rje'i byin gyi rlabs las e mthing nag dang / yaM sngo skya dang / raM khaM dmar nag dang / su ser nag dang / raM dmar nag dang / ko dkar skya dang / sna tshogs pa'i bruM 'phros par gyur to//
367a1(rgyud 'bum): de dag gi 'phro 'du las gru gsum mthing nag nam mkha' dang / sngo skya rlung zla gam dang / dmar nag rak+Sha'i rgya mtsho dang / ser nag zhing chen sa gzhi dang / dkar skya keng
367a2(rgyud 'bum): rus ri rab dang / sna tshogs rin po che'i gzhal yas khang mthing nag rdo rje rgya gram las lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor du gyur to// chos nyid mi 'gyur lhun gyis grub pa'i lte ba'i mthing nag zlum po
367a3(rgyud 'bum): 'phrin las rnam pa bzhis lhun gyis grub pa'i rgya gram gyi rtse mo phyogs bcur 'phro ba/ bar mtshams rin po che sna bzhi las lhun gyis grub pa/ gru chang rin po che ljang khur snang ba/ sgra bzhi rin po
367a4(rgyud 'bum): che sna bzhi tshad med pa bzhi'i 'phrin las su snang ba/ sna tshogs kyi rgyan rang bzhin du snang ba/ rang byung bar gyur to// de nas hUM mthing nag khro bo'i sa bon de las sna tshogs rdo rje phra mo'i 'od tsha tsha ltar
367a5(rgyud 'bum): 'phros/ rdo rje phra mo'i 'od zer la rdo rje lcags kyu phra mo bsam gyis mi khyab pas 'jig rten gyi dregs pa can kun dang / srog la rngam pa'i srin po pho mo sna tshogs pa bkug ste/ gzhal yas khang gi
367a6(rgyud 'bum): phyi rol tu shing rtsa ba nas bsgyel ba bzhin du gyur te ri mo bzhin g.yo ba med par gyur to/ / mthu'i byin gyis rlabs kyis 'khor lo'i lte dbus su rdo ba bsgyur ba bzhin du gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa
367a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyis kyang stir baM zhes brjod pas srin po pho mo dran pa rnyeng de mdun du gyur to/ / dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud las/ gzhal yas khang lhun gyis grub pa'i le'u ste bzhi
367b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / de nas thugs rje khros pa'i hUM mthing nag 'od 'bar ba las de bzhin gshegs pa kun gsung gcig gis a b+hi ro Sha Na hUM zhes gsungs pa las khro gnyer bsdus/
367b2(rgyud 'bum): shing zhal bgrang bas dug gsum rtsad nas gcod pa'i mche ba zur gsum gtsigs pa/ de ltar 'bar ba'i cha byad du snang ba zhig byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams chen po gsum g.yos/ rab tu
367b3(rgyud 'bum): g.yos/ kun tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos par gyur to// dpal rdo rje gtum po thams cad gsang ba'i rgyud las/ 'bar ba'i khro bo khros pa'i tshul du bskyed pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//
367b4(rgyud 'bum): / de'i tshe de'i dus na dus gsum gyi theg pa'i bdag po thams cad 'dus te/ ye shes kyi mkha' gsang ba'i bum pas 'bar ba'i khro bo de'i lus kun bkrus te ye shes kyi bum pa'i chu
367b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyun gyis dbang bskur ro/ / dag par 'khru bar byed pa'i nye shing pa dang / sgrib pa sbyong zhing kun tu skyob par byed pa'i phur mong gi thal ba dang / chos nyid kyi rtsi dang / ye shes kyi bcud mar la
367b6(rgyud 'bum): sogs pas 'gro ba rnams kyi tshul dang ldan pa'i phyir dbang bskur ro/ / ye shes kyi khro bo de lus la sim zhing rgyas te bde ba skyes par gyur te/ de nas rigs thams cad kyi bdag po sangs rgyas lnga
367b7(rgyud 'bum): yum dang bcas pas bde ba la snyoms par zhugs te/ gnyis su med pa'i mkha' las ye shes kyi yig 'bru khri mthing kha dang / khri dkar po dang / khri ser po dang / khri dmar po dang / waM ljang khu da /
368a1(rgyud 'bum): khri sna tshogs kyi mdog tu snang ba dag 'thon te/ gsung gcig gis bskyed bskul gyi sngags bka' stsal pa/ hUM e yaM raM khaM su raM ke bruM/ a b+hi ro ShaNahUM/ oM nyi ma sa swA/
368a2(rgyud 'bum): la nAM ga ru Da tsa le tsa le hUM phaT/ ces gsungs pa las ye shes las sprul pa khyung mthing kha dang / dkar po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / ljang khu dang / so so nas sna tshogs pa 'dus pa'i
368a3(rgyud 'bum): khyung lus dkar ba/ gshog pa sngo ba/ rA ye shes spu gri 'bar ba/ gdug pa can 'dren cing za ba/ 'bar ba'i khro bo'i thugs rje la gnas par gyur to// lus kha dog lnga la/ mchu gnam
368a4(rgyud 'bum): lcags kyi rdo rje las grub pa/ gshog pa nam mkha'i mtha' ma khebs pa/ mig gser zhun ma bzhin du snang ba/ gdug pa'i sbrul rigs bzhi so sor za ba dag spyi gtsug dang / dpral ba dang /
368a5(rgyud 'bum): rna ltag g.yas g.yon dang / dbu'i ltag khung la sogs par gnas so// rigs so sor phyag mtshan so sos dbang bskur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi bdag pos 'khor lo spyi gtsug tu
368a6(rgyud 'bum): / byin te/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma kohaM/ zhes gsung zhing 'khor lo byin no// gsung gi rigs kyi bdage bos kyang / aHsarba ta thA ga ta bA ka badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma kohaM/ zhes gsu
368a7(rgyud 'bum): zhing chos kyi 'khor lo mgrin par gzhag go/ / thugs kyi rigs kyi bdag pos kyang / hUM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma kon+daH/ zhes thugs kar rdo rje gzhag go// yon tan gyi rigs kyi bdag
368b1(rgyud 'bum): bos kyang / swA sarba ta thA ga ta rat+na gu h+ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ zhes rgya gram dang lte bar rin po che 'bar ba gzhag go/ las kyi rigs kyi bdag pos kyang / hA sarba ta thA ga ta karma gu h+ya a b+hi Shiny+tsamAM/
368b2(rgyud 'bum): ye shes kyi khro chung sku chung la spyan che ba/ rdo rje dang sdigs mdzub 'dzin pa/ dkar po dang / dmar po dang / ser po dang / ljang khu dang / mthing kha la sogs te sna tshogs pa'i khro chung 'thon to//
368b3(rgyud 'bum): 'thon par gyur to// de dag gi byin gyi rlabs kyis sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos par gyur to// sreg pa'i bskal pa'i sgra tsam yang drug par
368b4(rgyud 'bum): gyur to/ / de dag tshur 'dus shing nam mkha' la babs nas 'khor lo 'bar ba'i lte dbus su gnas pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung cig gis/ ro sha Na yak+Sha gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na
368b5(rgyud 'bum): phaT/ ces gsungs pa las ye shes kyi khro bo// sku dug ha la nag po'i mdog ltar 'tsher ba/ ye shes rngam pa'i spyan gsum bskal pa'i glog ltar 'khyug cing gdug pa nyi ma'i 'od zer bzhin
368b6(rgyud 'bum): gang la bltas pa brlag nus shing tsha ba/ smin ma rngam pa'i glog drag po bzhin ser nag tu 'bar bas gti mug dang nyon mongs pa'i mun pa sel bar byed pa/ smar ser nag la ye shes kyi me 'bar ba/
368b7(rgyud 'bum): nyon mongs pa'i bag chags sreg pa/ nyon mongs pa gti mug 'joms par byed pa'i glang po che'i ko rlon gsol ba/ nyon mongs pa'i zhe sdang 'dul ba'i rtags su/ gcan gzan gyi rgyal po stag gi
369a1(rgyud 'bum): sham thabs bgos pa/ nyon mongs pa phrag dog 'dul bar byed pa'i rtags su gzig gi mgo dos brgyan pa/ nyon mongs pa'i 'khor ba ma spangs pas zhing chen gyi
369a2(rgyud 'bum): g.yang gzhi gsol ba/ sbrul dkar khras dbu brgyan pa/ ser khras mgur chu byas pa/ dmar khras phyag gdub byas pa/ ljang khras rked bcings byas pa/ nag khras zhabs gdub byas pa/
369a3(rgyud 'bum): dug gsum ngang gis mi spong bar nyon mongs pa'i sha khrag gsol ba/ sku dang / gsung dang / thugs dang ldan pa'i thod pa skam po dang / rlon pa dang / ne 'phreng gis sku la brgyan pa/
369a4(rgyud 'bum): chos nyid skye ba med pa'i don dang ldan zhing / 'khor ba khrag zhag dang 'dra ba la thugs rjes gzigs pa'i phyir zhag gi tho ris kyis sku la brgyan pa/ theg pa chen po'i dbang gis thams cad
369a5(rgyud 'bum): 'dul ba'i phyir thal chen gyi tshom bus sku la brgyan pa/ chos nyid skye ba med pa'i don dang ldan zhing dbu 'bar ba'i cha byad du snang ste/ dbu skra sngo nag la ral pa'i cod pan gyis bsgyings pa/ zhabs
369a6(rgyud 'bum): g.yas pa brjid pa'i tshul gyis bskum nas gnas pa/ zhabs g.yon pa drag po'i tshul gyis bgrad nas gnas pa/ srog la rngam pa'i srin po pho mo brdzis pa/ phyag g.yas pa na rdo rje rtse lnga pa
369a7(rgyud 'bum): rdeg pa'i tshul du 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa na sdigs pa'i mdzub mo phyar ba dag tu snang ba zhes rgya gram dang / ral gri 'bar bas yan lag bzhi la las kyi byed pa por dbang bskur ro// dam rdzas bdud rtsi
369b1(rgyud 'bum): rnam lngas dbang bskur nas 'phrin las thams cad kyi byed pa por dbang bskur te/ de yang gnyis su med pa'i rol pas so// dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud las/ de bzhin gshegs/
369b2(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyis 'bar ba'i khro bo la dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas dpal rdo rje gtum po lag na rdo rjes sdigs mdzub ni bsgreng / rdo rje ni spar nas 'bar
369b3(rgyud 'bum): ba'i khro bo'i lta bas kun tu bltas te/ spyan ni bzlog/ zhal ni bgrang nas rngam pa'i sgra skad ni ha ha/ hUM hUM/ a la la/ aM aM/ d+hi d+hi/ ho ho/ zhes pa'i byin rlabs las phrag pa gnyis rab tu/
369b4(rgyud 'bum): 'bar te/ rdo rje khro bo dkar ba/ rnam par dkar ba dag mtha' yas pa 'thon to// dpral ba rnam par 'bar ba las khro bo mthing kha sna tshogs pa 'thon to// mgrin pa rab tu 'bar ba las khro bo dmar po rnam
369b5(rgyud 'bum): par dmar ba dag 'thon to/ / thugs ka rab tu 'bar ba las rdo rje khro bo nag po rab tu 'bar ba sna tshogs pa 'thon to// sku lte ba rab tu 'bar ba las khro bo ljang khu rab tu 'bar ba bdag 'thon to// 'bar ba'i
369b6(rgyud 'bum): khro bo de dag kyang 'bar ba/ rab tu 'bar ba/ kun tu rab tu 'bar ba/ me lce lta bu ste/ shin tu rngam pa/ shin tu 'jigs pa/ dgod pa'i mdog tu snang ba/ log sred can dag la gshe ba'i mdog tu
369b7(rgyud 'bum): snang ba/ thams cad thugs rje chen pos kun la khyab pa/ thugs zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang / dbang dang / drag po dang / 'phrin las bzhi yis sku'i dngos po shin tu bsgyur te 'gro ba'i don mdzad do// zhal
370a1(rgyud 'bum): nas rngam pa'i sgra sgrog pa de dag kun kyang khro bo'i stang stabs dang / mchongs pa dang / 'gying ba dang / rtse ba dang / spyan bgrad pa dang / mche ba gtsigs pa dang / khro gnyer mi
370a2(rgyud 'bum): bzang pa gtsigs pa shin tu mi bzad pa'i khro bor sprul te/ rtsi mchog gi rgyal po ma g+ha d+ha'i drir ldan pas gdug pa can kun gyi snying rab tu rul bar byed pa/ de lta bu'i 'bar ba'i khro bo de dag sprul rab
370a3(rgyud 'bum): / tu sprul par gyur to// de nas rnam pa'i gsung gis drag po'i sngags bka' stsal pa/ oM badz+ra tsaN+Da/ oM bi pu le/ oM badz+ra tsaN+Da pra ba ra nA ga/ oM badz+ra tsaN+Da ma hA nA go hr-i da ya/ A brte/
370a4(rgyud 'bum): dz+wAdz+wa la dz+wA la/ sarba nA ga hr-i da yA ni/ A brte dz+wA la/ sarba nA ga hr-i da yA ni/ ki mi ki mi/ nA ga ku lan bi d+h+waM sa ni/ ha na ha na/ sarba nA ga duSh+TaM/ hr-i da yA ni/ da ha da ha/ sarba duSh+TA na nA ga ba na ni
370a5(rgyud 'bum): pa tsa pa ts+ya/ pA tsa ya pA tsa ya/ sarba duSh+TAM nA gA nAM/ a kra ma/ a kra ma sU tra ma sa ka ra bi ma li/ bi kra maM/ ma hA nA ga te dza ba re swA hA/ zhes pas de dag thams cad yur yur por gyur to// stong gsum
370a6(rgyud 'bum): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos par gyur to// dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud las/ dbang du bsdus pa'i le'u ste

370b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i gsung dang brjid pa'i sku las 'di skad gsungs so/ / khro ba'i rgyal po nga nyid kyis// srid pa gsum na gnas pa yang // thams cad ma lus zil gyis mnam// rigs pa'i klu rgyal 'khor dang bcas/
370b2(rgyud 'bum): gzi byin drag pos mnan par bya// nga ni mthu stobs bdag po ste// rngam pa'i gsung dang brjid pa'i sku// phyag rgya drag pos zil gyis mnan// zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod nas brjid gnon gyi phyag rgya

370b4(rgyud 'bum): pa.oM badz+ra tsaN+Da badz+ra pA Ni/ hUM hUM/ ga ru Da b+hak+She/ hUM hUM/ dze mA la ba ri tsi/ sri tsa hUM phaT/ ces ched du brjod pas dregs pa can dang klu thams cad myos rab tu myos nas bka' bzhin bgyi'o zhes gsol to// de dag
370b5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyang myos pa'i chu drag po 'thungs pa lta bu 'am/ skyes bu gnyis kyis gdungs pa lta bu ste/ de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu gsol pa/ kye mgasang ba'i bdag po bcom ldan 'das/ rig
370b6(rgyud 'bum): sngags bdag po khro bo'i rgyal/ / khyod kyi rig sngags dmod pa yis// shin tu mi bzang rab tu myos// 'bangs su mchi zhing bka' bzhin 'tshal// thugs rje can gyis bdag cag la// rab tu dgongs shing 'bang
370b7(rgyud 'bum): su mchi/ / spang ma rnams la 'tshe mi bgyid// ces dam bcas so// dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud las/ dregs pa can zil gyis mnan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//
371a1(rgyud 'bum): de nas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i sde dpon chen po brgya byin zhes bya ba ga la ba der 'ongs te/ mchod pa'i yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs pas mchod nas rdo rje khro bo de la 'di skad ces gsol to//
371a2(rgyud 'bum): kye khro bo'i bdag po chen po dregs pa gdug pa can 'di dag ni shin tu ma rungs par gyur na/ 'di dag brid nas bstan pa gnas pa'i thabs kyi spro ba mdzad du gsol zhes gsol pa las/ lha'i dbang po nyon cig
371a3(rgyud 'bum): klu rnams kyi rdzas sna tshogs pa bsags la/ bdag nyid kyi lus dag cing gtsang bar byas la/ longs ma spyad pa'i ras dkar po bgos te/ mngar ba dang gsung ba'i dri zhim po dang ldan pa'i thig les lus byugs
371a4(rgyud 'bum): la bu ram dang / sha ka ra dang / sbrang rtsi mur bar byas/ zhag bdun nam dgu'i gong nas kha zas ngan pa spang bar bya'o// lus kyi rnam pa la rma bya'i sgro lnga btsugs te shes rab can gyis bya'o// klu'i sman sna tshogs
371a5(rgyud 'bum): pa dang 'jam pa'i 'bru bsres pa'i phye ma mngar ba'i chus spras te ri lu sha rtug gi 'bru tsam brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o/ / klu sman rnam pa tha dad pa'ang blags te dkar gsum la sogs pa dang ldan par bya'o// de nas thugs rje chen
371a6(rgyud 'bum): pos gzigs te/ klu yi rgyal po 'khor dang bcas// dga' dang gus pas spyan 'dren gyis// brtse zhing gdungs pas tshur shog cig/ dga' zhing gus pas mngan mi sems// kun kyang brtse bas tshur shog cig/ ces
371a7(rgyud 'bum): bka' sprul pas/ de dag kun gyi dbang po kun kyang shin tu dngangs par gyur nas sha ring la sbrang ma 'dus pa lta bu ste/ kun kyang dga' ba'i mdangs dang chas nas gang na ba der 'khod do// sngags bka' sprul pa/
371b1(rgyud 'bum): nA ga rA dza sa ma ya swA hA/ zhes bka' stsal pas/ kun kyang tshim par gyur to// de dag kun gyis kyang mgrin gcig gis dam tshig gi rim pa phul ba/ dpa' bo chen po khro bo'i bdag/ khyod kyi
371b2(rgyud 'bum): bka' las 'das gyur na/ / bdag cag rnams kyi mgo lus snying // dum bu rags nas rul bar shog/ tud+ya thA/ oM tsa TA tsan+da/ bi tsa Ta/ sha tha sha thA/ sA tsa rA tsi te swA hA/ zhes gsol to//
371b3(rgyud 'bum): dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud las/ gdug pa can bka' la btags pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas yang lha'i dbang po chen pos gsol pa/ kye rdo rje
371b4(rgyud 'bum): khro bo dag dregs pa can 'di dag shin tu ma rungs par gyur na/ la la dag ni rus pa chag cing grugs/ la la dag ni tshe'i 'du byed mtha' la gtugs su nye/ la la dag ni nam mkha' lding dbu'i
371b5(rgyud 'bum): gtsug tor na gnas pas len pa'i sdug bsngal gyis gzir/ la la dag ni khrag bskams/ la la drag ni sen mo dang yan lag chag/ la la dag ni gti mug gi gnyid log pas byang chub kyi snying po mi shes
371b6(rgyud 'bum): la la ngag ni rtsa dang rgyus pa chad de nad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gdungs/ la la ngag ni lus kun tsha ba'i nad kyis nyam thag/ la la dag ni rtsi shing yang mi grag/ la la dag ni nyon mongs pa rgyas te sngon sems bskyed pa rjes
371b7(rgyud 'bum): su mi dran/ la la dag ni sems bskyed pa rjes su dran yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal mi mthong / la la dag ni yi dgas kyi khams lta bu ste kha zas kyi skal ba dang mi ldan na/ 'di dag gso ba'i
372a1(rgyud 'bum): thabs bka' stsal du gsol zhes gsol ba las/ lha'i dbang po dag dbang po'i lag pas ni lag pa chad pa sos par 'gyur ro// chu srin sder mos ni sen mo chag pa sos
372a2(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / nA ga ge sar gyis ni byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// na ga puSh+pa sa ni klu'i gnas me tog gi nags tshal du 'gyur ro// gu gul gyi dri chen pos ni de ma yin pa
372a3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad bsregs nas/ klu'i sna la bsnams pa tsam gyis sngon byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa dran par 'gyur ro// 'bras yos kyis ni klu'i nad thams cad 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// thang ka bya rgyus pu
372a4(rgyud 'bum): shel gyis ni rtsa rgyus chad pa sos par 'gyur ro/ / ga pur gyis ni rtsa ba'i nad sos nas lus kyi bcud kun tshim par byed do// dar le brgan gyis ni kA ru Nas 'jigs pa las skyob par byed do// mtshan dang /

372a6(rgyud 'bum): pa sos par byed do/ / dung gis rus pa chag pa sos par byed do// ras skung dmar pos ni srog 'gags pa tshangs pa'i tshe dang ldan par byed do// dkar dang mngar gyis zhal zas ro mchog brgya dang ldan

372b1(rgyud 'bum): gso ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o/ / / de nas lha'i dbang pos gsol pa/ kye rdo rje khro bo chen po/ 'di dag bsdigs na ji ltar bsdigs// gags dag gcad pa ji lta bu/
372b2(rgyud 'bum): brlag par bya ba ji lta bu// rdo rje khro bos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig dbang po rnam par rgyal// bsdigs par bya ba 'di dag go/ shin tu khros bcas mgo bstan la// mkha' lding kA ru sprul par bya//

372b7(rgyud 'bum): zag nag skyes pa'i tshe nag shug/ sor ni bdun bdun tshad du bya// ma du zur gsum sor gsum tshad// 'bru chan nag po nag ltar sbyar// ming bya sbyin sreg rab tu s+phar// brgya rtsa brgyad de nyi shu gcig/

373b6(rgyud 'bum): dang mtshungs/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi sras su dgongs// gang zhig gsang sngags 'di 'chang ba// kun gyis nga dang 'dra bar mthong // gang zhig gsang sngags 'di 'chang ba// nga nyid rgyun du de na gnas//

374a1(rgyud 'bum): la nis zhag mo/ / gzhan la srang bu sngon po la// mdud pa re la re re'o// chu'am ying ni rang la'o// sha ri dang mi g+hata// gser dang rma bya grum pa'i spu/ @
374a2(rgyud 'bum): tshon sna lnga'i srad bu la/ / tsakra khris la mgul dang gtsug/ mo g.yon po g.yas bsrung bar bya// chus ni yams dang dug las thar// maM sa dr-i dang rak+ta dang // khub chu dag sbyar ram bza'

374a4(rgyud 'bum): gtsang dngos po sel/ / dri yi chu yi yon tan ni// klang rkang po log grang ba sal// shin tu zab ste gsang ba'i mchog/ skal ldan rtogs pa rnams kyis spyad pa las// skal med blo dman rnams kyi
374a5(rgyud 'bum): ga la yin/ / zhes gsungs so// dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud las/ bsrung ba'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas lha'i dbang pos
374a6(rgyud 'bum): 'di skad ces gsol to/ / slang ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na sems can gdug pa can gyi dug bsal ba'i mtshan nyid dang zhugs sa bstan du gsol/ nyon cig dbang po chen po legs par rab tu ring
374a7(rgyud 'bum): la zung zhig/ mtshan nyid rnams ni 'di lta ste// rus pa sha dang pags pa dang // rtsa dang khrag dang nang khrol lo// bcud dang chus te lus kyi stobs// lus kyi rtsi dang mdog dang dbyibs// reg pa chu dang
374b1(rgyud 'bum): chu ser dang / / klad pa lba ba lus kun la// zhugs sa rnams ni bco brgyad de// 'on kyang gcig sogs grangs kyis brtag/ rus pa la zhugs pa ni lus skems pa dang / zug gzer che ba
374b2(rgyud 'bum): dang / na thang nge ba dang / thig ler na ba'o// sha la zhugs pa ni lus bems sa 'dug pa dang / lus lci se 'dug pa dang / mdog gnag pa dang / dri ma ngan pa sngar 'ong ba dang / sha ra
374b3(rgyud 'bum): 'byung ba'o/ / pags pa la zhugs pa ni sha 'phrig pa dang mdog skya ba'o// rtsa la zhugs pa ni lus sbrid ber ba dang / rtags de ni bzlog dka' ba'o// sbrid lug pa dang / sbrid lci ba dang /
374b4(rgyud 'bum): tsha ba 'dzag dang tsha rab pa/ tsha ker ba dang tsha breng ba// lus la sogs pa tsha thang ba// tsha bir ba dang yan lag pra// khrag la zhugs pa ni/ sna nas khrag kyang skabs su 'dzag/ tsha ber ba dang lci yor ba/
374b5(rgyud 'bum): gdong pa stag tu dmar ba dang // 'o ma'i spris ma ltar 'ong ngo // nang khrol la zhugs pa ni/ glo snying mi bde skyug ting ngo nge// snying 'dar snying yang mi dga' ste// de nas bzlog par dka' ba'o// bcud la
374b6(rgyud 'bum): zhugs pa la bzhi ste/ sa bon mi 'byung / dbang po mi ldang / khu ba skyo ma'i mdog tu 'ong // khu ba dang sa snyigs phye nas 'ong // chu la zhugs pa ni gsum ste/ sbubs kyi chu rgya skyegs kyi khu ba ltar 'ong /
374b7(rgyud 'bum): sna chu rtag tu skya bor 'ong // mig gi chu yang rtag par 'dzag/ du ba ser bu byung tsam gyis// gzhan pas rab tu myar bar 'dzag/ lus kyi stobs la zhugs pa ni// sgyid lug pa dang skyi zhum pa/
375a1(rgyud 'bum): lus kyi rgyu ba nyal nyal 'ong // lus kyi rtsi la zhugs pa ni// so rtsi la sogs te lus kyi dri bya'i pags pa bzhin sang gis 'gro ba'o// mdog la zhugs pa ni/ 9
375a2(rgyud 'bum): ni btsod kyi mdog bzhin 'ong / / dbyibs la zhugs pa ni/ lus kyang gnyer rlung dag gis khengs// sor mo byi ba'i mjug ma 'dra// reg pa la zhugs pa ni/ sna rtse la sogs lag rtsa
375a3(rgyud 'bum): rnams/ / tsha yam tsha ber lus brtse ba// g.ya' bar 'ong ba dag yin no// chu ba la zhugs pa ni/ yan lag rengs shing na ba dang // sha 'bur ba dang grang sing sing // yan lag tshogs rnams
375a4(rgyud 'bum): khol ba'o/ / chu ser la zhugs pa ni chu ser la lnga ste/ za khol ko la/ za tsag tsag/ tsha lcibs lcibs/ lus la chu skangs yod pa'o// chu sgangs byung nas ring du mi lus la/ 'brum rjes sran
375a5(rgyud 'bum): ma 'dra'o/ / de ni bzlog par sla ba'o// klad pa la zhugs pa ni/ mgo bo phying phying skrangs pa dang / 'thom dang bem ma pa dag dang / skra rnams nul gyis byi ba la sogs pa'o// lha ba la zhugs
375a6(rgyud 'bum): pab ni/ gdong pa tsha lam lam 'ong ba dang / grung ser ser 'ong ba'o// de ni bzlog par sla ba'o// lus ring gdong yang thal skya'i mdog/ de ni bzlog par dka' ba'o// shin tu khro ba'i klu'i
375a7(rgyud 'bum): rnams ni/ / rtags dang mi ldan thugs kyis 'ong // bzlog dka' rma tshogs mi 'tshe rtags mi ldan// bzlog sla gzhan yang yan lag phra ba dang // sbom dang thung dang rengs la sogs// klu'i
375b1(rgyud 'bum): mtshan nyid du shes par bya'o/ / rtags ni de dag 'ga' zhig ni// nad gzhi gzhan ma las kyang 'byung // 'ga' ni klu yi gdon ma yin// las las 'byung ba dag kyang yod// de dag gi ni mtshan
375b2(rgyud 'bum): nyid ni/ / mkhas pas so sor shes par bya'o// nad gzhi las byung sman sogs dang // 'phrod pa'i zas ni phan pa yin// nad rnams gzhan ma yun mi rtag/ 'di 'dra'i mtshan nyid shes
375b3(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / shes nas myur du brtson 'grus kyis// sna tshogs thabs la ma rmongs pas/ bzlog pa'i las la 'bad par bya// chu yi thigs pa phra mo yis// dus su byung bas rdo ba 'bigs//
375b4(rgyud 'bum): gdug pa'i dbang can zhi ring yang // le lo dang bral rtse gcig sems// rgyun du rdzas bsgom bzlas brjod kyis// gdug pa'i nad las thar par nges// rtsol ba che la som nyi bral// gang bsams
375b5(rgyud 'bum): de las mi 'grub med/ / 'khor ba zhes pa'i phung po srog bcas la// mngon sum nyid du mthong 'gyur gyis// brtson pa dor bar mi bya'o// zhes dpal gtum po chen pos gsungs so// dpal rdo rje
375b6(rgyud 'bum): gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud las/ mtshan nyid brtag pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas lha'i dbang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i
375b7(rgyud 'bum): dus dag na/ / gdug pa can gyi yi dgas rnams// dug rnams dbyung na ji ltar dbyung // mchod pa'i las rnams ji ltar bya// chos kun bdag pos bka' stsol cig/ ces gsol to// bka' stsal pa
376a1(rgyud 'bum): lha'i dbang po nyon cig/ mchod pa'i las dag byed 'dod na// gnyis dgon gtsug lag chu mig 'gram// mtshe'u lteng ka khron pa'i steng // dbyar zla gsum la gnas par bya/
376a2(rgyud 'bum): dbyibs legs ran mdzes byi dor bya// ba yi rnam lnga spos dang dri// thig le lnga dang ldan par bya// dbus su hUM bri gsal bar bya// oM phA pho pheM pau/ 'di dag gzhi las rdzogs par bskyed// klu
376a3(rgyud 'bum): yi rgyal po rgya mtsho ni/ / lus dkar rin chen sbrul mgo gsum// lag na rin chen sdong bu'o// klu yi rgyal po kun nas gdugs// sbrul mgo gnyis pa kha dog ser// rin chen 'bar ba lag na'o//
376a4(rgyud 'bum): chu lha mgo lnga kha dog dmar// lag na pad+ma 'bar ba'o// klu rgyal shing la pu ra ka/ lag na sprin phung kha dog ljang // rgyal dang rje dang bram ze dmangs// so so'i rigs kyi rgyal po ste// spra tshil zha nya
376a5(rgyud 'bum): bag zan la/ / gzugs su yang ni mdzes par bya// sems can 'khor gyis bskor bar bya// klu sman sna tshogs dkar dang dmar// tshogs par byas la mchod sbyin bya// kham phor sbu gu mchu lnga par/ blugs
376a6(rgyud 'bum): la kha bcad gnas su sba/ / gso bar bya ba'i las ni rab// spyan drangs gdan dang phyag skyabs bstod// smon lam la sogs rgya cher bya// bden pa bdar zhing bsdigs par bya// dug rnams dbyung ba'i las
376a7(rgyud 'bum): dag ni/ / raM yaM khaM las byung ba yi// 'khor lo rnam gsum me rlung chu// sreg gtor bkru bya stong nyid kyis// 'khor lo chen po gnas par bya// hUM las gyur par ldan par bya// bzang skyob pa dang dogs
376b1(rgyud 'bum): nyes dang / / mnyam dang ldan pas mchod pa bya// de nang de bzhengs mtshan nas brjod// nya stong dus mchod sri zhus bskor// des ni don rnams 'grub par 'gyur// dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud las/
376b2(rgyud 'bum): dug dbyung zhing mchod pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos bka' stsal pa/ dus ngan tha mar gyur pa'i tshe// sdig
376b3(rgyud 'bum): la mi 'dzem mi dge spyod/ / mtshams med byed cing chos dkor 'jig/ mdze dang shu ba g.yan pa dang // bskams dang zha grum gzhogs phyed na// de'i tshe nga yi bstan pa 'byung // nyon cig dbang po
376b4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gyi mchog/ log sred gdul dka' gdol pa can// zhi bas mi 'dul gang zag gi/ gshed du 'khor lo 'di bskos so// kro d+ha rA dza'i gzungs bcas la// rdo rje rgya gram mtha' bskor rdo rje'i
376b5(rgyud 'bum): ra brtson 'grus bzhi ldan dbus dang lnga ru de'o/ / de las rgyas pa dag tu bskor 'dod na// de la khyad par khyams dang yi ge ni// bcu gcig ldan byas mtshon re'i ming rus gcar// khyams gcig hUM
376b6(rgyud 'bum): dang ming rus mang na sgrag/ dbus khyams sngags bri mngan de dag sgrag/ gcig la rdo rje hUM bar mang na gcar// rkang pa mos ma shigs na pho yi las// de ma byung na pho mo skrag pa'i las// bsod nams can gyi
376b7(rgyud 'bum): skal bzang ma thul na/ / srid pa'i gtong bzlog 'khor lo dkrugs te bskor// ro ras bri bya khA kha hu lu'i sgo// sbu gu byas la gdan nag yig sngon bri// dri dgod shing bsregs bong khrag bong dug sbyar/ dbus
377a1(rgyud 'bum): dang btson khang bzhi por rU bar gtsang / / dgos pa kun byed las rnams thams cad kyi// sngags 'di pho dang mor bri bar du gsang // oM badz+ra tsaN+Da ma hA ro ShaHhU~M phaT/ pho dang mo

377a3(rgyud 'bum): gu gul rgya tshil tshil chen ra lug smang ka ni/ / khu ba nag pos bya ba rab tu shis// bong dri nag po'i rngog ma dri rgod shi skra dang // yugs sa mo yi skra shad skud pas dkri// yugs sa mo yi der rtas gril la
377a4(rgyud 'bum): snang pho mo'i thod pa steng 'og rgya gram bri/ / ri rab mnan byas mtha' gnyis dang po bzhi// bang rim sngags bris steng du rgya gram gdab// rgya gram 'og khung steng du khru do'i tshad// bang rim pa ni la sngags

377b1(rgyud 'bum): de dag na gnas pa'i gdug pa can thams cad rab tu myos nas kha nas khrag ngan skyugs pa dag bskus te/ thams cad kyang ga na ba der thad du 'dus nas phyag 'tshal te mgrin gcig tu skad kyis 'di
377b2(rgyud 'bum): skad ces gsol to/ / kye ma snga pa ma mthong khro bdag 'jigs pa'i sku// rab tu grags pa ya mtshon e ma ho// thugs rjes dgongs shig bdag cag 'bangs su mchi// de las 'gal na dmyal bar ltung
377b3(rgyud 'bum): bar shog/ ces gsol zhing 'khod do// de nas bdud kyi rgyal po skos kyi bdag po bdud bye ba 'bum phrag dang bcas pas/ mgrin gcig gis srog gi snying po phul ba/ bcom ldan 'das bdag
377b4(rgyud 'bum): cag gi rig pa 'di pa zhes su gsol/ oM nag po tri Ta tri Ta tri ling tra ta ha ke Na/ bdag cag gi rig pa 'di gang na gnas pa der bdud kyis 'gal bar mi bgyid do// gang yid la dgos pa de grub par
377b5(rgyud 'bum): bgyid do/ / phas byang sngags dang sbyor ba btang ba'ang phyir bzlog go/ de nas gza' rgod chen por hu la 'khor gza' 'bum phrag dang bcas pas mgrin gcig gis rang rtags srog gi snying po phul ba/
377b6(rgyud 'bum): shu shu rak+Sha tshal pa/ kro d+hi kro le shwa ra/ ra hu la/ tsa ti tsa ti/ bdag cag gi rig pa 'di gang na gnas pa der gza' rnams kyis 'gal bar mi bgyid do// phas btang ba'ang slar de nyid la mchi'o//

378b1(rgyud 'bum): klu'i gnod pa'i rgyun spong ngo / / phas btang ba'ang slar de nyid la mchi'o zhes so so nas rang rtags srog gi snying po phul te dam bcas so// de nas dbang po chen pos khro bo'i bdag po chen po de la 'di skad ces gsol to//

379b1(rgyud 'bum): dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud las/ thun drag mchod sbyin gyi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// / de nas lha'i dbang po la sogs te/ ri rab dang bar snang la sogs pa la

380a1(rgyud 'bum): brgya ldan bdud rtsi mchog/ bde bar bzhes te dgyes par dgongs// a mri tA b+ha ta hUM/ kun tu grags pa'i sgra rnams ma lus dang // dam chos sgra sgrog sil snyan 'bul// s+pha ra/

380a6(rgyud 'bum): dus gsum sangs rgyas kun pas mnyan pa ste// snying bzhin skyo med rmi lam nang du bsgyur// ngag gi rdo rje chu bo'i rgyun bzhin drang // skyo med nyin mtshan dus su brtson par bya// rdo rje phrag par mi gsang bsdams la
380a7(rgyud 'bum): drang / nga brdzun med tshig gis dam pa de la bstod// bshad pa'i dbang rnams rab tu ma bstan na// rdo rje'i lce la bdud rtsi 'dzag gyur kyang // gzhan la zer thigs 'ga' yang spo mi bya// gsang 'os gnyer gtang sngas
380b1(rgyud 'bum): dang mtshan rnams gsang / / dus gsum 'gyur med rdo rje'i sku mchod de// na dang 'chi sogs las kyi rnam smin gang // sdug bsngal mi bzad nyam thag ci byung yang // lhag par dran pa bskyed de rjes
380b2(rgyud 'bum): su gzung / / 'gro nyal 'dug za spyod lam rnam pa bzhir// mi brjed shes rab dag gis rjes su gzung // slob dpon ma tshang dang gsang tshig yi dam lha// srog gi phyir yang rtag tu mi spong ngo // brda
380b3(rgyud 'bum): ba de bzhin de la de mi sems/ / dran pas rjes su de la gzung bar bya// smig chu rgyun bzhin brtul zhugs bya ba bskyed// de las 'gal ba'i brtul zhugs spyad// rdol zhing zag 'gyur dug can smad
380b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i snod/ / mu tig bdud rtsi der mi blugs// thabs kyi spyod pas dbye bar bya// dpag tshad kun tu rnam par spang // de dag 'gal na rdo rje dmyal ba yi// sdug bsngal chu bo reg cing bzod dka' bar// dus
380b5(rgyud 'bum): gsum rnams dang nga yis brjod mi nus/ / gzhan nas gzhan 'phang thar du med// ma nyams rgal dkar gdon mi ba// nga dang dus gsum kun kyang de la dgongs// gang la dmigs pa'i 'bras bu chud mi ba/
380b6(rgyud 'bum): phyogs skyong rnams kyis ngam spyod de la srung // zhes gsungs so// dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud las/ sa ma ya bkod pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// de nas
380b7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor de dag la ched du brjod pa ni brjod do/ / nyon cig 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kun// don dam dbyer med phyogs cha kun dang bral// mi len mi gnas mi spong mi 'gog cing // rang bzhin gnas pa de
381a1(rgyud 'bum): chos su med/ / rtog pa'i gnas min phra ba'i spyod yul min// dngos por mi gnas mtshan ma kun dang bral// sgo dang skur bas de la dpag ming dpog/ stong pa ma yin tha snyad de las
381a2(rgyud 'bum): 'das/ / mi gnas mi rtog rkyen gyis bskyed pa med// dngos bral kun gyi mtha' 'das brjod du med// 'di zhes nges pa de la mtshon du med// dus gsum bdag po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// yab yum shul
381a3(rgyud 'bum): dang kun gyi dngos po yin/ / sems can 'jig rten khams kyi rang bzhin dang // bud+d+ha 'jig rten khams kyi rang bzhin kun// gcig ste rnam grangs yongs kyis de las med// gang yang ma 'gags gcig tu nges
381a4(rgyud 'bum): pa med/ / tha snyad brjod bral sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// de ltar grol ba rnal 'byor mchog gi lam// phra ba'i sgo mo rnams kyis rjes dpag dka'// de la spro dang bsdu ba'i dbang po med// gzugs dang kha
381a5(rgyud 'bum): dog rnam pa gang du yang / / de nyid ma grub de la gnyen po med// 'byung ba chen po nam mkha'i rang bzhin la// khu rlangs 'ja' tshon na bun sprin la sogs// than drag lhags rlung la sogs gang byung yang /
381a6(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha' chen po de la g.yo ba med// dang po byung yang de yi ngang las byung // tha mar zhi yang de yi ngang du zhi// de dag de yi nang du 'ub kyis chub// yangs so che'o nam mkha'i khog par gnas// khams gsum
381a7(rgyud 'bum): sems can dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams/ / don dam nga yi rang bzhin nga nyid yin// kun kyang dge dang sdig sogs gang byas kyang // rang 'byung 'phrul ldan de la 'phel 'grib med// rang byung ye shes rgyu rkyen
381b1(rgyud 'bum): dngos po med/ / sems can sangs rgyas gnyis shes rtog gi bu// de la dbye dang ming dang yig tshogs med// ces gsungs so// dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud las/ gzhi byang chub snying
381b2(rgyud 'bum): po'i rgyu'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o/ / / de nas dregs pa'i 'khor de dag ngo mtshar du gyur nas mgrin gcig gis 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis mngon par bstod pa/ e ma ho/ rdo rje sems dpa'
381b3(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' che/ / rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal// rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin pa che// rdo rje sku ste che ba po// mi shes dri ma kun 'joms pa// sangs rgyas kun pas sngar sangs rgyas// 'gro ba'i mgon la phyag 'tshal bstod//

381b5(rgyud 'bum): 'bar ba/ / 'bar ba'i 'od kyis sdang ba 'joms// rdo rje shugs te shugs che ba// rdo rje'i mtshon chen phyag 'tshal bstod// phyag na rdo rje ye shes che// zhal gyi rdo rje sdang ba 'bigs// rdo rje mche ba rno ba che/
381b6(rgyud 'bum): chetshecheb rgya mtsho gsung chen bstod// rdo rje pad+ma byang chub che// thugs nyid sangs rgyas rang byung ba// rdo rje che ba thugs kyi mchog/ rdo rje rnal 'byor thugs chen bstod// 'jigs byed drag po nag po che// rdo rje
381b7(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs byed sdang byed pa/ / sgrub dka' sgrub legs yon tan che// yon tan rdo rje mchog legs bstod// rdo rje khro bo drag po che// ha la ha la nag po che// rtogs pa'i dus ngan rnam par spyod// rdo rje sems
382a1(rgyud 'bum): #dpa'abyugyu' chas bskyod/ / su ma pa stod / rnagatam po rnags gas pa'i rgyu pas/ 'thor gyim mngon par brjod pa'i ledu tham sacin /
382a2(rgyud 'bum): / de nas lnga'i dbang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// kye rdo rje khro bo khyod// dus ngan bstan pa mi gnas tshe// 'jig rten khams su chu 'a khyags dbab pa'i thabs bka' stsal du gsol
382a3(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsa ya pa/ nyon cig dbang po chen po/ 'jig rten phung bar bya na nA ga'i chu 'khyags dbab// gsang ba'i las rab 'di ni rab tu gnag/ na mo bud+d+hA ya/ badz+ra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra
382a4(rgyud 'bum): tsaN+Da/ ki li kI li/ tsuN+Da mo ri tsan/ tsaN+Da tsad+d+he/ nA ga ban+d+ha ya phaT/ swA hA/ sor brgyad seng ldeng phur bu gu gul dang // tshil chen sme khrag byug cing bdug/ rtsa gzir sngags gsham gdags

382a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad 'tshong bar 'gyur/ / nag po gnas su song la las 'di bya// byang bltas chu mig rdos dngangs skyibs gnag/ mgon rnon ga thegs pa chags pa yod// gnas dar oM nag 'das pa'i rtse mo /

382b7(rgyud 'bum): rten thog ser gyi le'u ste nyi shu ste rtsa gnyis pa'o/ / / de nas yang lha'i dbang pos zhus pa/ mthar thug drag po'i las kyis ji ltar dbab// rdzas dang sngags bcas drag po'i sbyar thabs

384a1(rgyud 'bum): tsit+ta gu h+ya tan+t+ra ut+tar/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma/ dpal rdo rje gtum po la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas brgya byin lha'i dbang pos gsol pa/

386b2(rgyud 'bum): tu gsang ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o/ / / de nas bcom ldan 'das bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas bdud rtsi mchog bka' stsal pa/

386b4(rgyud 'bum): gsum klu sman sna tshogs dang / / tsan dan la sogs drir sbyar ba'i// chu dga' lcug ma 'o ma can// kha brgyan byas te mgul pa yang // dar ras sngon pos bcings byas la// maN+Dal
386b5(rgyud 'bum): gtsang ma'i steng du gzhag/ lha yi nga rgyal ldan pa yi// gri lcags sbu gur mchu btsugs te// dbugs ma shor bar rab tu bsnag/ seng ldeng phur pa sor brgyad dang // sngags kyi mda' mchog
386b6(rgyud 'bum): la yang bsnag/ bum pa la sngags 'bum tshar re// 'thon nas snying rje'i yul la bkru// khong du btang na grol bar 'gyur// dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma las/ bdud rtsi
386b7(rgyud 'bum): bum khrus kyi le'u ste bdun pa'o/ / de nas yang bdud rtsi bum pa khrol bu la sgrub pa gsungs pa/ nyon cig lha yi dbang po gtso// ting 'dzin gsang bar sgrub pa ni/
387a1(rgyud 'bum): dzA ti pa la nas sngon mo// 'bras dang so ba ma gi ta// ting 'dzin bzhu brtul byas te sgrub// de la rtags byung phye mar sgrub// byugs nas dri chus skyo mar sbyar// zhun chen sbyar te/
387a2(rgyud 'bum): khong du gtang // bum pa'i chu la lcags sdug bsngag/ mchod dang ting 'dzin brtson par bya// bum chus khrus bye lde gus byug/ skyo ba zhun chen khong du gtang // dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang
387a3(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rgyud phyi ma las/ bum pa khrol bu phye ma dang / lde gu dang / khong du gtang ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas yang lha'i dbang po la bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig lha yi
387a4(rgyud 'bum): dbang po dag/ gdug pa'i dug la rnam mang yang // bsdus na rnam pa gnyis yod de// mngon sum dug dang rku dug ste// rkun thabs drug ni bzlog par dka'// gdug can nyon mongs gsum ldan te/
387a5(rgyud 'bum): te' gti mug che bas byol song rigs// 'dod chags che bas dpral bar dka'// shin tu zhe sdang che bas kyang // dug ni rkun thabs dag tu gtong // de phyir slar yang ldog par byed// phrag dog che bas
387a6(rgyud 'bum): rang rten la/ / gzhan gyis gtses na gzhan la gnod// rkun thabs drug gi mtshan nyid kyang // thabs shing gdug pa'i dug klod kyang // bar bar skabs su ldang bar byed// de bzlog thabs ni shin
387a7(rgyud 'bum): tu'ang dka'/ / de yi bzlog thabs dam pa 'di// ngas bstan pa la the tshom du// gang zhig byed par gyur pa de// nam yang grub par mi 'gyur te// grub kyang yal bar gyur pa yin// de nas lha yi dbang
387b1(rgyud 'bum): po dag/ the tshom med par nges par byos// tsan dan dmar pos gtsor byas te// na ga ge sar ma gi ta// rgya che la rgya mtsho'i lbu ba dang // phag rgod dag gi sha dag ste// yang na rgya tshil ma g+hi ta// phag rgod
387b2(rgyud 'bum): sha dang sbyar byas te/ / lcags snod nang du lcags kyis phur// 'bum phrag gsum du bsnyen byas nas// sgrub pas dkar gsum gzhan mi rten// 'o ma sol chus lus bkrus te// nya la gnas drug thig le bya//
387b3(rgyud 'bum): mkhur tshos gnyis dang dpral ba dang // snying kha lkog ma lag mthil gnyis// thig le mtshon gang ba ra bya// lte ba pus mo gsang gnas su// ma g+hi ta nyid 'ba' zhig byug/ thig le re la nyi shu
387b4(rgyud 'bum): gcig/ de ltar lo gcig bar du bya// gangs ri la ni nyi ma bzhin// dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma las/ rkun thabs kyi dug bzlog pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// /
387b5(rgyud 'bum): / de nas lha'i dbang pos gsol pa/ kye ma khro bdag rdo rje 'dzin// gdug pa'i dug gi mtshan nyid gang // bzlog dang mi bzlog ji lta bu// khro bdag chen pos bshad du gsol/ zhes gsol pas/
387b6(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig lha yi dbang po dag/ bsnyen dang sgrub pa rtags dang gnod pa rtags// lcags zangs mi dang gcer bu bum pa thogs// ba glang nya lcibs za ba dang /
387b7(rgyud 'bum): me chen 'bar dang zam pa 'dzugs// bskyed shing 'dzugs dang nyi ma shar// bzang ba'i rtags su shes par bya// nyi ma nub dang nam sos thur la babs// btson du bzung nas mi theg khur bskur dang // sgrub pa gnan
388a1(rgyud 'bum): gyi phul du 'gro ba ngan pa'i rtags/ / lung ba dang ni skum nas chu byung dang // nya sbrulas rlung gsod dang 'tshod ba dung // ring dang skems pa de dag khri la 'dug/ gcer bu spyi bcings tshogs kyis
388a2(rgyud 'bum): sems can gsol ba mthong / / 'jigs pa'i chu mig bskams dang rtag tu nor bu rgyad// sbal sbrul zas su za dang khyi spyang gsod la sogs// bzang ba'i ltas su yang dag shes par bya// chu nang chud dang sngal

388a6(rgyud 'bum): dag gnod rtags lus kyi nyams myong yang / / nub dang ni glu dang chang la dga'// nad dang nyams lI yan lag na// sha ni 'gul 'phrig shu ba g.yan pa sha bkra dang // ngo lhog sha ro skabs su zug gzer che//

388b1(rgyud 'bum): dbang pos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi lus la/ gdug pa'i dug lus la slab pa'i mtshan nyid bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'/
388b2(rgyud 'bum): stsal pa// sha mthangs bar du sleb pa'i dug/ rtag tu snying yang mi dga' zhing / sha rtsa za zhing 'gul dang 'phrig/ rtag tu 'phrug snying 'dod pa dang // sha yang 'o ma'i spris ma bzhin// sha mdog
388b3(rgyud 'bum): me lce 'dra ba'o/ / skabs su sha mthangs par dag na// chu grang blugs pa snyam byed dang // shu ba pa lhags sha bkra'o// gdug pa dug gis sha la sleb pa ni// 'phrig 'gul sha sbrid ber ba lta/
388b4(rgyud 'bum): sha ni gnag cing dmar la bem// du ba mig tu song ba bzhin// mig gi mtha' ma chu yis gang // mig kyang zlum la smin ma grugs// smin ma byi zhing mig kyang 'gul// sor mo rnams ni byi mjug 'dra//
388b5(rgyud 'bum): rtsa dang chu la zhugs pa ni// lus la dri ma nga ba 'byung // chu bur dang ni chu sgangs dang // de ni rtsa yi me tog yin// chu ser mdog ni du khu 'dra// chu ser ko rul mnam pa dang // ko ba rul pa'i dri
388b6(rgyud 'bum): mnam pa'i/ / chu ser dag ni 'byung ba yin// ro stod mi bde blo yang 'degs// spyi yi mtshan nyid 'di dag dang // 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag kyang yod// me 'od tsha ba 'dra ba 'ong // tsher ma zug pa

392a7(rgyud 'bum): med dug lnga las 'phros 'byung lnga'i dug/ kun rdzob tsam du 'byung ba 'joms// de dag rab tu gzhom pa'i phyir// rang bzhin rang grol bdud rtsi yis// rtsa ba'i dug sogs 'joms par byed/
392b1(rgyud 'bum): b+hU yi sku dang sngags kyi mthu// ye shes 'byung ba chen po yis// las kyi 'byung ba 'joms par byed// rdzas kyis kyang ni de bzhin no// zhes gsungs so// dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gus /
