422b7(rgyud 'bum): par nges/ / nang nas rab tu zlum byas la// tsan dan dkar po'i thig le ni// bcu bdun yongs su bri bar bya// de steng 'khor lo'i lha tshogs gnas// bla re ljang khu phub byas la// de nas 'dabs sbyor de
423a1(rgyud 'bum): nyid kyi/ / dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa nyid la// rgyar ni sor mo bcu gnyis la// zabs su chag gang nges par bru// khu byug dug tu bsres pa yis// de yi gcal du rnam par
423a2(rgyud 'bum): dgram/ / mchod pa lnga dang gtor ma dang // las la sbyor sogs dkar po nyid// yongs su gtang ba'i bya ba yin// sgra skad chen po'i rus pa la// 'phreng ba byas pas drag po'i rigs// de nying la
423a3(rgyud 'bum): ni bzung ba yis/ / rtsa ba'i sngags sogs 'bar ba bzlas// de dag steng du thim 'gyur bas// lus ngan sras po'i sngags bzlas pas// de yang gong ma'i tshad nyid du// phyin pas yongs
423a4(rgyud 'bum): su bzlas par bya/ / yid chen phur bu sor bcu pa// bcu drug dag gis de nyid kyi// kha ru yongs su bskor bar bya// bdag nyid snga ma'i cha lugs la// 'bar ba skyod pas phur bu bsngags//
423a5(rgyud 'bum): nyungs kar til gyi rigs gnyis la// byang phyogs khro bo'i snying po nyid// brgya rtsa brgyad pas yongs su bsngags// skud pa sngon po nyid la yang // 'bar ba chen po'i sngags bzlas nas/
423a6(rgyud 'bum): de yi gzugs nyid yung ba yis// gro ga dag la bris byas la// skud pa de yis rab bcings la// nang du nges par gzhug par bya// stang du me long nyid la yang // gur kum khu bas byug byas la
423a7(rgyud 'bum): ngo bstan kha ni dgab par bya/ / zhag bdun par du bsnyen pa yis// de nyid 'gugs pa'i sngags kyang bzlas// de nas sngags pas sbyor ba 'di// yongs su ma nyams yang dag bzlas// de rdzogs nang pa
423b1(rgyud 'bum): bkug byas la/ / gu gul nag po'i dud pa yis// sna nyid dag tu bdug par bya// de nas de nyid 'phros pa na// mi bzad rab tu 'bar ba yis// sder mo yis ni drag tu gzung // hUM gi nga rgyal sgra dang /
423b2(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa zhags pa sngon po gang yin pas// de yi ske nas bzung byas la// me long nyid la ngo bstan bya// g.yas pa rdo rje ldan pa yis// 'phreng bas sngags ni yang dag bzlas// de nas rab tu ldan pa
423b3(rgyud 'bum): yisasrog gi snying po yongs su bzlas/ / bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa yis// de nyid la ni yang dag dbab// de nas rnam pa rab ldan pas// sngags chu yis ni khrus byas la// lus ngag yid gsum
423b4(rgyud 'bum): drag po yis/ / dngos po yongs su bcings byas la// khru gang brkos pa'i nang du gzhug/ phur bus steng du gzir byas la// phaT kyi sngags kyis yang dag mnan// des ni gdon mi za bar ni// gnod
423b5(rgyud 'bum): sbyin gdon dang nges par bral/ / de nas bsrung ba'i 'khor lo nyid// yongs su bsrung ba byas pa yis// phyi nas gdon mi 'jug pa yin// oM ma hUM bai shra pa Na ya kaM ka lA yak+Sha ban+d+ha naM// oM badz+ra kro d+ha
423b6(rgyud 'bum): / a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM phaT/ pa tsa wa phuHsha ya ha/ ha na ha na yak+Sha ba ra ba ya/ oM A kaR+Sha ya A kaR+Sha ya/ sarba yak+Sha na hUM ra sha/ oM yak+Sha hr-i da ma dza ma dza so pa la haM/ oM sarba ra ra bi sho d+ha ya hUM phaT/
423b7(rgyud 'bum): ai ha ha ha phaT phaT phaT hUM/ sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // lus la sogs pa'i phan gnod gnyis// yongs su sbyang bar yang dag bshad// de nyid lus ngan sras po la// gang bstabs de nyid
424a1(rgyud 'bum): nges par 'jig/ de yi sbyor ba bya ba ni// lus ngan sras po'i sgrub pa bshad// dang por de yi gzugs bya ba// rams dang yung ba rab sbyar bas// ba dan ne'u le'i rgyal ba dang /
424a2(rgyud 'bum): sku gdung g.yas phyogs bzhag byas la// gong ma lta bu'i gzugs su bri// g.yas g.yon gnyis su de nyid kyi// yi ge gnyis po bri byas la// de mthar drag po'i snying po bri// gsum sbyor dngos
424a3(rgyud 'bum): po 'bigs byed pa'i/ / tshigs gsum du ni nges pa las// dar dag dmar po kha tshon gang // me tog 'phreng bas yongs su brgyan// rin chen sna lnga'i phye ma dang // dri yi phye ma sna tshogs pa// phur ma
424a4(rgyud 'bum): byas pas gdags par bya/ / srog snying 'o mas bris byas la// de yi ming rus khrag gis bri// 'bru dag dkar po'i steng btsugs pas// de nyid la ni chags par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor khru gang gru
424a5(rgyud 'bum): bzhi pa/ / phang du sor gnyis nges pa las// gong du bstan pa'i sbyor ba yis// yongs su byug par byas pa las// mchod pa lnga yis rab mchod la// bdag nyid sdom par yang dag gnas// zas su
424a6(rgyud 'bum): dkar gsum bza' byas shing / / chang la sogs pa btung mi bya// gtor ma cha gcig bsnyen par gnas// cha gnyis nyin mtshan dus gnyis su// bsam pa'i sbyor bas yongs su btung // dang
424a7(rgyud 'bum): po'i gtor ma de nyid las/ / nyungs kar nyid kyang blugs byas la// bzlas pa'i grangs su thim par bya// de yi ming rus gang yin pas// snying po dag la re re zhing // yang dag pa ru mnyes par bya//
424b1(rgyud 'bum): rang gis ma nyes gang yin pa'i// tshig bton pa yis drag por bod// shin tu gdug sems rab 'bar bar// dang po snying rje chen po bskyed// 'di la rtags kyi sbyor ba dang // brlag par brgya
424b2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i skul ma gdab/ / ring du 'tsho na snying rje spang // myur du khyod kyis bsgral du gsol// de dag la sogs tshig dag gis// de la tshig kyang drag por brjod// de nas gnas gang yin par ni//
424b3(rgyud 'bum): dang po'i gtor ma brdab par bya// dang po dang ni bar dag dang // tha mar phyogs skyong srung ma la// 'o dod bod pas gtor ma gtang // sngags rnams bla ma'i lung nas ni// yongs su shes
424b4(rgyud 'bum): par bya ba ni/ / oM bai shra ma NA ya hUM/ a mu taM kha ta pa ta sa sa gu ru/ de las yongs su byung bas ni// yang dag pa ru shes par bya// mtshan mo mgyogs pa zhes bya ba'i// srog chags gang dag
424b5(rgyud 'bum): shi ba yi/ / rus pa la ni sngags bzlas la// de yi khang rtsar gzhug par bya// de yis ltas ngan sna tshogs pa// yang dag pa ru 'byung ba yin// grub pa'i rtags su bstan pa ni// skyes pa mnga'
424b6(rgyud 'bum): gzhu ba dag ni/ / yang yang rmis par gyur pa ni// nges par 'grub par yang dag bshad// lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can rdo rje ma lce'i rgyud las/ gnod sbyin gdong ser gyi gdon 'dul ba'i le'u ste/
424b7(rgyud 'bum): bcu gsum pa'o// / lag na rdo rje gos sngon gyis// bcom ldan mgon la 'di skad gsol// gang zhig sgrub par byed pa la// bris sku la sogs glegs bam nyid//
425a1(rgyud 'bum): de gang gis bgyi ba lags// rig pa'i rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// gang zhig sgrub par byed pa yis// bris sku glegs pam sbyor ba 'dis// yang dag par ni bsgrub par bya/
425a2(rgyud 'bum): dur khrod la sogs gang yin par// ri mo mkhan nyid rim pa bzhin// dbang bskur ba ni yang dag bya// tha ga pa yang bsnyen byas la// dri zhim pa yis yongs su byugs// steng 'og gnyis la mthu'
425a3(rgyud 'bum): gnyis gsum/ / mnyam par gzhag pas yang dag brtag/ dmar po lnga yis rab byug la// sa bon yang dag ldan pa dang // dri zhim rnam pa sna tshogs pa// yongs su byug par bya ba yin// tshon rtsi
425a4(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa sna tshogs pas/ / yid ches sngags kyi tshon rtsi rnams// mnyam par sbyar rab bri bar bya// snod dag thod pa nyid la ni// pir ni mi yi sgra yis bya// dur khrod nyid dam khang stong ngam// gnas dben
425a5(rgyud 'bum): par ni yongs su bri/ / las mkhan sngon po'i gos bgos te// khrag gis gdong dag phyag byas la// sngags 'di yis ni brtag tu bzlas// oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na ka ra yaM/ sarba satwA ra tha hUM hUM/ gtor
425a6(rgyud 'bum): ma drag po gang yin pa/ / bri ba'i dus su gzhag par bya// zin nas de nyid gtang bar bya// drang por chen rtsi thams cad la// rin chen sna lngar byin gyis brlab// rdo rje rtsa gcig phyag rgya mos// yang
425a7(rgyud 'bum): dag pa ru bri bya ste/ / skyed byed dang ni yon bdag gi/ bsam pas yongs su bri bar bya// dkyil du pad+ma bcu drug la// snying po ze 'bru yang dag ldan// dkyil du gtso bo 'bar ba nyid// gong ma'i
425b1(rgyud 'bum): gzugs kyis bri bar bya/ / 'khor la sogs pa thams cad kyang // snga ma lta bur yang dag bri// phyi rol shing la sogs pa dang // dur khrod brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan// 'jigs par byed pa'i
425b2(rgyud 'bum): ro langs dang / / lce spang drag po'i sgra yang sgrog/ de ltar rim pa ji bzhin pas// gong ma lta bus yang dag bri// dbang bskur gnas skabs gang yin pas// mtshan ma'i dkyil 'khor yongs su bri//
425b3(rgyud 'bum): de yi bar du mi gzhan lo// bris sku bstan par mi bya'o// brgyang shing rus pa nyid la ni// byas pas thang ka yongs su brgyangs// gur dag sngon po phub byas la// mkha' la yongs su bstan mi
425b4(rgyud 'bum): bya gal te bstan par byas pa na/ / dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ba med// de bas mnyam par bzhag pa yis// sbyor ba legs par brtsam par bya// glegs bam nges par bri bar bya// gro ga dag la
425b5(rgyud 'bum): sor dag ni/ / dkyus su bcu gnyis zheng du bzhi// de yi tshad du bya ba la// khrag dang bdud rtsi lnga rnams kyis// yongs su byug par byas pa la// me long ur gyis mnan byas te// mthing shun nyid
425b6(rgyud 'bum): kyis legs par bri/ / 'dri mkhan sbyor ba rab ldan pas// smyug gu lcags las byas pa yi// snod ni thod par yang dag ldan// gtor ma yang dag bshams byas la// hUM gi ngag gis rtag tu brjod// gos
425b7(rgyud 'bum): dag sngon po bgos byas nas/ / rgyan cha lnga yis rnam par brgyan// mi gzhan la ni mi bstan cing // glegs shing rus pa'am glang chen gyi// ba so dag la nges par bya// thag pa bram ze mo yi ni// skra yis yongs
426a1(rgyud 'bum): su bsdum par bya/ / yang na yid ches pags pa la// mnyen par bya bas yongs su bsdam// de na lag g.yon stod kyi bar// de nyid dag gis yongs su smra// sangs rgyas lnga ma
426a2(rgyud 'bum): bdag po mchog/ nges par rdo rje rnon po nyid// snang ba thams cad 'dul byed cing // dngos su dpa' bo rab 'bar ba// chen po yi ni chen po nyid// kun la mkha' 'gro chen po ste// sku chen rab drag
426a3(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ / mkha' ltar mnyam la phyag 'tshal bstod// las la 'jug par snang ba nyid// kun bsdus pas ni de brjod bya// lag na rje rje gos sngon po can rdo rje me lce'i rgyud las/ bris sku
426a4(rgyud 'bum): dang glegs bam gyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o/ / lag na rdo rje gos sngon gyis// bcom ldan mgon la 'di skad gsol// gang zhig rgyud 'di las sbyor bas// thabs kyi yan
426a5(rgyud 'bum): lag sna tshogs pa/ / yang dag rgyas par gsung du gsol// bde gshegs mchog gis bka' stsal pa// dad pa'i rang bzhin can gyi mo// 'di nyid la ni mngon par sgrub// klu gdug 'bar bas zin ni mi/
426a6(rgyud 'bum): nubu mo na bar gyur pa dang // yan lag drag par na ba dang // smin ma la sogs byi ba dang // lus la sha ro khol bar gnas// tshigs sun zhing chags par ldan// snyi ngo mi dga' dang dkar la dga'/
426a7(rgyud 'bum): klus nang du shes par bya// ba lang dmang po mthong ba dang // skal pa la sogs mtshan ma mi// bu mo gzhon nu mthong ba dang // skyes pa sgra ser rmi bdag/ klu yi mtshan smra bstan pa yin// khrus
426b1(rgyud 'bum): dga' zhing skud pa 'khal/ / chang la yongs su dang che ba// tshangs pa'i nang du shes par bya// spu log mang dang lag sgyur dang // tho rangs na pa gang yin pa// zas mi za dang snying 'bar ba// tshangs
426b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i gdon du rig par bya/ / rked pa brkyang dang nyal la dga'// sen mo byi dor byed pa dag/ tshangs pa'i nang du shes par bya// nub mo sbur ba smai ba dang / spre'u byi la mthong gyur na// tshangs pa'i mtshan mar
426b3(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa yin/ / mi rgan ring pa mthong ba dang // shar phyogs ri la 'dzeg pa dag/ tshangs pa'i rtags su bstan pa yin// dbugs dag nang du 'dren pa dang // phra zhing spyi bor lag pa 'dud//
426b4(rgyud 'bum): skyug par byed cing sha la dga'// gshin rje yi ni gdon du bstan// rkang pas sa la brdeg pa dang // mkha' sogs g.yas pa'am g.yon pa na// gshin rje'i nad du rig par bya'o// tshig pa za dang
426b5(rgyud 'bum): gzhan la rgol/ / mi gzhan la ni mngon par snang // sbur dag rab tu mi bde dang // thag pa dag las mdud pa 'dor// gshin rje'i gdon du shes par bya// grang dang sha ba rmis pa dang // gos dag sngon
426b6(rgyud 'bum): po lus la gyon/ / gshin rje yi ni mtshan ma yin// shing la 'dzegs pas phyir lhung dang // gru gang zhugs par gang rmi ba// de ni gshin rje'i mtshan ma yin// mig rtsa rgod cing lbu ba skyug/ mkhur ba 'bug cing
426b7(rgyud 'bum): brang la rdung / / gnod sbyin gdon du shes par bya// yang yang sdang zhing sngas pa rgod// kha nas lce ni rkyong ba dang // lus la bsu byug byed pa dang // gnod sbyin gdon du shes par bya'o// sto ban zhing zas la dga'/
427a1(rgyud 'bum): rgyab tu gzer ba gang yin pa// gnod sbyin nad du shes par bya// rta sngon dag la zhon pa dang // bong bu la zhon rmi ba rnams// gnod sbyin mtshan ma yin par bshad// bya rog
427a2(rgyud 'bum): lag par thogs pa dang / / thag pas lus 'khyud nyal bar rmis// gnod sbyin mtshan mar rig par bya'o// spos chu la ni sngags btab nas// byin na len par mi byed pa// tshangs pa'i gdon du shes
427a3(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / nyungs kar nyid la rab bsngags nas// lag par byin pas mig mo lnga// gshin rje'i gdon du shes par bya// shal sngags kyis rab bsngags nas// kha ru byin pas sna 'gas pa// den
427a4(rgyud 'bum): klu gdon nges par gsal/ / skud pa sngon po nyid la ni// rab bsngags mdud pa bdun bor ba// mgul du bcings pas skad ngan 'don// gnod sbyin gdon du yin par bshad// chen po dag ni phrang
427a5(rgyud 'bum): pa na sa sbyor ba 'di yis yang dag sbyor/ / dur khrod mi gang bsregs pa yis// sna tshogs thal ba brang byas la// chang dang nges par spras byas te// sbrul gyi pags pas gtums byas la// til gyi gang
427a6(rgyud 'bum): bu grags pa la/ / 'bum du yang dag bzlas byas te// bdag nyid gos la yang dag gtum// de nas de dang phrad pa dang // drag po las kyi sbyor ba yis// de nyid la ni phog par gtor// de yis de la gtor ba
427a7(rgyud 'bum): yis de ni nges par rmongs par 'gyur/ / oM mA mu duSh+Ta staM b+ha na hUM/ sgyu ma dbang du sdung byed na// sbyor ba 'di nyid brtsam par bya// ngos 'jam rdul dang zla ba dang // bgegs kyi gnyen po'i
427b1(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / / sgog chen las kyi khu bas su// byed pa gnyis ka bar sprul la// de la mthun pa nyid la ni// yongs su bskul bas sbyin par bya// de nas nges pa dus btab la// kha sbyor ba yis
427b2(rgyud 'bum): yang dag bsngags/ / oM na mo kA ma de ba ya ya ya ka ya ka ka la siny+tsa b+ha g+ha bi pa ra ta na swA hA/ a mu kaM/ 'bum du dang por bsnyen pa yis// sbyor ba nges par spyad par bya// nor dag sgrub par 'dod
427b3(rgyud 'bum): pa na nor 'dzin lha mo yongs su bri/ / kha dog ser po nyid la ni// phyag bzhi par ni bri bar bya// zhal gcig nu ma 'bur ba la// g.yas kyi dang po ting 'dzin pa// gnyis pa 'bras kyi snyem
427b4(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin/ / g.yon gyi dang po nyid na ni// rin chen 'bar ba yang dag bsnams// gnyis pas ne'u le'i rgyal ba bsnams// de lta bu yi gzugs byas la// sna tshogs dri yis yang dag mchod/
427b5(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa rnam pa lnga dag dang // na bza' dar la sogs pa yis// yang dag pa ru mchod par bya// zhag grangs brgya rtsa brgyad pa ru// yongs su bsnyen pas sngags bzlas bya// de nas grub par
427b6(rgyud 'bum): gyur pa'i rtags/ / de nyid g.yo bar gyur pa yis// de grub rten ni rnyed par ni// de yis lus ni ston par 'gyur// de nas dbyig ni mi bzad pa'i// bdag por mi de nges par 'gyur// ma rungs pa dag spyor
427b7(rgyud 'bum): gzhug na/ / sbyor ba 'di dag nges par brtsam// de yis kun grags nyid dang ni// khu chen sa la sogs pa la// sngags 'di yis ni 'bum du bzlas// de nas bsnyen pa yongs rdzogs pas//
428a1(rgyud 'bum): yid ches drung la sbu gu can// sor bdun dag la drug blugs te// skud pa sngon pos rab bcings la// nub phyogs dag tu nges par gdags// de ni 'byung bas bskyod pa ma//
428a2(rgyud 'bum): mi de nges par spro bar 'gyur// oM ma hA kA lA ya staM b+ha u na ma ta ya/ a mu kaM sany+dza la swA hA/ mi rnams nges par mi gsal bas// rdo rje mo ni yongs su sgrub// sa la phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad
428a3(rgyud 'bum): dure mig bcu gnyis bris byas la/ / ma rig la sogs rtags kyi ni// dngos po yang dag bri bar bya// de nas sngags pas rab bsngags la// bsam pa rab tu rdzogs byas la// de nyid
428a4(rgyud 'bum): dngos po gang yin pas/ / bsam pa sbyar bas me tog bor// gang du bab pa der gnas la// shes rab can gyis rnam par dpyad// bzang ngan ltas rnams yongs su bshad// rig pa legs
428a5(rgyud 'bum): par spras pa yis/ / ba yi lci bas rab gtums la// dang por gnyis su shes par bya// ring du bye brag med pa yis// bcom ldan sngon du bzhag byas te// dang por mchod pas yang dag mchod//
428a6(rgyud 'bum): smo dag yongs su btsugs pa yis// shes rab bcu gsum bdag nyid can// dmar po gos kyis brgyan byas la// khrus dag legs par byas pa dang // dri yis legs par byugs byas la/
428a7(rgyud 'bum): dpral bar thig le dmar po gdab// me tog dri zhim dmar po nyid// de yi lag tu sbyin par bya// de yis de la blang bar bya// de yis dngos po gsal bya ste// bzang ngan ltas su nges par stom
428b1(rgyud 'bum): spyir na sna tshogs gdon la ni/ / 'bar ba chen po'i sngags bzlas bya// gu gul nag po'i dud pa dag/ de yi snga ru bdug byas la// nyungs kar gu gul me tog dang // de yi snying pos bsreg par bya//
428b2(rgyud 'bum): de yis nad pa gang yin pa// bgegs dang nges par bral bar 'gyur// srin lag nyid la skud pa ni// sngon pos yang dag bsdam par bya// spyi bo'i ske las srad bu gang // bcings pas sngags
428b3(rgyud 'bum): ni nges par bzlas/ / 'khrugs pa'i sde dag rgyal 'dod ni// khams gsum rnam rgyal snying po yis// 'bum du bzlas pas bsnyen pa bya// de nas a mra'i lo ma las// yung bas yongs su
428b4(rgyud 'bum): bris byas la/ / gi'u wang gis ni rab tu skul// cod pan spyi bor gtums byas la// rang nyid sku ru bsgoms byas la// lag pa g.yas pas nyungs kar dang // ske tshe thal bar sbyar byas
428b5(rgyud 'bum): la sngags bzlas sdigs mdzub phyar ba yis/ / yongs su bris par sde rgyal 'gyur// rnal 'byor pa yis bdag nyid la// 'chi ba bslu ba yang dag bya// bdag gi rgyud la 'chi ltas ni// phyi
428b6(rgyud 'bum): nang bcu gnyis yang dag ldan/ / bdag gi brang la sha mtshan dag/ dmar po byung bar gyur pa na// sum cu gnyis zhag 'chi 'gyur bas// rig pa'i rgyal po'i sngags kyis su// til la sreg
428b7(rgyud 'bum): blugs stong du ni/ / tshang bar byas pas de bzlog 'gyur// de dang cha 'thun gang yin pa// rkan la 'brum bu gsum pa dang // lce yi rtse mor sme ba dang // rdo rje lam nas khrag 'dzag dang // 'dzag gnyis/
429a1(rgyud 'bum): dbugs dag gsum pa dang // ri yi rtse mor shu ba byung // nang gi 'chi ltas nges pa ste// stag dang byi ba 'brug dag dang // rtsangs pa bya gag nag po ru// yongs su sbyor bas
429a2(rgyud 'bum): rig pa bzlas/ / gi'u wang 'ug pa rus sbal dang // tsam pa ka dang ut+pal dang // seng ldeng phur bu gang yin dang // 'ug pa'i sgo la sbyor ba dang // bya rog mkha' la 'phur ba yi// dkar pos bdag
429a3(rgyud 'bum): la phog pa ni/ / phyi yi 'chi ltas yin pas na// gong du grags pa'i sar song la// rig pa la sogs sbyor ba yis// yongs su bzlog par bya ba yin// mkha' la sna lnga mthong ba dang // chu la mi
429a4(rgyud 'bum): gzugs mthong gyur na/ / shin tu sdig pa'i ltas su bstan// rmi lam la ni stag zhon la// mchod rten nyid la 'dzegs pa dang // seng ge'i khar ni zhugs rmis pa// yongs su sdig pa'i ltas
429a5(rgyud 'bum): yin pas/ / logs shig sor mo rtse gsum dang // bse ruri phyogs dang kun da'i 'dab// yon tan rgya mtsho mtshan 'azang dang // skye mched 'phags lam chu srin mo// lo gsum zhag bzhi zlab
429a6(rgyud 'bum): ljar/ mi de nges par 'chi bas na// rig pa'i rgyal mo bdud rtsi 'khyil// rten 'brel yi ge brgya pa yis// sngags kyis sman la bsrung ba bya// khams gsum rnam rgyal 'jig rten mgon// de da/
429a7(rgyud 'bum): ni snying po yis// stag sogs so la nges par bzlas// rma thu chen mo'i sngags dag gis// 'ug pa'i sgra sogs nges par bsngags// phyag na rdo rje 'jam dbyangs dang // stobs chemathe bos
429b1(rgyud 'bum): dag gis/ / sngags kyis seng ldeng 'ug sgo dang // ku sha byi la la sogs dang // gsob la sngags pas yongs su bzlog/ gtor ma sbyin sreg las kyis ni// yongs su bzlog par bya ba yin/ shin tu/
429b2(rgyud 'bum): dpal dang dad par ldan// shes rab che dang thos pa bsags// bla ma la gus gtong bar phod// ltung ba la sogs gtsang ma la// rim pa bzhin du dbang bskur nas// tshogs kyi 'khor lo lnga byas la/
429b3(rgyud 'bum): shes rab ldan pa bstan bya ba'i// gsang ba drag po'i rgyud rgyal 'di// gzhan la bshad par bya ba min// gsang ba drag po khyod kyis ni// phan dang gnod bya gang yin pa// rim pa bzhin du shes pa yis//
429b4(rgyud 'bum): legs par spa dang bshad pa ni// gnas skabs du ma dang ldan zhing // kun la nges par zhugs pa yis// rgyud 'di la ni nges par brtag/ rgyud 'di gang na gnas pa na// sa phyogs de yi gdug pa rnams//
429b5(rgyud 'bum): ring du bsrings pas gnas mi byed// gal te gnas par byed pa na// de rnams kun gyi rgyud tshig 'gyur// drag po rgyud kyi rgyal po la// gang zhig zhugs par gyur pa la// dug gsum sku la rab brgyan nas// /
429b6(rgyud 'bum): btsun mo'i b+ha ga la gnas te// nyon mongs 'khor gyis rab bskor nas// bde ba chen po'i rol pas gnas// lag na rdo rjes de nyid du// skad cig tsam gyis bskor ba ni// 'bum phrag gsum du rab
429b7(rgyud 'bum): bskor nas/ / bde bar gshegs la 'di skad gsol// bdag gi rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di// nges pa'i don dang rab sbyar nas// gsang ba nyid du sba bar bgyi// lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can rdo rje me lce'i
430a1(rgyud 'bum): chungs/ rnam rgyas smra smra / ma ldan pa ma na so
430a2(rgyud 'bum): / / nga rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po rat+na kIr+t+ti dang / bod kyi lo tsab dge tshul khyung grags kyis bka' drin ma nos nas rgyu dpe bod du spyan drangs te bsgyur ba
430a3(rgyud 'bum): sa so/ / rtog skad du/ 'dzatha~M ma dzinacan mad+hA / 'daska dadu/ ji snyed po rdorje lji bab pa sa
430a4(rgyud 'bum): thas/ sbyangs rgyas dang byang chub sums dpa' thams cad su byug 'tsham la// 'di sa bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na// bcom ldan 'das du mod chen po thams pa'i myu
430a5(rgyud 'bum): tI/ de na 'khor na ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sgra dang / mi da / lA ma yin dang / klu rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// den
430a6(rgyud 'bum): ma ldan 'das kyi ba rdo snang ba zhes lngapa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par lugs te/ thugs ka nas 'ad se rab tu brtse bar gyur / kyi sa dang 'dzum gyi sto can pan lam
430a7(rgyud 'bum): khams sems cad khya bar byas ma/ sems can thams cad kyi dang / mi bde ba dang / sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral par byas nas/ thar bco ldacwa 'as kyi rnams susu /
430b1(rgyud 'bum): de nas drang srong chen po nyes 'dor langs te phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can thams cad la nad dang //
430b2(rgyud 'bum): dug dang / rims dang / dgra dang / gdon dang / byang stems dang / rbod gtong dang / char ches pa dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / lo tog ma rungs par byed pa rnams kyis sems can thams
430b3(rgyud 'bum): cad sdug bsngal zhing nyam thag par gyur na/ de la ji ltar bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar gyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po nyes 'dor nga la rdo rje snying
430b4(rgyud 'bum): po rdo rje lce dbab pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs yod de/ des sems can thams cad la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar byed do// de ngas bshad kyi leg par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig/
430b5(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis badz+ra badz+ra hUM zhes gsungs pas rdo rje snying po khro zhing gtum pa gdug pa'i cha lugs can 'thon nas bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs na 'khod par gyur to//
430b6(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mgrin gcig tu gzungs 'di bka' stsal to// nyi ma nAn/ zla ba nAn/ klad pa nAn/ ku na zhi/ tsi ta ku li nAn/ yak+Sha bzlog byer/ de nas gzungs 'di
430b7(rgyud 'bum): gsungs ma thag tu bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad 'jigs skra ga nas kha sbub tu 'gyel te slu bar sdug cing brgyal bar gyur to/ / de nas klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas kyang 'jigs skrag nas lus
431a1(rgyud 'bum): 'dar zhing / bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dgra dang gdon thams cad rlag par byed pa'i gzungs 'di
431a2(rgyud 'bum): brjod par gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ na mo bud+d+hA ya/ tsi tra mu drA yak+Sha bzlog byer/ de nas gzungs 'di smras ma thag tus chen po g.yos par gyur te/
431a3(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kha sbub tu 'gyel te/ gdon dang log 'dren thams cad kha spab tu 'gyel te khrag tu skyug cing dbugs dang bral bar gyur to// de nas yang klu mtha'
431a4(rgyud 'bum): yas kyis 'di skad ces brjod do/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sems can thams cad la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / smra bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa bsrung
431a5(rgyud 'bum): bar bgyi'o/ / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa yun ring du gnas par bgyi'o// cha cu dus su dbab cing lo tog thams cad bsrung bar bgyi'o// nad dang / dgra dang / gdon thams cad gzhom
431a6(rgyud 'bum): par bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar bka' stsal pa ltar bgyid pa las bzlog par mi bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ legs so legs so// klu'i rgyal
431a7(rgyud 'bum): po mtha' yas khyod kyis ji ltar dam bcas pa ltar gyis shig/ dam tshig rjes su srungs shig/ ji ltar nga'i bka' bcag na ngan song du lhung nga re/ nga'i ji ltar bsgo ba thams cad gyis shig
431b1(rgyud 'bum): de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos rdo rje lce dbab pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs bklags pas 'grub pa drag po rab tu mi bzad pa 'di smras so/ / badz+ra badz+ra hUM/ na mo bud+d+hA ya/ tsi tra mu drA yak+Sha bzlog byer/
431b2(rgyud 'bum): nA ga shig/ nA ga byer/ nA ga nan/ nA ga go la nan/ nA ga ha na ha na mA ra yarbad nan/ sa gdon nag po sod sod/ phya ga tsi phaT/ tsi ka phyu phaT/ lce pa ti phaT/ e pa ga ra tsi di nA ga 'bar ma
431b3(rgyud 'bum): ma hA ba la sa ta ye go de sad te nan/ thum ril rbad che ge mo mA ra ya/ dzaHrbad nan/ nA ga hri la hri la/ nA ga pro pro/ nA ga phob/ badz+ra pra be sha ya sa 'di srungs shig byer ya/ b+h+yor ma ma hA a hUM hAM
431b4(rgyud 'bum): Ta swAhA/ mA ra ya shan+ti ku ru swAH/ ra shA mA ra ya rbad shig byer nan nan/ ha nA ha na mA ra ya rbad nan/ de nas gzungs 'di gsungs ma thag tu nam mkha' la gnam lpags drag po'i rdo
431b5(rgyud 'bum): thog phab nas dgra dang / gdon dang / lo tog ma rungs par byed pa thams cad kyi lus dum bu dum bur gtubs nas rdul phra rab bzhin du brlag par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis cho ga
431b6(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po sa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byi dor byas nas pa'i rnam lngas byug par bya'o// tsan dran dang rgya spos dri zhim pos byug par bya'o// me tog sil ma dgram mo//
431b7(rgyud 'bum): bum pa gang ba gzhag go/ mar me bud do// gtor ma bzang po gzhag go/ lcags sam seng ldeng gi phur pa gzugs so// dbus su rdo rje snying po gzhag par bya'o// de'i mdun du klu mtha'
432a1(rgyud 'bum): yas gzhag go/ / de nas mchod par 'dod na me tog la sogs pa mchod pa lnga bya'o// klu mchod par 'dod na mkhar ba'i snod du 'o ma dang / klu sman sna tshogs dang / rtsi sman/
432a2(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs kyis bya'o// nad dang dug bsrung bar 'dod na tshil chen dang / gla rtsi dang / skud pa sngon po dang / rma bya'i sgros bya'o// klu nag po chen po la ni tshil chen dang / gra rtsi dang / tshon skud sA
432a3(rgyud 'bum): lnga dang / seng ldeng gi phur pas bya'o// 'byung po thams cad la ni phur pa dang nyungs kar gyis bya'o// skya rengs 'char ka'i gdon la ni phur pa dang / nyungs kar dang / nyungs nag dang / ske tshe dang / thal
432a4(rgyud 'bum): chen gyis bya'o/ / 'byung po kun tu rgyu ba la ni phur bu lnga dang thod pas bya'o// gzhan dag gsad par 'dod na phur pa dang / gzugs dang / thod pas bya'o// mnan par 'dod na thod pa dang / dug dang /
432a5(rgyud 'bum): nyungs kar gyis bya'o// lo tog gzhom par 'dod na thod pa dang / du ba dang / nyungs kar dang / tshil chen dang / khrag sna tshogs la bya'o// lo tog bsrung bar 'dod na thal chen dang / ske tshe dang / phur bus
432a6(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ kun tu srung ba zhes bya ba gzhan gyi sbod gtong bzlog par 'dod na mchod rten dang / gzugs dang / thod pa dang / nyungs kar dang / phur pas bya'o// thams cad zhi bar 'dod na thab khung rnying par
432a7(rgyud 'bum): tsan dan nam rgya shug la me btang la dkar gsum dang / mngar gsum dang / 'bras dang / til dang / mar dkar la sbyin sreg bya zhing / che ge mo mA ra ya shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ zhes bzlas na thams cad bsrung
432b1(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / gang dag gsad par 'dod na spa nga'i nang du seng ldeng ngam gdug pa'i shing la me btang la/ gdug pa'i rdzas sna tshogs dang / ske tshe dang / til dang / mar nag dang / tshil
432b2(rgyud 'bum): chen dang / ming byang spel te sbyin sreg bya zhing / che ge mo ra sha mA ra ya rbad/ ces bzlas na dgra dang gdon thams cad brlag par 'gyur ro// bdag dang gzhan bsrung bar 'dod na rma bya'i mkhris
432b3(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / ka ra dang / sa'i bdud rtsi lo lnga brgya lon pas bya'o// klu sa bdag bsrung bar 'dod na spos dang / gu gul nag po dang / gla rtsi dang / mu zi dang / ldong ros dang / dri chen dang / sbrang
432b4(rgyud 'bum): rtsis bya'o/ / mchog tu bsrung bar 'dod na 'bras bu gsum dang / bu chung gi rang byung dang / dris chus bya'o// khyad par dam pa srung ba chen po a ru ra rnam par rgyal ba bcang zhing gzungs 'di brjod
432b5(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / shig byer nAn/ 'go nAn/ ha na ha na mA ra ya rbad nAn/ drang srong chen po nyes 'dor 'di yid la rab tu zung zhig/ sems can thams cad la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar
432b6(rgyud 'bum): gyis shig/ nga'i bstan pa rjes su srungs shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal nas/ drang srong chen po nyes 'dor dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma
432b7(rgyud 'bum): yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// rdo rje snying po rdo rje lce dbab pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//
433a1(rgyud 'bum): 'di dang po skra cog gis bsgyur zhing / phyis gnyen lo tsa ba d+harma grags kyis kyang bsgyur ro// rgya gar skad du/ gu
433a2(rgyud 'bum): badz+ra pA Ni a ba tan+ta/ bod skad du/ dpal phyag na rdo rje gsang ba bstan pa'i rgyud/ dpal 'od zer gsang ba po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ 'og min gyi gnas
433a3(rgyud 'bum): lcang lo can gyi pho brang na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal chen po la/ rig sngags kyi lha tshogs kyis bskor te bzhugs so// de nas dpa' mo'i dbang phyug mas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
433a4(rgyud 'bum): 'das gsang ba'i bdag po 'di sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor ji lta bu zhig lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ snying rjer ldan zhing shes rab che// bzod dang ldan zhing brtson 'grus che// phyi nang
433a5(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba'i dbang thob cing / / bslab pa gsum la rab tu gnas// des ni dpa' bo yang dag 'grub// gsang ba bstan pa'i rgyud las/ sgrub pa po gang zag bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// /
433a6(rgyud 'bum): / dpa' mos gsol pa/ dpa' bo 'di sgrub pa'i gnas ji lta bu lags/ dpal chen pos bka' stsal pa/ dben la nyams dga' yid 'ong ba// bkra shis dpal 'phel dbang yang 'dzin
433a7(rgyud 'bum): dur khrod chen po 'jigs gnas pa/ / ri gsum rtse 'am shing drung ngam// phug gam lha khang stong pa dang // brag ri sngon po'i mdog 'dra ba// khro bo'i cha byad 'dra ba'i gnas// der ni dpa' bo sgrub par shis/
433b1(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba bstan pa'i rgyud las/ gnas bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// dpa' mos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dpa' bo 'di bskyed pa'i dmigs pa ji lta bu lags/ bcom
433b2(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dang po stong zhing bdag med de// snang zhing srid pa'i chos rnams kun// ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par dag/ de lta bu yi chos nyid la// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med pas// mi
433b3(rgyud 'bum): sgom mi rtog snang ba gsal/ / mtha' bral mkha' mnyam dbu ma'i don// sems kyi rang bzhin de lta bu// de ltar ma rtogs sems can la// sdug bsngal kun dang bral ba yi// thugs rjes phyogs med bsgom par bya//
433b4(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung ba'i rgyu// rang bzhin sems ni yi ge hUM// yi ge hUM gi 'phro 'du las// gzhal yas khang dang lha yi gdan// lha yi sa bon yi ge las// go rims bzhin du bskyed par bya//
433b5(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba bstan pa'i rgyud las/ dmigs pa bskyed pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / dpa' mos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bdag po 'di bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
433b6(rgyud 'bum): dmigs pa ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bskyed pa'i dmigs pa thob nas ni// snying khar ye shes sems dpa' bsgom// ye shes sems dpa'i thugs kar ni/
433b7(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma 'dab bzhi rgya sran tsam// dbus su nyi zla'i gzhal yas khang // gzhal yas khang gi nang du ni// a shad mar me'i rtse ltar bsgom// de la dmigs pa thob nas ni// ci yang bsam par mi bya ste/
434a1(rgyud 'bum): bsam gyis mi khrab de bsams pas// de las ye shes thob par 'gyur// gsal la mi rtog rig pa'i sku// ye shes zhes ni de la bya// gsang ba bstan pa'i rgyud las/ rdzogs/
434a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rim pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// dpa' mos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag po 'di'i 'khor ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
434a3(rgyud 'bum): pab/ dpa' bo chen po 'di'i 'khor ni thugs kyi 'khor bzhi'o// gsung gi 'khor brgyad do// sku'i 'khor lnga ru nges so// gsang ba bstan pa'i rgyud las/ 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//
434a4(rgyud 'bum): / dpa' mos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dpal chen po'i rig pa ni ji ltar legs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ oM badz+ra pA Ni hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha nI lAM ba ra
434a5(rgyud 'bum): / d+har badz+ra pA Ni hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra pA Ni kro d+ha ma hA tsaN+Da ro Sha Na hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ 'khor bzhi'i rig pa phul ba ni/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA kA lA ya hUM hUM phaT phaT/ snying tsit+taM kro tsi dun dz+wa/ oM badz+ra traM
434a6(rgyud 'bum): lokya hUM hUM phaT phaT/ baM mA ra ya tsit+ta rbang/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha nA ga hUM hUM phaT phaT/ mA ra ya rak+Sha rngubs rngubs rbad/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ku be ra hUM hUM phaT phaT/ mA ra ya kau tshi rbad/ dpa' bo'i 'khor lha ma srin sde brgyad
434a7(rgyud 'bum): kyis rig pa phul ba ma hA de ba mA ra ya sod sod/ ma hA nA ga mA ra ya dza dzaHma hA de ba mA ra ya ha na ha na/ ma hA ma ni mA ra ya gtubs gtubs/ ma hA grub pa mA ra ya tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ma hA yak+Sha mA ra ya b+hin+da b+hin+da/
434b1(rgyud 'bum): ma hA tri dza mA ra ya khos khos/ ma hA ba ni mA ra ya nan nan/ 'khor gos sngon can lnga brgya'i rig pa phul ba/ ma ra ya ru ta ru ta hUM hUM phaT phaT/ gsang ba bstan pa'i rgyud las/ rig pa bstan pa'i
434b2(rgyud 'bum): le'u ste drug pa'o/ / / dpa' mos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'phrin las kyi gzhung sbyin sreg gis bsdu 'tshal lam mi 'tshal ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
434b3(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sbyin sreg ni rnam pa gsum pa ste/ phyi dang / nang dang / gsang ba gsum mo// re re la ni bzhi bzhi bstan// zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang // dbang dang drag po'i sbyin sreg
434b4(rgyud 'bum): go gsang ba bstan pa'i rgyud las/ sbyin sreg gi le'u ste bdun pa'o// // bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ de nas rigs kyi lha tshogs rnams yi rang
434b5(rgyud 'bum): ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// bcom ldan 'das dpal phyag na rdo rje gsang ba bstan pa'i rgyud rdzogs so// // lo tsa ba dar ma tshul khrims kyis
434b6(rgyud 'bum): bsgyur ba'o/ / rgya gar skad du/ b+ha ga bAn badz+ra pA Ni gu h+ya a b+hi de sha tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba
434b7(rgyud 'bum): mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ dpal gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la phyag la 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das lcang lo can gyi
435a1(rgyud 'bum): pho brang na/ sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i tshogs dang / byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang / rig pa'i khro bo'i tshogs dpag tu
435a2(rgyud 'bum): med pa dang / lha ma yin gyi tshogs dang / gnod sbyin lnga brgya dang bcas te thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das bdud thams cad 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyom
435a3(rgyud 'bum): par zhugs so/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag ni rdo rjes bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar te/ phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma gsang ba'i rdo rje 'dzin// ting 'dzin
435a4(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po mi g.yo las/ / cig car bzhengs te gsang ba'i mchog/ ye shes lnga yi spyod yul gyi// sku gsung thugs kyis gsang ba mchog/ ji ltar sgrub pa'i rim pa dang // las kyi bya ba mdor
435a5(rgyud 'bum): bsdus te/ / gang zag ji lta bus sgrub cing // rig pa'i rgyal po mchog gyur pa// bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs// zhes zhus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das mnyam par gzhag
435a6(rgyud 'bum): pa las langs te/ thugs kar ye shes lnga mi byed pa'i rdo rje lan gsum du gsor bas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'gul ba dang ldeg pa la sogs pa kun tu 'khrugs te/ gdug pa
435a7(rgyud 'bum): can 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer bkye nas slar thugs kar thim pa las/ rdo rje lte ba nas yum dpa' mo rje rje bde ma zhes bya ba byung ste rang gi ston pa la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba lan gsum
435b1(rgyud 'bum): byas nas/ phyag byas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces gsol to// khyod kyi sku gsung thugs kyi ni// gsang ba dam pa gang yin pa// rdo rje 'dzin pas legs par gsungs// 'di ni rnyed dka' rgyud chen te/
435b2(rgyud 'bum): rin chen lta bur 'dod 'byung ba// grangs med tshogs las byung ba 'di// thugs rje'i rang bzhin ston pa las// bcom ldan khyed kyis bshad du gsol// zhes zhus pa dang / zhal 'dzum pa mdzad
435b3(rgyud 'bum): nas byams pa rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer gyis 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par byas te/ tshur 'dus nas rang gi zhal du thim pa dang / dpa' mo rdo rje bde ma khyod// stong pa'i rang bzhin
435b4(rgyud 'bum): bdag med mas/ / ji ltar zhus bzhin bshad par bya// gus par nyon la legs par zung // rdo rje 'chang gi sku gsung thugs// mi phyed stong pa'i rang bzhin las// thugs rje sna tshogs thabs tshul te//
435b5(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni rab tu rtogs dka' bas// 'das dang da ltar bzhugs pa dang // ma 'ongs sangs rgyas spyod yul yin// bsam gyis mi khyab rnam par dag/ brjod med mi g.yo 'dus ma byas// nam mkha'
435b6(rgyud 'bum): dri med chos kyi sku/ / dus gsum dus med rtogs pa'i mchog/ 'di la ji ltar bstan du yod// 'on kyang snying rje'i rang bzhin pas// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin ni// gnyis med gnyis kyi
435b7(rgyud 'bum): thabs tshul rig/ 'di ni gsang ba dam pa ste// de nyid gzhan la mngon bstan pas// gdul bya tshim 'gyur rgyal po bzhin// rang 'dod 'bras bu 'byung 'gyur bas// gsang ba mngon par bstan pa yi//
436a1(rgyud 'bum): rgyud chen rgyal po bshad par bya// e ma ho/ mi phyed rdo rje gsang ba'i mchog/ e ma ho/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// sna tshogs nor bu rgyud chen 'di// rang gi gsang ba
436a2(rgyud 'bum): dam pa yin/ / bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ rab tu dga' ba'i gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas
436a3(rgyud 'bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po khyod sgrub pa'i gang zag ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa// mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs// zag med bde ba'i rgyu
436a4(rgyud 'bum): 'byung ma/ / bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog/ khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon// nga nyid sgrub pa'i gang zag ni// snying rje ldan zhing shes rab che// bzod ldan brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs/
436a5(rgyud 'bum): bslab pa gsum ldan dad pas brgyan// dpa' zhing gsang ba'i spyod pa shes// gus shing g.yo med skyabs gnas gsum// rtag tu mchod cing yengs pa med// lhag pa'i lha la yid ches shing // phyi nang
436a6(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba'i dbang thob la/ / dam tshig brda do na nges par 'dzin// de ltos sgrub pa byas gyur na// yun mi ring ba rang nyid kyis// gsung gsum la ni mkhas 'gyur te// 'bang bas thob pa'i 'bras bu ni/ a
436a7(rgyud 'bum): ldan de yi snying la gnas/ / zhes gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las// sgrub pa po'i gang zag bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//
436b1(rgyud 'bum): dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang khyod sgrub pa'i gnas ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs// bag/
436b2(rgyud 'bum): med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma// bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog/ khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon// nga nyid sgrub pa'i gnas mchog ni// dur khrod brgyad dam nye ba'i gnas// dur khrod nags kyi
436b3(rgyud 'bum): nang du ni/ / ri rtse brag ri sngon po'i mdog/ khros pa'i gzugs 'dra byang lta ba// me tog sngon pos mdzes pa dang // ne'u gsing dang ut+pal nags// dben zhing yid 'ong nyams dga' ba// bkra shis
436b4(rgyud 'bum): dpal 'phel dbang yang 'dzin/ / lhung lo can dang ming 'thun pa// sna tshogs sgrub pa'i gnas su shis// tshwa sgo chu med u ma'i gnas// rgyal po'i pho brang tshong dus dang // nyan thos la sogs 'dug gnas su//
436b5(rgyud 'bum): nga nyid bsgrub par mi bya'o// smin pa'i gang zag rnams la ni// gnas sogs brtags pas ci zhig bya// thams cad bde chen sangs rgyas kyis// zhing khams rol pas gnas pa yin// bde bas rigs kyis
436b6(rgyud 'bum): brtag par bya/ / bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ sgrub pa'i gnas bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / dpa' mo rdo
436b7(rgyud 'bum): bde mas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang khyod sgrub pa'i thabs ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs// zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma//
437a1(rgyud 'bum): bdag med shwe rab ma yi mchog/ khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon// nga nyid sgrub pa'i rim pa ni// snying rje chen po sngon 'gro zhing // gzhan gyi don la bslab par bya// nam
437a2(rgyud 'bum): mkhar rdo rje can dmigs la/ / bde ba chen pos rnam par mchod// rgyud sbyang sangs rgyas tshogs dag la// 'gyod pa spangs te rjes yi rang // mya ngan 'da' la gsol bar bya// dam pa'i don la bskul bya
437a3(rgyud 'bum): zhing / rigs kyi sa bon cher bskyed la// kun la khyab byed gzhan don sgrub// bdag gi sdug bsngal mi blta zhing // gzhan dag bde la dgod par bya// me 'obs lta bur gnas pa yi// sems can kun
437a4(rgyud 'bum): la snying rje sgom/ / spros bral gnyis 'dzin spangs pa yi// tshul la yang dag bslab par bya// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med cing // dpa' bos stong zhing bdag dang bral// snang zhing srid pa'i chos
437a5(rgyud 'bum): rnams kun/ / ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par dag/ mtha' bral mkha' 'dra dbu ma'i don// de lta bu'i yi chos nyid la// sems kyi rang bzhin gnyis su med// ma rtogs log pa'i sems can la// sdug
437a6(rgyud 'bum): bsngal kun dang bral ba'i phyir/ / snying rje chen po bsgom par bya// rang gi sems nyid yi ge hUM// sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed pa'i ma// chu skyes thabs dang shes rab ldan// mtha' gnyis spangs pa
437a7(rgyud 'bum): gdan dang bcas/ / gnyis med rdo rje'i rang bzhin te// snying rjes sbyangs nas gsum pa rdzogs// sku mdog nag po zhal gcig pa// phyag gnyis g.yas pa rdo rje 'dzin// bsnun pa'i stobs can rdo rje 'bar/
437b1(rgyud 'bum): g.yon pas dril bu dkur brten te// sgeg pa'i tshul can nam mkhar gdengs// rin chen chu 'dzin rgyan dang ldan// stag lpags dar gyis sku la brgyan// g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang bdud la brdzis// spyan
437b2(rgyud 'bum): gsum gdug pa'i mche ba gtsigs/ / bskal pa'i me 'od nang du bzhugs// yi ge gsum gyis gnas gsum po// lhar byas skye mched byin gyis brlab// gnas su khro bo'i yig 'bru bskyed// sprul
437b3(rgyud 'bum): pa dpag med phyogs bcur 'gyed/ / yi ge bzhi yis ye shes dbab// rigs bdag la sogs sangs rgyas kyis// dbang bskur byin brlabs cod pan bsam// de yi ting nge 'dzin 'byung ba'i rgyu//
437b4(rgyud 'bum): cho ga gsum pa'i sems dpa' yis// gzhan don rgyun mi 'chad par sgom// yang na gsung gi yig 'brus mtshan// 'phrin las thogs med rnal 'byor bzlas// 'di ni rnam dag rig pa ste// /
437b5(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu ma nyams 'bras bur ldan// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ dpa' bo gcig ba sgrub pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//
437b6(rgyud 'bum): dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gi dkyil 'khor sgom pa'i thabs ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus
437b7(rgyud 'bum): pa legs/ / zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma// bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog/ khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon// skad cig ma yis lngar bsams nas// snying khar nyi ma'i rig pa hU~M/
438a1(rgyud 'bum): 'od kyis rang bzhin snod bcud rnams// sbyangs te sangs rgyas sa la gzhag/ 'od zer gnyis pas sangs rgyas dang // byang sems dkyil 'khor dgug bya ste// phyag rgya hU~M las lha ma
438a2(rgyud 'bum): bsam/ / me tog la sogs pas mchod la// tha dad pa yi mchod pa che// de 'od dpag med lha mo yis// reg bya tha mi dad pas mchod// sdig bshags rjes su yi rang dang // gsol
438a3(rgyud 'bum): zhing skyabs 'gro bdag lus dbul/ / sems bskyed dge ba bsngo bar bya// de rjes dang po byams pa ste// gnyis pa snying rje gsum pa dga'// kun gyi mtha' la btang snyoms so// sbyang
438a4(rgyud 'bum): gzhi sngags kyis phyi nang kun/ / stong par byas te rang lus kyang // dbang po'i gzhu 'dra srid 'dzin gyi// gnas su hUM bsam de 'od bcas// tsam las byung ba'i 'khor lo ste// rtsibs
438a5(rgyud 'bum): bcu la ni nyi ma bsam/ / dbus su hUM las gnod mdzes bskyed// de las hUM 'phros khro bcu yang // rang rang sa la gsal bar bskyed// sngags pas bgegs med gyis shig par// de la bka'
438a6(rgyud 'bum): lcang bsgo bar bya/ / zhal bzhi'i gsang sngags dran pa yis// mthe bong sdigs mdzub sbyar nas ni// phyogs bcur brda ni bstan par bya// oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha ni hUM hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM hUM phaT/
438a7(rgyud 'bum): gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM hUM phaT/ oM A na ya ho b+ha g+ha wAM bi d+yA rA dzA ya hUM hUM phaT/ sngags kyi rgyal po 'di brjod pas// lus ngag sems las byung ba yi// bgegs kun gyi ni mgo stangs su/
438b1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje phur ba gzugs par bya// oM g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya sar+b+ba duSh+TAM big+h+nAn hUM hUM phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya/ sar+b+ba pA paM A dz+nyA pa ya ti/ kA ya bA ka tsit+ta badz+ra kI la ya hUM phaT/ rdo rje tho bas brdung bya ste/
438b2(rgyud 'bum): oM badz+ra mud ga ra badz+ra kI la ya a ko Ta ya hUM phaT/ spyi bor btab pas nges par brlag/ slar 'dus phyogs mtshams ma lus par// sa gzhi ra ba dra ba dang // gur bcing ba dang bra bre dang /
438b3(rgyud 'bum): mda' dang me yi 'od 'bar bsgom// oM badz+ra me de ni badz+ri b+ha ba badz+ra ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hUM/ oM badz+ra prA kA ra hUM baM hUM/ oM badz+ra paM dza ra hUM laM hUM/ oM badz+ra bi tA na hUM khaM hUM/ oM badz+ra sha raM dzA la
438b4(rgyud 'bum): traM saM traM/ oM badz+ra dz+wa la a nA larka hUM/ rim pas brjod la snying rje yis// bdag nyid gzhan la phan 'dod pa// smon lam las byung rdzu 'phrul mchog/ yaM las byung ba gzhu 'dra ba//
438b5(rgyud 'bum): sngon po ba dan ldan pa bsam// de stang raM byung rgod ma'i kha// gru gsum dmar po 'od 'bar ba// baM las skyes pa zlum po ste// dkar po 'khyil ba'i tshul du bsam// de las
438b6(rgyud 'bum): skyes pa dbang chen te/ / laM skyes ser po rdo rje'i rgyu// gru bzhi 'od zer 'bar ba bsam// de steng tsam las chos kyi 'khor// lte bar bruM las gzhal yas khang // gru bzhi sgo
438b7(rgyud 'bum): dang rta babs bcas/ / dra ba phyed dang dra bas brgyan// 'phreng ba rin chen rdo rje dang // mdzes pa'i ba dan bcas pa bsam// de nang paM las chu skyes ni// ge sar 'dab mar bcas pa'i steng //
439a1(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma kA li 'od 'bar tsha// steng du zla ba A li bsil// kha sbyar bar du hUM dang a// gnag cing dmar ba'i rnam pa la// de las pad+ma rdo rje bsam/ slar yang
439a2(rgyud 'bum): yi ges 'gro ba sbyang / / hUM gis mi bskyod thugs rnams bsdu// a yis 'od dpag gsung bsdus la// gnyis med zhu bas sprul pa bsdu// rdo rje las ni khro bo ste// pad+ma sa khro mo'i
439a3(rgyud 'bum): rnam par bskyed/ / khro bo mthing kha zhal gcig pa// rang 'od las byung phyag gnyis 'khyud// rdo rje dril bu thabs shes rab// g.yas dang g.yon du bsam par bya//
439a4(rgyud 'bum): dbu rgyan la sogs rin chen ldan// dbu skra kham ser gyen du 'bar// nag po sbrul lus klu chen brgyad// sku smad stag gi pags pas dkris// chos gos sngon pos
439a5(rgyud 'bum): skra stong dkris/ / mche ba gtsigs shing spyan gsum dmar// 'dod dgur bsgyur zhing brkyang bskum zhabs// mtha' gnyis spangs pa'i steng du bzhugs// de yum
439a6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje bde ma khro/ / dmar ljang zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma// g.yas pa gri gug yab la 'khyud// g.yon pa thod pa bde ba ster// gnyis med g.yon gyi phyogs nas 'khril
439a7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rjes sbyor ba'i sgras bskul te/ / shar phyogs pad+mar nyi zla las/ hUM las khams gsum rnam par rgyal// dkar po zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa// g.yas pa rdo rje rtse gsum
439b1(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin/ / g.yon pa dril bu be con te// khro bo rgyan ldan bsams nas kyang // 'byung po'i nus pa 'joms par byed// lho phyogs nyi ma ro stengs su// hUM las byung ba'i legs ldan
439b2(rgyud 'bum): gnag/ g.yas pa gri gug g.yon thod pa// zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum thod 'phreng ldan// dgra bo gsod pa'i las la brtson// nub tu klu 'dul bdud rtsi 'khyil// ljang lu
439b3(rgyud 'bum): zhal gcig phyag bzhi khro/ / g.yas pa rdo rje bya khyung dang // g.yon pa dbyug to phur bu bsnams// sa 'og klu sogs zas su gsol// byang duk+Sha las rnam thos bu// zhal gcig
439b4(rgyud 'bum): phyag gnyis bum stengs su/ / mdog gser g.yas pa rgyal mtshan bsnams// g.yon pas nor 'dzin gzung ba ste// dbul ba sel ba'i don la brtson// sgo mtshams lha yi rang bzhin la/
439b5(rgyud 'bum): ye shes spyan drangs mchod la gzhug/ de ni yi ge bzhi sbyor yin// lus ngag sems la yi ge yi// lha yi mtshan ma gdab par bya// skye mched lhar byas ting 'dzin gyi// nus pa mi shim
439b6(rgyud 'bum): lhar bltas la/ / ye shes lnga 'dus yi ge bsam// de yi 'od kyis spyan drangs pa'i// rigs lnga snyoms 'jug byin rlabs kyis// mi bskyod rdo rjes dbang bskur te// gsang ba shes
439b7(rgyud 'bum): rab ye shes kyis/ / rgyas btab rigs la bzhi pa yi// phyag rgya che la rigs med do// 'di ni gsang chen sku grub pa// rim gyis gsal zhing rnam par dag/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sku thob pa/
440a1(rgyud 'bum): tshe gcig nyid la 'gyur ba yin// rtag tu goms pa'i sbyor ba yis// sa sogs 'jig rten ma lus kun// skad cig nyid la dbang du 'gyur// gtsug na rin chen la sogs
440a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i/ gdug pa can rnams snying yang 'byin// dga' bo la sogs klu chen rnams// rtag tu de la 'dud par 'gyur// nad kyi rigs kun ma lus 'joms// gnod sbyin ma lus bka' nyan
440a3(rgyud 'bum): cing lha srin ma lus bran du 'gyur/ / 'di ni gsang ba dam pa ste// mdzes ma khyod la bshad pa yin// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las//
440a4(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gi rig pa'i gsang sngags kyi don ji lta bu lags/
440a5(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs// zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma// bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog/ khyod la bshad kyis legs
440a6(rgyud 'bum): par nyon/ / gsang ba mchog gi gsang ba ste// 'phrin las thams cad rdzogs byed cing // sdug bsngal kun las skyob byed pa'i// A li kA li mnyam sbyor las// thabs dang shes
440a7(rgyud 'bum): rab ma'am med pa'i/ / sngags kyi don ni rnam pa lnga// sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa dang // 'phrin las sna tshogs rig pa dang // 'khor gyi las kyi rig pa dang // 'byung po dgug dang
440b1(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba dang / / gtor ma gtang ba'i rig pa'o// oM badz+ra pA Ni hU~M phaT swAhA/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA NI hU~M phaTaswAH/ oM badz+ra tsar+thA sa hA roSha/ hU~M phaT swAhA/ r+tha thA
440b2(rgyud 'bum): b+ho b+ho ban+nA ga a d+hi pa ta ye/ i daM nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra sha rI rA Ni/ badz+ra pA Ni tri da ya/ yaHsa mA ti kra mtha/ mA ku la/ uta sA da nAM/ b+ha biSh+yan+ti/ tad+ya thA/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha
440b3(rgyud 'bum): bud+d+ha bi bud+d+ha ma tI kra ma tha/ ha ra ha ra nA ga nAM/ pra ha ra pra ha ra nAg+na nAM/ ts+tshin+na ts+tshin+da nA gA hri da yA ni/ b+hin+da b+hin+da nA ga marmArti/ bi shIn+yar+d+hanA ga sha rIrA/ bi s+pho Ta sa nA ga na ya nA ni
440b4(rgyud 'bum): tad+ya thA/ oM AHhUM phaT/ nA ga bi dA ra NA ya hUM phaT/ nA go ta sA da nA ya hUM phaT/ nI la ba sa nA ya hUM phaT/ a pra ti ha ta ba la pa rA kra mA ya hUM phaT/ kr-i tAn tA rU pa ya phaT/
440b5(rgyud 'bum): ro Sha NA ya phaT/ trA sa nA ya phaT/ kuSh+maN+Dota sA da nA ya phaT/ pra ta pi shA tsa bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ yak+Sha a pasmA ra bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ hA sa ha sa/ dA ra dA ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/
440b6(rgyud 'bum): nA sha ya nA sha ya/ sar+b+ba big+h+nAn bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ sar+b+ba sha truM saM g+ha bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA Ni rA dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ oM badz+ra trai lokyA bi dza ya hUM phaT/ oM bar+Na
440b7(rgyud 'bum): trai lo kya bi dza ya b+hasmi swA hA/ mA ra ya tsit+ta rbad rbad/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA kA lA ya hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kA lA gu Ni hr-i da ya hUM phaT/ tsit+te kro d+hi duny+dza dzaH/ oM badz+ra kro d+hi a mri ta nA ga hU
441a1(rgyud 'bum): oM a mr-i ta s+'uT li si khaM ku ru hu phaT/ mA ra sa ra k+Sha rdubs rdzas/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ku ber rA dz+wa ma hU phaT/ oM a ts+ya b+ha la dza lonA ma rbu phaT/ nA ra ya ke tshomachom
441a2(rgyud 'bum): mthu bskur pa sod sod/ ma thun gsar sna dza/ ma mde 'i mA ma han tan/ ma hAs nu mAr la gtubs gtubs/ san grub sa myur la tiH(/ mtha la k+Sha wA ra sa d+hIHd+hI
441a3(rgyud 'bum): ma hA gan+d+harba mA ra ya khos khos/ ma hA ma ri Ni mA ra ya nAM/ ma hA nI lAM pa ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA Ni yak+Sha hUM/ mu ru ta mu ru ta hUM phaT/ mA ra Na sod sod/ mA ra Na bying bying/ mA ra Na rmugs rmugs/
441a4(rgyud 'bum): mA ra Na ha la ha la/ mA ra Na myos myos/ mA ra Na myos bying/ mA ra Na thu ma ri la dzadza/ ka ka rak+Sha hUM hU staM b+h+yo dzA kha khA/ te she rak+Sha hUM hU staM b+h+yo dzA kha khA/ tsa pa rak+Sha hUM hUM staM b+h+yo dzA kha khA/ tsa ka
441a5(rgyud 'bum): rak+Sha hUM hU stAM b+h+yo dzA kha khA/ mun du rak+Sha hUM hUM staM b+h+yo dzA kha khA/ ka ka rak+Sha sa ma ya bud+d+ha ya s+phu ta ra/ te sha rak+Sha sa ma ya bud+d+ha ya smA ta ra/ tsa pa rak+Sha sa ma ya bud+d+ha ya smA ta re/ tsa ka rak+Sha sa ma
441a6(rgyud 'bum): ya bud+d+ha ya s+phu ta ra/ mun du rak+Sha sa ma ya bud+d+hA ya s+phu tar/ hUM hUM/ hril hri la/ de mi dim/ phob phob/ shar shar/ de ri di ri/ chang rbad/ kha thaM kha r+the/ thus thus/ dza re dza re b+h+yo/
441a7(rgyud 'bum): has ha se/ te pa te pa/ kri ta ha kri ta ha/ kri khrig kri khug/ chal pa tshal ba/ rbad ling rbad leng / srog tshig nan rbad/ lus dul ma ra ya rbad/ raM raM dz+wa la dz+wA la shai shi/ rdul bun rbad sod/
441b1(rgyud 'bum): nA ga mA ra ya hUM phaT/ dzaHhUM baM hoHd+har+m+ma ka ka ki ti ra/ d+har+m+ma te shas muny+dza/ d+har+m+ma te sha tsa ka ra/ d+har+m+ma te sha sa ma ya/ bud+d+hA ya s+phu ta ra/ te pa te pa kha wA raM/ te pa te pa ka tsa ri/ te ba te
441b2(rgyud 'bum): mun du ra~M/ te pa te pa pustaM ha ra/ te ba ti pa sa mun dza/ tsa ka ra muM du ra khe/ badz+ra tsa ma ran dzA dzA/ de sha ra~M/ mun du ne/ badz+ra dzu ru dzu ru ra/ dzu ru dzu ru sa mr-i dza dzaH/ badz+ra g+he ne khe dza/ badz+ra pUr
441b3(rgyud 'bum): khe dzaH/ badz+ra muN+Da re khe dza/ kha dza rA dzA muM du ra khe/ kha dza ra dza muM du ra sa mu khe/ pad+ma ra Ni kha dza rA dza muM du ra khe/ kha dza rA dza muM du ra sa muny+dza ra khe/ dzu dzu dza dza khA hi dza/ oM kA ya bAka tsit+ta i daM ba liM
441b4(rgyud 'bum): b+huny+dza dzaM g+ha phuwa/ d+hU ba mAM sa se sa khan+ti/ khur+t+ti pheT gA da/ oM a mr-i ta pra ti dza ka sa ka ru pU dza khA haM/ rak+ta bi pa ta/ ka se ru pU dza khA hi/ d+hU pe/ puSh+pe/ A lo ke/ gan+d+he/
441b5(rgyud 'bum): / no bi d+ye/ ka sa ka ru pU dza khA hi/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sar+b+ba d+har+m+ma NAM/ A d+ya nuta pan na tAta/ oM AHhUM/ 'di ni rin chen sngags kyi ma chog/ ma lus dgos 'dod 'byung ba'i
441b6(rgyud 'bum): dpal/ / gzungs ma khyod la nyer bshad pas// 'di ni mi 'da'i dam tshig yin// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ gsang
441b7(rgyud 'bum): sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o/ / dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gi 'khor ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
442a1(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsal pa/ / mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs// bag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byungs// bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog/ khyod la bshad kyis legs
442a2(rgyud 'bum): par nyon/ / nga yi 'khor ni bsam mi khyab// 'di tsam grangs ni sangs rgyas kyis// bskal par grangs kyang shes mi 'gyur// de bas nam mkha'i tshad dang mtshungs// mdor
442a3(rgyud 'bum): bsdus nas ni bshad par bya/ / sku yi 'khor ni khro bo bcu// rigs lnga'i ngo bo sku gsung thugs// mi 'gyur gdug pa 'dul ba yin// thugs kyi 'khor ni rigs brgya ste/
442a4(rgyud 'bum): mdor bsdus sprul pa'i khro bo bzhi// gsung gi 'khor ni dpag med kyang // rigs drug 'dul ba'i khyud chen yin// sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab po// gdul bya'i 'khor ni klu
442a5(rgyud 'bum): chen brgyad/ / gsung gis de rigs 'dul ba yin// gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje'i tshogs// lnga brgya rigs bsdus sku yis 'dul// thugs kyis lha srin gdug pa 'dul//
442a6(rgyud 'bum): byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis 'dul// 'di la 'dis 'dul sprul pa'i tshogs// smon lam dbang gis byung ba ste// bsam gyis mi khyab des 'dul ba// rigs la brjod par
442a7(rgyud 'bum): ga la nus/ / mdor bsdus mdzes ma khyod la bstan// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las// 'khor nges par bstan pa'i
442b1(rgyud 'bum): le'u ste bdun pa'o/ / / dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gi las sgrub pa'i rim pa ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/
442b2(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsal pa// mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs// zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma// bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog/ khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon// gdug
442b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i klu rnams 'dul 'dod pas/ / rdo rje khyung chen stobs chen 'dul// nga yi gsung gi sprul pa ste// mche ba rno dpal drag po gtsigs// baM las rgya mtsho ri rab steng // yi ge hU~M
442b4(rgyud 'bum): las byung ba yi/ / dpa' bo klu 'dul bsgom par bya// sku mdog nag po zhal dgu ldan// rtsa zhal mthing nag g.yas pa dkar// g.yon pa dmar po de stang du// dbus
442b5(rgyud 'bum): dmar g.yas pa ltung ba ste/ / g.yon pa bcom gser dang 'dra// de steng dbus dkar g.yas pa gnag/ g.yon pa bai DUn+da lhur sngo// thams cad spyan gsum rdo rje'i mchu/
442b6(rgyud 'bum): gtsug rin chen rdo rje'i rwa// phyag ni bco brgyad g.yas pa na// rdo rje ral gri dgra sta zhags// mdung dang lcags kyu mda'i dang ni// rtse gsum las kyi bya khyung bsnams// rim bzhi/
442b7(rgyud 'bum): chu bdag mtha' yas dang // nor rgyas stobs rgyu dung skyong dang // pad+ma pad chen rigs ldan dang // 'jog po klu dgu ro stod lha// thal sbyar gcol rin chen stob/ mjug ma phyag la/
443a1(rgyud 'bum): dkris mdzad de// kun kya dang 'dog 'dzin// sbrul go bdun pa sbyin bzhin ga sa/ gtsun pargyal bu con dang // 'khor lo rgyags so shA /
443a2(rgyud 'bum): sbrul gyi rgyal mtshan gzhu dang ni// gtum chung phur dang khyung phur ro// rim bzhin rlung 'byin dga' ma dang // mdzes ldan dpa' mo 'od byed ma// grub ma bstan ma dge ma dang // gsal byed
443a3(rgyud 'bum): rim bzhin yab dang 'dra/ / thal sbyar gtso la pad+ma dbul// gdengs ka gsum gyis 'dud byed ma// g.yon du rim bzhin bsam par bya// zhabs bzhi chu srin rus sbal dang // phag
443a4(rgyud 'bum): dang lto 'phye'i steng na bzhugs/ / gshog pa rigs bzhi'i rdo rje ste// mjug ma ral gri rigs bzhir ldan// sder chen lpags la me 'bar bas// rab tu gtum zhing sa bdag dang /
443a5(rgyud 'bum): klu rigs ma lus brlag mdzad pa// 'og min gnas su srab par bsam// de rjes gnas gsum yi ges brgyan// oM AHhUM dkar dmar dang gnag/ sprul pa go cha'i sngags bsam pa/
443a6(rgyud 'bum): / oM hUM trAM hrIHA/ spyi bo mgrin pa snying kha dang // lte ba gsang gnas bsam par bya// e baM ma yA dpung pa dang // dpyi yi stengs su bsam par bya// hU~M sa hrIHa brang dang ni// sog
443a7(rgyud 'bum): dbrag ltong mo lte lkog bsam/ / dzaHhUM baM hoHsgo bzhir bsam// staM dza ya a sprul pa dang // yang sprul bsam gyis mi khyab bsam// de nas gsang ba'i sngags bstan pa// las kyi khyud
443b1(rgyud 'bum): chen drag po'i sngags/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi mthu bsdus pa// oM badz+ra khyung kar khyud kar badz+ra ga ru Ta tsa le tsa le hUM phaT/ sku yi gsang ba'i sngags su bstan// oM badz+ra ga ru Da hUM srog tshig ni rbang
443b2(rgyud 'bum): lus dul nA ga mA ra ya phaT/ r-i ra dza la dza la zhi zhi rdul bun rbad phaT/ gsung gi rig pa dam pa'o// oM badz+ra tsaN+Da gA ru Da hUM mA ra ya/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ badz+ra pa ti ga ru Da be ge hUM dzaH
443b3(rgyud 'bum): ri dza pri dza hUM phaT/ thugs gsang rdo rje gtum po'i sngags// drag byed thams cad rlag par byed// klu rnams snying khrag 'thig pa yin// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dam tshig 'di// rin chen
443b4(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du rnyed dka' bas/ / 'di la rtag tu 'bad par bya// mthun pa'i rdzas kyi gtor ma sbyin// de yi nang du gnod pa dgug/ oM badz+ra shrI ma ma nA ga sa bi ta chog khug maM laM
443b5(rgyud 'bum): d+hi swA hA/ 'dis ni bkug la lha la dbul// gal te gsad par 'dod pa na// sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa las// phur bu gnyis pa'i drag sngags dang // gsad pa spyi yi
443b6(rgyud 'bum): sham bur gdags/ / gzugs brnyan phur bus gdab par bya// tshangs pa yin yang nges par brlag/ oM badz+ra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na badz+ra kI la ya sar+b+ba big+h+nA na mud ga ra kI la ya A ko Ta ya hU~M
443b7(rgyud 'bum): phaT/ oM badz+ra tsaN+Da ga ru Ta kI li kI la ya sar+b+ba big+h+nAM mu ga ra kI la ya A ko Ta ya hUM phaT/ gtum chung phur bus gdab pa'i sngags// de rjes gzugs brnyan ma lus pa// drag po'i
444a1(rgyud 'bum): thab tu bsreg par bya/ / tsher ma can gyi me sngar la// khyung chen gtum po'i nga rgyal gyis// nA ga d+hA mi ba ti sar+b+ba kA ya bAka tsit+ta badz+ra nA yAn lan hUM/ ci rigs
444a2(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyis bsreg pa dang / / thal ba dkar gsum sbyar bya ste// rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i tshu la ngor// de ltar las kyi sbyor ba de// lan bdun byas par gyur na ni// klu chen drug gis snying
444a3(rgyud 'bum): la zin/ / nges par sos par 'gyur ba yin// gal te mi gtod kru chen gyi// lus dang khang par bcas pa la// me dang rdo rje'i char pa yis// skad cig nyid la tshig par 'gyur
444a4(rgyud 'bum): de bas dam tshig mi 'da' bas/ / las 'di myur bar mi bya'o// las kyi gtum po khyung sgrub pa// mdzes ma khyod la bstan pa yin// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par

444a6(rgyud 'bum): 'chang gi sku'i sprul pa pho nya gnod sbyin nag po'i sgrub pa ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs// zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma
444a7(rgyud 'bum): bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog/ khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon// de nyid gnod sbyin nag po 'di// bya ba'i las kun thogs pa meng // khyad par drag po'i 'phrin las 'grub/
444b1(rgyud 'bum): dur khrod brag rdzong nags phug tu// nag po'i sa la dkyil 'khor bya// pad+ma 'dab brgyad sgo dang bcas// mthing nag gru gsum me 'od ldan// saM las ri rab steng du hUM// 'od zer 'phro 'dus rdo rjer bsam// de las
444b2(rgyud 'bum): gnod sbyin nag po ni/ / zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs gsum ldan// g.yas pa 'jigs pa stag gi zhal// g.yon pa stobs chen seng ge ste// phyag g.yas dang po rdo rje 'dzin// gnyis pa rtse gsum gsum
444b3(rgyud 'bum): pa phur/ / g.yon pa dril chen lcags kyu dang // thod pa khrag gis bkang ba yin// g.yas pa gtum pa'i bdud mo brdzis// g.yon pas bdud po nyid gdong mnan// phur zhabs dmar po me 'bar bas//

444b7(rgyud 'bum): zi ra dang / / dug gi rigs kyis zab par bya// gsang ba drag po'i sngags 'di bzlas// oM badz+ra yak+Sha kA la tsaN+DA nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra sar+b+ba sha hUM bi dA ra ya phaT/ ha ra ha ra phaT/ pra ha ra pra ha ra phaT/ ts+tshin+da rIn+da phaT/

445a2(rgyud 'bum): o'i 'og tu sba/ / steng du ri rab rdo rje yis// mnan pa byas pas nges par bzlog/ yang na gnod sbyin chen po de// dur khrod ras la bri byas la// de yi snying khar sngags 'di bri// e li nang du chud
445a3(rgyud 'bum): par ni/ / oM badz+ra yak+Sha kA la tsaN+Da sa ya ma nu sma ra sid+d+hi hUM/ phyag la yak+Sha pa ti li// zhabs la kaM maM b+ha ra bri// de nyid gtor ma chen po la// bcug ste sngon po'i dar gyis dga'// de steng ras sam lom pa
445a4(rgyud 'bum): gnod sbyin srog gi 'khor lo ni/ / lte ba rtsibs bcu mu khyud bcas// yang rtsibs bcu dang mu khyud ldan// me 'od ldan pa bris byas te// sngags kyi 'khrul 'khor bkod nas kyang // las kyi ming dang spel pa
445a5(rgyud 'bum): brithi'i 'di ni gnod sbyin srog yin te/ / mi 'da' bka' yi dam tshig yin// las rnams gang bcol sku yis byed// yang na rgyal rigs thod pa la// gnod sbyin bris la tsha ba'i mar// chang dang bsres
445a6(rgyud 'bum): la byug bya ste/ / nyin re gang 'dod las dang sbyar// me tog kha dog mthun pas brab// bsgo ba'i 'phrin las 'grub par 'gyur// chu dar sngon po'i gzhi ma la// gser gyi 'khor lo bri bar bya// lte brtsings
445a7(rgyud 'bum): brgyad mu khyud ldan/ / phyi ma re mig bcu drug par// sa bon sngags dang sbal bya ste// kun gyi mtha' ru 'phrin las sngags// bris pa mgul du btags pa yis// mi mthun phyogs rnams srung 'gyur te/ bung ba
445b1(rgyud 'bum): me la bya ba bzhin/ / khyi sha btags pa'i ril bu'i nang // dgra yi gzugs bris sngags dang spel// nyi nub bya rog la byin te// sngags pazlas phyir zhing lan grangs ni// brgya'am stong du byas gyur na// gang yin gar+tha/

445b3(rgyud 'bum): khyim du bcangs pa na/ / mi phyugs la sogs 'khrug pa na// khyi dang 'dra bar 'brel bar 'gyur// khyi nag snying du gnod sbyin gyi// snying dang sku dang sngags bcu ga nas/ bcangs pa tsam gyis gnod sbyin nyid//

446a1(rgyud 'bum): shes sems dpa' bas ma/ / de yi rang bzhin skyeng nang du// pad+ma 'dab bzhi'i thig les brgyan// TI tha'i bar du rgya sran tshad// de yi nang du gnas pa'i srog/ ma sha mar
446a2(rgyud 'bum): me'i rtse ltar sgom/ / de la dmigs pa brtan pa dang // ci yang bsam par mi bya ste// bsam gyis mi khyab de bsams na// de las ye shes skye bar 'gyur// gsal zhing mi rtog rig pa'i sku// ye shes zhes
446a3(rgyud 'bum): ni de la bya/ / rten med rnam dag gsal ba yin// rtog parten can bsgom 'dod pas// sku yi gnas su 'khor lo ni// dkar po rtsa 'dab sum cu gnyis// mtshan gyi thabs kyis chas brgyan pa/
446a4(rgyud 'bum): gsung gi gnas su rtsa 'dab ni// bcu drug dmar po shes rab ste// de la thabs kyis nges par brgyan// thugs kyi gnas su dus sbyor brgyad// gtso bo'i yi ge brgyad gnas pa// 'phrin
446a5(rgyud 'bum): las byas pa'i gnas dag tu/ / dbyug gu'i grangs kyi rtsa gnas pa// shes rab gnyis 'gyur kha dog dmar// de dbus gnyis med g.yas dang g.yon// thabs dang shes rab rnam par dbye// rtog pa
446a6(rgyud 'bum): sad pa'i 'khor lo ni/ / thabs la drug dang shes rab drug/ tha ma bde ba'i 'dzin pa'i sa// mi rtog dpa' bo gnas pa yin// yi ge bzhi yis brgyan mdzad do// bde 'dzin 'khor lor yi ge med/
446a7(rgyud 'bum): brjod pa thams cad spangs pa ste// 'dus ma byas pa'i rang bzhin mchog/ khu ba khrag dang chu ser gnas// 'di ni lam gsum 'joms byed pa'o// skad cig rlung gi rta yis ni// thabs dang shes rab
446b1(rgyud 'bum): gnyis bskul nas/ / gnyis med ye shes skye bar 'gyur// ye shes kyis ni rtog pa sreg/ thal ba'ang dmigs par mi 'gyur bas// rtags lnga rim par 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas dpal gyi yon tan te// yang
446b2(rgyud 'bum): nas yang du goms par bya/ / sde pa bzhi yi longs spyod ni// gnas su yang dag skye bar 'gyur// gnyis med bde ba'i gnas thob nas// skye 'chi la sogs rgyud chad de// 'di ni rnam dag legs pa'i gnas// thob

448b1(rgyud 'bum): gnyis pa zur thig la sogs pa// nub dang lhor ni slob dpon la// byang shar slob ma'i gnas sa ste// g.yas kyis bskor ba ma gtogs pa// g.yon du nam yang ma yin no// de ltar cha yis rnam par dbye//
448b2(rgyud 'bum): thig skung chang na bla ma 'chi// dman dang lhag pas nad du 'gyur// phyogs 'khrul na ni slob ma rmongs// de bas mkhas pas skyon med bya// rin chen lnga 'am 'bru yi phye// yang na 'byung khungs las byung ba//
448b3(rgyud 'bum): yige bcu yis byin brlabs te// rigs lnga rnam par dag pa las// dkar ser dmar ljang nag po dang // dbang ldan phyogs nas bri bar bya// gal te tshon rtsi mi mnyam zhing // yo dang dma' bar gyur na no//
448b4(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub med cing rtsod la gdung // sbom pas nad 'byung phra bas ni// nor nyams gal te chad pas ni// 'chi 'gyur g.yas bskor ma bris na// phur bus btab pa yin zhes bya// shar phyogs dkar la lho nub byang //
