448b6(rgyud 'bum): drag la sogs phyogs mtshams dgod/ / dbus mtho shar dang byang gzhol zhing // mtho zhing ma 'dres drang bar bri// de nas rdo rje 'dzin dmigs la// gus pas me tog dang bcas nas// gsol ba
448b7(rgyud 'bum): 'di ltar gdab par bya/ / dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa che// byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa// mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo// dam tshig de nyid bdag la gsol/ byang chub sems mchog bdag
449a1(rgyud 'bum): la gsol/ / sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la gsol// thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu// mgon pos bdag ni gzhug par mdzod
449a2(rgyud 'bum): ces pa lan gsum bar du bya/ / bu tshur theg pa chen po yi// tshul tshon snod ni khyod yin te// gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga mchog/ khyod la yang dag bshad par bya// rdo rje mi phyed
449a3(rgyud 'bum): mthu yis ni/ / mnyam med pa yi ye shes 'thob// de bas kun mkhyen thob 'dod pas// bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig/ bla ma sangs rgyas kun mchod cing // rtsu ba yan lag nyes pa spong // ma grol
449a4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor ba'i sems can la/ / snying rje chen po rab bskyed nas// bsgral zhing grol ba'i lam la dgod// bde bar dbugs ni dbyung bar bya// de dag rim dang rim min pa// slob ma'i rim par rnam par brtag/ khrus
449a5(rgyud 'bum): byaso shing sbyin par bya/ / 'phrin las phyogs dang dngos grub kyi// rim pa rnam par brtag par bya// srung skud gdags dang ku sha sbyin// rmi lam brtags la ngan pa na// zhi ba'i me yis bzlog par bya/
449a6(rgyud 'bum): gdong g.yogs bcings la ye shes dbab// dkyil 'khor dam par gzhug pa'i phyir// sngon bsags sdig pa ma lus las// dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam gyis 'byung // bu khyod su yin ci dga'
449a7(rgyud 'bum): ba bdag ni skal bzang rigs yin pas/ / rdo rje 'dzin pa khyod la dga'// mig dbye dkyil 'khor lha yang bstan// dam tshig chu sbyin mna' yang bsgag/ me tog dor la lha ngo bstan// gang dang gang du badz+ra
449b1(rgyud 'bum): gyur pa'i/ / rigs kyis de la spro bar bya// chu dang cod pan rdo rje de// dril bu ming gis dbang bskur te// rigs lnga'i bdag nyid ye shes lnga// brtul zhug lung bstan rjes gnang byin// dbugs dbyung rdo rje slob dpon sgrub/
449b2(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba shes rab ye shes dang // bzhi pa brjod med dbang bskur ba// gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor du// mchog tu rab zhugs mthong bas na// deng khyod sdig pa ma lus las// rnam grol rigs su skyes
449b3(rgyud 'bum): pas na/ / sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam gsungs pa'i// rjes su gnang bas dbugs phyin 'gyur// dngos grub rgyu yi dam tshig ni// bu yis rtag tu srung bar gyis// slob mas bla ma la btud nas//
449b4(rgyud 'bum): gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal pa// de ltar bdag gis bsgrub par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa ltar// rgyan dang na bza' rin chen dang // rgyal srid bu dang chung ma dang // rang gi lus
449b5(rgyud 'bum): kyang bla ma la/ / bsnyen bkur tshim pa med par bya// deng du bdag tshe 'bras bu yod// bdag ni gson pa 'bras bu che// de ring sangs rgyas rigs su skyes// sangs rgyas sras su bdag gyur pas// sems
449b6(rgyud 'bum): can don ni ma'am med bya/ / zhi ba'i sbyin sreg dngos grub grogs// tshogs kyi 'khor lo dge 'dun mchod// nad pa'am mgon med 'phongs pa kun// kha zas kyis ni tshim par bya// zhing skyong gton/
449b7(rgyud 'bum): mas mnyes byas la// rang 'dod 'bras bu gsol ba gang ba// rjes su dam tshig spyod pa dang // bskyed pa la sogs rgyun mi 'chad// rnal 'byor pas ni bsam par bya// 'di ni rig mchog dbang bskur bla na med//
450a1(rgyud 'bum): mdzes ma myod sdugs rdzus sgyu bye sta// gan du gas myed drug la dmas smrar sa// kying badzin ma ri sa pa nga gsus/ bcom na sa r
450a2(rgyud 'bum): do rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ slob ma dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// dpa' mo rdo rje bdems gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
450a3(rgyud 'bum): rdorje 'chang gi 'khor klu sgrub pa'i thabs ji lta bu lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ / mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs// zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma// bdag med shes rab ma
450a4(rgyud 'bum): yi mchog/ khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon// gdul bya'i rigs su skyes pa yi// gdug pa'i klu chen rnam pa brgyad// rigs bsdus chu bdag b.ru N+Da// dam tshig la gnas sog
450a5(rgyud 'bum): ma med/ / 'di dag sgrub par 'dod pas ni// mdzes pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam lngas byug/ pad+ma lha snam sgo dang bcas// sgo rgyan ltos 'gros rab tu mdzes// lte bar rdo rje 'dzin pa bsam/
450a6(rgyud 'bum): mdun du las kyi bka' nyan bskyed// pad+ma brgyad la gru chen brgyad// gdengs ka bdun ldan thas sbyar bsami// lha snam rigs bzhi'i sa bdag ste// sgo dang gru chang rigs kyi rim// mchod rdzas klu yi rtsa
450a7(rgyud 'bum): sman bsam/ / de rjes rdo rje 'dzin bsams la// klu chen gnas nas spyan drangs te// e h+ye hi nA ga rA dza sa pa ri wA ra sa ma ya dza dzaHrang rang stan la gzhug par bya// pad+ma'i lte bar chub dag
450b1(rgyud 'bum): dang / dam tshig sog med dkar dang ser// thal sbyar sbrul gyi zhabs su 'khyil// gtso bo rdo rje 'chang la 'dud// shar phyogs mtha' yas sngon po ste// lho phyogs nor rgyas ser po che// nub phyogs 'jog po kha dog dmar//
450b2(rgyud 'bum): byang phyogs stobs rgyu nag po ste// shar lho pad+ma dung dang 'dra// lho nub pad chen ser ba ste// nub byang dung skyong btsod dang 'dra// byang shar rigs ldan dur ba'i mdog/ mjug ma 'khyil bas gtsol
450b3(rgyud 'bum): 'dud/ / sna tshogs gzugs ni rigs bzhi dang // sa bdag sna tshogs gzugs kyis bskor// de dag sngags kyi rim pa ni// oM badz+ra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na badz+ra pA Ni hri da yaM/ nA ga ya sa mA ti kra
450b4(rgyud 'bum): ma tha ud sA da naM b+ha bi Sh+yan+ti swA hA/ rdo rje 'chang gis klu dam tshig la gzhag pa'o// oM ba ru NA ya hU~M phuHswA hA/ oM sU Tu s+phu Ta ma hA nA ga rA dza kro d+hahUM/ sid+d+hi sid+d+hi s+pho Ta ya hUM phuHswAhA
450b5(rgyud 'bum): oM a nan ta hUM phuHswAhA/ oM ba su ki hUM phu swA hA/ oM tak+Sha ka hUM phuHswAhA/ oM kar ko Ta hUM phuHswA hA/ oM pad+mA hU~M phuHswAhA/ oM ma hA pad+ma hU~M phuHswAhA/ oM shaM kha pA la hU~M phuHswA hA/ oM ku
450b6(rgyud 'bum): li ka hUM phuHswAhA/ 'di dag klu'i rgyal po rnams kyi sngags so// rim pas mchod cing gsob bya// mdzes pa'i rgya mtsho'i gtor ma yis// klu rnams tshim pas gdug sems zhi// de rjes bstod pa brjod
450b7(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / hUM chu bdag sprul pa'i dam tshig can// mtha' yas nor rgyas la sogs klu dbang rnams// rgya mtsho chu gter zab pa'i 'jing chen gnas// rin chen sna tshogs yid 'ong spras pa yi// gzhal
451a1(rgyud 'bum): las 'byor pa phun sum gnas na bzhugs/ / sbrul mgo'i gdengs ka rab 'bar rin chen gsal// yid 'ong nor bu 'dod pa kun sgrub pa// rang gzhan phun tshogs don rnams ster ba'i
451a2(rgyud 'bum): dpal/ / 'od 'bar sa 'og mun pa ma lus sel// du ma'i bskal par yon tan sbyangs pa yis// klu rgyal 'byor pa mchog la mnga' brnyes pa// bsam gyis mi khyab rdzu 'phrul mchog brnyes pa'i/
451a3(rgyud 'bum): yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab khyed la bstod// sangs rgyas bka' thob dad pa'i stobs 'phel ba// sangs rgyas sar gnas grub la nan tan byed// thabs dang shes rab 'bral bas gzhan don mdzad//
451a4(rgyud 'bum): bdag gzhan don sgrub khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bde gshegs spyan sngar khas blangs dam bcas te// bstan pa srung zhing 'gro rnams bskyang ba'i phyir// khas blangs mna' phul dam
451a5(rgyud 'bum): tshig dran gyis la/ / 'phrin las don gyis bdag gzhan don sgrub mdzod// gzhan yang 'jig rten pa rnams la/ oMmatha' yas dang ni 'jog po dang // stobs kyi rgyu dang rigs ldan dang /
451a6(rgyud 'bum): nor rgyas bu dang dung skyong dang // pad+ma dang ni chu lha dang // rgya mtsho rgya mtsho chen po dang // dpal gyi 'od dang 'ong po che// gzugs che lto 'phye sbrul chen po// klu chen 'khor dang bcas pa la// 'thun pa
451a7(rgyud 'bum): dam rdzas yid 'ong ba/ / dkar gsum mngar gsum gso ba'i sman// rin chen dar dang tha 'og dang // dpag bsam shing dang 'dod 'dze'i ba// sna tshogs khyed la phul ba yis// klu yi nang rnams
451b1(rgyud 'bum): med par mdzod/ / phyis kyang mi byed dam chos la// so so'i gnas su 'gro bar gyis// 'di ni rdo rje 'chang gi bka'// 'di las 'das na klu rgyal rnams// snying 'tshig mgo bo 'gas 'gyur te/
451b2(rgyud 'bum): / lus la bskal pa'i me 'bar nas// sdug bsngal gyur na ma legs pas// dam las 'das par ma byed cig/ nA gA rA dza sa ma ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa badz+ra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na badz+ra pA Ni hUM phaT/ klu rnams
451b3(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig sgrub pa'o/ / de bzhin byas ni klu nad rnams// skad cig nyid la byang 'gyur te// sgrub po bde bar 'gyur ba yin// de bas 'di la brtson par gyis// mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa bzhin//
451b4(rgyud 'bum): gtan la phab pas rab tu bshad// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ klu sgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / dpa' mo rdo rje
451b5(rgyud 'bum): bde mas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gi 'khor klu gdug pa can rnams kyi nad 'byung ba'i rtags ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa
451b6(rgyud 'bum): legs/ / zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma// bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog/ khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon// klu la rigs drug la sogs pa// sna tshogs rigs su yod gyur kyang //
451b7(rgyud 'bum): 'byung ba lnga yi rang bzhin te// nor rgyas drang skyong rgyal rigs yin te mthong ba'i dug/ ser po sa la dbang ste lci 'thibs lus po sgo// sha 'bar ba bzhi la khyad par na ba yin// bco lnga nyin gung
452a1(rgyud 'bum): rgyu ba'i dus lan/ / nad kyi gnas ni spyi bor nges par 'bab// rlung rtsa babs la sha nus par du na// skra 'byi thung thabs na ste rna ba gro ba la// 'brel bas sha ro g+ho lu yin/
452a2(rgyud 'bum): dga' bo rigs ldan bram ze yin te bsams pa'i dug/ dmar po me la dbang ste tsha zhing gdung // lus dmar spyi chung thang la mig rtsa lus po bskam// 'bring po babs sa nyi nub dgongs mon// gnas
452a3(rgyud 'bum): stong bco lnga rgyu ba'i dus te de la na/ / snying khar babs pas snying mi dga' zhing dran pa nyams// mjug tu mgo dang lus la babs te na tsha che// sha ro snying la 'ong bas lce yis ro mo tshor// pad+ma 'jog po rje rigs yin te
452a4(rgyud 'bum): kharlangs dug/ dkar po chu la dbang bas grang zhing bsil bar na// lus mdog dkar la pags pa'i spris ma 'chags// tha chung babs pa yin te tshes brgyad bco brgyad na// snga dro tho rangs mi bde ske dang
452a5(rgyud 'bum): dpung pa g.yas/ / brang na tha ma mchin pa babs pa'i sa yin no// po bas zas mi 'ju zhing mig gis gzugs mi 'dzin// sha sprul tshor ba med de cung zad sha lpags dam// pad chen stobs rgyu dmangs
452a6(rgyud 'bum): rigs reg pa'i dug/ nag po rlung la dbang bas yang zhing g.yo// lus 'dar sems rgod sha 'phar phu shus 'debs// yan lag tshogs bzhin zhing phol dang bad kan skye// sgregs dang ro stong na zhing
452a7(rgyud 'bum): sna khrag 'byung / / 'byang zhing lus ngal dgongs dang srong lan// tha chung zhag la 'bab ste tshes gsum bcu gsum na// 'di ni 'gong rigs rtsub pas spro 'bog btsan thabs gsod// tha ma mkhal
452b1(rgyud 'bum): mar 'bab ste rna bas sgra mi thos/ / khu chu nyams pas chu sri sor mo phra// chu lha dam tshig nam mkha' yin pas kun la khyab// gong ma ci rig 'byung zhing dus med shes pa zhum// lus kyi shed nyams bral te/
452b2(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs ston// 'di ni bcos par dka' ste gtan la phebs par bya// khyad par mcher pa na zhing gdong la sme ba 'byung // lus la shig mang ko dr-i ro gzhob mnam// thur sel rlung la rul ba'i dri
452b3(rgyud 'bum): mgro/ / 'di ni mcher bar 'bab ste tshul khrag kyang 'byung // so so'i rtags su mkhas pas shes par gyis// spyi ron lnga po gang zhugs kyang // rim pas 'di ltar 'byung bar 'gyur// ma dang grog
452b4(rgyud 'bum): po phugs rdugs dang / / ri phug dog pa'i sgo dang dong // lha khang 'dam rdzab mi sdug gzugs// dud 'gro'i tshogs dang mtsho ri gzar// snying mi dga' zhing 'tshig pa na// dang po 'byung bar shes
452b5(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / glu len nub mo na dang shes pa lci// yan lag mi bde shu ba g.yan pa dang // bas ldogs 'brum chung dmar sib 'ong // 'khrug cing za 'khrug sha mdog nyams// me ris chu
452b6(rgyud 'bum): grangs blugs ltar grang / / grang sib tsha thig sha bkra che chung byed// sha 'phrig bem dang sbrid cing 'khol// mig zlum tsha shing smin ma 'byi// lag sor sen mo nyams pas phra// lus la dri nga chu bur
452b7(rgyud 'bum): dang / nya sgangs gnag chu rul dri mnam// stod gzer smad du 'khru bar byed// phyi yi sha skams mdog nyams dri ma bral// bug pa'i sgo yo bdud rtsi dus med pa// yang cig mdor bsdus/
453a1(rgyud 'bum): bshad pa ni// dbang po gsal ba'i 'bras bu ni// mchin pa'i sgo yin mig la brtag/ rgyal mo 'khor lo ga yang ra yin// gnas pa rus pa'i 'bras bu ni// mdzes pa so yi mkhar yin pas/
453a2(rgyud 'bum): kha dog rkang bu nus pa blta// nus pa chu ba'i 'bras bu ni// zangs mdog sen mo'i tshogs yin pas// skye lugs kha dog rtsa ba brtag/ mangs dang sha yi 'bras bu ni// khyab pa drag pa yin pas na// chags lugs
453a3(rgyud 'bum): kha dog 'gyur ba blta/ / drod rten khrag gi 'bras bu ni// bud med gsang sgo'i chu yin pas// kha dog ku ya gzugs la brtag/ rkang mar bcud kyi 'bras bu ni// rtsu ba gnas lugs skye sa brtag/ de rnams
453a4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad rtags ldan na/ / ngas kyang gso bar ga la nus// gsum bzhi lnga la sogs pa yi// rim pa rnams dang ldan pa na// sngags dang sman gyis gso bar bya// phyi nang 'brel ba'i babs sa yis//
453a5(rgyud 'bum): legs par brtags te gso bar bya// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ klu'i nad zhugs pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//
453a6(rgyud 'bum): dpa' mo rdo rje pade mas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gi klu nad gso ba'i cho ga ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs// zag med pade
453a7(rgyud 'bum): rgyu 'byung ma/ / bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog/ khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon// byol song klu yis zin pa la// 'tsho dang mi 'tsho gnyis yin te// nges pa'i rtags chen drug tshang na// de la
453b1(rgyud 'bum): mkhas pas ci byar yod/ / rnam smin las las byung ba yin// gzhan rnams gso bar 'dod pa la// dka' dang sla ba gnyis yin te// dang po sngags kyi rim pa yin// gnyis pa rdzas dang 'brel ba yin//
453b2(rgyud 'bum): dang po sngags kyi sbyor ba ni// dbang bskur tshogs bsags rgyud sbyangs la// rigs pa gsum gyis bsnyen pa bya// kha cig de tsam gyis kyang zhi// gal te nus pa che ba na// gsad pa drag po'i sham bu gdag//
453b3(rgyud 'bum): kha cig de yis 'tsho ba yin// gal te gnod tshabs che ba na// klu yi rang gshed bzlas pa tsam// nam mkha'i klu yis snying nas gzir// rig pa gnyis pa gsham du sbrel// rdo rje lte bar 'khor lo bri// de la dmigs
453b4(rgyud 'bum): te bsgrub par bya/ / dug rigs gsal bar gyur na ni// sa dug ngos zin rdo rje'i nang // dga' bo rigs ldan me yi sngags// bram ze'i 'khrul 'khor shis pa yin// me la chu yi 'khrul 'khor te// de yi sngags
453b5(rgyud 'bum): kyis gsang par bya/ / khang chen stobs rgyu rlung yin pas// sa yi 'khrul 'khor lte bar bca'// pad+ma 'jog po chu yin pas// rlung gi 'khor los gsang par bya// rang rang kha dog gshed
453b6(rgyud 'bum): du sbyar/ / bzhi snying sngags rnams dril la bzlas// gnyen po mi mthun rdzas dang sbyar// gnyen po gang yin lha yi gshed// man ngag bzhin du shes par bya// 'khrul 'khor
453b7(rgyud 'bum): rmed nas ma bden/ / rgyal po'i sdong zla dbye bar bya// dus tshod zhag grangs rim pa ni// rtags dang sbyar la shes par bya// rtags rjes rjes su log pa na// sbyin sreg ci rigs mkhas pas bya//
454a1(rgyud 'bum): byi rjes drag pos gcad pa dang // lha dang rdzas kyis gags kyis gcad// mnan pas las mtha' ba rtul par bya// zhi badrag po'i rim pa ni// ma khas pas rtags la brten
454a2(rgyud 'bum): pabapar bya/ / bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ klu'i nad bsal ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas gsol
454a3(rgyud 'bum): pabardo rje 'chang gi gtor ma bya ba'i rim pa ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa// mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs// zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma// bdag med shes rab
454a4(rgyud 'bum): ma yi mchog/ khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon// dkyil 'khor bri dang sbyin sreg dang // bzlas pa thun mtshams rab gnas dang // dbang bskur bskrad cing gsad pa dang // 'byung po khyung dang gnod sbyin
454a5(rgyud 'bum): dang klu dang gnas skyong mchod pa na/ / gtor ma med par gang spyad pa// las de 'bras bu med pa 'am// bar chad nye bar skye 'gyur bas// gter ma'i cho ga bstan par bya// lha yi rnal 'byor ldan pa
454a6(rgyud 'bum): yis/ / phun sum tshogs pa'i 'byor pa bsag/ gtor ma'i 'og tu rlung lha yi// sa bon las skyes kha dog sngo// g.yo ba'i rlung yab dang bcas pa// de stengs rgod ma'i kha bsams te// dmar po rlung
454a7(rgyud 'bum): las skyes pa bsam/ / gru gsum hUM las rdo rje gsum// sku gsung thugs kyis brtan por bya// de stengs a las pad+ma che// sangs la dkar zhing cung zad dmar// chos dbyings snod kyi gzhal yas
454b1(rgyud 'bum): yin de nas sbyang ba'i sa bon las/ / bruM aM dz+rIM khaM hUM bsam ste// slar yang sha lnga sbyangs pa las// maM laM paM taM baM bsams te// yum lnga'i ye shes rnam par dag/ bdud rtsi ye shes rnam dag
454b2(rgyud 'bum): 'di sbyang dang slar rtogs sbyor ba yi/ / yi ge gsum gyi sgra ldan pa// bde ba'i ro cher nyi mar gsal// 'char ba'i kha dog 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rje las byung dngul chu'i mdog/ gnyis med
454b3(rgyud 'bum): thabs dang shes rab yin/ / sa bon las byung pad+ma'i gdan// yangs par rdo rje 'dzin pa dang // phyogs spyod la sogs bkug la bstim// mjug mdud gong mo rtse mo sbyor// mthe bong rdo rje
454b4(rgyud 'bum): brtan par gnas/ / rang 'dod dngos grub sar bzhag la// hUM sgra ldan pas sngags 'dis sbyin// oM in+da/ ya mdzal/ dzak+Sha b+hU ta bah+ni/ bA u/ rak+Sha/ tsan+da sUdz+dza/ mA da bap+pa/ ta la pA tA
454b5(rgyud 'bum): le.aT+TA sap+pa sA hA/ i daM ba li b+huM dza dzi g+ha phul+la/ d+hU pa/ mAM sa bi ga/ am+b+ha kadz+dzi/ sap+tA sA d+hu khaN+Di khu Ni pe Da gA da sneH/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+har+m+ma NAM/ A d+ya nuta pan+na twA/ oM Ar+tha
454b6(rgyud 'bum): paT swA hA/ 'khor rnams rtogs par bya ba'o// lhag par khyed chen mchod pa ni// nya shaM b+he gol du dang // 'o ma sbrul gyi sha yis mchod// gnod sbyin dag la sharlon dang // chang ni med du mi rung ngo //
454b7(rgyud 'bum): ra khrag shing thog rnams kyis so// klu la dkar gsum mngar gsum dang // rtsi sman dang zab sna tshogs mchod// rang gi rig pa phul byas la// bstod cing gsol ba gang yin bya// hUMr khyod kyis sems can
455a1(rgyud 'bum): don kun mdzad/ / rjes su 'thun pa'i dngos grub stsol// rang gi gnas su gshegs nas kyang // slar yang spyan drangs tshen spyon// oM badz+ra sa ma ya muHzhes brjod// mchod sbyin 'di dang
455a2(rgyud 'bum): ma bral na/ / zhi sogs grub pa brgyad gang yin// mchog gi 'bras bu thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba las/ gtor mo'i cho ga
455a3(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o/ / / dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas gsol pa/ rdo rje 'chang la zhu ba gsol pa/ bdag gi cho ga ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
455a4(rgyud 'bum): mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs// zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma// bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog/ khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon// dus gsum sangs rgyas bskyed pa'i ma// rdo rje bde
455a5(rgyud 'bum): chen stong pa nyid/ / khyod kyi sgrub pa bzang po ni// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshad// da ltar byung ba'ang de 'chad de// ma 'ongs rnams kyang 'chad 'gyur la// nga yis kyang ni 'dir
455a6(rgyud 'bum): bshad de/ / byang chub sems ldan gang zag gis// rab dben pa yis sa yi char// mchod cing bstan dga' bsnyen byas la// sangs rgyas rdo rje can mchod bya// rim pas tshangs pa'i
455a7(rgyud 'bum): gnas bzhi bsgom/ / oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+haHsarba d+har+m+mAHswa b+hA ba shud+d+hohaM/ rang bzhin rnam par dag pa bsgom// oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma kohaM/ brjod med ye shes dag par bsgom// srung zhing
455b1(rgyud 'bum): gzhal yas khang pa der/ / mdzes pa'i pad+ma la gnas pa// chos 'byung rnam dag pho brang du// nyi ma zla ba rnam dag dpal// baM las byung ba'i lha mo ni// sku mdog dmar ljang zhal gcigs// phyag
455b2(rgyud 'bum): gnyis gri gug thod pa 'dzin/ / gar stabs rgyan gyis mdzes ma ste// thod pa skam po'i 'phreng bas brgyan// shar du mA ma kI bsam ste// sngon mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma// g.yas pa rdo rje g.yon
455b3(rgyud 'bum): thod pa/ / g.yas su sangs rgyas spyan ser te// zhal gcig phyag gnyis g.yas pa na// rin chen g.yon pas thod pa 'dzin// g.yon du dam tshig sgrol ma ljang // g.yas pa ut+pal thod pa 'dzin// rgyab tu
455b4(rgyud 'bum): gos dkar dmar ser te/ / pad+ma thod pa bsnams pa'i phyag/ kun kyang khro zhing gar stabs bzhugs// rus pa rin chen rgyan dang ldan// mchog sgrub nang rnams sbyang ba dang // srung zhing 'dod pa na
455b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyas dang / / rang gi srog 'dzin 'phrin las dbang // rtag tu ye shes pa yang mchod// rig pa nges par bstan pa ni// oM badz+ra su kA bud+d+ha sar+b+ba ba shiM ku ru su ra ka hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM shaM ka re shAM ti ka
455b6(rgyud 'bum): rer g+hu Ta g+hu Ta/ ti ni g+hA ta ya/ g+hu Ti ni swAhA/ oM ru ru s+phu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa ni/ sar+b+ba ar+tha sA d+ha ni sAhA/ oM a ka Te bi ka Te ni ka T+wA~M/ ka T+wAM ka Te ka ro TaM bIr+ya swAhA/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re ma ma A
455b7(rgyud 'bum): yu She swA hA/ rang rang las dang 'brel ba ni// 'bum 'gyur sngags kyis 'grub par 'gyur// las gzhan dngos grub ma bsgrubs par// lha mo khyod kyis byed pa yin// 'od ni gsang ba dam pa ste// ches gsang
456a1(rgyud 'bum): bas kyang mchog yin no/ / de bas mdzes ma khyod la bshad// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ yum sgrub pa rnam par phye ba'i le'u ste bcu
456a2(rgyud 'bum): drug pa'o/ / dpa' mo rdo rje bdems gsol pa/ rdo rje 'chang gi las sna tshogs pa sgrub pa ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs/

456a4(rgyud 'bum): lo bri/ / de yi nang du chud pa yi// longs spyod ming dang sbal bris nas// bkug la bcug la sngags 'di bzlas// oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na/ tad+ya thA/ oM tsa la pra tsa la/ la lA lu te yA/ de ba kam hA kA la
456a5(rgyud 'bum): an tsa ra ya bi sI swA hA/ khri bzlas pas rang ci 'dod pa 'ong bar 'gyur te/ gong bu dgug pa'o// rang nyid rdo rje 'dzin bsams la/ ta la'i lo ma la ri rab kyi 'khor lo byas te/ zur du hUM dang hrI'i bar du bsgrub
456a6(rgyud 'bum): bya'i ming bri'o/ / ste de sngags bri/ rtsings la'ang sngags bris te/ rkang pa g.yon pas mnan cing / oM nad+ha man ro// tsa mu d+hi d+hum ke shid+hI/ phan d+ha na d+hIH/ btsab tsahrI// de bdin me ngo mo ba
456a7(rgyud 'bum): sAH/ zhes khri bzlas pas rkang pa dgug pa'o// oM tsar+tha ma sngo/ dartag ga a rig ga bi ta ri swA hA/ sngags 'di ba zlas la kha bkrus la/ khyi mchog gi lci ba dang sdong ros bsres la rdo rje'i gzugs byas te/
456b1(rgyud 'bum): lte bar 'khrul 'khor bcug la dgra'i sgor sbas na 'chi bar 'gyur ro// bklags pas 'grub 'gyur nus pa 'di// rdo rje 'dzin par rab zhugs nas// rdza mkhan lag pa'i 'dag pa la// rdo rje'i rnam par
456b2(rgyud 'bum): 'khrul 'khor bcar/ / oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro/ daN che ge mo mu kha ti thA ti sa/ g+ha tshan tI/ g+hA da ti/ ma~M g+hA la~M g+h+raM/ mu tra mu rI She NaM che ge mo b+han+d+ha mi swAhA/ sngags 'di khri bzlas khang par mnan/ nges par
456b3(rgyud 'bum): gshegs las rgyal bar 'gyur/ / oM badz+ra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na ma ni kha be rA ya/ tsi ri tsi ri/ ka ta ru tu be na mu Shi/ tuM te baM d+ha si ri kha li swA hA/ rdo rje la ni khrag gis bri/ gang gi phyogs mtshams
456b4(rgyud 'bum): sbas pa na/ / byi ba kha ni 'ching ba yin// oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na naM tu na te si ri si ri/ kha li khi li swA hA/ stag gi pags pa la bris te// gang la btags pa'i spyang ki srung // oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na ma
456b5(rgyud 'bum): rak+Sha to/ nA sha ka rA ya swA hA/ shing thog la bzlas ra bar sbas// spre'u gnod pa bzlog par 'gyur// oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na sar+b+ba staM b+ha ya duM b+he swA hA/ sbrang rtsi bu ram khu ba la// 'di bzlas byugs
456b6(rgyud 'bum): pas dom 'bros so/ / oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na bA rA ha d+hi naM druM druM d+he swA hA/ dug dang lan tshwa ske tshe dang // yungs kar la phugs bon dang // da du ra dang ka la bi dang / ma he phag dang lce spyang khrag
456b7(rgyud 'bum): sbrus la rdo rje brgyad byas la/ / phyogs mtshams sbas na gnod pa zhi// mtshams gcad pa yi dam pa yin// oM badz+ra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na b+hi d+ha hi ni kaM b+he swA hA/ sngags ni brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na/

457b2(rgyud 'bum): chags kyis za bar mi 'gyur ro/ / oM badz+ra su kha de bi shud+d+ha al+lI ba ra tsu li tsi ra sa ga gan+d+ha sA pa mi ha pan+d+ha li swA hA/ sngags 'di rdo rje'i shing dang / da la si dang / arga gsum la lan bdun bdun bzlas te/ rna ba'i

459b7(rgyud 'bum): gcig 'bar gyur na/ / bsam pa thams cad 'grub par ston// gnyis 'bar rtse gsum mi g.yo na// 'bar ba'i 'bras bu thams cad 'dzin// rtse bzhi mnyam nyid brtan pa ste// rgyas//

460a5(rgyud 'bum): kAs+ya shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ sreg thugs so// oM bo d+hi prik+ShA sa swAH/ a shwad tha'i 'o// oM badz+ral tA ya swAhA/ p+lag sha'i 'o// oM badz+ra ku be rA ya swahA/ 'o ma can gyi snying gi'o//

460a7(rgyud 'bum): She swAhA/ dur ba'i'o// oM badz+ra pra ti ha ta badz+ra ya swAhA/ ku sha'i'o// rdzas rnams rang sngags ci rigs dbul// bstod cing gsol ba'i las bya ste// me yi snong khar dkyil 'khor mchod// gas/
460b1(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pa rim pa bzhin// sngar bstan pa las shes par bya// de rjes lhag mas ci rigs mchod// zhu ba la sogs rdzas rnams ni// lha yi zhal du mchod par bya// lam shing ku sha la sogs pa/
460b2(rgyud 'bum): 'od la mchod par bya ba yin// phyag tu zhal zas 'thor 'thung dbul// me tog bdug pa dbu dang 'od// thig le snying kha bsang gtor yang // sku la phul te zhabs bsil zhabs// mar me la sogs
460b3(rgyud 'bum): rim bzhin gnas/ / dkyil 'khor bsdu gshegs rim pa rnams// mkhas pas nye bar brtags te bya// dkyil 'khor lhas ni mchog ster la// ma yis 'dod pa'i don sgrub byed// lag pan gyis ni

460b5(rgyud 'bum): 'phel so ba'i las yin te/ / sdig pa 'dag pa til yin no// 'bras kyis nus pa 'phel byed pa// zhi la yungs kar ku shas bsrung // dpal bskyed pa ni bud shing ste// yam shing gzi byin ster bar byed//
460b6(rgyud 'bum): 'byor pa 'phel ba mar yin no// sbyin bdag bkra shis thab yin te// dngos grub kun ster mchod pa'i rdzas// thabs dang shes rab gzar bu ste// bdud rtsi mar gyis tshim byed pa// mchod pa gzhan gyis
460b7(rgyud 'bum): ci zhig bya/ / 'di ni mdzes ma'i yul yin gyis// gzhan gyis rtogs par ga la 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ sbyin sreg gi cho ga bstan pa'i
461a1(rgyud 'bum): le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o/ / / dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas gsol ba/ rdo rje 'chang khyod kyi gsang ba'i mtshan nyi shu gcig gi bstod pa ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan
461a2(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ / mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs// zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma// bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog/ khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon// nga yi ming ni nyi shu gcig
461a3(rgyud 'bum): / dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsang // mi 'gyur g.yung drung dbang bskur te// 'di dag mdzes ma khyod la bstan// na mo nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA Ni tsaN+Da badz+ra/ na mo g+ha dza kaN+Do b+ho tsaN+Da badz+ra/ na maHsu d+hA
461a4(rgyud 'bum): Sha ni sa b+h+yo tsaN+Da badz+ra/ na mo rat+na kur+N+Na ka ra si tsaN+Da badz+ra/ na mo b+ha kr-i pradz+nye d+ha si ra tsar+N+Na badz+ra/ na maHAr+ya go Sha san+ni tsar+N+Na badz+ra/ na maHpra sa rA yi to sI tsaN+Da badz+ra/ na mo badz+ra la ar tsi shi sI tsaN+Da badz+ra/ na maHsa rU pa no
461a5(rgyud 'bum): / la tsaN+Da badz+ra/ na mo dur dAn ta da ma kam pa ra tsar+N+Na badz+ra/ na mo b+hai ra ba bi b+ha ta sa rU pa~M b+hiHtsat+ta badz+ra/ na mau gro mo kr-i d+ha ba~M gra ha rU pi b+hiHtsaN+Da badz+re/ na maHtsa tur s+phA n+d+ha ri Shi sin+na tsaN+Da badz+ra/ na mo ma hA ba la ra kra ma tsaN+Da badz+ra na mo na
461a6(rgyud 'bum): rA si ha na ra hA tsaN+Da badz+ra ni mo sa mo g+hu dza ga dang+gA bi ta tsat+ta badz+ra/ na mo shA~M ki bi shI ni mA NaM tsaN+Da badz+ra/ na mo ha hA sa twa so ni b+ho/ tsat+ta badz+ra/ na maHa tsa mo hU~M ka dang to tsits+tsha badz+ra/ namaHpa ny+dza rbad+ha t+yA ma su ku TaH
461a7(rgyud 'bum): na mo badz+ra ma hA be sha yud rod tsat+ta badz+ra/ rdorje gtum po'i mtshan nyi shu rtsa gcig po 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / yid la byed pa dang / 'dri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa dang / glegs pas du byas te 'chang ba yin phyog bcu
461b1(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rjes su skyong bar 'gyur ro/ / srung bar 'gyur ro// sbed par 'gyur ro// skyob par 'gyur ro// mtshan 'di rnams 'dzin pa de mtshams med pa lnga byas pa'i sdig pa byang bar 'gyur ro//
461b2(rgyud 'bum): lan cig tsam brjod pas kyang bskal pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu'i bar du sems can dmyal ba rnams su mi skye'o// ngan 'gro gzhan yang spangs pa yin no// tshe rabs thams cad du skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// rdo rje 'chang
461b3(rgyud 'bum): lnga brgya'ang rtag tu mtshan 'dzin pa'i phyi bzhin rjes su 'brang ngo / / gdug pa can gyi klu rnams kyis mi 'tshe zhing slar longs spyod sna tshogs sbyin no// 'chi ba'i dus su'ang bai DUR+Ya lta bu'i sku lus bstan te rang gi
461b4(rgyud 'bum): gnas su khrid par 'gyur ro/ / mtshan 'di gnas pa'i sa de ni lcang lo can dang mtshungs pa yin no// mi ma yin pa gdug pa can rnams kyis nam yang gnod pa byed par mi 'gyur ro// grub pa brgyad dang sangs rgyas
461b5(rgyud 'bum): kyang ster bar byed na/ gzhan lta'ang ci smos te/ mtshan 'di dag rin po che dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o// 'di ni dus gsum sangs rgyas kyis// ched du brjod pa rin po che// gdug pa thams cad 'joms
461b6(rgyud 'bum): par byed/ / dpal dang gzi brjid 'phel ba yin// 'phrin las sgo rnams thogs pa med// 'di ni rdo rje 'chang yin pas// nyin mtshan dus gsum klog pa yi// phyi bzhin rtag tu srung bar byed// nad dang gdon
461b7(rgyud 'bum): rnams kun las thar/ / sman chen nyes pa thams cad 'joms// 'byung po kun gyis bkur ba ste// mdzes ma khyod la bstan pa yin// 'di ni rnam dag legs pa'i lam// su 'chang lag na dpal gnas /
462a1(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu mtshan 'di brjod par gyis// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ mtshan nyi shu rtsa gcig gis bstong pa'i le'u ste nyi shu
462a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / / dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas gsol pa/ rdo rje 'chang gi rgyud 'di bshad pa dang / sba ba dang / ji ltar gzung ba'i cho ga ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
462a3(rgyud 'bum): stsal pa/ / mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs// zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma// bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog/ khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon// phyi ma'i dus su nga yi rgyud// gsang
462a4(rgyud 'bum): bsku gsung thugs kyi gter/ / bla med rgyud rgyal rin chen 'di// byang chub sems ldan snying rje che// thos mang shes rab mchog tu gsal// dad pa che zhing lha la gus// bla ma bstan cing dbang bskur thob//
462a5(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig sdom pa ma lus ldan// brtson 'grus che la gzhan don dpa'// 'jig rten de la ma chags pas// rgyud 'di mnyan dang bshad par bya// de las bzlog pa'i gang zag la// ming tsam
462a6(rgyud 'bum): bstan par mi bya'o/ / gal te bstan par gyur pa na// sngags pa dam tshig nyams gyur te// nang gdon 'byung po ma lus pas// nye bar gtses te 'chi bar 'gyur// de nas mnar med sdug bsngal ni//
462a7(rgyud 'bum): grangs med 'das kyang thar mi 'gyur// de bas gsang ba sku gsung thugs// snying po dam pa 'di dag la// rgya yis btab ste mchod pa dang // bstod cing sba ba byas gyur na// yid la re ba kun rdzogs shing //
462b1(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten thams cad bde bar 'gyur// glegs bam sor ni bcu drug la// rim bdun rgyu yis btab nas kyang // rtag tu spyi bo'i gtsug tu gzung // 'di dang bral bar ma gyur na// bsnyen pa de yin sgrub
462b2(rgyud 'bum): pa de/ sgrub pa chen po'ang de yin te// sngags kyang de yin lha yang de// bla ma de yin slob dpon yang // sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun yang // de yin bskyed dang rdzogs pa de// ma lus dbang
462b3(rgyud 'bum): yang de yin te/ / 'jig rten bya ba kun spangs nas// 'di la mchod par gyur pa ni// tshogs gzhan ci yin rmongs pa'i rgyu// ci phyir 'di la 'bad mi byed// ces bcom ldan 'das kyis
462b4(rgyud 'bum): gsungs te/ yum la rjes su gtad pa'i don bstan pa ni/ sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen mo// rdo rje bde ma bde ster ma// rtog pa gcod mdzad yum khyod la// rgyud 'di gtad kyis legs par zung // gzungs
462b5(rgyud 'bum): ma yid 'ong rgyal ba'i sa/ / rnam dag mchod cing sdug bsngal 'joms// ma lus 'gro ba 'dren pa'i dpal// rdo rje bde ma phyag 'tshal lo// zhes bstod nas rgyud gtad do// de nas yum gyis rjes
462b6(rgyud 'bum): bzung ste/ / dus gsum bde gshegs ma lus pa'i// thugs kyi sras po sde dpon che// 'jig rten thams cad 'dul mdzad pa// dpa' bo khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// gtum po dpa' bo 'jig
462b7(rgyud 'bum): par byed/ / klu 'dul gzhan gyis mi thub pa// drag po 'jigs par byed pa'i lha// rdo rje gtum po khyod phyag 'tshal// zhes bstod nas phyag dang skor bas mnyes par byas nas/ slar yab kyi
463a1(rgyud 'bum): thugs ka'i rdo rje'i lte bar thim par gyur to/ / de nas 'khor thams cad kyis mchod pas mchod cing bstod de/ gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po gsungs pa
463a2(rgyud 'bum): legs so legs so zhes mngon par mgrin gcig tu ched du brjod pa ched du brjod de/ rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs pa la mngon par dga' nas yi rangs te mngon par bstod par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das
463a3(rgyud 'bum): phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ rgyud ji ltar bstan cing sba ba dang rjes su yi rang ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// // bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje
463a4(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ / / rgya gar gyi mkhan po wa la tsan+d+ra gu ru chen po dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba glan chung dar ma tshul khrims kyis
463a5(rgyud 'bum): byang phyogs sham b+ha la'i dpe dang bstan te bsgyur ba'o/ / slad kyis yul dbus kyi dpe dang / kha che nas byung ba dang bstun nas legs par gtan la phab pa'o//

463a7(rgyud 'bum): gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das bdud les rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba 'og min gyi gnas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi pho brang na bzhugs so// de'i tshe 'dus pa rnams kyi dang po sems
463b1(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po yid cher g.yos te/ gus pas bkur sti dang / rim gro dang / phud dud dang / bsti stang du byas te/ e ma 'o byams mgon thugs rje can// 'gro ba'i sems can thams cad kun//
463b2(rgyud 'bum): me yis tshig cing mtshon gyis phog/ mun par 'khyams nas ri yis non// rlung gis khyer ba snying re rje// skyabs kyi dam pa bka' stsal 'tshal// zhes zhus pas/ der ni mgon pos sku bstan te//

463b5(rgyud 'bum): mngon par bshad bya ba/ / bkra shis maN+Dal legs byas la// tshul dang 'thun pa'i bum pa dgod// de yang chu gtsang sna bdun blugs// gzhan yang shing thog 'bras bu dang // mngar gyi rnam pa dang /
463b6(rgyud 'bum): dri'i rnam pa dang / rin po che'i mchog dang / 'bru'i bye brag dang / sman rnams blugs so// bum pa de'i mgrin pa dang sngon pos bkris te/ steng du bla re phub la gzhag go// rdo rje bde ba'i rgyud las
463b7(rgyud 'bum): sgrub rdzas kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o/ / de nas mngon par bshad bya ba// sgrub byed rang rgyud dag pa yis// bskyed tshul rgyas sam bsdus kyang rung // hUM las phyag na rdo rje ni// nga
464a1(rgyud 'bum): gsum mthing nag phyag bzhi mdzes/ / sku ni che zhing mtshungs pa med// zhabs kyis rgya mtsho'i nang du yang // chu srin sbal ba'i steng du brdzis// g.yas g.yon dang po'i phyag gnyis
464a2(rgyud 'bum): kyis/ / rdo rje gsor zhing dril chen rdung // mtha' gnyis drug pa zhal du 'dren// dbu gsum g.yas dkar rigs lngas brgyan// dbu g.yon dmar po sbrul gyis mdzes// zhal dbus mthing nag lcags mchu
464a3(rgyud 'bum): can/ / steng du mkha' lding tshangs pa sprul// dpa' bo gdug pa dpung po'i brgyan// rin chen lhun po'i ri rab la// stangs bcas zhum pa med par bzhugs// de ltar lha dang rab sbyar nas// de nyid bstan
464a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i yan lag gis/ / rang lus tshigs su gzhug par gyis// rdo rje bde ba'i rgyud las/ lha sgom pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas mngon par bshad bya ba
464a5(rgyud 'bum): / sgo gsum sbyor ba shes pa yis// gsang ba'i snying po 'bum du bzlas// oM badz+ra tsaN+DA sarba duSh+TA ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM phaT/ bco brgyad sngags kyi rgyal po 'di// ma 'byung mi 'byung 'byung mi 'gyur// 'di
464a6(rgyud 'bum): bzlas sngon du grub par 'gyur/ / rtag tu mtshan ma bzang po 'byung // gzhan gyi sbyor ba 'ong mi 'ong // rang la nges par ston par 'gyur// bsnyen pa'i rim par thub mi thub// 'bad pas legs par brtag par
464a7(rgyud 'bum): bya ba de nas gtor ma sbyin pa mi/ / oM AHhUM zhes rgyun du gtong ngo // rdo rje bde ba'i rgyud las/ gsang ba'i snying po dang mtshan lngas bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// de nas
464b1(rgyud 'bum): mngon par bshad bya ba/ / rten ni rdo rje'i 'od du nga// brten pa 'gro chatshang hU~M du 'bar// 'bar ba'i 'od byer kun tu 'gro// 'jig rten ma lus sbyangs nas kyang / slar lajig pa nyid la 'dus/ rtswa dang rnas ga /
464b2(rgyud 'bum): 'bar// brtan par gyur na spro bstsu bya// rdo rje 'de ba'i rgyud las/ me'i bsam gtan gyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// de nas mngon par bshang bya ba// mthing gi shog bu sngon po la// gser gyi 'khor
464b3(rgyud 'bum): lo bris pa'i snang / / bsrung ba'i snying po legs bkod de// gang ming rag sha sbyar bar gyis// de yang dri yis yongs bsgos te// sangs rgyas sems can nyid la stim// de nyid bum par legs bzhugs
464b4(rgyud 'bum): la mchod cing bzlas brjod gsol ba gdab/ / de nas tshes pa'i dus bzang la// rang ngam gzhan la btags gyur na// bar chad thams cad nyer zhi nas// tshe dpal bsod nams rgyas par

464b6(rgyud 'bum): 'tshe ba 'di ltar 'byung bar 'gyur// mi dga' sems 'phyo 'gro snying 'dod// nyam chung 'thibs dang ltas kyang ngan// yang yang na zhing bsnyams snol 'ong // de ni klu yi gnod pa ste// tshor nas legs par
464b7(rgyud 'bum): bcos na bzlog/ sa srin mi la 'di ltar gnod// lus sbrid sha 'phrig sha ro 'byung // sha bkra thor bu ngo yang 'gyur// de nas tshor nas bcos na bzlog/ sa bdag gnod na 'di ltar 'gyur// gdong
465a1(rgyud 'bum): yang shin tu ldog 'gyur che/ / na ma'i zug rngu drag por 'gyur// res 'ga' bde ba ltar yang byed// skabs su thig le kho na na// de yang bcos bka' shes pas thog/ gnyan
465a2(rgyud 'bum): gnod pa 'di yin te/ / shin tu na tsha'i tshabs kyang che// rkang lag na 'khums dri ma ldog/ sha khrag lus nas mig kyang sreng // kha so sna yo chu ser ba// kha yang mi thub gnod pa za// chu bur byung na mtshang
465a3(rgyud 'bum): yang che/ / tshor bas mi chog sgrim pa gces// gdon tshogs gzhan yang yun mi rtag/ pha mo tsam la sogs pa zlog/ kun la bsgrims te btsos na 'tsho// rdo rje bde ba'i rgyud las/ gzhan gyi
465a4(rgyud 'bum): / gnod pa brtag pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas mngon par bshad bya ba// dbang chel sogs thams cad la// mchod dang gtor mas mgu bar bya// ci 'dong pa yi rdzas

465a7(rgyud 'bum): rtsi dang / / shu dag shing kun mu bi drug/ gsang sngags btab ste lus la byug/ gu gul nyam khris gla rtsi dang // sgog pa shu dag dri chen rnams// bdug pa byas te yang na bkru// gserag yu b+hu ru mig
465b1(rgyud 'bum): ma phug/ btsan dug rma bya'i mkhris par bcas// bcangs na bsrung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur// rdo rje bde ba'i rgyud las/ rten 'brel rdzas kyi le'u ste dgu pa'o// rdo rje bde ba'i rgyud
465b2(rgyud 'bum): las dum bu dang po bstan pa'o/ / de nas mngon par bshad bya ba// gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba'i phyir// drag sngags 'di dag brjod par bya'o// oM mA ra Na song sod/ mA ra
465b3(rgyud 'bum): / bying bying / mA ra Na rmugs rmugs/ mA ra Na ha la ha la/ mA ra Na dun dun/ mA ra Na myos myos/ mA ra Na myos bying thum ri la dzaH/ mi tshig spangs te drag sngags 'di// dbugs ma shor bar sgrub nas drang / bum par bstis
465b4(rgyud 'bum): nas rtags thob nas/ / 'thungs sam dkrus na dngos grub thob// sngags la gang ming sbyar byas nas// yungs kar gdug pa'i phur pa la// brjod de las la sbyar gyur na// gang la bzlas pa brlag

465b6(rgyud 'bum): ste bcu pa'o/ / / de nas mngon par bshad bya ba// rdzas bsag lha bskyed drag sngags bzlas// dgos pa tshang ba'i bum pa ste// mi dmigs paM las rin po che'i//
465b7(rgyud 'bum): bum pa tshul dang 'thun par bsam// de nas baM dang laM las ni// chu dang sa yi dkyil 'khor bas ma// lha bsgoms khyad par bum pa 'dzin// mchu ni rdo rje'i sbu gu ste// de nas sngags kyi 'od zer 'phros/
466a1(rgyud 'bum): phyir 'phros gdug pa ma lus sreg/ 'od zer lcags kyi sgrub mar drang // bum par khro chu khol mar gyur// de 'thungs bkrus pas gang gnod pa// rdul du drag ste dag par bsam/
466a2(rgyud 'bum): brtsams pa'i las la the tsom med// rdo rje khros pa'i rgyud las/ bum pa khros pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas mngon par bshad bya ba// rdzas bsag lha bsgoms 'khor lo bskor
466a3(rgyud 'bum): ro ras byi dug bya rog sgros/ / khru gang tsam gyi mtshan nyid la// 'chi bar byed pa'i snag tsha la// ltogs pa'i sgro rtsa g.yas pa yis// drag sngags mnyam pa'i re mig bri// de nas mtshan mar gang
466a4(rgyud 'bum): dmigs gzugs/ / kha dog rigs bzhi nyid du bya// de snying drag sngags re re dgod// maN+Dal gtsang ma dris byugs te// dkar dang dmar dang ser dang ldang // rma bya'i sgo yis brgyan byas te// lha sgom
466a5(rgyud 'bum): khyad par 'khor lo 'dzin/ / 'khor lo bskor ba'i rim pa ni// drag sngags mnyam pa'i 'khor lo bskor// sngags ni/ nA ga tsakra mA ra Na hUM phaT/ gang bsams 'di la the tsom med// rdo rje khros pa'i
466a6(rgyud 'bum): rgyud las/ 'khor lo khros pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas mngon par bshad bya ba// rdzas bsag lha bsgom phur pa ga ba// lcags sam seng ldeng dug shing la// sngags
466a7(rgyud 'bum): grangs mnyam pa'i phur pa bsham/ / 'khor lo'i mtha' ma bskor te dgod// lha bsgom khyad par phur ba 'dzin// drag sngags bzlas pa'i rim pa ni// nA ga badz+ra kI la ya mA ra Na hUM phaT/ sngags grangs ma'am pa'i
466b1(rgyud 'bum): phur pa bsham/ / brtsams pa'i las la the tshom med// rdo rje khros pa'i rgyud las/ phur pa khros pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas mngon par bshad bya ba// rdzas bsag lnga
466b2(rgyud 'bum): bsgom sbyin sreg bya/ / gdug pa'i shing bu khru gang tshad// sngags kyi grangs kyang mnyam par bya// sngon dmar skud pas rim gsum dkri// bar der 'khor lo'i srog rtsa gcad// lag tu gri thogs drag sngags brjod//
466b3(rgyud 'bum): nA ga tik+Sh+mI che ge mo mA ra ya hUM phaT/ rim par bsgrangs te g.yang gzhi khud// byang shar mtshams su rnam par gzhag/ de nas maN+Dal dbus nyid du// hom khung brus te dug khrag byug/ nang du hom bu gzug par
466b4(rgyud 'bum): byas 'khor lo gris gtubs thogs nas ni/ / grangs dang mnyam par bsreg par bya// me de yugs sa'i khyim nas bslang // lha bsgom khyad par ma dpung 'dzin// gsang sngags bzlas pa'i rim pa 'di// nA ga tsit+ta dz+wa la
466b5(rgyud 'bum): ror mA ra ya phaT/ bsregs nas las brtsams 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje bde ba khros pa'i rgyud las/ me dpung khros pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// de nas mngon par bshad bya ba// rdzas
466b6(rgyud 'bum): bsag lnga bsgom man sngag zug chu srin sram mamabe pa'i mgor/ / bsregs pa'i thal ba bsdus byas la// gang yin nyid kyi sbyor ba bcas// lha bsgom khyad par ri rab 'dzin// drag sngag bzlas pa'i rim pa ni// nA gsum
466b7(rgyud 'bum): b+ha ya nan/ / mnan byas chu srim pa ru bsgom// 'di byas gang la bzlas pa brlag/ 'di la the tshom mi bya'o// rdo rje khros pa'i rgyud las// ri rab khros pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// rdo rje khros pa'i rgyud las
467a1(rgyud 'bum): dum bu gnyis pa'o/ / / de nas mngon par bshad bya ba// glang po'i bags par 'brug bris nas/ gang ming bcug ste drag sngags bzlas// gnam lkugs
467a2(rgyud 'bum): bab pa bzlog par 'gyur/ / 'bru yi pad+ma 'dab brgyad la// klu yi gzugs rnams bris pa la// bstim nas drag sngags brgyab gyur na// gnam chu dus su phebs par 'gyur// thod par e bris sngags kyis
467a3(rgyud 'bum): bskor/ / gang yin bcug la bstim pa la// drag sngags gang yin bzlas byas na// myur du 'grub par gdon mi za// srog chags 'jigs par gyur pa la// 'chi ba'i chu yis drag sngags bri/
467a4(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs byed bkug ste de la mchod// de nyid yungs kar thum por 'debs// gang la btags pa srung ba'i mchog/ rdo rje bde khros kyi rgyud las/ phra mo'i le'u ste bcu drug
467a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / / de nas de dag la 'khor rnams mngon par dga' ste/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod cing bstod nas rjes su yi rang ba phul te mi snang bar gyur to// mnyam pa chen po
467a6(rgyud 'bum): la gzhag pa'o/ / rdo rje bde khros kyi rgyud las/ rjes su yi rang ba'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// rdo chos kyi rgyud las dus su gsum pa'o// rdzogs so//
